   agni īḍ purohita    yajña deva ṛtvij    hotṛ ratna dhātama    agni pūrva ṛṣi    īḍ nūtana uta    tad deva ā iha vah    agni rayi aś    poṣa eva diva diva    yaśas vīravattama    agni yad yajña adhvara    viśvatas paribhū as    tad id deva gam    agni hotṛ kavi kratu    satya citraśravastama    deva deva ā gam    yat aṅga dāś tvad    agni bhadra kṛ    tvad id tad satya aṅgiras    upa tvad agni diva diva    doṣāvastṛ dhī mad    namas bhṛ ā i    rāj adhvara    gopā ṛta dīdivi    vṛdh sva dama    tad mad pitṛ iva sūnu    agni su upāyana bhū    sac mad svasti 
     vāyu ā yā darśata    idam soma alaṃkṛ    tad pā śru hava    vāyu uktha jṛ    tvad acchā jaritṛ    su soma ahar vid    vāyu tvad prapṛc    dhenā gā dāś    uruvyañc soma pīti    indra vāyu idam suta    upa prayas ā gam    indu tvad vaś hi    vāyu indra ca cit    suta vājinī vasu    tad ā yā upa dru    vāyu indra ca su    ā yā upa niṣkṛta    makṣū itthā dhī nara    mitra hvā pū dakṣa    varuṇa ca riśādas    dhī ghṛtāñc sādh    ṛta mitrāvaruṇa    ṛtāvṛdh ṛta spṛś    kratu bṛhat aś    kavi mad mitrāvaruṇa    tuvi jan uru kṣaya    dakṣa dhā apas 
     aśvin yajvan iṣ    dru pāṇi śubh pati    puru bhuj canasy    aśvin puru daṃsas    nara śavīra dhī    dhiṣṇya van gir    dasra yuvāku suta    nāsatya vṛj barhis    ā yā rudravartani    indra ā yā citra bhānu    suta idam tvāyu    aṇu tan pū    indra ā yā dhī iṣay    vipra jū sutāvat    upa brahman vāghant    indra ā yā tuj    upa brahman harivat    suta dhā mad canas    oma carṣaṇī dhṛt    viśva deva ā gam    dāś dāś suta    viśva deva aptur    suta ā gam tūrṇi    usrā iva svasara    viśva deva asridh    ehimāya adruh    medha juṣ vahni    pāvaka mad sarasvatī    vāja vājinīvat    yajña vaś dhiyāvasu    codayitṛ sūnṛta    cit sumati    yajña dhā sarasvatī    mah arṇas sarasvatī    pra cetay ketu    dhī viśva vi rāj 
     su rūpa kṛtnu ūti    su dugha iva goduh    hvā div div    upa mad savana gam    soma soma pā pā    go dā id revat mada    atha tvad antama    vid sumati    mā mad ati khyā ā gam    pare vigra astṛta    indra pracch vipaścit    yad tvad sakhi ā vara    uta brū mad nid    niḥ anyatas cit ṛch    dhā indra id duvas    uta mad subhaga ari    vac dasma kṛṣṭi    as id indra śarman    ā īṃ āśu āśu bhṛ    yajña śrī nṛ mādana    patay manday sakha    idam pā śatakratu    ghana vṛtra bhū    prāv vāja vājin    tad tvad vāja vājin    vājay śatakratu    dhana indra sāti    yad rai avani mahat    su pāra su sakhi    tad indra gā 
     ā tu i ni sad    indra abhi pra gā    sakhi stoma vāhas    purutama puru    īś vārya    indra soma sacā su    tad gha mad yoga ā bhū    tad rai tad puraṃdhi    gam vāja ā tad mad    yad saṃstha na vṛ    hari samad śatru    tad indra gā    suta pāvan su idam    śuci i vīti    soma dadhi āśir    tva suta pā    sadyas vṛdh jan    indra jyaiṣṭhya sukratu    ā tvad viś āśu    soma indra girvaṇas    śam tvad as pracetas    tvad stoma vṛdh    tvad uktha śatakratu    tvad vṛdh mad gir    akṣitoti san idam    vāja indra sahasrin    yad viśva pauṃsya    mā mad marta abhi druh    tanu indra girvaṇas    īś yavay vadha 
     yuj bradhna aruṣa    car pari sthā    ruc rocana div    yuj idam kāmya    hari vipakṣas ratha    śoṇa dhṛṣṇu nṛ vāhas    ketu kṛ aketu    peśas marya apeśas    sam uṣas jan    āt aha svadhā anu    punar garbha tva er    dhā nāman yajñiya    vīḍu cit ārujatnu    guhā cit indra vahni    vid usriyā anu    devay yathā mati    acchā vidadvasu gir    mah nū śruta    indra sam hi dṛś    saṃgam a bhī    mandu samāna varcas    anavadya abhidyu    makha sahasvat arc    gaṇa indra kāmya    atas parijman ā gam    div vā rocana adhi    sam idam ṛj gir    itas vā sāti ī    div vā pārthiva adhi    indra mah vā rajas 
     indra id gāthin bṛhat    indra arka arkin    indra vāṇī nū    indra id hari sacā    sammiśla ā vacas yuj    indra vajrin hiraṇyaya    indra dīrgha cakṣas    ā sūrya rohay div    vi go adri īray    indra vāja mad av    sahasra pradhana ca    ugra ugra ūti    indra mad mahādhana    indra arbha hvā    yuj vṛtra vajrin    tad mad vṛṣan adas caru    satrādāvan apa vṛ    mad apratiṣkuta    tuñja tuñja yad uttara    stoma indra vajrin    na vidh idam suṣṭuti    vṛṣan yūtha iva vaṃsaga    kṛṣṭi ṛch ojas    īś apratiṣkuta    yad eka carṣaṇi    vasu irajy    indra pañcan kṣiti    indra tvad viśvatas pari    hvā jana    mad as kevala 
     ā indra sānasi rayi    sa jitvan sadāsah    varṣiṣṭha ūti bhṛ    ni yad muṣṭi hatyā    ni vṛtra rudh    tvota ni arvant    indra tvota ā mad    vajra ghana dā    ji sam yudh spṛdh    mad śūra astṛ    indra tvad yuj mad    sah pṛtany    mahat indra paras ca nu    mahi tva as vajrin    div na prathiman śavas    samoha vā yad aś    nṛ toka saniti    vipra vā dhiyāyu    yad kukṣi soma pātama    samudra iva pinv    uru ap na kākud    eva hi idam sūnṛtā    virapśa gomat mah    pakva śākhā na dāś    eva hi tvad vibhūti    ūti indra māvat    sadyas cit as dāś    eva hi idam kāmya    stoma uktha ca śaṃs    indra soma pīti 
     indra i mad andhas    viśva soma parvan    mahat abhiṣṭi ojas    ā īṃ enad sṛj suta    mandi indra mandin    cakri viśva cakri    mad su śiprā mandin    stoma viśvacarṣaṇi    sacā idam savana ā    sṛj indra tvad gir    prati tvad ud hā    ajoṣa vṛṣabha pati    sam coday citra arvāk    rādhas indra vareṇya    as id tvad vibhu prabhu    mad su tatra coday    indra rai rabhasvat    tuvi dyumna yaśasvat    sam gomant indra vājavat    mad pṛthu śravas bṛhat    viśva āyus dhā akṣita    mad dhā śravas bṛhat    dyumna sahasra sātama    indra tad rathin iṣ    vasu indra vasu pati    gir gṛ ṛgmiya    homa gantṛ ūti    suta suta nyokas    bṛhat bṛhat ā id ari    indra śūṣa arc 
      gā tvad gāyatrin     arc arka arkin     brahman tvad śatakratu     ud vaṃśa iva yam     yat sānu sānu āruh     bhūri paś kṛ     tad indra artha cit     yūtha vṛṣṇi ej     yuj hi keśin hari     vṛṣaṇa kakṣya prā     atha mad indra soma pā     gir upaśruti car     e stoma abhi svar     abhi gṛ ā ru     brahman ca mad vasu sacā     indra yajña ca vardhay     uktha indra śaṃs     vardhana puru niṣṣidh     śakra yathā suta mad     ran sakhya ca     tad id sakhi tva ī     tad rai tad su vīrya     tad śakra uta mad śak     indra vasu day     suvivṛt suniraja     indra tvādāta id yaśas     go apa vraja vṛ     kṛ rādhas adrivat     nahi tvad rodas ubh     ṛghāy inv     ji svarvat ap     sam go mad dhū     āśrut karṇa śru hava     nu cit dhā mad gir     indra stoma idam mad     kṛ yuj cit antara     vid hi tvad vṛṣantama     vāja havana śrut     vṛṣantama hvā     ūti sahasra sātama     ā tu mad indra kauśika     mand suta pā     navya āyus pra su tṛ     kṛ sahasra sā ṛṣi     pari tvad girvaṇas gir     idam bhū viśvatas     vṛdh āyu anu vṛddhi     juṣ bhū juṣṭi 
      indra viśva vṛdh     samudra vyacas gir     rathītama rathin     vāja satpati pati     sakhya tvad indra vājin     mā bhī śavas pati     tvad abhi pra nonāv     jetṛ aparājita     puru indra rāti     na vi das ūti     yadi vāja gomat     stotṛ mah magha     pur bhindu yuvan kavi     amita ojas jan     indra viśva karman     dhartṛ vajrin puruṣṭuta     tvad vala gomat     apavṛ adrivat bila     tvad deva a bhī     tuj av     tvad mad śūra rāti     prati i sindhu āvad     upasthā girvaṇas     vid tvad tad kāru     māyā indra māyin     tvad śuṣṇa avatṛ     vid tvad tad medhira     tad śravas ud tṛ     indra īś ojas     abhi stoma nū     sahasra yad rāti     uta vā as bhūyas 
      agni dūta vṛ     hotṛ viśva vedas     idam yajña sukratu     agni agni havīman     sadā hvā viśpati     havya vāha puru priya     agni deva iha ā vah     jan vṛktabarhis     as hotṛ mad īḍ     tad vaś vi bodhay     yat agni yā dūtya     deva ā sad barhis     ghṛtāhavana dīdī     prati sma riṣ dah     agni tvad rakṣasvin     agni agni sam indh     kavi gṛhapati yuvan     havyavah juhū āsya     kavi agni upa stu     satya dharman adhvara     deva amīva cātana     yad tvad agni haviṣpati     dūta deva sapary     tad sma pra avitṛ bhū     yad agni deva vīti     haviṣmat āvivās     tad pāvaka mṛḍay     tad mad pāvaka dīdī     agni deva iha ā vah     upa yajña havis ca mad     tad mad stu ā bhṛ     gāyatra navīyas     rayi vīravat iṣ     agni śukra śocis     viśva deva hūti     idam stoma juṣ mad 
      su samindh mad ā vah     deva agni haviṣmat     hotṛ pāvaka yaj ca     madhumat tanūnapāt     yajña deva mad kavi     adya kṛ vīti     narāśaṃsa iha priya     idam yajña upa hvā     madhu jihvā haviṣkṛta     agni sukhatama ratha     deva īḍ ā vah     as hotṛ manus dhā     stṛ barhis ānuṣak     ghṛta pṛṣṭha manīṣin     yatra amṛta cakṣaṇa     vi śri ṛtāvṛdh     dvār deva asaścat     adya nūnam ca yaj     naktoṣāsā supeśas     idam yajña upa hvā     idam mad barhis āsad     tad su jihvā upa hvā     hotṛ daivya kavi     yajña mad yaj idam     iḍā sarasvatī mahī     tri devī mayobhu     barhis sad asridh     iha tvaṣṭṛ agriya     viśva rūpa upa hvā     mad as kevala     ava sṛj vanaspati     deva deva havis     pra dātṛ as cetana     svāhā yajña kṛ     indra yajvan gṛha     tatra deva upa hvā 
      ā idam agni duvas gir     viśva soma pīti     deva yā yaj ca     ā tvad kaṇva hvā     gṛ vipra tvad dhī     deva agni ā gam     indra vāyu bṛhaspati     mitra agni pūṣan bhaga     āditya māruta gaṇa     pra tvad bhṛ indu     matsara mādayiṣṇu     drapsa madhu camūṣad     īḍ tvad avasyu     kaṇva vṛj barhis     haviṣmat araṃkṛt     ghṛta pṛṣṭha manas yuj     yad tvad vah vahni     ā deva soma pīti     tad yajatra ṛtāvṛdh     agni patnīvat kṛ     madhu su jihvā pāyay     yad yajatra yad īḍ     tad tvad pā jihvā     madhu agni vaṣaṭ kṛt     sūrya rocana     viśva deva uṣarbudh     vipra hotṛ iha vah     viśva somya madhu     agni indra vāyu     pā mitra dhāman     tvad hotṛ manus dhā     agni yajña sad     tad idam mad adhvara yaj     yuj hi aruṣa ratha     harit deva rohit     tad deva iha ā vah 
      indra soma pā ṛtu     tvad viś indu     matsara tad oka     marut pā ṛtu     potra yajña pū     tvad hi as sudānu     abhi yajña gṛ mad     gnāvat neṣṭṛ pā ṛtu     tvad hi ratna dhā as     agni deva iha ā vah     sāday yoni tri     pari bhūṣ pā ṛtu     brāhmaṇa indra rādhas     pā soma ṛtu anu     tvad id hi sakhya astṛta     tvad dakṣa dhṛ vrata     mitrāvaruṇa dūḍabha     ṛtu yajña aś     draviṇas dā draviṇas     grāvan hasta adhvara     yajña deva īḍ     draviṇas dā dā mad     vasu yad śru     deva tad van     draviṇas dā pipīṣ     hu pra ca sthā     neṣṭra ṛtu iṣ     yat tvad turīya ṛtu     draviṇas dā yaj     adha sma mad dadi bhū     aśvin pā madhu     dīdi agni śuci vrata     ṛtu yajña vāhas     gārhapatya santya     ṛtu yajñanī as     deva devay yaj 
      ā tvad vah hari     vṛṣan soma pīti     indra tvad sūra cakṣas     idam dhānā ghṛtasnu     hari iha upa vah     indra sukhatama ratha     indra prātar hvā     indra pre adhvara     indra soma pīti     upa mad su ā gam     hari indra keśin     su hi tvad hvā     tad idam mad stoma ā gam     upa idam savana su     gaura na tṛṣita pā     idam soma indu     su adhi barhis     tad indra sahas pā     idam tvad stoma agriya     hṛdispṛś as śaṃtama     atha soma su pā     viśva id savana su     indra mada gam     vṛtrahan soma pīti     tad idam mad kāma ā pṛṇ     go aśva śatakratu     stu tvad su ādhī 
      indrāvaruṇa mad     samrāj avas ā vṛ     tad mad mṛḍ īdṛś     gantṛ hi as avas     hava vipra māvat     dhartṛ carṣaṇi     anukāma tarpay     indrāvaruṇa rai ā     tad tvad nediṣṭha ī     yuvāku hi śacī     yuvāku sumati     bhū vāja dāvan     indra sahasra dāvan     varuṇa śaṃs     kratu bhū ukthya     tad id avas mad     san ni ca dhā     as uta prarecana     indrāvaruṇa tvad mad     hvā citra rādhas     mad su ji kṛ     indrāvaruṇa nu nu tvad     siṣās dhī ā     mad śarman yam     pra tvad aś suṣṭuti     indrāvaruṇa yad hvā     yad ṛdh sadhastuti 
      soman svaraṇa     kṛ brahman pati     kakṣīvant yad auśija     yad revat yad amīva han     vasu vid puṣṭi vardhana     tad mad sac yad tura     mā mad śaṃsa a rā     dhūrti praṇaś martya     rakṣ mad brahman pati     tad gha vīra na riṣ     yad indra brahman pati     soma hi martya     tvad tad brahman pati     soma indra ca martya     dakṣiṇā pā aṃhas     sadas pati adbhuta     priya indra kāmya     sani medhā yā     yad ṛte na sidh     yajña vipaścit cana     tad dhī yoga inv     āt ṛdh haviṣkṛti     prāñc kṛ adhvara     hotrā deva gam     narāśaṃsa sudhṛṣṭama     paś saprathastama     div na sadmamakhas 
      prati tya cāru adhvara     gopītha pra hvā     marut agni ā gam     nahi deva na martya     mah tvad kratu para     marut agni ā gam     yad mah rajas vid     viśva deva adruh     marut agni ā gam     yad ugra arka arc     anādhṛṣṭa ojas     marut agni ā gam     yad śubhra ghora varpas     su kṣatra riśādas     marut agni ā gam     yad nāka adhi rocana     div deva ās     marut agni ā gam     yad īṅkhay parvata     tiras samudra arṇava     marut agni ā gam     ā yad tan raśmi     tiras samudra ojas     marut agni ā gam     abhi tvad pūrva pīti     sṛj somya madhu     marut agni ā gam 
      idam deva janman     stoma vipra āsayā     kṛ ratna dhātama     yad indra vacas yuj     takṣ manas hari     śamī yajña aś     takṣ nāsatya     parijman sukha ratha     takṣ dhenu sabardugha     yuvan pitṛ punar     satya mantra ṛjūyu     ṛbhu viṣṭi kṛ     sam tvad mada gam     indra ca marutvat     āditya ca rājan     uta tya camasa nava     tvaṣṭṛ deva niṣkṛ     kṛ catur punar     tad mad ratna dhā     tris ā sāpta su     eka eka su śasti     dhāray vahni     bhaj su kṛtyā     bhāga deva yajñiya 
      iha indra agni upa hvā     tad id stoma vaś     tad soma soma pātama     tad yajña pra śaṃs     indra agni śubh nṛ     tad gāyatra gā     tad mitra praśasti     indra agni tad hvā     soma pā soma pīti     ugra as hvā     upa idam savana su     indra agni ā iha gam     tad mahat sadaspati     indra agni rakṣas ubj     apraja as atrin     tad satya jāgṛ     adhi pracetuna pada     indra agni śarman yam 
      prātar yuj vi bodhay     aśvin ā iha gam     idam soma pīti     yad su ratha rathītama     ubh deva divispṛś     aśvin tad hvā     yad tvad kaśā madhumat     aśvin sūnṛtāvat     tad yajña mikṣ     nahi tvad as dūraka     yatra ratha gam     aśvin somin gṛha     hiraṇya pāṇi ūti     savitṛ upa hvā     tad cit devatā pada     ap napāt av     savitṛ upa stu     tad vrata vaś     vibhaktṛ hvā     vasu citra rādhas     savitṛ nṛ cakṣas     sakhi ā ni sad     savitṛ stomya nu mad     dātṛ rādhas śubh     agni patnī iha ā vah     deva vaś upa     tvaṣṭṛ soma pīti     ā gnā agni iha av     hotrā yaviṣṭha bhāratī     varūtṛ dhiṣaṇā vah     abhi mad devī avas     mah śarman nṛ patnī     acchinna pattra sac     iha indrāṇī upa hvā     varuṇānī svasti     agnāyī soma pīti     mahi div pṛthivī ca mad     idam yajña mikṣ     pṛ mad bharīman     tad id ghṛtavat payas     vipra rih dhīti     gandharva dhruva pada     syona pṛthivī bhū     anṛkṣara niveśana     yam mad śarman saprathas     atas deva av mad     yatas viṣṇu vikram     pṛthivī saptan dhāman     idam viṣṇu vi kram     tredhā ni dhā pada     saṃvah idam pāṃsura     tri pada vi kram     viṣṇu gopā adābhya     atas dharma dhāray     viṣṇu karman paś     yatas vrata paś     indra yujya sakhi     tad viṣṇu parama pada     sadā paś sūri     div iva cakṣus ātan     tad vipra vipanyu     jāgṛ sam indh     viṣṇu yad parama pada 
      tīvra soma ā gam     āśīrvat suta idam     vāyu tad prasthā pā     ubh deva divispṛś     indra vāyu hvā     idam soma pīti     indra vāyu manas jū     vipra hvā ūti     sahasra akṣa dhī pati     mitra mad hvā     varuṇa soma pīti     jan pū dakṣas     ṛta yad ṛtāvṛdh     ṛta jyotis pati     tad mitrāvaruṇa hvā     varuṇa prāvitṛ bhū     mitra viśva ūti     kṛ mad surādhas     marutvat hvā     indra ā soma pīti     sajūs gaṇa tṛp     indra jyeṣṭha marut gaṇa     deva pūṣarāti     viśva mad śru hava     han vṛtra sudānu     indra sahas yuj     mā mad duḥśaṃsa īś     viśva deva hvā     marut soma pīti     ugra hi pṛśni mātṛ     ji iva tanyatu     marut i dhṛṣṇuyā     yad śubha yā nṛ     haskāra vidyut pari     atas jan av mad     marut mṛḍay mad     ā pūṣan citra barhis     āghṛṇi dharuṇa div     āj naś yathā paśu     pūṣan rājan āghṛṇi     apaguh guhā dhā     vid citra barhis     uta u tad mad indu     ṣaṣ yuj anuseṣidh     go yava na carkṛṣ     ambi i adhvan     jāmi adhvarīy     pṛc madhu payas     adas yad upa sūrya     yad vā sūrya saha     tad mad hi adhvara     ap devī upa hvā     yatra go pā mad     sindhu kṛ havis     ap antar amṛta ap bheṣaja     ap uta praśasti     deva bhū vājin     ap mad soma brū     antar viśva bheṣaja     agni ca viśva śambhu     ap ca viśva bheṣaja     ap pṛ bheṣaja     varūtha tanū mad     jyok ca sūrya dṛś     idam ap pra vah     yad ka ca durita mad     yad vā mad abhidruh     yad vā śap uta anṛta     ap adya anu car     rasa sam gam     payasvat agni ā gam     tad mad sam sṛj varcas     sam mad agni varcas sṛj     sam prajā sam āyus     vid mad idam deva     indra vid saha ṛṣi 
      ka nūnam katama amṛta     man cāru deva nāman     ka mad mahi aditi punar dā     pitṛ ca dṛś mātṛ ca     agni mad prathama amṛta     man cāru deva nāman     tad mad mahi aditi punar dā     pitṛ ca dṛś mātṛ ca     abhi tvad deva savitṛ     īś vārya     sadā av bhāga i     yad cit hi tvad itthā bhaga     śam purā nid     a dveṣa hasta dhā     bhaga bhaj tad mad     ud aś tvad avas     mūrdhan rai ārabh     nahi tvad kṣatra na sahas na manyu     vayas cana adas patay āp     na idam ap animiṣa car     na yad vāta pramī abhva     abudhna rājan varuṇa vana     ūrdhva stūpa dā pū dakṣa     nīcīna sthā upari budhna idam     mad antar nidhā ketu as     uru hi rājan varuṇa kṛ     sūrya pathin anvi u     a pad pāda pratidhā kṛ     uta apavaktṛ hṛdayāvidh cit     śata tvad rājan bhiṣaj sahasra     uru gabhīra sumati tvad as     bādh dūra nirṛti parācais     kṛ cit enas pra muc mad     adas yad ṛkṣa nidhā uccā     nakta dṛś kuha cit divā i     adabdha varuṇa vrata     vicākaś candramas nakta i     tad tvad yā brahman vand     tad ā śās yajamāna havis     a hīḍ varuṇa iha bhū     uru śaṃsa mā mad āyus pra muṣ     tad id nakta tad divā mad ah     tad idam keta hṛd ā vi cakṣ     śunaḥśepa yad hvā grah     tad mad rājan varuṇa muc     śunaḥśepa hi hvā grah     tri āditya dru pada bandh     ava enad rājan varuṇa sṛj     vid adabdha vi muc pāśa     ava tvad heḍas varuṇa namas     ava yajña i havis     kṣi mad asura pracetas     rājan enas śrath kṛ     ud uttama varuṇa pāśa mad     ava adhama vi madhyama śrathāy     atha mad āditya vrata tvad     anāgas aditi as 
      yat cit hi tvad viś yathā     pra deva varuṇa vrata     mī div div     mā mad vadha hatnu     hīḍ radh     mā hṛ manyu     vi mṛḍīka tvad manas     rathī aśva na saṃdo     gir varuṇa sā     parā hi mad vimanyu     pat vasyas iṣṭi     vi na vasati upa     kadā kṣatra śrī nara     ā varuṇa kṛ     mṛḍīka uru cakṣas     tad id samāna aś     ven na pra yu     dhṛ vrata dāś     vid yad vi pada     antarikṣa pat     vid nau samudriya     vid mās dhṛ vrata     dvādaśan prajāvat     vid yad upajan     vid vāta vartani     uru ṛṣva bṛhat     vid yad adhyās     ni sad dhṛ vrata     varuṇa pastyā ā     sāmrājya su kratu     atas viśva adbhuta     cit abhi paś     kṛ yad ca kṛ     tad mad viśvāhā su kratu     āditya su patha kṛ     pra mad āyus tṛ     bhṛ drāpi hiraṇyaya     varuṇa vas nirṇij     pari spaś ni sad     na yad dips dipsu     na druhvan jana     na deva abhimāti     uta yad mānuṣa ā     yaśas kṛ asāmi ā     mad udara ā     parā mad i dhīti     go na gavyūti anu     iṣ uru cakṣas     sam nu vac punar     yatas mad madhu ābhṛ     hotṛ iva kṣad priya     dṛś nu viśva darśata     dṛś ratha adhi kṣam     etad juṣ mad gir     idam mad varuṇa śru     hava adya ca mṛḍay     tvad avasyu ā kan     tvad viśva medhira     div ca gam ca rāj     tad yāman prati śru     ud uttama muc mad     vi pāśa madhyama cṛt     ava adhama jīv 
      vas hi miyedhya     vastra ūrj pati     tad idam mad adhvara yaj     ni mad hotṛ vareṇya     sadā yaviṣṭha manman     agni divitmat vacas     ā hi sma sūnu pitṛ     āpi yaj āpi     sakhi sakhi vareṇya     ā mad barhis riśādas     varuṇa mitra aryaman     sad manus yathā     pūrvya hotṛ idam mad     mand sakhya ca     idam u su śru gir     yat cit hi śaśvat tan     deva deva yaj     tvad id hu havis     priya mad as viśpati     hotṛ mandra vareṇya     priya su agni mad     su agni hi vārya     deva dhā ca mad     su agni man     atha mad ubhaya     amṛta martya     mithas as praśasti     viśva agni agni     idam yajña idam vacas     canas dhā sahas yahu 
      aśva na tvad vāravat     vand agni namas     saṃrāj adhvara     tad gha mad sūnu śavas     pṛthu pragāman su śeva     mīḍhvas mad bhū     tad mad dūrāt ca āsāt ca     ni martya aghāyu     pā sadam id viśvāyu     idam u su tvad mad     sani gāyatra navyas     agni deva pra vac     ā mad bhaj parama     ā vāja madhyama     śikṣ vasu antama     vibhaktṛ as citrabhānu     sindhu ūrmi upāka ā     sadyas dāś kṣar     yad agni pṛt martya     av vāja yad jū     tad yam śaśvat iṣ     nakir idam sahantya     parī kaya cit     vāja as śravāyya     tad vāja viśvacarṣaṇi     arvant as tarutṛ     vipra as sanitṛ     jarā bodha tad viṣ     viś viś yajñiya     stoma rudra dṛśīka     tad mad mahat animāna     dhūmaketu puru ścandra     dhī vāja hi     tad revat iva viśpati     daivya ketu śru mad     uktha agni bṛhadbhānu     namas mahat namas arbhaka     namas yuvan namas āśina     yaj deva yadi śak     mā jyāyas śaṃsa ā vṛj deva 
      yatra grāvan pṛthu budhna     ūrdhva bhū su     ulūkhala su     ava id u indra jargur     yatra dvi iva jaghana     adhiṣavaṇya kṛ     ulūkhala su     ava id u indra jargur     yatra nārī apacyava     upacyava ca śikṣ     ulūkhala su     ava id u indra jargur     yatra manthā vibandh     raśmi yam iva     ulūkhala su     ava id u indra jargur     yat cit hi tvad gṛha gṛha     ulūkhalaka yuj     iha dyumattama vad     ji iva dundubhi     uta sma tvad vanaspati     vāta vi vā agra id     atha u indra pā     su soma ulūkhala     āyaji vāja sātama     tad hi uccā vibharibhṛ     hari iva andhas bhas     tad mad adya vanaspati     ṛṣva ṛṣva sotṛ     indra madhumat su     ucchiṣṭa camū bhṛ     soma pavitra ā sṛj     ni dhā go adhi tvac 
      yat cit hi satya soma pā     an āśaṃs iva as     ā tu mad indra śaṃsay     go aśva śubhri     sahasra tuvīmagha     śiprin vāja pati     śacīvat tvad daṃsanā     ā tu mad indra śaṃsay     go aśva śubhri     sahasra tuvīmagha     ni svāpay mithūdṛś     sas a budh     ā tu mad indra śaṃsay     go aśva śubhri     sahasra tuvīmagha     sas tya arāti     budh śūra rāti     ā tu mad indra śaṃsay     go aśva śubhri     sahasra tuvīmagha     sam indra gardabha mṛṇ     nū pāpa adas     ā tu mad indra śaṃsay     go aśva śubhri     sahasra tuvīmagha     pat kuṇḍṛṇācī     dūram vāta vana adhi     ā tu mad indra śaṃsay     go aśva śubhri     sahasra tuvīmagha     sarva parikrośa han     jambhay kṛkadāśū     ā tu mad indra śaṃsay     go aśva śubhri     sahasra tuvīmagha 
      ā tvad indra krivi yathā     vājay śatakratu     maṃhiṣṭha sic indu     śata vā yad śuci     sahasra vā samāśir     ā id u nimna na ri     sam yat mada śuṣmin     enā hi idam udara     samudra na vyacas dhā     idam u tvad sam at     kapota iva garbhadhi     vacas tad cit mad ūh     stotra rādhā pati     girvāhas vīra yad tvad     vibhūti as sūnṛta     ūrdhva sthā mad ūti     idam vāja śatakratu     sam anya brū     yoga yoga tavastara     vāja vāja hvā     sakhi indra ūti     ā gha gam yadi śru     sahasrin ūti     vāja upa mad hava     anu pratna oka     hvā tuviprati nṛ     yad tvad pūrvam pitṛ hvā     tad tvad mad viśva vāra     śās puruhūta     sakhi vasu jaritṛ     mad śiprin     soma pā soma pāvan     sakhi vajrin sakhi     tathā tad as soma pā     sakhi vajrin tathā kṛ     yathā tvad vaś iṣṭi     revat mad sadhamāda     indra as tuvi vāja     kṣumat yad mad     ā gha tvāvat tman āp     stotṛ dhṛṣṇu i     ṛch akṣa na cakrī     ā yat duvas śatakratu     ā kāma jaritṛ     ṛch akṣa na śacī     śaśvat indra popruth ji     nānad śāśvas dhana     tad mad hiraṇya ratha daṃsanāvat     tad mad san sani tad mad dā     āśvina aśvāvat     iṣ yā śavīra     gomant dasra hiraṇyavat     samāna yojana hi tvad     ratha dasra amartya     samudra aśvin i     ni aghnya mūrdhan     cakra ratha yam     pari div anya i     ka tvad uṣas kadhapriya     bhuj marta amartya     ka nakṣ vibhāvarī     mad hi tvad man     ā anta ā parāka     aśvā na citra aruṣī     tvad tya ā gam     vāja duhitṛ div     mad rayi ni dhāray 
      tvad agni prathama aṅgiras ṛṣi     deva deva bhū śiva sakhi     tvad vrata kavi vidmana apas     jan marut bhrāj ṛṣṭi     tvad agni prathama aṅgirastama     kavi deva pari bhūṣ vrata     vibhu viśva bhuvana medhira     dvi mātṛ śayu katidhā cit āyu     tvad agni prathama mātariśvan     āvis bhū sukratūyā vivasvant     rej rodas hotṛ vūrya     sagh bhāra yaj mah vasu     tvad agni manu div vāśay     purūravas su kṛt sukṛttara     śvātra yat pitṛ muc pari     ā tvad pūrva nī ā apara punar     tvad agni vṛṣabha puṣṭi vardhana     udyam sruc bhū śravāyya     yad āhuti pari vid vaṣaṭkṛti     eka āyu agra viś āvivās     tvad agni vṛjina vartani nara     sakman pṛ vidatha vicarṣaṇi     yad śūrasāti paritakmya dhana     dabhra cit samṛti han bhūyas     tvad tad agni amṛta tva uttama     marta dhā śravas diva diva     yad tṛṣ ubhaya janman     mayas kṛ prayas ā ca sūri     tvad mad agni sani dhana     yaśas kāru kṛ stu     ṛdh karman apas nava     deva dyāvāpṛthivī prāv mad     tvad mad agni pitṛ upastha ā     deva deva anavadya jāgṛvi     tanū kṛt bhū pramati ca kāru     tvad kalyāṇa vasu viśva āvap     tvad agni pramati tvad pitṛ as mad     tvad vayaskṛt tvad jāmi mad     sam tvad rai śatin sam sahasrin     su vīra i vratapā adābhya     tvad agni prathama āyu āyu     deva kṛ nahuṣa viśpati     iḍā kṛ manuṣa śāsanī     pitṛ yat putra mamaka jan     tvad mad agni tvad deva pāyu     maghavan rakṣ tanū ca vand     trātṛ toka tanaya go as     animeṣa rakṣ tvad vrata     tvad agni yajyu pāyu antara     aniṣaṅga catur akṣa indh     yad rā havya avṛka dhāyas     kīri cit mantra manas van tad     tvad agni uru śaṃsa vāghant     spārha yad rekṇas parama van tad     ādhra cit pramati vac pitṛ     pra pāka śās pra diś viduṣṭara     tvad agni prayam dakṣiṇā nṛ     varman iva sīv pari pā viśvatas     svādu kṣadman yad vasati syona kṛt     jīva yāja yaj tad upama div     idam agni śaraṇi mṛṣ mad     idam adhvan yad gā dūrāt     āpi pitṛ pramati somya     bhṛmi as ṛṣi kṛt martya     manuṣvat agni aṅgirasvat aṅgiras     yayāti vat sadana pūrvavat śuci     acchā yā ā vah daivya jana     ā sāday barhis yaj ca priya     etad agni brahman vṛdh     śakti vā yad tvad kṛ vid vā     uta pra nī abhi vasyas mad     sam mad sṛj sumati vājavat 
      indra nu vīrya pra vac     yad kṛ prathama vajrin     han ahi anu ap tṛd     pra vakṣaṇā bhid parvata     han ahi parvata śri     tvaṣṭṛ idam vajra svarya takṣ     vāśra iva dhenu syand     añjas samudra ava gam ap     vṛṣāy vṛ soma     trikadruka pā suta     ā sāyaka maghavan dā vajra     han enad prathama jā ahi     yat indra han prathama jā ahi     āt māyin mī pra uta māyā     āt sūrya janay div uṣas     tādītnā śatru na kila vid     han vṛtra vṛtratara vyaṃsa     indra vajra mahat vadha     skandhas iva kuliśa vivraśc     ahi śī upapṛc pṛthivī     ayoddhṛ iva durmada ā hi hvā     mahat vīra tuvi bādha ṛjīṣa     na tṛ idam samṛti vadha     sam rujānā piṣ indra śatru     a pād a hasta pṛtany indra     ā idam vajra adhi sānu han     vṛṣan vadhri pratimāna bubhūṣ     purutrā vṛtra śī vyas     nada na bhid adas śī     manu ruh ati i ap     yad cit vṛtra mahina pariṣṭhā     tad ahi patsutaḥśī bhū     nīcāvayas bhū vṛtra putra     indra idam ava vadhar bhṛ     uttara sū adhara putra as     dānu śī saha vatsa na dhenu     a sthā a niveśana     kāṣṭhā madhya nidhā śarīra     vṛtra niṇya vi car ap     dīrgha tamas āśī indra śatru     dāsa patnī ahi gopā sthā     nirudh ap paṇi iva go     ap bila apidhā yad as     vṛtra han apa tad vṛ     aśvya vāra bhū tad indra     sṛka yat tvad pratihan deva eka     ji go ji śūra soma     avasṛj sṛ saptan sindhu     na idam vidyut na tanyatu sidh     na yad mih kṛ hrāduni ca     indra ca yat yudh ahi ca     uta aparī maghavan vi ji     ahi yātṛ ka paś indra     hṛd yat tvad han bhī gam     navan ca yat navati ca sravantī     śyena na bhī tṛ rajas     indra yā avasā rājan     śama ca śṛṅgin vajra bāhu     tad id u rājan kṣi carṣaṇi     ara na nemi pari tad bhū 
      e āyā upa gavyat indra     mad su pramati vṛdh     anāmṛṇa kuvid āt idam rai     go keta para āvṛj mad     upa id mad dhana dā apratīta     juṣ na śyena vasati pat     indra namasy upama arka     yad stotṛ hvā as yāman     ni sarva senā iṣudhi sañj     sam ari go aj yad vaś     coṣkūy indra bhūri vāma     mā paṇi bhū mad adhi pravṛdh     vadh hi dasyu dhanin ghana     eka car upaśāka indra     dhanū adhi viṣuṇak tad vi i     ayajvan sanaka preti i     parā cit śīrṣa vṛj tad indra     ayajvan yajvan spṛdh     pra yat div harivat sthātṛ ugra     niḥ avrata dham rodasī     yuyuts anavadya senā     yātay kṣiti navagva     vṛṣāyudh na vadhri niraṣṭa     pravat indra citay e     tvad etad rud jakṣ ca     yodhay rajas indra pāra     avadah div ā dasyu uccā     pra su stu śaṃsa av     kṛ parīṇah pṛthivī     hiraṇya maṇi śubh     na hi tṛ tad indra     pari spaś dhā sūrya     pari yat indra rodas ubh     bhuj mahina viśvatas sīm     a man abhi man     niḥ brahman dham dasyu indra     na yad div pṛthivī anta āp     na māyā dhana dā paribhū     yuj vajra vṛṣabha kṛ indra     niḥ jyotis tamas go duh     anu svadhā kṣar ap idam     vṛdh madhya ā nāvyā     sadhrīcīna manas tad indra     ojiṣṭha hanman han abhi div     ni āvyadh ilībiśa dṛḍha     vi śṛṅgin bhid śuṣṇa indra     yāvat taras maghavan yāvat ojas     vajra śatru vadh pṛtanyu     abhi sidhma gā idam śatru     vi tigma vṛṣabha pur bhid     sam vajra sṛj vṛtra indra     pra sva mati tṛ śad     av kutsa indra yad kan     prāv yudh vṛṣabha daśadyu     śapha cyu reṇu nakṣ div     ud śvaitreya nṛṣāhya sthā     av śama vṛṣabha tugrya     kṣetra jeṣa maghavan śvitrya go     jyok cit atra sthā kṛ     śatrūy adhara vedana kṛ 
      tris cit mad adya bhū navedas     vibhu tvad yāma uta rāti aśvin     tvad hi yantra himyā iva vāsas     abhyāyam bhū manīṣin     tri pavi madhu vāhana ratha     soma venā anu viśva id vid     tri skambha skambh ārabh     tris nakta yā tris u aśvin div     samāna ahar tris avadya gohana     tris adya yajña madhu mikṣ     tris vājavat iṣ aśvin tvad     doṣā mad uṣas ca pinv     tris vartis yā tris anuvrata jana     tris suprāvya tredhā iva śikṣ     tris nāndī vah aśvin tvad     tris pṛkṣ mad akṣara iva pinv     tris mad rayi vah aśvin tvad     tris devatāti tris uta av dhī     tris saubhaga tva tris uta śravas mad     triṣṭha tvad svar duhitṛ ruh ratha     tris mad aśvin divya bheṣaja     tris pārthiva tris u dā ap     oman śam yos mamaka sūnu     tri dhātu śarman vah śubh pati     tris mad aśvin yajata diva diva     pari tri dhātu pṛthivī śī     tri nāsatya rathya parāvat     ātman iva vāta svasara gam     tris aśvin sindhu saptan mātṛ     tri āhāva tredhā havis kṛ     tri pṛthivī upari prava div     nāka rakṣ div aktu dhā     kva tri cakra trivṛt ratha     kva tri vandhur yad sanīḍa     kadā yoga vājin rāsabha     yad yajña nāsatya upayā     ā nāsatya gam hu havis     madhu pā madhupa āsan     tvad hi pūrvam savitṛ uṣas ratha     ṛta citra ghṛtavat iṣ     ā nāsatya tri ekādaśa iha     deva yā madhu peya aśvin     pra āyus tṛ niḥ rapas mṛś     sidh dveṣas bhū sacābhū     ā mad aśvin trivṛt ratha     arvāñc rayi vah su vīra     śru tvad av johav     vṛdh ca mad bhū vājasāti 
      hvā agni prathamam svasti     hvā mitrāvaruṇa iha avas     hvā rātri jagant niveśana     hvā deva savitṛ ūti     ā kṛṣṇa rajas vṛt     niveśay amṛta martya ca     hiraṇyaya savitṛ ratha     ā deva yā bhuvana paś     yā deva pravat yā udvat     yā śubhra yajata hari     ā deva yā savitṛ parāvat     apa viśva durita bādh     abhivṛ kṛśana viśva rūpa     hiraṇya śamyā yajata bṛhat     āsthā ratha savitṛ citra bhānu     kṛṣṇa rajas taviṣī dhā     vi jana śyāva śiti pād khyā     ratha hiraṇya prauga vah     śaśvat viś savitṛ daivya     upastha viśva bhuvana sthā     tri div savitṛ dvi upastha     eka yama bhuvana virāṣah     āṇi na rathya amṛta adhi sthā     iha brū yad u tad cit     vi suparṇa antarikṣa khyā     gabhīra vepas asura su nītha     kva idānīm sūrya ka cit     katama div raśmi idam tan     aṣṭan vi khyā kakubh pṛthivī     tri dhanvan yojana saptan sindhu     hiraṇya akṣa savitṛ deva āgā     dhā ratna dāś vārya     hiraṇya pāṇi savitṛ vicarṣaṇi     ubh dyāvāpṛthivī antar i     apa amīvā bādh vī sūrya     abhi kṛṣṇa rajas div ṛch     hiraṇya hasta asura su nītha     su mṛḍīka svavat yā arvāñc     apasidh rakṣas yātudhāna     sthā deva pratidoṣam gṛ     yad tvad pathin savitṛ pūrvya     areṇu su kṛ antarikṣa     tad mad adya pathin su ga     rakṣ ca mad adhi ca brū deva 
      pra tvad yahva puru     viś devay     agni sūkta vacas ī     yad sīm id anya īḍ     jana agni dhā sahas vṛdh     haviṣmat vidh tvad     tad tvad mad adya sumanas iha avitṛ     bhū vāja santya     pra tvad dūta vṛ     hotṛ viśva vedas     mah tvad as vi car arci     div spṛś bhānu     deva tvad varuṇa mitra aryaman     sam dūta pratna indh     viśva tad agni ji tvad dhana     yad tvad dāś martya     mandra hotṛ gṛha pati     agni dūta viś as     tvad viśva saṃgam vrata dhruva     yad deva kṛ     tvad id agni subhaga yaviṣṭhya     viśva ā hu havis     tad tvad mad adya sumanas uta apara     yaj deva su vīrya     tad gha īṃ itthā namasvin     upa svarāj ās     hotrā agni manus sam indh     tṛ ati sridh     han vṛtra tṛ rodas ap     uru kṣaya kṛ     bhū kaṇva vṛṣan dyumnin āhu     krand aśva gaviṣṭi     sam sad mahat as     śuc deva vītama     vi dhūma agni aruṣa miyedhya     sṛj praśaṃs darśata     yad tvad deva manu iha     yajiṣṭha havyavāhana     yad kaṇva medhyātithi dhana spṛt     yad vṛṣan yad upastuta     yad agni medhyātithi     kaṇva indh ṛta adhi     tad pra iṣ dīdī tad idam ṛc     tad agni vardhay     rai pṛ svadhāvat as hi tvad     agni deva āpya     tvad vāja śrutya rāj     tad mad mṛḍ mahat as     ūrdhva u su mad ūti     sthā deva na savitṛ     ūrdhva vāja sanitṛ yat añji     vāghant vihvā     ūrdhva mad pā aṃhas ni ketu     viśva sam atrin dah     kṛ mad ūrdhva caratha jīv     vid deva mad duvas     pā mad agni rakṣas     pā dhūrti arāvan     pā riṣ uta vā jighāṃs     bṛhadbhānu yaviṣṭhya     ghana iva viṣvañc vi han arāvan     tapus jambha yad asmadruh     yad martya śā ati aktu     mā mad tad ripu īś     agni van su vīrya     agni kaṇva saubhaga     agni prāv mitra uta medhyātithi     agni sāti upastuta     agni turvaśa yadu parāvat     ugrādeva hvā     agni nī navavāstva bṛhat ratha     turvīti dasyu sahas     ni tvad agni manu dhā     jyotis jana śaśvat     dīdī kaṇva ṛta jan ukṣ     yad namasy kṛṣṭi     tveṣa agni amavat arci     bhīma na pratīti     rakṣasvin sadam id yātumāvat     viśva sam atrin dah 
      krīḍa tvad śardhas māruta     anarvan ratheśubh     kaṇva abhi pra gā     yad pṛṣatī ṛṣṭi     sākam vāśī añji     jan sva bhānu     iha iva śru idam     kaśā hasta yat vad     ni yāman citra ṛj     pra tvad śardha ghṛṣvi     tveṣa dyumna śuṣmin     devatta brahman gā     pra śaṃs go aghnya     krīḍa yad śardhas māruta     jambha rasa vṛdh     ka tvad varṣiṣṭha ā nṛ     div ca gam ca dhūti     yat sīm anta na dhū     ni tvad yāma mānuṣa     dhṛ ugra manyu     hā parvata giri     yad ajma pṛthivī     jṛ iva viśpati     bhī yāma rej     sthira hi jāna idam     vayas mātṛ niri     yat sīm anu dvitā śavas     ud u tya sūnu gir     kāṣṭhā ajma tan     vāśra abhijñu yā     tya cit gha dīrgha pṛthu     mih napāt amṛdhra     pra cyāvay yāman     marut yad ha tvad bala     jana cyu     giri cyu     yat ha yā marut     sam ha brū adhvan ā     śru kaścit idam     pra yā śībham āśu     as kaṇva tvad dū     tatra u su māday     as hi sma mada tvad     as sma mad idam     viśva cit āyus jīv 
      ka ha nūnam kadhapriya     pitṛ putra na hasta     dhā vṛj barhis     kva nūnam ka tvad artha     gam div na pṛthivī     kva tvad go na raṇ     kva tvad sumna navyas     marut kva suvita     kva u viśva saubhaga     yat tvad pṛśni mātṛ     marta as     stotṛ tvad amṛta as     mā tvad mṛga na yavasa     jaritṛ bhū ajoṣya     pathin yama gā upa     mā u su mad parā parā     nirṛti durhaṇā vadh     pad tṛṣṇā saha     satya tveṣa amavat     dhanvan cit ā rudriya     mih kṛ avāta     vāśrā iva vidyut mā     vatsa na mātṛ sac     yat idam vṛṣṭi sṛj     divā cit tamas kṛ     parjanya uda vāha     yat pṛthivī vyund     adha svana marut     viśva ā sadman pārthiva     rej pra mānuṣa     marut vīḍu pāṇi     citra rodhasvatī anu     yā īṃ akhidra yāman     sthira tvad as nemi     ratha aśva idam     su saṃskṛ abhīśu     acchā vad tan giri     jarā brahmaṇaspati     agni mitra na darśata     mā śloka āsya     parjanya iva tan     gā gāyatra ukthya     vand māruta gaṇa     tveṣa panasyu arkin     mad vṛdh as iha 
      pra yat itthā parāvat     śocis na māna as     ka kratu marut ka varpas     ka yā ka ha dhūti     sthira tvad as āyudha parāṇud     vīḍu uta pratiṣkambh     tvad as taviṣī panīyas     mā martya māyin     parā ha yad sthira han     nṛ vartay guru     vi yā vanin pṛthivī     vi āśā parvata     nahi tvad śatru vid adhi div     na bhūmi riśādas     tvad as taviṣī tan yuj     rudra nu cit ādhṛṣ     pra vepay parvata     vi vic vanaspati     pra u ṛch marut durmada iva     deva sarva viś     upa u ratha pṛṣatī yuj     praṣṭi vah rohita     ā tvad yāma pṛthivī cit śru     bhī mānuṣa     ā tvad makṣū tana kaṃ     rudra avas vṛ     gam nūnam mad avas yathā purā     itthā kaṇva bhī     yuṣmeṣita marut martya iṣ     ā yad mad abhva iṣ     vi tad yu śavas vi ojas     vi yuṣmāka ūti     asāmi hi prayajyu     kaṇva dā pracetas     asāmi marut ā mad ūti     gam vṛṣṭi na vidyut     asāmi ojas bhṛ sudānu     asāmi dhūti śavas     ṛṣi dviṣ marut parimanyu     iṣu na sṛj dviṣ 
      ud sthā brahmaṇaspati     devay tvad i     upa pra i marut sudānu     indra prāśū bhū sacā     tvad id hi sahas putra martya     upabrū dhana dhā     su vīrya marut ā su aśvya     dhā yad tvad ākan     pre brahmaṇaspati     pra devī i sūnṛtā     acchā vīra narya paṅkti rādhas     deva yajña nī mad     yad vāghant dā sūnara vasu     tad dhā akṣiti śravas     tad iḍā su vīra ā yaj     su pratūrti anehas     pra nūnam brahmaṇaspati     mantra vad ukthya     yad indra varuṇa mitra aryaman     deva oka kṛ     tad id vac vidatha śambhu     mantra deva anehas     idam ca vāc pratihary nṛ     viśva id vāma tvad aś     ka devay aś     jana ka vṛj barhis     pra pra dāś pastyā sthā     antarvāvat kṣaya dhā     upa kṣatra pṛc han rājan     bhaya cit su kṣiti dhā     na idam vartṛ na tarutṛ mahat dhana     na arbha as vajrin 
      yad rakṣ pracetas     varuṇa mitra aryaman     nu cit tad dabh jana     yad bāhutā iva pṛ     pā martya riṣ     ariṣṭa sarva edh     vi durga vi dviṣ puras     han rājan idam     nī durita tiras     su ga pathin anṛkṣara     āditya ṛta i     na atra avakhāda as tvad     yad yajña nī nṛ     āditya ṛju pathin     pra tvad tad dhīti naś     sa ratna martya vasu     viśva toka uta tman     acchā gam astṛta     kathā rādh sakhi     stoma mitra aryaman     mahi psaras varuṇa     mā tvad han mā śap     prati vac devay     sumna id tvad ā vivās     catur cit dā     bhī ā nidhā     na durukta spṛhay 
      sam pūṣan adhvan tṛ     vi aṃhas vimuc napāt     sac deva pra mad puras     yad mad pūṣan agha vṛka     duḥśeva ādiś     apa sma tad pathin hā     apa tya paripanthin     muṣīvan huraścit     dūram adhi sruti aj     tvad tad dvayāvin     agha śaṃsa kaścit     pad abhi sthā tapuṣi     ā tad tvad dasra mantumat     pūṣan avas vṛ     yad pitṛ coday     adha mad viśva saubhaga     hiraṇya vāśīmattama     dhana suṣaṇa kṛ     ati mad saścant nī     su ga mad su patha kṛ     pūṣan iha kratu vid     abhi su yavasa nī     na nava jvāra adhvan     pūṣan iha kratu vid     śak pṛ pra yam ca     śā prā udara     pūṣan iha kratu vid     na pūṣan mith     sūkta abhi gṛ     vasu dasma ī 
      ka rudra pracetas     mīḍhuṣṭama tavyas     vac śaṃtama hṛd     yathā mad aditi kṛ     paśu nṛ yathā go     yathā toka rudriya     yathā mad mitra varuṇa     yathā rudra cit     yathā viśva sajoṣas     gātha pati medha pati     rudra jalāṣa bheṣaja     tad śaṃyu sumna ī     yad śukra iva sūrya     hiraṇya iva ruc     śreṣṭha deva vasu     śam mad kṛ arvant     suga meṣa meṣī     nṛ nārī go     mad soma śrī adhi     ni dhā śata nṛ     mahi śravas tuvi nṛmṇa     mā mad soma paribādh     mā arāti hvṛ     ā mad indu vāja bhaj     yad tvad prajā amṛta     para dhāman ṛta     mūrdhan nābhi soma ven     ābhūṣ soma vid 
      agni vivasvat uṣas     citra rādhas amartya     ā dāś jātavedas vah tvad     adya deva uṣarbudh     juṣ hi dūta as havyavāhana     agni rathī adhvara     sajūs aśvin uṣas su vīrya     mad dhā śravas bṛhat     adya dūta vṛ     vasu agni puru priya     dhūma ketu bhāṛjīka vyuṣṭi     yajña adhvara śrī     śreṣṭha yaviṣṭha atithi su āhu     juṣ jana dāś     deva acchā yā jātavedas     agni īḍ vyuṣṭi     stu tvad mad     viśva amṛta bhojana     agni trātṛ amṛta miyedhya     yajiṣṭha havyavāhana     su śaṃsa bhū gṛ yaviṣṭhya     madhu jihvā su āhu     praskaṇva pratṛ āyus jīv     namasy daivya jana     hotṛ viśva vedas     sam hi tvad viś indh     tad ā vah puru hvā pracetas     agni deva iha dru     savitṛ uṣas aśvin bhaga     agni vyuṣṭi kṣap     kaṇva tvad su soma indh     havyavāha su adhvara     pati hi adhvara     agni dūta viś as     uṣarbudh ā vah soma pīti     deva adya svar dṛś     agni pūrva anu uṣas vibhāvasu     dīdī viśva darśata     as grāma avitṛ purohita     as yajña mānuṣa     ni tvad yajña sādhana     agni hotṛ ṛtvij     manuṣvat deva dhā pracetas     jīra dūta amartya     yat deva mitra mahas purohita     antara yā dūtya     sindhu iva prasvan ūrmi     agni bhrāj arci     śru śrut karṇa vahni     deva agni sa yāvan     ā sad barhis mitra aryaman     prātar yāvan adhvara     śru stoma marut sudānu     agni jihvā ṛtāvṛdh     pā soma varuṇa dhṛ vrata     aśvin uṣas sajūs 
      tvad agni vasu iha     rudra āditya uta     yaj su adhvara jana     manu jan ghṛta pruṣ     śruṣṭīvan hi dāś     deva agni vicetas     tad rohit aśva girvaṇas     trayastriṃśat ā vah     priyamedha vat atri vat     jātavedas virūpa vat     aṅgiras vat mahi vrata     praskaṇva śru hava     mahikeru ūti     priyamedha hvā     rāj adhvara     agni śukra śocis     ghṛtāhavana santya     idam u su śru gir     yad kaṇva sūnu     hvā av tvad     tvad citraśravastama     hvā viś jantu     śociṣkeśa puru priya     agni havya vah     ni tvad hotṛ ṛtvij     dhā vasu vittama     śrut karṇa saprathastama     vipra agni diviṣṭi     ā tvad vipra cyu     su soma abhi prayas     bṛhat bhās bhṛ havis     agni marta dāś     prātar yāvan sahaskṛta     soma peya santya     iha adya daivya jana     barhis ā sāday vasu     arvāñc daivya jana     agni yaj sahūti     idam soma sudānu     tad pā tiroahnya 
      etad u uṣas apūrvya     vi vas priya div     stu tvad aśvin bṛhat     yad dasra sindhu mātṛ     manotṛ rayi     dhī deva vasu vid     vañc tvad kakuha     jṛ adhi viṣṭap     yat tvad ratha vi pat     havis jāra ap     pṛ papuri nara     pitṛ kuṭa carṣaṇi     ādāra tvad mati     nāsatya man vacas     pā soma dhṛṣṇuyā     yad mad pṛ aśvin     jyotiṣmat tamas tiras     tad mad rā iṣ     ā mad nau mati     yā pāra gam     yuj aśvin ratha     aritra tvad div pṛthu     tīrtha sindhu ratha     dhī yuj indu     div kaṇva indu     vasu sindhu pada     sva vavri kuha dhits     bhū u bhās u aṃśu     hiraṇya prati sūrya     vi khyā jihvā asita     bhū u pāra i     pathin ṛta sādhuyā     dṛś vi sruti div     tad tad id aśvin avas     jaritṛ prati bhūṣ     mada soma pṛ     vas vivasvant     soma pīti gir     manuṣvat śambhu ā gam     tvad uṣas anu śrī     parijman upacar     ṛta van aktu     ubh pā aśvin     ubh mad śarman yam     avidriya ūti 
      idam tvad madhumattama     su soma ṛtāvṛdh     tad aśvin pā tiroahnya     dhā ratna dāś     tri vandhura trivṛt su peśas     ratha ā yā aśvin     kaṇva tvad brahman kṛ adhvara     tad su śru hava     aśvin madhumattama     pā soma ṛtāvṛdh     atha adya dasra vasu bhṛ ratha     dāś upa gam     triṣadhastha barhis viśva vedas     madhu yajña mikṣ     kaṇva tvad su soma abhidyu     tvad hvā aśvin     yad kaṇva abhiṣṭi     prāv tvad aśvin     tad su mad av śubh pati     pā soma ṛtāvṛdh     sudās dasra vasu bhṛ ratha     pṛkṣ vah aśvin     rayi samudra uta vā div pari     mad dhā puruspṛh     yat nāsatya parāvat     yat vā as adhi turvaśa     atas ratha suvṛt mad ā gam     sākam sūrya raśmi     arvāñc tvad sapti adhvara śrī     vah savana id upa     iṣ pṛc su kṛt sudānu     ā barhis sad nṛ     tad nāsatya gam     ratha sūrya tvac     yad śaśvat vah dāś vasu     madhu soma pīti     uktha arvāk av purūvasu     arka ca ni hvā     śaśvat kaṇva sadas priya hi kaṃ     soma pā aśvin 
      saha vāma mad uṣas     vi vas duhitṛ div     saha dyumna bṛhat vibhāvarī     rai devī dāsvat     aśvāvat gomat viśva su vid     bhūri cyu vas     ud īray prati mad sūnṛta uṣas     cud rādhas maghavan     vas uṣas vas ca nu     devī jīra ratha     yad idam ācaraṇa dhṛ     samudra na śravasyu     uṣas yad tvad pra yāma yuj     manas dāna sūri     atra aha tad kaṇva idam kaṇvatama     nāman gṛ nṛ     ā gha yoṣā iva sūnara     uṣas yā prabhuj     jaray vṛjana padvat i     ud pātay pakṣin     vi yad sṛj samana vi arthin     pada na vī odatī     vi nakir tad pat ās     vyuṣṭi vājinīvat     etad yuj parāvat     sūrya udayana adhi     śata ratha subhaga uṣas idam     vi yā abhi mānuṣa     viśva idam nam cakṣ jagant     jyotis kṛ sūnara     apa dveṣas maghavan duhitṛ div     uṣas vas apa sridh     uṣā ā bhā bhānu     candra duhitṛ div     āvah bhūri mad saubhaga     vivas diviṣṭi     viśva hi prāṇana jīvana tvad     vi yat vas sūnara     tad mad ratha bṛhat vibhāvarī     śru citrāmagha hava     uṣas vāja hi van     yad citra mānuṣa jana     tad ā vah su kṛt adhvara upa     yad tvad gṛ vahni     viśva deva ā vah soma pīti     antarikṣa uṣas tvad     tad mad dhā gomat aśvāvat ukthya     uṣas vāja su vīrya     yad ruśat arci     prati bhadra dṛś     tad mad rayi viśva vāra su peśas     uṣas dā sugmya     yad cit hi tvad ṛṣi pūrva ūti     hvā av mahi     tad mad stoma abhi gṛ rādhas     uṣas śukra śocis     uṣas yat adya bhānu     vi dvār ṛch div     pra mad yam avṛka pṛthu chardis     pra devī gomat iṣ     sam mad rai bṛhat viśva peśas     mikṣ sam iḍā ā     sam dyumna viśva tura uṣas mahi     sam vāja vājinīvat 
      uṣas bhadra ā gam     div cit rocana adhi     vah aruṇapsu     upa tvad somin gṛha     su peśas sukha ratha     yad adhiṣṭhā uṣas tvad     tad su śravas jana     prāv adya duhitṛ div     vi cit tvad patatrin     dvipad catuṣpada arjunī     uṣas prarch ṛtu anu     div anta pari     vivas hi raśmi     viśva ābhā rocana     tad tvad uṣas vasūyu     gir kaṇva hvā 
      ud u tya jātavedas     deva vah ketu     dṛś viśva sūrya     apa tya tāyu yathā     nakṣatra i aktu     sūra viśva cakṣas     dṛś idam ketu     vi raśmi jana anu     bhrāj agni yathā     taraṇi viśva darśata     jyotiṣkṛt as sūrya     viśva ā bhā rocana     pratyañc deva viś     pratyañc ud i mānuṣa     pratyañc viśva svar dṛś     yad pāvaka cakṣas     bhuraṇy jana anu     tvad varuṇa paś     vi div i rajas pṛthu     aha mā aktu     paś janman sūrya     saptan tvad harit ratha     vah deva sūrya     śociṣkeśa vicakṣaṇa     yuj saptan śundhyu     sūra ratha naptī     tad yā sva yukti     ud mad tamas pari     jyotis paś uttara     deva devatrā sūrya     gam jyotis uttama     udi adya mitra maha     āruh uttara div     hṛd roga mad sūrya     hariman ca nāśay     śuka mad hariman     ropaṇākā dhā     atho hāridrava mad     hariman ni dhā     ud gā idam āditya     viśva sahas saha     dviṣ mad randhay     mā u mad dviṣ radh 
      abhi tya meṣa puruhūta ṛgmiya     indra gir mad vasu arṇava     yad div na vicar mānuṣa     bhuj maṃhiṣṭha abhi vipra arc     abhi īṃ van su abhiṣṭi ūti     antarikṣa prā taviṣī āvṛ     indra dakṣa ṛbhu mada cyut     śatakratu javana sūnṛtā āruh     tvad gotra aṅgiras vṛ apa     uta atri śata dura gātu vid     sasa cit vimada vah vasu     āji adri vas nartay     tvad ap apidhāna vṛ     apadhāray parvata dānumat vasu     vṛtra yat indra śavas vadh ahi     āt id sūrya div ārohay dṛś     tvad māyā apa māyin dham     svadhā yad adhi śupti hu     tvad pipru nṛmaṇas praruj pur     pra ṛjiśvan dasyu hatya av     tvad kutsa śuṣṇa hatya av     randhay atithigva śambara     mahat cit arbuda ni kram pad     sanāt eva dasyu hatya jan     tvad viśva taviṣī sadhryañc dhā     tvad rādhas soma pītha hṛṣ     tvad vajra cit bāhu dhā     vraśc śatru ava viśva vṛṣṇya     vi jñā ārya yad ca dasyu     barhiṣmant randhay śās avrata     śākin bhū yajamāna coditṛ     viśva id tad tvad sadhamāda kan     anuvrata randhay apavrata     ābhū indra śnathay an ābhū     vṛdh cit vṛdh div inakṣ     stu vamra vi han saṃdih     takṣ yat tvad uśanas sahas sahas     vi rodas majman bādh śavas     ā tvad vāta nṛmaṇas manas yuj     ā pṛ vah abhi śravas     mand yat uśanas kāvya saca     indra vaṅku vaṅkutara adhi sthā     ugra yayi niḥ ap srotas sṛj     vi śuṣṇa dṛṃhay īray pur     ā sma ratha vṛṣan pāna sthā     śāryāta prabhṛ yad mad     indra yathā su soma kan     anarvan śloka ā ruh div     dā arbha mahat vacasyu     kakṣīvant vṛcayā indra su     menā bhū vṛṣaṇaśva su kratu     viśva id tad tvad savana pravac     indra śri su dhī nireka     pajra stoma durya na yūpa     aśvayu gavyu rathayu vasūyu     indra id rai kṣi prayantṛ     idam namas vṛṣabha sva rāj     satya śuṣma tavas vac     idam indra vṛjana sarva vīra     smat sūri tvad śarman as 
      tya su meṣa mahay svar vid     śata yad su bhū sākam īr     atya na vāja havanasyad ratha     ā indra vṛt av suvṛkti     tad parvata na dharuṇa acyuta     sahasra ūti taviṣī vṛdh     indra yat vṛtra vadh nadīvṛt     ubj arṇas jarhṛṣ andhas     tad hi dvara dvarin vavra ūdhas     candra budhna mada vṛdh manīṣin     indra tad hvā svapasyā dhī     maṃhiṣṭha rāti tad hi papri andhas     ā yad pṛ div sadman barhis     samudra na su bhū sva abhiṣṭi     tad vṛtra hatya anu sthā ūti     śuṣma indra avāta ahrutapsu     abhi sva vṛṣṭi mada idam yudh     raghu iva pravaṇa sṛ ūti     indra yat vajrin dhṛṣ andhas     bhid vala paridhi iva trita     pari īṃ ghṛṇā car tviṣ śavas     ap vṛ rajas budhna āśī     vṛtra yat pravaṇa durgṛbhiśvan     nihan hanu indra tanyatu     hrada na hi tvad nyṛṣ ūrmi     brahman indra tvad yad vardhana     tvaṣṭṛ cit tvad yujya vṛdh śavas     takṣ vajra abhibhūti ojas     han u hari sambhṛta kratu     indra vṛtra manus gātuy ap     yam bāhu vajra āyasa     dhāray div ā sūrya dṛś     bṛhat svaścandra amavat yat ukthya     kṛ bhiyas rohaṇa div     yat mānuṣa pradhana indra ūti     svar nṛṣāc marut mad anu     div cit idam amavat ahi svana     yoyu bhiyas vajra indra tvad     vṛtra yat badbadh rodas     mada suta śavas bhid śiras     yat id nu indra pṛthivī daśabhuji     ahar viśva tan kṛṣṭi     atra ha tvad maghavan viśru sahas     div anu śavas barhaṇā bhū     tvad idam pāra rajas vyoman     sva bhūti ojas av dhṛṣ manas     kṛ bhūmi pratimāna ojas     ap svar paribhū i ā div     tvad bhū pratimāna pṛthivī     ṛṣva vīra bṛhat pati bhū     viśva āprā antarikṣa mahitva     satya addhā nakir anya tvāvat     na yad dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyacas     na sindhu rajas anta aś     na uta sva vṛṣṭi mada idam yudh     eka anya kṛ viśva ānuṣak     arc atra marut tad āji     viśva deva mad anu tvad     vṛtra yat bhṛṣṭimat vadha     ni tvad indra prati āna han 
      ni u su vāc pra mah bhṛ     gir indra sadana vivasvant     nu cit hi ratna sas iva vid     na duṣṭuti draviṇas da śaṃs     dura aśva dura indra go as     dura yava vasu ina pati     śikṣā nara pradiv a kāma karśana     sakhi sakhi tad idam gṛ     śacīvat indra puru kṛt dyumattama     tvad id idam abhitas cekit vasu     atas saṃgrah abhibhū ā bhṛ     mā tvāyat jaritṛ kāma ūnay     idam div sumanas idam indu     nirudh amati go aśvin     indra dasyu daray indu     yu dveṣas sam iṣ rabh     sam indra rai sam iṣ rabh     sam vāja puru ścandra abhidyu     sam devī pramati vīra śuṣma     go agra aśvāvat rabh     tad tvad mada mad tad vṛṣṇya     tad soma vṛtra hatya satpati     yat kāru daśan vṛtra aprati     barhiṣmant ni sahasra barhay     yudh yudh upa gha id i dhṛṣṇuyā     pur pur sam idam han ojas     nami yat indra sakhi parāvat     nibarhay namuci nāma māyin     tvad karañja uta parṇaya vadh     tejiṣṭha atithigva vartani     tvad śata vaṅgṛda bhid pur     anānuda pariṣū ṛjiśvan     tvad etad jana rājan dvis daśan     abandhu suśravas upagam     ṣaṣṭi sahasra navati navan śru     ni cakra rathya duṣpad vṛj     tvad av suśravas tvad ūti     tvad trāman indra tūrvayāṇa     tvad idam kutsa atithigva āyu     mah rājan yuvan randhanāy     yad udṛc indra deva gopa     sakhi tvad śivatama as     tvad stu tvad su vīra     drāghīyas āyus pratara dhā 
      mā mad idam maghavan pṛt aṃhas     nahi tvad anta śavas parīṇaś     kranday nadī roro vana     kathā na kṣoṇī bhiyas sam ṛch     arc śakra śākina śacīvat     śru indra mahay abhi stu     yad dhṛṣṇu śavas rodas ubh     vṛṣan vṛṣan tva vṛṣabha nyṛj     arc div bṛhat śūṣya vacas     svakṣatra yad dhṛṣ dhṛṣ manas     bṛhat śravas asura barhaṇā kṛ     puras hari vṛṣabha ratha hi tad     tvad div bṛhat sānu kopay     ava tman dhṛṣ śambara bhid     yat māyin vrandin mandin dhṛṣ     śā gabhasti aśani pṛtany     ni yat vṛj śvasana mūrdhan     śuṣṇa cit vrandin roro vana     prācīna manas barhaṇāvat     yat adya cit kṛ ka tvad pari     tvad av narya turvaśa yadu     tvad turvīti vayya śatakratu     tvad ratha etaśa kṛtvya dhana     tvad pur navati dambhay navan     tad gha rājan sat pati śvi jana     rā havya prati yad śāsa inv     uktha vā yad abhigṛ rādhas     dānu idam upara pinv div     asama kṣatra asama manīṣā     pra soma pā apas as nema     yad tvad indra dā vardhay     mahi kṣatra sthavira vṛṣṇya ca     tvad id etad bahula adri duh     camūṣad camasa indra pāna     vi aś tarpay kāma idam     atha manas vasu deya kṛ     ap sthā dharuṇahvara tamas     antar vṛtra jaṭhara parvata     abhi īṃ indra nadī vavri dhā     viśva anuṣṭhā pravaṇa han     tad śevṛdha adhi dhā dyumna mad     mahi kṣatra janāṣah indra tavya     rakṣ ca mad maghavan pā sūri     rai ca mad su apatya iṣ dhā 
      div cit idam variman vi prath     indra na mahan pṛthivī cana prati     bhīma tuviṣmat carṣaṇi ātapa     śā vajra tij na vaṃsaga     tad arṇava na nadī samudriya     prati grah viśri varīman     indra soma pā vṛṣāy     sanāt tad yudhma ojas panasy     tvad tad indra parvata na bhuj     mah nṛmṇa dharman irajy     pra vīrya devatāti cekit     viśva ugra karman purodhā     tad id vana namasyu vacasy     cāru jana prabrū indriya     vṛṣan chandu bhū haryata vṛṣan     kṣema dhenā maghavan yat inv     tad id maha samitha majman     kṛ yudhma ojas jana     adha cana śraddhā tviṣīmat     indra vajra nijaṅghan vadha     tad hi śravasyu sadana kṛtrima     kṣmā vṛdh ojas vināśay     jyotis kṛ avṛka yajyu     ava su kratu sṛ ap sṛj     dāna manas soma pāvan as tvad     arvāñc hari vandana śrut ā kṛ     yamiṣṭha sārathi yad indra tvad     na tvad keta ā dabh bhūrṇi     a prakṣi vasu bhṛ hasta     a sah sahas tanū śru dhā     āvṛ avata na kartṛ     tanū tvad kratu indra bhūri 
      etad pra pūrva ava tad camriṣ     atya na yoṣā ud yam bhurvaṇi     dakṣa mah pāyay hiraṇyaya     ratha āvṛt hari yoga ṛbhvas     tad gūrti nemanniṣ parīṇas     samudra na saṃcaraṇa saniṣyu     pati dakṣa vidatha nu sahas     giri na vena adhi ruh tejas     tad turvaṇi mahat areṇu pauṃsya     giri bhṛṣṭi na bhrāj tuj śavas     yad śuṣṇa māyin āyasa mada     dudhra ābhū rāmay ni dāman     deva yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdha ūti     indra sac uṣas na sūrya     yad dhṛṣṇu śavas bādh tamas     ṛch reṇu bṛhat arhariṣvaṇi     vi yat tiras dharuṇa acyuta rajas     sthāpay div ātā barhaṇā     svar mīḍha yat mada indra harṣay     han vṛtra niḥ ap ubj arṇava     tvad div dharuṇa dhā ojas     pṛthivī indra sadana māhina     tva suta mada ri ap     vi vṛtra samayā pāṣya ruj 
      pra maṃhiṣṭha bṛhat bṛhadri     satya śuṣma tavas mati bhṛ     ap iva pravaṇa yad durdhara     rādhas viśvāyu śavas apāvṛ     adha tvad viśva anu ha as iṣṭi     ap nimna iva savana haviṣmat     yat parvata na saṃśā haryata     indra vajra śnath hiraṇyaya     idam bhīma namas sam adhvara     uṣa na śubhra ā bhṛ panīyas     yad dhāman śravas nāman indriya     jyotis kṛ harit na i     idam tvad indra tad mad puruṣṭuta     yad tvad ārabh car prabhūvasu     nahi tvad anya girvaṇas gir sagh     kṣoṇī iva prati mad hary tad vacas     bhūri tvad indra vīrya tvad as     idam stotṛ maghavan kāma ā pṛṇ     anu tvad div bṛhat vīrya mā     idam ca tvad pṛthivī nam ojas     tvad tad indra parvata mahat uru     vajra vajrin parvaśas kṛt     avasṛj nivṛ sṛ ap     satrā viśva dhā kevala sahas 
      nu cit sahas jā amṛta ni tud     hotṛ yat dūta bhū vivasvant     vi sādhiṣṭha pathin rajas mā     ā devatāti havis vivās     ā sva adman yu ajara     tṛṣu aviṣy atasa sthā     atya na pṛṣṭha pruṣ ruc     div na sānu stanay krand     krāṇā rudra vasu purodhā     hotṛ niṣad rayiṣah amartya     ratha na viś ṛj āyu     vi ānuṣak vārya deva ṛch     vi vāta jū atasa sthā     vṛthā juhū sṛṇi tuviṣvaṇi     tṛṣu yat agni vanin vṛṣāy     kṛṣṇa tvad eman ruśat ūrmi ajara     tapus jambha vana ā vāta coday     yūtha na sah ava vā vaṃsaga     abhivraj akṣita pājas rajas     sthātṛ caratha bhī patatrin     tvad bhṛgu mānuṣa ā     rayi na cāru su hava jana     hotṛ agni atithi vareṇya     mitra na śeva divya janman     hotṛ saptan juhū yajiṣṭha     yad vāghant vṛ adhvara     agni viśva arati vasu     sapary prayas yā ratna     acchidra sūnu sahas mad adya     stotṛ mitra mahat śarman yam     agni gṛ aṃhas uruṣy     ūrj napāt pur āyasa     bhū varūtha gṛ vibhāva     bhū maghavan maghavan śarman     uruṣy agni aṃhas gṛ     prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam 
      vayā id agni agni tvad anya     tvad viśva amṛta māday     vaiśvānara nābhi as kṣiti     sthūṇā iva jana upamit yam     mūrdhan div nābhi agni pṛthivī     atha bhū arati rodasī     tad tvad deva janay deva     vaiśvānara jyotis id ārya     ā sūrya na raśmi dhruva     vaiśvānara dhā agni vasu     yad parvata oṣadhī ap     yad mānuṣa as tad rājan     bṛhat iva sūnu rodas     gir hotṛ manuṣya na dakṣa     svarvat satya śuṣma puru     vaiśvānara nṛtama yahvī     div cit tvad bṛhat jātavedas     vaiśvānara pra ric mahi tva     rājan kṛṣṭi as mānuṣa     yudh deva varivas kṛ     pra nu mahi tva vṛṣabha vac     yad pūru vṛtra han sac     vaiśvānara dasyu agni han     dhū kāṣṭhā ava śambara bhid     vaiśvānara mahiman viśva kṛṣṭi     bharadvāja yajata vibhāvan     śātavaneya śatin agni     puruṇītha jṛ sūnṛtāvat 
      vahni yaśas vidatha ketu     suprāvya dūta sadyoartha     dvijanman rayi iva praśaṃs     rāti bhṛ bhṛgu mātariśvan     idam śāsus ubhaya sac     haviṣmat uśij yad ca marta     div cit pūrva ni sad hotṛ     āpṛcchya viśpati viś vedhas     tad navīyas hṛd ā jan     mad su kīrti madhu jihvā aś     yad ṛtvij vṛjana mānuṣa     prayasvat āyu hā     uśij pāvaka vasu mānuṣa     vareṇya hotṛ dhā viś     damūnas gṛhapati dama ā     agni bhū rayi pati rayi     tad tvad mad pati agni rayi     pra śaṃs mati gotama     āśu na vājambhara marjay     prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam 
      idam id u pra tavas tura     prayas na hṛ stoma māhina     ṛcīṣama adhrigu oha     indra brahman rātatama     idam id u prayas iva pra yam     bhṛ āṅgūṣa bādh suvṛkti     indra hṛd manas manīṣā     pratna pati dhī marjay     idam id u tya upama svarṣā     bhṛ āṅgūṣa āsya     maṃhiṣṭha acchokti mati     suvṛkti sūri vṛdh     idam id u stoma sam hi     ratha na taṣṭṛ iva tatsina     gir ca girvāhas suvṛkti     indra viśvaminva medhira     idam id u sapti iva śravasya     indra arka juhū sam añj     vīra dāna oka vand     pur gur śravas darman     idam id u tvaṣṭṛ takṣ vajra     su apastama svarya raṇa     vṛtra cit vid yad marman     tuj īś tuj kiyedhā     idam id u mātṛ savana sadyas     mah pitu pā cāru anna     muṣāy viṣṇu pacata sahīyas     vyadh varāha tiras adri as     idam id u gnā cit deva patnī     indra arka ahi hatya ve     pari dyāvāpṛthivī bhṛ uru     na idam tad mahiman pari as     idam id eva pra ric mahi tva     div pṛthivī pari antarikṣa     svarāj indra dama ā viśva gur     svari amatra vakṣ raṇa     idam id eva śavas śuṣ     vi vraśc vajra vṛtra indra     go na vṛ avani muc     abhi śravas dā sacetas     idam id u tveṣas ram sindhu     pari yat vajra sīm yam     īśāna kṛt dāś daśasy     turvīti gādha turvaṇi kṛ     idam id u pra bhṛ tuj     vṛtra vajra īś kiyedhā     go na parvan vi rad tiryañc     iṣ arṇas ap car     idam id u pra brū pūrvya     tura karman navyas uktha     yudh yat iṣ āyudha     ṛghāy nirī śatru     idam id u bhī giri ca dṛh     div ca bhūmi janus tuj     upa u vena joguv oṇi     sadyas bhū vīrya nodhas     idam id u tya anu dā idam     eka yad van bhūri īś     pra etaśa sūrya spṛdh     sauvaśvya suṣvi av indra     eva tvad hāriyojana suvṛkti     indra brahman gotama kṛ     ā idam viśva peśas dhī dhā     prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam 
      pra man śavasāna śūṣa     āṅgūṣa girvaṇas aṅgirasvat     suvṛkti stu ṛgmiya     arc arka nṛ viśru     pra tvad mah mahi namas bhṛ     āṅgūṣya śavasāna sāman     yad mad pūrva pitṛ pada jña     arc aṅgiras go vid     indra aṅgiras ca iṣṭi     vid saramā tanaya dhāsi     bṛhaspati bhid adri vid go     sam usriyā vāś nṛ     tad suṣṭubh tad stubh saptan vipra     svara adri svarya navagva     saraṇyu phaliga indra śakra     vala rava daray daśagva     gṛ aṅgiras dasma vi vṛ     uṣas sūrya go andhas     vi bhūmi prathay indra sānu     div rajas upara stabhāy     tad u prayakṣatama idam karman     dasma cārutama as daṃsas     upahvara yat upara pinv     madhu arṇas nadī catur     dvitā vi vṛ sanajā sanīḍa     ayāsya stu arka     bhaga na menā parama vyoman     dhāray rodas su daṃsas     sanāt div pari bhūman virūpa     punarbhū yuvatī sva eva     kṛṣṇa aktā uṣas ruśat     vapus ā car anya anya     sanemi sakhya svapasy     sūnu dhṛ śavas su daṃsas     āma cit dhā pakva antar     payas kṛṣṇa ruśat rohin     sanāt sanīḍa avani a van     vrata rakṣ amṛta sahas     puru sahasra jani na patnī     duvasy svasṛ ahrayāṇa     sanāyu namas navyas arka     vasūyu mati dasma drā     pati na patnī vaś vaś     spṛś tvad śavasāvat manīṣā     sanāt eva tvad rai gabhasti     na kṣi na upa das dasma     dyumat as kratumat indra dhīra     śikṣ śacīvat tvad mad śacī     sanāy gotama indra navya     takṣ brahman hariyojana     su nītha mad śavasāna nodhas     prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam 
      tvad mahat indra yad ha śuṣma     div jan pṛthivī ama dhā     yat ha tvad viśva giri cit abhva     bhī dṛḍha kiraṇa na ej     ā yat hari indra vivrata vī     ā tvad vajra jaritṛ bāhu dhā     yad a viharyata kratu amitra     pur iṣ puruhūta puru     tvad satya indra dhṛṣṇu etad     tvad ṛbhukṣan narya tvad sah     tvad śuṣṇa vṛjana pṛkṣ āṇi     yuvan kutsa dyumat sacā han     tvad ha tya indra cud sakhi     vṛtra yat vajrin vṛṣan karman ubh     yat ha śūra vṛṣamaṇas parācais     vi dasyu yoni kṛt vṛthāṣah     tvad ha tya indra a riṣaṇy     dṛḍha cit marta ajuṣṭi     vi mad ā kāṣṭhā arvant vṛ     ghana iva vajrin śnath amitra     tvad ha tya indra arṇa sāti     svar mīḍha nṛ āji hvā     tvad svadhāvat idam ā samarya     ūti vāja atasāyya bhū     tvad ha tya indra saptan yudh     pur vajrin purukutsa dardar     barhis na yat sudās vṛthā vṛj     aṃh rājan varivas pūru kṛ     tvad tya mad indra deva citra     iṣ ap na pyā parijman     yad śūra prati mad yam     tman ūrj na viśvadha kṣar     kṛ tvad indra gotama     brahman āvac namas hari     su peśas vāja ā bhṛ mad     prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam 
      vṛṣan śardha su makha vedhas     nodhas suvṛkti pra bhṛ marut     apas na dhīra manas suhastya     gir sam añj vidatha ābhū     tad jan div ṛṣva ukṣan     rudra marya asura arepas     pāvaka śuci sūrya iva     satvan na drapsin ghora varpas     yuvan rudra ajara abhoj han     vakṣ adhrigu parvata iva     dṛh cit viśva bhuvana pārthiva     pra cyāvay divya majman     citra añji vapus vi añj     vakṣas rukma adhi yat śubh     aṃsa idam ni mṛkṣ ṛṣṭi     sākam jan svadhā div nṛ     īśāna kṛt dhuni riśādas     vāta vidyut taviṣī kṛ     duh ūdhas divya dhūti     bhūmi pinv payas parijri     pinv ap marut sudānu     payas ghṛtavat vidatha ābhū     atya na mih vi nī vājin     utsa duh stanay a kṣi     mahiṣa māyin citra bhānu     giri na sva tavas raghuṣyad     mṛga iva hastin khād vana     yat āruṇī taviṣī yuj     siṃha iva nānad pracetas     piśa iva supiś viśva vedas     kṣap jinv pṛṣat ṛṣṭi     sam id sabādh śavas ahi manyu     rodas ā vad gaṇa śrī     nṛṣāc śūra śavas ahi manyu     ā vandhura amati na darśata     vidyut na sthā marut ratha tvad     viśva vedas rayi samokas     sammiśla taviṣī virapśin     astṛ iṣu dhā gabhasti     ananta śuṣma vṛṣan khādi nṛ     hiraṇyaya pavi payas vṛdh     uddhan āpathi na parvata     makha ayās svasṛt dhruva cyut     dudhra kṛt marut bhrāj ṛṣṭi     ghṛṣu pāvaka vanin vicarṣaṇi     rudra sūnu havas gṛ     rajastur tavas māruta gaṇa     ṛjīṣin vṛṣan sac śrī     pra nu tad marta śavas jana ati     sthā tvad ūti marut yad av     arvant vāja bhṛ dhana nṛ     āpṛcchya kratu ā kṣi puṣ     carkar marut pṛt duṣṭara     dyumat śuṣma maghavan dhā     dhana spṛt ukthya viśvacarṣaṇi     toka puṣ tanaya śata himā     nu sthira marut vīravat     ṛtīṣah rayi mad dhā     sahasrin śatin śvi     prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam 
      paśu na tāyu guhā cat     namas yuj namas vah     sa joṣa dhīra pada anu gam     upa tvad sad viśva yajatra     ṛta deva anu vrata gā     bhū pariṣṭi div na bhūman     vṛdh īṃ ap panū suśiśvi     ṛta yoni garbha su jan     puṣṭi na raṇva kṣiti na pṛthu     giri na bhujman kṣodas na śambhu     atya na ajman sarga pratak     sindhu na kṣodas ka īṃ vṛ     jāmi sindhu bhrātṛ iva svasṛ     ibhya na rājan vana ad     yat vāta jū vana vi sthā     agni ha dā roman pṛthivī     śvas ap haṃsa na sad     kratu cetiṣṭha viś uṣarbudh     soma na vedhas ṛta prajan     paśu na śiśu vibhu dūrebhā 
      rayi na citra svar na saṃdṛś     āyu na prāṇa nitya na sūnu     takvan na bhūrṇi vana sac     payas na dhenu śuci vibhāvan     dhṛ kṣema oka na raṇva     yava na pakva ji jana     ṛṣi na stubhvan viś praśaṃs     vājin na prī vayas dhā     duroka śocis kratu na nitya     jāyā iva yoni aram viśva     citra yat bhrāj śveta na viś     ratha na rukmin tveṣa samad     senā iva sṛj ama dhā     astṛ na didyut tveṣa pratīka     yama ha jan yama jan     jāra kanī pati jani     tad tvad car mad vasati     asta na go nakṣ indh     sindhu na kṣodas pra nyāñc i     nū go svar dṛśīka 
      vana jāyu marta mitra     vṛ śruṣṭi rājan iva ajurya     kṣema na sādhu kratu na bhadra     bhū svādhī hotṛ havyavah     hasta dhā nṛmṇa viśva     ama deva dhā guhā niṣad     vid īṃ atra nṛ dhiyaṃdhā     hṛd yat takṣ mantra śaṃs     aja na kṣā dhṛ pṛthivī     stambh div mantra satya     priya pada paśu ni pā     viśvāyu agni guhā guha gā     yad īṃ cit guhā bhū     ā yad sad dhārā ṛta     vi yad cṛt ṛta sap     āt id vasu pra vac idam     vi yad vīrudh rudh mahi tva     uta prajā uta prasū antar     citti ap dama viśvāyu     sadman iva dhīra saṃmā kṛ 
      śrī upa sthā div bhuraṇyu     sthātṛ caratha aktu vi vṛ     pari yat idam eka viśva     bhū deva deva mahi tva     āt id tvad viśva kratu juṣ     śuṣka yat deva jīva jan     bhaj viśva deva tva nāman     ṛta sap amṛta eva     ṛta preṣa ṛta dhīti     viśva āyus viśva apas kṛ     yad tvad dāś yad vā tvad śikṣ     tad cit rayi day     hotṛ niṣad manu apatya     tad cit nu idam pati rayi     iṣ retas mithas tanū     sam jñā sva dakṣa amūra     pitṛ na putra kratu juṣ     śruṣ yad idam śās tura     vi rai vṛ dvār purukṣu     piś nāka star damūnas 
      śukra śuc uṣ na jāra     prā samyañc div na jyotis     pari prajan kratu bhū     bhū deva pitṛ putra as     vedhas a dṛp agni vijñā     ūdhas na go svādman pitu     jana na śeva āhūrya as     madhya niṣad raṇva duroṇa     putra na jan raṇva duroṇa     vājin na prī viś vi tṛ     viś yat hvā nṛ sanīḍa     agni deva tva viśva aś     nakir tvad etad vrata mī     nṛ yat idam śruṣṭi kṛ     tad tu tvad daṃsas yat ahar samāna     nṛ yat yuj vī rapas     uṣas na jāra vibhāvan usra     saṃjñā rūpa cit idam     tman vah dvār vi ṛch     nū viśva svar dṛśīka 
      van puru ari manīṣā     agni su śoka viśva aś     ā daivya vrata cit     ā mānuṣa jana janman     garbha yad ap garbha vana     garbha ca sthā garbha caratha     adri cit idam antar duroṇa     viś na viśva amṛta svādhī     tad hi kṣapāvant agni rayi     dāś yad idam aram sūkta     etad cit bhūman ni pā     deva janman marta ca vid     vṛdh yad puru kṣap virūpa     sthātṛ ca ratha ṛta pravye     rādh hotṛ svar niṣad     kṛ viśva apas satya     go praśasti vana dhā     bhṛ viśva bali svar mad     vi tvad nṛ purutrā sapary     pitṛ na jivri vi vedas bhṛ     sādhu na gṛdhnu astṛ iva śūra     yātṛ iva bhīma tveṣa samad 
      upa pra jinv vaś vaś     pati na nitya jani sanīḍa     svasṛ śyāva aruṣa juṣ     citra vas uṣas na go     vīḍu cit dṛḍha pitṛ mad uktha     adri ruj aṅgiras rava     kṛ div bṛhat gātu mad     ahar svar vid ketu usṛ     dhā ṛta dhanay idam dhīti     āt id ari didhiṣū vibhṛtra     a tṛṣ apas i acchā     deva janman prayas vardhay     math yat īṃ vibhṛ mātariśvan     gṛha gṛha śyeta jenya bhū     āt īṃ rājan na sahīyas sacā as     ā dūtya bhṛgavāṇa vī     mah yat pitṛ īṃ rasa div kṛ     ava tsar pṛśana cit     sṛj astṛ dhṛṣ didyu idam     sva deva duhitṛ tviṣi dhā     sva ā yad tvad dama ā vibhā     namas vā dāś vaś anu div     vṛdh u agni vayas idam dvibarhas     yā rai sa ratha yad jū     agni viśva abhi pṛkṣ sac     samudra na sravat saptan yahva     na jāmi vi cit vayas mad     vid deva pramati cit     ā yat iṣ nṛpati tejas naś     śuci retas niṣic div abhīka     agni śardha anavadya yuvan     svādhī janay sūday ca     manas na yad adhvan sadyas i     eka satrā sūra vasu īś     rājan mitrāvaruṇa su pāṇi     go priya amṛta rakṣ     mā mad agni sakhya pitrya     pra mṛṣ abhi vidu kavi as     nabhas na rūpa jariman mī     purā tad abhiśasti adhī 
      ni kāvya vedhas śaśvat kṛ     hasta dhā narya puru     agni bhū rayi pati rayi     satrā kṛ amṛta viśva     mad vatsa pari as na vid     iṣ viśva amṛta amūra     śramayu padavī dhiyaṃdhā     sthā pada parama cāru agni     tri yat agni śarad tvad id     śuci ghṛta śuci sapary     nāman cit dhā yajñiya     sūday tanū su jan     ā rodas bṛhat vevid     pra rudriya bhṛ yajñiya     vid marta nemadhiti cit     agni pada parama sthā     saṃjñā upa sad abhijñu     patnīvat namasya namasy     ric tanū kṛ sva     sakhi sakhi nimiṣ rakṣ     tris saptan yat guhya tvad id     pada vid nidhā yajñiya     tad rakṣ amṛta sa joṣa     paśu ca sthātṛ caratha ca pā     vid agni vayuna kṣiti     vi ānuṣak śurudh jīv dhā     antar vid adhvan deva yāna     atandra dūta bhū havis vāh     su ādhī div ā saptan yahvī     rai dvār vi ṛta jña jñā     vid gavya saramā dṛḍha ūrva     yad ā nu kaṃ mānuṣa bhuj viś     ā yad viśva su apatya sthā     kṛ amṛta tva gātu     mahan mahat pṛthivī vi sthā     mātṛ putra aditi dhāyas vi     adhi śrī ni cāru idam     div yat akṣi amṛta kṛ     adha kṣar sindhu na sṛj     pra nyāñc agni aruṣa jñā 
      rayi na yad pitṛ vid vayodhas     su praṇīti cit na śāsus     syonaśī atithi na prī     hotṛ iva sadman vidh vi tṛ     deva na yad savitṛ satya manman     kratu nipā vṛjana viśva     puru praśaṃs amati na satya     ātman iva śeva didhiṣ bhū     deva na yad pṛthivī viśvadhā     upakṣi hita mitra na rājan     puraḥsad śarman sad na vīra     anavadya pati juṣ iva nārī     tad tvad nṛ dama ā nityam indh     agni sac kṣiti dhruva     adhi dyumna ni bhūri idam     bhū viśvāyu dharuṇa rayi     vi pṛkṣ agni maghavan aś     vi sūri dā viśva āyus     san vāja samitha ari     bhāga deva śravas dhā     ṛta hi dhenu vaś     smadūdhan pyā div bhaj     parāvat sumati bhikṣ     vi sindhu samayā sṛ adri     tvad agni sumati bhikṣ     div śravas dhā yajñiya     nakta ca kṛ uṣas virūpa     kṛṣṇa ca varṇa aruṇa ca sam dhā     yad rai marta sūd agni     tad as maghavan mad ca     chāyā iva viśva bhuvana sac     āprā rodas antarikṣa     arvant agni arvant nṛ nṛ     vīra vīra van tvota     īś pitṛ vid rai     vi sūri śata hima mad aś     etad tvad agni ucatha vedhas     juṣ as manas hṛd ca     śak rai su dhur yam tvad     adhi śravas deva bhaj dhā 
      upapre adhvara     mantra vac agni     āre mad ca śru     yad snīhiti pūrvya     saṃgam kṛṣṭi     rakṣ dāś gaya     uta brū jantu     ud agni vṛtra han jan     dhanaṃjaya raṇa raṇa     yad dūta as kṣaya     vī havya vīti     dasmat kṛ adhvara     tad id su hu aṅgiras     su deva sahas yahu     jan ah su barhis     ā ca vah tad iha     deva upa praśasti     havya su ścandra vī     na upabdi aśvya     śru ratha kat cana     yat agni yā dūtya     tvota vājin ahraya     abhi pūrva apara     pra dāś agni sthā     uta dyumat su vīrya     bṛhat agni vivās     deva deva dāś 
      juṣ saprathastama     vacas deva psarastama     havya hu āsan     atha tvad aṅgirastama     agni vedhastama priya     vac brahman sānasi     ka tvad jāmi jana     agni ka dāśvadhvara     ka ha ka as śri     tvad jāmi jana     agni mitra as priya     sakhi sakhi īḍ     yaj mad mitrāvaruṇa     yaj deva ṛta bṛhat     agni yaj sva dama 
      ka tvad upeti manas vara     bhū agni śaṃtama ka manīṣā     ka vā yajña pari dakṣa tvad āp     ka vā tvad manas dāś     e agni iha hotṛ ni sad     adabdha su puraetṛ bhū mad     av tvad rodas viśvaminva     yaj mah saumanasa deva     pra su viśva rakṣas dah agni     bhū yajña abhiśasti pāvan     atha ā vah soma pati hari     ātithya idam kṛ su dāvan     prajāvat vacas vahni ās     ca hvā ni ca sad iha deva     vī hotra uta potra yajatra     bhū prayantṛ janitṛ vasu     yathā vipra manus havis     deva yaj kavi kavi as     eva hotṛ satyatara tvad adya     agni mandra juhū yaj 
      kathā dāś agni ka idam     deva juṣ vac bhāmin gir     yad martya amṛta ṛtāvan     hotṛ yajiṣṭha id kṛ deva     yad adhvara śaṃtama ṛtāvan     hotṛ tad u namas ā kṛ     agni yat vī marta deva     tad ca ā budh manas yaj     tad hi kratu tad marya tad sādhu     mitra na bhū adbhuta rathī     tad medha prathama devay     viś upa brū dasma ārya     tad mad nṛ nṛtama riśādas     agni gir avas vī dhīti     tan ca yad maghavan śaviṣṭha     vāja prasū iṣay manman     eva agni gotama ṛtāvan     vipra stu jātavedas     tad idam dyumna pyā tad vāja     tad puṣṭi yā joṣa ā cit 
      abhi tvad gotama gir     jātavedas vicarṣaṇi     dyumna abhi pra nonāv     tad u tvad gotama gir     rāyaskāma duvasy     dyumna abhi pra nonāv     tad u tvad vāja sātama     aṅgirasvat hvā     dyumna abhi pra nonāv     tad u tvad vṛtra hantama     yad dasyu avadhū     dyumna abhi pra nonāv     vac rahūgaṇa     agni madhumat vacas     dyumna abhi pra nonāv 
      hiraṇya keśa rajas visāra     ahi dhuni vāta iva dhrajīmat     śuci bhrājas uṣas navedas     yaśasvat apasyu na satya     ā tvad suparṇa mī eva     kṛṣṇa nonāv vṛṣabha yadi idam     śiva na smi āgā     pat mih stanay abhra     yat īṃ ṛta payas pyā     nī ṛta pathin rajiṣṭha     aryaman mitra varuṇa parijman     tvac pṛc upara yoni     agni vāja gomat     īś sahas yahu     mad dhā jātavedas mahi śravas     tad indh vasu kavi     agni īḍ gir     revat mad purvaṇīka dīdī     kṣap rājan uta tman     agni vastu uta uṣas     tad tigma jambha rakṣas dah prati     av mad agni ūti     gāyatra prabharman     viśva dhī vand     ā mad agni rayi bhṛ     satrāsāh vareṇya     viśva pṛt duṣṭara     ā mad agni su cetu     rayi viśvāyu poṣas     mārḍīka dhā jīv     pra pū tigma śocis     vāc gotama agni     bhṛ sumnayu gir     yad mad agni abhidās     anti dūra pad tad     mad id vṛdh bhū     sahasra akṣa vicarṣaṇi     agni rakṣas sidh     hotṛ gṛ ukthya 
      itthā hi soma id mada     brahman kṛ vardhana     śaviṣṭha vajrin ojas     pṛthivī niḥ śās ahi     arc anu sva rājya     tad tvad mad vṛṣan mada     soma śyena ābhṛ su     yad vṛtra niḥ ap     han vajrin ojas     arc anu sva rājya     pre abhī dhṛṣ     na tvad vajra ni yam     indra nṛmṇa hi tvad śavas     han vṛtra ji ap     arc anu sva rājya     niḥ indra bhūmi adhi     vṛtra han niḥ div     sṛj marutvat ava     jīva dhanya idam ap     arc anu sva rājya     indra vṛtra dudh     sānu vajra hīḍ     abhikram ava han     ap sarma coday     arc anu sva rājya     adhi sānu ni han     vajra śata parvan     mad indra andhas     sakhi gātu iṣ     arc anu sva rājya     indra tvad id adrivat     anutta vajrin vīrya     yat ha tya māyin mṛga     tad u tvad māyā vadh     arc anu sva rājya     vi tvad vajra sthā     navati nāvyā anu     mahat tvad indra vīrya     bāhu tvad bala dhā     arc anu sva rājya     sahasra sākam arc     pari stubh viṃśati     śata enad anu nonāv     indra brahman udyam     arc anu sva rājya     indra vṛtra taviṣī     niḥ han sahas sahas     mahat tad idam pauṃsya     vṛtra han sṛj     arc anu sva rājya     idam cit tvad manyu     vip bhiyas mahī     yat indra vajrin ojas     vṛtra marutvat vadh     arc anu sva rājya     na vepas na tanyatā     indra vṛtra vi bhī     abhi enad vajra āyasa     sahasra bhṛṣṭi i     arc anu sva rājya     yat vṛtra tvad ca aśani     vajra saṃyodhay     ahi indra jighāṃs     div tvad badbadh śavas     arc anu sva rājya     abhiṣṭana tvad adrivat     yad sthā jagat ca rej     tvaṣṭṛ cit tvad manyu     indra vevij bhī     arc anu sva rājya     nahi nu yāt adhī     indra ka vīrya para     tad nṛmṇa uta kratu     deva ojas sam arc     arc anu sva rājya     yad atharvan manu pitṛ     dadhyac dhī tan     tad brahman pūrvathā     indra uktha sam gam     arc anu sva rājya 
      indra mada vṛdh     śavas vṛtrahan nṛ     tad id mahat āji     uta īṃ arbha hvā     tad vāja pra mad av     as hi vīra senya     as bhūri parādadi     as dabhra cit vṛdha     yaj śikṣ     su bhūri tvad vasu     yat udīr āji     dhṛṣṇu dhā dhana     yuj madacyut hari     ka han ka vasu dhā     mad indra vasu dhā     kratu mahat anuṣvadham     bhīma ā vṛdh śavas     śrī ṛṣva upāka     ni śiprin harivat dhā     hasta vajra āyasa     ā prā pārthiva rajas     badbadh rocana div     na tvāvat indra kaścana     na jan na jan     ati viśva vakṣ     yad ari marta bhojana     parādā dāś     indra mad śikṣ     vi bhaj bhūri tvad vasu     bhakṣ tvad rādhas     mada mada hi mad dadi     yūtha go ṛju kratu     sam gṛbhāy puru śata     ubhayāhastyā vasu     śā rai ā bhṛ     māday suta sacā     śavas śūra rādhas     vid hi tvad purūvasu     upa kāma sṛj     atha mad av bhū     etad tvad indra jantu     viśva puṣ vārya     antar hi khyā jana     ari vedas a dāś     tad mad vedas ā bhṛ 
      upa u su śru gir     maghavan mā atathā iva     yadā mad sūnṛtāvat     kṛ āt arthay id     yuj nu indra tvad hari     ghas mad hi     ava priya dhū     stu sva bhānu     vipra naviṣṭha mati     yuj nu indra tvad hari     su saṃdṛś tvad mad     maghavan vand     pra nūnam pṛ vandhura     stu yā vaśa anu     yuj nu indra tvad hari     tad gha tad vṛṣan ratha     adhi sthā go vid     yad pātra hāriyojana     pṛ indra cit     yuj nu indra tvad hari     yuj tvad as dakṣiṇa     uta savya śatakratu     tad jāyā upa priya     mad yā andhas     yuj nu indra tvad hari     yuj tvad brahman keśin hari     upa pra yā dhā gabhasti     ud tvad suta rabhasa mad     pūṣaṇvat vajrin sam u patnī mad
