       samindh agni ā vah      deva adya yam sruc      tantu tan pūrvya      su soma dāś      ghṛtavat upa mā      madhumat tanūnapāt      yajña vipra māvat      śam dāś      śuci pāvaka adbhuta      madhu yajña mikṣ      narāśaṃsa tris ā div      deva deva yajñiya      īḍ agni ā vah      indra citra iha priya      idam hi tvad mati mad      acchā su jihvā vañc      stṛ yam sruc      barhis yajña su adhvara      vṛj deva vyacastama      indra śarman saprathas      vi śri ṛtāvṛdh      prayā deva mahi      pāvaka puruspṛh      dvār deva asaścat      ā bhand upāka      naktoṣāsā supeśas      yahvī ṛta mātṛ      sad barhis ā sumat      mandra jihvā jugurvaṇi      hotṛ daivya kavi      yajña mad yaj idam      sidhra adya divispṛś      śuci deva arpay      hotrā marut bhāratī      iḍā sarasvatī mah      barhis sad yajñiya      tad mad turīpa adbhuta      puru vāra puru tman      tvaṣṭṛ poṣa vi sā      rai nābhi mad asmayu      avasṛj upa tman      deva yaj vanaspati      agni havya sūd      deva deva medhira      pūṣaṇvat marutvat      viśva deva vāyu      svāhā gāyatra vepas      havya indra kṛ      svāhākṛta ā gam      upa havya vīti      indra ā gam śru hava      tvad hvā adhvara 
       pra tavyas navyas dhīti agni      vāc mati sahas sūnu bhṛ      ap napāt yad vasu saha priya      hotṛ pṛthivī ni sad ṛtviya      tad jan parama vyoman      āvis agni bhū mātariśvan      idam kratu samindh majman      pra div śocis pṛthivī rocay      idam tveṣa ajara idam bhānu      su saṃdṛś su pratīka su dyut      bhā tvakṣas ati aktu na sindhu      agni rej a sas ajara      yad er bhṛgu viśva vedas      nābhi pṛthivī bhuvana majman      agni tad gir hi sva ā dama      yad eka vasu varuṇa na rāj      na yad vara marut iva svana      senā iva sṛj divya yathā aśani      agni jambha tigita ad bharv      yodha na śatru tad vana ni ṛj      kuvid mad agni ucatha vī as      vasu kuvid vasu kāma āvṛ      coda kuvid tuj sāti dhī      śuci pratīka tad idam dhī gṛ      ghṛta pratīka tvad ṛta dhūrṣad      agni mitra na samindh ṛj      indh akra vidatha dīdī      śukra varṇa ud u mad yam dhī      aprayucchat aprayucchat agni      śiva mad pāyu pā śagma      adabdha a dṛp iṣṭa      a nimiṣ pari pā mad jā 
       i pra hotṛ vrata idam māyā      ūrdhva dhā śuci peśas dhī      abhi sruc kram dakṣiṇa āvṛt      yad idam dhāman prathamam ha niṃs      abhi īṃ ṛta dohana nū      yoni deva sadana parīvṛ      ap upastha vibhṛ yat āvas      adha svadhā dhā yad ī      yuyūṣ savayas tad id vapus      samāna artha vitartar mithas      āt īṃ bhaga na hvā sam mad ā      voḍhṛ na raśmi sam yam sārathi      yad īṃ dvi savayas sapary      samāna yoni mithuna samokas      divā na nakta palita yuvan jan      puru car ajara mānuṣa yuga      tad īṃ hi dhīti daśan vriś      deva marta ūti hvā      dhanū adhi pravat ā tad ṛch      abhivraj vayuna nava dhā      tvad hi agni divya rāj      tvad pārthiva paśu pā iva tman      ena tad etad bṛhat abhiśrī      hiraṇyaya vakvan barhis aś      agni juṣ prati hary tad vacas      mandra svadhāvat ṛta jan sukratu      yad viśvatas pratyañc as darśata      raṇva saṃdṛṣṭi pitumat iva kṣaya 
       tad pracch tad gam tad vid      tad cit ī tad nu ī      tad as praśis tad iṣṭi      tad vāja śavas śuṣmin pati      tad id pracch na sima vi pracch      sva iva dhīra manas yad grah      na mṛṣ prathama na apara vacas      idam kratu sac a pradṛp      tad id gam juhū tad arvatī      viśva eka śru vacas mad      puru praiṣa taturi yajña sādhana      acchidra ūti śiśu ādā sam rabhas      upasthāyam car yat samṛch      sadyas jan tsar yujya      abhi śvānta mṛś nāndī mud      yat īṃ gam vaś apiṣṭhā      tad īṃ mṛga apya vanargu      upa tvac upama ni dhā      vi brū vayuna martya      agni vid ṛta cit hi satya 
       tri mūrdhan saptan raśmi gṛ      anūna agni pitṛ upastha      niṣad idam car dhruva      viśva div rocana āprā      ukṣan mahat abhi vakṣ enad      ajara sthā itaūti ṛṣva      urvī pad ni dhā sānu      rih ūdhas aruṣa idam      samāna vatsa abhi saṃcar      viṣvañc dhenu vi car sumeka      anapavṛjya adhvan mā      viśva keta adhi mah dhā      dhīra pada kavi nī      nānā hṛd rakṣ ajurya      siṣās pari paś sindhu      āvis idam bhū sūrya nṛ      didṛkṣeṇya pari kāṣṭhā jenya      īḍ mah arbha jīv      purutrā yat bhū sū aha idam      garbha maghavan viśva darśata 
       kathā tvad agni śocay āyu      dāś vāja āśuṣ      ubh yat toka tanaya dhā      ṛta sāman raṇay deva      budh mad idam vacas yaviṣṭha      maṃhiṣṭha prabhṛ svadhāvat      pī tva anu tva gṛ      vandāru tvad tanū vand agni      yad pāyu māmateya tad agni      paś andha durita rakṣ      rakṣ tad su kṛt viśva vedas      dips id ripu na aha dabh      yad mad agni a rā aghāyu      arātīvan marcay dvaya      mantra guru punar as tad idam      anu mṛc tanū durukta      uta vā yad sahasya pravid      marta marta marcay dvaya      atas pā stu stu      agni mākir mad durita 
       math yat īṃ viṣ mātariśvan      hotṛ viśvāpsu viśvadevya      ni yad manuṣya viś      svar na citra vapus vibhāva      dā id na dabh manman      agni varūtha mad tad kan      juṣ viśva idam karman      upastuti bhṛ kāru      nitya cit nu yad sadana grah      praśasti dhā yajñiya      pra sū nī gṛbhay iṣṭi      aśva na rathī raṃh      puru dasma ni ri jambha      āt ruc vana ā vibhāvan      āt idam vāta anu vā śocis      astṛ na śaryā asana anu div      na yad ripu na riṣaṇyu      garbha as reṣaṇa reṣay      andha apaśya na dabh abhikhyā      nitya īṃ pretṛ rakṣ 
       mah tad rai īṣ pati dan      ina ina vasu pada ā      upa dhraj adri vidh id      tad yad vṛṣan nṛ na rodasī      śravas as jīva pā sarga      pra yad sṛ śri yoni      ā yad pur nārmiṇī dīdī      atya kavi nabhanya na arvan      sūra na ruc śata ātman      abhi dvi janman tri rocana      viśva rajas śuc sthā      hotṛ yajiṣṭha ap sadhastha      idam tad hotṛ yad dvijanman      viśva dhā vārya śravasya      marta yad idam sutuka dāś 
       puru tvad dāś vac      ari agni tvad svid ā      toda iva śaraṇa ā maha      vi anina dhanin      prahoṣa cit a rā      kadā cana pragā a devayu      sa candra vipra martya      maha vrādhantama div      pra pra id tvad agni vanus as 
       mitra na yad śimī go gavyu      svādhī vidatha ap jan      rej rodas pājas gir      prati priya yajata janus avas      yat ha tya tvad purumīḍha somin      pra mitra na dhā su ābhū      adha kratu vid gātu arc      uta śru vṛṣan pastyāvat      ā tvad bhūṣ kṣiti janman rodasī      pravac vṛṣan dakṣas mah      yat īṃ ṛta bhṛ yat arvant      pra hotrā śimī vī adhvara      pra tad kṣiti asura yad mahi priya      ṛtāvan ṛta ā ghuṣ bṛhat      tvad div bṛhat dakṣa ābhū      go na dhur upa yuj ap      mahī atra mahina vāra ṛch      areṇu tuj ā sadman dhenu      svar tad uparatāti sūrya      ā nimruc uṣas takvavī iva      ā tvad ṛta keśin nū      mitra yatra varuṇa gātu arc      ava tman sṛj pinv dhī      tvad vipra manman irajy      yad tvad yajña śam ha dāś      kavi hotṛ yaj manman sādhana      upa aha tad gam vī adhvara      acchā gir sumati gam asmayu      tvad yajña prathama go añj      ṛtāvan manas na prayukti      bhṛ tvad manman saṃyam gir      a dṛp manas revat aś      revat vayas dhā revat aś      nṛ māyā itaūti māhina      na tvad div aha na uta sindhu      na deva tva paṇi na aś magha 
       tvad vastra pīvasa vas      tvad acchidra mantu ha sarga      avatṛ anṛta viśva      ṛta mitrāvaruṇa sac      etad cana tva vi cit idam      satya mantra kavi śaṃs ṛghāvat      triraśri han catur asra ugra      deva nid ha prathama jṛ      a pād i prathama padvat      ka tad tvad mitrāvaruṇa cit      garbha bhāra bhṛ ā cit idam      ṛta pṛ anṛta ni tṛ      pre id pari jāra kanī      paś na upanipad      an avapṛc vitan vas      priya mitra varuṇa dhāman      an aśva jan an abhīśu arvan      kanikrad patay ūrdhva sānu      acitta brahman juṣ yuvan      pra mitra dhāman varuṇa gṛ      ā dhenu māmateya av      brahman priya pyā tad ūdhas      pitu bhikṣ vayuna vid      ās āvivās aditi uruṣy      ā tvad mitrāvaruṇa havya juṣṭi      namas deva avas vṛt      mad brahman pṛtanā sah      mad vṛṣṭi divya su pāra 
       yaj tvad mah sajoṣas      havya mitrāvaruṇa namas      ghṛta ghṛtasnu adha yad tvad mad      adhvaryu na dhīti bhṛ      prastuti tvad dhāman na prayukti      yam mitrāvaruṇa suvṛkti      añj yat tvad vidatha hotṛ      sumna tvad sūri vṛṣan iyakṣ      pyā dhenu aditi ṛta      jana mitrāvaruṇa havis dā      hi yat tvad vidatha sapary      tad rā havya mānuṣa na hotṛ      uta tvad viś mad andhas      go ap ca pyā deva      uta u mad idam pūrvya pati      vī pā payas usriyā 
       viṣṇu nu kaṃ vīrya pra vac      yad pārthiva vimā rajas      yad skabhāy uttara sadhastha      vikram tredhā uru gāya      pra tad viṣṇu stu vīrya      mṛga na bhīma kucara giriṣṭhā      yad uru tri vikramaṇa      adhikṣi bhuvana viśva      pra viṣṇu śūṣa i manman      giri kṣit uru gāya vṛṣan      yad idam dīrgha prayam sadhastha      eka vimā tri id pada      yad tri pṛ madhu pada      a kṣi svadhā mad      yad u tridhātu pṛthivī uta div      eka dhṛ bhuvana viśva      tad idam priya abhi pāthas aś      nṛ yatra devayu mad      urukrama tad hi bandhu itthā      viṣṇu pada parama madhu utsa      tad tvad vāstu vaś gam      yatra go bhūri śṛṅga ayās      atra aha tad uru gāya vṛṣan      parama pada ava bhā bhūri 
       pra tvad andhas dhiyāy      mah śūra viṣṇu ca arc      yad sānu parvata adābhya      mah sthā arvant iva sādhu      tveṣa itthā samaraṇa śimīvat      indrāviṣṇu suta pā tvad uruṣy      yad martya pratidhā id      kṛśānu astṛ asanā uruṣy      tad īṃ vṛdh mahi idam pauṃsya      ni mātṛ nī retas bhuj      dhā putra avara para pitṛ      nāman tṛtīya adhi rocana div      tad tad id idam pauṃsya gṛ      ina trātṛ avṛka mīḍhvas      yad pārthiva tri id vigāman      uru kram uru gāya jīv      dvi id idam kramaṇa svar dṛś      abhikhyā martya bhuraṇy      tṛtīya idam nakir ā dhṛṣ      vi cana patay patatrin      catur sākam navati ca nāman      cakra na vṛt vyati vip      bṛhat śarīra vimā ṛkvan      yuvan a kumāra prati i āhava 
       bhū mitra na śevya ghṛta āsuti      vibhū dyumna eva yā u saprathas      adha tvad viṣṇu vid cit ṛdh      stoma yajña ca rādh haviṣmat      yad pūrvya vedhas navīyas      sumat jānī viṣṇu dāś      yad jāta idam mahat mahi brū      tad id u śravas yujya cit abhi as      tad u stu pūrvya yathā vid      ṛta garbha janus pṛ      ā idam jñā nāman cit vac      mah tvad viṣṇu sumati bhaj      tad idam rājan varuṇa tad aśvin      kratu sac māruta vedhas      dhṛ dakṣa uttama ahar vid      vraja ca viṣṇu sakhivat apavṛ      ā yad vī sacatha daivya      indra viṣṇu su kṛt sukṛttara      vedhas jinv triṣadhastha ārya      ṛta bhāga yaj ābhaj 
       budh agni jm ud i sūrya      vi uṣas candra mah vas arcis      āyuj aśvin yā ratha      prasū deva savitṛ jagant pṛthak      yat yuj vṛṣan aśvin ratha      ghṛta mad madhu kṣatra ukṣ      mad brahman pṛtanā jinv      mad dhana śūrasāti bhaj      arvāñc tri cakra madhu vāhana ratha      jīra aśva aśvin yā suṣṭuta      tri vandhura maghavan viśva saubhaga      śam mad ā vah dvipad catuṣpada      ā mad ūrj vah aśvin tvad      madhumat mad kaśā mikṣ      pra āyus tṛ niḥ rapas mṛj      sidh dveṣas bhū sacābhū      tvad ha garbha jagatī dhā      tvad viśva bhuvana antar      tvad agni ca vṛṣan ap ca      vanaspati aśvin īray      tvad ha as bhiṣaj bheṣaja      atho ha as rathya rāthya      atho ha kṣatra adhi dhā ugra      yad tvad haviṣmat manas dāś 
       vasu rudra puru mantu vṛdh      daśasy mad vṛṣan abhiṣṭi      dasra ha yat rekṇas aucathya tvad      pra yat sṛ akava ūti      ka tvad dāś sumati cit idam      vasu yat dhā namas pada go      jāgṛ mad revat puraṃdhi      kāmapra iva manas car      yuj ha yat tvad taugrya peru      vi madhya arṇas dhā pajra      upa tvad avas śaraṇa gam      śūra na ajman patay eva      upastuti aucathya uruṣy      mā mad idam patatrin vi duh      mā mad edha daśataya ci dah      pra yat tvad bandh tman khād kṣā      na mad gṛ nadī mātṛtama      dāsa yat īṃ su samubh avadhā      śiras yat idam traitana vitakṣ      svayam dāsa uras aṃsa api      dīrghatamas māmateya      jṛ daśama yuga      ap artha i      brahman bhū sārathi 
       pra div yajña pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdh      mahi stu vidatha pracetas      deva yad deva putra su daṃsas      itthā dhī vārya prabhūṣ      uta man pitṛ adruh manas      mātṛ mahi sva tavas tad havīman      su retas pitṛ bhūman kṛ      uru prajā amṛta varīman      tad sūnu su apas su daṃsas      mahi jan mātṛ pūrvacitti      sthātṛ ca satya jagat ca dharman      putra pā pada a dvayāvin      tad māyin mā su pracetas      jāmi sayoni mithuna samokas      navya navya tantu ā tan div      samudra antar kavi su dīti      tad rādhas adya savitṛ vareṇya      mad deva prasava man      mad dyāvāpṛthivī su cetu      rayi dhā vasumat śatagvin 
       tad hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśva śambhu      ṛtāvan rajas dhāray kavi      su janman dhiṣaṇā antar i      deva devī dharman sūrya śuci      uru vyacas mahin asaścat      pitṛ mātṛ ca bhuvana rakṣ      sudhṛṣṭama vapuṣya na rodasī      pitṛ yat sīm abhi rūpa vāsay      tad vahni putra pitṛ pavitravat      pū dhīra bhuvana māyā      dhenu ca pṛśni vṛṣabha su retas      viśvāhā śukra payas idam duh      idam deva apas apastama      yad jan rodasī viśva śambhu      vi yad mā rajas sukratūyā      ajara skambhana sam arc      tad mad gṛ mahin mahi śravas      kṣatra dyāvāpṛthivī dhā bṛhat      yad abhi kṛṣṭi tan viśvahā      panāyya ojas mad sam inv 
       kim u śreṣṭha kim yaviṣṭha mad āgam      ka i dūtya ka yad vac      na nind camasa yad mahat kula      agni bhrātṛ dru id bhūti vad      eka camasa catur kṛ      tad tvad deva brū tad tvad āgam      saudhanvana yadi eva kṛ      sākam deva yajñiya bhū      agni dūta prati yad brū      aśva kṛ ratha uta iha kṛ      dhenu kṛ yuvaśa kṛ dvi      tad bhrātṛ anu tvad kṛ e      kṛ ṛbhu tad pracch      kva id bhū yad tya dūta mad āgam      yadā avakhyā camasa catur kṛ      āt id tvaṣṭṛ gnā antar ni añj      han enad iti tvaṣṭṛ yat brū      camasa yad deva pāna nind      anya nāman kṛ suta saca      anya enad kanyā nāman spṛ      indra hari yuj aśvin ratha      bṛhaspati viśvarūpā upāj      ṛbhu vibhvan vāja deva gam      su apas yajñiya bhāga i      niḥ carman go ri dhīti      yad jaranta yuvaśa tad kṛ      saudhanvana aśva aśva takṣ      yuj ratha upa deva yā      idam udaka pā iti brū      idam vā gha pā muñja nejana      saudhanvana yadi tad na iva hary      tṛtīya gha savana māday      ap bhūyiṣṭha iti eka brū      agni bhūyiṣṭha iti anya brū      vadhary bahu pra eka brū      ṛta vad camasa piś      śroṇa eka udaka go avāj      māṃsa eka piś sūnā ābhṛ      ā nimruc śakṛt eka apabhṛ      ka svid putra pitṛ upāv      udvat idam kṛ tṛṇa      nivat ap svapasyā nṛ      agohya yat sas gṛha      tad adya idam ṛbhu na anu gam      sammīlay yat bhuvana parisṛp      kva svid tātya pitṛ tvad as      śap yad karasna tvad ādā      yad prabrū pra u tad brū      svap ṛbhu tad pracch      agohya ka idam mad budh      śvan basta bodhayitṛ brū      saṃvatsara idam adya vi khyā      div yā marut bhūmi agni      idam vāta antarikṣa yā      ap yā varuṇa samudra      tvad iṣ śavas napāt 
       mā mad mitra varuṇa aryaman āyu      indra ṛbhukṣan marut pari khyā      yat vājin deva jan sapti      pravac vidatha vīrya      yat nirṇij rekṇas prāvṛ      rāti grah mukhatas nī      su prāñc aja memy viśva rūpa      indra pūṣan priya api i pāthas      etad chāga puras aśva vājin      pūṣan bhāga nī viśvadevya      abhi priya yat puroḍāś arvant      tvaṣṭṛ id enad sauśravasa jinv      yat haviṣya ṛtuśas deva yāna      tris mānuṣa pari aśva nī      atra pūṣan prathama bhāga i      yajña deva prativeday aja      hotṛ adhvaryu āvayas agnimindha      grāvagrābha uta śaṃstṛ su vipra      tad yajña su alaṃkṛ      su yaj vakṣaṇā ā pṛṇ      yūpavraska uta yad yūpa vāha      caṣāla yad aśva yūpa takṣ      yad ca arvant pacana sambhṛ      uta u tad abhigūrti mad inv      upa pragā sumat mad dhā manman      deva āśā upa vī pṛṣṭha      anu enad vipra ṛṣi mad      deva puṣṭa kṛ su bandhu      yad vājin dāman saṃdāna arvant      yad śīrṣaṇya raśanā rajju idam      yad vā gha idam prabhṛ āsya tṛṇa      sarva tad tvad api deva as      yad aśva kravis makṣikā aś      yad vā svaru svadhiti rip as      yad hasta śamitṛ yad nakha      sarva tad tvad api deva as      yad ūvadhya udara apavā      yad āma kravis gandha as      su kṛ tad śamitṛ kṛ      uta medha śrī pāka pac      yad tvad gātra agni pac      abhi śūla nihan avadhāv      mā tad bhūmi ā śriṣ mā tṛṇa      deva tad vaś rā as      yad vājin paripaś pakva      yad īṃ ah surabhi niḥ hṛ iti      yad ca arvant māṃsa bhikṣā upās      uta u tad abhigūrti mad inv      yad nīkṣaṇa māṃspacana ukhā      yad pātra yūṣan āsecana      ūṣmaṇya apidhāna caru      aṅka sūnā pari bhūṣ aśva      nikramaṇa niṣadana vivartana      yad ca paḍvīśa arvant      yad ca pā yad ca ghāsi ghas      sarva tad tvad api deva as      mā tvad agni dhvanay dhūma gandhi      mā ukhā bhrāj abhi vij jaghri      yaj vī abhigur vaṣaṭkṛ      tad deva prati grah aśva      yad aśva vāsas upastṛ      adhīvāsa yad hiraṇya idam      saṃdāna arvant paḍvīśa      priya deva ā yāmay      yad tvad sāda mahas śūkṛta      pārṣṇi vā kaśā vā tud      sruc iva tad havis adhvara      sarva tad tvad brahman sūday      catustriṃśat vājin deva bandhu      vaṅkri aśva svadhiti sam i      acchidra gātra vayuna kṛ      parus parus anughuṣ vi śaṃs      eka tvaṣṭṛ aśva viśastṛ      dvi yantṛ bhū tathā ṛtu      yad tvad gātra ṛtuthā kṛ      tad tad piṇḍa pra hu agni      mā tvad tap priya ātman apī      mā svadhiti tanū ā sthāpay tvad      mā tvad gṛdhnu aviśastṛ atihā      chidra gātra asi mithū kṛ      na vai u etad mṛ na riṣ      deva id i pathin su ga      hari tvad pṛṣatī bhū      upasthā vājin dhur rāsabha      su gavyā mad vājin su aśvya      puṃs putra uta viśvāpuṣ rayi      anāgāstva mad aditi kṛ      kṣatra mad aśva van haviṣmat 
       yat krand prathamam jan      udi samudra uta vā purīṣa      śyena pakṣa hariṇa bāhu      upastu mahi jāta tvad arvant      yama dā trita enad āyuj      indra eṇa prathama adhi sthā      gandharva idam raśanā grah      sūra aśva vasu niḥ takṣ      as yama as āditya arvant      as trita guhya vrata      as soma samayā vipṛc      ah tvad tri div bandhana      tri tvad ah div bandhana      tri ap tri antar samudra      uta iva mad varuṇa chand arvant      yatra tvad ah parama janitra      idam tvad vājin avamārjana      idam śapha sanitṛ nidhāna      atra tvad bhadra raśanā paś      ṛta yad abhirakṣ gopā      ātman tvad manas ārāt jñā      avas div patay pataṃga      śiras paś pathin su ga      areṇu jeh patatrin      atra tvad rūpa uttama paś      jigīṣ iṣ ā pada go      yadā tvad marta anu bhoga naś      āt id grasiṣṭha oṣadhi jāgṛ      anu tvad ratha anu marya arvant      anu go anu bhaga kanī      anu vrāta tvad sakhya i      anu deva mā vīrya tvad      hiraṇya śṛṅga ayas idam pāda      manas javas avara indra as      deva id idam havis adya i      yad arvant prathama adhiṣṭhā      īrmānta silikamadhyama      sam śūraṇa divya atya      haṃsa iva śreṇiśas yat      yat akṣ divya ajma aśva      tvad śarīra patayiṣṇu arvant      tvad citta vāta iva dhrajīmat      tvad śṛṅga viṣṭhā purutrā      araṇya jarbhur car      upa pragā śasana vājin arvan      devadryañc manas dhī      aja puras nī nābhi idam      anu paścāt kavi i rebha      upa pragā parama yad sadhastha      arvant acchā pitṛ mātṛ ca      adya deva juṣṭatama hi gam      atha śās dāś vārya 
       idam vāma palita hotṛ      tad bhrātṛ madhyama as aśna      tṛtīya bhrātṛ ghṛta pṛṣṭha idam      atra paś viśpati saptan putra      saptan yuj ratha eka cakra      eka aśva vah saptan nāman      tri nābhi cakra ajara anarva      yatra idam viśva bhuvana adhi sthā      idam ratha adhi yad saptan sthā      saptan cakra saptan vah aśva      saptan svasṛ abhi sam nū      yatra go nidhā saptan nāman      ka dṛś prathama jan      asthanvat yat anastha bhṛ      bhūmi asu asṛj ātman kva svid      ka vid upa gā pracch etad      pāka pracch manas a vijñā      deva enā nidhā pada      vatsa baṣkaya adhi saptan tantu      vi tan kavi ve u      a cit cit cit atra      kavi pracch vid na vid      vi yad stambh ṣaṣ idam rajas      aja rūpa ka api svid eka      iha brū yad īṃ aṅga vid      idam vāma nidhā pada vi      śīrṣan kṣīra duh go idam      vavri vas udaka pad pā      mātṛ pitṛ ṛta ā bhaj      dhīti agra manas sam hi gam      tad bībhatsu garbha rasa nivyadh      namasvat id upavāka i      yuj mātṛ as dhur dakṣiṇā      sthā garbha vṛjanī antar      mā vatsa anu go paś      viśvarūpī tri yojana      tri mātṛ tri pitṛ bhṛ eka      ūrdhva sthā na īṃ ava glāpay      mantray div adas pṛṣṭha      viśva vid vāc a viśvaminva      dvādaśan ara nahi tad jara      varvṛt cakra pari div ṛta      ā putra agni mithuna atra      saptan śata viṃśati ca sthā      pañcan pāda pitṛ dvādaśan ākṛti      div ah para ardha purīṣin      atha idam anya upara vicakṣaṇa      saptan cakra ṣaṣ ara ah arpay      pañcan ara cakra parivṛt      tad ā sthā bhuvana viśva      tad na akṣa tap bhūri bhāra      sanāt eva na śṛ sa nābhi      sa nemi cakra ajara vi vṛt      uttāna daśan yuj vah      sūrya cakṣus rajas i āvṛ      tad ā arpay bhuvana viśva      sākaṃja saptatha ah ekaja      ṣaṣ id yama ṛṣi deva ja iti      tad iṣ vidhā dhāmaśas      sthātra rej vikṛ rūpaśas      strī as tad u mad puṃs ah      paś akṣaṇvat na vi cit andha      kavi yad putra tad īṃ ā cit      yad tad vijñā tad pitṛ pitṛ as      avas para paras idam avara      pad vatsa bhṛ go ud sthā      tad kadryañc ka svid ardha parāgā      kva svid sū nahi yūtha antar      avas para pitṛ yad idam      anuvid paras idam avara      kavīy ka iha pra vac      deva manas kutas adhi prajan      yad arvāñc tad u parāñc ah      yad parāñc tad u arvāñc ah      indra ca yad kṛ soma tad      dhur na yuj rajas vah      dvi suparṇa sayuj sakhi      samāna vṛkṣa pari svaj      tad anya pippala svādu ad      an aś anya abhi cākaś      yatra suparṇa amṛta bhāga      animeṣa vidatha abhisvar      ina viśva bhuvana gopā      tad mad dhīra pāka atra ā viś      yad vṛkṣa madhvad suparṇa      niviś sū ca adhi viśva      tad id ah pippala svādu agra      tad na ud naś yad pitṛ na vid      yat gāyatra adhi gāyatra ādhā      traiṣṭubha vā traiṣṭubha nistakṣ      yat vā jagant jagant ādhā pada      yad id tad vid tad amṛta tva aś      gāyatra prati mā arka      arka sāman traiṣṭubha vāka      vāka vāka dvipad catuṣpada      akṣara mā saptan vāṇī      jagant sindhu div stabhāy      rathaṃtara sūrya pari paś      gāyatra samidh tri ah      tatas mahan pra ric mahi tva      upa hvā su dugha dhenu etad      su hasta go duh uta duh enad      śreṣṭha sava savitṛ sū mad      abhīndh gharma tad u su pra vac      hiṃkṛ vasu patnī vasu      vatsa iṣ manas abhi āgā      duh aśvin payas aghnyā idam      tad vṛdh mahat saubhaga      go mā anu vatsa miṣ      mūrdhan hiṃ kṛ mā u      sṛkvan gharma abhi vaś      mā māyu pyā payas      idam tad śiñj yad go abhivṛ      mā māyu dhvasani adhi śri      tad citti ni hi kṛ martya      vidyut bhū prati vavri ūh      an śī tura gātu jīva      ej dhruva madhya ā pastyā      jīva mṛ car svadhā      amartya martya sayoni      paś gopā a nipad      ā ca parā ca pathin car      tad sadhryañc tad viṣvañc vas      ā varvṛt bhuvana antar      yad īṃ kṛ na tad idam vid      yad īṃ dṛś hiruk id nu tad      tad mātṛ yoni parivye antar      bahuprajas nirṛti ā viś      div mad pitṛ janitṛ nābhi atra      bandhu mad mātṛ pṛthivī mah idam      uttāna camū yoni antar      atra pitṛ duhitṛ garbha ādhā      pracch tvad para anta pṛthivī      pracch yatra bhuvana nābhi      pracch tvad vṛṣan aśva retas      pracch vāc parama vyoman      idam vedi para anta pṛthivī      idam yajña bhuvana nābhi      idam soma vṛṣan aśva retas      brahman idam vāc parama vyoman      saptan ardha garbha bhuvana retas      viṣṇu sthā pradiś vidharman      tad dhīti manas tad vipaścit      paribhū pari bhū viśvatas      na vi jñā yad iva idam as      niṇya saṃnah manas car      yadā mad gam prathama jā ṛta      āt id vāc aś bhāga idam      apāñc prāñc i svadhā grah      amartya martya sayoni      tad śaśvat viṣūcīna vī      ni anya ci na ni ci anya      ṛc akṣara parama vyoman      yad deva adhi viśva niṣad      yad tad na vid ka ṛc kṛ      yad id tad vid tad idam sam ās      su yavasa bhagavat hi bhū      atho mad bhagavat as      ad tṛṇa aghnyā viśvadānīm      pā śudh udaka ācar      gaurī mā salila takṣ      ekapada dvipada tad catuṣpada      aṣṭāpada navapada bhū      sahasra akṣara parama vyoman      tad samudra adhi vi kṣar      tena jīv pradiś catur      tatas kṣar akṣara      tad viśva upa jīv      śaka maya dhūma ārāt paś      viṣūvat paras idam avara      ukṣan pṛśni pac vīra      tad dharman prathama as      tri keśin ṛtuthā vi cakṣ      saṃvatsara vap eka idam      viśva eka abhi cakṣ śacī      dhrāji eka dṛś na rūpa      catur vāc parimā pada      tad vid brāhmaṇa yad manīṣin      guhā tri nidhā na iṅgay      turīya vāc manuṣya vad      indra mitra varuṇa agni ah      atho divya tad suparṇa garutmant      eka as vipra bahudhā vad      agni yama mātariśvan ah      kṛṣṇa niyāna hari suparṇa      ap vas div ud pat      tad āvṛt sadana ṛta      āt id ghṛta pṛthivī vi und      dvādaśan pradhi cakra eka      tri nabhya ka u tad cit      tad sākam tri śata na śaṅku      arpay ṣaṣṭi na calācala      yad tvad stana śaśaya yad mayas bhū      yad viśva puṣ vārya      yad ratna dhā vasu vid yad su dattra      sarasvatī tad iha dhā kṛ      yajña yajña yaj deva      tad dharman prathama as      tad ha nāka mahiman sac      yatra pūrva sādhya as deva      samāna etad udaka      ud ca i ava ca aha      bhūmi parjanya jinv      div jinv agni      divya suparṇa vāyasa bṛhat      ap garbha darśata oṣadhi      abhīpatas vṛṣṭi tarpay      sarasvant av johav 
       ka śubh savayas sanīḍa      samānyā marut sam mikṣ      ka mati kutas e etad      arc śuṣma vṛṣan vasūyā      ka brahman juṣ yuvan      ka adhvara marut ā vṛt      śyena iva dhraj antarikṣa      ka mah manas ram      kutas tvad indra māhina as      eka yā satpati ka tvad itthā      sam pracch samṛch śubhāna      vac tad mad harivat yad tvad mad      brahman mad mati śam suta      śuṣma ṛch prabhṛ mad adri      ā śās prati hary uktha      idam hari vah tad mad acchā      atas mad antama yuj      svakṣatra tanū śubh      mahas e upa yuj nu      indra svadhā anu hi mad bhū      kva tya tvad marut svadhā as      yat mad eka saṃdhā ahi hatya      mad hi ugra taviṣa tuviṣmat      viśva śatru nam vadhasna      bhūri kṛ yujya mad      samāna vṛṣabha pauṃsya      bhūri hi kṛ śaviṣṭha      indra kratu marut yat vaś      vadh vṛtra marut indriya      sva bhāma taviṣa bhū      mad etad manu viśva ścandra      su ga ap kṛ vajra bāhu      anutta ā tvad maghavan nakir nu      na tvāvat as devatā vid      na jan naś na jan      yad kṛ kṛ pravṛdh      eka cit mad vibhu as ojas      yad nu dhṛṣ kṛ manīṣā      mad hi ugra marut vid      yad cyu indra id īś idam      mad mad marut stoma atra      yad mad nṛ śrutya brahman kṛ      indra vṛṣan su makha mad      sakhi sakhi tanū tanū      eva id etad prati mad ruc      anedya śravas ā iṣ dhā      saṃcakṣ marut candra varṇa      chand mad chaday ca nūnam      kṛ nu atra marut mah tvad      pra yā sakhi acchā sakhi      manman citra apivātay      idam bhū naveda mad ṛta      ā yat duvasy duvas na kāru      mad kṛ mānya medhā      ā u su vṛt marut vipra acchā      idam brahman jaritṛ tvad arc      etad tvad stoma marut idam gir      māndārya mānya kāru      ā iṣ tanū vayā      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       tad nu vac rabhasa janman      pūrva mahitva vṛṣabha ketu      aidha iva yāman marut tuviṣvan      yudh iva śakra taviṣa kṛ      nitya na sūnu madhu bhṛ upa      krīḍ krīḍa vidatha ghṛṣvi      nakṣ rudra avas namasvin      na mṛdh sva tavas haviṣkṛt      yad ūma amṛta rā      rai poṣa ca havis dāś      ukṣ idam marut hita iva      puru rajas payas mayobhu      ā yad rajas taviṣī vye      pra tvad eva sva yam dhraj      bhī viśva bhuvana harmya      citra tvad yāma prayam ṛṣṭi      yat tveṣa yāma naday parvata      div vā pṛṣṭha narya cyu      viśva tvad ajman bhī vanaspati      rathīy iva pra hā oṣadhi      tvad mad ugra marut sucetunā      ariṣṭa grāma sumati pṛ      yatra tvad didyut rad krivirdat      ri paśu sudhita iva barhaṇā      pra skambha deṣṇa anavabhra rādhas      alātṛṇa vidatha suṣṭuta      arc arka madira pā      vid vīra prathama pauṃsya      śata bhuji tad abhihruti agha      pur rakṣ marut yad av      jana yad ugra tavas virapśin      pā śaṃsa tanaya puṣṭi      viśva bhadra marut ratha tvad      mithaspṛdhya iva taviṣa ādhā      aṃsa ā tvad prapatha khādi      akṣa tvad cakra samayā vi vṛt      bhūri bhadra narya bāhu      vakṣas rukma rabhasa añji      aṃsa eta pavi kṣura adhi      vi na pakṣa vi anu śrī      mahat mahan vibhu vibhūti      dūredṛś yad divya iva star      mandra su jihvā svaritṛ āsan      sammiśla indra marut pariṣṭubh      tad tvad su jan marut mahitvana      dīrgha tvad dātra aditi iva vrata      indra cana tyajas vi hvṛ tad      jana yad su kṛt rā      tad tvad jāmi tva marut para yuga      puru yat śaṃsa amṛta av      idam dhī manu śruṣṭi āvi      sākam nṛ daṃsana ā cit      yad dīrgha marut śvi      yuṣmāka parīṇas tura      ā yad tan vṛjana jana      idam yajña tad abhīṣṭi aś      etad tvad stoma marut idam gir      māndārya mānya kāru      ā iṣ tanū vayā      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       sahasra tvad indra ūti mad      sahasra iṣ harivat gūrtatama      sahasra rai māday      sahasrin upa mad i vāja      ā mad avas marut yā acchā      jyeṣṭha vā bṛhaddiva su māyā      adha yat idam niyut parama      samudra cit dhanay pāra      myakṣ yad sudhita ghṛtāñc      hiraṇya nirṇij upara na ṛṣṭi      guhā car manus na yoṣā      sabhāvat vidathya iva sam vāc      parā śubhra ayās yavyā      sādhāraṇa iva marut myakṣ      na rodasī apa nud ghora      juṣ vṛdh sakhya deva      juṣ yat īṃ asurya sac      viṣā stukā rodasī nṛmaṇas      ā sūrya iva vidh ratha gā      tveṣa pratīka nabhas na ityā      āsthāpay yuvati yuvan      śubha nimiśla vidatha pajra      arka yat tvad marut haviṣmat      gā gātha su soma duvasy      pra tad vac vakmya yad idam      marut mahiman satya as      sacā yat īṃ vṛṣamaṇas ahaṃyu      sthira cit janī vah subhāga      pā mitrāvaruṇa avadya      ci īṃ aryaman u apraśasta      uta cyu acyuta dhruva      vṛdh īṃ marut dāti vāra      nahi nu tvad marut anti mad      ārāttāt cit śavas anta āp      tad dhṛṣṇu śavas śvi      arṇas na dveṣas dhṛṣat pari sthā      mad adya indra preṣṭha      mad śvas vac samarya      mad purā mahi ca mad anu div      tad mad ṛbhukṣan nṛ anu as      etad tvad stoma marut idam gir      māndārya mānya kāru      ā iṣ tanū vayā      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       yajña yajña tvad samanā tuturvaṇi      dhī dhī tvad deva yā u dhā      ā tvad arvāñc suvita rodasī      mah vṛt avas suvṛkti      vavra na yad sva ja sva tavas      iṣ svar abhijan dhūti      sahasriya ap na ūrmi      ās go vand na ukṣan      soma na yad su tṛp aṃśu      hṛd pā duvas na ās      ā idam aṃsa rambhiṇī iva rabh      hasta khādi ca kṛti ca sam dhā      ava sva yuj div ā vṛthā yā      amartya kaśā cud tman      areṇu tuvi jan cyu      dṛḍha cit marut bhrāj ṛṣṭi      ka tvad antar marut ṛṣṭi vidyut      rej tman hanu iva jihvā      dhanvan cyut iṣ na yāman      puru praiṣa ahanya na etaśa      kva svid idam rajas mah para      kva avara marut yad āyā      yat cyāvay vithura iva saṃdhā      vi adri pat tveṣa arṇava      sāti na tvad amavat svarvat      tveṣa vipāka marut pipiṣvat      bhadra tvad rāti pṛṇ na dakṣiṇā      pṛthujraya asurya iva jañj      prati stubh sindhu pavi      yat abhriya vāc udīray      ava smi vidyut pṛthivī      yadi ghṛta marut pruṣ      sū pṛśni mahat raṇa      tveṣa ayās marut anīka      tad sapsara janay abhva      āt id svadhā iṣira pari paś      etad tvad stoma marut idam gir      māndārya mānya kāru      ā iṣ yā tanū vayā      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       mah cit tvad indra i etad      mah cit as tyajas varūtṛ      tad mad vedhas marut cit      sumna van tvad hi preṣṭha      yuj tad indra viśvakṛṣṭi      vid niṣṣidh martyatrā      marut pṛtsuti hās      svarmīḍha pradhana sāti      myakṣ tad tvad indra ṛṣṭi mad      sanemi abhva marut jū      agni cit hi sma atasa śuc      ap na dvīpa dhā prayas      tvad tu mad indra tad rayi dā      ojiṣṭha dakṣiṇā iva rāti      stut ca yad tvad vāyu      stana na madhu pyā vāja      tvad rai indra tośatama      praṇī ka cit ṛtāyu      tad su mad marut mṛḍay      yad sma purā gātuy iva deva      prati pra yā indra mih nṛ      mah pārthiva sadana yat      adha yat idam pṛthu budhna eta      tīrtha na ari pauṃsya sthā      prati ghora eta ayās      marut śru e upabdi      yad martya pṛtanāy ūma      ṛṇāvan na patay sarga      tvad māna indra viśvajanya      rad marut śurudh go agra      stu stu deva deva      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       na nūnam as na u śvas      ka tad vid yad adbhuta      anya citta abhi saṃcar      uta adhī vi naś      kim mad indra jighāṃs      bhrātṛ marut tvad      tad kﾱp sādhuyā      mā mad samaraṇa vadh      kim mad bhrātṛ agastya      sakhi as ati man      vid hi tvad yathā manas      mad id na dits      aram kṛ vedi      sam agni indh puras      tatra amṛta cetana      yajña tvad tan      tvad īś vasu pati vasu      tvad mitra mitra pati dheṣṭha      indra tvad marut sam vad      adha prāś ṛtuthā havis 
       prati tvad idam namas mad i      sūkta bhikṣ sumati tura      ran marut vedyā      ni heḍas dhā vi muc aśva      etad tvad stoma marut namasvat      hṛd takṣ manas dhā deva      upa īṃ ā yā manas juṣ      tvad hi as namas id vṛdha      stu mad marut mṛḍay      uta stu maghavan śambhaviṣṭha      ūrdhva mad as komya vana      ahar viśva marut jigīṣā      idam mad taviṣa īṣ      indra bhī marut rej      tvad havya niśā as      tad āre kṛ mṛḍ mad      yad māna citay usrā      vyuṣṭi śavas śaśvat      tad mad marut vṛṣabha śravas dhā      ugra ugra sthavira sahas dā      tvad pā indra sahīyas nṛ      bhū marut avayā heḍas      su praketa sāsahi dhā      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       citra tvad as yāma      citra ūti sudānu      marut ahi bhānu      āre tad tvad sudānu      marut ṛj śaru      āre aśman yad as      tṛṇaskanda nu viś      pari vṛj sudānu      ūrdhva mad kṛ jīv 
       gā sāman nabhanya yathā vi      arc tad vṛdh svarvat      go dhenu barhis adabdha      ā yat sadman divya vivās      arc vṛṣan vṛṣan sveduhavya      mṛga na aśna ati yat gur      pra mandayu manā gur hotṛ      bhṛ marya mithuna yajatra      nakṣ hotṛ pari sadman mā i      bhṛ garbha ā śarad pṛthivī      krand aśva nī ru go      antar dūta na rodas car vāc      tad kṛ aṣatara idam      pra cyautna devay bhṛ      juṣ indra dasma varcas      nāsatya iva sugmya ratheṣṭhā      tad u stu indra yad ha satvan      yad śūra maghavan yad ratheṣṭhā      pratyañc cit yodhīyas vṛṣaṇvat      varīvar cit tamas vihantṛ      pra yat itthā mahina nṛ as      aram rodas kakṣyā na idam      sam vye indra vṛjana na bhūman      bhṛ svadhāvat opaśa iva div      samad tvad śūra as vṛ      prapathintama paritaṃsay      sajoṣas indra mada kṣoṇī      sūri cit yad anumad vāja      eva hi tvad śam savana samudra      ap yat tvad idam mad deva      viśva tvad anu joṣya bhū go      sūri cit yadi dhiṣā vī jana      as yathā su sakhi idam      su abhiṣṭi nṛ na śaṃsa      as yathā mad indra vandaneṣṭhā      tura na karman nī uktha      viṣpardhas nṛ na śaṃsa      asmāka as indra vajra hasta      mitrāyu na pūrpati su śiṣṭi      madhyāyu upa śikṣ yajña      yajña hi sma indra kaścit ṛdh      hvṛ cit manas parī      tīrtha na acchā tṛṣ oka      dīrgha na sidhra ā kṛ adhvan      mā u su mad indra atra pṛt deva      as hi sma tvad śuṣmin avayāj      mah cit yad mih yavyā      haviṣmat marut vand gir      etad stoma indra tvad mad      etad gātu harivat vid mad      ā mad vṛt suvita deva      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       tvad rājan indra yad ca deva      rakṣ nṛ pā asura tvad mad      tvad satpati maghavan mad tarutra      tvad satya vasavāna sahas dā      dan viś indra mṛdhravāc      saptan yat pur śarman śārada dṛ      ṛch ap anavadya arṇa      yuvan vṛtra purukutsa radh      aj vṛt indra śūra patnī      div ca yad puruhūta nūnam      rakṣ agni aśuṣa tūrvayāṇa      siṃha na dama apas vastu      śī nu tad indra tad yoni      praśasti pavīrava mahan      sṛj arṇas ava yat yudh go      sthā hari dhṛṣ mṛj vāja      vah kutsa indra yad kan      syūmanyu ṛjra vāta aśva      pra svar cakra vṛh abhīka      abhi spṛdh yā vajra bāhu      han indra mitreru      coda pravṛdh harivat a dāśu      pra yad paś aryaman sacā āyu      tvad śṛ vah apatya      rap kavi indra arka sāti      kṣā dāsa upabarhaṇī kṛ      kṛ tri maghavan dānu citra      ni duryoṇa kuyavāc mṛdh śri      sana tad tvad indra navya āgā      sah nabh aviraṇa puru      bhid pur na bhid adeva      nam vadhar adeva pīyu      tvad dhuni indra dhunimat      ṛch ap sīrā na sru      pra yat samudra ati śūra pṛ      pāray turvaśa yadu svasti      tvad mad indra viśvadha as      avṛkatama nṛ nṛ pātṛ      tad mad viśva spṛdh sahas dā      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       mad pā tvad mah      pātra iva harivat matsara mada      vṛṣan tvad vṛṣan indu      vājin sahasra sātama      ā mad tvad gam matsara      vṛṣan mada vareṇya      sahāvat indra sānasi      pṛtanāṣāh amartya      tvad hi śūra san      coday manus ratha      sahāvat dasyu avrata      uṣ pātra na śocis      muṣāy sūrya kavi      cakra īś ojas      vah śuṣṇa vadha      kutsa vāta aśva      śuṣmintama hi tvad mada      dyumnintama uta kratu      vṛtra han varivas vid      man aśva sātama      yathā pūrva jaritṛ indra      mayas iva ap na tṛṣ bhū      tad anu tvad nivid johav      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       mad mad vasyaiṣṭi      indra indu vṛṣan viś      ṛghāy inv      śatru anti na vid      tad ā veśay gir      yad eka carṣaṇi      anu svadhā yad vap      yava na carkṛṣ vṛṣan      yad viśva hasta      pañcan kṣiti vasu      spāśay yad asmadruh      divya iva aśani han      a su sama hā      dūṇāśa yad na tvad mayas      mad idam vedana      dā sūri cit ūh      av yad dvibarhas      arka sānuṣak as      āji indra indu      prāv vāja vājin      yathā pūrva jaritṛ indra      mayas iva ap na tṛṣ bhū      tad anu tvad nivid johav      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       ā carṣaṇi prā vṛṣabha jana      rājan kṛṣṭi puruhūta indra      stu śravasy avas upa madrik      yuj hari vṛṣan yā arvāñc      yad tvad vṛṣan vṛṣabha indra      brahman yuj vṛṣan ratha atya      tad ā sthā tad ā yā arvāñc      hvā tvad su indra soma      ā sthā ratha vṛṣan vṛṣan tvad      su soma pariṣic madhu      yuj vṛṣan vṛṣabha kṣiti      hari yā pravat upa madrik      idam yajña deva yā idam miyedha      idam brahman idam indra soma      stṛ barhis ā tu śakra pra yā      pā niṣad vi muc hari iha      ā u suṣṭuta indra yā arvāñc      upa brahman mānya kāru      vid vastu avas gṛ      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       yat ha tvad indra śruṣṭi as      yad bhū jaritṛ ūti      mā mad kāma mahay ā dagh      viśva tvad aś pari āp āyu      na gha rājan indra ā dabh mad      yad nu svasṛ kṛ yoni      ap cit idam sutuka viṣ      gam mad indra sakhya vayas ca      ji nṛ indra pṛt śūra      śru hava nādh kāru      prabhṛ ratha dāś upāka      udyam gir yadi ca tman bhū      eva nṛ indra su śravasyā      prakhāda pṛkṣa abhi mitrin bhū      samarya iṣ stu vivāc      satrākara yaj śaṃsa      tvad mad maghavan indra śatru      abhi as mahat man      tvad trā tvad u mad vṛdh bhū      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       puru mad śarad śram      doṣā vastu uṣas jaray      mī śrī jariman tanū      api u nu patnī vṛṣan gam      yad cit hi pūrva ṛtasāp as      sākam deva vad ṛta      tad cit ava as nahi anta āp      sam u nu patnī vṛṣan gam      na mṛṣā śrānta yad av deva      viśva id spṛdh abhi aś      ji id atra śata nīthā āji      yat samyañc mithuna abhi aj      nada mad rudh kāma āgam      itas ājan amutas kutaścid      lopāmudrā vṛṣan niḥ ri      dhīra adhīra dhā śvas      idam nu soma antitas      hṛd pā upa brū      yat sīm āgas kṛ tad su mṛḍ      pulu kāma hi martya      agastya khan khanitra      prajā apatya bala iṣ      ubh varṇa ṛṣi ugra puṣ      satya deva āśis gam 
       tvad rajas su yama aśva      ratha yat tvad pari arṇas dī      hiraṇyaya tvad pavi pruṣāy      madhu pā uṣas sac      tvad atya ava nakṣ yad      vipatman narya prayajyu      svasṛ yat tvad viśva gūrti bhṛ      vāja īḍ madhu pā iṣ ca      tvad payas usriyā dhā      pakva āma ava pūrvya go      antar yad vanin tvad ṛtapsu      hvāra na śuci yaj haviṣmat      tvad ha gharma madhumat atri      apas na kṣodas vṛ eṣa      tad tvad nara aśvin paśvaiṣṭi      rathyā iva cakra prati i madhu      ā tvad dāna vṛt dasra      go oha taugrya na jivri      ap kṣoṇī sac māhina tvad      jṛ tvad akṣu aṃhas yajatra      ni yat yu niyut su dānu      upa svadhā sṛj puraṃdhi      vī vāta na sūri      ā mah dā suvrata na vāja      mad cit hi tvad jaritṛ satya      vipan vi paṇi hitāvat      adha cit hi sma aśvin anindya      pā hi sma vṛṣan antideva      tvad cit hi sma aśvin anu div      virudra prasravaṇa sāti      agastya nṛ nṛ praśaṃs      kārādhunī iva citay sahasra      pra yat vah mahina ratha      pra syandra yā manus na hotṛ      dhā sūri uta vā su aśvya      nāsatya rayiṣac as      tad tvad ratha mad adya hu      stoma aśvin suvita navya      ariṣṭa nemi pari div i      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       ka u preṣṭha iṣ rayi      adhvary yad unnī ap      idam tvad yajña kṛ praśasti      vasu dhiti avitṛ jana      ā tvad aśva śuci payaspā      vāta raṃhas divya atya      manas jū vṛṣan vīta pṛṣṭha      ā iha svarāj aśvin vah      ā tvad ratha avani na pravatvat      sṛpra vandhura suvita gam      vṛṣan sthātṛ manas javīyas      ahampūrva yajata dhiṣṇya yad      iha iha jan sam vāś      arepas tanū nāman sva      jiṣṇu tvad anya su makha sūri      div anya subhaga putra ūh      pra tvad niceru kakuha vaśa anu      piśaṅga rūpa sadana gam      hari anya pyā vāja      mathra rajas aśvin vi ghoṣa      pra tvad śaradvat vṛṣabha na niṣṣāh      puru iṣ car madhu iṣ      eva anya pyā vāja      viṣ ūrdhva nadī mad āgā      sṛj tvad sthavira vedhas gir      bāḍha aśvin tredhā kṣar      upastu av nādh      yāman a yāman śru hava mad      uta tya tvad ruśat vapsas gir      tri barhis sadas pinv nṛ      vṛṣan tvad megha vṛṣan pyā      go na seka manus daśasy      tvad pūṣan iva aśvin purandhi      agni uṣā na jṛ haviṣmat      hvā yat tvad varivasyā gṛ      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       bhū idam vayuna ā u su bhūṣ      ratha vṛṣaṇvat mad manīṣin      dhiyaṃjinva dhiṣṇya viśpalā vasu      div napāt sukṛt śuci vrata      indratama hi dhiṣṇya maruttama      dasra daṃsiṣṭha rathya rathītama      pṛ ratha vah madhu āci      tad dāś upa yā aśvin      ka atra dasra kṛ ka ās      jana yad ka cit a havis mahīy      ati kram jṛ paṇi asu      jyotis vipra kṛ vacasyu      jambhay abhitas śvan      han mṛdh vid tad aśvin      vāc vāc jaritṛ ratnin kṛ      ubh śaṃsa nāsatya av mad      tvad etad kṛ sindhu plava      ātmanvat pakṣin taugrya kaṃ      yad devatrā manas nirvah      supaptani pat kṣodas mah      avavyadh taugrya ap antar      anārambhaṇa tamas pravyadh      catur nau jaṭhala juṣ      ud aśvin iṣ pāray      ka svid vṛkṣa niṣṭhā madhya arṇas      yad taugrya nādh pariṣvaj      parṇa mṛga pataru iva ārabh      ud aśvin vah śromata kaṃ      tad tvad nara nāsatya anu as      yad tvad māna ucatha vac      idam adya sadas somya ā      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       tad yuj manas yad javīyas      tri vandhura vṛṣan yad tri cakra      yad upayā su kṛt duroṇa      tri dhātu pat vi na parṇa      suvṛt ratha vṛt i abhi kṣā      yat sthā kratumat anu pṛkṣ      vapus vapuṣyā sac idam gir      div duhitṛ uṣas sac      ā sthā suvṛt yad ratha tvad      anu vrata vṛt haviṣmat      yad nṛ nāsatya iṣay      vartis yā tanaya tman ca      mā tvad vṛka mā vṛkī ā dhṛṣ      mā pari vṛj uta mā ati dagh      idam tvad bhāga nidhā idam gir      dasra idam tvad nidhi madhu      tvad gotama purumīḍha atri      dasra hvā av haviṣmat      diś na diś ṛjūyā iva i      mad hava nāsatya upa yā      tṛ tamas pāra idam      prati tvad stoma aśvin dhā      ā iha yā pathin deva yāna      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       tad tvad adya tad apara hu      vas uṣas vahni uktha      nāsatya kuha cit as ari      div napāt sudāstara      mad u su vṛṣan māday      ud paṇi han ūrmi mad      śru mad acchokti mati      āyaj nṛ nicetṛ ca karṇa      śrī pūṣan iṣukṛt iva deva      nāsatya vahatu sūryā      vañc tvad kakuha ap jan      yuga jṛ iva varuṇa bhūri      mad tad tvad mādhvī rāti as      stoma hi mānya kāru      anu yat tvad śravasya su dānu      su vīrya carṣaṇi mad      etad tvad stoma aśvin kṛ      māna maghavan suvṛkti      yā vartis tanaya tman ca      agastya nāsatya mad      tṛ tamas pāra idam      prati tvad stoma aśvin dhā      ā iha yā pathin deva yāna      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       katara pūrva katara apara idam      kathā jan kavi ka vi vid      viśva tman bhṛ yad ha nāman      vi vṛt ahar cakriya iva      bhūri dvi a car car      padvat garbha apada dhā      nitya na sūnu pitṛ upastha      div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva      anehas dātra aditi anarva      hvā svarvat avadha namasvat      tad rodas janay jaritṛ      div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva      a tap avas av      anu as rodas deva putra      ubh deva ubhaya ahar      div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva      saṃgam yuvatī samanta      svasṛ jāmi pitṛ upastha      abhighrā bhuvana nābhi      div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva      urvī sadman bṛhat ṛta      hvā deva avas janitrī      dhā yad amṛta su pratīka      div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva      urvī pṛthvī bahula dūreanta      upa brū namas yajña idam      dhā yad subhaga su pratūrti      div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva      deva vā yad kṛ kaścit āgas      sakhi vā sadam id jāspati vā      idam dhī bhū avayāna idam      div rakṣ pṛthivī mad abhva      ubh śaṃsa narya mad av      ubh mad ūti avas sac      bhūri cit ari sudāstara      iṣ mad iṣay deva      ṛta div tad vac pṛthivī      abhiśrāva prathama sumedhas      pā avadya durita abhīka      pitṛ mātṛ ca rakṣ avas      idam dyāvāpṛthivī satya as      pitṛ mātṛ yad iha upabrū tvad      bhū deva avama avas      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       ā mad iḍā vidatha su śasti      viśvānara savitṛ deva i      api yathā yuvan mad mad      viśva jagant abhipitva manīṣā      ā mad viśva āskra gam deva      mitra aryaman varuṇa sajoṣas      bhū yathā mad viśva vṛdha      kṛ vithura na śavas      preṣṭha tvad atithi gṛ      agni śasti turvaṇi sajoṣas      as yathā mad varuṇa su kīrti      iṣ ca pṛ ari gur sūri      upa tvad iṣ namas jigīṣā      uṣāsānaktā su dugha iva dhenu      samāna ahar vimā arka      viṣurūpa payas tad ūdhas      uta mad ahi budhnya mayas kṛ      śiśu na pyā iva vī sindhu      yad napāt ap jū      manas jū vṛṣan yad vah      uta mad īṃ tvaṣṭṛ gam acchā      smat sūri abhipitva sajoṣas      ā vṛtrahan indra carṣaṇi prā      tuviṣṭama nṛ mad iha gam      uta mad īṃ mati aśva yoga      śiśu na go taruṇa rih      tad īṃ gir jani na patnī      surabhiṣṭama nṛ nas      uta mad īṃ marut vṛdh senā      smat rodas samanas sad      pṛṣat aśva avani na ratha      riśādas mitra yuj na deva      pra nu yat idam mahina cit      pra yuj prayuj tad suvṛkti      adha yat idam sudina na śaru      viśva ā iriṇa pruṣāy senā      pra u aśvin av kṛ      pra pūṣan sva tavas hi as      a dveṣa viṣṇu vāta ṛbhukṣan      acchā sumna vṛt deva      idam tad tvad mad dīdhiti yajatra      apiprāṇa ca sadana ca bhū      ni yad deva yat vasūyu      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       pitu nu stu      mah dharman taviṣī      yad trita vi ojas      vṛtra viparva arday      svādu pitṛ madhu pitṛ      mad tvad vṛ      mad av bhū      upa mad pitu ā car      śiva śiva ūti      mayobhu adviṣeṇya      sakhi su śeva advayas      tvad tya pitu rasa      rajas anu viṣṭhā      div vāta iva śri      tvad tya pitu dā      tvad svādiṣṭha tad pitu      pra svādman rasa      tuvi grīvā iva īr      tvad pitu maha      deva manas dhā      kṛ cāru ketu      tvad ahi avas vadh      yat adas pitu gam      vivasvan parvata      atra cit mad madhu pitu      aram bhakṣa gam      yat ap oṣadhi      pariṃśa āriś      vāta āpi pīvas id bhū      yat tvad soma go āśir      yava āśir bhaj      vāta āpi pīvas id bhū      karambha oṣadhi bhū      pīvas vṛkka udārathi      vāta āpi pīvas id bhū      tad tvad mad pitu      vacas go na havya sūd      deva tvad sadhamāda      mad tvad sadhamāda 
       samindh adya rāj      deva deva sahasra jit      dūta havya kavi vah      tanūnapāt ṛta i      madhu yajña sam añj      dhā sahasrin iṣ      āhu mad īḍ      deva ā vah yajñiya      agni sahasra sā as      prācīna barhis ojas      sahasra vīra stṛ      yatra āditya virāj      virāj samrāj vibhu prabhu      bahu ca bhūyas ca yad      dvār ghṛta kṣar      su rukma hi supeśas      adhi śrī virāj      uṣas ā iha sad      prathama hi suvācas      hotṛ daivya kavi      yajña mad yaj idam      bhāratī iḍā sarasvatī      yad tvad sarva upabrū      tad mad coday śrī      tvaṣṭṛ rūpa hi prabhu      paśu viśva samañj      tad mad sphāti ā yaj      upa tmanī vanaspati      pāthas deva sṛj      agni havya svad      purogā agni deva      gāyatra sam añj      svāhākṛtī ruc 
       agni nī su pathin rai mad      viśva deva vayuna vid      yu mad hvṛ enas      bhūyiṣṭha tvad namaukti vidh      agni tvad pāray navyas mad      svasti ati durga viśva      pur ca pṛthu bahula mad uru      bhū toka tanaya śam yos      agni tvad mad yu amīvā      an agni trā abhi am kṛṣṭi      punar mad suvita deva      kṣā viśva amṛta yajatra      pā mad agni pāyu ajasra      uta priya sadana ā śuc      mā tvad bhaya jaritṛ yaviṣṭha      nūnam vid mā apara sahasvat      mā mad agni ava sṛj agha      aviṣyu ripu ducchunā      mā datvat daṃś mā ad mad      mā riṣ sahasāvat parā dā      vi gha tvāvat ṛta jan yam      gṛ agni tanū varūtha      viśva ririkṣu uta vā ninitsu      abhihrut as hi deva viṣpaś      tvad tad agni ubhaya vi vid      vī prapitva manus yajatra      abhipitva manu śās bhū      marmṛjenya uśij na akra      vac nivacana idam      māna sūnu sah agni      mad sahasra ṛṣi san      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       anarvan vṛṣabha mandra jihvā      bṛhaspati vardhay navya arka      gāthānī su ruc yad deva      āśru nū marta      tad ṛtviya upa vāc sac      sarga na yad devay sṛj      bṛhaspati tad hi añjas varas      vibhvan bhū sam ṛta mātariśvan      upastuti namas udyati ca      śloka yam savitṛ iva pra bāhu      idam kratu ahanya yad as      mṛga na bhīma arakṣas tuviṣmat      idam śloka div i pṛthivī      atya na yam yakṣa bhṛt vicetas      mṛga na heti i ca idam      bṛhaspati ahi māyā abhi div      yad tvad deva usrika man      pāpa bhadra upajīv pajra      na dūḍhī anu dā vāma      bṛhaspati ci id piyāru      supraitu su yavasa na pathin      durniyantu pariprī na mitra      anarvan abhi yad cakṣ mad      apivṛ apavṛ sthā      sam yad stubh avani na i      samudra na sravat rodha cakra      sa vid ubhaya cakṣ antar      bṛhaspati taras ap ca gṛdhra      eva maha tuvi jan tuviṣmat      bṛhaspati vṛṣabha dhā deva      tad mad stu vīravat dhā gomat      vid iṣa vṛjana jīra dānu 
       kaṅkata na kaṅkata      atho satīna kaṅkata      dvi iti pluṣi iti      ni adṛṣṭa lip      adṛṣṭa han e      atho han pare      atho avahan han      atho piṣ piṣ      śara kuśara      darbha sairya uta      mauñja adṛṣṭa vairiṇa      sarva sākam ni lip      ni go goṣṭha sad      ni mṛga viś      ni ketu jana      ni adṛṣṭa lip      etad u tya prati dṛś      pradoṣa taskara iva      adṛṣṭa viśva dṛś      pratibudh bhū      div tvad pitṛ pṛthivī mātṛ      soma bhrātṛ aditi svasṛ      adṛṣṭa viśva dṛś      sthā ilay su kaṃ      yad aṃsya yad aṅgya      sūcīka yad prakaṅkata      adṛṣṭa ka cana iha tvad      sarva sākam ni jas      ud purastāt sūrya i      viśva dṛś adṛṣṭa han      adṛṣṭa sarva jambhay      sarva ca yātudhānī      ud pat adas sūrya      puru viśva jūrv      āditya parvata      viśva dṛś adṛṣṭa han      sūrya viṣa ā sañj      dṛti surāvat gṛha      tad u cit nu na mṛ      na u mad mṛ      āre idam yojana      hariṣṭhā madhu tvad      madhula kṛ      iyattaka śakuntikā      saka ghas tvad viṣa      tad u cit nu na mṛ      na u mad mṛ      āre idam yojana      hariṣṭhā madhu tvad      madhula kṛ      tris saptan viṣpuliṅgaka      viṣa puṣya ghas      tad cit nu na mṛ      na u mad mṛ      āre idam yojana      hariṣṭhā madhu tvad      madhula kṛ      navan navati      viṣa ropuṣī      sarva grah nāman      āre idam yojana      hariṣṭhā madhu tvad      madhula kṛ      tris saptan mayūrī      saptan svasṛ agru      tad tvad viṣa vi bhṛ      udaka kumbhin iva      iyattaka kuṣumbhaka      taka bhid aśman      tatas viṣa pra vṛt      parāñc anu saṃvat      kuṣumbhaka tad brū      giri pravartamānaka      vṛścika arasa viṣa      arasa vṛścika tvad viṣa    tvad agni div tvad āśuśukṣaṇi    tvad ap tvad aśman pari    tvad vana tvad oṣadhī    tvad nṛ nṛpati jan śuci    tvad agni hotra tvad potra ṛtviya    tvad neṣṭra tvad agnidh ṛtāy    tvad praśāstra tvad adhvarīy    brahman ca as gṛhapati ca mad dama    tvad agni indra vṛṣabha as as    tvad viṣṇu urugāya namasya    tvad brahman rayi vid brahmaṇaspati    tvad vidhartṛ sac puraṃdhi    tvad agni rājan varuṇa dhṛ vrata    tvad mitra bhū dasma īḍ    tvad aryaman sat pati yad sambhuj    tvad aṃśa vidatha deva bhājayu    tvad agni tvaṣṭṛ vidh su vīrya    tvad gnāvat mitra mahat sajātya    tvad āśuheman rā su aśvya    tvad nṛ śardhas as purūvasu    tvad agni rudra asura mah div    tvad śardhas māruta pṛkṣ īś    tvad vāta aruṇa yā śaṃgaya    tvad pūṣan vidh pā nu tman    tvad agni draviṇas dā araṃkṛt    tvad deva savitṛ ratna dhā as    tvad bhaga nṛpati vasu īś    tvad pāyu dama yad tvad vidh    tvad agni dama ā viśpati viś    tvad rājan suvidatra ṛj    tvad viśva su anīka paty    tvad sahasra śata daśan prati    tvad agni pitṛ iṣṭi nṛ    tvad bhrātra śamī tanūruc    tvad putra bhū yad tvad vidh    tvad sakhi su śeva pā ādhṛṣ    tvad agni ṛbhu āke namasya    tvad vāja kṣumat rai īś    tvad vi bhā anu dā    tvad viśikṣu as yajña ātani    tvad agni aditi deva dāś    tvad hotṛ bhāratī vṛdh gir    tvad iḍ śata hima as dakṣ    tvad vṛtra han vasu pati sarasvatī    tvad agni su bhṛ uttama vayas    tvad spārha varṇa ā saṃdṛś śrī    tvad vāja prataraṇa bṛhat as    tvad rayi bahula viśvatas pṛthu    tvad agni āditya āsya    tvad jihvā śuci kṛ kavi    tvad rātiṣāc adhvara sac    tvad deva havis ad āhu    tvad agni viśva amṛta adruh    ās deva havis ad āhu    tvad marta svad āsuti    tvad garbha vīrudh jan śuci    tvad tad sam ca prati ca as majman    agni su jan pra ca deva ric    pṛkṣ yat atra mahina vi tvad bhū    anu dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī ubh    yad stotṛ go agra aśva peśas    agni rāti upasṛj sūri    mad ca tad ca pra hi nī vasyas ā    bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
     yajña vṛdh jātavedas    agni yaj havis tan gir    samindh su prayas svarṇara    dyukṣa hotṛ vṛjana dhūrṣad    abhi tvad nakti uṣas vāś    agni vatsa na svasara dhenu    div iva id arati mānuṣa yuga    kṣap bhā puru vāra saṃyam    tad deva budhna rajas su daṃsas    divaspṛthivī arati ni er    ratha iva vid śukra śocis    agni mitra na kṣiti praśaṃs    tad vakṣ rajas sva ā dama    candra iva su ruc hvāra ā    pṛśni patara citay akṣa    pāthas na pāyu janas ubh anu    tad hotṛ viśva pari bhū adhvara    tad u havya manus ṛj gir    hiriśipra jarbhur    div na star citay rodas anu    tad mad revat samindh svasti    saṃdas rayi mad dīdī    ā mad kṛ suvita rodas    agni havya manus deva vī    dā mad agni bṛhat dā sahasrin    dvār na vāja śruti apa vṛ    prāñc dyāvāpṛthivī brahman kṛ    svar na śukra uṣas vi dyut    tad indh uṣas rāmyā anu    svar na dīdī aruṣa bhānu    hotrā agni manus su adhvara    rājan viś atithi cāru āyu    eva mad agni amṛta pūrvya    dhī pyā bṛhat diva mānuṣa    duh dhenu vṛjana kāru    tman śatin puru rūpa iṣan    mad agni arvant vā su vīrya    brahman vā citay jana ati    mad dyumna adhi pañcan kṛṣṭi    uccā svar na śuc duṣṭara    tad mad bhū sahasya praśaṃs    yad su jan iṣay sūri    yad agni yajña upe vājin    nitya toka dīdī sva dama    ubhaya jātavedas as tvad    stotṛ agni sūri ca śarman    vasu rai puru ścandra bhūyas    prajāvat su apatya śak mad    yad stotṛ go agra aśva peśas    agni rāti upasṛj sūri    mad ca tad ca pra hi nī vasyas ā    bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
     samindh agni nidhā pṛthivī    pratyañc viśva bhuvana sthā    hotṛ pāvaka pradiv su medhas    deva deva yaj agni arh    narāśaṃsa prati dhāman añj    tri div prati mahan su arcis    ghṛta pruṣ manas havya und    mūrdhan yajña sam añj deva    īḍ agni manas mad arh    deva yaj mānuṣa pūrva adya    tad ā vah marut śardhas acyuta    indra nṛ barhiṣad yaj    deva barhis vṛdh su vīra    stṛ rai subhara vedi idam    ghṛta añj vasu sad idam    viśva deva āditya yajñiya    vi śri urviyā hvā    dvār deva su prāyaṇa namas    vyacasvat vi prath ajurya    varṇa pū yaśas su vīra    sādhu apas sanatā mad vakṣ    uṣāsānaktā vayī iva raṇvita    tantu tan saṃve samyañc    yajña peśas sudughā payasvat    daivya hotṛ prathama viduṣṭara    ṛju yaj sam ṛc vapuṣṭara    deva yaj ṛtuthā sam añj    nābhi pṛthivī adhi sānu tri    sarasvatī sādhay dhī mad    iḍā devī bhāratī viśvatūrti    tri devī svadhā barhis ā idam    acchidra pā śaraṇa niṣad    piśaṅga rūpa subhara vayodhas    śruṣṭi vīra jan deva kāma    prajā tvaṣṭṛ vi sā nābhi mad    atha deva api i pāthas    vanaspati avasṛj upa sthā    agni havis sūday pra dhī    tridhā samañj nī prajñā    deva daivya śamitṛ upa havya    ghṛta mikṣ ghṛta idam yoni    ghṛta śri ghṛta u idam dhāman    anuṣvadham ā vah māday    svāhākṛta vṛṣabha vah havya 
     hvā tvad sudyotman suvṛkti    viś agni atithi su prayas    mitra iva yad didhiṣ bhū    deva ādeva jana jātavedas    idam vidh ap sadhastha    dvitā dhā bhṛgu viś āyu    etad viśva abhi as bhūman    deva agni arati jīra aśva    agni deva mānuṣa viś    priya dhā kṣi na mitra    tad dīdī vaś ūrmyā ā    dakṣāyya yad dāsvat dama ā    idam raṇva sva iva puṣṭi    saṃdṛṣṭi idam hi dakṣu    vi yad bharibhṛ oṣadhī jihvā    atya na rathya dodhav vāra    ā yad mad abhva vanad pan    uśij na mā varṇa    sa citra cit raṃsu bhās    jṛ yad muhur ā yuvan bhū    ā yad vana tṛṣ na bhā    vār na pathin rathyā iva svan    kṛṣṇa adhvan tapu raṇva cit    div iva smi nabhas    tad yad vi sthā abhi dah urvī    paśu na i svayu a gopā    agni śociṣmat atasa uṣ    kṛṣṇa vyathis svaday na bhūman    nu tvad pūrva avas adhīti    tṛtīya vidatha manman śaṃs    mad agni saṃyat vīra bṛhat    kṣumat vāja su apatya rayi dā    tvad yathā gṛtsamada agni    guhā van upara abhi as    su vīra abhimātiṣāh    smat sūri gṛ tad vayas dhā 
     hotṛ jan cetana    pitṛ pitṛ ūti    prayakṣ jenya vasu    śak vājin yam    ā yad saptan raśmi    tan yajña netṛ    manuṣvat daivya aṣṭama    potṛ viśva tad inv    dhanv vā yat īṃ anu    vac brahman vī u tad    pari viśva kāvya    nemi cakra iva bhū    sākam hi śuci śuci    praśāstṛ kratu jan    vid idam vrata dhruva    vayā iva anu ruh    tad idam varṇa āyu    neṣṭṛ sac dhenu    kuvid tri ā vara    svasṛ yad idam yā    yadi mātṛ upa svasṛ    ghṛta bhṛ sthā    tad adhvaryu āgati    yava vṛṣṭi iva mud    sva sva dhāyas    kṛ ṛtvij ṛtvij    stoma yajña ca āt aram    van rā mad    yathā vid aram kṛ    viśva yajata    idam agni tvad api    yad yajña kṛ mad 
     idam mad agni samidh    idam upasad van    idam u su śru gir    idam tvad agni vidh    ūrj napāt aśvamiṣṭi    idam sūkta su jan    tad tvad gir girvaṇas    draviṇasyu draviṇas    sapary saparyu    tad bhū sūri maghavan    vasu pati vasu dāvan    yu mad dveṣas    tad mad vṛṣṭi div pari    tad mad vāja anarvan    tad mad sahasrin iṣ    īḍ avasyu    yaviṣṭha dūta mad giri    yajiṣṭha hotṛ ā gam    antar hi agni i    vid janman ubhaya kavi    dūta janya iva mitrya    tad vid ā ca prī    yaj cit ānuṣak    ā ca idam sad barhis 
     śreṣṭha yaviṣṭha bhārata    agni dyumat ā bhṛ    vasu puruspṛh rayi    mā mad arāti īś    deva martya ca    pṛ tad uta dviṣ    viśva uta tvad mad    dhārā udanya iva    ati gāh dviṣ    śuci pāvaka vand    agni bṛhat vi ruc    tvad ghṛta āhu    tvad mad as bhārata    agni vaśā ukṣan    aṣṭāpada āhu    dru anna sarpis āsuti    pratna hotṛ vareṇya    sahas putra adbhuta 
     vājay iva nu ratha    yoga agni upa stu    yaśastama mīḍhvas    yad su nītha dāś    ajurya jaray ari    cāru pratīka āhu    yad u śrī dama ā    doṣā uṣas praśaṃs    yad vrata na mī    ā yad svar na bhānu    citra vibhā arcis    añj ajara abhi    atri anu sva rājya    agni uktha vṛdh    viśva adhi śrī dhā    agni indra soma    deva ūti mad    a riṣ sac    abhi as pṛtany 
     ni hotṛ hotṛṣadana vid    tveṣa dīdī sad su dakṣa    adabdha vrata pramati vasiṣṭha    sahasrambhara śuci jihvā agni    tvad dūta tvad u mad paraspā    tvad vasyas ā vṛṣabha praṇī    agni toka mad tan tanu    aprayucchat dīdī bhū gopā    vidh tvad parama janman agni    vidh stoma avara sadhastha    yad yoni udṛch yaj tad    pra tvad havis hu samindh    agni yaj havis yajīyas    śruṣṭi deṣṇa abhi gṛ rādhas    tvad hi as rayi pati rayi    tvad śukra vacas manotṛ    ubhaya tvad na kṣi vasavya    diva diva jan dasma    kṛ kṣumat jaritṛ agni    kṛ pati su apatya rai    sainānīka suvidatra mad    yaj deva āyajiṣṭha svasti    adabdha gopā uta mad paraspā    agni dyumat uta revat dīdī 
      johūtra agni prathama pada     pada manus yat samindh     śrī vas amṛta vicetas     marmṛjenya śravasya tad vājin     śru agni citrabhānu hava mad     viśva gir amṛta vicetas     śyāva ratha vah rohita     rohita kṛ vibhṛtra     uttāna janay suṣūta     bhū agni puru peśa garbha     śiriṇā cit aktu mahas     a parīvṛ vas pracetas     ghṛ agni havis ghṛta     pratikṣi bhuvana viśva     pṛthu vayas bṛhat     vyaciṣṭha anna rabhasa dṛś     viśvatas pratyañc ghṛ     arakṣas manas tad juṣ     marya śrī spṛhay varṇa agni     na abhimṛś tanu jarbhur     jñā bhāga sah vara     tvādūta manu vat vad     anūna agni juhū vacasyā     madhupṛc dhanasā johav 
      śru hava indra mā riṣaṇy     as tvad dā vasu     idam hi tvad ūrj vardhay     vasūyu sindhu na kṣar     sṛj mahi indra yad pinv     pariṣṭhā ahi śūra puru     amartya cit dāsa man     avabhid uktha vṛdh     uktha id nu śūra yad kan     stoma indra rudriya ca     tvad id etad yad mand     pra vāyu sṛ na śubhra     śubhra nu tvad śuṣma vardhay     śubhra vajra bāhu dhā     śubhra tvad indra vṛdh mad     dāsa viś sūrya sah     guhā dhā guh guh ap     apivṛ māyin kṣi     uta u ap div stambh     han ahi śūra vīrya     stu nu tvad indra pūrvya maha     uta stu nūtana kṛ     stu vajra bāhu vaś     stu hari sūrya ketu     hari nu tvad indra vājay     ghṛtaścut svāra svar     vi samanā bhūmi prath     ram parvata cit sṛ     ni parvata sad aprayucchat     sam mātṛ vaś krand     dūra pāra vāṇī vardhay     indra iṣay dhamani prath ni     indra mahat sindhu āśī     māyāvin vṛtra sphur niḥ     rej rodas bhī     kanikrad vṛṣan idam vajra     roro vṛṣan idam vajra     amānuṣa yat mānuṣa nijūrv     ni māyin dānava māyā     pāday pā suta     pā pā id indra śūra soma     mad tvad mandin suta     pṛ tvad kukṣi vardhay     itthā su paura indra av     tvad indra api bhū vipra     dhī van ṛtayā sap     avasyu dhā praśasti     sadyas tvad rai dā as     as tad tvad indra yad tvad ūti     avasyu ūrj vardhay     śuṣmintama yad kan deva     mad rayi rā vīravat     rā kṣaya rā mitra mad     rā śardhas indra māruta mad     sajoṣas yad ca mand     pra vāyu pā agraṇīti     vī id nu yad mand     tṛp soma pā drahyat indra     mad su pṛt ā tarutra     vardhay div bṛhat arka     bṛhat id nu yad tad tarutra     uktha vā sumna āvivās     stṛ barhis pastyāvat     tvota id indra vāja gam     ugra id nu śūra mand     trikadruka pā soma indra     pradodhu śmaśru prī     yā hari suta pīti     dhā śavas śūra yad vṛtra     avabhid dānu aurṇavābha     apāvṛ jyotis ārya     ni savyatas sad dasyu indra     san yad tvad ūti tṛ     viśva spṛdh ārya dasyu     mad tad tvāṣṭra viśvarūpa     randhay sākhya trita     idam su mandin trita     ni arbuda vṛdh stṛ     vartay sūrya na cakra     bhid vala indra aṅgirasvat     nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ     duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan     śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      yad jan eva prathama manasvat     deva deva kratu paribhūṣ     yad śuṣma rodas abhyas     nṛmṇa mahan tad jana indra     yad pṛthivī vyath dṛh     yad parvata prakup ram     yad antarikṣa vimā varīyas     yad div stambh tad jana indra     yad han ahi ri saptan sindhu     yad go udaj apadhā vala     yad aśman antar agni jan     saṃvṛj samad tad jana indra     yad idam viśva cyavana kṛ     yad dāsa varṇa adhara guhā kṛ     śvaghnin iva yad ji lakṣa ādā     ari puṣṭa tad jana indra     yad sma pracch kuha tad iti ghora     uta īṃ ah na etad as iti enad     tad ari puṣṭi vij iva mī     śrath idam dhā tad jana indra     yad radhra coditṛ yad kṛśa     yad brahman nādh kīri     yuj grāvan yad av su śiprā     su soma tad jana indra     yad aśva pradiś yad go     yad grāma yad viśva ratha     yad sūrya yad uṣas jan     yad ap netṛ tad jana indra     yad krandas sami vihvā     para avara ubhaya amitra     samāna cit ratha āsthā     nānā hvā tad jana indra     yad na ṛte viji jana     yad yudh av hvā     yad viśva pratimāna bhū     yad acyuta cyut tad jana indra     yad śaśvat mahi enas dhā     a man śaru han     yad śṛdh na anudā śṛdhyā     yad dasyu han tad jana indra     yad śambara parvata kṣi     catvāriṃśa śarad anuvid     ojāy yad ahi han     dānu śī tad jana indra     yad saptan raśmi vṛṣabha tuviṣmat     avasṛj sṛ saptan sindhu     yad rauhiṇa sphur vajra bāhu     div āruh tad jana indra     div cit idam pṛthivī nam     śuṣma cit idam parvata bhī     yad soma pā nici vajra bāhu     yad vajra hasta tad jana indra     yad su av yad pac     yad śaṃs yad śam ūti     yad brahman vardhana yad soma     yad idam rādhas tad jana indra     yad su pac dudhra ā cit     vāja dardar tad kila as satya     mad tvad indra viśvaha priya     su vīra vidatha ā vad 
      ṛtu janitrī tad ap pari     makṣū jan āviś yad vṛdh     tad āhanas bhū pyā payas     aṃśu pīyūṣa prathama tad ukthya     sadhri ā i pari bhṛ payas     viśvapsnya pra bhṛ bhojana     samāna adhvan pravat anuṣyand     yad tad kṛ prathamam tad as ukthya     anu eka vad yad dā tad     rūpa mī tad apas eka i     viśva eka vinud titikṣ     yad tad kṛ prathamam tad as ukthya     prajā puṣṭi vibhaj ās     rayi iva pṛṣṭha prabhū e     asinvat daṃṣṭra pitṛ ad bhojana     yad tad kṛ prathamam tad as ukthya     adha kṛ pṛthivī saṃdṛś div     yad dhauti ahi han āric pathin     tad tvad stoma uda na vājin     deva deva jan tad as ukthya     yad bhojana ca day ca vardhana     ārdra ā śuṣka madhumat duh     tad śevadhi ni dhā vivasvant     viśva eka īś tad as ukthya     yad puṣpin ca prasū ca dharman     adhi dāna vi avanī dhāray     yad ca asama jan didyut div     uru ūrva abhitas tad as ukthya     yad nārmara sahavasu nihan     pṛkṣa ca dāsaveśa ca vah     ūrjay apariviṣṭa āsya     uta eva adya puru kṛt tad as ukthya     śata vā yad daśan sākam ādo     eka śruṣṭi yat ha coda av     a rajju dasyu sam ubh dabhīti     suprāvya bhū tad as ukthya     viśva id anu rodhana idam pauṃsya     dā idam dhā kṛtnu dhana     ṣaṣ stambh viṣṭir pañcan saṃdṛś     pari paras bhū tad as ukthya     su pravācana tvad vīra vīrya     yat eka kratu vid vasu     jātūṣṭhira pra vayas sahasvat     yad kṛ tad indra viśva as ukthya     ramay sarapas tara kaṃ     turvīti ca vayya ca sruti     nīcā as ud nī parāvṛj     pra andha śroṇa śravay tad as ukthya     mad tad vasu dāna rādhas     sam arthay bahu tvad vasavya     indra yad citra śravasy anu div     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      adhvaryu bhṛ indra soma     ā amatra sic mad andhas     kāmin hi vīra sadam idam pīti     hu vṛṣan tad id etad vaś     adhvaryu yad ap vṛ     vṛtra han aśani iva vṛkṣa     tad etad bhṛ etad     etad indra arh pīti idam     adhvaryu yad dṛbhīka han     yad go udaj apa hi vala vṛ     tad etad antarikṣa na vāta     indra soma ā vṛ jū na vastra     adhvaryu yad uraṇa han     navan cakhvas navati ca bāhu     yad arbuda ava nīcā bādh     tad indra soma bhṛtha hi     adhvaryu yad su aśna han     yad śuṣṇa aśuṣa yad vyaṃsa     yad pipru namuci yad rudhikrā     tad indra andhas hu     adhvaryu yad śata śambara     pur bhid aśman iva puru     yad varcin śata indra sahasra     apavap bhṛ soma idam     adhvaryu yad śata ā sahasra     bhūmi upastha vap han     kutsa āyu atithigva vīra     ni āvṛj bhṛ soma idam     adhvaryu yad nṛ kāmay     śruṣṭi vah naś tad indra     gabhasti pū bhṛ śru     indra soma yajyu hu     adhvaryu kṛ śruṣṭi idam     vana nipū vana ud nī     juṣ hastya abhi vaś tvad     indra soma madira hu     adhvaryu payas udhan yathā go     soma īṃ pṛṇ bhoja indra     vid mad idam nibhṛta mad etad     dits bhūyas yajata cit     adhvaryu yad divya vasu     yad pārthiva kṣamya rājan     tad ūrdara na pṛṇ yava     indra soma tad apas tvad as     mad tad vasu dāna rādhas     sam arthay bahu tvad vasavya     indra yad citra śravasy anu div     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      pra gha nu idam mahat maha     satya satya karaṇa vac     trikadruka pā suta     idam mada ahi indra han     avaṃśa div stabhāy bṛhat     ā rodas pṛṇ antarikṣa     tad dhāray pṛthivī prath ca     soma tad mada indra kṛ     sadman iva prāñc vi mi māna     vajra kha tṛd nadī     vṛthā sṛj pathin dīrghayātha     soma tad mada indra kṛ     tad pravoḍhṛ parigam dabhīti     viśva dah āyudha indh agni     sam go aśva sṛj ratha     soma tad mada indra kṛ     tad īṃ mah dhunī i ram     tad asnātṛ pāray svasti     tad utsnā rayi abhi pra sthā     soma tad mada indra kṛ     tad udañc sindhu ri mahitva     vajra anas uṣas sam piṣ     ajavas javin vivraśc     soma tad mada indra kṛ     tad vid apagoha kanī     āvis bhū ud sthā parāvṛj     prati śroṇa sthā vi anakṣ cakṣ     soma tad mada indra kṛ     bhid vala aṅgiras gṛ     vi parvata dṛṃhita īr     ric rodhas kṛtrima idam     soma tad mada indra kṛ     svapna abhivap cumuri dhuni ca     han dasyu pra dabhīti av     rambhin cit atra vid hiraṇya     soma tad mada indra kṛ     nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ     duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan     śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      pra tvad as jyeṣṭhatama suṣṭuti     agni iva samindh havis bhṛ     indra ajurya jaray ukṣ     sanāt yuvan av hvā     yad indra bṛhat kaścana īṃ ṛte     viśva idam sambhṛ adhi vīrya     jaṭhara soma tanū sahas mahas     hasta vajra bhṛ śīrṣan kratu     na kṣoṇī paribhū tvad indriya     na samudra parvata indra tvad ratha     na tvad vajra anu aś kaścana     yat āśu pat yojana puru     viśva hi idam yajata dhṛṣṇu     kratu bhṛ vṛṣabha saścant     vṛṣan yaj havis viduṣṭara     pā indra soma vṛṣabha bhānu     vṛṣan kośa pū madhu ūrmi     vṛṣabha anna vṛṣabha pā     vṛṣan adhvaryu vṛṣabha adri     vṛṣan soma vṛṣabha     vṛṣan tvad vajra uta tvad vṛṣan ratha     vṛṣan hari vṛṣabha āyudha     vṛṣan mada vṛṣabha tvad īś     indra soma vṛṣabha tṛp     pra tvad nau na samana vacasyu     brahman yā savana dādhṛṣi     kuvid mad idam vacas nibudh     indra utsa na vasu sic     purā sambādha abhi ā vṛt mad     dhenu na vatsa yavasa pyā     sakṛt su tvad sumati śatakratu     sam patnī na vṛṣan nas     nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ     duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan     śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      tad idam navya aṅgirasvat arc     śuṣma yat idam pratnathā udīr     viśva yat gotra sahas parīvṛ     mada soma dṛṃhay īray     tad bhū yad ha prathama dhāyas     ojas mā mahiman ātṛ     śūra yad yudh tanū parivye     śīrṣan div mahina prati muc     adha kṛ prathama vīrya mahat     yad idam agra brahman śuṣma īray     ratheṣṭha hari aśva vicyu     pra jīri sṛ sadhryañc pṛthak     adha yad viśva bhuvana abhi majman     īśāna kṛt pravayas abhi vṛdh     āt rodas jyotis vahni ātan     sīv tamas dudhita sam vye     tad prācīna parvata dṛh ojas     adharācīna kṛ ap apas     dhāray pṛthivī viśva dhāyas     stambh māyā div avasraṃs     tad idam aram bāhu yad pitṛ kṛ     viśva ā janus vedas pari     yad pṛthivī ni krivi śī     vajra han vṛj tuviṣvaṇi     amājur iva pitṛ sacā as     samāna ā sadas tvad i bhaga     kṛ praketa upa mā ā bhṛ     dā bhāga tanū yad mah     bhoja tvad indra mad hvā     dadi tvad indra apas vāja     av indra citra mad ūti     kṛ vṛṣan indra vasyas mad     nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ     duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan     śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      prātar ratha nava yuj sasni     catur yuga tri kaśā saptan raśmi     daśan aritra manuṣya svarṣā     tad iṣṭi mati raṃh bhū     tad idam aram prathama tad dvitīya     uta u tṛtīya manus tad hotṛ     anya garbha anya u jan     tad anya sac jenya vṛṣan     hari nu kaṃ ratha indra yuj     e su vac vacas nava     mā u su tvad atra bahu hi vipra     ni ram yajamāna anya     ā dvi hari indra yā     ā catur ā ṣaṣ hvā     ā aṣṭan daśan soma peya     idam su su makha mā mṛdhas kṛ     ā viṃśati triṃśat yā arvāñc     ā catvāriṃśat hari yuj     ā pañcāśat su ratha indra     ā ṣaṣṭi saptati soma peya     ā aśīti navati yā arvāñc     ā śata hari vah     idam hi tvad śunahotra soma     indra tvāyā pariṣic mada     mad brahman indra yā acchā     viśva hari dhur dhā ratha     purutrā hi vihvā bhū     idam śūra savana māday     na mad indra sakhya vi yu     mad idam dakṣiṇā duh     upa jyeṣṭha varūtha gabhasti     prāya prāya ji as     nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ     duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan     śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      pā idam andhas mada     manīṣin su prayas     yad indra pradiv vṛdh     oka dhā brahmaṇy ca nṛ     idam mad madhu vajrahasta     ahi indra arṇovṛt vi vraśc     pra yat vi na svasara acchā     prayas ca nadī kram     tad māhina indra arṇas ap     preray ahi han acchā samudra     janay sūrya vid go     aktu ahar vayuna sādh     tad aprati manu puru     indra dāś dāś han vṛtra     sadyas yad nṛ atasāyya bhū     spṛdh sūrya sāti     tad su indra sūrya     ā deva ric martya stava     ā yat rayi guh avadya idam     bhṛ aṃśa na etaśa daśasy     tad randhay sadivas sārathi     śuṣṇa aśuṣa kuyava kutsa     divodāsa navati ca navan     indra pur vi īr śambara     eva tvad indra ucatha hi     śravasyā na tman vājay     aś tad sāpta āśuṣ     nam vadhar a deva pīyu     eva tvad gṛtsamada śūra manman     avasyu na vayuna takṣ     brahmaṇy indra tvad navīyas     iṣ ūrj su kṣiti sumna aś     nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ     duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan     śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      mad tvad vayas indra vid su mad     pra bhṛ vājayu na ratha     vipanyu dhī manīṣā     sumna iyakṣ tvāvat nṛ     tvad mad indra ūti     tvāyat abhiṣṭi pā as jana     tvad ina dāś varūtṛ     itthā dhī abhi yad nakṣ tvad     tad mad yuvan indra johūtra     sakhi śiva nṛ as pā     yad śaṃs yad śam ūti     pac ca stu ca praṇī     tad u stu indra tad gṛ     yad purā vṛdh śad ca     tad vasu kāma pṛ i     brahmaṇy nūtana āyu     tad aṅgiras ucatha juṣ     brahman tu indra gā iṣ     muṣ uṣas sūrya stavat     aśna cit śnath pūrvya     tad ha śru indra nāma deva     ūrdhva bhū manus dasmatama     ava priya arśasāna sah     śiras bhṛ dāsa svadhāvat     tad vṛtrahan indra kṛṣṇa yoni     puraṃdara dāsa īray vi     janay manu kṣā ap ca     satrā śaṃsa yajamāna tu     tad tavasya anu dā satrā     indra deva arṇa sāti     prati yat idam vajra bāhu dhā     han dasyu pur āyasa ni tṛ     nūnam tad tvad prati vara jaritṛ     duh indra dakṣiṇā maghavan     śikṣ stotṛ mā ati dagh bhaga mad     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      viśva jit dhana jit svar jit     satrā jit nṛ jit urvarā jit     aśva jit go jit ap jit bhṛ     indra soma yajata haryata     abhibhū abhibhaṅga van     a sah sah vedhas     tuvigri vahni duṣṭarītu     satrā sāh namas indra vac     satrā sāha jana bhakṣa janaṃsaha     cyavana yudhma anu joṣa vakṣ     vṛtaṃcaya sahuri viś ār     indra vac pra kṛ vīrya     anānuda vṛṣabha dudh vadha     gambhīra ṛṣva a samaś kāvya     radhra coda śnathana vīḍay pṛthu     indra su yajña uṣas svar jan     yajña gātu aptur vid     dhī hi uśij manīṣin     abhisvara niṣad go avasyu     indra hi draviṇa aś     indra śreṣṭha draviṇa dhā     citti dakṣa subhaga tva mad     poṣa rayi ariṣṭi tanu     svādman vāc sudina tva ahar 
      trikadruka mahiṣa yava āśir     tuvi śuṣma     tṛp soma pā viṣṇu su     yathā vaś     tad īṃ mad mahi karman kṛ     mah uru     tad enad sac deva deva satya indra     satya indu     adha tviṣīmat abhi ojas krivi     yudh bhū     ā rodas pṛṇ idam majman     pra vṛdh     dhā anya jaṭhara pra īṃ ric     tad enad sac deva deva satya indra     satya indu     sākam jan kratu sākam ojas     vakṣ     sākam vṛdh vīrya sāsahi mṛdh     vicarṣaṇi     dā rādhas stu kāmya vasu     tad enad sac deva deva satya indra     satya indu     tvad tya narya nṛtu     apas indra prathama pūrvya div     pravac kṛ     yat deva śavas prari asu     ri ap     bhū viśva abhi ā a deva ojas     vid ūrj śatakratu     vid iṣ 
      gaṇa tvad gaṇapati hvā     kavi kavi upamaśravastama     jyeṣṭha rāj brahman brahmaṇaspati     ā mad śru ūti sad sādana     deva cit tvad asurya pracetas     bṛhaspati yajñiya bhāga aś     usrā iva sūrya jyotis maha     viśva id jan brahman as     ā vibādh parirāp tamas ca     jyotiṣmat ratha ṛta sthā     bṛhaspati bhīma amitra dambhana     rakṣas han gotra bhid svar vid     sunīti nī trā jana     yad tvad dāś na tad aṃhas aś     brahman dviṣ tapana manyumī as     bṛhaspati mahi tad tvad mahitvana     na tad aṃhas na durita kutaścana     na arāti tṛ na dvayāvin     viśva id idam dhvaras vi bādh     yad su gopā rakṣ brahmaṇaspati     tvad mad gopā pathikṛt vicakṣaṇa     tvad vrata mati jṛ     bṛhaspati yad mad abhi hvaras dhā     sva tad mamar ducchunā harasvat     uta vā yad mad marcay anāgas     arātīvan marta sānuka vṛka     bṛhaspati apa tad vartay pathin     suga mad idam deva vīti kṛ     trātṛ tvad tanu hvā     avaspartṛ adhivaktṛ asmayu     bṛhaspati deva nid ni barhay     mā dureva uttara sumna ud naś     tvad mad su vṛdh brahmaṇaspati     spārha vasu manuṣya dā     yad mad dūra taḍitas yad arāti     abhi as jambhay tad anapnas     tvad mad uttama vayas     bṛhaspati papri sasni yuj     mā mad duḥśaṃsa abhidipsu īś     pra su śaṃsa mati tṛ     anānuda vṛṣabha jagmi āhava     niṣṭap śatru pṛtanā sāsahi     as satya ṛṇayā brahmaṇaspati     ugra cit dam vīḍu harṣin     a deva manas yad riṣaṇy     śās ugra man jighāṃs     bṛhaspati mā praṇaś tad mad vadha     ni karman manyu dureva śṛdh     bhara hu namas upasad     gam vāja san dhana dhana     viśva id ari abhidipsu mṛdh     bṛhaspati vi vṛh ratha iva     tejiṣṭha tapanī rakṣas tap     yad tvad nid dhā dṛś vīrya     āvis tad kṛ yad as tvad ukthya     bṛhaspati vi parirāp arday     bṛhaspati ati yad ari arh     dyumat vibhā kratumat jana     yad dīdī śavas ṛta prajan     tad mad draviṇa dhā citra     mā mad stena yad abhi druh pada     nirāmin ripu anna gṛdh     ā deva ūh vi vrayas hṛd     bṛhaspati na paras sāman vid     viśva hi tvad bhuvana pari     tvaṣṭṛ jan sāman sāman kavi     tad ṛṇacit ṛṇayā brahmaṇaspati     druh han mah ṛta dhartṛ     tvad śrī vi hā parvata     go gotra utsṛj yat aṅgiras     indra yuj tamas parīvṛ     bṛhaspati niḥ ap ubj arṇava     brahmaṇaspati tvad idam yam     sūkta bhū tanaya ca jinv     viśva tad bhadra yad av deva     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      tad idam av prabhṛti yad īś     idam vidh nava maha gir     yathā mad mīḍhvas stu sakhi tvad     bṛhaspati sādh tad uta mad mati     yad nantva nam ni ojas     uta dardar manyu śambara vi     praccyāvay acyuta brahmaṇaspati     ā ca viś vasumat vi parvata     tad deva devatama kartva     śrath dṛḍha vrad vīḍay     ud go aj bhid brahman vala     guh tamas vi cakṣay svar     aśman āsya avata
