brahmaṇaspati     madhu dhārā abhi yad ojas tṛd     tad eva viśva pā svar dṛś     bahu sākam sic utsa udrin     sana tad kaścit bhuvana bhavītva     mās śarad dvār vṛ tvad     a yat car anya anya id     yad kṛ vayuna brahmaṇaspati     abhinakṣ abhi yad tad aś     nidhi paṇi parama guhā dhā     tad vid praticakṣ anṛta punar     yatas u i tad ud i āviś     ṛtāvan praticakṣ anṛta punar     ā atas ā sthā kavi mah pathin     tad bāhu dham agni aśman     nakir tad as araṇa hā hi tad     ṛta jyā kṣipra brahmaṇaspati     yatra vaś pra tad aś dhanvan     tad sādhu iṣu yad as     nṛ cakṣas dṛś karṇa yoni     tad saṃnaya tad vinaya purohita     tad suṣṭuta tad yudh brahmaṇaspati     cākṣma yat vāja bhṛ mati dhana     id sūrya tap tapyatu vṛthā     vibhu prabhu prathama mehanāvat     bṛhaspati suvidatra rādhya     idam sāta venya vājin     yad jana ubhaya bhuj viś     yad avara vṛjana viśvathā vibhu     mahat u raṇva śavas vakṣ     tad deva deva prati prath pṛthu     viśva id u tad paribhū brahmaṇaspati     viśva satya maghavan tvad id     ap cana pra mī vrata tvad     acchā indrābrahmaṇaspati havis mad     anna yuj eva vājin gā     uta āśiṣṭha anu śru vahni     sabheya vipra bhṛ mati dhana     vīḍu dveṣas anu vaśa ṛṇa ādadi     tad ha vājin samitha brahmaṇaspati     brahmaṇaspati bhū yathāvaśam     satya manyu mahi karman kṛ     yad go udaj tad div vi ca bhaj     mah iva rīti śavas sṛ pṛthak     brahmaṇaspati su yama viśvahā     rai as rathī vayasvat     vīra vīra upa pṛc mad tvad     yat īś brahman vī mad hava     brahmaṇaspati tvad idam yam     sūkta bhū tanaya ca jinv     viśva tad bhadra yad av deva     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      indh agni van vanuṣy     kṛ brahman śvi rā havya id     jan jan ati tad pra sarsṛ     yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati     vīra vīra van vanuṣy     go rayi prath budh tman     toka ca tad tanaya ca vṛdh     yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati     sindhu na kṣodas śimīvat ṛghāy     vṛṣan iva vadhri abhi vaś ojas     agni iva prasiti na aha vṛ     yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati     tad ṛṣ divya asaścat     tad satvan prathama go gam     a nibhraṃś taviṣī han ojas     yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati     tad id viśva dhunay sindhu     acchidra śarman dhā puru     deva sumna subhaga tad edh     yad yad yuj kṛ brahmaṇaspati 
      ṛju id śaṃsa van vanuṣy     devay id a devay abhi as     su prāvī id van pṛt duṣṭara     yajvan id a yajyu vi bhaj bhojana     yaj vīra pra vī manāy     bhadra manas kṛ vṛtratūrya     havis kṛ subhaga yathā as     brahmaṇaspati avas vṛ     tad id jana tad viś tad janman     tad putra vāja bhṛ dhana nṛ     deva yad pitṛ āvivās     śraddhā manas havis brahmaṇaspati     yad idam havya ghṛtavat vidh     pra tad prāñc nī brahmaṇaspati     uruṣy īṃ aṃhas rakṣ riṣ     aṃhu cit idam uru cakri adbhuta 
      idam gir āditya ghṛtasnu     sanāt rājan juhū hu     śru mitra aryaman bhaga mad     tuvi jan varuṇa dakṣa aṃśa     idam stoma sa kratu mad adya     mitra aryaman varuṇa juṣ     āditya śuci dhāra pū     a vṛjina anavadya ariṣṭa     tad āditya uru gabhīra     adabdha dips bhūri akṣa     antar paś vṛjina uta sādhu     sarva rājan parama cit antī     dhāray āditya jagat sthā     deva viśva bhuvana gopā     dīrgha ādhī rakṣ asurya     ṛtāvan ci ṛṇa     vid āditya avas tvad idam     yad aryaman bhaya ā cit mayobhu     tvad mitrāvaruṇa praṇīti     pari śvabhra iva durita vṛj     su ga hi tvad aryaman mitra pathin     anṛkṣara varuṇa sādhu as     tad āditya adhi vac mad     yam mad duṣparihantu śarman     pṛ mad aditi rājan putra     ati dveṣas aryaman su ga     bṛhat mitra varuṇa śarman     upa as puru vīra ariṣṭa     tri bhūmi dhāray tri uta div     tri vrata vidatha antar idam     ṛta āditya mahi tvad mahi tva     tad aryaman varuṇa mitra cāru     tri rocana divya dhāray     hiraṇyaya śuci dhāra pū     a svapnaj animiṣa adabdha     uru śaṃsa ṛju martya     tvad viśva varuṇa as rājan     yad ca deva asura yad ca marta     śata mad rā śarad vicakṣ     aś āyus sudhita pūrva     na dakṣiṇa vi cit na savya     na prācīna āditya na uta paśca     pākyā cit vasu dhīrya cit     yuṣmānīta abhaya jyotis aś     yad rājan ṛta ni bhī dāś     yad vardhay puṣṭi ca nitya     tad revat yā prathama ratha     vasu dāvan vidatha praśaṃs     śuci ap su yavasa adabdha     upa kṣi vṛdh vayas su vīra     nakir tad han antitas na dūrāt     yad āditya bhū praṇīti     aditi mitra varuṇa uta mṛḍ     yat tvad mad kṛ kaścit āgas     uru aś abhaya jyotis indra     mā mad dīrgha abhi naś tamisrā     ubh idam pyā samyañc     div vṛṣṭi subhaga nāma puṣ     ubh kṣaya āji yā pṛt     ubh ardha bhū sādhu idam     yad tvad māyā abhidruh yajatra     pāśa āditya ripu vicṛt     aśvin iva tad ati yā ratha     ariṣṭa uru ā śarman as     mā mad maghavan varuṇa priya     bhūri dāvan ā vid śūna āpi     mā rai rājan su yama ava sthā     bṛhant vad vidatha su vīra 
      idam kavi āditya sva rāj     viśva as abhi as mahan     ati yad mandra yajatha deva     su kīrti bhikṣ varuṇa bhūri     tvad vrata subhaga as     su ādhī varuṇa stu     upāyana uṣas gomat     agni na jṛ anu div     tvad as puru vīra śarman     uru śaṃsa varuṇa praṇetṛ     tvad mad putra aditi adabdha     abhi kṣam yujya deva     pra sīm āditya sṛj vidhartṛ     ṛta sindhu varuṇa i     na śram na vi muc etad     vi na pat raghuyā parijman     vi mad śrathāy raśanā iva āgas     ṛdh tvad varuṇa khā ṛta     mā tantu chid ve dhī mad     mā mātrā śṛ apas puras ṛtu     apa u su myakṣ varuṇa bhiyas mad     samrāj ṛtāvan anu mad gṛbhāy     dāman iva vatsa vi muc aṃhas     nahi tvad āre nimiṣ cana īś     mā mad vadha varuṇa yad tvad iṣṭi     enas kṛ asura bhrī     mā jyotis pravasatha gam     vi su mṛdh śrath jīv mad     namas purā tvad varuṇa uta nūnam     uta apara tuvi jan brū     tvad hi kaṃ parvata na śri     a pracyu dūḍabha vrata     paras ṛṇa sū adha mad kṛ     mā mad rājan anya kṛ bhuj     a vivas id nu bhūyas uṣa     ā mad jīva varuṇa tad śās     yad mad rājan yujya vā sakhi vā     svapna bhaya bhīru mad ah     stena vā yad dips mad vṛka vā     tvad tad varuṇa pā mad     mā mad maghavan varuṇa priya     bhūri dāvan ā vid śūna āpi     mā rai rājan su yama ava sthā     bṛhant vad vidatha su vīra 
      dhṛ vrata āditya iṣira     āre mad kṛ raha sū iva āgas     śru tvad varuṇa mitra deva     bhadra vid av hvā tvad     tvad deva pramati tvad ojas     tvad dveṣas sanutar yu     abhikṣattṛ abhi ca kṣam     adya ca mad mṛḍay apara ca     ka u nu tvad kṛ apara     ka sana vasu āpya     tvad mad mitrāvaruṇa aditi ca     svasti indrāmarut dhā     haye deva tvad id āpi as     tad mṛḍ nādh mad     mā tvad ratha madhyama vāh ṛte bhū     mā yuṣmāvat āpi śram     pra tvad eka mī bhūri āgas     yad mad pitṛ iva kitava śās     āre pāśa āre agha deva     mā mad adhi putra vi iva grah     arvāñc adya bhū yajatra     ā tvad hārdi bhī vye     trā mad deva nijur vṛka     trā karta avapad yajatra     mā mad maghavan varuṇa priya     bhūri dāvan ā vid śūna āpi     mā rai rājan su yama ava sthā     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      ṛta deva kṛ savitṛ     indra ahi han na ram ap     ahar ahar yā aktu ap     kiyat ā prathama sarga idam     yad vṛtra sina atra ābhṛ     pra tad janitrī vid vac     pathin rad anu joṣa idam     diva diva dhunī i artha     ūrdhva hi sthā adhi antarikṣa     adha vṛtra pra vadha bhṛ     mih vas upa hi īṃ dru     tigma āyudha ji śatru indra     bṛhaspati tapus aśan iva vyadh     vṛkadvaras asura vīra     yathā han dhṛṣat purā cit     eva hā śatru mad indra     ava kṣip div aśman uccā     yad śatru mand nijūrv     toka sāti tanaya bhūri     mad ardha kṛ indra go     pra hi kratu vṛh yad van     radhra as yaj coda     indrāsoma tvad mad av     idam bhayastha kṛ u loka     na mad tam na śram na uta tand     na vac mā su iti soma     yad mad pṛ yad dā yad nibudh     yad mad su upa go e     sarasvatī tvad mad av     marutvat dhṛṣ ji śatru     tya cit śṛdh taviṣīy     indra han vṛṣabha śaṇḍika     yad mad sanutya uta vā jighatnu     abhikhyā tad tigita vyadh     bṛhaspati āyudha ji śatru     druh riṣ pari dhā rājan     asmāka satvan śūra śūra     vīrya kṛ yad tvad kṛ     jyok bhū anudhūpay     han tad ā bhṛ mad vasu     tad tvad śardha māruta sumnayu gir     upa brū namas daivya jana     yathā rayi sarva vīra naś     apatyasāc śrutya diva diva 
      mad mitrāvaruṇa av ratha     āditya rudra vasu sacābhū     pra yat vi na pat vasman pari     śravasyu hṛṣīvat vanarṣad     adha sma mad ud av sajoṣas     ratha deva abhi viś vājayu     yat āśu padyā tṛ rajas     pṛthivī sānu jaṅghan pāṇi     uta tya mad indra viśvacarṣaṇi     div śardha māruta su kratu     anu nu sthā avṛka ūti     ratha mah sani vāja sāti     uta tya deva bhuvana sakṣaṇi     tvaṣṭṛ gnā sajoṣas jū ratha     iḍā bhaga bṛhaddiva uta rodas     pūṣan purandhi aśvin adha pati     uta tya devī subhaga mithūdṛś     uṣāsānaktā jagant     stu yat tvad pṛthivī navyas     sthātṛ ca vayas trivayas upastir     uta tvad śaṃsa uśij iva vaś     ahirbudhnya aja eka pād uta     trita ṛbhukṣan savitṛ canas dhā     ap napāt āśu heman dhī     etad tvad vaś udyam yajatra     takṣ āyu navyas sam     śravasyu vāja kan     sapti na rathya aha dhīti aś 
      idam mad dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāy     bhū avitṛ vacas siṣās     yad āyus prataram tad idam puras     upastu vasūyu tvad mahas dhā     mā mad guhya rip āyu ahar dabh     mā mad idam radh ducchunā     mā mad vi yu sakhya vid tad mad     sumnāy manas tad tvad ī     a hīḍ manas śruṣṭi ā vah     duh dhenu pyā asaścat     padyā āśu vacas ca vājin     tvad hi puruhūta viśvahā     rākā mad su hava suṣṭuti hvā     śru mad subhaga budh tman     sīv apas sūci a chid     dā vīra śata dāya ukthya     yad tvad rākā sumati supeśas     yad dā dāś vasu     tad mad adya sumanas upāgam     sahasra poṣa subhaga rā     sinīvālī pṛthuṣṭuka     yad deva as svasṛ     juṣ havya āhu     prajā devī diś mad     yad su bāhu su aṅguri     suṣūmā bahusūvarī     tad viś patnī havis     sinīvālī hu     yad guṅgū yad sinīvālī     yad rākā yad sarasvatī     indrāṇī hvā ūti     varuṇānī svasti 
      ā tvad pitṛ marut sumna i     mā mad sūrya saṃdṛś yu     abhi mad vīra arvant kṣam     pra jan rudra prajā     tvādatta rudra śaṃtama     śata hima aś bheṣaja     vi mad dveṣas vitaram vi aṃhas     vi amīvā cātay viṣvañc     śreṣṭha jan rudra śrī as     tavastama tavas vajra bāhu     pṛ mad pāra aṃhas svasti     viśva abhīti rapas yu     mā tvad rudra krudh namas     mā duṣṭuti vṛṣabha mā sahūti     ud mad vīra arpay bheṣaja     bhiṣaktama tvad bhiṣaj śru     havīman hvā yad havis     ava stoma rudra dā     ṛdūdara su hava mā mad idam     babhru su śiprā radh manā     ud mad mad vṛṣabha marutvat     tvakṣīyas vayas nādh     ghṛṇin iva chāyā arapas aś     vivās rudra sumna     kva tya tvad rudra mṛḍayāku     hasta yad as bheṣaja jalāṣa     apabhṛ rapas daivya     abhi nu mad vṛṣabha kṣam     pra babhru vṛṣabha śvityañc     mah mah suṣṭuti īray     namasy kalmalīkin namas     gṛ tveṣa rudra nāman     sthira aṅga puru rūpa ugra     babhru śukra piś hiraṇya     īśāna idam bhuvana bhūri     na vai u yu rudra asurya     arh bhṛ sāyaka dhanvan     arh niṣka yajata viśva rūpa     arh idam day viśva abhva     na vai ojīyas rudra tvad as     stu śru garta sad yuvan     mṛga na bhīma upahatnu ugra     mṛḍ jaritṛ rudra stu     anya tvad mad ni vap senā     kumāra cit pitṛ vand     prati nam rudra upe     bhūri dātṛ sat pati gṛ     stu tvad bheṣaja rā mad     yad tvad bheṣaja marut śuci     yad śaṃtama vṛṣan yad mayobhu     yad manu vṛ ā pitṛ mad     tad śam ca yos ca rudra vaś     pari mad heti rudra vṛj     pari tveṣa durmati mah gā     ava sthira maghavan tan     mīḍhvas toka tanaya mṛḍ     eva babhru vṛṣabha cekit     yathā deva na hṛ na han     havana śrut mad rudra iha bhū     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      dhārā vara marut dhṛṣṇu ojas     mṛga na bhīma taviṣī arcin     agni na śuc ṛjīṣin     bhṛmi dham apa go vṛ     div na star citay khādin     vi abhriya na dyutay vṛṣṭi     rudra yat tvad marut rukma vakṣas     vṛṣan jan pṛśni śukra ūdhas     ukṣ aśva atya iva āji     nada karṇa turay āśu     hiraṇya śiprā marut dodhu     pṛkṣa yā pṛṣatī samanyu     pṛkṣ tad viśva bhuvana vakṣ     mitra vā sadam ā jīra dānu     pṛṣat aśva anavabhra rādhas     ṛjipya na vayuna dhūrṣad     indhanvan dhenu rapś ūdhas     adhvasman pathin bhrāj ṛṣṭi     ā haṃsa na svasara gam     madhu mada marut samanyu     ā mad brahman marut samanyu     nṛ na śaṃsa savana gam     aśvā iva pyā dhenu ūdhas     kṛ dhī jaritṛ vāja peśas     tad mad dā marut vājin ratha     āp brahman citay diva diva     iṣ stotṛ vṛjana kāru     sani medhā ariṣṭa duṣṭara sahas     yat yuj marut rukma vakṣas     aśva ratha bhaga ā sudānu     dhenu na śiśu svasara pinv     jana rā havis mah iṣ     yad mad marut vṛkatāti martya     ripu dhā vasu rakṣ riṣ     vartay tapus cakrī abhi tad     ava rudra aśas han vadhar     citra tad tvad marut yāman cekit     pṛśni yat ūdhas api āpi duh     yat vā nid nū rudriya     trita jara adābhya     tad tvad mah marut eva yāvan     viṣṇu eṣa prabhṛtha hvā     hiraṇya varṇa kakuha yam sruc     brahmaṇy śaṃs rādhas i     tad daśagva prathama yajña vah     tad mad hi uṣas vyuṣṭi     uṣas na rāmī aruṇa apa vṛ     mah u jyotis śuc go arṇas     tad kṣoṇī aruṇa na añji     rudra ṛta sadana vṛdh     nimih atya pājas     su ścandra varṇa dhā su peśas     tad i mahi varūtha ūti     upa gha id idam namas gṛ     trita na yad pañcan hotṛ abhiṣṭi     āvṛt avara cakrī av     yad radhra pāray ati aṃhas     yad nid muc vanditṛ     arvāñc tad marut yad tvad ūti     ā u su vāśrā iva sumati gā 
      upa īṃ sṛj vājayu vacasyā     canas dhā nādya gir mad     ap napāt āśu heman kuvid tad     su peśas kṛ juṣ hi     idam su idam hṛd ā su takṣ     mantra vac kuvid idam vid     ap napāt asurya mahan     viśva arya bhuvana jan     sam anya i upa i anya     samāna ūrva nadī pṛ     tad u śuci śuci dīdī     ap napāt pari sthā ap     tad a smera yuvati yuvan     marmṛj pari i ap     tad śukra śikvan revat mad     dīdī anidhma ghṛta nirṇij ap     idam tri avyathya nārī     deva devī didhiṣ anna     kṛ iva upa hi prasarsṛ ap     tad pīyūṣa dhā pūrva sū     aśva atra janiman idam ca svar     druh riṣ sampṛc pā sūri     āma pur paras a pramṛṣ     na arāti vi naś na anṛta     sva ā dama su dugha yad dhenu     svadhā pyā su bhū anna ad     tad ap napāt ūrjay ap antar     vasu deya vidh vi bhā     yad ap ā śuci daivya     ṛtāvan ajasra urviyā vibhā     vayā id anya bhuvana idam     pra jan vīrudh ca prajā     ap napāt ā hi sthā upastha     jihma ūrdhva vidyut vas     tad jyeṣṭha mahiman vah     hiraṇya varṇa pari i yahva     hiraṇya rūpa tad hiraṇya saṃdṛś     ap napāt tad id u hiraṇya varṇa     hiraṇyaya pari yoni niṣad     hiraṇya dā dā anna idam     tad idam anīka uta cāru nāman     apīcya vṛdh naptṛ ap     yad indh yuvati sam itthā     hiraṇya varṇa ghṛta anna idam     idam bahu avama sakhi     yajña vidh namas havis     sam sānu mṛj didhiṣ bilma     dhā anna pari vand ṛc     tad īṃ vṛṣan janay tad garbha     tad īṃ śiśu dhā tad rih     tad ap napāt an abhimlā varṇa     anya iva iha tanū viṣ     idam pada parama sthā     adhvasman viśvahā dīdī     ap naptṛ ghṛta anna vah     svayam atka pari dī yahvī     yam agni su kṣiti jana     yam u maghavan suvṛkti     viśva tad bhadra yad av deva     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      tvad hi vas go ap     duh sīm avi adri nṛ     pā indra svāhā prahu vaṣaṭkṛ     hotra ā soma prathama yad īś     yajña sammiśla pṛṣatī ṛṣṭi     yāman śubhra añji priya uta     āsad barhis bharata sūnu     potra ā soma pā div nṛ     amā iva mad su hava ā hi gam     ni barhis sad ran     atha mand juṣ andhas     tvaṣṭṛ deva jani sumadgaṇa     ā vah deva iha vipra yaj ca     vaś hotṛ ni sad yoni tri     prati vī prasthā somya madhu     pā āgnīdhra tvad bhāga tṛp     etad tya tvad tanū nṛmṇa vardhana     sahas ojas pradiv bāhu dhā     tvad su maghavan tvad ābhṛ     tvad idam brāhmaṇa ā tṛp pā     juṣ yajña budh hava mad     sad hotṛ nivid pūrvya anu     acchā rājan namas i āvṛt     praśāstra ā pā somya madhu 
      mand hotra anu joṣa andhas     adhvaryu tad pṛ vaś āsic     tad etad bhṛ tad vaśa dadi     hotra soma draviṇas dā pā ṛtu     yad u pūrvam hvā tad idam hvā     tad id u hvā dadi yad nāman paty     adhvaryu prasthā somya madhu     potra soma draviṇas dā pā ṛtu     med tvad vahni yad ī     a riṣaṇy vīḍay vanaspati     āyu dhṛṣṇu abhigur tvad     neṣṭra soma draviṇas dā pā ṛtu     apa āt hotra uta potra mad     uta neṣṭra juṣ prayas dhā     turīya pātra amṛkta amartya     draviṇas dā pā drāviṇodasa     arvāñc adya yayya nṛvāhaṇa     ratha yuj iha tvad vimocana     pṛc havis madhu hi kaṃ gam     atha soma pā vājinīvasu     juṣ agni samidh juṣ āhuti     juṣ brahman janya juṣ suṣṭuti     viśva viśva ṛtu vasu mah     vaś deva vaś pāyay havis 
      ud u tya deva savitṛ sava     śaśvattama tad apas vahni sthā     nūnam deva vi hi dhā ratna     atha bhaj vīti hotra svasti     viśva hi śruṣṭi deva ūrdhva     pra bāhu ā pṛthu pāṇi sṛ     ap cit idam vrata ā nimṛgra     idam cit vāta ram parijman     āśu cit i vi muc nūnam     ram at cit i     ahyarṣu cit ni yam aviṣyā     anu vrata savitṛ mokī āgā     punar sam vye vitan ve     madhyā kartu ni dhā śakman dhīra     ud saṃhā sthā vi ṛtu dhardhṛ     aramati savitṛ deva āgā     nānā oka durya viśva āyus     vi sthā prabhava śoka agni     jyeṣṭha mātṛ sūnu bhāga ādhā     anu idam keta iṣ savitṛ     samāvṛt viṣṭhā jigīṣu     viśva kāma car amā bhū     śaśvat apas vikṛ hā āgā     anu vrata savitṛ daivya     tvad dhā apya ap bhāga     dhanvan anu ā mṛgayas vi sthā     vana vi nakir idam tad     vrata deva savitṛ mī     yādrādhyam varuṇa yoni apya     aniśita nimiṣ jarbhur     viśva mārtāṇḍa vraja ā paśu gā     sthaśas janman savitṛ vi ākṛ     na yad indra varuṇa na mitra     vrata aryaman na mī rudra     na arāti tad idam svasti     hvā deva savitṛ namas     bhaga dhī vājay puraṃdhi     narāśaṃsa gnāspati mad av     āya vāma saṃgatha rayi     priya deva savitṛ as     mad tad div ap pṛthivī     tvad dā kāmya rādhas ā gā     śam yad stotṛ āpi bhū     uru śaṃsa savitṛ jaritṛ 
      grāvan iva tad id artha jṛ     gṛdhra iva vṛkṣa nidhimat acchā     brahman iva vidatha uktha śās     dūta iva hu janya purutrā     prātar yāvan rathya iva vīra     aja iva yama vara ā sac     menā iva tanū śubh     dampati iva kratu vid jana     śṛṅga iva mad prathama gam arvāk     śapha iva jarbhur taras     cakravāka iva prati vastu usra     arvāñc yā rathya iva śakra     nau iva mad pāray yuga iva     nabhya iva mad upadhi iva pradhi iva     śvan iva mad ariṣaṇya tanū     khṛgala iva visraṃs pā mad     vāta iva ajurya nadī iva rīti     akṣi iva cakṣus yā arvāk     hasta iva tanū śambhaviṣṭha     pāda iva mad nī vasyas acchā     oṣṭha iva madhu āsan vad     stana iva pyā jīv mad     nāsā iva mad tanū rakṣitṛ     karṇa iva su śrut bhū mad     hasta iva śakti abhi saṃdadi mad     kṣam iva mad sam aj rajas     idam gir aśvin yuṣmayat     kṣṇotra iva svadhiti sam śā     etad tvad aśvin vardhana     brahman stoma gṛtsamada kṛ     tad nṛ juṣ upa yā     bṛhant vad vidatha su vīra 
      somāpūṣan janana rayi     janana div janana pṛthivī     jan viśva bhuvana gopa     deva kṛ amṛta nābhi     idam deva jan juṣ     idam tamas guh ajuṣṭa     idam indra pakva āma antar     somāpūṣan jan usriyā     somāpūṣan rajas vimā     saptan cakra ratha a viśvaminva     viṣūvṛt manas yuj     tad jinv vṛṣan pañcan raśmi     div anya sadana kṛ uccā     pṛthivī anya adhi antarikṣa     tad mad puru vāra purukṣu     rai poṣa vi sā nābhi mad     viśva anya bhuvana jan     viśva anya abhicakṣ i     somāpūṣan av dhī mad     tvad viśva pṛtanā ji     dhī pūṣan jinv viśvaminva     rayi soma rayi pati dhā     av devī aditi anarvan     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      vāyu yad tvad sahasrin     ratha tad ā gam     niyutvat soma pīti     niyutvat vāyu ā gam     idam śukra yam tvad     gam su gṛha     śukra adya gavāśir     indra vāyu niyutvat     ā yā pā nṛ     idam tvad mitrāvaruṇa     su soma ṛtāvṛdh     mad id iha śru hava     rājan an abhidruh     dhruva sadas uttama     sahasra sthūṇa ās     tad samrāj ghṛta āsuti     āditya dānu pati     sac anavahvara     gomat u su nāsatya     aśvāvat yā aśvin     vartis rudra nṛpāyya     na yad paras na antare     ādhṛṣ vṛṣaṇvasu     duḥśaṃsa martya ripu     tad mad ā vah aśvin     rayi piśaṅga saṃdṛś     dhiṣṇya varivas vid     indra aṅga mahat bhaya     abhi as apa cyu     tad hi sthira vicarṣaṇi     indra ca mṛḍay mad     na mad paścāt agha naś     bhadra bhū mad puras     indra āśā pari     sarva abhaya kṛ     ji śatru vicarṣaṇi     viśva deva ā gam     śru mad idam hava     ā idam barhis ni sad     tīvra tvad madhumat idam     śunahotra matsara     etad pā kāmya     indra jyeṣṭha marut gaṇa     deva pūṣan rāti     viśva mad śru hava     ambitamā nadītamā     devitamā sarasvatī     apraśasta iva as     praśasti ambā mad kṛ     tvad viśva sarasvatī     śri āyus devī     śunahotra mad     prajā devī diś mad     idam brahman sarasvatī     juṣ vājinīvat     yad tvad manman gṛtsamada ṛtāvan     priya deva hu     pre yajña śambhu     tvad id ā vṛ     agni ca havyavāhana     div mad pṛthivī idam     sidhra adya divispṛś     yajña deva yam     ā tvad upastha adruh     deva sad yajñiya     iha adya soma pīti 
      kanikrad janus prabrū     ṛch vāc aritṛ iva nau     su maṅgala ca śakuni bhū     mā tvad kaścit abhibhā viśvyā vid     mā tvad śyena ud vadh mā suparṇa     mā tvad vid iṣumat vīra astṛ     pitrya anu pradiś kanikrad     su maṅgala bhadra vādin vad iha     ava krand dakṣiṇatas gṛha     su maṅgala bhadra vādin śakunti     mā mad stena īś mā agha śaṃsa     bṛhant vad vidatha su vīra 
      pradakṣiṇit abhi gṛ kāru     vi vad ṛtuthā śakunti     ubh vāc vad sāman gā iva     gāyatra ca traiṣṭubha ca anu rāj     udgātṛ iva śakuni sāman gā     brahman putra iva savana śaṃs     vṛṣan iva vājin śiśumat apī     sarvatas mad śakuni bhadra ā vad     viśvatas mad śakuni puṇya ā vad     āvad tvad śakuni bhadra ā vad     tūṣṇīm ās sumati cit mad     yat utpat vad karkari yathā     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra    soma mad tavas vaś agni    vahni kṛ vidatha yaj    deva acchā dīdī yuj adri    śamāy agni tanū juṣ    prāñc yajña kṛ vṛdh gir    samidh agni namas duvasy    div śās vidatha kavi    gṛtsa cit tavas gātu iṣ    mayas dhā medhira pū dakṣa    div su bandhu janus pṛthivī    vid u darśata ap antar    deva agni apas svasṛ    vardhay subhaga saptan yahvī    śveta jan aruṣa mahitva    śiśu na jan abhi ṛch aśvā    deva agni janiman vapuṣy    śukra aṅga rajas ātan    kratu pū kavi pavitra    śocis vas pari āyus ap    śrī mā bṛhat anūna    vraj ā sīm an ad adabdha    div yahvī a vas a nagna    sana atra yuvati sa yoni    eka garbha dhā saptan vāṇī    stṛ idam saṃhan u viśva rūpa    ghṛta yoni sravatha madhu    sthā atra dhenu pinv    mahī dasma mātṛ samyañc    bhṛ sūnu sahas vi dyut    dhā śukra rabhasa vapus    ścut dhārā madhu ghṛta    vṛṣan yatra vṛdh kāvya    pitṛ cit ūdhas janus vid    vi idam dhārā sṛj vi dhenā    guhā car sakhi śiva    div yahvī na guhā bhū    pitṛ ca garbha janitṛ ca bhṛ    puru eka dhā pyā    vṛṣan sapatnī śuci sabandhu    ubh idam manuṣya ni pā    uru mahat anibādha vṛdh    ap agni yaśas sam hi puru    ṛta yoni śī damūnas    jāmi agni apas svasṛ    akra na babhri samitha mahī    didṛkṣeya sūnu bhāṛjīka    ud usriyā janitṛ yad jan    ap garbha nṛtama yahva agni    ap garbha darśata oṣadhi    vana jan subhaga virūpa    deva cit manas sam hi gam    paniṣṭha jan tavas duvasy    bṛhat id bhānu bhāṛjīka    agni sac vidyut na śukra    guhā iva vṛdh sadas sva antar    apāra ūrva amṛta duh    īḍ ca tvad yaj havis    īḍ sakhī tva sumati nikāma    deva avas mā sam jaritṛ    rakṣ ca mad damya anīka    upakṣetṛ tvad su praṇīti    agni viśva dhanya dhā    su retas śravas tuj    abhi as pṛtanāyu a deva    ā deva bhū ketu agni    mandra viśva kāvya vid    prati marta vāsay damūnas    anu deva rathira yā sādh    ni duroṇa amṛta martya    rājan sad vidatha sādh    ghṛta pratīka urviyā vi dyut    agni viśva kāvya vid    ā mad gam sakhya śiva    mahat mahi ūti saraṇy    mad rayi bahula saṃtarutra    su vāc bhāga yaśas kṛ mad    etad tvad agni janiman sana    pra pūrvya nūtana vac    mahat vṛṣan savana kṛ idam    janman janman nidhā jātavedas    janman janman nidhā jātavedas    viśvāmitra indh ajasra    tad mad sumati yajñiya    api bhadra saumanasa as    idam yajña sahasāvat tvad mad    devatrā dhā sukratu rā    pra yam hotṛ bṛhatī iṣ mad    agni mahi draviṇa ā yaj    iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go    śaśvattama hvā sādh    as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan    agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad 
     vaiśvānara dhiṣaṇā ṛtāvṛdh    ghṛta na pū agni jan    dvitā hotṛ manus ca vāghant    dhī ratha na kuliśa sam ṛch    tad rocay janus rodas ubh    tad mātṛ bhū putra īḍ    havyavah agni ajara canohita    dūḍabha viś atithi vibhāvasu    kratu dakṣa tarus vidharman    deva agni janay citti    ruc bhānu jyotis mah    atya na vāja san upa brū    ā mandra san vareṇya    vṛ ahraya vāja ṛgmiya    rāti bhṛgu uśij kavi kratu    agni rāj divya śocis    agni sumna dhā puras jana    vāja śravas iha vṛj barhis    yam sruc su ruc viśvadevya    rudra yajña sādh iṣṭi apas    pāvaka śoci tvad hi kṣaya pari    hotṛ yajña vṛj barhis nṛ    agni duvas iṣ āpya    upās draviṇa dhā tad    ā rodas pṛṇ ā svar mahat    jan yat enad apas dhāray    tad adhvara pari nī kavi    atya na vāja sāti canohita    namasy havyadāti su adhvara    duvasy damya jātavedas    rathī ṛta bṛhat vicarṣaṇi    agni deva bhū purohita    tri yahva samidh parijman    agni pū uśij amṛtyu    tad eka dhā martya bhuj    u loka u dvi upa jāmi i    viś kavi viśpati mānuṣa iṣ    sam sīm kṛ svadhiti na tij    tad udvat nivat yā veviṣ    tad garbha idam bhuvana dhṛ    tad jinv jaṭhara prajan    vṛṣan citra nānad na siṃha    vaiśvānara pṛthu pājas amartya    vasu ratna day vi dāś    vaiśvānara pratnathā nāka āruh    div pṛṣṭha bhand su manman    sa pūrvavat janay jantu dhana    samāna ajma pari i jāgṛvi    ṛtāvan yajñiya vipra ukthya    ā yad dhā mātariśvan div kṣaya    tad citra yāma hari keśa ī    su dīti agni suvita navyas    śuci na yāman iṣira svar dṛś    ketu div rocana sthā uṣarbudh    agni mūrdhan div apratiṣkuta    tad ī namas vājin bṛhat    mandra hotṛ śuci a dvayāvin    damūnas ukthya viśvacarṣaṇi    ratha na citra vapuṣa darśata    manus hita sadam id rai ī 
     vaiśvānara pṛthu pājas vip    ratna vidh dharuṇa gā    agni hi deva amṛta duvasy    atha dharma sanatā na duṣ    antar dūta rodas dasma ī    hotṛ niṣad manus purohita    kṣaya bṛhat pari bhūṣ div    deva agni iṣ dhiyāvasu    ketu yajña vidatha sādhana    vipra agni mahay citti    apas yad adhi saṃdhā gir    tad sumna yaj ā kan    pitṛ yajña asura vipaścit    vimāna agni vayuna ca vāghant    ā viś rodasī bhūri varpas    puru priya bhand dhāman kavi    candra agni candra ratha hari vrata    vaiśvānara apsuṣad svar vid    vigāha tūrṇi taviṣī āvṛ    bhūrṇi deva iha su śrī    agni deva manus ca jantu    tan yajña puru peśas dhī    rathī antar ī sādh iṣṭi    jīra damūnas abhiśasti cātana    agni jṛ su apatya āyu    ūrj pinv sam iṣ dīdī mad    vayas jinv bṛhat ca jāgṛ    uśij deva as su kratu vip    viśpati yahva atithi nṛ sadā    yantṛ dhī uśij ca vāghant    adhvara cetana jātavedas    pra śaṃs namas jūti vṛdh    vibhāvan deva su raṇa pari kṣiti    agni bhū śavas sumat ratha    tad vrata bhūri poṣin mad    upa bhūṣ dama ā suvṛkti    vaiśvānara tvad dhāman ā kan    yad svar vid bhū vicakṣaṇa    jan āpṛṇ bhuvana rodasī    agni tad viśva paribhū as tman    vaiśvānara daṃsanā bṛhat    ri eka su apasyā kavi    ubh pitṛ mahay jan    agni dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri retas 
     samidh samidh sumanas bhū mad    śuc śuc sumati rā vasu    ā deva deva yajatha vah    sakhi sakhi sumanas yaj agni    yad deva tris ahar āyaj    diva diva varuṇa mitra agni    tad idam yajña madhumat kṛ mad    tanūnapāt ghṛta yoni vidh    pra dīdhiti viśva vāra gā    hotṛ iḍ prathama yaj    acchā namas vṛṣabha vand    tad deva yaj iṣay yajīyas    ūrdhva tvad gātu adhvara kṛ    ūrdhva śocis prasthā rajas    div vā nābhi ni sad hotṛ    stṛ deva vyacas vi barhis    saptan hotra manas vṛ    inv viśva prati i ṛta    nṛ peśas vidatha pra jan    abhi idam yajña vi car puru    ā bhand uṣas upāka    uta smi tanū virūpa    yathā mad mitra varuṇa juṣ    indra marutvat uta vā mahas    daivya hotṛ prathama ni ṛj    saptan pṛkṣa svadhā mad    ṛta śaṃs ṛta id tad ah    anu vrata vrata pā dhī    ā bhāratī bhāratī sajoṣas    iḍā deva manuṣya agni    sarasvatī sārasvata arvāk    tri devī barhis ā idam sad    tad mad turīpa adha poṣayitnu    deva tvaṣṭṛ vi rā sā    yatas vīra karmaṇya su dakṣa    yuj grāvan jan deva kāma    vanaspati ava sṛj upa deva    agni havis śamitṛ sūday    tad id u hotṛ satyatara yaj    yathā deva janiman vid    ā yā agni samindh arvāñc    indra deva sa ratha tura    barhis mad ās aditi su putra    svāhā deva amṛta māday 
     prati agni uṣas cekit    budh vipra padavī kavi    pṛthu pājas devay samindh    apa dvāra tamas vahni vṛ    pra id u agni vṛdh stoma    gir stotṛ namasya uktha    puru ṛta saṃdṛś kan    sam dūta dyut uṣas viroka    dhā agni mānuṣa viś    ap garbha mitra ṛta sādh    ā haryata yajata sānu sthā    bhū u vipra hu mati    mitra agni bhū yat samindh    mitra hotṛ varuṇa jātavedas    mitra adhvaryu iṣira damūnas    mitra sindhu uta parvata    pā priya rip agra pada vi    pā yahva caraṇa sūrya    pā nābhi saptan śīrṣan agni    pā deva upamāda ṛṣva    ṛbhu kṛ īḍ cāru nāma    viśva deva vayuna vid    sasa carman ghṛtavat pada vi    tad id agni rakṣ aprayucchat    ā yoni agni ghṛtavat sthā    pṛthu pragāṇa vaś vaś    dīdī śuci ṛṣva pāvaka    punar punar mātṛ navyas kṛ    sadyas jan oṣadhī vakṣ    yadi vṛdh prasū ghṛta    ap iva pravat śubh    uruṣy agni pitṛ upastha    ud u stu samidh yahva dyut    varṣman div adhi nābhi pṛthivī    mitra agni īḍ mātariśvan    dūta vah yajatha deva    ud stambh samidh nāka ṛṣva    agni bhū uttama rocana    yadi bhṛgu pari mātariśvan    guhā as havyavāha samindh    iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go    śaśvattama hvā sādh    as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan    agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad 
     pra kāru manana vañc    devadryañc nī devay    dakṣiṇāvah vājin prāñc i    havis bhṛ agni ghṛtācī    ā rodas pṛ jan    uta pra ric adha nu prayajyu    div cit agni mahina pṛthivī    vañc tvad vahni saptan jihvā    div ca tvad pṛthivī yajñiya    ni hotṛ sāday dama    yadi viś mānuṣa devay    prayasvat īḍ śukra arcis    mahat sadhastha dhruva ā niṣad    antar div māhina hary    āskra sapatnī ajara amṛkta    sabardugha urugāya dhenu    vrata tvad agni mahat maha    tvad kratu rodas ā tan    tvad dūta bhū jan    tva nī vṛṣabha carṣaṇi    ṛta vā keśin yogyā    ghṛtasnu rohita dhur dhā    atha ā vah deva deva viśva    su adhvara kṛ jātavedas    div cit ā tvad rucay roka    uṣas vibhā anu bhā puru    apas yat agni uśadhak vana    hotṛ mandra panay deva    uru vā yad antarikṣa mad    div vā yad rocana as deva    ūma vā yad su hava yajatra    āyam rathī agni aśva    ā idam agni sa ratha yā arvāñc    nānā ratha vā vibhu hi aśva    patnīvat triṃśat tri ca deva    anuṣvadham ā vah māday    tad hotṛ yad rodas cit urvī    yajña yajña abhi vṛdh gṛ    prāñc adhvara iva sthā sumeka    ṛtāvan ṛta jan satya    iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go    śaśvattama hvā sādh    as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan    agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad 
     pra yad ṛch śiti pṛṣṭha dhāsi    ā mātṛ viś saptan vāṇī    parikṣi pitṛ sam car    pra sarsṛ dīrgha āyus prayakṣ    divakṣas dhenu vṛṣan aśvā    deva ā sthā madhumat vah    ṛta tvad sadas kṣemayat    pari eka car vartani go    ā sīm ruh su yama bhū    pati cit rayi vid rayi    pra nīla pṛṣṭha atasa dhāsi    tad vāsay purudhā pratīka    mahi tvāṣṭra ūrjay ajurya    stabhūy vahat vah    vi aṅga dyut sadhastha    eka iva rodas ā viś    jñā vṛṣan aruṣa śeva    uta bradhna śāsana raṇ    divoruc su ruc ruc    iḍā yad gaṇya māhina gir    uta u pitṛ pravid anu ghoṣa    mahas mahat nī śūṣa    ukṣan ha yatra pari dhāna aktu    anu sva dhāman jaritṛ vakṣ    adhvaryu pañcan saptan vipra    priya rakṣ nidhā pada vi    prāñc mad ukṣan ajurya    deva deva anu hi vrata gā    daivya hotṛ prathama ni ṛj    saptan pṛkṣa svadhā mad    ṛta śaṃs ṛta id tad ah    anu vrata vrata pā dhī    vṛṣāy mah atya puru    vṛṣan citra raśmi su yāma    deva hotṛ mandratara cit    mah deva rodas ā iha vah    pṛkṣa prayaj draviṇas su vāc    su ketu uṣas revat vas    uta u cit agni mahina pṛthivī    kṛ cit enas sam mah daśasy    iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go    śaśvattama hvā sādh    as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan    agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad 
     añj tvad adhvara devay    vanaspati madhu daivya    yat ūrdhva sthā draviṇa iha dhā    yat vā kṣi mātṛ idam upastha    samindh śri purastāt    brahman van ajara su vīra    āre mad amati bādh    ud śri mahat saubhaga    ud śri vanaspati    varṣman pṛthivī adhi    su miti mā    varcas dhā yajña vāhas    yuvan su vāsas parivye āgā    tad u śreyas bhū jan    tad dhīra kavi ud nī    su ādhī manas devay    jan jan su su dina dina tvad    samarya ā vidatha vṛdh    pū dhīra apas manīṣā    deva yā vipra ud ṛch vāc    yad tvad nṛ devay nimi    vanaspati svadhiti vā takṣ    tad deva svaru sthā    prajāvat mad didhiṣ ratna    yad vraśc adhi kṣam    nimā yam sruc    tad mad vī vārya    devatrā kṣetrasādhas    āditya rudra vasu su nītha    dyāvākṣam pṛthivī antarikṣa    sajoṣas yajña av deva    ūrdhva kṛ adhvara ketu    haṃsa iva śreṇiśas yat    śukra vas svaru mad āgā    unnī kavi purastāt    deva deva api i pāthas    śṛṅga iva id śṛṅgin sam dṛś    caṣālavat svaru pṛthivī    vāghant vā vihava śruṣ    mad av pṛtanājya    vanaspati śata valśa vi ruh    sahasra valśa vi mad ruh    yad tvad idam svadhiti tij    praṇī mahat saubhaga 
     sakhi tvad vṛ    deva marta ūti    ap napāt subhaga su dīditi    su pratūrti anehas    kan vana tvad    yat mātṛ gam ap    na tad tvad agni pramṛṣ nivartana    yat dūra as iha bhū    ati tṛṣṭa vakṣ    atha eva su manas as    pra pra anya i pari anya ās    yad sakhya as śri    i ati sridh    śaśvat ati saścant    anu īṃ vid nicira adruh    ap siṃha iva śri    sṛ iva tman    agni itthā tirodhā    ā enad nī mātariśvan parāvat    deva math pari    tad tvad marta grah    deva havya vāhana    viśva yat yajña abhipā mānuṣa    tvad kratu yaviṣṭhya    tad bhadra tvad daṃsanā    pāka cit chaday    tvad yat agni paśu samās    samindh apiśarvara    ā hu su adhvara    śīra pāvaka śocis    āśu dūta ajira pratna īḍ    śruṣṭi deva sapary    tri śata tri sahasra agni    triṃśat ca deva navan ca sapary    ukṣ ghṛta stṛ barhis idam    āt id hotṛ ni sāday 
      tvad agni manīṣin     samrāj carṣaṇi     deva marta indh     sam adhvara     tvad yajña ṛtvij     agni hotṛ īḍ     gopā ṛta dīdī     sva dama     tad gha yad tvad dāś     samidh jātavedas     tad agni dhā su vīrya     tad puṣ     tad ketu adhvara     agni deva ā gam     añj saptan hotṛ     haviṣmat     pra hotṛ pūrvya vacas     agni bhṛ bṛhat     vip jyotis bhṛ     na vedhas     agni vṛdh mad gir     yatas jan ukthya     mah vāja draviṇa darśata     agni yajiṣṭha adhvara     deva devay yaj     hotṛ mandra vi rāj     ati sridh     tad mad pāvaka dīdī     dyumat mad su vīrya     bhū stotṛ antama     svasti     tad tvad vipra vipanyu     jāgṛ sam indh     havyavāha amartya     sahas vṛdh 
      agni hotṛ purohita     adhvara vicarṣaṇi     tad vid yajña ānuṣak     tad havyavah amartya     uśij dūta canohita     agni dhī sam ṛch     agni dhī tad cit     ketu yajña pūrvya     artha hi idam taraṇi     agni sūnu sana śru     sahas jātavedas     vahni deva kṛ     adābhya puraetṛ     viś agni mānuṣa     tūrṇi ratha sadā nava     sah viśva abhiyuj     kratu deva amṛkta     agni tuvi śravastama     abhi prayas vāhas     dāś aś martya     kṣaya pāvaka śocis     pari viśva sudhita     agni aś manman     vipra jātavedas     agni viśva vārya     vāja san     tvad deva er 
      indra agni ā gam suta     gir nabhas vareṇya     idam pā dhī iṣ     indra agni jaritṛ sacā     yajña gā cetana     idam pā idam suta     indra agni kavicchad     yajña jūti vṛ     tad soma iha tṛp     tośa vṛtra han hvā     sa jitvan aparājita     indra agni vāja sātama     pra tvad arc ukthin     nīthāvid jaritṛ     indra agni iṣ ā vṛ     indra agni navati pur     dāsa patnī dhū     sākam eka karman     indra agni apas pari     upa pra i dhīti     ṛta pathyā anu     indra agni taviṣa tvad     sadhastha prayas ca     tvad aptūrya dhā     indra agni rocana div     pari vāja bhūṣ     tad tvad cit pra vīrya 
      pra tvad deva agni     barhiṣṭha arc idam     gam deva ā tad mad     yajiṣṭha barhis ā sad     ṛtāvan yad rodas     dakṣa sac ūti     haviṣmant tad īḍ     tad san av     tad yantṛ vipra idam     tad yajña atha hi tad     agni tad tvad duvasy     dā yad van magha     tad mad śarman vīti     agni yam śaṃtama     yatas mad pruṣ vasu     div kṣiti ap ā     dīdī apūrvya     vasu idam dhīti     ṛkvan agni indh     hotṛ viśpati viś     uta mad brahman av     uktha devahūtama     śam mad śuc marut vṛdha     agni sahasra sātama     nu u mad rā sahasravat     tokavat puṣṭimat vasu     dyumat agni su vīrya     varṣiṣṭha an upakṣi 
      ā hotṛ mandra vidatha sthā     satya yajvan kavitama tad vedhas     vidyut ratha sahas putra agni     śociṣkeśa pṛthivī pājas śri     yam tvad namaukti juṣ     ṛtāvan tvad cit sahasvat     vid ā vah vid ni sad     madhya ā barhis ūti yajatra     dru tvad uṣas vājay     agni vāta pathyā acchā     yat sīm añj pūrvya havis     ā vandhur iva sthā duroṇa     mitra ca tvad varuṇa sahasvat     agni viśva marut sumna arc     yat śocis sahas putra sthā     abhi kṣiti prathay sūrya nṛ     mad tvad adya rā hi kāma     uttāna hasta namas upasad     yajiṣṭha manas yaj deva     a sridh manman vipra agni     tvad hi putra sahas vi puru     deva i ūti vi vāja     tvad dā sahasrin rayi mad     adrogha vacas satya agni     tvad dakṣa kavi kratu yad idam     deva marta adhvara kṛ     tvad viśva su ratha budh     sarva tad agni amṛta svad iha 
      vi pājas pṛthu śośuc     bādh dviṣ rakṣas amīvā     su śarman bṛhat śarman as     agni mad su hava praṇīti     tvad mad idam uṣas vyuṣṭi     tvad sūra udi bhū gopā     janman iva nitya tanaya juṣ     stoma mad agni tanū su jan     tvad nṛ cakṣas vṛṣabha anu puru     kṛṣṇa agni aruṣa vi bhā     vasu nī ca pṛ ca ati aṃhas     kṛ mad rai uśij yaviṣṭha     aṣāḍha agni vṛṣabha dīdī     pur viśva saubhaga ā saṃji     yajña nī prathama pāyu     jātavedas bṛhat su praṇīti     acchidra śarman jaritṛ puru     deva acchā dīdī sumedhas     ratha na sasni abhi vah vāja     agni tvad rodas mad sumeka     pra pyā vṛṣabha jinv vāja     agni tvad rodas mad su dogha     deva deva su ruc ruc     mā mad marta durmati pari sthā     iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go     śaśvattama hvā sādh     as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan     agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad 
      idam agni su vīrya     īś mah saubhaga     rai īś su apatya gomat     īś vṛtra hatha     idam nṛ marut sac vṛdh     yad rai śevṛdha     abhi yad as pṛtanā dūḍhī     viśvāhā śatru ādabh     tad tvad mad rai śā     mīḍhvas agni su vīrya     tuvi dyumna varṣiṣṭha prajāvat     anamīva śuṣmin     cakri yad viśva bhuvana abhi sāsahi     cakri deva ā duvas     ā deva yat ā su vīrya     ā śaṃsa uta nṛ     mā mad agni amati     mā a vīra tā radh     mā a go tā sahas putra mā nid     apa dveṣas ā kṛ     śak vāja subhaga prajāvat     agni bṛhat adhvara     sam rai bhūyas sṛj mayobhu     tuvi dyumna yaśasvat 
      samindh prathama anu dharma     sam aktu añj viśva vāra     śociṣkeśa ghṛta nirṇij pāvaka     su yajña agni yajatha deva     yathā yaj hotra agni pṛthivī     yathā div jātavedas cit     eva idam havis yaj deva     manuṣvat yajña pra tṛ idam adya     tri āyus tvad jātavedas     tri ājāni uṣas tvad agni     tad deva avas yaj vid     atha bhū yaj śam yos     agni su dīti su dṛś gṛ     namasy tvad īḍ jātavedas     tvad dūta arati havyavāha     deva kṛ amṛta nābhi     yad tvad hotṛ pūrva agni yajīyas     dvitā ca sattṛ svadhā ca śambhu     tad anu dharman pra yaj cit     atha mad dhā adhvara deva vīti 
      bhū mad agni sumanas upeti     sakhi iva sakhi pitṛ iva sādhu     puru druh hi kṣiti jana     prati pratyañc dah arāti     tap u su agni antara amitra     tap śaṃsa a rā para     tap u vasu cit a cit     vi tvad sthā ajara ayās     idhma agni iṣ ghṛta     hu havya taras bala     yāvat īś brahman vand     idam dhī śata seya deva     ud śocis sahas putra stu     bṛhat vayas śam dhā     revat agni viśvāmitra śam yos     marmṛj tvad tanū bhūri kṛtvas     kṛ ratna su sanitṛ dhana     tad gha id agni bhū yat samindh     stotṛ duroṇa subhaga revat     sṛpra karasna dhā vapus 
      agni hotṛ pra vṛ miyedha     gṛtsa kavi viśva vid amūra     tad mad yaj devatāti yajīyas     rai vāja van magha     pra tvad agni haviṣmat ṛch     acchā su dyumna rātin ghṛtāñc     pradakṣiṇit devatāti vṛ     sam rāti vasu yajña śri     tad tejīyas manas tvota     uta śikṣ su apatya śikṣu     agni rai nṛtama prabhūti     bhū tvad suṣṭuti ca vasu     bhūri hi tvad dhā anīka     agni deva yajyu jana     tad ā vah devatāti yaviṣṭha     śardhas yat adya divya yaj     yat tvad hotṛ añj miyedha     niṣāday yajatha deva     tad tvad mad agni av iha bhū     adhi śravas dhā mad tanū 
      agni uṣas aśvin dadhikrā     vyuṣṭi hvā vahni uktha     su jyotis mad śru deva     sajoṣas adhvara vaś     agni tri tvad vājina tri sadhastha     tri tvad jihvā ṛta jan puru     tri u tvad tanū deva van     tad mad pā gir aprayucchat     agni bhūri tvad jātavedas     deva svadhāvat amṛta nāman     yad ca māyā māyin viśvaminva     tvad puru saṃdhā pracch bandhu     agni netṛ bhaga iva kṣiti     daiva deva ṛtu pā ṛtāvan     tad vṛtra han sanaya viśva vedas     pṛ viśva ati durita gṛ     dadhikrā agni uṣas ca devī     bṛhaspati savitṛ ca deva     aśvin mitrāvaruṇa bhaga ca     vasu rudra āditya iha hvā 
      idam mad yajña amṛta dhā     idam havya jātavedas juṣ     stoka agni medas ghṛta     hotṛ prāś prathama niṣad     ghṛtavat pāvaka tvad     stoka ścut medas     sva dharman deva vīti     śreṣṭha mad dhā vārya     tvad stoka ghṛtaścut     agni vipra santya     ṛṣi śreṣṭha sam indh     yajña prāvitṛ bhū     tvad ścut adhrigu śacīvat     stoka agni medas ghṛta     kavi śaṃs bṛhat bhānu gā     havya juṣ medhira     ojiṣṭha tvad madhya medas udbhṛ     pra tvad mad dā     ścut tvad vasu stoka adhi tvac     prati tad devaśas vī 
      idam tad agni yad soma indra     su dhā jaṭhara vaś     sahasrin vāja atya na sapti     san as stu jātavedas     agni yad tvad div varcas pṛthivī     yad oṣadhī ap ā yajatra     yad antarikṣa uru ātan     tveṣa tad bhānu arṇava nṛ cakṣas     agni div arṇa acchā gā     acchā deva vac dhiṣṇya yad     yad rocana parastāt sūrya     yad ca avastāt upasthā ap     purīṣya agni     prāvaṇa sajoṣas     juṣ yajña adruh     anamīva iṣ mahi     iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go     śaśvattama hvā sādh     as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan     agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad 
      nirmath sudhita ā sadhastha     yuvan kavi adhvara praṇī     jṛ agni ajara vana     atra ā dhā amṛta jātavedas     math bhārata revat agni     devaśravas devavāta su dakṣa     agni vi paś bṛhat abhi rai     iṣ mad nī bhū anu div     daśan kṣip pūrvya sīm jan     su jan mātṛ priya     agni stu daivavāta devaśravas     yad jana as vaśin     ni tvad dhā vara ā pṛthivī     iḍā pada su dina tva ahar     dṛṣadvatī mānuṣa āpayā     sarasvatī revat agni dīdī     iḍā agni purudaṃsa sani go     śaśvattama hvā sādh     as mad sūnu tanaya vijāvan     agni tad tvad sumati bhū mad 
      agni sah pṛtanā     abhimāti apās     duṣṭara tṛ arāti     varcas dhā yajña vāhas     agni iḍā sam indh     vītihotra amartya     juṣ su u mad adhvara     agni dyumna jāgṛvi     sahas sūnu āhu     ā idam barhis sad u mad     agni viśva agni     deva mahay gir     yajña yad u cāyu     agni dā dāś rayi     vīravat parīṇas     śā mad sūnumat 
      agni div sūnu as pracetas     tan pṛthivī uta viśva vedas     ṛdhak deva iha yaj ā cit     agni san vīrya vid     san vāja amṛta bhūṣ     tad mad deva ā iha vah purukṣu     agni dyāvāpṛthivī viśvajanya     ā bhā devī amṛta amūra     kṣi vāja puru ścandra namas     agni indra ca dāś duroṇa     sutāvat yajña iha upa yā     amardhat soma peya deva     agni ap sam indh duroṇa     nitya sūnu sahas jātavedas     sadhastha mahay ūti 
      vaiśvānara manas agni nicāy     haviṣmat anuṣatya svar vid     sudānu deva rathira vasūyu     gir raṇva kuśika hvā     tad śubhra agni av hvā     vaiśvānara mātariśvan ukthya     bṛhaspati manus devatāti     vipra śrotṛ atithi raghuṣyad     aśva na krand jani sam indh     vaiśvānara kuśika yuga yuga     tad mad agni su vīrya su aśvya     dhā ratna amṛta jāgṛvi     pra i vāja taviṣī agni     śubh sammiśla pṛṣatī yuj     bṛhadukṣ marut viśva vedas     pra vepay parvata adābhya     agni śrī marut viśvakṛṣṭi     ā tveṣa ugra avas i mad     tad svānin rudriya varṣa nirṇij     siṃha na heṣa kratu sudānu     vrāta vrāta gaṇa gaṇa su śasti     agni bhāma marut ojas i     pṛṣat aśva anavabhra rādhas     gam yajña vidatha dhīra     agni as janman jātavedas     ghṛta mad cakṣus amṛta mad āsan     arka tri dhātu rajas vimā     ajasra gharma havis as nāma     tri pavitra pū hi arka     hṛd mati jyotis anu prajñā     varṣiṣṭha ratna kṛ svadhā     āt id dyāvāpṛthivī pari paś     śata dhārā utsa a kṣi     vipaścit pitṛ vaktva     meḍi mad pitṛ upastha     tad rodas pṛ satya vāc 
      pra tvad vāja abhidyu     haviṣmat ghṛtācī     deva gā sumnayu     īḍ agni vipaścit     giri yajña sādhana     śruṣṭīvan dhitāvan     agni śak tvad mad     yam deva vājin     ati dveṣas tṛ     samindh adhvara     agni pāvaka īḍ     śociṣkeśa tad i     pṛthu pājas amartya     ghṛta nirṇij su āhu     agni yajña havyavah     tad sabādh yam sruc     itthā dhī yajñavat     ā kṛ agni ūti     hotṛ deva amartya     purastāt i māyā     vidatha pracoday     vājin vāja dhā     adhvara pra nī     vipra yajña sādhana     dhī kṛ vareṇya     bhūta garbha ā dhā     dakṣa pitṛ tan     ni tvad dhā vareṇya     dakṣa iḍā sahaskṛta     agni su dīti uśij     agni yantur ap tura     ṛta yoga     vipra vāja sam indh     ūrj napāt adhvara     dīdī upa div     agni īḍ kavi kratu     īḍ namasya     tiras tamas darśata     sam agni indh vṛṣan     vṛṣa agni sam indh     aśva na deva vāhana     tad haviṣmat īḍ     vṛṣan tvad mad vṛṣan     vṛṣan sam indh     agni dīdī bṛhat 
      agni juṣ mad havis     puroḍāś jātavedas     prātaḥsāva dhiyāvasu     puroḍāś agni pacata     tvad vā gha pariṣkṛ     tad juṣ yaviṣṭhya     agni vī puroḍāś     āhu tiroahnya     sahas sūnu as adhvara dhā     mādhyaṃdina savana jātavedas     puroḍāś iha kavi juṣ     agni yahva tvad bhāgadheya     na pra mī vidatha dhīra     agni tṛtīya savana hi kan     puroḍāś sahas sūnu āhu     atha deva adhvara vipanyayā     dhā ratnavat amṛta jāgṛvi     agni vṛdh āhuti     puroḍāś jātavedas     juṣ tiroahnya 
      as idam adhimanthana     as prajanana kṛ     etad viś patnī ā bhṛ     agni math pūrvathā     araṇi nidhā jātavedas     garbha iva sudhita garbhiṇī     diva diva īḍ jāgṛ     haviṣmat manuṣya agni     uttāna ava bhṛ cit     sadyas pravye vṛṣan jan     aruṣa stūpa ruśat idam pājas     iḍā putra vayuna jan     iḍā tvad pada mad     nābhi pṛthivī adhi     jātavedas ni dhā     agni havya vah     math nṛ kavi advayat     pracetas amṛta su pratīka     yajña ketu prathama purastāt     agni nṛ janay su śeva     yadi math bāhu vi ruc     aśva na vājin aruṣa vana ā     citra na yāman aśvin a nivṛ     pari vṛj aśman tṛṇa dah     jan agni ruc cekit     vājin vipra kavi śaṃs sudānu     yad deva īḍ viśva vid     havyavāha dhā adhvara     sad hotṛ sva u loka cit     sāday yajña sukṛta yoni     devāvī deva havis yaj     agni bṛhat yaj vayas dhā     kṛ dhūma vṛṣan sakhi     a sridh i vāja acchā     idam agni pṛtanāṣāh su vīra     yad deva sah dasyu     idam tvad yoni ṛtviya     yatas jan ruc     tad jñā agni ā sad     atha ā mad vardhay gir     tanūnapāt vac garbha āsura     narāśaṃsa bhū yat vijan     mātariśvan yat mā mātṛ     vāta sarga bhū sarīman     sunirmatha nirmath     sunidha nidhā kavi     agni su adhvara kṛ     deva devay yaj     jan amṛta martya     asreman taraṇi vīḍu jambha     daśan svasṛ agru samyañc     puṃs jan abhi sam rabh     pra saptan hotṛ sanaka ruc     mātṛ upastha yat śuc ūdhas     na ni miṣ suraṇa diva diva     yat asura jaṭhara jan     amitrāyudh marut iva prayā     prathama jā brahman viśva id vid     dyumnavat brahman kuśika er     eka eka dama agni sam indh     yat adya tvad pre yajña idam     hotṛ cit vṛ iha     dhruva yaj dhruva uta śam     prajñā vid upa yā soma 
      iṣ tvad somya sakhi     su soma dhā prayas     titikṣ abhiśasti jana     indra tvad ā kaścana hi praketa     na tvad dūra parama cit rajas     ā tu pra yā harivat hari     sthira vṛṣan savana kṛ idam     yuj grāvan samindh agni     indra su śiprā maghavan tarutra     mahat vrāta tuvikūrmi ṛghāvat     yad ugra dhā bādh martya     kva tya tvad vṛṣabha vīrya     tvad hi sma ā cyāvay acyuta     eka vṛtra car han     tvad dyāvāpṛthivī parvata     anu vrata nimā iva sthā     uta abhaya puruhūta śravas     eka dṛḍha vad vṛtrahan as     idam cit indra rodas apāra     yat saṃgrah maghavan kāśi id tvad     pra su u tvad indra pravat hari     pra tvad vajra pramṛ i śatru     hā pratyañc anvañc parāñc     viśva satya kṛ viṣ as     yad dhāyu dhā martya     a bhaj cit bhaj gehya tad     bhadra tvad indra sumati ghṛtāñc     sahasra dāna puruhūta rāti     saha dānu puruhūta kṣi     ahasta indra sam piṣ kuṇāru     abhi vṛtra vṛdh piyāru     a pāda indra tavas han     ni sāmana iṣira indra bhūmi     mah apāra sadana sad     stambh div vṛṣabha antarikṣa     ṛṣ ap tvad iha prasū     alātṛṇa vala indra vraja go     purā hantu bhī vi ṛch     su ga pathin kṛ niraj go     prāv vāṇī puruhūta dham     eka dvi vasumat samyañc     indra ā prā pṛthivī uta div     uta antarikṣa abhi mad samīka     iṣ rathī sayuj śūra vāja     diś sūrya na mī pradiś     diva diva haryaśva prasū     sam yat naś adhvan āt id aśva     vimocana kṛ tad tu idam     didṛkṣ uṣas yāman aktu     vivasvat mahi citra anīka     viśva jñā mahi yat āgā     indra karman su kṛ puru     mahi jyotis nidhā vakṣaṇā     āma pakva car bhṛ go     viśva svādman sambhṛ usriyā     yat sīm indra dhā bhojana     indra dṛh yāma kośa bhū     yajña śikṣ gṛ sakhi     durmāyu dureva martya     niṣaṅgin ripu han     sam ghoṣa śru avama amitra     hā ni idam aśani tapiṣṭha     vraśc īṃ adhastāt vi ruj sah     hā rakṣas maghavan randhay     ud vṛh rakṣas saha mūla indra     vraśc madhya prati agra śṛ     ā kīvat salalūka kṛ     brahman dviṣ tapuṣi heti as     svasti vājin ca praṇetṛ     sam yat mahi iṣ āsad puru     rai vantṛ bṛhat as     mad as bhaga indra prajāvat     ā mad bhṛ bhaga indra dyumat     ni tvad deṣṇa dhā prareka     ūrva iva prath kāma mad     tad ā pṛṇ vasu pati vasu     idam kāma manday go aśva     candravat rādhas prath ca     svaryu mati tvad vipra     indra vāhas kuśika kṛ     ā mad gotra dardar gopati go     sam mad sani i vāja     divakṣas as vṛṣabha satya śuṣma     mad su maghavan bhū go dā     śuna hvā maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vāja sāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      śās vahni duhitṛ naptī gā     vid ṛta dīdhiti sapary     pitṛ yatra duhitṛ seka ṛj     sam śagmya manas dhanv     na jāmi tānva riktha ric     kṛ garbha sanitṛ nidhāna     yadi mātṛ janay vahni     anya kṛ su kṛt anya ṛdh     agni jan juhū rej     mah putra aruṣa prayakṣ     mahat garbha mahi ā jāta idam     mah pravṛdh haryaśva yajña     abhi jaitra sac spṛdh     mahi jyotis tamas niḥ jñā     tad jñā prati ud i uṣa     pati go bhū eka indra     vīḍu as abhi dhīra tṛd     prāñc hi manas saptan vipra     viśva vid pathyā ṛta     prajñā id tad namas viś     vid yadi saramā rugṇa adri     mahi pāthas pūrvya sadhryañc kṛ     agra nī su padin akṣara     acchā rava prathama jñā gā     gam u vipratama sakhīy     sūday su kṛt garbha adri     san marya yuvan makhasy     atha bhū aṅgiras sadyas arc     as as pratimāna purobhū     viśva vid janiman han śuṣṇa     pra mad div padavī gavyu arc     sakhi sakhi muc niḥ avadya     ni gavyat manas sad arka     kṛ amṛta tva gātu     idam cit nu sadana bhūri idam     yad māsa siṣās ṛta     saṃpaś mad abhi sva     payas pratna retas duh     vi rodasī tap ghoṣa idam     jan niṣṭhā dhā go vīra     tad jan vṛtrahan tad id u havya     ud usriyā sṛj indra arka     uruvyañc idam ghṛtavat bhṛ     madhu svādman duh jenya go     pitṛ cit kṛ sadana sam idam     mahi tviṣīmat su kṛt vi hi khyā     viṣkambh skambhana ā janitrī     ās ūrdhva rabhasa vi mi     mah yadi dhiṣaṇā śiśnatha dhā     sadyovṛdh vibhu rodasī     gir yad anavadya samyañc     viśva indra taviṣī anutta     mahi ā tvad sakhya vaś śakti     ā vṛtra han niyut i puru     mahi stotra avas āgam sūri     mad su maghavan bhū gopā     mahi kṣetra puru ścandra vid     āt id sakhi caratha sam īr     indra nṛ jan dīdī     sākam sūrya uṣas gātu agni     ap cit etad vibhu damūnas     pra sadhryañc sṛj viśva ścandra     madhu pū kavi pavitra     div hi aktu dhanutṛ     anu kṛṣṇa vasudhiti hā     ubh sūrya maṃhanā yajatra     pari yat tvad mahiman vṛj     sakhi indra kāmya ṛjipya     pati bhū vṛtrahan sūnṛtā     gir viśvāyu vṛṣabha vayodhas     ā mad gam sakhya śiva     mahat mahi ūti saraṇy     tad aṅgirasvat namas sapary     navya kṛ sanyas purājā     druh vi yā bahula a deva     svar ca mad maghavan sāti dhā     mih pāvaka pratan bhū     svasti mad pṛ pāra idam     indra tvad rathira pā mad riṣ     makṣū makṣū kṛ go jit mad     dediś vṛtrahan go pati go     antar kṛṣṇa aruṣa dhāman gā     pra sūnṛtā diś ṛta     dvār ca viśva vṛ apa sva     śuna hvā maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vāja sāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      indra soma soma pati pā idam     mādhyaṃdina savana cāru yad tvad     prapruth śiprā maghavan ṛjīṣin     vimuc hari iha māday     gavāśir manthin indra śukra     pā soma rā tvad mada     brahman kṛt māruta gaṇa     sajoṣas rudra tṛp ā vṛṣ     yad tvad śuṣma yad taviṣī vṛdh     arc indra marut tvad ojas     mādhyaṃdina savana vajrahasta     pā rudra sa gaṇa su śiprā     tad id nu idam madhumat vip     indra śardhas marut yad as     yad vṛtra iṣay vid     amarman man marman     manuṣvat indra savana juṣ     pā soma śaśvat vīrya     tad ā vṛt haryaśva yajña     saraṇyu ap arṇa sṛ     tvad ap yat ha vṛtra han     atya iva prasṛj sṛ āji     śī indra car vadha     vṛ pari deva a deva     yaj id namas vṛdh indra     bṛhat ṛṣva ajara yuvan     yad priya mā yajñiya     na rodas mahiman mā     indra karman su kṛ puru     vrata deva na mī viśva     dhṛ yad pṛthivī div uta idam     jan sūrya uṣas su daṃsas     adrogha satya tvad tad mahitva     sadyas yat jan pā ha soma     na div indra tavas tvad ojas     na aha na māsa śarad vṛ     tvad sadyas pā jan indra     mada soma parama vyoman     yat ha dyāvāpṛthivī āviś     atha bhū pūrvya kāru dhāyas     han ahi pariśī arṇas     ojāy tuvi jan tavyas     na tvad mahitva anu bhū adha div     yat anya sphigī kṣā vas     yajña hi tvad indra vardhana bhū     uta priya su soma miyedha     yajña yajña av yajñiya as     yajña tvad vajra ahi hatya av     yajña indra avas kṛ arvāk     ā enad sumna navyas vṛt     yad stoma vṛdh pūrvya     yad madhyama uta nūtana     viṣ yat mad dhiṣaṇā jan     stu purā pārya indra ahar     aṃhas yatra pṛ yathā mad     nau iva yā ubhaya hvā     āp￞ idam kalaśa svāhā     sektṛ iva kośa sic pā     sam u priya āvṛt mada     pradakṣiṇit abhi soma indra     na tvad gabhīra puruhūta sindhu     na adri pari as vṛ     itthā sakhi iṣay yat indra     ā dṛḍha cit ruj gavya ūrva     śuna hvā maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      pra parvata vaś upastha     aśvā iva viṣita hā     go iva śubhra mātṛ rih     vipāś śutudrī payas jū     indra iṣay prasava bhikṣ     acchā samudra rathya iva yā     samṛch ūrmi pinv     anya tvad anya api i śubhra     acchā sindhu mātṛtama yā     vipāś uru subhaga gam     vatsa iva mātṛ saṃrih     samāna yoni anu saṃcar     enā mad payas pinv     anu yoni deva kṛ car     na vṛ prasava sarga tak     kiṃyu vipra nadī johav     ram mad vacas somya     ṛtāvan upa muhūrta eva     pra sindhu acchā bṛhat manīṣā     avasyu hvā kuśika sūnu     indra mad rad vajra bāhu     apahan vṛtra paridhi nadī     deva nī savitṛ su pāṇi     tad mad prasava yā uru     pravac śaśvadhā vīrya tad     indra karman yat ahi vivraśc     vi vajra pariṣad han     e ap ayana iṣ     etad vacas jaritṛ mā api mṛṣ     ā yad tvad ghuṣ uttara yuga     uktha kāru prati mad juṣ     mā mad ni kṛ puruṣatrā namas tvad     ā u su svasṛ kāru śru     yā tvad dūra anas ratha     ni su nam bhū su pāra     adhoakṣa sindhu srotyā     ā tvad kāru śru vacas     yā dūra anas ratha     ni tvad nam pyā iva yoṣā     marya iva kanyā tvad     yat aṅga tvad bharata saṃtṛ     gavyat grāma iṣay indra jū     aha prasava sarga tak     ā tvad vṛ sumati yajñiya     tṛ bharata gavyu sam     bhaj vipra sumati nadī     pra pinv iṣay su rādhā     ā vakṣaṇā pṛṇ yā śībham     ud tvad ūrmi śamyā han     ap yoktra muc     mā a duṣkṛt vyenas     aghnya śūna ārch 
      indra pūrbhid ātṛ dāsa arka     vidadvasu day vi śatru     brahman jū tanū vṛdh     bhūri dātra āpṛṇ rodas ubh     makha tvad taviṣa pra jūti     ṛch vāc amṛta bhūṣ     indra kṣiti as mānuṣa     viś daiva uta pūrva yāvan     indra vṛtra vṛ śardha nīti     pra māyin mī varpaṇīti     han vyaṃsa uśadhak vana     āvis dhenā kṛ rāmyā     indra svarṣā janay ahar     ji uśij pṛtanā abhiṣṭi     prarocay manu ketu ahar     vid jyotis bṛhat raṇa     indra tuj barhaṇā ā viś     nṛ vat dhā narya puru     cetay dhī idam jaritṛ     pra idam varṇa tṛ śukra idam     mah maha panay idam     indra karman su kṛ puru     vṛjana vṛjina sam piṣ     māyā dasyu abhibhūti ojas     yudh indra mahan varivas kṛ     deva satpati carṣaṇi prā     vivasvant sadana idam tad     vipra uktha kavi gṛ     satrāsāh vareṇya sahas dā     san svar ap ca deva     san yad pṛthivī div uta idam     indra mad anu dhīraṇa     san atya uta sūrya san     indra san purubhojas go     hiraṇyaya uta bhoga san     han dasyu pra ārya varṇa av     indra oṣadhi san ahar     vanaspati san antarikṣa     bhid vala nud vivāc     atha bhū dam abhikratu     śuna hvā maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      sthā hari ratha ā yuj     yā vāyu na niyut mad acchā     pā andhas abhisṛj mad     indra svāhā rā tvad mada     upa ajira puruhūta sapti     hari ratha dhur ā yuj     dru yathā sambhṛta viśvatas cit     upa idam yajña ā vah indra     upa u nī vṛṣan tapuṣpā     uta īṃ av tvad vṛṣabha svadhāvat     gras aśva vi muc iha śoṇa     diva diva sadṛśa ad dhānā     brahman tvad brahman yuj yuj     hari sakhi sadhamāda āśu     sthira ratha sukha indra adhiṣṭhā     prajñā vid upa yā soma     mā tvad hari vṛṣaṇa vīta pṛṣṭha     ni ram yaj anya     ati āyā śaśvat mad tvad     aram su kṛ soma     tvad idam soma tvad e arvāñc     śaśvattama sumanas idam pā     idam yajña barhis ā niṣad     dhā idam jaṭhara indu indra     stṛ tvad barhis su indra soma     kṛ dhānā ad tvad hari     tad oka puru śāka vṛṣan     marutvant tvad rā havis     idam nṛ parvata tvad ap     sam indra go madhumat kṛ     tad āgam sumanas ṛṣva pā     prajñā vid pathyā anu sva     yad ābhaj marut indra soma     yad tvad vṛdh bhū gaṇa tvad     tad etad sajoṣas vaś     agni pā jihvā soma indra     indra pā svadhā cit suta     agni vā pā jihvā yajatra     adhvaryu vā pre śakra hasta     hotṛ vā yajña havis juṣ     śuna hvā maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      idam u su prabhṛti sāti dhā     śaśvat śaśvat ūti yād     suta suta vṛdh vardhana     yad karman mahat su śru bhū     indra soma pradiv vid     ṛbhu yad vṛṣan parvan vihāyas     prayam prati su gṛbhāy     indra pā vṛṣan dhū vṛṣan     pā vṛdh tvad gha su     indra soma prathama uta idam     yathā pā pūrvya indra soma     eva pā panya adya navīyas     mahat amatra vṛjana virapśin     ugra śavas pat dhṛṣṇu ojas     na aha vyac pṛthivī cana enad     yat soma haryaśva mad     mahat ugra vṛdh vīrya     samākṛ vṛṣabha kāvya     indra bhaga vāja dā idam go     pra jan dakṣiṇā idam puru     pra yat sindhu prasava yathā i     ap samudra rathyā iva gam     atas cit indra sadas varīyas     yat īṃ soma pṛṇ duh aṃśu     samudra sindhu yād     indra soma suṣuta bhṛ     aṃśu duh hastin bharitra     madhu pū dhārā pavitra     hrada iva kukṣi soma dhāna     sam ī vyac savana puru     anna yat indra prathama vi aś     vṛtra han vṛ soma     ā tu bhṛ mākir etad pari sthā     vid hi tvad vasu pati vasu     indra yad tvad māhina dattra as     mad tad haryaśva pra yam     mad pra yam maghavan ṛjīṣin     indra rai viśva vāra bhūri     mad śata śarad jīv dhā     mad vīra śaśvat indra śiprin     śuna hu maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      vārtrahatya śavas     pṛtanāṣāhya ca     indra tvad vartay     arvācīna su tvad manas     uta cakṣus śatakratu     indra kṛ vāghant     nāman tvad śatakratu     viśva gir ī     indra abhimātiṣāhya     puruṣṭuta dhāman     śata mahay     indra carṣaṇī dhṛt     indra vṛtra han     puruhūta upa brū     bhara vājasāti     vāja sāsahi bhū     tvad ī śatakratu     indra vṛtra han     dyumna pṛtanājya     pṛtsutur śravas ca     indra sah abhimāti     śuṣmintama mad ūti     dyumnin pā jāgṛvi     indra soma śatakratu     indriya śatakratu     yad tvad jana pañcan     indra tad tvad ā vṛ     gam indra śravas bṛhat     dyumna dhā duṣṭara     ud tvad śuṣma tṛ     arvāvat mad ā gam     atho śakra parāvat     u loka yad tvad adrivat     indra iha tatas ā gam 
      abhi taṣṭṛ iva dhī manīṣā     atya na vājin sudhura hā     abhi priya marmṛś para     kavi iṣ saṃdṛś sumedhas     ina uta pracch janiman kavi     manodhṛt su kṛt takṣ div     idam u tvad praṇī vṛdh     manas van adha nu dharman gam     ni sīm id atra guhya dhā     uta kṣatra rodas sam añj     sam mātrā mā yam urvī     antar mahī samṛch dhāyas dhā     āsthā pari viśva bhūṣ     śrī vas car sva rocis     mahat tad vṛṣan asura nāman     viśva rūpa amṛta sthā     sū pūrva vṛṣabha jyāyas     idam idam śurudh as puru     div napāt vidatha dhī     kṣatra rājan pradiv dhā     tri rājan vidatha puru     pari viśva bhūṣ sadas     paś atra manas gam     vrata gandharva api vāyu keśa     tad id nu idam vṛṣabha dhenu     ā nāman mā sakmya go     anya anya asurya vas     ni māyin mā rūpa idam     tad id nu idam savitṛ nakir mad     hiraṇyaya amati yad śri     ā suṣṭuti rodas viśvaminva     api iva yoṣā janiman vṛ     tvad pratna sādh mah yad     daiva svasti pari mad as     gopā jihvā sthā virūpa     viśva paś māyin kṛta     śuna hu maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      indra mati hṛd ā vañc     acchā pati stoma takṣ gā     yad jāgṛvi vidatha śaṃs     indra yad tvad jan vid tad     div cit ā pūrvya jan     vi jāgṛvi vidatha śaṃs     bhadra vastra arjuna vas     tad idam mad sana jā pitrya dhī     yama cit atra yama sū sū     jihvā agra pat as hi sthā     vapus jan mithuna sac     tamas han tapus budhna e     nakir idam nind martya     yad mad pitṛ go yodha     indra idam dṛṃhitṛ māhināvat     ud gotra sṛj daṃsanāvat     sakhi ha yatra sakhi navagva     abhijñu ā satvan go anugam     satya tad indra daśan daśagva     sūrya vid tamas kṣi     indra madhu sambhṛ usriyā     padvat vid śaphavat nama go     guhā dhā guh guh ap     hasta dhā dakṣiṇa dakṣiṇāvat     jyotis vṛ tamas vijñā     āre as durita abhīka     idam gir soma pā soma vṛdh     juṣ indra purutama kāru     jyotis yajña rodas anu as     āre as durita bhūri     bhūri cit hi tuj martya     su pāra vasu barhaṇāvat     śuna hvā maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      indra tvad vṛṣabha mad     su soma hvā     tad pā madhu andhas     indra kratu vid su     soma hary puruṣṭuta     pā vṛṣ tātṛpi     indra pra mad dhitāvan     yajña viśva deva     tṛ stu viśpati     indra soma su idam     tvad pra i satpati     kṣaya candra indu     dhā ā jaṭhara su     soma indra vareṇya     tvad dyukṣa indu     girvaṇas pā mad suta     madhu dhārā añj     indra tvādāta id yaśas     abhi dyumna vanin     indra sac akṣita     pā soma vṛdh     arvāvat mad ā gam     parāvat ca vṛtrahan     idam juṣ mad gir     yat antarā parāvat     arvāvat ca hvā     indra iha tatas ā gam 
      ā tu mad indra madryañc     hvā soma pīti     hari yā adrivat     sad hotṛ mad ṛtviya     stṛ barhis ānuṣak     yuj prātar adri     idam brahman brahman vāhas     kṛ ā barhis sad     vī śūra puroḍāś     ran savana mad     idam stoma vṛtrahan     uktha indra girvaṇas     mati soma pā uru     rih śavas pati     indra vatsa na mātṛ     tad mand hi andhas     rādhas tanū mah     na stotṛ nid kṛ     mad indra tvāyu     haviṣmat jṛ     uta tvad asmayu vasu     mā āre mad vi muc     hari priya arvāñc yā     indra svadhāvat mad iha     arvāñc tvad sukha ratha     vah indra keśin     ghṛta snu barhis āsad 
      upa mad su ā gam     soma indra gavāśir     hari yad tvad asmayu     tad indra mada ā gam     gam grāvan su     kuvid nu idam tṛp     indra itthā gir mad     acchā gā iṣay itas     āvṛt soma pīti     indra soma pīti     stoma iha hvā     uktha kuvid āgam     indra soma su idam     tad dhā śatakratu     jaṭhara vājinīvasu     vid hi tvad dhanaṃjaya     vāja dadhṛṣ kavi     adha tvad sumna ī     idam indra gavāśir     yava āśir ca mad pā     āgam vṛṣan suta     tvad id indra sva okya     soma cud pā     etad ran tvad hṛd     tvad suta pīti     pratna indra hvā     kuśika avasyu 
      ā yā arvāñc upa vandhureṣṭhā     tvad id anu pradiv soma peya     priya sakhi vi muc upa barhis     tvad idam havya vāh hvā     ā yā puru ati carṣaṇi     ari āśis upa mad hari     idam hi tvad mati stoma takṣ     indra hvā sakhya juṣ     ā mad yajña namas vṛdh sajoṣas     indra deva hari yā tūya     mad hi tvad mati johav     ghṛta prayas sadhamāda madhu     ā ca tvad etad vṛṣan vah     hari sakhi su dhur su aṅga     dhānāvat indra savana juṣ     sakhi sakhi śru vandana     kuvid mad gopā kṛ jana     kuvid rājan maghavan ṛjīṣin     kuvid mad ṛṣi pā suta     kuvid mad vasu amṛta śikṣ     ā tvad bṛhat hari yuj     arvāk indra sadhamād vah     pra yad dvitā div ṛj ātā     su sammṛj vṛṣabha mūra     indra pā vṛṣan dhū vṛṣan     ā yad tvad śyena vaś bhṛ     yad mada cyāvay pra kṛṣṭi     yad mada apa gotra vṛ     śuna hvā maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      idam tvad as haryata     soma ā hari su     juṣ indra hari mad ā gam     ā sthā harit ratha     hary uṣas arcay     sūrya hary rocay     vid cit haryaśva vṛdh     indra viśva abhi śrī     div indra hari dhāyas     pṛthivī hari varpas     dhāray harit bhūri bhojana     yad antar hari car     jan harita vṛṣan     viśva ā bhā rocana     haryaśva harita dhā āyudha     ā vajra bāhu hari     indra hary arjuna     vajra śukra abhivṛ     apāvṛ hari adri su     ud go hari āj 
      ā mandra indra hari     yā mayūra roman     mā tvad kaścit ni yam vi na pāśin     ati dhanvan iva tad i     vṛtra khāda valaṃruja     pur darma ap aja     sthātṛ ratha hari abhisvara     indra dṛḍha cit āruja     gambhīra udadhi iva     kratu puṣ go iva     pra su gopā yavasa dhenu yathā     hrada kulyā iva aś     ā mad tuj rayi bhṛ     aṃśa na pratijñā     vṛkṣa pakva phala aṅkin iva dhū     indra sampāraṇa vasu     svayu indra svarāj as     smaddiṣṭi sva yaśastara     tad vṛdh ojas puruṣṭuta     bhū mad su śravastama 
      yudhma tvad vṛṣabha svarāj     ugra yuvan sthavira ghṛṣvi     a jṛ vajrin vīrya     indra śru mahat maha     mahat as mahiṣa vṛṣṇya     dhana spṛt ugra sah anya     eka viśva bhuvana rājan     tad yodhay ca kṣayay ca jana     pra mātrā ric ruc     pra deva viśvatas apratīta     pra majman div indra pṛthivī     pra uru mah antarikṣa ṛjīṣin     uru gabhīra janus abhi ugra     viśva vyacas avata mati     indra soma pradiv su     samudra na sravat ā viś     yad soma indra pṛthivī div     garbha na mātṛ bhṛ tvāyā     tad tad hi tad u tad mṛj     adhvaryu vṛṣabha pā u 
      marutvat indra vṛṣabha raṇa     pā soma anuṣvadham mada     ā sic jaṭhara madhu ūrmi     tvad rājan as pradiv suta     sajoṣas indra sa gaṇa marut     soma pā vṛtrahan śūra vid     han śatru apa mṛdh nud     atha abhaya kṛ viśvatas mad     uta ṛtu ṛtu pā pā soma     indra deva sakhi su mad     yad ābhaj marut yad tvad anu     han vṛtra dhā tvad ojas     yad tvad ahi hatya maghavan vṛdh     yad śāmbara harivat yad gaviṣṭi     yad tvad nūnam anumad vipra     pā indra soma sa gaṇa marut     marutvat vṛṣabha vṛdh     a kavāri divya śās indra     viśvāsah avas nūtana     ugra sahas dā iha tad hvā 
      sadyas ha jan vṛṣabha kanīna     prabhṛ av andhas su     sādhu pā pratikāma yathā tvad     rasa āśir prathamam somya     yad jan tad ahar idam kāma     aṃśu pīyūṣa pā giriṣṭhā     tad tvad mātṛ pari yoṣā janitrī     mah pitṛ dama āsic agra     upasthā mātṛ anna tigma     tigma paś abhi soma ūdhas     prayāvay car gṛtsa anya     maha kṛ purudhā pratīka     ugra turāṣāh abhibhūti ojas     yathāvaśam tanū kṛ etad     tvaṣṭṛ indra janus abhibhū     adas ā soma pā camū     śuna hu maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      śaṃs mahat indra yad viśva     ā kṛṣṭi soma pā kāma vye     yad su kratu dhiṣaṇā vibhvan takṣ     ghana vṛtra janay deva     yad nu nakir pṛtanā svarāj     dvitā tṛ nṛtama hariṣṭhā     inatama satvan yad ha śūṣa     pṛthu jrayas mī āyus dasyu     sahāvan pṛt taraṇi na arvan     vyānaśin rodas mehanāvat     bhaga na kāra hu mati     pitṛ iva cāru su hava vayodhas     dhartṛ div rajas pracch ūrdhva     ratha na vāyu vasu niyutvat     kṣap vas jan sūrya     vibhaj bhāga dhiṣaṇā iva vāja     śuna hu maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      indra svāhā pā yad soma     āgam tumra vṛṣabha marutvat     ā uru vyacas pṛ idam anna     ā idam havis tanū kāma ṛdh     ā tvad saparyu javas yuj     yad anu pradiv śruṣṭi av     iha tvad dhā hari su śiprā     pā tu idam suṣuta cāru     go mimikṣu dhā su pāra     indra jyaiṣṭhya dhāyas gṛ     mad soma pā ṛjīṣin     sam mad purudhā go iṣaṇy     idam kāma manday go aśva     candravat rādhas prath ca     svaryu mati tvad vipra     indra vāhas kuśika kṛ     śuna hu maghavan indra     idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti     śru ugra ūti samad     han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
      carṣaṇī dhṛt maghavan ukthya     indra gir bṛhatī abhi nū     vṛdh puruhūta suvṛkti     amartya jṛ diva diva     śatakratu arṇava śākina nṛ     gir mad indra upa i viśvatas     vāja sani pur bhid tūrṇi ap tura     dhāmasāc abhiṣāc svar vid     ākara vasu jaritṛ panasy     an ehas stubh indra duvasy     vivasvant sadana ā hi prī     satrāsāh abhimāti han stu     nṛ u tvad nṛtama gir uktha     abhi pra vīra arc sabādh     sam sahas puru māyā hā     namas idam pradiv eka īś     puru idam niṣṣidh martya     puru vasu pṛthivī bhṛ     indra div oṣadhī uta ap     rayi rakṣ jīri vana     tvad brahman gir indra tvad     satrā dhā harivat juṣ     bhū āpi avas nūtana     sakhi vasu jaritṛ vayas dhā     indra marutvat iha pā soma     yathā śāryāta pā suta     tvad praṇīti tvad śūra śarman     ā vivās kavi su yajña     tad vaś iha pā soma     marut indra sakhi su mad     jan yat tvad pari deva bhūṣ     mah bhara puruhūta viśva     aptūrya marut āpi etad     mad indra anu dāti vāra     tad sākam pā vṛtra khāda     su soma dāś sva sadhastha     idam hi anu ojas     su rādha pati     pā tu idam girvaṇas     yad tvad anu svadhā as     suta ni yam tanū     tad tvad mad somya     pra tvad aś kukṣi     pra indra brahman śiras     pra bāhu śūra rādhas 
      dhānāvat karambhin     apūpavat ukthin     indra prātar juṣ mad     puroḍāś pacatya     juṣ indra ā gur ca     tvad havya sṛ     puroḍāś ca mad ghas     joṣay gir ca mad     vadhūyu iva yoṣaṇā     puroḍāś sana śru     prātaḥsāva juṣ mad     indra kratu hi tvad bṛhat     mādhyaṃdina savana dhānā     puroḍāś indra kṛ iha cāru     pra yat stotṛ jaritṛ tūrṇi artha     vṛṣāy upa gir īḍ     tṛtīya dhānā savana puruṣṭuta     puroḍāś āhu mah mad     ṛbhumat vājavat tvad kavi     prayasvat upa śikṣ dhīti     pūṣaṇvat tvad kṛ karambha     harivat haryaśva dhānā     apūpa ad sa gaṇa marut     soma pā vṛtrahan śūra vid     prati dhānā bhṛ tūya idam     puroḍāś vīratama nṛ     diva diva sadṛśa indra tvad     vṛdh tvad soma peya dhṛṣṇu 
      indrāparvata bṛhat ratha     vāma iṣ ā vah su vīra     vī havya adhvara deva     vṛdh gir iḍā mad     sthā su kaṃ maghavan mā parā gā     soma nu tvad suṣuta yaj     pitṛ na putra sic ā rabh tvad     indra svādiṣṭha gir śacīvat     śaṃs adhvaryu prati mad gṛ     indra vāhas kṛ juṣ     ā idam barhis yaj sad     atha ca bhū uktha indra śaṃs     jāyā id asta maghavan tad id u yoni     tad id tvad yuj hari vah     yadā kadā ca su soma     agni tvad dūta dhanv acchā     parā yā maghavan ā ca yā     indra bhrātṛ ubhayatra tvad artha     yatra ratha bṛhat nidhāna     vimocana vājin rāsabha     pā soma asta indra pra yā     kalyāṇa jāyā suraṇa gṛha tvad     yatra ratha bṛhant nidhāna     vimocana vājin dakṣiṇāvat     idam bhoja aṅgiras virūpa     div putra asura vīra     viśvāmitra dā magha     sahasra sāva pra tṛ āyus     rūpa rūpa maghavan bobhav     māyā kṛ tanū pari sva     tris yat div pari muhūrta āgā     sva mantra anṛtu pā ṛtāvan     mahat ṛṣi deva jā deva jū     stambh sindhu arṇava nṛ cakṣas     viśvāmitra yat vah sudās     priyāy kuśika indra     haṃsa iva kṛ śloka adri     mad gir adhvara su sacā     deva vipra ṛṣi nṛ cakṣas     vi pā kuśika somya madhu     upa pre kuśika cetay     aśva rai pra muc sudās     rājan vṛtra jaṅghan prāñc apāñc udañc     atha yaj vara ā pṛthivī     yad idam rodas ubh     mad indra stu     viśvāmitra rakṣ     brahman idam bhārata jana     viśvāmitra rā     brahman indra vajrin     kṛ id mad su rādhas     ka tvad kṛ kīkaṭa go     na āśir duh na tap gharma     ā mad bhṛ pramaganda vedas     naicāśākha maghavan randhay mad     sasarparī amati bādh     bṛhat mā jamadagni dā     ā sūrya duhitṛ tan     śravas deva amṛta ajurya     sasarparī bhṛ tūya idam     adhi śravas pāñcajanya kṛṣṭi     tad pakṣya navya āyus dhā     yad mad palasti jamadagni dā     sthira go bhū vīḍu akṣa     mā īṣā vi vṛh mā yuga vi śṛ     indra pātalya dā śṛ     ariṣṭa nemi abhi mad sac     bala dhā tanū mad     bala indra anaḍuh mad     bala toka tanaya jīv     tvad hi bala dā as     abhi vye khadira sāra     ojas dhā spandana śiṃśapā     akṣa vīḍu vīḍay vīḍay     mā yāma idam ava hāpay mad     idam mad vanaspati     mā ca hā mā ca riṣ     svasti ā gṛha     āvas ā vimocana     indra ūti bahula mad adya     yācchreṣṭha maghavan śūra jinv     yad mad dviṣ adhara tad pad     yad u dviṣ tad u prāṇa hā     paraśu cit vi tap     śimbala cit vi vraśc     ukhā cit indra yeṣ     prayasta phena as     na sāyaka cit jana     lodha nī paśu man     na a vājin vājin hāsay     na gardabha puras aśva nī     idam indra bharata putra     apapitva cit na prapitva     hi aśva araṇa na nitya     jyā vāja pari nī āji 
      idam mah vidathya śūṣa     śaśvat kṛtvas īḍ pra bhṛ     śru mad damya anīka     śru agni divya ajasra     mahi mah div arc pṛthivī     kāma mad iṣ car prajñā     yad ha stoma vidatha deva     saparyu māday sacā idam     tvad ṛta rodas satya as     mah su mad suvita pra bhū     idam div namas agni pṛthivī     sapary prayas yā ratna     uta u hi tvad pūrvya āvid     ṛtāvan rodas satyavāc     nṛ cit tvad samitha śūrasāti     vand pṛthivī vevid     ka addhā vid ka iha pra vac     deva acchā pathyā ka sam i     dṛś idam avama sadas     para yad guhya vrata     kavi nṛ cakṣas abhi sīm cakṣ     ṛta yoni vighṛta mad     nānā kṛ sadana yathā vi     samāna kratu saṃvid     samānyā viyu dūreanta     dhruva pada sthā jāgarūka     uta svasṛ yuvatī bhavantī     āt u brū mithuna nāman     viśva id etad janiman sam vyac     mah deva bhṛ na vyath     ej dhruva pat viśva eka     car patatrin viṣuṇa vi jan     sanā purāṇa adhi i ārāt     mah pitṛ janitṛ jāmi tad mad     deva yatra panitṛ eva     uru pathin vyuta sthā antar     idam stoma rodas pra brū     ṛdūdara śru agni jihvā     mitra samrāj varuṇa yuvan     āditya kavi prath     hiraṇya pāṇi savitṛ su jihvā     tris ā div vidatha paty     deva ca savitṛ śloka śri     āt mad ā sū sarvatāti     su kṛt su pāṇi svavat ṛtāvan     deva tvaṣṭṛ avas tad mad dhā     pūṣaṇvat ṛbhu māday     ūrdhva grāvan adhvara takṣ     vidyut ratha marut ṛṣṭimat     div marya ṛta jan ayās     sarasvatī śru yajñiya     dhā rayi saha vīra tura     viṣṇu stoma puru dasma arka     bhaga iva kārin yāman gam     uru krama kakuha yad puru     na mṛdh yuvati janitrī     indra viśva vīrya paty     ubh ā prā rodas mahitva     puraṃdara vṛtrahan dhṛṣṇuṣeṇa     saṃgrah mad ā bhṛ bhūri paśu     nāsatya mad pitṛ bandhu pṛcchā     sajātya aśvin cāru nāman     tvad hi as rayi dā mad rayi     dātra rakṣ akava adabdha     mahat tad tvad kavi cāru nāman     yat ha deva bhū viśva indra     sakha ṛbhu puruhūta priya     idam dhī sāti takṣ mad     aryaman mad aditi yajñiya     a dabh varuṇa vrata     yu mad anapatya gam     prajāvat mad paśumat as gātu     deva dūta purudhā prasū     anāga mad vac sarvatāti     śru mad pṛthivī div uta ap     sūrya nakṣatra uru antarikṣa     śru mad vṛṣan parvata     dhruva kṣema iḍā mad     āditya mad aditi śru     yam mad marut śarman bhadra     sadā su ga pitumat as pathin     madhu deva oṣadhī sam pṛc     bhaga mad agni sakhya na mṛdh     ud rai aś sadana purukṣu     svad havya sam iṣ dīdī     asmadryañc sam mā śravas     viśva agni pṛt tad ji śatru     aha viśva sumanas dīdī mad 
      uṣas pūrva adha yat vivas     mahat vi jan akṣara pada go     vrata deva upa nu prabhūṣ     mahat deva asura tva eka     mā u su mad atra hvṛ deva     mā pūrva agni pitṛ pada jña     purāṇa sadman ketu antar     mahat deva asura tva eka     vi mad purutrā patay kāma     śamī acchā dīdī pūrvya     samindh agni ṛta id vad     mahat deva asura tva eka     samāna rājan vibhṛ purutrā     śī śaya prayuta vana anu     anya vatsa bhṛ kṣi mātṛ     mahat deva asura tva eka     ākṣit pūrva apara anūrudh     sadyas jan taruṇa antar     antarvat sū a pravye     mahat deva asura tva eka     śayu parastāt adha nu dvi mātṛ     bandhana car vatsa eka     mitra tad varuṇa vrata     mahat deva asura tva eka     dvi mātṛ hotṛ vidatha samrāj     anu agra car kṣi budhna     pra raṇya raṇya vāc bhṛ     mahat deva asura tva eka     śūra iva yudh antama     pratīcīna dṛś viśva e     antar mati car niṣṣidh go     mahat deva asura tva eka     ni vevīy palita dūta idam     antar mahat car rocana     vapus bhṛ abhi mad vi cakṣ     mahat deva asura tva eka     viṣṇu gopā parama pā pāthas     priya dhāman amṛta dhā     agni tad viśva bhuvana vid     mahat deva asura tva eka     nānā kṛ yamya vapus     tad anya ruc kṛṣṇa anya     śyāva ca yad aruṣa ca svasṛ     mahat deva asura tva eka     mātṛ ca yatra duhitṛ ca dhenu     sabardugha dhāpay samyañc     ṛta tad sadas īḍ antar     mahat deva asura tva eka     anya vatsa rih mā     ka bhū ni dhā dhenu ūdhas     ṛta tad payas pinv iḍā     mahat deva asura tva eka     padya vas puru rūpa vapus     ūrdhva sthā tryavi rerih     ṛta sadman vi car vid     mahat deva asura tva eka     pada iva nidhā dasma antar     tad anya guhya āvis anya     sadhrīcīna pathyā tad viṣvañc     mahat deva asura tva eka     ā dhenu dhunay aśiśu     sabardugha śaśaya a praduh     navya navya yuvati bhū     mahat deva asura tva eka     yat anya vṛṣabha roro     tad anya yūtha ni dhā retas     tad hi kṣapāvant tad bhaga tad rājan     mahat deva asura tva eka     vīra nu su aśvya jana     pra nu vac vid idam deva     ṣoḍhā yuj pañcan pañcan vah     mahat deva asura tva eka     deva tvaṣṭṛ savitṛ viśva rūpa     puṣ prajā purudhā jan     idam ca viśva bhuvana idam     mahat deva asura tva eka     mahi sam īr camū samyañc     ubh tad idam vasu nyṛṣ     śru vīra vid vasu     mahat deva asura tva eka     idam ca mad pṛthivī viśva dhāyas     upa kṣi hita mitra na
