rājan     puraḥsad śarman sad na vīra     mahat deva asura tva eka     niṣṣidhvan tvad oṣadhī uta ap     rayi tvad indra pṛthivī bhṛ     sakhi tvad vāma bhāj as     mahat deva asura tva eka 
      na tad mī māyin na dhīra     vrata deva prathama dhruva     na rodas adruh vedyā     na parvata ninam sthā     ṣaṣ bhāra eka a car bhṛ     ṛta varṣiṣṭha upa go āgā     tri mahī upara sthā atya     guhā dvi nidhā dṛś eka     tri pājasya vṛṣabha viśva rūpa     uta tri udhan purudhā prajāvat     tri anīka paty māhināvat     tad retodhā vṛṣabha śaśvat     abhīka idam padavī budh     āditya hvā cāru nāman     ap cit idam ram deva     pṛthak vraj pari sīm vṛj     tri sadhastha sindhu tris kavi     uta tri mātṛ vidatha samrāj     ṛtāvan yoṣaṇā tri apya     tris ā div vidatha paty     tris ā div savitṛ vārya     diva diva ā sū tris mad ahar     tri dhātu rai ā sū ā vasu     bhaga trātṛ dhiṣaṇā sāti dhā     tris ā div savitṛ soṣav     rājan mitrāvaruṇa su pāṇi     ap cit idam rodas cit uru     ratna bhikṣ savitṛ sava     tris uttama dūṇaśa rocana     tri rāj asura vīra     ṛtāvan iṣira dūḍabha     tris ā div vidatha as deva 
      pra mad vic vid manīṣā     dhenu car prayuta agopa     sadyas cit yad duh bhūri dhāsi     indra tad agni pan idam     indra su pūṣan vṛṣan su hasta     div na prī śaśaya duh     viśva yat idam raṇay deva     pra tvad atra vasu sumna aś     yad jāmi vṛṣan iṣ śakti     namasy jñā garbha idam     acchā putra dhenu vāś     mahas car bhṛ vapus     acchā vac rodas sumeka     grāvan yuj adhvara manīṣā     idam u tvad manu bhūri vāra     ūrdhva bhū darśata yajatra     yad tvad jihvā madhumat sumedhas     agni deva vac uruvyañc     tad iha viśva avas yajatra     ā sāday pāyay ca madhu     yad tvad agni parvata iva dhārā     sac pyā deva citra     tad mad pramati jātavedas     vasu rā sumati viśvajanya 
      dhenu pratna kāmya duh     antar putra car dakṣiṇā     ā dyotani vah śubhra yāma     uṣas stoma aśvin jāgṛ     su yuj vah prati tvad ṛta     ūrdhva bhū pitṛ iva medha     jṛ mad vi paṇi manīṣā     tvad avas kṛ yā arvāk     su yuj aśva suvṛt ratha     dasra idam śru śloka adri     kim aṅga tvad prati avarti gamiṣṭha     ah vipra aśvin purājā     ā man ā gam kaccit eva     viśva jana aśvin hvā     idam hi tvad go ṛjīka madhu     pra mitra na dā usṛ agra     tiras puru cit aśvin rajas     āṅgūṣa tvad maghavan jana     ā iha yā pathin deva yāna     dasra idam tvad nidhi madhu     purāṇa oka sakhya śiva tvad     tvad nṛ draviṇa jahnāvī     punar kṛ sakhya śiva     madhu mad saha nu samāna     aśvin vāyu tvad su dakṣa     niyut ca sajoṣas yuvan     nāsatya tiroahnya juṣ     soma pā asridh sudānu     aśvin pari tvad iṣ purūcī     i gir yat amṛdhra     ratha ha tvad ṛta jā adri jū     pari dyāvāpṛthivī yā sadyas     aśvin madhuṣuttama yuvāku     soma tad pā ā gam duroṇa     ratha ha tvad bhūri varpas karikṛ     sutāvat niṣkṛta āgamiṣṭha 
      mitra jana yātay brū     mitra dhṛ pṛthivī uta div     mitra kṛṣṭi animiṣa abhi cakṣ     mitra havya ghṛtavat hu     pra tad mitra marta as prayasvat     yad tvad āditya śikṣ vrata     na han na ji tvota     na enad aṃhas aś antitas na dūrāt     anamīva iḍā mad     mitajñu variman ā pṛthivī     āditya vrata upakṣi     mad mitra sumati as     idam mitra namasya su śeva     rājan su kṣatra jan vedhas     tad mad sumati yajñiya     api bhadra saumanasa as     mahat āditya namas upasad     yātay jana gṛ su śeva     tad etad panyatama juṣ     agni mitra havis ā hu     mitra carṣaṇī dhṛt     avas deva sānasi     dyumna citraśravastama     abhi yad mahina div     mitra bhū sa prathas     abhi śravas pṛthivī     mitra pañcan yam     jana abhiṣṭi śavas     tad deva viśva bhṛ     mitra deva āyu     jana vṛj barhis     iṣ iṣ vrata kṛ 
      iha iha tvad manas bandhu tā nṛ     uśij gam abhi tad vedas     yad māyā prati jūti varpas     saudhanvana yajñiya bhāga aś     yad śacī camasa piś     yad dhī go ri carman     yad hari manas nistakṣ     tad deva tva ṛbhu sam aś     indra sakhya ṛbhu sam aś     manu napāt apas dhanv     saudhanvana amṛta tva er     viṣ śamī su kṛt su kṛtyā     indra yā sa ratha suta sacā     atho vaśa bhū saha śrī     na tvad pratimā su kṛ vāghant     saudhanvana ṛbhu vīrya ca     indra ṛbhu vājavat samukṣ     su soma ā vṛṣ gabhasti     dhī iṣay maghavan dāś gṛha     saudhanvana saha mad nṛ     indra ṛbhumat vājavat mad iha mad     idam savana śacī puruṣṭuta     idam tvad svasara yam     vrata deva manus ca dharman     indra ṛbhu vājin vājay iha     stoma jaritṛ upa yā yajñiya     śata keta iṣira āyu     sahasraṇītha adhvara homan 
      uṣas vāja vājin praceta     stoma juṣ gṛ maghavan     purāṇa devī yuvati puraṃdhi     anu vrata car viśva vāra     uṣas devī amartya vi bhā     candra ratha sūnṛtā īray     ā tvad vah su yama aśva     hiraṇya varṇa pṛthu pājas yad     uṣas pratyañc bhuvana viśva     ūrdhva sthā amṛta ketu     samāna artha caraṇīy     cakra iva navyas ā vṛt     ava syūman iva ci maghavan     uṣas yā svasara patnī     svar jan subhaga su daṃsas     ā anta div prath ā pṛthivī     acchā tvad devī uṣas vibhā     pra tvad bhṛ namas suvṛkti     ūrdhva madhu dhā div pājas śri     pra rocana ruc raṇva saṃdṛś     ṛtāvan div arka budh     ā revat rodas citra sthā     e agni uṣas vibhā     vāma i draviṇa bhikṣ     ṛta budhna uṣas iṣaṇy     vṛṣan mah rodas ā viś     mah mitra varuṇa māyā     candra iva bhānu vi dhā purutrā 
      idam u tvad bhṛmi man     yuvāvat na tujya bhū     kva tya indrāvaruṇa yaśas tvad     yad sma sina bhṛ sakhi     idam u tvad purutama rayīyat     śaśvattama avas johav     sa joṣa indrāvaruṇa marut     div pṛthivī śru hava mad     mad tad indrāvaruṇa vasu as     mad rayi marut sarva vīra     mad varūtṛ śaraṇa av     mad hotrā bhāratī dakṣiṇā     bṛhaspati juṣ mad     havya viśvadevya     rā ratna dāś     śuci arka bṛhaspati     adhvara namasy     anāmin ojas ā kan     vṛṣabha carṣaṇi     viśva rūpa adābhya     bṛhaspati vareṇya     idam tvad pūṣan āghṛṇi     suṣṭuti deva navīyas     mad tvad śaṃs     tad juṣ gir mad     vājay av dhī     vadhūyu iva yoṣaṇā     yad viśva abhi vipaś     bhuvana sam ca paś     tad mad pūṣan av bhū     tad savitṛ vareṇya     bhargas deva dhā     dhī yad mad pracoday     deva savitṛ mad     vājay puraṃdhi     bhaga rāti ī     deva nṛ savitṛ     vipra yajña suvṛkti     namasy dhī iṣ     soma gā gātu vid     deva i niṣkṛta     ṛta yoni āsad     soma mad dvipad     catuṣpada ca paśu     anamīva iṣ kṛ     mad āyus vardhay     abhimāti sah     soma sadhastha āsad     ā mad mitrāvaruṇa     ghṛta gavyūti ukṣ     madhu rajas su kratu     uru śaṃsa namas vṛdh     mahan dakṣa rāj     drāghiṣṭha śuci vrata     gṛ jamadagni     yoni ṛta sad     pā soma ṛtāvṛdh    tvad hi agni sadam id samanyu    deva deva arati nyer    iti kratu nyer    amartya yaj martya ā    deva ādeva jan pracetas    viśva ādeva jan pracetas    sa bhrātṛ varuṇa agni ā vṛt    deva acchā sumati yajña vanas    jyeṣṭha yajña vanas    ṛtāvan āditya carṣaṇī dhṛt    rājan carṣaṇī dhṛt    sakhi sakhi abhi ā vṛt    āśu na cakra rathyā iva raṃhi    mad dasma raṃhi    agni mṛḍīka varuṇa sacā vid    marut viśva bhānu    toka tuj śuc śam kṛ    mad dasma śam kṛ    tvad mad agni varuṇa vid    deva heḍas ava yā    yajiṣṭha vahnitama śośuc    viśva dveṣas pra muc mad    tad tvad mad agni avama bhū ūti    nediṣṭha idam uṣas vyuṣṭi    ava yaj mad varuṇa rā    vī mṛḍīka su hava mad as    idam śreṣṭha subhaga saṃdṛś    deva citratama martya    śuci ghṛta na tap aghnyā    spārha deva maṃhanā iva dhenu    tris idam tad parama as satya    spārha deva janiman agni    ananta antar parivye āgā    śuci śukra arya roruc    tad dūta viśva id abhi vaś sadman    hotṛ hiraṇya ratha raṃsu jihvā    rohit aśva vapuṣya vibhāvan    sadā raṇva pitumat iva saṃsad    tad cetay manus yajña bandhu    pra tad mahi raśanā nī    tad kṣi idam durya sādh    deva marta sa dhanin tva āp    tad tu u mad agni nī prajñā    acchā ratna deva bhaj yad idam    dhī yad viśva amṛta kṛ    div pitṛ janitṛ satya ukṣan    tad jan prathama pastyā    mah budhna rajas idam yoni    a pād a śīrṣan guh anta    yoyu vṛṣabha nīḍa    pra śardha ṛch prathamam vipanyā    ṛta yoni vṛṣabha nīḍa    spārha yuvan vapuṣya vibhāvan    saptan priya janay vṛṣan    mad atra pitṛ manuṣya    abhi pra sad ṛta āśuṣ    aśman vraja su dugha vavra antar    ud usrā aj uṣas hvā    tad marmṛj dṛ adri    tad idam anya abhitas vi vac    paśu ayantra abhi kārā arc    vid jyotis kṛp dhī    tad gavyat manas dṛdhra ubh    go yam pari as adri    dṛḍha nṛ vacas daivya    vraja gomat uśij vi vṛ    tad man prathama nāman dhenu    tris saptan mātṛ parama vid    tad jñā abhi nū vrā    āvis bhū aruṇī yaśas go    naś tamas dudhita ruc div    ud deva uṣas bhānu ṛch    ā sūrya bṛhat sthā ajra    ṛju marta vṛjina ca paś    āt id paścā budh vi khyā    āt id ratna dhāray div bhaj    viśva viśva durya deva    mitra dhī varuṇa satya as    acchā vac śuc agni    hotṛ viśva bharas yajiṣṭha    śuci ūdhas tṛd na go    andhas na pū pariṣic aṃśu    viśva aditi yajñiya    viśva atithi mānuṣa    agni deva avas āvṛ    su mṛḍīka bhū jātavedas 
     yad martya amṛta ṛtāvan    deva deva arati nidhā    hotṛ yajiṣṭha mahan śuc    havya agni manus īray    iha tvad sūnu sahas mad adya    jan jan ubhaya antar agni    dūta ī yuj ṛṣva    ṛju muṣka vṛṣan śukra ca    atya vṛdha snu rohita ghṛtasnu    ṛta man manas javiṣṭha    antar ī aruṣa yuj    tvad ca deva viś ā ca marta    aryaman varuṇa mitra idam    indrāviṣṇu marut aśvin uta    su aśva agni su ratha su rādhas    ā id u vah su havis jana    gomat agni avimat aśvin yajña    nṛvat sakhi sadam id apramṛṣya    iḍāvat etad asura prajāvat    dīrgha rayi pṛthu budhna sabhāvat    yad tvad idhma bhṛ svid    mūrdhan vā tap tvāyā    bhū tad svatavas pāyu agni    viśva sīm aghāy uruṣy    yad tvad bhṛ anniy cit anna    niśās mandra atithi udīr    ā devayu indh duroṇa    tad rayi dhruva as dāsvat    yad tvad doṣā yad uṣas praśaṃs    priya vā tvad kṛ haviṣmat    aśva na sva dama ā hemyāvat    tad aṃhas pṛ dāś    yad tvad agni amṛta dāś    duvas tvad kṛ yam sruc    na tad rai śam vi yu    na enad aṃhas pari aghāyu    yad tvad agni adhvara juṣ    deva marta sudhita rā    prī id as hotrā tad yaviṣṭha    as yad vidh vṛdha    citti acitti ci vi vid    pṛṣṭha iva vīta vṛjina ca marta    rai ca mad su apatya deva    diti ca rā aditi uruṣy    kavi śās kavi adabdha    nidhāray durya āyu    atas tvad dṛśya agni etad    pad paś adbhuta ari eva    tvad agni vāghant su praṇīti    su soma vidh yaviṣṭha    ratna bhṛ śam ghṛṣvi    pṛthu ścandra av carṣaṇi prā    adha ha yad mad agni tvāyā    pad hasta kṛ tanū    ratha na kṛ apas bhurij    ṛta yam sudhī āśuṣ    adha mātṛ uṣas saptan vipra    jan prathama vedhas nṛ    div putra aṅgiras bhū    adri ruj dhanin śuc    adha yathā mad pitṛ para    pratna agni ṛta āśuṣ    śuci id i dīdhiti uktha śās    kṣam bhid aruṇī apa vṛ    su karman su ruc devay    ayas na deva janiman dham    śuc agni vṛdh indra    ūrva gavya pariṣad gam    ā yūtha iva kṣumat paśu khyā    deva yat janiman anti ugra    marta cit urvaśī kṛp    vṛdh cit ari upara āyu    kṛ tvad su apas bhū    ṛta vas uṣas vibhā    anūna agni purudhā su ścandra    deva marmṛj cāru cakṣus    etad tvad agni ucatha vedhas    vac kavi tad juṣ    ucchuc kṛ vasyas mad    mah rai puru vāra pra yam 
     ā tvad rājan adhvara rudra    hotṛ satya yaj rodasī    agni purā tanayitnu acitta    hiraṇya rūpa av kṛ    idam yoni kṛ yad mad tvad    jāyā iva pati vaś su vāsas    arvācīna parivye ni    u tvad svapāka pratyañc    a śru a dṛp manman    nṛ cakṣas su mṛḍīka vedhas    deva śasti amṛta śaṃs    grāvan iva sotṛ madhuṣut yad īḍ    tvad cit mad śamī agni idam    ṛta budh ṛta cit svādhī    kadā tvad uktha sadhamādya    kadā bhū sakhya gṛha tvad    kathā ha tad varuṇa tvad agni    kathā div garh ka mad āgas    kathā mitra mīḍhvas pṛthivī    brū ka aryaman ka bhaga    ka dhiṣṇyā vṛdh agni    ka vāta pratavas śubhaṃyā    parijman nāsatya kṣā    brū ka agni rudra nṛ han    kathā mah puṣṭimbhara pūṣan    ka rudra su makha havis dā    ka viṣṇu urugāya retas    brū ka agni śaru bṛhat    kathā śardha marut ṛta    kathā svar bṛhat pracch    prati brū aditi tura    sādh div jātavedas cit    ṛta ṛta niyam īḍ ā go    āma sacā madhumat pakva agni    kṛṣṇa as ruśat dhāsi etad    jāmarya payas pyā    ṛta hi sma vṛṣabha cit añj    puṃs agni payas pṛṣṭhya    a spand car vayodhas    vṛṣan śukra duh pṛśni ūdhas    ṛta adri vi as bhid    sam aṅgiras nū go    śuna nṛ pari sad uṣas    āvis svar bhū jan agni    ṛta deva amṛta amṛkta    arṇas ap madhumat agni    vājin na sarga prastubh    pra sadam id sru dhan    mā ka yakṣa sadam id huras gā    mā veśa pramī mā āpi    mā bhrātṛ agni anṛju ṛṇa vī    mā sakhi dakṣa ripu bhuj    rakṣ mad agni tvad rakṣaṇa    rakṣ su makha prī    prati sphur vi ruj vīḍu aṃhas    hā rakṣas mahi cit vṛdh    idam bhū sumanas agni arka    idam spṛś manman śūra vāja    uta brahman aṅgiras juṣ    sam tvad śasti deva van jṛ    etad viśva vid tvad vedhas    nītha agni niṇya vacas    nivacana kavi kāvya    śaṃs mati vipra uktha 
     kṛ pājas prasiti na pṛthu    yā rājan iva amavat ibha    tṛṣu anu prasiti drū    as as vyadh rakṣas tapiṣṭha    tvad bhrama āśuyā pat    anu spṛś dhṛṣat śośuc    tapus agni juhū pataṃga    a saṃdo vi sṛj viṣvañc ulkā    prati spaś vi sṛj tūrṇitama    bhū pāyu viś idam adabdha    yad mad dūra agha śaṃsa yad anti    agni mākir tvad vyathis ā dhṛṣ    ud agni sthā prati ā tan    ni amitra uṣ tigma heti    yad mad arāti samindh kṛ    nīcā tad dah atasa na śuṣka    ūrdhva bhū prati vyadh adhi mad    āvi kṛ daivya agni    ava sthira tan jāmi    jāmi ajāmi pra mṛ śatru    tad tvad jñā sumati yaviṣṭha    yad īvat brahman gā īr    viśva idam su dina rai    dyumna ari vi dvār abhi dyut    tad id agni as subhaga sudānu    yad tvad nitya havis yad uktha    piprīṣ sva āyus duroṇa    viśva id idam su dina tad as iṣṭi    arc tvad sumati ghuṣ arvāk    sam tvad vāvātā jṛ idam gir    su aśva tvad su ratha marjay    mad kṣatra dhāray anu div    iha tvad bhūri ā car upa tman    doṣā vastṛ dīdī anu div    krīḍ tvad sumanas sap    abhi dyumna sthā jana    yad tvad su aśva su hiraṇya agni    upayā vasumat ratha    tad trā bhū tad sakhi    yad tvad ātithya ānuṣak juṣ    mah ruj bandhu tā vacas    tad mad pitṛ gotama anu i    tvad mad idam vacas cit    hotṛ yaviṣṭha su kratu damūnas    a svapnaj taraṇi su śeva    atandra avṛka aśramiṣṭha    tvad pāyu sadhryañc niṣad    agni tvad mad pā amūra    yad pāyu māmateya tvad agni    paś andha durita rakṣ    rakṣ tad su kṛt viśva vedas    dips id ripu na aha dabh    tvad mad sadhanī tvota    tvad praṇīti aś vāja    ubh śaṃsa sūday satyatāti    anuṣṭhuyā kṛ ahrayāṇa    idam tvad agni samidh vidh    prati stoma śaṃs gṛbhāy    dah aśas rakṣas pā mad    druh nid mitra mahat avadya 
     vaiśvānara mīḍhvas sa joṣa    kathā dāś agni bṛhat bhās    anūna bṛhat vakṣatha    upa stabhāy upamit na rodhas    mā nind yad idam mad rāti    deva dā martya svadhāvat    pāka gṛtsa amṛta vicetas    vaiśvānara nṛtama yahva agni    sāman dvibarhas mahi tigma bhṛṣṭi    sahasra retas vṛṣabha tuviṣmat    pada na go apaguh vid    agni mad pra id u vac manīṣā    pra tad agni bhas tigma jambha    tapiṣṭha śocis yad su rādhas    pra yad mī varuṇa dhāman    priya mitra cit dhruva    a bhrātṛ na yoṣan vī    pati rip na jani dureva    pāpa as anṛta asatya    idam pada jan gabhīra    idam mad agni kiyat pāvaka    a mī guru bhāra na manman    bṛhat dhṛṣ gabhīra    yahva pṛṣṭha prayas saptan dhātu    tad id nu eva samanā samāna    abhi kratu pū dhīti aś    sasa carman adhi cāru pṛśni    agra rup ārupita jabāru    pravac vacas ka mad idam    guhā dhā upa niṇik vad    yad usriyā apa iva vṛ    pā priya rup agra pada vi    idam u tya mahi mah anīka    yad usriyā sac pūrvya go    ṛta pada adhi dīdī    guhā raghuṣyad raghu i vid    adha dyut pitṛ sacā ās    man guh cāru pṛśni    mātṛ pada parama anti as go    vṛṣan śocis prayam jihvā    ṛta vac namas pracch    tvad āśas jātavedas yadi idam    tvad idam kṣi yad ha viśva    div yad u draviṇa yad pṛthivī    ka mad idam draviṇa ka ha ratna    vi mad vac jātavedas cit    guhā adhvan parama yat mad idam    reku pada na nind gam    ka maryādā vayuna ka ha vāma    acchā gam raghu na vāja    kadā mad deva amṛta patnī    svar varṇa tan uṣas    anira vacas phalgva    pratītya kṛdhu atṛpa    adha tad agni ka iha vad    anāyudha ā asat sac    idam śrī samindh vṛṣan    vasu anīka dama ā ruc    ruśat vas sudṛśīka rūpa    kṣiti na rai puru vāra dyut 
     ūrdhva u su mad adhvara hotṛ    agni sthā devatāti yajīyas    tvad hi viśva abhi as manman    pra vedhas cit tṛ manīṣā    amūra hotṛ ni sad viś    agni mandra vidatha pracetas    ūrdhva bhānu savitṛ iva śri    metṛ iva dhūma stabhāy upa div    yam su jūrṇi rātin ghṛtāñc    pradakṣiṇit devatāti vṛ    ud u svaru nava jā na akra    paśu añj sudhita sumeka    stṛ barhis samindh agni    ūrdhva adhvaryu juṣ sthā    pari agni paśu pā na hotṛ    triviṣṭi i pradiv vṛ    pari tman mitadru i hotṛ    agni mandra madhu vacas ṛtāvan    dru idam vājin na śoka    bhī viśva bhuvana yat bhrāj    bhadra tvad agni su anīka saṃdṛś    ghora as viṣuṇa cāru    na yat tvad śocis tamas vṛ    na dhvasman tanū repas ā dhā    na yad sātu jan vṛ    na mātṛ pitṛ nu cit iṣṭi    adha mitra na sudhita pāvaka    agni dīda mānuṣa viś    dvis yad pañcan jan saṃvas    svasṛ agni mānuṣa viś    uṣarbudh atharya na danta    śukra svās paraśu na tigma    tvad tya agni harit ghṛta snā    rohita ṛjvañc svañc    aruṣa vṛṣan ṛju muṣka    ā devatāti hvā dasma    yad ha tya tvad sah ayās    tveṣa agni arci car    śyena na duvasana artha    tuviṣvaṇas māruta na śardhas    kṛ brahman samindh tvad    śaṃs uktha yaj vi ū dhā    hotṛ agni manus ni sad    namasy uśij śaṃsa āyu 
     idam iha prathama dhā dhātṛ    hotṛ yajiṣṭha adhvara īḍ    yad apnavāna bhṛgu viruc    vana citra vibhu viś viś    agni kadā tvad ānuṣak    bhū deva cetana    adha hi tvad grah    marta viś īḍ    ṛtāvan vicetas    paś div iva star    viśva adhvara    haskartṛ dama dama    āśu dūta vivasvant    viśva yad carṣaṇi abhi    ā bhṛ ketu āyu    bhṛgavāṇa viś viś    tad īṃ hotṛ ānuṣak    cit ni sad    raṇva pāvaka śocis    yajiṣṭha saptan dhāman    tad śaśvat mātṛ    vana ā vye a śri    citra as guhā dhā    su veda kūcid arthin    sasa yat viyuti ūdhas    ṛta dhāman raṇay deva    mahat agni namas rā havya    vī adhvara sadam id ṛtāvan    vī adhvara dūtya vid    ubh antar rodas saṃcit    dūta ī pradiv vṛ    viduṣṭara div ārodhana    kṛṣṇa tvad eman ruśat puras bhās    cariṣṇu arcis vapus id eka    yat a pravye dhā ha garbha    sadyas cit jan bhū id u dūta    sadyas jan dṛś ojas    yat idam vāta anuvā śocis    vṛj tigma atasa jihvā    sthira cit anna day vi jambha    tṛṣu yat anna tṛṣu vakṣ    tṛṣu dūta kṛ yahva agni    vāta meḍi sac nijūrv    āśu na vājay hi arvan 
     dūta tvad viśva vedas    havyavāha amartya    yajiṣṭha ṛj gir    tad hi vid vasu dhiti    mahat ārodhana div    tad deva ā iha vah    tad vid deva ānam    deva ṛtāy dama    dā priya cit vasu    tad hotṛ tad id u dūtya    cit antar i    vid ārodhana div    tad as yad agni    dāś havya dāti    yad īṃ puṣ indh    tad rai tad su vīrya    san vi śru    yad agni dhā duvas    mad rai diva diva    sam car puruspṛh    mad vāja īr    tad vipra carṣaṇi    śavas mānuṣa    ati kṣipra iva vyadh 
     agni mṛḍ mahat as    yad īṃ ā devayu jana    i barhis āsad    tad mānuṣa dūḍabha    viś prāvī amartya    dūta viśva bhū    tad sadman pari nī    hotṛ mandra diviṣṭi    uta potṛ ni sad    uta gnā agni adhvara    uta u gṛhapati dama    uta brahman ni sad    vī hi adhvarīy    upavaktṛ jana    havya ca mānuṣa    vī id u idam dūtya    yad juṣ adhvara    havya marta vah    mad juṣ adhvara    mad yajña aṅgiras    mad śru hava    pari tvad dūḍabha ratha    mad aś viśvatas    yad rakṣ dāś 
      agni tad adya     aśva na stoma     kratu na bhadra     ṛdh tvad oha     adha hi agni     kratu bhadra     dakṣa sādhu     rathī ṛta bṛhat bhū     idam mad arka     bhū mad arvāñc     svar na jyotis     agni viśva sumanas anīka     idam tvad adya     gir gṛ     agni dāś     pra tvad div na stanay śuṣma     tvad svādiṣṭha     agni saṃdṛṣṭi     idā cit ahar     idā cit aktu     śrī rukma na ruc upāka     ghṛta na pū     tanū arepas     śuci hiraṇya     tad tvad rukma na ruc svadhāvat     kṛ cit hi sma     sanemi dveṣas     agni i     itthā yaj ṛtāvan     śiva mad sakhya     as bhrātra agni     deva tvad     tad mad nābhi sadana tad ūdhas 
      bhadra tvad agni sahasin anīka     upāka ā ruc sūrya     ruśat dṛś dṛś naktayā cit     arūkṣita dṛś ā rūpa anna     vi sā agni gṛ manīṣā     kha vepas tuvi jan stu     viśva yad van śukra deva     tad mad rā su mahat bhūri manman     tvad agni kāvya tvad manīṣā     tvad uktha jan rādh     tvad i draviṇa vīra peśas     itthā dhī dāś martya     tvad vājin vājambhara vihāyas     abhiṣṭi kṛt jan satya śuṣma     tvad rayi deva jū mayobhu     tvad āśu jū agni arvan     tvad agni prathama devay     deva marta amṛta mandra jihvā     dveṣas yut ā vivās dhī     damūnas gṛha pati amūra     āre mad amati āre aṃhas     āre viśva durmati yat nipā     doṣā śiva sahas sūnu agni     yad deva ā cit sac svasti 
      yad tvad agni indh yam sruc     tris tvad anna kṛ tad ahar     tad su dyumna abhi as prasah     tvad kratu jātavedas cit     idhma yad tvad bhṛ śram     mah agni anīka ā sapary     tad indh prati doṣā uṣas     puṣ rayi sac han amitra     agni īś bṛhat kṣatriya     agni vāja parama rai     dhā ratna vidh yaviṣṭha     vi ānuṣak martya svadhāvat     yat cit hi tvad puruṣatrā yaviṣṭha     acitti kṛ ka cit āgas     kṛ su mad aditi anāga     vi enas śrath viṣvañc agni     mah cit agni enas abhīka     ūrva deva uta martya     mā tvad sakhi sadam id riṣ     yam toka tanaya śam yos     yathā ha tya vasu gaurī cit     pad sā muc yajatra     eva u su mad muc vi aṃhas     pra tṛ agni prataram mad āyus 
      prati agni uṣas agra khyā     vibhā sumanas ratna dheya     yā aśvin su kṛt duroṇa     ud sūrya jyotis deva i     ūrdhva bhānu savitṛ deva śri     drapsa dodhu gaviṣa na satvan     anu vrata varuṇa i mitra     yat sūrya div ārohay     yad sīm kṛ tamas vipṛc     dhruva kṣema an avasā artha     tad sūrya harit saptan yahva     spaś viśva jagant vah     vahiṣṭha vihṛ yā tantu     avavye asita deva vasman     dodhu raśmi sūrya     carman iva avadhā tamas ap antar     an āyam a nibandh kathā idam     nyāñc uttāna ava pad na     ka yā svadhā ka dṛś     div skambha samṛch pā nāka 
      prati agni uṣas jātavedas     khyā deva ruc mahas     ā nāsatya uru gāya ratha     idam yajña upa mad yā acchā     ūrdhva ketu savitṛ deva śri     jyotis viśva bhuvana kṛ     āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣa     vi sūrya raśmi cekit     āvah aruṇī jyotis āgā     mah citra raśmi cekit     prabodhay suvita devī     uṣas ī su yuj ratha     ā tvad vahiṣṭha iha tad vah     ratha aśva uṣas vyuṣṭi     idam hi tvad madhu peya soma     idam yajña vṛṣan māday     an āyam a nibandh kathā idam     nyāñc uttāna ava pad na     ka yā svadhā ka dṛś     div skambha samṛch pā nāka 
      agni hotṛ mad adhvara     vājin as pari nī     deva deva yajñiya     pari tri viṣṭi adhvara     yā agni rathī iva     ā deva prayas dhā     pari vāja pati kavi     agni havya kram     dhā ratna dāś     idam yad sṛñjaya puras     daivavāta samindh     dyumat amitra dambhana     idam gha vīra īvat     agni īś martya     tigma jambha mīḍhvas     tad arvant na sānasi     aruṣa na div śiśu     marmṛj diva diva     budh yat mad hari     kumāra sāhadevya     acchā na hvā ud ṛch     uta tya yajata hari     kumāra sāhadevya     prayam sadyas ā dā     etad tvad deva aśvin     kumāra sāhadevya     dīrgha āyus as somaka     tad tvad deva aśvin     kumāra sāhadevya     dīrgha āyus kṛ 
      ā satya yā maghavan ṛjīṣin     dru idam hari upa mad     tad id andhas su su dakṣa     iha abhipitva kṛ gṛ     ava sā śūra adhvan na anta     idam mad adya savana mand     śaṃs uktha uśanas iva vedhas     cit asurya manman     kavi na niṇya vidatha sādh     vṛṣan yat seka vipā arc     div itthā jan saptan kāru     ahar cit kṛ vayuna gṛ     svar yat vid sudṛśīka arka     mahi jyotis ruc yat ha vastu     andha tamas dudhita vicakṣ     nṛ kṛ nṛtama abhiṣṭi     vakṣ indra amita ṛjīṣin     ubh ā prā rodas mahitva     atas cit idam mahiman vi ric     abhi yad viśva bhuvana bhū     viśva śakra narya vid     ap ric sakhi nikāma     aśman cit yad bhid vacas     vraja gomat uśij vi vṛ     ap vṛtra vṛ parāhan     prāv tvad vajra pṛthivī sacetas     pra arṇas samudriya i     pati bhū śavas śūra dhṛṣṇu     apa u yat adri puruhūta dardar     āvis bhū saramā pūrvya tvad     tad mad netṛ vāja ā dṛ bhūri     gotra ruj aṅgiras gṛ     acchā kavi nṛmaṇas go abhiṣṭi     svarṣāti maghavan nādh     ūti tad iṣan dyumna hūti     ni māyāvat abrahman dasyu ṛch     ā dasyu han manas yā asta     bhū tvad kutsa sakhya nikāma     sva yoni ni sad sarūpa     vi tvad cikits ṛta cit ha nārī     yā kutsa sa ratha avasyu     toda vāta hari īś     ṛjra vāja na gadhya yuyūṣ     kavi yat ahar pārya bhūṣ     kutsa śuṣṇa aśuṣa ni bṛṃh     prapitva ahar kuyava sahasra     sadyas dasyu pra mṛṇ kutsya     pra svar cakra vṛh abhīka     tvad pipru mṛgaya śvi     ṛjiśvan vaidathina radh     pañcāśat kṛṣṇa ni vap sahasra     atka na pur jariman vi dardar     svar upāka tanū dhā     vi yat tvad cit amṛta varpas     mṛga na hastin taviṣī vas     siṃha na bhīma āyudha bhṛ     indra kāma vasūy gam     svarmīḍha na savana kan     śravasyu śam uktha     oka na raṇva sudṛś iva puṣṭi     tad id tvad indra su hava hvā     yad tad kṛ narya puru     yad māvat jaritṛ gadhya cit     makṣū vāja bhṛ spārha rādhas     tigma yat antar aśani pat     ka cit śūra muhuka jana     ghora yat arya samṛti bhū     adha sma mad tanū bhū gopā     bhū avitṛ vāmadeva dhī     bhū sakhi avṛka vājasāti     tvad anu pramati ā gam     uru śaṃsa jaritṛ viśvadha as     idam nṛ indra tvāyu tvad     maghavan maghavan viśva āji     div na dyumna abhi as ari     kṣap mad śarad ca puru     eva id indra vṛṣabha vṛṣan     brahman kṛ bhṛgu na ratha     nu cit yathā mad sakhya viyu     as mad ugra avitṛ tanū pā     nu stu indra nu gṛ     iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā     kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya     dhī as rathī sadāsā 
      tvad mahat indra tvad ha kṣā     anu kṣatra maṃhanā man div     tvad vṛtra śavas han     sṛj sindhu ahi gras     tvad tviṣ janiman rej div     rej bhūmi bhiyas sva manyu     ṛghāy su bhū parvata     ṛd dhanvan saray ap     bhid giri śavas vajra iṣ     āviṣkṛ sah ojas     vadh vṛtra vajra mand     sṛ ap javas han vṛṣṇi     su vīra tvad janitṛ man div     indra kartṛ su apastama bhū     yad īṃ jan svarya su vajra     an apacyu sadas na bhūman     yad eka id cyāvay pra bhūman     rājan kṛṣṭi puruhūta indra     satya enad anu viśva mad     rāti deva gṛ maghavan     satrā soma bhū idam viśva     satrā mada bṛhat madiṣṭha     satrā bhū vasu pati vasu     dattra viśva dhā indra kṛṣṭi     tvad adha prathamam jan     ama viśva dhā indra kṛṣṭī     tva prati pravat āśī     ahi vajra maghavan vi vraśc     satrāhan dādhṛṣi tumra indra     mahat apāra vṛṣabha su vajra     han yad vṛtra san uta vāja     dā magha maghavan su rādhas     idam vṛt cātay samyañc     yad āji maghavan śru eka     idam vāja bhṛ yad san     idam priya sakhya as     idam śru adha ji uta han     idam uta pra kṛ yudh go     yadā satya kṛ manyu indra     viśva dṛḍha bhī ej idam     sam indra go ji sam hiraṇya     sam aśviya maghavan yad ha puru     idam nṛ nṛtama idam śāka     rai vibhaj sambhara ca vasu     kiyat svid indra adhi i mātṛ     kiyat pitṛ janitṛ yad jan     yad idam śuṣma muhuka ṛch     vāta na jū stanay abhra     kṣi tvad a kṣi kṛ     ṛch reṇu maghavan sa moha     vibhañjanu aśanimat iva div     uta stotṛ maghavan vasu dhā     idam cakra iṣ sūrya     ni etaśa ram sṛ     ā kṛṣṇa īṃ hvṛ ghṛ     tvac budhna rajas idam yoni     asiknī yaj na hotṛ     gavyat indra sakhya vipra     aśvāyat vṛṣan vājay     janīy jani dā akṣitoti     ā cyāvay avata na kośa     trā mad bhū dṛś āpi     abhikhyātṛ marḍitṛ somya     sakhi pitṛ pitṛtama pitṛ     kṛ īṃ u loka vaś vayas dhā     sakhīy av bhū sakhi     gṛ indra stu vayas dhā     mad hi ā tvad kṛ sabādh     idam śamī mahay indra     stu indra maghavan yat ha vṛtra     bhūri eka aprati han     idam priya jaritṛ yad śarman     nakir deva vāray na marta     eva mad indra maghavan virapśin     kṛ satya carṣaṇī dhṛt anarvan     tvad rājan janus dhā mad     adhi śravas māhina yad jaritṛ     nu stu indra nu gṛ     iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā     kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya     dhī as rathī sadāsā 
      idam pathin anuvid purāṇa     yatas deva ujjan viśva     atas cit ā jan pravṛdh     mā mātṛ adas pat kṛ     na mad atas niḥ i durgaha etad     tiraścatā pārśva niḥ gam     bahu mad a kṛ kṛ     yudh tva sam tva pracch     pare mātṛ anu cakṣ     na na anu gā anu nu gam     tvaṣṭṛ gṛha pā soma indra     śata dhanya camū su     kim tad ṛdhak kṛ yad sahasra     mās bhṛ śarad ca puru     nahi nu idam pratimāna as     antar jan uta yad jan     avadya iva man guhā kṛ     indra mātṛ vīrya ā nyṛṣ     atha ud sthā svayam atka vas     ā rodas pṛ jan     etad ṛṣ alalābhavat     ṛtāvan iva saṃkruś     etad vi pracch ka idam bhan     ka ap adri paridhi ruj     ka u svid idam nivid bhan     indra avadya didhiṣ ap     mad etad putra mahat vadha     vṛtra han sṛj vi sindhu     mamat cana tvad yuvati parās     mamat cana tvad kuṣavā gṛ     mamat cit ap śiśu mṛḍ     mamat cit indra sahas ud sthā     mamat cana tvad maghavan vyaṃsa     nivyadh apa hanu han     adha nivyadh uttara bhū     śiras dāsa sam piṣ vadha     gṛṣṭi sū sthavira tavāgā     anādhṛṣya vṛṣabha tumra indra     a rih vatsa caratha mātṛ     svayam gā tanū iṣ     uta mātṛ mahiṣa anu ven     adas tvad hā putra deva     atha brū vṛtra indra han     sakhi viṣṇu vitaram vi kram     ka tvad mātṛ vidhavā kṛ     śayu ka tvad jighāṃs car     ka tvad deva adhi mārḍīka as     yat prakṣi pitṛ pādagṛhya     avarti śvan āntra pac     na deva vid marḍitṛ     paś jāyā a mahīy     adha mad śyena madhu ā bhṛ 
      eva tvad indra vajrin atra     viśva deva su hava ūma     mahat ubh rodas vṛdh ṛṣva     niḥ eka id vṛ vṛtra hatya     avasṛj jivri na deva     bhū samrāj indra satya yoni     han ahi pariśī arṇas     pra vartani rad viśvadhena     a tṛp viyam a budh     a budh svap indra     saptan prati pravat āśī     ahi vajra vi ri a parvan     kṣoday śavas kṣāman budhna     vār na vāta taviṣī indra     dṛḍha ubh vaś ojas     avabhid kakubh parvata     abhi pra dṛ jani na garbha     ratha iva pra yā sākam adri     tarpay visṛt ubj ūrmi     tvad vṛ ri indra sindhu     tvad mah avani viśvadhena     turvīti vayya kṣar     ramay namas ej arṇas     su taraṇa kṛ indra sindhu     pra agru nabhanu na vakva     dhvasra pinv yuvatī ṛta jña     dhanvan ajra pṛc tṛṣ     duh indra starī daṃsu patnī     puru uṣas śarad ca gur     vṛtra han sṛj vi sindhu     pariṣṭhā tṛd badbadh     sīrā indra sru pṛthivī     vamra putra agru ad     niveśana harivat ā bhṛ     vi andha khyā ahi ādā     niḥ bhū ukha chid sam ṛch parvan     pra tvad pūrva karaṇa vipra     a vid ah vid karas     yathā yathā vṛṣṇya sva gur     apas rājan narya viṣ     nu stu indra nu gṛ     iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā     kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya     dhī as rathī sadāsā 
      ā mad indra dūrāt ā mad āsāt     abhiṣṭi kṛt av yā ugra     ojiṣṭha nṛpati vajra bāhu     saṃga samad turvaṇi pṛtanyu     ā mad indra hari yā acchā     arvācīna avas rādhas ca     sthā vajrin maghavan virapśin     idam yajña anu mad vājasāti     idam yajña tvad mad indra     puras dhā san kratu mad     śvaghnin iva vajrin sani dhana     tvad mad ari āji ji     vaś u su mad sumanas upāka     soma nu su su svadhāvat     pā indra pratibhṛ madhu     sam andhas mad pṛṣṭhya     vi yad rapś ṛṣi nava     vṛkṣa na pakva sṛṇya na jetṛ     marya na yoṣā abhi man     acchā vac puruhūta indra     giri na yad svatavas ṛṣva indra     sanāt eva sahas jan ugra     ādṛ vajra sthavira na bhīma     udan iva kośa vasu nyṛṣ     na yad vartṛ janus nu as     na rādhas āmarītṛ magha     udvṛṣ taviṣīvat ugra     mad dā puruhūta rai     īś rai kṣaya carṣaṇi     uta vraja apavṛ go     śikṣā nara samitha prahāvat     vasu rāśi abhinī bhūri     ka tad śru śacī śaciṣṭha     yad kṛ muhu ka cit ṛṣva     puru dāś vicayiṣṭha aṃhas     atha dhā draviṇa jaritṛ     mā mad mṛdh ā bhṛ dā tad mad     pra dāś dā bhūri yad tvad     navya deṣṇa śaṃs idam tvad uktha     pra brū mad indra stu     nu stu indra nu gṛ     iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā     kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya     dhī as rathī sadāsā 
      ā yā indra av upa mad     iha stu sadhamād as śūra     vṛdh taviṣī yad puru     div na kṣatra abhibhūti puṣ     tad id iha stu vṛṣṇya     tuvi dyumna tuvi rādhas nṛ     yad kratu vidathya na samrāj     sah tarutra abhi as kṛṣṭi     ā yā indra div ā pṛthivī     makṣū samudra uta vā purīṣa     svarṇara av mad marutvat     parāvat vā sadana ṛta     sthūra rai bṛhat yad īś     tad u stu vidatha indra     yad vāyu ji gomatī     pra dhṛṣṇuyā nī vasyas acchā     upa yad namas namas stabhāy     ṛch vāc janay yaj     ṛj puru vāra uktha     ā indra kṛ sadana hotṛ     dhiṣā yadi dhiṣaṇy saraṇy     sad adri auśija goha     ā duroṣas pāstya hotṛ     yad mad mahat saṃvaraṇa vahni     satrā yat īṃ bhārvara vṛṣan     sac śuṣman stu bhara     guhā yat īṃ auśija goha     pra yat dhī prāyas mada     vi yat varas parvata vṛ     payas jinv ap javas     vid gaura gavaya goha     yadi vāja sudhī vah     bhadra tvad hasta su kṛ uta pāṇi     prayantṛ stu rādhas indra     ka tvad niṣatti kim u na u mad     kim na ud ud u hṛṣ dā u     eva vasu indra satya samrāj     han vṛtra varivas pūru kṛ     puruṣṭuta kratu mad śak rai     bhakṣ tvad avas daivya     nu stu indra nu gṛ     iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā     kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya     dhī as rathī sadāsā 
      yad mad indra juṣ yad ca vaś     tad mad mahat kṛ śuṣmin ā cit     brahman stoma maghavan soma uktha     yad aśman śavas bhṛ i     vṛṣan vṛṣaṃdhi catur asra as     ugra bāhu nṛtama śacīvat     śrī paruṣṇī vas ūrṇā     yad parvan sakhya vī     yad deva devatama jan     maha vāja mahat ca śuṣma     dhā vajra bāhu vaś     div ama rejay pra bhūman     viśva rodhas pravat ca puru     div ṛṣva janiman rej kṣā     ā mātṛ bhṛ śuṣmin ā go     nṛvat parijman nonāv vāta     tad tu tvad indra mahat maha     viśva id savana pravac     yat śūra dhṛṣṇu dhṛṣ dhṛṣ     ahi vajra śavas viṣ     tad tu tvad satya tuvi nṛmṇa viśva     pra dhenu sṛ vṛṣan ūdhas     adha ha tvad vṛṣamaṇas bhī     pra sindhu javas kram     atra aha tvad harivat tad u deva     avas indra stu svasṛ     yat sīm anu pra muc badbadh     dīrgha anu prasiti syanda ya dhī     pīḍ aṃśu mad na sindhu     ā tvad śamī śam śakti     asmadryañc śuc yam     āśu na raśmi tuvi ojas go     mad varṣiṣṭha kṛ jyeṣṭha     nṛmṇa satrā sahuri sahas     mad vṛtra su hana radh     han vadhar vanus martya     mad id su śru tvad indra     mad citra upa mā vāja     mad viśva puraṃdhi     mad su maghavan bhū go dā     nu stu indra nu gṛ     iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā     kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya     dhī as rathī sadāsā 
      kathā mahat vṛdh ka hotṛ     yajña juṣ abhi soma ūdhas     pā vaś juṣ andhas     vakṣ ṛṣva śuc dhana     ka idam vīra sadhamād āp     sam aś sumati ka idam     kad idam citra cit kad ūti     vṛdh bhū śam yajyu     kathā śru hvā indra     kathā śru avas idam vid     ka idam puru upamāti ha     kathā enad ah papuri jaritṛ     kathā sabādhas śam idam     naś abhi draviṇa dhī     deva bhū navedas mad ṛta     namas grah abhi yad juṣ     kathā ka idam uṣas vyuṣṭi     deva marta sakhya juṣ     kathā ka idam sakhya sakhi     yad idam kāma su yuj taṃs     kim āt amatra sakhya sakhi     kadā nu tvad bhrātra pra brū     śrī sudṛś vapus idam sarga     svar na citratama iṣ ā go     druh jighāṃs dhvaras an indra     tetij tigma tuj anīka     ṛṇa cit yatra ṛṇayā mad ugra     dūra ajñāta uṣas bādh     ṛta hi śurudh as puru     ṛta dhīti vṛjina han     ṛta śloka badhira tṛd     karṇa budh śuc āyu     ṛta dṛḍha dharuṇa as     puru candra vapus vapus     ṛta dīrgha iṣaṇ pṛkṣ     ṛta go ṛta ā viś     ṛta yam ṛta id van     ṛta śuṣma tura yā u gavyu     ṛta pṛthu bahula gabhīra     ṛta dhenu parama duh     nu stu indra nu gṛ     iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā     kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya     dhī as rathī sadāsā 
      ka suṣṭuti śavas sūnu indra     arvācīna rādhas ā vṛt     dadi hi vīra gṛ vasu     tad go pati niṣṣidh mad jana     tad vṛtra hatya hvā tad īḍ     tad suṣṭuta indra satya rādhas     tad yāman ā maghavan martya     brahmaṇy suṣvi varivas dhā     tad id nṛ vi hvā samīka     ric tanū kṛ trā     mithas yat tyāga ubhaya gam     nṛ toka tanaya sāti     kratūy kṣiti yoga ugra     āśuṣ mithas arṇa sāti     sam yat viś vṛt yudhma     āt id nema indray abhīka     āt id ha nema indriya yaj     āt id pakti puroḍāś ric     āt id soma vi pṛc a suṣvi     āt id juṣ vṛṣabha yaj     kṛ idam varivas yad itthā     indra soma vaś su     sadhrīcīna manas a viven     tad id sakhi kṛ samad     yad indra su soma adya     pac pakti uta bhṛjj dhānā     prati manāyu ucatha hary     tad dhā vṛṣan śuṣma indra     yadā samarya vi cit ṛghāvan     dīrgha yat āji abhi khyā ari     krand vṛṣan patnī acchā     duroṇa ā niśā soma sut     bhūyas vasna car kanīyas     a vikrī kan punar i     tad bhūyas kanīyas na ric     dīna dakṣa vi duh pra vāṇa     ka idam daśan mad     indra krī dhenu     yadā vṛtra jaṅghan     atha enad mad punar dā     nu stu indra nu gṛ     iṣ jaritṛ nadī na pyā     kṛ tvad harivat brahman navya     dhī as rathī sadāsā 
      ka adya narya deva kāma     vaś indra sakhya juṣ     ka vā mah avas pārya     samindh agni su soma īḍ     ka nam vacas somya     manāyu vā bhū usṛ     ka indra yujya ka sakhi tva     ka bhrātra vaś kavi ka ūti     ka deva avas adya vṛ     ka āditya aditi jyotis īḍ     ka aśvin indra agni su     aṃśu pā manas avivenam     tad agni bhārata śarman yam     jyok paś sūrya uccar     yad indra su iti ah     nṛ narya nṛtama nṛ     na tad jyā bahu na dabhra     uru idam aditi śarman yam     priya su kṛt priya indra manāyu     priya su prāvī priya idam somin     suprāvya prāśuṣah etad vīra     suṣvi pakti kṛ kevala indra     na a suṣvi āpi na sakhi na jāmi     duṣprāvya avahan id avāc     na revat paṇi sakhī indra     a su suta pā sam gṛ     ā idam vedas khid han nagna     vi suṣvi pakti kevala bhū     indra para avara madhyama     indra yā avasā indra     indra kṣi uta yudh     indra nṛ vājay hvā 
      mad manu bhū sūrya ca     mad kakṣīvant ṛṣi as vipra     mad kutsa ārjuneya ni ṛj     mad kavi uśanas paś mad     mad bhūmi dā ārya     mad vṛṣṭi dāś martya     mad ap nī vāś     mad deva anu keta i     mad pur mand vi īr     navan sākam navati śambara     śatatama veśya sarvatāti     divodāsa atithigva yat av     pra su tad vi marut vi as     pra śyena śyena āśu patvan     a cakra yat svadhā suparṇa     havya bhṛ manu deva juṣ     bhṛ yadi vi atas vevij     pathin uru manas javas sṛj     tūya yā madhu somya     uta śravas vid śyena atra     ṛjīpin śyena dā aṃśu     parāvat śakuna mandra mada     soma bhṛ dṛh devāvat     div adas uttara ādā     ādā śyena bhṛ soma     sahasra sava ayuta ca sākam     atra puraṃdhi hā arāti     mada soma mūra a mūra 
      garbha nu as anu idam vid     mad deva janiman viśva     śata mad pur āyasa rakṣ     adha śyena javas niḥ dī     na gha tad mad apa joṣam bhṛ     abhi īṃ as tvakṣas vīrya     īrmā purandhi hā arāti     uta vāta tṛ śvi     ava yat śyena svan adha div     vi yat yadi vā atas vah purandhi     sṛj yat idam ava ha kṣip jyā     kṛśānu as manas bhuraṇy     ṛjipya īṃ indrāvat na bhujyu     śyena bhṛ bṛhat adhi snu     antar pat patatrin idam parṇa     adha yāman prasita tad vi     adha śveta kalaśa go añj     āpyā maghavan śukra andhas     adhvaryu prayam madhu agra     indra mada prati dhā pā     śūra mada prati dhā pā 
      tvad yuj tvad tad soma sakhya     indra ap manu sasrut kṛ     han ahi ri saptan sindhu     apāvṛ apidhā iva kha     tvad yuj ni khid sūrya     indra cakra sahas sadyas indu     adhi snu bṛhat vṛt     mah druh apa viśva āyu dhā     han indra dah agni indu     purā dasyu madhyaṃdina abhīka     durga duroṇa kratu na yā     puru sahasra śaru ni bṛṃh     viśva sīm adhama indra dasyu     viś dāsa kṛ a praśaṃs     bādh mṛṇ ni śatru     vid apaciti vadhatra     eva satya maghavan tvad tad     indra ca soma ūrva aśvya go     ādardar apidhā aśan     ric kṣā cit tṛd 
      ā mad stu upa vāja ūti     indra yā hari mand     tiras cit ari savana puru     āṅgūṣa gṛ satya rādhas     ā hi sma yā narya cit     hvā sotṛ upa yajña     su aśva yad abhīru man     su mad sam ha vīra     śrāvay idam karṇa vājay     juṣ anu pra diś manday     udvṛṣ rādhas tuviṣmat     kṛ mad indra su tīrtha abhaya ca     acchā yad gam nādh ūti     itthā vipra hvā gṛ     upa tman dhā dhur āśu     sahasra śata vajra bāhu     tvota maghavan indra vipra     mad tvad as sūri gṛ     bhaj bṛhat diva rai     ākāyya dā purukṣu 
      nakir indra tvad uttara     na jyāyas as vṛtrahan     nakir eva yathā tvad     satrā tvad anu kṛṣṭi     viśva cakra iva vṛt     satrā mahat as śru     viśva cana id anā tvad     deva indra yudh     yat aha nakta ātṛ     yatra uta bādh     cakra kutsa yudh     muṣāy indra sūrya     yatra deva ṛghāy     viśva yudh eka id     tvad indra vanu han     yatra uta martya kaṃ     ri indra sūrya     prāv śacī etaśa     kim āt uta as vṛtrahan     maghavan manyumattama     atra aha dānu ātṛ     etad gha id uta vīrya     indra kṛ pauṃsya     strī yat durhaṇāyu     vadh duhitṛ div     div cit gha duhitṛ     mahat mahīy     uṣas indra sam piṣ     apa uṣas anas sṛ     sampiṣ aha bhī     ni yat sīm śnath vṛṣan     etad idam anas śī     su sampiṣ vipāś ā     sṛ sīm parāvat     uta sindhu vibālī     viṣṭhā adhi kṣam     pari as indra māyā     uta śuṣṇa dhṛṣṇuyā     pra mṛś abhi vedana     pur yat idam sampiṣ     uta dāsa kaulitara     bṛhat parvata adhi     avahan indra śambara     uta dāsa varcin     sahasra śata vadh     adhi pañcan pradhi iva     uta tya putra agrū     parāvṛj śatakratu     uktha indra ābhaj     uta tya turvaśa yadu     a snātṛ śacīpati     indra vid pāray     uta tya sadyas ārya     sarayu indra pāratas     arṇā citraratha vadh     anu dvi hā nī     andha śroṇa ca vṛtrahan     na tad tvad sumna aś     śata aśmanmaya     pur indra vi as     divodāsa dāś     svāpay dabhīti     sahasra triṃśat hatha     dāsa indra māyā     tad gha id uta as vṛtrahan     samāna indra go pati     yad tad viśva cyu     uta nūnam yat indriya     kṛ indra pauṃsya     adya nakir tad ā mī     vāma vāma tvad āduri     deva dā aryaman     vāma pūṣan vāma bhaga     vāma deva karūḍatin 
      ka mad citra ā bhū     ūti sadāvṛdha sakhi     ka śaciṣṭha vṛt     ka tvad satya mada     maṃhiṣṭha mad andhas     dṛḍha cit āruj vasu     abhi su mad sakhi     av jaritṛ     śata bhū ūti     abhi mad ā vṛt     cakra na vṛt arvant     niyut carṣaṇi     pravat hi kratu     ā ha pad iva gam     bhaj sūrya sacā     sam yat tvad indra manyu     sam cakra dhanv     adha tvad adha sūrya     uta sma hi tvad ah id     maghavan śacīpati     dātṛ avidīdhayu     uta sma sadyas id pari     śam su     puru cit mah vasu     na hi sma tvad śata cana     rādhas vṛ āmur     na cyautna kṛ     mad av tvad śata     mad sahasra ūti     mad viśva abhiṣṭi     mad iha ā vṛ     sakhya svasti     mah rai divitmat     mad av viśvahā     indra rai parīṇas     mad viśva ūti     mad tad apa ā vṛ     vraja astṛ iva gomat     nava indra ūti     mad dhṛṣṇuyā ratha     dyumat indra an apacyu     gavyu aśvayu i     mad uttama kṛ     śravas deva sūrya     varṣiṣṭha div iva upari 
      ā tu mad indra vṛtrahan     mad ardha ā gam     mahat mah ūti     bhṛmi cit gha as tūtuji     ā citra citrin ā     citra kṛ ūti     dabhra cit śaśīyas     han vrādh ojas     sakhi yad tvad sacā     mad indra tvad sacā     mad tvad abhi nonāv     mad mad id ud av     tad mad citra adrivat     anavadya ūti     anādhṛṣṭa ā gam     bhū u su tvāvat     sakhi indra gomat     yuj vāja ghṛṣvi     tvad hi eka īś     indra vāja gomat     tad mad yam mah iṣ     na tvad vṛ anyathā     yat dits stu magha     stotṛ indra girvaṇas     abhi tvad gotama gir     nū pra dā     indra vāja ghṛṣvi     pra tvad vac vīrya     yad mand āruj     pur dāsa abhī     tad tvad gṛ vedhas     yad kṛ pauṃsya     suta indra girvaṇas     vṛdh gotama     indra tvad stoma vāhas     ā idam dhā vīravat yaśas     yat cit hi śaśvat as     indra sādhāraṇa tvad     tad tvad mad hvā     arvācīna vasu bhū     mad su mad andhas     soma indra soma pā     mad tvad mati     ā stoma indra yam     arvāk ā vartay hari     puroḍāś ca mad ghas     joṣay gir ca mad     vadhūyu iva yoṣaṇā     sahasra vyati     yuj indra ī     śata soma khārī     sahasra tvad śata mad     go ā cyāvay     asmatrā rādhas i tvad     daśan tvad kalaśa     hiraṇya dhā     bhūri dā as vṛtrahan     bhūri dā bhūri dā mad     mā dabhra bhūri ā bhṛ     bhūri gha id indra dits     bhūri dā hi as śru     purutrā śūra vṛtrahan     ā mad bhaj rādhas     pra tvad babhru vicakṣaṇa     śaṃs goṣan napāt     mā idam go anu śrath     kanīnakā iva vidradha     nava drupada arbhaka     babhru yāma śubh     aram mad usra yāman     aram an usra yāman     babhru yāma asridh 
      pra ṛbhu dūta iva vāc iṣ     upastir śvaitarī dhenu īḍ     yad vāta jū taraṇi eva     pari div sadyas apas bhū     yadā aram kṛ ṛbhu pitṛ     pariviṣṭi veṣaṇā daṃsanā     āt id deva upa sakhya i     dhīra puṣṭi vah manā     punar yad kṛ pitṛ yuvan     sana yūpa iva jaraṇa śī     tad vāja vibhvan ṛbhu indravat     madhu psaras mad av yajña     yat saṃvatsam ṛbhu go rakṣ     yat saṃvatsam ṛbhu mās piś     yat saṃvatsam bhṛ bhāsas idam     tad śamī amṛta tva aś     jyeṣṭha ah camasa dvi kṛ iti     kanīyas tri kṛ iti ah     kaniṣṭha ah catur kṛ iti     tvaṣṭṛ ṛbhu tad panay vacas tvad     satya vac nṛ eva hi kṛ     anu svadhā ṛbhu gam etad     vibhrāj camasa aha iva     ven tvaṣṭṛ catur dṛś     dvādaśan div yat agohya     ātithya ran ṛbhu sas     su kṣetra kṛ nī sindhu     dhanvan sthā oṣadhī nimna ap     ratha yad kṛ suvṛt nareṣṭhā     yad dhenu viśva jū viśva rūpa     tad ā takṣ ṛbhu rayi mad     su avas su apas su hasta     apas hi idam juṣ deva     abhi kratu manas dhī     vāja deva bhū sukarman     indra ṛbhukṣan varuṇa vibhvan     yad hari medhā uktha mad     indra kṛ su yuj yad aśva     tad rai poṣa draviṇa mad     dhā ṛbhu kṣemay na mitra     idā ahar pīti uta tvad mada dhā     na ṛte śrānta sakhya deva     tad nūnam mad ṛbhu vasu     tṛtīya idam savana dhā 
      ṛbhu vibhvan vāja indra mad acchā     idam yajña ratna dheya upa yā     idā hi tvad dhiṣaṇā devī ahar     dhā pīti sam mada gam tvad     vid janman vāja ratna     uta ṛtu ṛbhu māday     sam tvad mada gam sam puraṃdhi     su vīra mad rayi eray     idam tvad yajña ṛbhu kṛ     yad ā manuṣvat pradiv dhā     pra tvad acchā juṣ sthā     bhū viśva agriya uta vāja     bhū u tvad vidh ratna dheya     idā nṛ dāś martya     pā vāja ṛbhu dā tvad     mahi tṛtīya savana mada     ā vāja yā upa mad ṛbhukṣan     mah nṛ draviṇas gṛ     ā tvad pīti abhipitva ahar     idam asta nava sū iva gam     ā napāt śavas yā upa     idam yajña namas hu     sajoṣas sūri yad ca as     madhu pā ratna dhā indravat     sajoṣas indra varuṇa soma     sajoṣas pā girvaṇas marut     agre pā ṛtu pā sajoṣas     gnāspatnī ratna dhā sajoṣas     sajoṣas āditya māday     sajoṣas ṛbhu parvata     sajoṣas daivya savitṛ     sajoṣas sindhu ratna dhā     yad aśvin yad pitṛ yad ūti     dhenu takṣ ṛbhu yad aśva     yad aṃsatra yad ṛdhak rodas yad     vibhu nṛ su apatya kṛ     yad gomat vājavat su vīra     rayi dhā vasumat purukṣu     tad agre pā ṛbhu mand     mad dhā yad ca rāti gṛ     na apabhū na tvad tṛṣ     a niḥśaṃs ṛbhu yajña idam     sam indra mad sam marut     sam rājan ratna dheya deva 
      iha upa yā śavas napāt     saudhanvana ṛbhu mā apa bhū     idam hi tvad savana ratna dheya     gam indra anu tvad mada     āgam ṛbhu iha ratna dheya     bhū soma suṣuta pīti     su kṛtyā yat su apasyā     eka vikṛ camasa caturdhā     vi kṛ camasa caturdhā     sakhi vi śikṣ iti brū     atha i vāja amṛta pathin     gaṇa deva ṛbhu su hasta     kimmaya svid camasa etad as     yad kāvya catur vikṛ     atha su savana mada     pā ṛbhu madhu somya     śacī kṛ pitṛ yuvan     śacī kṛ camasa deva pāna     śacī hari dhanutṛ takṣ     indra vāha ṛbhu vāja ratna     yad tvad su abhipitva ahar     tīvra vāja savana mada     tad rayi ṛbhu sarva vīra     ā takṣ vṛṣan mand     prātar suta pā hari aśva     mādhyaṃdina savana kevala tvad     sam ṛbhu pā ratna dhā     sakhi yad indra kṛ su kṛtyā     yad deva bhū su kṛtyā     śyena iva id adhi div niṣad     tad ratna dhā śavas napāt     saudhanvana bhū amṛta     yad tṛtīya savana ratna dheya     kṛ su apasyā su hasta     tad ṛbhu pariṣic tvad etad     sam mada indriya pā 
      an aśva jan an abhīśu ukthya     ratha tri cakra pari vṛt rajas     mahat tad tvad devya pravācana     div ṛbhu pṛthivī yat ca puṣ     ratha yad kṛ suvṛt su cetas     a vihval manas pari dhyā     tad u nu idam savana pā     ā tvad vāja ṛbhu veday     tad tvad vāja ṛbhu su pravācana     deva vibhu bhū mahitvana     jivri yat as pitṛ sanā jur     punar yuvan caratha takṣ     eka vi kṛ camasa caturvaya     niḥ carman go ri dhīti     atha deva amṛta tva aś     śruṣṭi vāja ṛbhu tad tvad ukthya     ṛbhu rayi prathama śravastama     vāja śru yad jan nṛ     vibhvan takṣ vidatha pravac     yad deva av tad vicarṣaṇi     tad vājin arvan tad ṛṣi vacasyā     tad śūra as pṛtanā duṣṭara     tad rai poṣa tad su vīrya dhā     yad vāja vibhvan ṛbhu yad av     śreṣṭha tvad peśas adhi dhā darśata     stoma vāja ṛbhu tad juṣ     dhīra hi as kavi vipaścit     tad tvad idam brahman veday     tvad mad dhiṣaṇā pari     vid viśva narya bhojana     dyumat vāja vṛṣan śuṣma uttama     ā mad rayi ṛbhu takṣ vayas     iha prajā iha rayi rā     iha śravas vīravat takṣ mad     yad mad citay ati anya     tad vāja citra ṛbhu dā mad 
      upa mad vāja adhvara ṛbhukṣan     deva yā pathin deva yāna     yathā yajña manus viś idam     dhā raṇva sudina ahar     tad tvad hṛd manas as yajña     juṣ adya ghṛta nirṇij gā     pra tvad suta haray pṛ     kratu dakṣa harṣay pā     tri udāya deva dhā yathā tvad     stoma vāja ṛbhukṣan dā tvad     hu manuṣvat upara viś     tvad sacā bṛhat diva soma     pīvas aśva śuc ratha hi bhū     ayas śiprā vājin su niṣka     indra sūnu śavas napāt     anu tvad cit agriya mada     ṛbhu ṛbhukṣan rayi     vāja vājintama yuj     indrasvat hvā     sadā sātama aśvin     tad id ṛbhu yad av     tvad indra ca martya     tad dhī as san     medha sāti tad arvant     vi mad vāja ṛbhukṣan     pathin ci yaj     mad sūri stu     viśva āśā tṛ     tad mad vāja ṛbhukṣan     indra nāsatya rayi     sam aśva carṣaṇi ā     puru śaṃs maghatti 
      uta u hi tvad dātra as pūrva     yad pūru trasadasyu nituś     kṣetrāsā dā urvarā sā     ghana dasyu abhibhūti ugra     uta vājin puru niṣṣidhvan     dadhikrā u dā viśvakṛṣṭi     ṛjipya śyena pruṣitapsu āśu     carkar ari nṛpati na śūra     yad sīm anu pravat iva dru     viśva pūru mad hṛṣ     pad gṛdh medhayu na śūra     rathatur vāta iva dhraj     yad sma ārudh gadhya samad     sanutara car go gam     āvirṛjīka vidatha nici     tiras arati pari āp āyu     uta sma enad vastramathi na tāyu     anu kruś kṣiti bhara     jasuri na śyena     śravas ca acchā paśumat ca yūtha     uta sma idam prathama sṛ     ni vevīy śreṇi ratha     sraj kṛ janya na śubhvan     reṇu rerih kiraṇa daṃś     uta tya vājin sahuri ṛtāvan     śuśrūṣ tanū samarya     tura i turay ṛjipya     adhi bhrū kṛ reṇu ṛj     uta sma idam tanyatu iva div     ṛghāy abhiyuj bhī     yadā sahasra abhi sīm yudh     durvartu sma bhū bhīma ṛj     uta sma idam panay jana     jūti kṛṣṭi prā abhibhūti āśu     uta enad ah samitha vī     parā dadhikrā sṛ sahasra     ā dadhikrā śavas pañcan kṛṣṭi     sūrya iva jyotis ap tan     sahasra sā śata sā vājin arvan     pṛc madhu sam idam vacas 
      āśu dadhikrā tad u nu stu     div pṛthivī uta carkar     vas mad uṣas sūday     ati viśva durita pṛ     mah carkar arvant kratu prā     dadhikrāvan puru vāra vṛṣan     yad pūru dīdī na agni     dā mitrāvaruṇa taturi     yad aśva dadhikrāvan kṛ     samindh agni uṣas vyuṣṭi     anāgas tad aditi kṛ     tad mitra varuṇa sajoṣas     dadhikrāvan iṣ ūrj mah yat     man marut nāman bhadra     svasti varuṇa mitra agni     hvā indra vajra bāhu     indra iva id ubhaya vi hvā     udīr yajña upapre     dadhikrā u sūdana martya     dā mitrāvaruṇa mad aśva     dadhikrāvan kṛ     jiṣṇu aśva vājin     surabhi mad mukha kṛ     pra mad āyus tṛ 
      dadhikrāvan id u nu carkar     viśva id mad uṣas sūday     ap agni uṣas sūrya     bṛhaspati āṅgirasa jiṣṇu     satvan bhariṣa gaviṣa duvanyasad     śravasy iṣ uṣas turaṇyasad     satya drava dravara pataṃgara     dadhikrāvan iṣ ūrj svar jan     uta sma idam dru turaṇy     parṇa na vi anu vā pragardhin     śyena iva dhraj aṅkasa pari     dadhikrāvan saha ūrj tartar     uta tya vājin kṣipaṇi turaṇy     grīvā bandh apikakṣa āsan     kratu dadhikrā anu saṃtavītvat     pathin aṅkas anu āpanīphaṇ     haṃsa śuci sad vasu antarikṣa sad     hotṛ vedi sad atithi duroṇa sad     nṛṣad vara sad ṛta sad vyoman sad     ap jā go jā ṛta jā adri jā ṛta 
      indra ka tvad varuṇa sumna āp     stoma haviṣmat amṛta na hotṛ     yad tvad hṛd kratumat mad vac     spṛś indrāvaruṇa namasvat     indra ha yad varuṇa kṛ āpi     deva marta sakhya prayasvat     tad han vṛtra samitha śatru     avas vā mahat tad pra śru     indra ha ratna varuṇa dheṣṭha     itthā nṛ śam tad     yadi sakhi sakhya soma     su su prayas māday     indra tvad varuṇa didyu idam     ojiṣṭha ugra ni vadh vajra     yad mad dureva vṛkati dabhīti     tad mā abhibhūti ojas     indra tvad varuṇa bhū idam     dhī pretṛ vṛṣabha iva dhenu     tad mad duh yavasa iva gam     sahasra dhārā payas mah go     toka dhā tanaya urvarā     svar dṛśīka vṛṣan ca pauṃsya     indra mad atra varuṇa as     avas dasma paritakmyā     tvad id hi av pūrvya     pari prabhūti gaviṣ su āpi     vṛ sakhya priya     śūra maṃhiṣṭha pitṛ iva śambhu     tad tvad dhī av vājay     āji na gam yuvayu sudānu     śrī na go upa soma sthā     indra gir varuṇa mad manīṣā     idam indra varuṇa mad manīṣā     gam upa draviṇa iṣ     upa īṃ sthā joṣṭṛ iva vasu     raghu iva śravas bhikṣ     aśvya tman rathya puṣṭi     nitya rai pati as     tad kṛ ūti navyas     asmatrā rai niyut sac     ā mad bṛhat bṛhat ūti     indra yā varuṇa vājasāti     yat didyu pṛtanā prakrīḍ     tad tvad as san āji 
      mad dvitā rāṣṭra kṣatriya     viśvāyu viśva amṛta yathā mad     kratu sac varuṇa deva     rāj kṛṣṭi upama vavri     mad rājan varuṇa mad tad     asurya prathama dhāray     kratu sac varuṇa deva     rāj kṛṣṭi upama vavri     mad indra varuṇa tad mahitva     uru gabhīra rajas sumeka     tvaṣṭṛ iva viśva bhuvana vid     sam īray rodas dhāray ca     mad ap pinv vakṣ     dhāray div sadana ṛta     ṛta putra aditi ṛtāvan     uta tridhātu prathay vi bhūman     mad nṛ su aśva vājay     mad vṛ samaraṇa hvā     kṛ āji maghavan mad indra     ṛch reṇu abhibhūti ojas     mad tad viśva kṛ nakir mad     daivya sahas vṛ apratīta     yat mad soma mad yat uktha     ubh bhī rajas apāra     vid tvad viśva bhuvana tad     tad pra brū varuṇa vedhas     tvad vṛtra śru han     tvad vṛ ri indra sindhu     mad atra pitṛ tad as     saptan ṛṣi daurgaha bandh     tad āyaj trasadasyu idam     indra na vṛtra tura ardha deva     purukutsānī hi tvad dāś     havya indrāvaruṇa namas     atha rājan trasadasyu idam     vṛtra han dā ardha deva     rai mad san mad     havya deva yavasa go     tad dhenu indrāvaruṇa tvad mad     viśvāhā dhā an apasphur 
      ka u śru katama yajñiya     vandāru deva katama juṣ     ka idam devī amṛta preṣṭha     hṛd śriṣ suṣṭuti su havya     ka mṛḍ katama āgamiṣṭha     deva u katama śambhaviṣṭha     ratha ka ah dru aśva āśu     yad sūrya duhitṛ vṛ     makṣū hi sma gam īvat div     indra na śakti paritakmyā     div ājan divya suparṇa     ka śacī bhū śaciṣṭha     ka tvad bhū upamāti ka mad     āśvina gam hu     ka tvad mah cit tyajas abhīka     uruṣy mādhvī dasra mad ūti     uru tvad ratha pari nakṣ div     ā yat samudra abhi vṛt tvad     madhu mādhvī madhu tvad pruṣāy     yat sīm tvad pṛkṣ bhuraj pakva     sindhu ha tvad rasā sic aśva     ghṛṇā vi aruṣa pari gam     tad u su tvad ajira cit yāna     yad pati bhū sūryā     iha iha yat tvad samanā     tad idam mad sumati vāja ratna     uruṣy jaritṛ tvad ha     śri kāma nāsatya yuvadryañc 
      tad tvad ratha mad adya ā hu     pṛthujraya aśvin saṃgati go     yad sūryā vah vandhurāyu     gir vāhas purutama vasūyu     tvad śrī aśvin devatā tad     div napāt van śacī     tvad vapus abhi pṛkṣ sac     vah yat kakuha ratha tvad     ka tvad adya ā kṛ rā havya     ūti vā suta peya vā arka     ṛta vā vanus pūrvya     namas yam aśvin vṛt     hiraṇyaya puru bhū ratha     idam yajña nāsatya upa yā     pā id madhu somya     dhā ratna vidh jana     ā mad yā div acchā pṛthivī     hiraṇyaya suvṛt ratha     mā tvad anya ni yam devay     sam yat dā nābhi pūrvya tvad     nu mad rayi puru vīra bṛhat     dasra mā ubhaya mad     nṛ yat tvad aśvin stoma av     sadhastuti ājamīḍha gam     iha iha yat tvad samanā     tad idam mad sumati vāja ratna     uruṣy jaritṛ tvad ha     śri kāma nāsatya yuvadryañc 
      etad tya bhānu ud ṛch yuj     ratha parijman div idam sānu     pṛkṣa idam mithuna adhi tri     dṛti turīya madhu vi rapś     ud tvad pṛkṣa madhumat īr     ratha aśva uṣas vyuṣṭi     apavṛ tamas ā parīvṛ     svar na śukra tan ā rajas     madhu pā madhu pā āsan     uta priya madhu yuj ratha     ā vartani madhu jinv pathin     dṛti vah madhumat aśvin     haṃsa yad tvad madhumat asridh     hiraṇya parṇa uhū uṣarbudh     uda prut mandin mandinispṛś     madhu na makṣ savana gam     su adhvara madhumat agni     usṛ jṛ prati vastu aśvin     yat nij hasta taraṇi vicakṣaṇa     soma su madhumat adri     ākenipa aha dodhu     svar na śukra tan ā rajas     sūra cit aśva yuj i     viśva anu svadhā cit pathin     pra tvad vac aśvin dhiyaṃdhā     ratha su aśva ajara yad as     yad sadyas pari rajas yā     haviṣmat taraṇi bhoja acchā 
      agra pā madhu     su vāyu diviṣṭi     tvad hi pūrva pā as     śata ā mad abhiṣṭi     niyutvat indra sārathi     vāyu suta tṛp     ā tvad sahasra hari     indra vāyu abhi prayas     vah soma pīti     ratha hiraṇya vandhura     indra vāyu su adhvara     ā hi sthā divispṛś     ratha pṛthu pājas     dāś upa gam     indra vāyu iha ā gam     indra vāyu idam suta     tad deva sajoṣas     pā dāś gṛha     iha prayāṇa as tvad     indra vāyu vimocana     iha tvad soma pīti 
      vāyu śukra yam tvad     madhu agra diviṣṭi     ā yā soma pīti     spārha deva niyutvat     indra ca vāyu idam     soma pīti arh     tvad hi i indu     nimna ap na sadhryañc     vāyu indra ca śuṣmin     sa ratha śavas pati     niyutvat mad ūti     ā yā soma pīti     yad tvad as puruspṛh     niyut dāś nṛ     mad tad yajña vāhas     indra vāyu ni yam 
      vī hotra a vī     vip na rai ari     vāyu ā candra ratha     yā suta pīti     niryu aśasti     niyutvat indra sārathi     vāyu ā candra ratha     yā suta pīti     anu kṛṣṇa vasu dhiti     yam viśva peśas     vāyu ā candra ratha     yā suta pīti     vah tvad manas yuj     yuj navati navan     vāyu ā candra ratha     yā suta pīti     vāyu śata hari     yu puṣ     uta vā tvad sahasrin     ratha ā yā pājas 
      idam tvad āsya havis     priya indrābṛhaspati     uktha mada ca śaṃs     idam tvad pari sic     soma indrābṛhaspati     cāru mada pā     ā mad indrābṛhaspati     gṛha indra ca gam     soma pā soma pīti     mad indrābṛhaspati     rayi dhā śatagvin     aśvāvat sahasrin     indrābṛhaspati mad     suta gir hvā     idam soma pā     soma indrābṛhaspati     pā dāś gṛha     māday tad oka 
      yad stambh sahas vi jm anta     bṛhaspati triṣadhastha rava     tad pratna ṛṣi dhī     puras vipra dhā mandra jihvā     dhuneti su praketa mad     bṛhaspati abhi yad mad taṃs     pṛṣat sṛpra adabdha ūrva     bṛhaspati rakṣ idam yoni     bṛhaspati yad parama parāvat     atas ā tad ṛta spṛś ni sad     tvad khan avata adri duh     madhu ścut abhitas virapśa     bṛhaspati prathama jan     mah jyotis parama vyoman     saptan āsya tuvi jan rava     vi saptan raśmi dham tamas     tad suṣṭubh tad ṛkvat gaṇa     vala ruj phaliga rava     bṛhaspati usriyā havyasūd     kanikrad vāvāś ud aj     eva pitṛ viśva deva vṛṣan     yajña vidh namas havis     bṛhaspati su prajā vīravat     mad as pati rayi     tad id rājan pratijanya viśva     śuṣma sthā abhi vīrya     bṛhaspati yad su bhṛ bhṛ     valgūy vand pūrvabhāj     tad id kṣi sudhita oka sva     tad iḍā pinv viśvadānīm     tad viś svayam eva nam     yad brahman rājan pūrva i     apratīta ji sam dhana     pratijanya uta yad sajanya     avasyu yad varivas kṛ     brahman rājan tad av deva     indra ca soma pā bṛhaspati     idam yajña mand vṛṣaṇvasu     ā tvad viś indu su ābhū     mad rayi sarva vīra ni yam     bṛhaspati indra vṛdh mad     sacā tad tvad sumati bhū mad     av dhī jāgṛ puraṃdhi     jas ari vanus arāti 
      idam u tya purutama purastāt     jyotis tamas vayunāvat sthā     nūnam div duhitṛ vibhā     gātu kṛ uṣas jana     sthā u citra uṣas purastāt     mā iva svaru adhvara     vi ū vraja tamas dvāra     vas vṛ śuci pāvaka     vas adya citay bhoja     rādhas deya uṣas maghavan     a citra antar paṇi sas     a budh tamas vimadhya     kuvid tad deva sanaya nava vā     yāma bhū uṣas tvad adya     yad navagva aṅgira daśagva     saptan āsya revat revat vas     tvad hi devī ṛta yuj aśva     pariprayā bhuvana sadyas     prabodhay uṣas sas     dvipa catuṣpād caratha jīva     kva svid idam katama purāṇa     yad vidhāna vidhā ṛbhu     śubha yat śubhra uṣas car     na vi jñā sadṛśa ajurya     tad gha tad bhadra uṣas purā as     abhiṣṭi dyumna ṛta jan satya     yad yaj śam uktha     stu śaṃs draviṇa sadyas āp     tad ā car samanā purastāt     samānatas samanā prath     ṛta devī sadas budh     go na sarga uṣas jṛ     tad id nu eva samanā samāna     a mī varṇa uṣas car     guh abhva asita ruśat     śukra tanū śuci ruc     rayi div duhitṛ vibhā     prajāvat yam mad devī     syona ā tvad pratibudh     su vīrya pati as     tad tvad div duhitṛ vibhā     upa brū uṣas yajña ketu     mad as yaśas jana     tad div ca dhā pṛthivī ca devī 
      prati tya sūnara janī     vivas pari svasṛ     div dṛś duhitṛ     aśvā iva citra aruṣa     mātṛ go ṛtāvan     sakhi bhū aśvin uṣas     uta sakhi as aśvin     uta mātṛ go as     uta uṣas vasu īś     yāvay dveṣas tvad     cikitvit sūnṛtāvarī     prati stoma budh     prati bhadra dṛś     go sarga na raśmi     ā uṣas prā uru jrayas     āprā vibhāvan     vi vṛ jyotis tamas     uṣas anu svadhā av     ā div tan raśmi     ā antarikṣa uru priya     uṣas śukra śocis 
      tad deva savitṛ vārya mahat     vṛ asura pracetas     chardis yad dāś yam tman     tad mad mahat ud yam deva aktu     div dhartṛ bhuvana prajāpati     piśaṅga drāpi prati muc kavi     vicakṣaṇa prathay āpṛṇ uru     jan savitṛ sumna ukthya     āprā rajas divya pārthiva     śloka deva kṛ sva dharman     pra bāhu sṛj savitṛ savīman     niveśay prasū aktu jagant     adābhya bhuvana pracākaś     vrata deva savitṛ abhi rakṣ     prasṛj bāhu bhuvana prajā     dhṛ vrata mah ajma rāj     tris antarikṣa savitṛ mahitvana     tri rajas tri rocana     tri div pṛthivī tri i     tri vrata abhi mad rakṣ tman     bṛhat sumna prasavītṛ niveśana     jagat sthātṛ ubhaya yad vaśin     tad mad deva savitṛ śarman yam     mad kṣaya tri varūtha aṃhas     āgam deva ṛtu vṛdh kṣaya     dhā mad savitṛ su prajā iṣ     tad mad kṣapā aha ca jinv     prajāvat rayi mad sam inv 
      bhū deva savitṛ vand nu mad     idānīm ahar upavac nṛ     vi yad ratna bhaj mānava     śreṣṭha mad atra draviṇa yathā dhā     deva hi prathama yajñiya     amṛta tva sū bhāga uttama     āt id dāman savitṛ vi vṛ     anūcīna jīvita mānuṣa     acitti yad kṛ daivya jana     dīna dakṣa prabhūti pūruṣatvatā     deva ca savitṛ mānuṣa ca     tvad mad atra sū anāgas     na pramī savitṛ daivya tad     yathā viśva bhuvana dhāray     yad pṛthivī variman ā su aṅguri     varṣman div sū satya idam tad     indra jyeṣṭha bṛhat parvata     kṣaya idam sū pastyāvat     yathā yathā patay viyam     eva eva sthā savitṛ sava tvad     yad tvad tris ahar savitṛ sava     diva diva saubhaga āsū     indra dyāvāpṛthivī sindhu ap     āditya mad aditi śarman yam 
      ka tvad trā vasu ka varūtṛ     dyāvābhūmī aditi trā mad     sahīyas varuṇa mitra marta     ka tvad adhvara varivas dhā deva     pra yad dhāman pūrvya arc     vi yat vas viyotṛ amūra     vidhātṛ vi tad ajasra     ṛta dhīti ruc dasma     pra pastyā aditi sindhu arka     svasti īḍ sakhya devī     ubh yathā mad ahar nipā     uṣāsānaktā kṛ adabdha     vi aryaman varuṇa cit pathin     iṣ pati suvita gātu agni     indrāviṣṇu nṛvat u su stu     śarman mad yam amavat varūtha     ā parvata marut avas     deva trātṛ vṛ bhaga     pā pati janya aṃhas mad     mitra mitriya uta mad uruṣy     nu rodas ahi budhnya     stu devī apya iṣ     samudra na saṃcaraṇa saniṣyu     gharma svaras nadī apa vṛ     deva mad devī aditi ni pā     deva trātṛ trā aprayucchat     nahi mitra varuṇa dhāsi     arh pramī sānu agni     agni īś vasavya     agni mah saubhaga     tad mad rā     uṣas maghavan ā vah     sūnṛta vārya puru     mad vājinīvat     tad su mad savitṛ bhaga     varuṇa mitra aryaman     indra mad rādhas gam 
      mahi dyāvāpṛthivī iha jyeṣṭha     ruc bhū śocay arka     yat sīm variṣṭha bṛhat vimi     ru ha ukṣan prath eva     devī deva yajata yajatra     a mī sthā vakṣ     ṛtāvan adruh deva putra     yajña netrī śocay arka     tad id su apas bhuvana as     yad idam dyāvāpṛthivī jan     uru gabhīra rajas sumeka     a vaṃśa dhīra śacī sam īr     nu rodas bṛhat mad varūtha     patnīvat iṣay sajoṣas     uruvyañc viśva yajata ni pā     dhī as rathī sadāsā     pra tvad mah abhi     upastuti bhṛ     śuci upa praśasti     pū tanū mithas     sva dakṣa rāj     ūh sanāt ṛta     mah mitra sādh     tṛ pṛ ṛta     pari yajña ni sad 
      kṣetra pati mad     hita iva ji     go aśva poṣayitnu ā     tad mad mṛḍ īdṛś     kṣetra pati madhumat ūrmi     dhenu iva payas mad duh     madhuścut ghṛta iva su pū     ṛta mad pati mṛḍay     madhumat oṣadhī div ap     madhumat mad bhū antarikṣa     kṣetra pati madhumat mad as     a riṣ anu enad car     śuna vāha śuna nṛ     śuna kṛṣ lāṅgala     śuna varatrā bandh     śuna aṣṭrā ud iṅgay     śunāsīra idam vāc juṣ     yad div kṛ payas     tad idam upa sic     arvāñc subhaga bhū     sītā vand tvad     yathā mad subhaga as     yathā mad su phala as     indra sītā ni grah     tad pūṣan anu yam     tad mad payasvat duh     uttara uttara samā     śuna mad phāla vi kṛṣ bhūmi     śuna kīnāśa abhi i vāha     śuna parjanya madhu payas     śunāsīra śuna mad dhā 
      samudra ūrmi madhumat ud ṛch     upāṃśu sam amṛta tva naś     ghṛta nāman guhya yad as     jihvā deva amṛta nābhi     mad nāman pra brū ghṛta     idam yajña dhāray namas     upa brahman śru śaṃs     catur śṛṅga vam gaura etad     catur śṛṅga tri idam pāda     dvi śīrṣa saptan hasta idam     tridhā bandh vṛṣabha roro     maha deva martya ā viś     tridhā dhā paṇi guh     go deva ghṛta anu vid     indra eka sūrya eka jan     vena eka svadhā niḥ takṣ     etad ṛṣ hṛdya samudra     śata vraja ripu na avacakṣ     ghṛta dhārā abhi cākaś     hiraṇyaya vetasa madhya idam     samyañc sru sarit na dhenā     antar hṛd manas pū     etad ṛṣ ūrmi ghṛta     mṛga iva kṣipaṇu īṣ     sindhu iva prādhvana śūghana     vātapramī patay yahva     ghṛta dhārā aruṣa na vājin     kāṣṭhā bhid ūrmi pinv     abhi samanā iva yoṣā     kalyāṇa smi agni     ghṛta dhārā samidh nas     tad juṣ hary jātavedas     kanyā iva vahatu i u     añji añj abhi cākaś     yatra soma su yatra yajña     ghṛta dhārā abhi tad pū     abhi ṛṣ suṣṭuti gavya āji     mad bhadra draviṇa dhā     idam yajña nī devatā mad     ghṛta dhārā madhumat pū     dhāman tvad viśva bhuvana adhi śri     antar samudra hṛd antar āyus     ap anīka samitha yad ābhṛ     tad aś madhumat tvad ūrmi    budh agni samidh jana    prati dhenu iva e uṣas    yahva iva pra vayā ujjhā    pra bhānu sṛ nāka acchā    budh hotṛ yajatha deva    ūrdhva agni sumanas prātar sthā    samindh ruśat dṛś pājas    mahat deva tamas niḥ muc    yat īṃ gaṇa raśanā jāgṛ    śuci añj śuci go agni    āt dakṣiṇā yuj vājay    uttāna ūrdhva dhā juhū    agni acchā devay manas    cakṣus iva sūrya sam car    yat īṃ sū uṣas virūpa    śveta vājin jan agra ahar    jan hi jenya agra ahar    dhā dhā aruṣa vana    dama dama saptan ratna dhā    agni hotṛ ni sad ā yajīyas    agni hotṛ ni sad yajīyas    upastha mātṛ surabhi u loka    yuvan kavi puru niṣṭhā ṛtāvan    dhṛ kṛṣṭi uta madhya indh    pra nu tya vipra adhvara sādhu    agni hotṛ īḍ namas    ā yad tan rodas ṛta    nitya mṛj vājin ghṛta    mārjālya mṛj sva damūnas    kavi praśaṃs atithi śiva mad    sahasra śṛṅga vṛṣabha tad ojas    viśva agni sahas prā anya    pra sadyas agni ati i anya    āvis yad cārutama bhū    īḍ vapuṣya vibhāvan    priya viś atithi mānuṣa    tvad bhṛ kṣiti yaviṣṭha    bali agni antitas ā uta dūrāt    ā bhandiṣṭha sumati cit    bṛhat tvad agni mahi śarman bhadra    ā adya ratha bhānumat bhānumat    agni sthā yajata samanta    vid pathin uru antarikṣa    ā iha deva havis adya vah    vac kavi medhya    vacas vandāru vṛṣabha vṛṣan    gaviṣṭhira namas stoma agni    div iva rukma uruvyañc śri 
     kumāra mātṛ yuvati samubh    guhā bhṛ na dā pitṛ    anīka idam na mī jana    puras paś nidhā arati    ka etad tvad yuvati kumāra    peṣī bhṛ mahiṣī jan    puru hi garbha śarad vṛdh    paś jan yat sū mātṛ    hiraṇyadat śuci varṇa ārāt    kṣetra paś āyudha mā    dā idam amṛta vipṛkvat    ka mad anindra kṛ anuktha    kṣetra paś sanutar car    sumat yūtha na puru śubh    na tad grah jan hi tad    paliknī id yuvati bhū    ka mad maryaka vi yu go    na yad gopā araṇa cit as    yad īṃ grah ava tad sṛj    āj paśu upa mad cit    vas rājan vasati jana    arāti ni martya    brahman atri ava tad sṛj    ninditṛ nind bhū    śvan cit śepa nido sahasra    yūpa muc śam hi tad    eva mad agni vi muc pāśa    hotṛ cit iha tu niṣad    hṛṇīy apa hi mad i    pra mad deva vrata pā vac    indra vid anu hi tvad cakṣ    tad mad agni anuśās āgā    vi jyotis bṛhant bhā agni    āvis viśva kṛ mahitva    pra adeva māyā sah dureva    śā śṛṅga rakṣas vinikṣ    uta svāna div as agni    tigma āyudha rakṣas han u    mada cit idam pra ruj bhāma    na vṛ paribādh adeva    etad tvad stoma tuvi jan vipra    ratha na dhīra su apas takṣ    yadi id agni prati tvad deva hary    svarvat ap idam ji    tuvi grīvā vṛṣabha vṛdh    aśatru ari sam aj vedas    iti idam agni amṛta vac    barhiṣmat manu śarman yam    haviṣmat manu śarman yam 
     tvad agni varuṇa jan yad    tvad mitra bhū yat samindh    tvad viśva sahas putra deva    tvad indra dāś martya    tvad aryaman bhū yat kanī    nāma svadhāvat guhya bhṛ    añj mitra sudhita na go    yat dampati samanas kṛ    tvad śrī marut marjay    rudra yat tvad janiman cāru citra    pada yad viṣṇu upama nidhā    tad pā guhya nāman go    tvad śrī sudṛś deva deva    puru dhā amṛta sap    hotṛ agni manus ni sad    daśasy uśij śaṃsa āyu    na tvad hotṛ pūrva agni yajīyas    na kāvya para as svadhāvat    viś ca yad atithi bhū    tad yajña van deva marta    mad agni van tvota    vasūyu havis budh    mad samarya vidatha ahar    mad rai sahas putra marta    yad mad āgas abhi enas bhṛ    adhi id agha agha śaṃsa dhā    han cit abhiśasti etad    agni yad mad marcay dvaya    tvad idam vyuṣ deva pūrva    dūta kṛ yaj havya    saṃstha yat agni ī rayi    deva marta vasu indh    ava spṛ pitṛ yudh vid    putra yad tvad sahas sūnu ūh    kadā cit abhi cakṣ mad    agni ṛta cit yātay    bhūri nāman vand dhā    pitṛ vasu yadi tad joṣay    kuvid deva sahas kan    sumna agni van vṛdh    tvad aṅga jaritṛ yaviṣṭha    viśva agni durita ati pṛ    stena dṛś ripu jana    ajñāta keta vṛjina bhū    idam yāma tvadrik bhū    vasu vā tad id āgas vac    na aha idam agni abhiśasti mad    na riṣ vṛdh parā dā 
     tvad agni vasu pati vasu    abhi pra mand adhvara rājan    tvad vāja vājay ji    abhi as pṛtsuti martya    havyavah agni ajara pitṛ mad    vibhu vibhāvan su dṛśīka mad    su gārhapatya sam iṣ dīdī    asmadryañc sam mā śravas    viś kavi viśpati mānuṣa    śuci pāvaka ghṛta pṛṣṭha agni    ni hotṛ viśva vid dhā    tad deva van vārya    juṣ agni iḍā sajoṣas    yat raśmi sūrya    juṣ mad samidh jātavedas    ā ca deva havis adya vah    juṣ damūnas atithi duroṇa    idam mad yajña upa yā vid    viśva agni abhiyuj vihan    śatrūy ā bhṛ bhojana    vadha dasyu pra hi cātay    vayas kṛ tanū sva    pṛ yat sahas putra deva    tad agni pā nṛtama vāja mad    mad tvad agni uktha vidh    mad havya pāvaka bhadra śoci    mad rayi viśva vāra sam inv    mad viśva draviṇa dhā    mad agni adhvara juṣ    sahas sūnu triṣadhastha havya    mad deva su kṛt as    śarman mad tri varūtha pā    viśva mad durgaha jātavedas    sindhu na nau durita ati pṛ    agni atri vat namas gṛ    mad bhū av tanū    yad tvad hṛd kīrin man    amartya martya johav    jātavedas yaśas mad dhā    prajā agni amṛta tva aś    yad tvad su kṛt jātavedas    u loka agni kṛ syona    aśvin tad putrin vīravat    gomat rayi naś svasti 
     su samindh śocis    ghṛta tīvra hu    agni jātavedas    narāśaṃsa sūd    idam yajña adābhya    kavi hi madhu hastya    īḍ agni ā vah    indra citra iha priya    sukha ratha ūti    ūrṇamradas vi prath    abhi arka nū    bhū mad śubhra sāti    devī dvār vi śri    su prāyaṇa mad ūti    pra pra yajña pṛ    su pratīka vayas vṛdh    yahva ṛta mātṛ    doṣā uṣas ī    vāta patman īḍ    daivya hotṛ manus    idam mad yajña ā gam    iḍā sarasvatī mahī    tri devī mayobhu    barhis sad asridh    śiva tvaṣṭṛ iha ā gam    vibhu poṣa uta tman    yajña yajña mad ud av    yatra vid vanaspati    deva guhya nāman    tatra havya gāmay    svāhā agni varuṇa    svāhā indra marut    svāhā deva havis 
     agni tad man yad vasu    asta yad i dhenu    asta arvant āśu    asta nitya vājin    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    tad agni yad vasu gṛ    sam yad e dhenu    sam arvant raghudru    sam su jan sūri    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    agni hi vājin viś    dā viśvacarṣaṇi    agni rai su ābhū    tad prī yā vārya    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    ā tvad agni indh    dyumat deva ajara    yat ha tya tvad panīyas    samidh dīdī div    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    ā tvad agni ṛc havis    śukra śocis pati    su ścandra dasma viśpati    havyavah tvad hu    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    pra u tya agni agni    viśva puṣ vārya    tad hi tad i    tad iṣaṇy ānuṣak    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    tvad tya agni arci    mahi vrādh vājin    yad patvan śapha    vraja bhur go    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    nava mad agni ā bhṛ    stotṛ su kṣiti iṣ    tad as yad arc    tvādūta dama dama    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    ubh su ścandra sarpis    darvī śrī āsan    uta u mad ud pṛ    uktha śavas pati    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ    eva āṃ agni gir    gir yajña ānuṣak    dhā mad su vīrya    uta tya āśu aśvya    iṣ stotṛ ā bhṛ 
     sakhi sam tvad samyañc    iṣ stoma ca agni    varṣiṣṭha kṣiti    ūrj naptṛ sahasvat    kutra cit yad samṛti    raṇva nṛ nṛṣadana    arh cit yad indh    saṃjanay jantu    sam yat iṣ van    sam havya mānuṣa    uta dyumna śavas    ṛta raśmi ā dā    tad sma kṛ ketu ā    nakta cit dūra ā as    pāvaka yat vanaspati    pra sma mī ajara    ava sma yad veṣaṇa    sveda pathin hu    abhi īṃ aha sva jenya    bhūman pṛṣṭha iva ruh    yad martya puruspṛh    vid viśva dhāyas    pra svādana pitu    astatāti cit āyu    tad hi sma dhanvan akṣita    dātṛ na dā ā paśu    hiriśmaśru śucidat    ṛbhu a nibhraṃś taviṣī    śuci sma yad atri vat    pra svadhiti iva ri    suṣū sū mātṛ    kṛ yad aś bhaga    ā yad tvad sarpis āsuta    agni śam as dhāyas    ā idam dyumna uta śravas    ā citta martya dhā    iti cit manyu adhrija    tvādāta ā paśu dā    āt agni apṛṇat    atri sah dasyu    iṣ sah nṛ 
     tvad agni ṛtāyu sam indh    pratna pratna ūti sahaskṛta    puru ścandra yajata viśva dhāyas    damūnas gṛhapati vareṇya    tvad agni atithi pūrvya viś    śociṣkeśa gṛhapati ni sad    bṛhat ketu puru rūpa dhana spṛt    su śarman su avas jaradviṣ    tvad agni mānuṣa īḍ viś    hotrā vid vivici ratna dhātama    guhā as subhaga viśva darśata    tuviṣvaṇas su yaj ghṛta śrī    tvad agni dharṇasi viśvadhā mad    gir gṛ namas upa sad    tad mad juṣ samindh aṅgiras    deva marta yaśas su dīti    tvad agni puru rūpa viś viś    vayas dhā pratnathā puruṣṭuta    puru anna sahas vi rāj    tviṣi tad tvad tviṣ na ādhṛṣ    tvad agni samindh yaviṣṭhya    deva dūta kṛ havya vāhana    uru jrayas ghṛta yoni āhu    tveṣa cakṣus dhā coday mati    tvad agni pradiv āhu ghṛta    sumnāyu su samidh sam indh    tad vṛdh oṣadhī vakṣ    abhi jrayas pārthiva vi sthā 
     tvad agni haviṣmat    deva marta īḍ    man tvad jātavedas    tad havya vah ānuṣak    agni hotṛ dāsvat    kṣaya vṛj barhis    sam yajña car yad    sam vāja śravasyu    uta sma yad śiśu yathā    nava jan araṇī    dhartṛ mānuṣa    viś agni su adhvara    uta sma durgṛbhīy    putra na hvārya    puru yad dah vana    agni paśu na yavasa    adha sma yad arci    samyak sami dhūmin    yat īṃ aha trita div    upa dhmātṛ iva dham    śā dhmātṛ yathā    tvad mad agni ūti    mitra ca praśasti    dveṣoyut na durita    tur martya    tad mad agni abhi nara    rayi sah ā bhṛ    tad kṣepay tad poṣay    bhū vāja sāti    uta as pṛt mad vṛdh 
      agni ojiṣṭha ā bhṛ     dyumna mad adhrigu     pra mad rai parīṇas     rad vāja pathin     tvad mad agni adbhuta     kratu dakṣa maṃhanā     tvad asurya āruh     krāṇā mitra na yajñiya     tvad mad agni idam     gaya puṣṭi ca vardhay     yad stoma pra sūri     nṛ magha aś     yad agni candra tvad gir     śubh aśva rādhas     śuṣma śuṣmin nṛ     div cit yad bṛhat     su kīrti budh tman     tvad tya agni arci     bhrāj i dhṛṣṇuyā     parijman na vidyut     svāna ratha na vājayu     nu mad agni ūti     sabādhas ca rāti     asmāka ca sūri     viśva āśā tṛ     tvad mad agni aṅgiras     stu stu ā bhṛ     hotṛ vibhvāsah rayi     stotṛ stu ca mad     uta as pṛt mad vṛdh 
      jana gopā jan jāgṛvi     agni su dakṣa suvita navyas     ghṛta pratīka bṛhat divispṛś     dyumat vi bhā bharata śuci     yajña ketu prathama purohita     agni nṛ triṣadhastha sam indh     indra deva sa ratha sa barhis     sad ni hotṛ yajatha sukratu     a sammṛj jan mātṛ śuci     mandra kavi ud sthā vivasvant     ghṛta tvad vardhay agni āhu     dhūma tvad ketu bhū div śri     agni mad yajña upa vī sādhuyā     agni nṛ vi bhṛ gṛha gṛha     agni dūta bhū havyavāhana     agni vṛ vṛ kavi kratu     tvad idam agni madhumattama vacas     tvad manīṣā idam as śam hṛd     tvad gir sindhu iva avani mahī     ā pṛṇ śavas vardhay ca     tvad agni aṅgiras guhā dhā     anu vid śri vana vana     tad jan math sahas mahat     tvad ah sahas putra aṅgiras 
      pra agni bṛhat yajñiya     ṛta vṛṣan asura manman     ghṛta na yajña āsya su pū     gir bhṛ vṛṣabha pratyañc     ṛta cit ṛta id cit     ṛta dhārā anu tṛd puru     na mad yātu sahas na dvaya     ṛta sap aruṣa vṛṣan     ka mad agni ṛtay ṛta     bhū navedas ucatha navyas     vid mad deva ṛtu pā ṛtu     na mad pati sanitṛ idam rai     ka tvad agni ripu bandhana     ka pāyu san dyumat     ka dhāsi agni anṛta pā     ka asat vacas as gopā     sakhi tvad viṣuṇa agni etad     śiva as aśiva bhū     dhvṛ svayam etad vacas     ṛjūy vṛjina brū     yad tvad agni namas yajña īḍ     ṛta tad pā aruṣa vṛṣan     tad kṣaya pṛthu ā sādhu i     prasarsṛ nahuṣa śeṣas 
      arc tvad hvā     arc sam indh     agni arc ūti     agni stoma man     sidhra adya divispṛś     deva draviṇasyu     agni juṣ mad gir     hotṛ yad mānuṣa ā     tad yaj daivya jana     tvad agni saprathas as     juṣ hotṛ vareṇya     tvad yajña vi tan     tvad agni vāja sātama     vipra vṛdh suṣṭuta     tad mad rā su vīrya     agni nemi ara iva     deva tvad paribhū as     ā rādhas citra ṛj 
      agni stoma bodhay     samindh amartya     havya deva mad dhā     tad adhvara īḍ     deva marta amartya     yajiṣṭha mānuṣa jana     tad hi śaśvat īḍ     sruc deva ghṛtaścut     agni havya vah     agni jan ruc     han dasyu jyotis tamas     vid go ap svar     agni īḍ kavi     ghṛta pṛṣṭha sapary     vī mad śru hava     agni ghṛta vṛdh     stoma viśvacarṣaṇi     su ādhī vacasyu
