      pra vedhas kavi vid     gir bhara yaśas pūrvya     ghṛta prasad asura su śeva     rai dhṛ dharuṇa vasu agni     ṛta ṛta dharuṇa dhāray     yajña śāka parama vyoman     div dharman dharuṇa sad nṛ     jan a jan abhi yad nakṣ     aṃhoyu tanū tan vi     vayas mahat duṣṭara pūrvya     tad saṃvat nava jan tur     siṃha na krudh abhitas pari sthā     mātṛ iva yat bhṛ prath     jana jana dhāyas cakṣ ca     vayas vayas jṛ yat dhā     pari tman viṣurūpa gā     vāja nu tvad śavas pā anta     uru dogha dharuṇa deva rai     pada na tāyu guhā dhā     mah rai citay atri spṛ 
      bṛhat vayas hi bhānu     arc deva agni     yad mitra na praśasti     marta dhā puras     tad hi div jana     hotṛ dakṣa bāhu     vi havya agni ānuṣak     bhaga na vāra ṛch     idam stoma maghavan     sakhya vṛdh śocis     viśva yad tuviṣvaṇi     sam arya śuṣma ādhā     adha hi agni idam     su vīrya maṃhanā     tad id yahva na rodas     pari śravas bhū     nu mad e vārya     agni gṛ ā bhṛ     yad mad yad ca sūri     svasti dhā sacā     uta as pṛt mad vṛdh 
      ā yajña deva martya     itthā tavyas ūti     agni kṛ su adhvara     pūru īḍ av     idam hi sva yaśastara     ās vidharman man     tad nāka citra śocis     mandra paras manīṣā     idam vā ās u arcis     yad āyuj tuj gir     div na yad retas     bṛhat śuc arci     idam kratu vicetas     dasma vasu ratha ā     adha viśva hu     agni viś pra śaṃs     nu mad id hi vārya     ās sac sūri     ūrj napāt abhiṣṭi     pā śak svasti     uta as pṛt mad vṛdh 
      prātar agni puru priya     viś stu atithi     viśva yad amartya     havya marta raṇ     dvita mṛktavāhas     sva dakṣa maṃhanā     indu tad dhā ānuṣak     stotṛ cit tvad amartya     tad tvad dīrgha āyu śocis     gir hvā maghavan     ariṣṭa yad ratha     vi aśva dāvan i     citra vā yad dīdhiti     āsan uktha pā yad     stṛ barhis svarṇara     śravas dhā pari     yad mad pañcāśat dā     aśva sadhastuti     dyumat agni mahi śravas     bṛhat kṛ maghavan     nṛvat amṛta nṛ 
      abhi avasthā pra jan     pra vavri vavri cit     upastha mātṛ vi cakṣ     hu vi citay     animiṣa nṛmṇa pā     ā dṛḍha pur viś     ā śvaitreya jantu     dyumat vṛdh kṛṣṭi     niṣka grīvā bṛhaduktha     idam madhu na vājayu     priya dugdha na kāmya     ajāmi jāmi sacā     gharma na vāja jaṭhara     adabdha śaśvat dabha     krīḍ mad raśmi ā bhū     sam bhasman vāyu vevid     tad idam as dhṛṣaj na tigma     su saṃśā vakṣi vakṣaṇesthā 
      yad agni vāja sātama     tvad cit man rayi     tad mad gir śravāyya     devatrā panay yuj     yad agni na īray tvad     vṛdh ugra śavas     apa dveṣas apa hvaras     anya vrata sac     hotṛ tvad vṛ     agni dakṣa sādhana     yajña pūrvya gir     prayasvat hvā     itthā yathā tvad ūti     sahasāvat diva diva     rai ṛta su kratu     go as sadhamād     vīra as sadhamād 
      manuṣvat tvad ni dhā     manuṣvat sam indh     agni manuṣvat aṅgiras     deva devay yaj     tvad hi mānuṣa jana     agni su prī indh     sruc tvad i ānuṣak     su jan sarpis āsuti     tvad viśva sajoṣas     deva dūta kṛ     sapary tvad kavi     yajña deva īḍ     deva tvad deva yajya     agni īḍ martya     samindh śukra dīdī     ṛta yoni āsad     sasa yoni āsad 
      pra viśvasāman atri vat     arc pāvaka śocis     yad adhvara īḍ     hotṛ mandratama viś     ni agni jātavedas     dhā deva ṛtvij     pra yajña i ānuṣak     adya deva vyacastama     cikitvinmanas tvad     deva marta ūti     vareṇya tvad avas     ī man     agni cit idam mad     idam vacas sahasya     tad tvad su śiprā dampati     stoma vṛdh atri     gir śubh atri 
      agni sah ā bhṛ     dyumna prāsah rayi     viśva yad carṣaṇi abhi     ās vāja sah     tad agni pṛtanāṣāh     rayi sahasvat ā bhṛ     tvad hi satya adbhuta     dātṛ vāja gomat     viśva hi tvad sajoṣas     jana vṛj barhis     hotṛ sadman priya     vī vārya puru     tad hi sma viśvacarṣaṇi     abhimāti sahas dhā     agni idam kṣaya ā     revat mad śukra dīdī     dyumat pāvaka dīdī 
      agni tvad no antama     uta trātṛ śiva bhū varūthya     vasu agni vasu śravas     acchā naś dyumattama rayi dā     tad mad budh śru hava     uruṣy mad aghāy sama     tad tvad śociṣṭha dīdī     sumna nūnam ī sakhi 
      acchā tvad agni avas     deva gā tad mad vasu     rā putra ṛṣu     ṛtāvan pṛ dviṣ     tad hi satya yad pūrva cit     deva cit yad indh     hotṛ mandra jihvā id     su dīti vibhāvasu     tad mad dhīti variṣṭha     śreṣṭha ca sumati     agni rai dīdī mad     suvṛkti vareṇya     agni deva rāj     agni marta āviś     agni mad havya vāhana     agni dhī sapary     agni tuvi śravastama     tuvi brahman uttama     a tṛ śrāvay pati     putra dā dāś     agni dā sat pati     sah yad yudh nṛ     agni atya raghuṣyad     jetṛ a parāji     yad vāhiṣṭha tad agni     bṛhat arc vibhāvasu     mahiṣī iva tvad rayi     tvad vāja ud īr     tvad dyumat arci     grāvan iva vac bṛhat     uta u tvad tanyatu yathā     svāna ṛch tman div     eva āṃ agni vasūyu     sah vand     tad mad viśva ati dviṣ     pṛ nau iva su kratu 
      agni pāvaka rocis     mandra deva jihvā     ā deva vah yaj ca     tad tvad ghṛtasnu ī     citrabhānu svar dṛś     deva ā vīti vah     vītihotra tvad kavi     dyumat sam indh     agni bṛhat adhvara     agni viśva ā gam     deva havya dāti     hotṛ tvad vṛ     yaj su     ā agni su vīrya vah     deva ā sad barhis     samindh sahasra jit     agni dharma puṣ     deva dūta ukthya     ni agni jātavedas     hotra vāha yaviṣṭhya     dhā deva ṛtvij     pra yajña i ānuṣak     adya deva vyacastama     stṛ barhis āsad     ā idam marut aśvin     mitra sad varuṇa     deva sarva viś 
      anasvat sat pati mah mad     go cetiṣṭha asura maghavan     traivṛṣṇa agni daśan sahasra     vaiśvānara tryaruṇa cit     yad mad śata ca viṃśati ca go     hari ca yuj su dhur dā     vaiśvānara suṣṭuta vṛdh     agni yam tryaruṇa śarman     eva tvad agni sumati kan     naviṣṭha navama trasadasyu     yad mad gir tuvi jan puru     yuj abhi tryaruṇa gṛ     yad mad iti pravac     aśvamedha sūri     dā ṛc sani i     dā medhā ṛtāy     yad mad paruṣa śata     uddharṣay ukṣan     aśvamedha dāna     soma iva tri āśir     indra agni śata dāvan     aśvamedha su vīrya     kṣatra dhāray bṛhat     div sūrya iva ajara 
      samindh agni div śocis śri     pratyañc uṣas urviyā vi bhā     i prāñc viśva vāra namas     deva īḍ havis ghṛtāñc     samindh amṛta rāj     havis kṛ sac svasti     viśva tad dhā draviṇa yad inv     ātithya agni ni ca dhā id puras     agni śṛdh mahat saubhaga     tvad dyumna uttama as     sam jāspatya su yama ā kṛ     śatrūy abhi sthā mahas     samindh pramahas     agni vand tvad śrī     vṛṣabha dyumnavat as     sam adhvara indh     samindh agni āhu     deva yaj su adhvara     tvad hi havyavah as     ā hu ā duvasy     agni pre adhvara     vṛ havyavāhana 
      tri aryaman manus devatāti     tri rocana divya dhāray     arc tvad marut pū dakṣa     tvad idam ṛṣi indra as dhīra     anu yat īṃ marut mand     arc indra pā suta     ādā vajra abhi yat ahi han     ap yahva sṛj sṛ u     uta brahman marut mad idam     indra soma suṣuta pā     tad hi havya manus go vid     han ahi pā indra idam     āt rodas vitaram vi skabhāy     saṃvye cit bhiyas mṛga kṛ     jigarti indra apajargur     prati śvas ava dānava han     adha kratu maghavan tvad deva     anu viśva dā soma peya     yat sūrya harit pat     puras as upara etaśa kṛ     navan yat idam navati ca bhoga     sākam vajra maghavan vivraśc     arc indra marut sadhastha     traiṣṭubha vacas bādh div     sakhi sakhi pac tūya agni     idam kratu mahiṣa tri śata     tri sākam indra manus saras     su pā vṛtra hatya soma     tri yat śata mahiṣa ghas     mās tri saras maghavan somya pā     kāra na viśva hvā deva     bhara indra yat ahi han     uśanā yat sahasya yā     gṛha indra jū aśva     van atra sa ratha yā     kutsa deva van ha śuṣṇa     pra anya cakra vṛh sūrya     kutsa anya varivas yā kṛ     an ās dasyu mṛṇ vadha     ni duryoṇa āvṛj mṛdhra vāc     stoma tvad gaurivīti vṛdh     randhay vaidathina pipru     ā tvad ṛjiśvan sakhya kṛ     pac pakti pā soma idam     navagva su soma indra     daśagva abhi arc arka     gavya cit ūrva apidhānavat     tad cit nṛ śam apa vṛ     kathā u nu tvad pari car vid     vīrya maghavan yad kṛ     yad ca u nu navya kṛ śaviṣṭha     pra id u tad tvad vidatha brū     etad viśva kṛ indra bhūri     aparīta janus vīrya     yad cit nu vajrin kṛ dhṛṣ     na tvad vartṛ taviṣī as tad     indra brahman kṛ juṣ     yad tvad śaviṣṭha navya kṛ     vastra iva bhadra su kṛ vasūyu     ratha na dhīra su apas takṣ 
      kva tya vīra ka paś indra     sukha ratha i hari     yad rai vajrin su soma iṣ     tad oka gam puruhūta ūti     avacakṣ pada idam sasvar     ugra nidhātṛ anu i iṣ     pracch anya uta tad mad ah     indra nṛ budh aś     pra nu mad suta yad tvad kṛta     indra brū yad mad juṣ     vid a vidvas śru ca vid     vah idam maghavan sarva senā     sthira manas kṛ jan indra     vī id eka yudh bhūyas cit     aśman cit śavas didyut vi     vid go ūrva usriya     paras yat tvad parama ājan     parāvat śrutya nāman bhṛ     atas cit indra bhī deva     viśva ap ji dāsa patnī     tvad id etad marut su śeva     arc arka su andhas     ahi ūh ap āśī     pra māyā māyin sah indra     vi su mṛdh janus dāna i     han go maghavan saṃkan     atra dāsa namuci śiras yat     vartay manu gātu iṣ     yuj hi mad kṛ āt id indra     śiras dāsa namuci mathāy     aśman cit svarya vṛt     pra cakriya iva rodas marut     strī hi dāsa āyudha kṛ     ka mad kṛ abala idam senā     antar hi khyā ubh idam dhenā     atha upa pre yudh dasyu indra     sam atra go abhitas nū     iha iha vatsa viyu yat as     sam tad indra sṛj idam śāka     yat īṃ soma suṣuta mad     yat īṃ soma babhru dhū mad     roro vṛṣabha sādana     puraṃdara pā indra idam     punar go dā usriya     bhadra idam ruśama agni kṛ     go catur dā sahasra     ṛṇaṃcaya prayam magha     prati grah nṛtama nṛ     supeśas mad ava sṛj asta     go sahasra ruśama agni     tīvra indra mand suta     aktu vyuṣṭi paritakmya     vas tad rātri paritakmya yad     ṛṇaṃcaya rājan ruśamā     atya na vājin raghu añj     babhru catur san sahasra     catur sahasra gavya paśu     prati grah ruśama agni     gharma cit tap pravṛj yad as     ayasmaya tad u ādā vipra 
      indra ratha pravat kṛ     yad adhiṣṭhā maghavan vājay     yūtha iva paśu vi u gopā     ariṣṭa yā prathama siṣās     ā pra dru harivat mā vi ven     piśaṅga rāti abhi mad sac     nahi tvad indra vasyas anya as     amena cit janivat kṛ     ud yat sahas sahas ājan     dediś indra indriya viśva     pracoday su dugha vavra antar     vi jyotis saṃvṛt tamas vṛ     anu tvad ratha aśva takṣ     tvaṣṭṛ vajra puruhūta dyumat     brahman indra mahay arka     vardhay ahi han u     vṛṣan yat tvad vṛṣan arka arc     indra grāvan aditi sajoṣas     an aśva yad pavi a ratha     indra iṣay abhi vṛt dasyu     pra tvad pūrva karaṇa vac     pra nūtana maghavan yad kṛ     śaktīvat yat vibhṛ rodas ubh     ji ap manu dānu citra     tad id nu tvad karaṇa dasma vipra     ahi yat han ojas atra mā     śuṣṇa cit pari māyā grah     prapitva i apa dasyu sidh     tvad ap yadu turvaśa     ramay su dugha pāra indra     ugra yā vah ha kutsa     sam ha yat tvad uśanā ram deva     indrākutsa vah ratha     ā tvad atya api karṇa vah     niḥ sīm ap dham niḥ sadhastha     maghavan hṛd vṛ tamas     vāta yuj su yuj cit aśva     kavi cit etad gam avasyu     viśva tvad atra marut sakhi     indra brahman taviṣī vṛdh     svar cit ratha paritakmyā     pūrva kṛ upara jū     bhṛ cakra etaśa sam ri     puras dhā san kratu mad     e jana abhicakṣ gam     indra sakhi su soma iṣ     vad grāvan ava vedi bhṛ     yad jīra adhvaryu car     yad kan kan nu tvad     marta amṛta mā u tad aṃhas ārch     van yajyu uta tad dhā     ojas jana yad tad as 
      dardar utsa sṛj vi kha     tvad arṇava badbadh ram     mahat indra parvata vi yat vṛ     sṛj vi dhārā ava dānava han     tvad utsa ṛtu badbadh     raṃh ūdhas parvata vajrin     ahi cit ugra prayuta śī     han indra taviṣī dhā     tya cit mahat niḥ mṛga     vadhar han taviṣī indra     yad eka id aprati man     āt idam anya jan tavyas     tya cit idam svadhā mad     mih napāt suvṛdh tamas gā     vṛṣan prabharman dānava bhāma     vajra vajrin ni han śuṣṇa     tya cit idam kratu niṣad     amarman vid id idam marman     yat īṃ su kṣatra prabhṛti mada     yuyuts tamas harmya dhā     tya cit itthā katpaya śī     asūrya tamas vṛdh     tad cit mad vṛṣabha suta     uccais indra apagur han     ud yat indra mahat dānava     vadhar yam sahas apratīta     yat īṃ vajra prabhṛti dabh     viśva jantu adhama kṛ     tya cit arṇa madhupa śī     asinva vavra mahi ādā ugra     a pāda atra mahat vadha     ni duryoṇa āvṛj mṛdhra vāc     ka idam śuṣma taviṣī vṛ     eka dhana bhṛ apratīta     idam cit idam jrayas nu devī     indra ojas bhiyas hā     ni idam devī svadhiti hā     indra gātu vaś iva yam     sam yat ojas yu viśva idam     anu svadhāvan kṣiti nam     eka nu tvad sat pati pāñcajanya     jan śru yaśas jana     tad mad grah āśas naviṣṭha     doṣā vastu hvā indra     eva hi tvad ṛtuthā yātay     magha vipra dā śru     kim tvad brahman sakhi     yad tvāyā nidhā kāma indra 
      mahi mah tavas dhī nṛ     indra itthā tavas a tavyas     yad idam sumati vājasāti     stu jana samarya cit     tad tvad mad indra dhiyasāna arka     hari vṛṣan yoktra śri     yā itthā maghavan anu joṣa     vah abhi pra ari sah jana     na tad tvad indra abhi mad ṛṣva     a yuj a brahman tā yat as     sthā ratha adhi tad vajra hasta     ā raśmi deva yam su aśva     puru yad tvad indra as uktha     go kṛ urvarā yudh     takṣ sūrya cit oka sva     vṛṣan samad dāsa nāman cit     mad tad tvad indra yad ca nṛ     śardhas jan yā ca ratha     ā mad gam ahi śuṣma satvan     bhaga na hvā prabhṛtha cāru     papṛkṣeṇya indra tvad hi ojas     nṛmṇa ca nṛt amarta     tad na ena vasavāna rayi dā     pra arya stu tuvi magha dāna     eva mad indra ūti ava     pā gṛ śūra kāru     uta tvac dā vājasāti     prī madhu suṣuta cāru     uta tya mad paurukutsya sūri     trasadasyu hiraṇin rā     vah mad daśan śyeta idam     gairikṣita kratu nu sac     uta tya mad mārutāśva śoṇa     kratvāmagha vidatha rāti     sahasra mad cyavatāna dā     ānūka arya vapus na arc     uta tya mad dhvanya juṣ     lakṣmaṇya su ruc yat     mahan rai saṃvaraṇa ṛṣi     vraja na go prayam api gam 
      ajāta śatru ajara svarvat     anu svadhā amita dasma i     su pac brahman vāhas     puruṣṭuta prataram dhā     ā yad soma jaṭhara pṛ     mand maghavan madhu andhas     yat īṃ mṛga han mahat vadha     sahasra bhṛṣṭi uśanas vadha yam     yad idam ghraṃsa uta vā yad ūdhas     soma su bhū dyumat aha     apa apa śakra tatanuṣṭi ūh     tanū śubhra maghavan yad kavāsakha     yad vadh pitṛ yad mātṛ     yad śakra bhrātṛ na atas īṣ     vī id u idam prayam yataṃkara     na kilbiṣa īṣ vasu ākara     na pañcan daśan vaś ārabh     na a su sac puṣ cana     jyā vā id adas han vā dhuni     ā devayu bhaj gomat vraja     vitvakṣaṇa samṛti cakramāsaja     a su viṣuṇa su vṛdha     indra viśva dam vibhīṣaṇa     yathāvaśam nī dāsa ārya     sam īṃ paṇi aj bhojana muṣ     vi dāś bhaj sūnara vasu     durga cana dhṛ viśva ā puru     jana yad idam taviṣī krudh     sam yat jana su dhana viśva śardhas     vid indra maghavan go śubhri     yuj hi anya kṛ pravepanin     ud īṃ gavyā sṛj satvan dhuni     sahasra sā āgniveśi gṛ     śatri agni upamā ketu ari     tad ap saṃyat pyā     tad kṣatra amavat tveṣa as 
      yad tvad sādhiṣṭha av     indra kratu tad ā bhṛ     mad carṣaṇī sah     sasni vāja duṣṭara     yat indra tvad catur     yat śūra as tri     yat vā pañcan kṣiti     avas tad su mad ā bhṛ     ā tvad avas vareṇya     vṛṣantama hvā     vṛṣa jūti hi jan     ābhū indra turvaṇi     vṛṣan hi as rādhas     jan vṛṣan tvad śavas     svakṣatra tvad dhṛṣ manas     satrāha indra pauṃsya     tvad tad indra martya     amitray adrivat     sarvarathā śatakratu     ni yā śavas pati     tvad id vṛtra hantama     jana vṛj barhis     ugra puru pūrvya     hvā vājasāti     mad indra duṣṭara     puras yāvan āji     sa yāvan dhana dhana     vājay av ratha     mad indra i mad     ratha av puraṃdhi     mad śaviṣṭha vārya     div śravas dhā     div stoma man 
      tad ā gam indra yad vasu     cit dā dāman rayi     dhanvan cara na vaṃsaga tṛṣ     kam pā duh aṃśu     ā tvad hanu harivat śūra śiprā     ruh soma na parvata pṛṣṭha     anu tvad rājan arvant na hi     gir mad puruhūta viśva     cakra na vṛt puruhūta vip     manas bhī mad amati id adrivat     ratha adhi tvad jaritṛ sadāvṛdha     kuvid nu stu maghavan purūvasu     etad grāvan iva jaritṛ tvad indra     ṛch vāc bṛhat āśuṣ     pra savya maghavan yam rai     pra dakṣiṇit harivat mā vi ven     vṛṣan tvad vṛṣan vṛdh div     vṛṣan vṛṣan vah hari     tad mad vṛṣan vṛṣan ratha su śiprā     vṛṣan kratu vṛṣa vajrin bhara dhā     yad rohita vājin vājinīvat     tri śata sac diś     yuvan sam idam kṣiti nam     śru ratha marut duvoyā 
      sam bhānu yat sūrya     āhu ghṛta pṛṣṭha svañcas     tad amṛdhra uṣas vi vas     yad indra su iti ah     samindh agni van stṛ barhis     yuj grāvan su soma jṛ     grāvan yad iṣira vad     i adhvaryu havis ava sindhu     vadhū idam pati iṣ i     yad īṃ vah mahiṣī iṣira     ā idam śravasy ratha ā ca ghuṣ     puru sahasra pari vartay     na tad rājan vyath yad indra     tīvra soma pā go sakhi     ā satvana aj han vṛtra     kṣi kṣiti subhaga nāma puṣ     puṣ kṣema abhi yoga bhū     ubh vṛt sami sam ji     priya sūrya priya agni bhū     yad indra su soma dāś 
      uru tvad indra rādhas     vibhu rāti śatakratu     adha mad viśvacarṣaṇi     dyumna su kṣatra maṃhay     yad īṃ indra śravāyya     iṣ śaviṣṭha dhā     prath dīrghaśruttama     hiraṇya varṇa duṣṭara     śuṣma yad tvad adrivat     mehanā ketasap     ubh deva abhiṣṭi     div ca gam ca rāj     uta u mad idam ka cit     dakṣa tvad vṛtrahan     mad nṛmṇa ā bhṛ     mad nṛmaṇasy     nu tvad idam abhiṣṭi     tvad śarman śatakratu     indra as su gopā     śūra as su gopā 
      yad indra citra mehanā     as tvādāta adrivat     rādhas tad mad vidadvasu     ubhayāhasti ā bhṛ     yad man vareṇya     indra dyukṣa tad ā bhṛ     vid tad tvad mad     akūpāra dā     yad tvad ditsu prarādh     manas as śru bṛhat     tad dṛḍha cit adrivat     ā vāja dṛ sāti     maṃhiṣṭha tvad maghavan     rājan carṣaṇi     indra upa praśasti     puru juṣ gir     idam id kāvya vacas     uktha indra śaṃs     tad u brahman vāhas     gir vṛdh atri     gir śubh atri 
      ā yā adri su     soma soma pati pā     vṛṣan indra vṛṣan vṛtra hantama     vṛṣan grāvan vṛṣan mada     vṛṣan soma idam su     vṛṣan indra vṛṣan vṛtra hantama     vṛṣan tvad vṛṣan hvā     vajrin citra ūti     vṛṣan indra vṛṣan vṛtra hantama     ṛjīṣin vajrin vṛṣabha turāṣāh     śuṣmin rājan vṛtrahan soma pāvan     yuj hari upa yā arvāñc     mādhyaṃdina savana mad indra     yat tvad sūrya svarbhānu     tamas vyadh āsura     a kṣetra vid yathā muh     bhuvana dhī     svarbhānu adha yat indra māyā     avas div vṛt avahan     guh sūrya tamas apavrata     turīya brahman vid atri     mā mad idam tvad as atri     irasyā druh bhiyas ni gṛ     tvad mitra as satya rādhas     tad mad iha av varuṇa ca rājan     grāvan brahman yuj sapary     kīrin deva namas upaśikṣ     atri sūrya div cakṣus ādhā     svarbhānu apa māyā guh     yad vai sūrya svarbhānu     tamas vyadh āsura     atri tad anu vid     nahi anya śak 
      ka nu tvad mitrāvaruṇa ṛtāy     div vā mah pārthiva vā dā     ṛta vā sadas trā mad     yajñāy vā paśu sā na vāja     tad mad mitra varuṇa aryaman āyu     indra ṛbhukṣan marut juṣ     namas vā yad dhā suvṛkti     stoma rudra mīḍhvas sa joṣa     ā tvad yeṣṭha aśvin hvā     vāta patman rathya puṣṭi     uta vā div asura manman     pra andhas iva yajyu bhṛ     pra sakṣaṇa divya kaṇva hotṛ     trita div sajoṣas vāta agni     pūṣan bhaga prabhṛtha viśva bhoja     āji na gam āśvaśvatama     pra tvad rayi yuj aśva bhṛ     rai eṣa av dhā dhī     su śeva eva auśija hotṛ     yad tvad eva marut tura     pra tvad vāyu ratha yuj kṛ     pra deva vipra panitṛ arka     iṣudhyu ṛtasāp puraṃdhi     vasu mad atra patnī ā dhī dhā     upa tvad iṣ vand śūṣa     pra yahva div citay arka     uṣāsānaktā vid iva viśva     ā ha vah martya yajña     abhi tvad arc poṣyāvat nṛ     vāstoṣpati tvaṣṭṛ rā     dhanya sajoṣas dhiṣaṇā namas     vanaspati oṣadhi rai eṣa     tuj mad tan parvata as     svaitu yad vasu na vīra     pan āptya yajata sadā mad     vṛdh mad śaṃsa narya abhiṣṭi     vṛṣan stu bhūmya garbha     trita napāt ap suvṛkti     gṛ agni etarī na śūṣa     śociṣkeśa ni ri vana     kathā mah rudriya brū     ka rai cit bhaga     ap oṣadhī uta mad av     div vana giri vṛkṣa keśa     śru mad ūrj pati gir tad     nabhas tarīyas iṣira parijman     śru ap puras na śubhra     pari sruc bṛṃh adri     vid cit nu mahat yad tvad eva     brū dasma vārya dhā     vi cana su bhū ava i     kṣubh marta anuyam vadhasna     ā daivya pārthiva janman     ap ca acchā su makha vac     vṛdh div gir candra agra     udan vṛdh abhiṣan arṇa     pada pada mad jariman ni dhā     varūtṛ vā śakra yad pāyu ca     sac mātṛ mah rasā mad     smat sūri ṛju hasta ṛju vani     kathā dāś namas sudānu     eva yā marut acchokti     praśravas marut acchokti     mā mad ahi budhnya riṣ dhā     mad bhū upamāti vani     iti cit nu prajā paśumat     deva van martya tvad     ā deva van martya tvad     atra śiva tanū dhāsi idam     jarā cit mad nirṛti gras     tad tvad deva sumati ūrjay     iṣ aś vasu śasā go     tad mad sudānu mṛḍay devī     prati dru suvita gam     abhi mad iḍā yūtha mātṛ     smat nadī urvaśī vā gṛ     urvaśī vā bṛhat diva gṛ     abhivṛ prabhṛtha āyu     sac mad ūrjavya puṣṭi 
      pra śaṃtama varuṇa dīdhiti gir     mitra bhaga aditi nūnam aś     pṛṣat yoni pañcan hotṛ śru     a tṛ pathin asura mayobhu     prati mad stoma aditi grah     sūnu na mātṛ hṛdya su śeva     brahman priya deva dhā yad as     mad mitra varuṇa yad mayobhu     ud īray kavitama kavi     und enad abhi madhu ghṛta     tad mad vasu prayam dhā     candra deva savitṛ sū     sam indra mad manas nī go     sam sūri harivat sam svasti     sam brahman deva dhā yad as     sam deva sumati yajñiya     deva bhaga savitṛ rai aṃśa     indra vṛtra saṃji dhana     ṛbhukṣan vāja uta vā purandhi     av mad amṛta tura     marutvat apratīta jiṣṇu     a jṛ pra brū kṛta     na tvad pūrva maghavan na apara     na vīrya nūtana ka cana āp     upa stu prathama ratna dheya     bṛhaspati sanitṛ dhana     yad śaṃs stu śambhaviṣṭha     purūvasu āgam johav     tvad ūti sac ariṣṭa     bṛhaspati maghavan su vīra     yad aśva dā uta vā as go dā     yad vastra dā subhaga tad rai     visarman kṛ vitta idam     yad bhuj apṛṇat mad uktha     apavrata prasava vṛdh     brahman dviṣ sūrya yāvay     yad ūh rakṣas deva vīti     acakra tad marut ni yā     yad tvad śamī śam nind     tucchya kāma kṛ svid     tad u stu yad su iṣu su dhanvan     yad viśva kṣi bheṣaja     yaj mah saumanasa rudra     namas deva asura duvasy     damūnas apas yad su hasta     vṛṣan patnī nadī vibhvan takṣ     sarasvatī bṛhat diva uta rākā     daśasy varivasy śubhra     pra su mah su śaraṇa medhā     gir bhṛ navyas jan     yad āhanas duhitṛ vakṣaṇā     rūpa mī kṛ idam mad     pra suṣṭuti stanay ru     iḍ pati jaritṛ nūnam aś     yad abdimat udanimat ṛch     pra vidyut rodas ukṣ     etad stoma māruta śardhas acchā     rudra sūnu yuvanyu ud aś     kāma rai hvā mad svasti     upa stu pṛṣat aśva ayās     pra etad stoma pṛthivī antarikṣa     vanaspati oṣadhī rai aś     deva deva su hava bhū mad     mā mad mātṛ pṛthivī durmati dhā     uru deva anibādha as     sam aśvin avas nūtana     mayobhu su praṇīti gam     ā mad rayi vah ā uta vīra     ā viśva amṛta saubhaga 
      ā dhenu payas tūrṇi artha     a mṛdh upa mad i madhu     mah rai bṛhat saptan vipra     mayobhu jaritṛ johav     ā suṣṭuti namas vartay     div vāja pṛthivī amṛdhra     pitṛ mātṛ madhu vacas su hasta     bhara bhara mad yaśas av     adhvaryu kṛ madhu     pra vāyu bhṛ cāru śukra     hotṛ iva mad prathama pā idam     deva madhu rā tvad mada     daśan kṣip yuj bāhu adri     soma yad śamitṛ su hasta     madhu rasa su gabhasti giriṣṭhā     giriṣṭhā duh śukra aṃśu     su tvad juṣ soma     kratu dakṣa bṛhat mada     hari ratha su dhura yoga arvāk     indra priya kṛ hvā     ā mad mah aramati sajoṣas     gnā deva namas rā havya     madhu mada bṛhat ṛta jña     ā agni vah pathin deva yāna     añj yad prathay na vipra     vapāvat na agni tap     pitṛ na putra upas preṣṭha     ā gharma agni ṛtay sad     acchā mah bṛhat śaṃtama gir     dūta na gam aśvin hvā     mayobhu sa ratha yā arvāk     gam nidhi dhur āṇi na nābhi     pra tavyas namaukti tura     mad pūṣan uta vāyu diś     yad rādhas coditṛ mati     yad vāja draviṇas dā uta tman     ā nāman marut vah viśva     ā rūpa jātavedas hvā     yajña gir jaritṛ suṣṭuti ca     viśva gam marut viśva ūti     ā mad div bṛhat parvata ā     sarasvatī yajata gam yajña     hava devī juṣ ghṛtāñc     śagma mad vāc vaś śru     ā vedhas nīla pṛṣṭha bṛhat     bṛhaspati sadana sāday     sādadyoni dama ā dīdī     hiraṇya varṇa aruṣa sap     ā dharṇasi bṛhat diva rā     viśva gam oman hvā     gnā vas oṣadhi amṛdhra     tri dhātu śṛṅga vṛṣabha vayodhas     mātṛ pada parama śukra āyu     vipanyu rāspira gam     su śevya namas rā havya     śiśu mṛj āyu na vāsa     bṛhat vayas bṛhat tvad agni     dhī jur mithuna sac     deva deva su hava bhū mad     mā mad mātṛ pṛthivī durmati dhā     uru deva anibādha as     sam aśvin avas nūtana     mayobhu su praṇīti gam     ā mad rayi vah ā uta vīra     ā viśva amṛta saubhaga 
      tad pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathā imathā     jyeṣṭhatāti barhiṣad svarvid     pratīcīna vṛjana duh     ji anu yad vṛdh     śrī su dṛśi upara yad svar     viruc kakubha a cud     su gopā as na dabh sukratu     paras māyā ṛta as nāman tvad     atya havis sac as ca dhātu ca     ariṣṭa gātu tad hotṛ sahas bhari     prasarsṛ anu barhis vṛṣan śiśu     madhya yuvan ajara visruh dhā     pra tvad etad su yuj yāman iṣṭi     nyāñc adas yamī ṛtāvṛdh     suyantu sarva śāsa abhīśu     krivi nāman pravaṇa muṣāy     saṃjarbhur taru sutegṛbh     vayākin cit garbha susvaru     dhāravāka ṛju gāthā śubh     vṛdh patnī abhi jīva adhvara     yādṛś eva dṛś tādṛś vac     sam chāyā dhā sidhra ap ā     mahī mad uru sā uru jrayas     bṛhat su vīra an apacyu sahas     vī agru janivat vai ati spṛdh     samary manas sūrya kavi     ghraṃsa rakṣ pari viśvatas gaya     mad śarman van svāvasu     jyāyas idam yatuna ketu     ṛṣi svara car yad nāman tvad     yādṛś dhā tad apasyā vid     yad u svayam vah tad aram kṛ     samudra idam ava sthā agrima     na riṣ savana yad āyam     atra na hārdi kravaṇa rej     yatra mati vid pū bandhana     tad hi kṣatra manasa citti     evāvada yajata sadhri     avatsāra spṛ raṇvan     śaviṣṭha vāja vid cit ṛdh     śyena idam aditi kakṣya mada     viśva vāra yajata māyin     sam anya anya arthay i     vid viṣāṇa paripāna anti tad     sadāpṛṇa yajata vi dviṣ vadh     bāhuvṛkta śrutavid tarya tvad sacā     ubh sa vara prati i bhā ca     yat īṃ gaṇa bhaj suprayāvan     sutambhara yajamāna sat pati     viśva ūdhas tad dhī     bhṛ dhenu rasavat śri payas     anubrū adhi i na svap     yad jāgṛ tad ṛc kāmay     yad jāgṛ tad u sāman i     yad jāgṛ tad idam soma ah     tvad mad as sakhya nyokas     agni jāgṛ tad ṛc kāmay     agni jāgṛ tad u sāman i     agni jāgṛ tad idam soma ah     tvad mad as sakhya nyokas 
      vid div viṣā adri uktha     e uṣas arcin gā     apavṛ vrajin ud svar gā     vi dvār mānuṣa deva vṛ     vi sūrya amati na śrī sā     ā ūrva go mātṛ jñā gā     dhanū arṇas nadī khādoarṇa     sthūṇā iva su mā dṛh div     idam uktha parvata garbha     mahi janus pūrvya     vi parvata hā sādh div     āvivās dasay bhūman     sūkta tvad vacas deva juṣ     indra nu agni avas hvā     uktha hi sma kavi su yajña     āvivās marut yaj     nu adya sudhī bhū     pra ducchunā mi varīyas     āre dveṣas sanutar dhā     āyā prāñc yaj acchā     dhī kṛ sakhi     apa yad mātṛ ṛch vraja go     yad manu viśiśipra ji     yad vaṇij vaṅku āp purīṣa     nū atra hasta yam adri     arc yad daśan mās navagva     ṛta i saramā go vid     viśva satya aṅgiras kṛ     viśva idam vyuṣ māhina     sam yat go aṅgiras nū     utsa idam parama sadhastha     ṛta pathin saramā vid go     ā sūrya yā saptan aśva     kṣetra yad idam urviyā dīrgha yātha     raghu śyena patay andhas acchā     yuvan kavi dīdī go gam     ā sūrya ruh śukra arṇas     yuj yat harit vīta pṛṣṭha     udan na nau nī dhīra     āśru ap arvāk sthā     dhī tvad ap dhā svarṣā     yad tṛ daśan mās navagva     idam dhī as deva gopā     idam dhī tur ati aṃhas 
      haya na vid yuj svayam dhur     tad vah prataraṇa avasyu     na idam vaś vimuc na āvṛt punar     vid pathin puraetṛ ṛju nī     agni indra varuṇa mitra deva     śardhas pra yam māruta uta viṣṇu     ubh nāsatya rudra adha gnā     pūṣan bhaga sarasvatī juṣ     indra agni mitrāvaruṇa aditi svar     pṛthivī div marut parvata ap     hvā viṣṇu pūṣan brahmaṇaspati     bhaga nu śaṃsa savitṛ ūti     uta mad viṣṇu uta vāta asridh     draviṇas dā uta soma mayas kṛ     uta ṛbhu uta rai mad aśvin     uta tvaṣṭṛ uta vibhvan anu man     uta tya mad māruta śardhas ā gam     divikṣaya yajata barhis āsad     bṛhaspati śarman pūṣan uta mad yam     varūthya varuṇa mitra aryaman     uta tya mad parvata su śasti     su dīti nadī trāman bhū     bhaga vibhaj śavas avas gam     uru vyacas aditi śru mad hava     deva patnī vaś av mad     prāv mad tuj vājasāti     yad pārthiva yad ap api vrata     tad mad devī su hava śarman yam     uta gnā vī deva patnī     indrāṇī agnāyī aśvinī rāj     ā rodas varuṇānī śru     vī devī yad ṛtu jani 
      prayuj div i brū     mah mātṛ duhitṛ bodhay     āvivās yuvati manīṣā     pitṛ ā sadana johav     ajira tad apas i     āsthā amṛta nābhi     ananta uru viśvatas sīm     pari dyāvāpṛthivī i pathin     ukṣan samudra aruṣa suparṇa     pūrva yoni pitṛ ā viś     madhya div nidhā pṛśni aśman     vi kram rajas pā anta     catur īṃ bhṛ kṣemay     daśan garbha car dhāpay     tri dhātu parama idam go     div car pari sadyas anta     idam vapus nivacana jana     car yat nadī sthā ap     dvi yat īṃ bhṛ mātṛ anya     iha iha jan yamya sabandhu     vi tan dhī idam apas     vastra putra mātṛ ve     upapṛc vṛṣan mud     div pathin vadhū i acchā     tad as mitrāvaruṇa tad agni     śam yos mad idam as śaṃs     aś gādha uta pratiṣṭhā     namas div bṛhat sādana 
      ka u priya dhāman man     sva kṣatra sva yaśas mah mad     āmenya rajas yat abhra     ap vṛ vitan māyin     tad tan vayuna vīra vakṣaṇa     samāna vṛtā viśva ā rajas     apa u apāñc apara apej     pra pūrva tṛ devayu jana     ā grāvan ahanya aktu     variṣṭha vajra ā ghṛ māyin     śata vā yad pracar sva dama     saṃvartay vi ca vartay aha     tad idam rīti paraśu iva prati     anīka khyā bhuj idam varpas     sacā yadi pitumat iva kṣaya     ratna dhā bharahūti viś     tad jihvā catur anīka ṛj     cāru vas varuṇa yat ari     na tad vid puruṣa tva tā mad     yatas bhaga savitṛ dā vārya 
      deva tvad adya savitṛ iṣ     bhaga ca ratna vibhaj āyu     ā tvad nṛ puru bhuj vṛt     diva diva cit aśvin sakhīy     prati prayāṇa asura vid     sūkta deva savitṛ duvasy     upa brū namas vijñā     jyeṣṭha ca ratna vibhaj āyu     a dattra yā day vārya     pūṣan bhaga aditi vastu usṛ     indra viṣṇu varuṇa mitra agni     ahar bhadra janay dasma     tad mad anarvan savitṛ varūtha     tad sindhu iṣay anu gam     upa yat vac adhvara hotṛ     rai as pati vāja ratna     pra yad vasu īvat ā namas dā     yad mitra varuṇa sūkta vāc     ave abhva kṛ varīyas     divaspṛthivī avas mad 
      viśva deva netṛ     marta vṛ sakhya     viśva rai iṣudhy     dyumna vṛ puṣ     tad tvad deva netṛ     yad ca idam anuśaṃs     tad rai tvad hi āpṛc     sac sacathya     atas mad ā nṛ atithi     atas patnī daśasy     āre viśva patheṣṭhā     dviṣ yu yūyuvi     yatra vahni abhidhā     dru droṇya paśu     nṛmaṇas vīra pastyā     arṇa dhīra iva san     etad tvad deva netṛ     rathaspati śam rayi     śam rai śam svasti     iṣa stut man     deva stut man 
      agni suta pīti     viśva ūma ā gam     deva havya dāti     ṛta dhīti ā gam     satya dharman adhvara     agni pā jihvā     vipra vipra santya     prātaryāvan ā gam     deva soma pīti     idam soma camū su     amatra pari sic     priya indra vāyu     vāyu ā yā vīti     juṣ havya dāti     pā su andhas     abhi prayas     indra ca vāyu idam     suta pīti arh     tad juṣ arepas     abhi prayas     su indra vāyu     soma dadhi āśir     nimna na i sindhu     abhi prayas     sajūs viśva deva     aśvin uṣas sajūs     ā yā agni atri vat     suta ran     sajūs mitrāvaruṇa     sajūs soma viṣṇu     ā yā agni atri vat     suta ran     sajūs āditya vasu     sajūs indra vāyu     ā yā agni atri vat     suta ran     svasti mad mā aśvin bhaga     svasti devī aditi anarvan     svasti pūṣan asura dhā mad     svasti dyāvāpṛthivī su cetu     svasti vāyu upa brū     soma svasti bhuvana yad pati     bṛhaspati sarva gaṇa svasti     svasti āditya bhū mad     viśva deva mad adya svasti     vaiśvānara vasu agni svasti     deva av ṛbhu svasti     svasti mad rudra pā aṃhas     svasti mitrāvaruṇa     svasti pathyā revat     svasti mad indra ca agni ca     svasti mad aditi kṛ     svasti pathin anu car     sūryācandramas iva     punar dā a han     jñā sam gam 
      pra śyāvāśva dhṛṣṇuyā     arc marut ṛkvan     yad adrogha anuṣvadham     śravas mad yajñiya     tad hi sthira śavas     sakhi as dhṛṣṇuyā     tad yāman ā dhṛṣadvin     tman pā śaśvat     tad syandra na ukṣan     ati skand śarvarī     marut adha mahas     div kṣam ca man     marut tvad dhā     stoma yajña ca dhṛṣṇuyā     viśva yad mānuṣa yuga     pā martya riṣ     arh yad sudānu     nṛ asāmi śavas     pra yajña yajñiya     div arc marut     ā rukma ā yudh nṛ     ṛṣva ṛṣṭi sṛj     anu enad aha vidyut     marut jajhjhatī iva     bhānu ṛch tman div     yad vṛdh pārthiva     yad uru antarikṣa ā     vṛjana vā nadī     sadhastha vā mah div     śardhas māruta ud śaṃs     satya śavas ṛbhvas     uta sma tad śubh nṛ     pra syandra yuj tman     uta sma tad paruṣṇī     ūrṇā vas śundhyu     uta pavi ratha     adri bhid ojas     āpathi vipathi     antaspatha anupatha     e mad nāman     yajña viṣṭāra ūh     adha nṛ ni ūh     adha niyut ūh     adha pārāvata iti     citra rūpa darśya     chanda stubh kubhanyu     utsa ā kīrin nṛt     tad mad kaścit na tāyu     ūma as dṛś tviṣ     yad ṛṣva ṛṣṭi vidyut     kavi as vedhas     tad ṛṣi māruta gaṇa     namasy ramay gir     acchā ṛṣi māruta gaṇa     dāna mitra na yoṣaṇā     div vā dhṛṣṇu ojas     stu dhī iṣaṇy     nu man idam     deva acchā na vakṣaṇā     dāna sac sūri     yāma śru añji     pra yad mad bandhu eṣa     go vac sūri     pṛśni vac mātṛ     adha pitṛ iṣmin     rudra vac śikvas     saptan mad saptan śākina     eka eka śata dā     yamunā adhi śru     ud rādhas gavya mṛj     ni rādhas aśvya mṛj 
      ka vid jāna idam     ka vā purā sumna as marut     yat yuj kilāsī     ā etad ratha sthā     ka śru kathā yā     ka sṛ sudās anu āpi     iḍā vṛṣṭi saha     tad mad ah yad āyā     upa div vi mada     nṛ marya arepas     idam paś iti stu     yad añji yad vāśī sva bhānu     sraj rukma khādi     śrāya ratha dhanvan     tvad sma ratha anu     mud dhā marut jīra dānu     vṛṣṭi div i iva     ā yad nṛ sudānu dāś     div kośa cyu     vi parjanya sṛj rodas anu     dhanvan i vṛṣṭi     tṛd sindhu kṣodas rajas     pra sṛ dhenu yathā     syand aśva iva adhvan vimocana     vi yat vṛt enī     ā yā marut div     āntarikṣa amāt uta     mā ava sthā parāvat     mā tvad rasā anitabhā kubhā krumu     mā tvad sindhu ni ram     mā tvad pari sthā sarayu purīṣin     mad id sumna as tvad     tad tvad śardha ratha     tveṣa gaṇa māruta navyas     anu pra i vṛṣṭi     śardha śardha tvad idam     vrāta vrāta gaṇa gaṇa su śasti     anu kram dhīti     ka adya sujāta     rā havya pra yā     idam yāma marut     yad toka tanaya dhānya     bīja vah akṣita     mad tad dhā yad tvad ī     rādhas viśvāyu saubhaga     atī nid tiras svasti     hā avadya arāti     vṛṣ śam yos ap usṛ bheṣaja     as marut saha     su deva samaha as     su vīra nara marut tad martya     yad trā as tad     stu bhoja stu idam yāman     ran go na yavasa     i pūrva iva sakhi anu hvā     gir gṛ kāmin 
      pra śardha māruta sva bhānu     idam vāc añj parvata cyut     gharma stubh div ā pṛṣṭha yajvan     dyumna śravas mah nṛmṇa arc     pra tvad marut taviṣa udanyu     vayovṛdh aśva yuj parijri     sam vidyut dhā vāś trita     svar ap avani parijri     vidyut mahas nṛ aśman didyu     vāta tviṣ marut parvata cyut     abdayā cit muhur ā hrādunī vṛ     stanay ama rabhasa udojas     vi aktu rudra vi ahar śikvas     vi antarikṣa vi rajas dhūti     vi yat ajra aj nau īṃ yathā     vi durga marut na aha riṣ     tad vīrya tvad marut mahitvana     dīrgha tan sūrya na yojana     e na yāma a grah śocis     an aśva dā yat ni yā giri     bhrāj śardhas marut yat arṇasa     muṣ vṛkṣa kapanā iva vedhas     adha sma mad aramati sajoṣas     cakṣus iva i anu nī suga     na tad ji marut na han     na sridh na vyath na riṣ     na idam rai upa das na ūti     ṛṣi vā yad rājan vā sūd     niyutvat grāma jit yathā nṛ     aryaman na marut kabandhin     pinv utsa yat ina svar     vi und pṛthivī madhu andhas     pravatvat idam pṛthivī marut     pravatvat div bhū pre     pravatvat pathyā antarikṣya     pravatvat parvata jīra dānu     yat marut sabharas svarṇṛ     sūrya udi mad div nṛ     na tvad aśva śrathay aha sṛ     sadyas idam adhvan pāra aś     aṃsa tvad ṛṣṭi pad khādi     vakṣas rukma marut ratha śubh     agni bhrājas vidyut gabhasti     śiprā śīrṣan vitan hiraṇyaya     tad nāka ari a grah śocis     ruśat pippala marut vi dhū     sam añc vṛjana atitviṣ yat     svar ghoṣa vitan ṛtāyu     yuṣmādatta marut vicetas     rai as rathī vayasvat     na yad yu tiṣya yathā div     mad ran marut sahasrin     tvad rayi marut spārha vīra     tvad ṛṣi av sāman vipra     tvad arvant bharata vāja     tvad dhā rājan śruṣṭimat     tad tvad yā draviṇa sadyaūti     yad svar na tan nṛ abhi     idam su mad marut hary vacas     yad tṛ taras śata himā 
      prayajyu marut bhrāj ṛṣṭi     bṛhat vayas dhā rukma vakṣas     ī aśva su yama āśu     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     svayam dhā taviṣī yathā vid     bṛhat mahat urviyā vi rāj     uta antarikṣa mā vi ojas     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     sākam jan su bhū sākam vakṣ     śrī cit ā prataram vṛdh nṛ     virokin sūrya iva raśmi     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     ābhūṣeṇya tvad marut mahitvana     didṛkṣeṇya sūrya iva cakṣaṇa     uta u mad amṛta tva dhā     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     ud īray marut samudra     tvad vṛṣṭi varṣay purīṣin     na tvad dasra upa das dhenu     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     yat aśva dhur pṛṣatī yuj     hiraṇyaya prati atka muc     viśva id spṛdh marut vi as     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     na parvata na nadī vṛ tvad     yatra ci marut gam id u tad     uta dyāvāpṛthivī yā pari     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     yad pūrvya marut yad ca nūtana     yad vad vasu yad ca śaṃs     viśva tad bhū navedas     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     mṛḍ mad marut mā vadh     mad śarman bahula vi yam     adhi stotra sakhya gā     śubh yā anu ratha vṛdh     tvad mad nī vasyas acchā     niḥ aṃhati marut gṛ     juṣ mad havya dāti yajatra     mad as pati rayi 
      agni śṛdh ā gaṇa     piṣ rukma añji     viś adya marut av hvā     div cit rocana adhi     yathā cit man hṛd     tad id mad gam āśas     yad tvad nediṣṭha havana āgam     tad vṛdh bhīma saṃdṛś     mīḍhuṣmat iva pṛthivī parāhan     mad i mad ā     ṛkṣa na tvad marut śimīvat ama     dudhra go iva bhīmayu     ni yad ri ojas     vṛthā go na durdhur     aśman cit svarya parvata giri     pra cyāvay yāman     ud sthā nūnam idam     stoma saṃvakṣ     marut purutama apūrvya     go sarga iva hvā     yuj hi aruṣa ratha     yuj ratha rohit     yuj hari ajira dhur vah     vahiṣṭha dhur vah     uta tya vājin aruṣa tuviṣvaṇi     iha sma dhā darśata     mā tvad yāma marut ciram kṛ     pra tad ratha cud     ratha nu māruta mad     śravasyu ā hvā     ā yad sthā suraṇa bhṛ     sacā marut rodasī     tad tvad śardha ratheśubh     tveṣa panasyu ā hvā     yad su jan subhaga mahīy     sacā marut mīḍhvas 
      rudra indravat sajoṣas     hiraṇya ratha suvita gam     idam tvad mad prati hary mati     tṛṣṇaj na div utsa udanyu     vāśīmat ṛṣṭimat manīṣin     su dhanvan iṣumat niṣaṅgin     su aśva as su ratha pṛśni mātṛ     su āyudha marut yā śubh     dhū div parvata dāś vasu     ni tvad vana hā yāman bhī     kopay pṛthivī pṛśni mātṛ     śubh yat ugra pṛṣatī yuj     vāta tviṣ marut varṣa nirṇij     yama iva su sadṛś su peśas     piśaṅga aśva aruṇa aśva arepas     pratvakṣas mahina div iva uru     puru drapsa añjimat sudānu     tveṣa saṃdṛś anavabhra rādhas     sujāta janus rukma vakṣas     div arka amṛta nāman bhaj     ṛṣṭi tvad marut aṃsa adhi     sahas ojas bāhu tvad bala dhā     nṛmṇa śīrṣan āyudha ratha tvad     viśva tvad śrī adhi tanū piś     gomat aśvāvat rathavat su vīra     candravat rādhas marut dā mad     praśasti mad kṛ rudriya     bhakṣ tvad avas daivya     haye nṛ marut mṛḍ mad     tuvīmagha amṛta ṛta jña     satya śrut kavi yuvan     bṛhat giri bṛhat vakṣ 
      tad u nūnam taviṣīmat idam     stu gaṇa māruta navyas     yad āśu aśva amavat vah     uta īś amṛta svarāj     tveṣa gaṇa tavas khādi hasta     dhuni vrata māyin dāti vāra     mayobhu yad amita mahitva     vand vipra tuvi rādhas nṛ     ā tvad i udan vāha adya     vṛṣṭi yad viśva marut jū     idam yad agni marut samindh     etad juṣ kavi yuvan     tvad rājan irya jana     vibhvan takṣ janay yajatra     tvad i muṣṭi han bāhu jū     tvad sat aśva marut su vīra     ara iva id a carama aha iva     pra pra jan akava mahas     pṛśni putra upama rabhiṣṭha     sva mati marut sam myakṣ     yat prayā pṛṣatī aśva     vīḍu pavi marut ratha     kṣud ap ri vana     ava usriya vṛṣabha krand div     prath yāman pṛthivī cit idam     bhartṛ iva garbha sva icchu dhā     vāta hi aśva dhur āyuj     varṣa sveda kṛ rudriya     haye nṛ marut mṛḍ mad     tuvīmagha amṛta ṛta jña     satya śrut kavi yuvan     bṛhat giri bṛhat vakṣ 
      pra tvad spaś krand suvita dā     arc div pra pṛthivī ṛta bhṛ     ukṣ aśva ā rajas     anu sva bhānu śrathay arṇava     ama idam bhiyas bhūmi ej     nau na pṛ kṣar vyathis i     dūredṛś yad citay eman     antar maha vidatha yat nṛ     go iva śrī śṛṅga uttama     sūrya na cakṣus rajas visarjana     atya iva su bhū cāru as     marya iva śrī cit nṛ     ka tvad mahat mahat ud aś     ka kāvya marut ka ha pauṃsya     tvad ha bhūmi kiraṇa na rej     pra yat bhṛ suvita dā     aśva iva id aruṣa sa bandhu     śūra iva prayudh pra uta yudh     marya iva suvṛdh vṛdh nṛ     sūrya cakṣus pra mī vṛṣṭi     tad a jyeṣṭha a kaniṣṭha udbhid     a madhyama mahas vi vṛdh     su jan janus pṛśni mātṛ     div marya ā mad acchā gā     vi na yad śreṇi pat ojas     anta div bṛhat sānu pari     aśva idam ubhaya yathā vid     pra parvata nabhanu cyu     mā div aditi vī mad     sam dānu citra uṣas yat     ācyu divya kośa etad     ṛṣi rudra marut gṛ 
      īḍ agni su avas namas     iha prasad vi ci kṛta mad     ratha iva pra bhṛ vājay     pradakṣiṇit marut stoma ṛdh     ā yad sthā pṛṣatī śru     sukha rudra marut ratha     vana cit ugra hā ni tvad bhī     pṛthivī cit rej parvata cit     parvata cit mahi vṛdh bhī     div cit sānu rej svana tvad     yat krīḍ marut ṛṣṭimat     ap iva sadhryañc dhav     vara iva id raivata hiraṇya     abhi svadhā tanū piś     śrī śreyas tavas ratha     satrā mahas kṛ tanū     a jyeṣṭha a kaniṣṭha etad     sam bhrātṛ vṛdh saubhaga     yuvan pitṛ su apas rudra idam     su dugha pṛśni su dina marut     yat uttama marut madhyama vā     yat vā avama subhaga div as     atas mad rudra uta vā nu idam     agni vid havis yad yaj     agni ca yat marut viśva vedas     div vah uttara adhi snu     tad mand dhuni riśādas     vāma dhā yaj su     agni marut śubhay ṛkvan     soma pā mand gaṇaśri     pāvaka viśvaminva āyu     vaiśvānara pradiv ketu sajūs 
      ka as nṛ śreṣṭhatama     yad eka eka āyā     parama parāvat     kva tvad aśva kva abhīśu     katham śak kathā yā     pṛṣṭha sadas nas yama     jaghana coda idam     vi saktha nṛ yam     putrakṛtha na jani     parā vīra e     marya bhadra jānī     agnitap yathā as     san tad aśvya paśu     uta gavya śatāvaya     śyāvāśva stu yad     dos vīra upabarbṛh     uta tva strī śaśīyas     puṃs bhū vasyas     adevatra arādhas     vi yad jñā jasuri     vi tṛṣ vi kāmin     devatrā kṛ manas     uta gha nema a stu     puṃs iti brū paṇi     tad vaira deya id sama     uta mad rap yuvati mand     prati śyāva vartani     vi rohita purumīḍha yam     vipra dīrgha yaśas     yad mad dhenu śata     vaidadaśvi yathā dā     taranta iva maṃhanā     yad īṃ vah āśu     pā madira madhu     atra śravas dhā     yad śrī adhi rodas     vibhrāj ratha ā     div rukma iva upari     yuvan tad māruta gaṇa     tveṣa ratha anedya     śubhaṃyāvan apratiṣkuta     ka vid nūnam idam     yatra mad dhūti     ṛta jan arepas     tvad marta vipanyu     praṇī itthā dhī     śru yāman hūti     tad mad vasu kāmya     puru ścandra riśādas     ā yajñiya vṛt     etad mad stoma ūrmyā     dārbhya parā vah     gir devī rathī iva     uta mad vac iti     su soma rathavīti     na kāma apa vī mad     etad kṣi rathavīti     maghavan gomatī anu     parvata apaśri 
      ṛta ṛta apidhā dhruva tvad     sūrya yatra vimuc aśva     daśan śata saha sthā tad eka     deva śreṣṭha vapus paś     tad su tvad mitrāvaruṇa mahitva     īrmā sthā aha duh     viśva pinv svasara dhenā     anu tvad eka pavi ā vṛt     dhāray pṛthivī uta div     mitra rājan varuṇa mahas     vardhay oṣadhi pinv go     ava vṛṣṭi sṛj jīra dānu     ā tvad aśva su yuj vah     yam raśmi upa i arvāk     ghṛta nirṇij anu vṛt tvad     upa sindhu pradiv kṣar     anu śru amati vṛdh uru     barhis iva yajus rakṣ     namasvat dhṛtadakṣa adhi garta     mitra ās varuṇa iḍā antar     a kravi hasta su kṛt paraspā     yad trā varuṇa iḍā antar     rājan kṣatra a hṛṇīy     sahasra sthūṇā bhṛ saha dvi     hiraṇya nirṇij ayas idam sthūṇā     vi bhrāj div aśvājanī iva     bhadra kṣetra nimā tilvila vā     san madhu adhigartya     hiraṇya rūpa uṣas vyuṣṭi     ayas sthūṇā uditi sūrya     ā ruh varuṇa mitra garta     atas cakṣ aditi diti ca     yad baṃhiṣṭha na ativyadh sudānu     acchidra śarman bhuvana gopa     tad mad mitrāvaruṇa av     siṣās ji as 
      ṛta gopā adhi sthā ratha     satya dharman parama vyoman     yad atra mitrāvaruṇa av tvad     tad vṛṣṭi madhumat pinv div     samrāj idam bhuvana rāj     mitrāvaruṇa vidatha svar dṛś     vṛṣṭi tvad rādhas amṛta tva ī     dyāvāpṛthivī vi car tanyu     samrāj ugra vṛṣabha div pati     pṛthivī mitrāvaruṇa vicarṣaṇi     citra abhra upa sthā rava     div varṣay asura māyā     māyā tvad mitrāvaruṇa div śri     sūrya jyotis car citra āyudha     tad abhra vṛṣṭi guh div     parjanya drapsa madhumat īr     ratha yuj marut śubh sukha     śūra na mitrāvaruṇa gaviṣṭi     rajas citra vi car tanyu     div samrāj payas mad ukṣ     vāc su mitrāvaruṇa irāvat     parjanya citra vad tviṣīmat     abhra vas marut su māyā     div varṣay aruṇa arepas     dharman mitrāvaruṇa vipaścit     vrata rakṣ asura māyā     ṛta viśva bhuvana vi rāj     sūrya ā dhā div citrya ratha 
      varuṇa tvad riśādas     ṛc mitra hvā     pari vraja iva bāhu     gam svarṇṛ     tad bāhu sucetunā     pra yam idam arc     śeva hi jārya tvad     viśva kṣā joguv     yat nūnam aś gati     mitra yā patha     idam priya śarman     a hiṃs sac     tvad mitrāvaruṇa     upama dhā ṛc     yad ha kṣaya maghavan     stotṛ ca spṛdh     ā mad mitra su dīti     varuṇa ca sadhastha ā     sva kṣaya maghavan     sakhi ca vṛdh     tvad mad yad varuṇa     kṣatra bṛhat ca bhṛ     uru mad vājasāti     kṛ rai svasti     vas mad yajata     devakṣatra ruśadgu     su soma na hastin     ā pad dhāv nṛ     bhṛ arcanānas 
      yad cit tad su kratu     devatrā tad brū mad     varuṇa yad darśata     mitra vā van gir     tad hi śreṣṭha varcas     rājan dīrghaśruttama     tad sat pati ṛtāvṛdh     ṛtāvan jana jana     tad tvad ī av     pūrva upa brū sacā     su aśva su cetu     vāja abhi pra dā     mitra aṃhu cit āt uru     kṣaya gā van     mitra hi pratūrv     sumati as vidh     mad mitra avas     as saprathastama     anehas tvoti     satrā varuṇa śeṣas     tvad mitra idam jana     yat sam ca nī     mā maghavan pari khyā     mā u mad ṛṣi     gopītha mad uruṣy 
      ā cit su kratu     deva marta riśādas     varuṇa ṛta peśas     dhā prayas mah     tad hi kṣatra a vihruta     samyak asurya aś     adha vrata iva mānuṣa     svar na dhā darśata     tad tvad eṣa ratha     uru gavyūti idam     rātahavya suṣṭuti     dadhṛṣ stoma man     adha hi kāvya tvad     dakṣa pur adbhuta     ni ketu jana     ci pū dakṣas     tad ṛta pṛthivī bṛhat     śravas eṣa ṛṣi     jrayasāna aram pṛthu     ati kṣar yāman     ā yat tvad īyacakṣas     mitra mad ca sūri     vyaciṣṭha bahu pāyya     yat sva rājya 
      baṭ itthā deva niṣkṛta     āditya yajata bṛhat     varuṇa mitra aryaman     varṣiṣṭha kṣatra aś     ā yat yoni hiraṇyaya     varuṇa mitra sad     dhartṛ carṣaṇi     yam sumna riśādas     viśva hi viśva vedas     varuṇa mitra aryaman     vrata pada iva sac     pā martya riṣ     tad hi satya ṛta spṛś     ṛtāvan jana jana     su nītha sudānu     aṃhu cit uru cakri     ka nu tvad mitra a stu     varuṇa vā tanū     tad su tvad iṣ mati     atri iṣ mati 
      pra tvad mitra gā     varuṇa vip gir     mahi kṣatra ṛta bṛhat     samrāj yad ghṛta yoni     mitra ca ubh varuṇa ca     deva deva praśaṃs     tad mad śak pārthiva     mah rai divya     mahi tvad kṣatra deva     ṛta ṛta sap     iṣira dakṣa aś     adruh deva vṛdh     vṛṣṭi div rīti ap     iṣ pati dānumat     bṛhat garta aś 
      tri rocana varuṇa tri uta div     tri mitra dhāray rajas     vṛdh amati kṣatriya     anu vrata rakṣ ajurya     irāvat varuṇa dhenu tvad     madhumat tvad sindhu mitra duh     tri sthā vṛṣabha tri     dhiṣaṇā retodhā vi dyumat     prātar devī aditi johav     madhyaṃdina uditi sūrya     rai mitrāvaruṇa sarvatāti     īḍ toka tanaya śam yos     yad dhartṛ rajas rocana     uta āditya divya pārthiva     na tvad deva amṛta ā mī     vrata mitrāvaruṇa dhruva 
      purūruṇā cit hi as     avas nūnam tvad varuṇa     mitra van tvad sumati     tad tvad samyak adruhvan     iṣ aś dhāyas     mad tad rudra as     pā mad rudra pāyu     uta trā su trātra     tur dasyu tanū     mā ka adbhuta kratu     yakṣa bhuj tanū     mā śeṣas mā tanas 
      ā mad gam riśādas     varuṇa mitra barhaṇā     upa idam cāru adhvara     viśva hi pracetas     varuṇa mitra rāj     īś pyā dhī     upa mad suta ā gam     varuṇa mitra dāś     idam soma pā 
      ā mitra varuṇa mad     gir hu atri vat     ni barhis sad soma pīti     vrata as dhruva kṣema     dharman yātay jana     ni barhis sad soma pīti     mitra ca mad varuṇa ca     juṣ yajña iṣṭi     ni barhis sad soma pīti 
      yat adya as parāvat     yat arvāvat aśvin     yat vā puru puru bhuj     yat antarikṣa ā gam     iha tya puru bhūtama     puru daṃsas bhṛ     varasyā yā adhrigu     hvā tuviṣṭama bhuj     īrmā anya vapus vapus     cakra ratha yam     pari anya nāhuṣa yuga     mahan rajas dī     tad u su tvad idam kṛ     viśva yad tvad anu stu     nānā jan arepas     sam mad bandhu e     ā yat tvad sūrya ratha     sthā raghuṣyad sadā     pari tvad aruṣa vi     ghṛṇā vṛ ātap     tvad atri cit     nara sumna cetas     gharma yat tvad arepas     nāsatya āsan bhuraṇy     ugra tvad kakuha yayi     śru yāma saṃtani     yat tvad daṃsas aśvin     atri nṛ āvṛt     madhu u su madhūyu     rudra sac pyā     yat samudra ati pṛ     pakva pṛkṣ bhṛ tvad     satya id vai u aśvin     tvad ah mayobhu     tad yāman yāman hūtama     yāman ā mṛḍayattama     idam brahman vardhana     aśvin as śaṃtama     yad takṣ ratha iva     vac bṛhat namas 
      deva aśvin     adya div manāvasu     tad śru vṛṣaṇvasu     atri tvad ā vivās     kuha tya kuha nu śru     div deva nāsatya     ka ā yat jana     ka tvad nadī sacā     ka yā ka ha gam     ka acchā yuj ratha     ka brahman ran     mad tvad vaś iṣṭi     paura cit hi uda prut     paura paura jinv     yat īṃ gṛbhītatāti     siṃha iva druh pada     pra cyavāna jṛ     vavri atka na muc     yuvan yadi kṛ punar     ā kāma ṛch vadhū     as hi tvad iha stotṛ     as tvad saṃdṛś śrī     nu śru mad ā gam     avas vājinīvasu     ka tvad adya puru     ā van martya     ka vipra vipra vāhas     ka yajña vājinīvasu     ā tvad ratha ratha     yeṣṭha yā aśvin     puru cit asmayu tiras     āṅgūṣa martya ā     śam u su tvad madhūyu     mad as carkṛti     arvācīna vicetas     vi śyena iva dī     aśvin yat ha karhicit     śru idam hava     vasu u su tvad bhuj     pṛc su tvad pṛc 
      prati priyatama ratha     vṛṣan vasu vāhana     stotṛ tvad aśvin ṛṣi     stoma prati bhūṣ     mādhvī mad śru hava     atyāyā aśvin     tiras viśva mad     dasra hiraṇya vartani     suṣumna sindhu vāhas     mādhvī mad śru hava     ā mad ratna bhṛ     aśvin gam tvad     rudra hiraṇya vartani     juṣ vājinīvasu     mādhvī mad śru hava     suṣṭubh tvad vṛṣaṇvasu     ratha vāṇīcī ādhā     uta tvad kakuha mṛga     pṛkṣ kṛ vāpuṣa     mādhvī mad śru hava     bodhinmanas rathya     iṣira havana śrut     vi cyavāna aśvin     ni yā a dvayāvin     mādhvī mad śru hava     ā tvad nṛ manas yuj     aśva pruṣitapsu     vi vah pā     saha sumna aśvin     mādhvī mad śru hava     aśvin ā iha gam     nāsatya mā vi ven     tiras cit arya pari     vartis yā adābhya     mādhvī mad śru hava     idam yajña adābhya     jaritṛ śubh pati     avasyu aśvin tvad     gṛ upa bhūṣ     mādhvī mad śru hava     bhū uṣas ruśat paśu     ā agni dhā ṛtviya     yuj tvad vṛṣaṇvasu     ratha dasra amartya     mādhvī mad śru hava 
      ā bhā agni uṣas anīka     ud vipra deva yā vāc sthā     arvāñc nūnam rathya iha yā     pyā aśvin gharma acchā     na saṃskṛta pra mī gamiṣṭha     anti nūnam aśvin upastu iha     divā abhipitva avas āgamiṣṭha     prati avarti dāś śambhaviṣṭha     uta ā yā saṃgava prātar ahar     madhyaṃdina uditi sūrya     divā nakta avas śaṃtama     na idānīm pīti aśvin tan     idam hi tvad pradiv sthāna oka     idam gṛha aśvin idam duroṇa     ā mad div bṛhat parvata ā     ap yā iṣ ūrj vah     sam aśvin avas nūtana     mayobhu su praṇīti gam     ā mad rayi vah ā uta vīra     ā viśva amṛta saubhaga 
      prātar yāvan prathama yaj     purā gṛdhra a rā pā     prātar hi yajña aśvin dhā     pra śaṃs kavi pūrvabhāj     prātar yaj aśvin hi     na sāya as deva yā a juṣ     uta anya mad yaj vi ca vas     pūrva pūrva yaj vanīyas     hiraṇya tvac madhu varṇa ghṛta snu     pṛkṣ vah ā ratha vṛt tvad     manas javas aśvin vāta raṃhas     yad atiyā durita viśva     yad bhūyiṣṭha nāsatya viṣ     caniṣṭha pitu rā vibhāga     tad toka idam pṛ śamī     an ūrdhva bhās sadam id tur     sam aśvin avas nūtana     mayobhu su praṇīti gam     ā mad rayi vah ā uta vīra     ā viśva amṛta saubhaga 
      aśvin ā iha gam     nāsatya mā vi ven     haṃsa iva pat ā suta upa     aśvin hariṇa iva     gaura iva anu yavasa     haṃsa iva pat ā suta upa     aśvin vājinīvasu     juṣ yajña iṣṭi     haṃsa iva pat ā suta upa     atri yat tvad avaruh ṛbīsa     johav nādh iva yoṣā     śyena cit javas nūtana     āgam aśvin śaṃtama     vi hā vanaspati     yoni sū iva     śru mad aśvin hava     saptavadhri ca muc     bhī nādh     ṛṣi saptavadhri     māyā aśvin tvad     vṛkṣa sam ca vi ca añc     yathā vāta puṣkariṇī     samiṅgay sarvatas     eva tvad garbha ej     nire daśamāsya     yathā vāta yathā vana     yathā samudra ej     eva tvad daśamāsya     saha ave jarāyu     daśan māsa śī     kumāra adhi mātṛ     nire jīva a kṣan     jīva jīv adhi 
      mah mad adya bodhay     uṣas rai divitmat     yathā cit mad bodhay     satyaśravas vāyya     su jan aśva sūnṛta     yad sunītha śaucadratha     vi vas duhitṛ div     tad vi vas sahīyas     satyaśravas vāyya     su jan aśva sūnṛta     tad mad adya ābhṛ vasu     vi vas duhitṛ div     yad u vi vas sahīyas     satyaśravas vāyya     su jan aśva sūnṛta     abhi yad tvad vibhāvan     stoma gṛ vahni     magha maghavan su śrī     dāmanvat su rāti     su jan aśva sūnṛta     yat cit hi tvad gaṇa idam     chaday maghatti     pari cit vaṣṭi dā     dā rādhas ahraya     su jan aśva sūnṛta     ā idam dhā vīravat yaśas     uṣas maghavan sūri     yad mad rādhas ahraya     maghavan rā     su jan aśva sūnṛta     tad dyumna bṛhat yaśas     uṣas maghavan ā vah     yad mad rādhas aśvya     gavya bhaj sūri     su jan aśva sūnṛta     uta mad gomat iṣ     ā vah duhitṛ div     sākam sūrya raśmi     śukra śuc arci     su jan aśva sūnṛta     vi vas duhitṛ div     mā cira tan apas     na id tvad stena yathā ripu     tap sūra arcis     su jan aśva sūnṛta     etāvat vā id uṣas tvad     bhūyas vā dā arh     yad stotṛ vibhāvan     vas na pramī     su jan aśva sūnṛta 
      dyut yāman bṛhat ṛta     ṛtāvan aruṇapsu vibhā     devī uṣas svar āvah     prati vipra mati jṛ     etad jana darśata bodhay     su ga pathin kṛ yā agra     bṛhat ratha bṛhat viśvaminva     uṣas jyotis yam agra ahar     etad go aruṇa yuj     a sridh rayi aprāyu kṛ     pathin rad suvita devī     puruṣṭuta viśva vāra vi bhā     etad vyena bhū dvibarhas     āviṣkṛ tanū purastāt     ṛta pathin anu i sādhu     prajñā iva na diś mī     etad śubhra na tanū vid     ūrdhva iva snā dṛś mad sthā     apa dveṣas bādh tamas     uṣas div duhitṛ jyotis āgā     etad pratyañc duhitṛ div nṛ     yoṣā iva bhadra ni ri apsas     vivṛ dāś vārya     punar jyotis yuvati pūrvathā kṛ 
      yuj manas uta yuj dhī     vipra vipra bṛhat vipaścit     vi hotra dhā vayunā vid eka id     mah deva savitṛ pariṣṭuti     viśva rūpa prati muc kavi     prasū bhadra dvipad catuṣpada     vi nāka khyā savitṛ vareṇya     anu prayāṇa uṣas vi rāj     yad prayāṇa anu anya id yā     deva deva mahiman ojas     yad pārthiva vimā tad etaśa     rajas deva savitṛ mahitvana     uta yā savitṛ tri rocana     uta sūrya raśmi sam uc     uta rātri ubhayatas parī     uta mitra bhū deva dharman     uta īś prasava tvad eka id     uta pūṣan bhū deva yāman     uta idam viśva bhuvana vi rāj     śyāvāśva tvad savitṛ stoma aś 
      tad savitṛ vṛ     mad deva bhojana     śreṣṭha sarva dhātama     tur bhaga dhā     idam hi sva yaśastara     savitṛ ka cana priya     na mī sva rājya     tad hi ratna dāś     sū savitṛ bhaga     tad bhāga citra ī     adya mad deva savitṛ     prajāvat sū saubhaga     parā duḥṣvapnya sū     viśva deva savitṛ     durita parā sū     yad bhadra tad mad ā sū     anāgas aditi     deva savitṛ sava     viśva vāma dhā     ā viśva deva sat pati     sūkta adya vṛ     satya sava savitṛ     yad idam ubh ahar     puras i aprayucchat     svādhī deva savitṛ     yad idam viśva jāta     āśrāvay śloka     pra ca sū savitṛ 
      acchā vad tavas gir ā abhi     stu parjanya namas vivās     kanikrad vṛṣabha jīra dānu     retas dhā oṣadhī garbha     vi vṛkṣa han uta han rakṣas     viśva bhī bhuvana mahat vadha     uta anāgas īṣ vṛṣṇyāvat     yat parjanya stanay han duṣkṛt     rathin iva kaśā aśva abhikṣip     āvis dūta kṛ varṣya aha     dūrāt siṃha stanatha ud īr     yat parjanya kṛ varṣya nabhas     pra vāta vā patay vidyut     ud oṣadhī hā pinv svar     irā viśva bhuvana jan     yat parjanya pṛthivī retas av     yad vrata pṛthivī nannam     yad vrata śaphavat jarbhur     yad vrata oṣadhī viśva rūpa     tad mad parjanya mahi śarman yam     div mad vṛṣṭi marut rā     pra pinv vṛṣan aśva dhārā     arvāñc etad stanayitnu i     ap niṣic asura pitṛ mad     abhi krand stanay garbha ā dhā     udanvat pari dī ratha     dṛti su kṛṣ viṣā nyāñc     sama bhū udvat nipāda     mahat kośa ud añc ni sic     syand kulyā viṣā purastāt     ghṛta dyāvāpṛthivī vi und     su prapāṇa bhū aghnyā     yat parjanya kanikrad     stanay han duṣkṛt     prati idam viśva mud     yad ka ca pṛthivī adhi     vṛṣ varṣa ud u su gṛbhāy     kṛ dhanvan atī u     jan oṣadhī bhojana kaṃ     uta prajā vid manīṣā 
      baṭ itthā parvata     khidra bhṛ pṛthivī     pra yad bhūmi pravatvat     mahan jinv mahin     stoma tvad vicārin     prati stubh aktu     pra yad vāja na heṣ     peru as arjunī     dṛḍha cit yad vanaspati     kṣmā dhardhṛ ojas     yat tvad abhra vidyut     div vṛṣ vṛṣṭi 
      pra samrāj bṛhat arc gabhīra     brahman priya varuṇa śru     vi yad han śamitṛ iva carman     upastir pṛthivī sūrya     vana vi antarikṣa tan     vāja arvant payas usriyā     hṛd kratu varuṇa ap agni     div sūrya dhā soma adri     nīcīna bāra varuṇa kabandha     pra sṛj rodas antarikṣa     tad viśva bhuvana rājan     yava na vṛṣṭi vi und bhūman     und bhūmi pṛthivī uta div     yadā duh varuṇa vaś āt id     sam abhra vas parvata     taviṣīy śrathay vīra     idam u su āsura śru     mah māyā varuṇa pra vac     māna iva sthā antarikṣa     vi yad mā pṛthivī sūrya     idam u nu kavitama māyā     mah deva nakir ā dhṛṣ     eka yat udan na pṛṇ enī     āsic avani samudra     aryamya varuṇa mitrya vā     sakhi vā sadam id bhrātṛ vā     veśa vā nitya varuṇa araṇa vā     yat sīm āgas kṛ śrath tad     kitava yat rip na dīv     yat vā gha satya uta yat na vid     sarva tad vi sā śithira iva deva     adha tvad as varuṇa priya 
      indra agni yad av     ubh vāja martya     dṛḍha cit tad pra bhid     dyumna vāṇī iva trita     yad pṛtanā duṣṭara     yad vāja śravāyya     yad pañcan carṣaṇi abhi     indra agni tad hvā     tad id amavat śavas     tigma didyut maghavan     prati dru gabhasti     go vṛtra han iṣ     tad tvad eṣa ratha     indra agni hvā     pati tura rādhas     vid girvaṇastama     tad vṛdh anu div     marta deva adabha     arh cit puras dhā     aṃśa iva deva arvant     eva indra agni     hu havya śūṣya     ghṛta na pū adri     tad sūri śravas bṛhat     rayi gṛ dhṛ     iṣ gṛ dhṛ 
      pra tvad mah mati i viṣṇu     marutvat giri jā eva yā marut     pra śardha prayajyu su khādi     tavas bhand iṣṭi     dhuni vrata śavas     pra yad jan mahina yad ca nu svayam     pra vidman brū eva yā marut     kratu tad tvad marut na ādhṛṣ śavas     dāna mahan tad idam     adhṛṣṭa na adri     pra yad div bṛhat śru gir     suśukvan su bhū eva yā marut     na yad irin sadhastha īś     agni na sva vidyut     pra syandra dhuni     tad kram mahat niḥ uru krama     samāna sadas eva yā marut     yadā yuj tman sva adhi snu     viṣpardhas vimahas     gā śevṛdha nṛ     svana na tvad amavat rejay vṛṣan     tveṣa yayi taviṣa eva yā marut     yad sah ṛj sva rocis     sthā raśman hiraṇyaya     su āyudha iṣmin     apāra tvad mahiman vṛdh śavas     tveṣa śavas av eva yā marut     sthātṛ hi prasiti saṃdṛś as     tad mad uruṣy nid     śuc na agni     tad rudra su makha agni yathā     tuvi dyumna av eva yā marut     dīrgha pṛthu prath sadman pārthiva     yad ajma ā mah     śardhas adbhuta enas     a dveṣas mad marut gātu e     śru hava jaritṛ eva yā marut     viṣṇu mah samanyu yu     smat rathī na daṃsanā     apa dveṣas sanutar     gam mad yajña yajñiya suśami     śru hava arakṣas eva yā marut     jyeṣṭha na parvata vyoman     tvad tad pracetas     as durdhartu nid    tvad hi agni prathama manotṛ    idam dhī bhū dasma hotṛ    tvad sīm vṛṣan kṛ duṣṭarītu    sahas viśva sahas sah    adha hotṛ ni sad yajīyas    iḍ pada iṣay īḍ as    tad tvad nṛ prathama devay    mah rai citay anu gam    vṛt iva i bahu vasavya    tvad rayi jāgṛ anu gam    ruśat agni darśata bṛhat    vapāvat viśvahā dīdī    pada deva namas vī    śravasyu śravas āp amṛkta    nāman cit dhā yajñiya    bhadra tvad raṇay saṃdṛṣṭi    tvad vṛdh kṣiti pṛthivī    tvad rai ubhaya jana    tvad trātṛ taraṇa cetay bhū    pitṛ mātṛ sadam id mānuṣa    sapary tad priya viś agni    hotṛ mandra ni sad yajīyas    tad tvad mad dama ā dīdī    upa jñubādh namas sad    tad tvad mad sudhī navya agni    sumnāyu ī devay    tvad viś nī dīdī    div agni bṛhat rocana    viś kavi viśpati śaśvat    nitośana vṛṣabha carṣaṇi    pretīṣaṇi iṣay pāvaka    rāj agni yajata rayi    tad agni yaj śam ca marta    yad tvad naś samidh havya dāti    yad āhuti pari vid namas    viśva id tad vāma dhā tvota    idam u tvad mahi mah vidh    namas agni samidh uta havya    vedi sūnu sahas gir uktha    ā tvad bhadra sumati yat    ā yad tan rodas vi bhās    śravas ca śravasya tarutra    bṛhat vāja sthavira mad    revat agni vitaram vi bhā    nṛvat vasu sadam id dhā mad    bhūri toka tanaya paśu    puru iṣ bṛhatī āreagha    mad bhadra sauśravasa as    puru agni purudhā tvāyā    vasu rājan vasu tā tvad aś    puru hi tvad puru vāra as    agni vasu vidh rājan tvad 
     tvad hi kṣaitavat yaśas    agni mitra na paty    tvad vicarṣaṇi śravas    vasu puṣṭi na puṣ    tvad hi sma carṣaṇi    yajña gir īḍ    tvad vājin yā avṛka    rajastur viśvacarṣaṇi    sajoṣas tvad div nṛ    yajña ketu indh    yat ha tya mānuṣa jana    sumnāyu hu adhvara    ṛdh yad tvad sudānu    dhī marta śam    ūti tad bṛhat div    dviṣ aṃhas na tṛ    samidh yad tvad āhuti    niśiti martya naś    vayāvat tad puṣ    kṣaya agni śata āyus    tveṣa tvad dhūma ṛch    div as śukra ātan    svar na hi dyut tvad    kṛp pāvaka ruc    adha hi viś īḍ    as priya mad atithi    raṇva pur iva jṛ    sūnu na trayayāyya    kratu hi droṇa añj    agni vājin na kṛtvya    parijman iva svadhā gaya    atya na hvārya śiśu    tvad tya cit acyuta    agni paśu na yavasa    dhāman ha yat tvad ajara    vana vraśc śikvas    vī hi adhvarīy    agni hotṛ dama viś    samṛdh viśpati kṛ    juṣ havya aṅgiras    acchā mad mitra mahat deva deva    agni vac sumati rodasī    vī svasti su kṣiti div nṛ    dviṣ aṃhas durita tṛ    tad tṛ tvad avas tṛ 
     agni tad kṣi ṛta pā ṛtejā    uru jyotis naś devayu tvad    yad tvad mitra varuṇa sajoṣas    deva pā tyajas marta aṃhas    yaj yajña śam śamī    ṛdh vāra agni dāś    eva cana tad yaśas ajuṣṭi    na aṃhas marta naś na pradṛpti    svar na yad dṛśati arepas    bhīma yat i śuc tvad ā dhī    heṣasvat śurudh na idam aktu    kutra cit raṇva vasati vanejā    tigma cit eman mahi varpas idam    bhas aśva na yamasāna ās    vijeh paraśu na jihvā    dravi na drāvay dāru dah    tad id astṛ iva prati dhā as    śā tejas ayas na dhārā    citra dhrajati arati yad aktu    vi na druṣadvan raghu patman jaṃhas    tad īṃ rebha na prati vastu usrā    śocis rārap mitra mahas    nakta yad īṃ aruṣa yad div nṛ    amartya aruṣa yad div nṛ    div na yad vidh nonāv    vṛṣan rukṣa oṣadhī nū    ghṛṇi na yad dhrajas patman i    ā rodas vasu su patnī    dhāyas vā yad yujya arka    vidyut na davidyut sva śuṣma    śardhas vā yad marut takṣ    ṛbhu na tveṣa rabhasāna dyut 
     yathā hotṛ manus devatāti    yajña sūnu sahas yaj    eva mad adya samanā samāna    vaś agni vaś yaj deva    tad mad vibhāvan cakṣaṇi na vastu    agni vandāru vid canas dhā    viśvāyu yad amṛta martya    uṣarbudh bhū atithi jātavedas    div na yad panay abhva    bhāsas vas sūrya na śukra    vi yad i ajara pāvaka    aśna cit śnath pūrvya    vadman hi sūnu as adman sadvan    kṛ agni janus ajman anna    tad tvad mad ūrja sani ūrj dhā    rājan iva ji avṛka kṣi antar    nitikti yad vāraṇa anna ad    vāyu na rāṣṭrin ati i aktu    tur yad tvad ādiś arāti    atya na hrut pat parihrut    ā sūrya na bhānumat arka    agni tan rodas vi bhās    citra nī pari tamas añj    śocis patman auśija na dī    tvad hi mandratama arka śoka    vṛ mahi mad śru agni    indra na tvad śavas devatā    vāyu pṛ rādhas nṛtama    nu mad agni avṛka svasti    vī rai pathin pṛ aṃhas    tad sūri gṛ rā sumna    mad śata hima su vīra 
     hvā tvad sūnu sahas yuvan    adrogha vāc mati yaviṣṭha    yad inv draviṇa pracetas    viśva vāra puru vāra adruh    tvad vasu purvaṇīka hotṛ    doṣā vastu er yajñiya    kṣāman iva viśva bhuvana yad    sam saubhaga dhā pāvaka    tvad viś pradiv sad idam    kratu rathī bhū vārya    atas i vidh cit    vi ānuṣak jātavedas vasu    yad mad sanutya abhidās agni    yad antara mitra mahat vanuṣy    tad ajara vṛṣan tvad sva    tap tapiṣṭha tapas tapasvat    yad tvad yajña samidh yad uktha    arka sūnu sahas dāś    tad martya amṛta pracetas    rai dyumna śravas vi bhā    tad tad kṛ iṣay tūya agni    spṛdh bādh sahas sahasvat    yat śaṃs div añj vacas    tad juṣ jaritṛ ghoṣin manman    aś tad kāma agni tvad ūti    aś rayi rayivat su vīra    aś vāja abhi vājay    aś dyumna ajara ajara tvad 
     pra navyas sahas sūnu acchā    yajña gātu avas iṣ    vraśc vana kṛṣṇa yāma ruśat    vīti hotṛ divya gā    tad śvitāna tanyatu rocana sthā    ajara nānad yaviṣṭha    yad pāvaka purutama puru    pṛthu agni anuyā bharv    vi tvad viṣvañc vāta jū agni    bhāma śuci śuci car    tuvi mrakṣa divya navagva    vana van dhṛṣ ruj    yad tvad śukra śuci śuciṣmat    kṣā vap viṣā aśva    adha bhrama tvad urviyā vi bhā    yātay adhi sānu pṛśni    adha jihvā pāpat pra vṛṣan    goṣuyudh na aśani sṛj    śūra iva prasiti kṣāti agni    durvartu bhīma day vana    ā bhānu pārthiva jrayas    mah toda dhṛṣ tan    tad bādh apa bhaya sahas    spṛdh vanuṣy vanus ni jūrv    tad citra citra citay mad    citra kṣatra citratama vayas dhā    candra rayi puru vīra bṛhat    candra candra gṛ yu 
     mūrdhan div arati pṛthivī    vaiśvānara ṛta ā jan agni    kavi samrāj atithi jana    āsan ā pātra janay deva    nābhi yajña sadana rayi    mahat āhāva abhi sam nū    vaiśvānara rathī adhvara    yajña ketu janay deva    tvad vipra jan vājin agni    tvad vīra abhimātiṣāh    vaiśvānara tvad mad dhā    vasu rājan spṛhayāyya    tvad viśva amṛta jan    śiśu na deva abhi sam nū    tvad kratu amṛta tva i    vaiśvānara yat pitṛ dīdī    vaiśvānara tvad tad vrata    maha agni nakir ā dhṛṣ    yat jan pitṛ upastha    vid ketu vayuna ahar    vaiśvānara vimā cakṣas    sānu div amṛta ketu    tad id u viśva bhuvana adhi mūrdhan    vayā iva ruh saptan visruh    vi yad rajas mā sukratu    vaiśvānara vi div rocana kavi    pari yad viśva bhuvana prath    adabdha gopā amṛta rakṣ 
     pṛkṣa vṛṣan aruṣa nu sahas    pra nu vac vidatha jātavedas    vaiśvānara mati navīyas śuci    soma iva pū cāru agni    tad jan parama vyoman    vrata agni vrata pā rakṣ    vi antarikṣa mā sukratu    vaiśvānara mahina nāka spṛś    vi stambh rodas mitra adbhuta    antarvāvat kṛ jyotis tamas    vi carman iva dhiṣaṇā vartay    vaiśvānara viśva dhā vṛṣṇya    ap upastha mahiṣa grah    viś rājan upa sthā ṛgmiya    ā dūta agni bhṛ vivasvant    vaiśvānara mātariśvan parāvat    yuga yuga vidathya gṛ    agni rayi yaśas dhā navyas    pavi iva rājan agha śaṃsa ajara    nīcā ni vraśc vanin na tejas    mad agni maghavan dhāray    anāmin kṣatra ajara su vīrya    mad ji śatin sahasrin    vaiśvānara vāja agni tvad ūti    adabdha tvad gopā yaj    mad pā triṣadhastha sūri    rakṣ ca mad dā śardhas agni    vaiśvānara pra ca tṛ stu 
     ahar ca kṛṣṇa ahar arjuna ca    vi vṛt rajas vedyā    vaiśvānara jan na rājan    avatṛ jyotis agni tamas    na mad tantu na vi jñā otu    na yad ve samara at    ka svid putra iha vaktva    para vad avara pitṛ    tad id tantu tad vi jñā otu    tad vaktva ṛtuthā vad    yad īṃ cit amṛta gopā    avas car paras anya paś    idam hotṛ prathama paś idam    idam jyotis amṛta martya    idam tad jan dhruva ā niṣad    amartya tanū vṛdh    dhruva jyotis nidhā dṛś kaṃ    manas javiṣṭha patay antar    viśva deva samanas sa keta    eka kratu abhi vi i sādhu    vi mad karṇa patay vi cakṣus    vi idam jyotis hṛdaya ādhā yad    vi mad manas car dūra ādhī    ka svid vac ka u nu man    viśva deva namasy bhī    tvad agni tamas sthā    vaiśvānara av ūti mad    amartya av ūti mad 
      puras tvad mandra divya suvṛkti     pre yajña agni adhvara dhā     puras uktha tad hi mad vibhāvan     su adhvara kṛ jātavedas     tad u dyumat purvaṇīka hotṛ     agni agni manus indh     stoma yad idam śūṣa     ghṛta na śuci mati pū     pyā tad śravas martya     yad agni dāś vipra uktha     citra tad ūti citra śocis     vraja sāti gomat dhā     ā yad prā jan urvī     dūredṛś bhās kṛṣṇa adhvan     adha bahu cit tamas ūrmyā     tiras śocis dṛś pāvaka     nu mad citra puru vāja ūti     agni rayi maghavan ca dhā     yad rādhas śravas ca ati anya     su vīrya ca abhi as jana     idam yajña canas dhā agni vaś     yad tvad ās hu haviṣmat     bharadvāja dhā suvṛkti     av vāja gadhya sāti     vi vardhay iḍā     mad śata hima su vīra 
      yaj hotṛ iṣay yajīyas     agni bādha marut na prayukti     ā mad mitrāvaruṇa nāsatya     div hotra pṛthivī vṛt     tvad hotṛ mandratama mad adruh     antar deva vidatha martya     pāvaka juhū vahni ās     agni yaj tanū tvad sva     dhanya cit hi tvad dhiṣaṇā vaś     pra deva janman gṛ yaj     vepiṣṭha aṅgiras yat ha vipra     madhu chandas bhan rebha iṣṭi     dyut su apāka vibhāvan     agni yaj rodas uruvyañc     āyu na yad namas rā havya     añj su prayas pañcan jana     vṛj ha yat namas barhis agni     yam sruc ghṛtavat suvṛkti     myakṣ sadman sadana pṛthivī     śri yajña sūrya na cakṣus     daśasy mad purvaṇīka hotṛ     deva agni agni indh     rai sūnu sahas vas     ati sraṃs vṛjana na aṃhas 
      madhya hotṛ duroṇa barhis rāj     agni toda rodas yaj     idam tad sūnu sahas ṛtāvan     dūra sūrya na śocis tan     ā yad tvad su apāka yajatra     yaj rājan sarvatāti iva nu div     triṣadhastha tṛ na jaṃhas     havya magha mānuṣa yaj     tejiṣṭha yad arati vanerāj     toda adhvan na vṛdh dyut     adrogha na dravitṛ cit tman     amartya avartra oṣadhī     tad asmāka etarī na śūṣa     agni stu dama ā jātavedas     dru anna van kratu na arvan     usṛ pitṛ iva jāray yajña     adha sma idam panay bhās     vṛthā yat takṣ anuyā pṛthvī     sadyas yad syandra viṣā dhavīyas     ṛṇa na tāyu ati dhanvan rāj     tad tvad mad arvant nidā     viśva agni agni indh     vī rai vi yā ducchunā     mad śata hima su vīra 
      tvad viśva subhaga saubhaga     agni vi i vanin na vayā     śruṣṭi rayi vāja vṛtratūrya     div vṛṣṭi īḍ u rīti ap     tvad bhaga mad ā hi ratna iṣ     parijman iva kṣi dasma varcas     agni mitra na bṛhat ṛta     as kṣattṛ vāma deva bhūri     tad sat pati śavas han vṛtra     agni vipra vi paṇi bhṛ vāja     yad tvad pracetas ṛta jan rai     sajoṣas naptṛ ap hi     yad tvad sūnu sahas gir uktha     yajña marta niśiti vedyā naś     viśva tad deva prati vāra agni     dhā dhānya paty vasavya     tad nṛ ā sauśravasa su vīra     agni sūnu sahas puṣ dhā     kṛ yat śavas bhūri paśu     vayas vṛka ari jasuri     vadman sūnu sahas mad vihāyas     agni toka tanaya vājin mad dā     viśva gir abhi pūrti aś     mad śata hima su vīra 
      agni yad martya duvas     dhī juṣ dhīti     bhas nu tad pra pūrvya     iṣ vṛ av     agni id hi pracetas     agni vedhastama ṛṣi     agni hotṛ īḍ     yajña manus viś     nānā hi agni av     spṛdh rai ari     tūrv dasyu āyu     vrata sīkṣ avrata     agni ap sā ṛtīṣah     vīra dā sat pati     yad tras śavas     saṃcakṣ śatru bhī     agni hi vidman nid     deva marta uruṣy     sahāvan yad a vṛ     rayi vāja a vṛ     acchā mad mitra mahas deva deva     agni vac sumati rodasī     vī svasti su kṣiti div nṛ     dviṣ aṃhas durita tṛ     tad tṛ tvad avas tṛ 
      idam u su tvad atithi uṣarbudh     viśva viś pati ṛj gir     vī id div janus kaccit ā śuci     jyok cit ad garbha yad acyuta     mitra na yad sudhita bhṛgu     vanaspati īḍ ūrdhva śocis     tad tvad su prī vītahavya adbhuta     praśasti mahay diva diva     tad tvad dakṣa avṛka vṛdha bhū     ari para antara taruṣa     rai sūnu sahas martya ā     chardis yam vītahavya saprathas     bharadvāja saprathas     dyut tvad atithi svarṇṛ     agni hotṛ manus su adhvara     vipra na dyukṣa vacas suvṛkti     havyavāha arati deva ṛj     pāvaka yad citay kṛp     kṣāman ruc uṣas na bhānu     tūrv na yāman etaśa nu raṇa     ā yad ghṛṇa na tṛṣ ajara     agni agni tvad samidh duvasy     priya priya tvad atithi gṛ     upa tvad gir amṛta vivās     deva deva van hi vārya     deva deva van hi mad duvas     samindh agni samidh gir gṛ     śuci pāvaka puras adhvara dhruva     vipra hotṛ puru vāra adruh     kavi sumna ī jātavedas     tvad dūta agni amṛta yuga yuga     havyavāha dhā pāyu īḍ     deva ca marta ca jāgṛvi     vibhu viśpati namas ni sad     vibhūṣ agni ubhaya anu vrata     dūta deva rajas sam i     yat tvad dhīti sumati āvṛ     adha sma mad tri varūtha śiva bhū     tad su pratīka sudṛś svañc     avidvas viduṣṭara sap     tad yaj viśva vayuna vid     pra havya agni amṛta vac     tad agni pā uta tad pṛ     yad tvad naś kavi śūra dhīti     yajña vā niśiti vā uditi vā     tad id pṛc śavas uta rai     tvad agni vanuṣy ni pā     tvad u mad sahasāvat avadya     sam tvad dhvasmanvat abhi i pātha     sam rayi spṛhayāyya sahasrin     agni hotṛ gṛhapati tad rājan     viśva vid janiman jātavedas     deva uta yad martya     yajiṣṭha tad pra yaj ṛtāvan     agni yat adya viś adhvara hotṛ     pāvaka śoci vī tvad hi yajvan     ṛta yaj mahina vi yat bhū     havya vah yaviṣṭha yad tvad adya     abhi prayas sudhita hi khyā     ni tvad dhā rodas yaj     av mad maghavan vāja sāti     agni viśva durita tṛ     tad tṛ tvad avas tṛ     agni viśva su anīka deva     ūrṇāvat prathama sad yoni     kulāyin ghṛtavat savitṛ     yajña nī yaj sādhu     idam u tya atharvan vat     agni math vedhas     yad aṅkūy ānī     amūra śyāvyā     jan deva vīti     sarvatāti svasti     ā deva vah amṛta ṛtāvṛdh     yajña deva spṛś     mad u tvad gṛhapati jana     agni kṛ samidh bṛhat     asthūri mad gārhapatya as     tigma mad tejas sam śā 
      tvad agni yajña     hotṛ viśva dhā     deva mānuṣa jana     tad mad mandra adhvara     jihvā yaj mah     ā deva vah yaj ca     vid hi vedhas adhvan     pathin ca deva añjasā     agni yajña sukratu     tvad īḍ adha dvitā     bharata vājin śuna     yaj yajña yajñiya     tvad idam vārya puru     divodāsa su     bharadvāja dāś     tvad dūta amartya     ā vah daivya jana     śru vipra suṣṭuti     tvad agni su ādhī     marta deva vīti     yajña deva īḍ     tvad pra yaj saṃdṛś     uta kratu sudānu     viśva juṣ kāmin     tvad hotṛ manus dhā     vahni ās viduṣṭara     agni yaj div viś     agni ā yā vīti     gṛ havya dāti     ni hotṛ sad barhis     tad tvad samidh aṅgiras     ghṛta vardhay     bṛhat śuc yaviṣṭhya     tad mad pṛthu śravāyya     acchā deva vivās     bṛhat agni su vīrya     tvad agni puṣkara adhi     atharvan niḥ math     mūrdhan viśva vāghant     tad u tvad dadhyac ṛṣi     putra indh atharvan     vṛtra han puraṃdara     tad u tvad pāthya vṛṣan     sam indh dasyu hantama     dhanaṃjaya raṇa raṇa     e u su brū tvad     agni itthā itara gir     idam vṛdh indu     yatra kva ca tvad manas     dakṣa dhā uttara     tatra sadas kṛ     nahi tvad pūrta akṣipat     bhū nema vasu     atha duvas van     ā agni gam bhārata     vṛtra han puru cetana     divodāsa sat pati     tad hi viśva ati pārthiva     rayi dāś mahitvana     van a van a stṛ     tad pratna vat navīyas     agni dyumna sami     bṛhat tan bhānu     pra tvad sakhi agni     stoma yajña ca dhṛṣṇuyā     arc gā ca vedhas     tad hi yad mānuṣa yuga     sad hotṛ kavi kratu     dūta ca havyavāhana     tad rājan śuci vrata     āditya māruta gaṇa     vasu yaj iha rodas     vasu tvad agni saṃdṛṣṭi     iṣay martya     ūrj napāt amṛta     kratu dā as śreṣṭha     adya tvad van surekṇas     marta aś suvṛkti     tad tvad agni tvota     iṣay viśva āyus     tṛ ari arāti     van ari arāti     agni tigma śocis     yā viśva ni atrin     agni mad van rayi     su vīra rayi ā bhṛ     jātavedas vicarṣaṇi     han rakṣas su kratu     tvad mad pā aṃhas     jātavedas aghāy     rakṣ mad brahman kavi     yad mad agni dureva ā     marta vadha dāś     tad mad pā aṃhas     tvad tad deva jihvā     pari bādh duṣkṛt     marta yad mad jighāṃs     bharadvāja saprathas     śarman yam sahantya     agni vareṇya vasu     agni vṛtra jaṅghan     draviṇasyu vipanyayā     samindh śukra āhu     garbha mātṛ pitṛ pitṛ     vidyut akṣara     sad ṛta yoni ā     brahman prajāvat ā bhṛ     jātavedas vicarṣaṇi     agni yad dīdī div     upa tvad raṇva saṃdṛś     prayasvat sahaskṛta     agni sṛj gir     upa chāyā iva ghṛṇi     gam śarman tvad mad     agni hiraṇya saṃdṛśa     yad ugra iva śaryahan     tigma śṛṅga na vaṃsaga     agni pur ruj     ā yad hasta na khādin     śiśu jan na bhṛ     viś agni su adhvara     pra deva deva vīti     bhṛ vasu vittama     ā sva yoni ni sad     ā jan jātavedas     priya śā atithi     syona ā gṛhapati     agni yuj hi yad tvad     āśvāsa deva sādhu     aram vah manyu     acchā mad yā ā vah     abhi prayas vīti     ā deva soma pīti     ud agni bhārata dyumat     ajasra davidyut     vi bhā ajara     vīti yad deva marta duvasy     agni īḍ adhvara haviṣmat     hotṛ satya yaj rodasī
