      yava yava mad andhas     puṣṭa puṣṭa pari sru     soma viśva ca saubhaga     indu yathā tvad stava     yathā tvad jāta andhas     ni barhis priya sad     uta mad go vid aśva vid     pū soma andhas     makṣūtama aha     yad jyā na ji     han śatru abhī     tad pū sahasra jit 
      pari soma ṛta bṛhat     āśu pavitra ṛṣ     vihan rakṣas devayu     yat soma vāja ṛṣ     śata dhārā apasyu     indra sakhya āviś     abhi tvad yoṣan daśan     jāra na kanyā nū     mṛj soma sāti     tvad indra viṣṇu     svādu indu pari sru     nṛ stotṛ pā aṃhas 
      pra tvad dhārā asaścat     div na i vṛṣṭi     acchā vāja sahasrin     abhi priya kāvya     viśva cakṣ ṛṣ     hari tuj āyudha     tad marmṛj āyu     ibha rājan iva suvrata     śyena na sad     tad mad viśva div     div pṛthivī adhi     pū indu ā bhṛ 
      tṛ tad mandin dhāv     dhārā su andhas     tṛ tad mandin dhāv     usrā vid vasu     marta devī avas     tṛ tad mandin dhāv     dhvasra puruṣanti     ā sahasra dā     tṛ tad mandin dhāv     ā yad triṃśat tan     sahasra ca dā     tṛ tad mandin dhāv 
      pū go jit aśva jit     viśva jit soma raṇya jit     prajāvat ratna ā bhṛ     pū ap adābhya     pū oṣadhī     pū dhiṣaṇā     tvad soma pū     viśva durita tṛ     kavi sad ni barhis     pū svar vid     jan bhū mahat     indu viśva abhi id as 
      pra gāyatra gā     pū vicarṣaṇi     indu sahasra cakṣas     tad tvad sahasra cakṣas     atho sahasrabharṇas     ati vāra pū     ati vāra pū syand     kalaśa abhi dhāv     indra hārdi āviś     indra soma rādhas     śam pū vicarṣaṇi     prajāvat retas ā bhṛ 
      idam vīti pari sru     yad tvad indu mada ā     avahan navati navan     pur sadyas divodāsa     divodāsa śambara     adha tya turvaśa yadu     pari mad aśva aśva vid     gomat indu hiraṇyavat     kṣar sahasrin iṣ     pū tvad mad     pavitra abhyund     sakhi tva ā vṛ     yad tvad pavitra ūrmi     abhikṣar dhārā     tad mad soma mṛḍay     tad mad pū ā bhṛ     rayi vīravat iṣ     īś soma viśvatas     etad u tya daśan kṣip     mṛj sindhu mātṛ     sam āditya khyā     sam indra uta vāyu     su i pavitra ā     sam sūrya raśmi     tad mad bhaga vāyu     pūṣan pū madhumat     cāru mitra varuṇa ca     uccā tvad jāta andhas     div as bhūmi ā dā     ugra śarman mahi śravas     enad viśva ari ā     dyumna mānuṣa     siṣās van     tad mad indra yajyu     varuṇa marut     varivas vid pari sru     upa u su jan aptur     go bhaṅga pariṣkṛ     indu deva yā     tad id vṛdh mad gir     vatsa saṃśiśvan iva     yad indra hṛdaṃsani     ṛṣ mad soma śam go     duh pyā iṣ     vṛdh samudra ukthya     pū jan     div citra na tanyatu     jyotis vaiśvānara bṛhat     pū tvad rasa     mada rājan aducchuna     vi vāra avya ṛṣ     pū rasa tvad     dakṣa vi rāj dyumat     jyotis viśva svar dṛś     yad tvad mada vareṇya     tad pū andhas     devāvī agha śaṃsa han     jaghni vṛtra amitriya     sasni vāja diva diva     go sā u aśva sā as     sammiśla aruṣa bhū     su upastha na dhenu     sad śyena na yoni ā     tad pū yad av     indra vṛtra han     vṛ mahi ap     su vīra mad dhana     ji soma mīḍhvas     pū vṛdh mad gir     tvota tvad avas     as van āmur     soma vrata jāgṛ     apahan pū mṛdh     apa soma arāvan     gam indra niṣkṛta     mah mad rai ā bhṛ     pū han mṛdh     rā indu vīravat yaśas     na tvad śata cana hrut     rādhas dits ā mī     yat pū makhasy     pū indu vṛṣan su     kṛ mad yaśas jana     viśva apa dviṣ han     idam tvad sakhya mad     tvad indu dyumna uttama     sah pṛtany     yad tvad bhīma āyudha     tigma as dhvṛ     rakṣ sama mad nid 
      etad sṛj indu     tiras pavitra āśu     viśva abhi saubhaga     vihan durita puru     suga toka vājin     tan kṛ arvant     kṛ varivas go     abhi ṛṣ suṣṭuti     iḍā mad saṃyat     su aṃśu mada     ap dakṣa giriṣṭhā     śyena na yoni āsad     śubhra andhas deva van     ap dhū nṛ su     svad go payas     āt īṃ aśva na hetṛ     śubh amṛta     madhu rasa sadhamāda     yad tvad dhārā madhuścut     sṛj indu ūti     tad pavitra āsad     tad ṛṣ indra pā     tiras roman avyaya     sad yoni vana ā     tvad indu pari sru     svādiṣṭha aṅgiras     varivas vid ghṛta payas     idam vicarṣaṇi hi     pū tad cit     hi āpya bṛhat     etad vṛṣan vṛṣan vrata     pū aśasti han     kṛ vasu dāś     ā pū sahasrin     rayi gomat aśvin     puru ścandra puruspṛh     etad tya pari sic     marmṛj āyu     uru gāya kavi kratu     sahasra ūti śatāmagha     vimā rajas kavi     indra pū mada     giri jan iha stu     indu indra dhā     vi yoni vasati iva     pū su nṛ     soma vāja iva sṛ     camū śakman āsad     tad tri pṛṣṭha tri vandhura     ratha yuj yā     ṛṣi saptan dhīti     tad sotṛ dhana spṛt     āśu vāja yā     hari hi vājin     āviś kalaśa su     viśva ṛṣ abhi śrī     śūra na go sthā     ā tvad indu mada kaṃ     payas duh āyu     deva deva madhu     ā mad soma pavitra ā     sṛj madhumattama     deva deva śruttama     etad soma sṛj     gṛ śravas mah     madintama dhārā     abhi gavya vīti     nṛmṇa pū ṛṣ     san vāja pari sru     uta mad gomat iṣ     viśva ṛṣ pariṣṭubh     gṛ jamadagni     pū vāc agriya     soma citra ūti     abhi viśva kāvya     tvad samudriya ap     agriya vāc īray     pū viśvamejaya     tvad idam bhuvana kavi     mahiman soma sthā     tvad ṛṣ sindhu     pra tvad div na vṛṣṭi     dhārā i asaścat     abhi śukra upastir     indra indu pū     ugra dakṣa sādhana     īś vīti rādhas     pū ṛta kavi     soma pavitra āsad     dhā stotṛ su vīrya 
      ā pū sahasrin     rayi soma su vīrya     mad śravas dhāray     iṣ ūrj ca pinv     indra matsarintama     camū ā ni sad     su indra viṣṇu     soma kalaśa kṣar     madhumat as vāyu     etad sṛj āśu     ati hvaras babhru     soma ṛta dhārā     indra vṛdh aptur     kṛ viśva ārya     apahan arāvan     su anu sva ā rajas     abhi ṛṣ babhru     indra gam indu     idam pū dhārā     yad sūrya rocay     hi mānuṣa ap     yuj svar etaśa     pū manu adhi     antarikṣa yā     uta tya harit daśan     svar yuj yā     indu indra iti brū     pari itas vāyu su     gir indra matsara     avya vāra sic     pū vid rayi     mad soma duṣṭara     yad dūṇāśa vanuṣy     abhi ṛṣ sahasrin     rayi gomat aśvin     abhi vāja uta śravas     soma deva na sūrya     adri pū su     dhā kalaśa rasa     etad dhāman ārya     śukra ṛta dhārā     vāja gomat kṣar     su indra vajrin     soma dadhi āśir     pavitra ati kṣar     pra soma madhumattama     rai ṛṣ pavitra ā     mada yad deva vītama     tad ī mṛj āyu     hari nadī vājin     indu indra matsara     ā pū hiraṇyavat     aśvāvat soma vīravat     vāja gomat ā bhṛ     pari vāja na vājayu     avya vāra sic     indra madhumattama     kavi mṛj mṛj     dhī vipra avasyu     vṛṣan kanikrad ṛṣ     vṛṣan dhī aptur     soma ṛta dhārā     mati vipra sam svar     pū deva āyuṣak     indra gam tvad mada     vāyu ā ruh dharman     pū ni tuś     rayi soma śravāyya     priya samudra ā viś     apahan pū mṛdh     kratu vid soma matsara     nud adevayu jana     pū sṛj     soma śukra indu     abhi viśva kāvya     pū āśu     śubhra sṛj indu     han viśva apa dviṣ     pū div pari     antarikṣa sṛj     pṛthivī adhi sānu     pū soma dhārā     indu viśva apa sridh     han rakṣas su kratu     apahan soma rakṣas     abhi ṛṣ kanikrad     dyumat śuṣma uttama     mad vasu dhāray     soma divya pārthiva     indu viśva vārya 
      vṛṣan soma dyumat as     vṛṣan deva vṛṣan vrata     vṛṣan dharma dhā     vṛṣan tvad vṛṣṇya śavas     vṛṣan vana vṛṣan mada     satya vṛṣan vṛṣan id as     aśva na krand vṛṣan     sam go indu sam arvant     vi mad rai dvār vṛ     sṛj pra vājin     gavyā soma aśvayā     śukra vīrayā āśu     śubh ṛtāyu     mṛj gabhasti     pū vāra avyaya     tad viśva dāś vasu     soma divya pārthiva     pū āntarikṣa     pū viśva vid     pra tvad sarga sṛj     sūrya iva na raśmi     ketu kṛ div pari     viśva rūpa abhi ṛṣ     samudra soma pinv     hi vāc iṣ     pū vidharman     krand deva na sūrya     indu pū cetana     priya kavi mati     sṛj aśva rathī iva     ūrmi yad tvad pavitra ā     devāvī parikṣar     sad ṛta yoni ā     tad mad ṛṣ pavitra ā     mada yad deva vītama     indu indra pā     iṣ pū dhārā     mṛj manīṣin     indu ruci abhi go i     pū varivas kṛ     ūrj jana girvaṇas     hari sṛj āśir     pū deva vīti     indra yā niṣkṛta     dyut vājin yam     pra hi indu     acchā samudra āśu     dhī jū sṛj     marmṛj āyu     vṛthā samudra indu     gam ṛta yoni ā     pari mad yā asmayu     viśva vasu ojas     pā mad śarman vīravat     mā vahni etaśa     pada yuj ṛkvan     pra yat samudra ādhā     ā yat yoni hiraṇyaya     āśu ṛta sad     hā apracetas     abhi vena nū     iyakṣ pracetas     majj avicetas     indra indu marutvat     pū madhumattama     ṛta yoni āsad     tad tvad vipra vacas vid     pariṣkṛ vedhas     sam tvad mṛj āyu     rasa tvad mitra aryaman     pā varuṇa kavi     pū marut     tvad soma vipaścit     pū vāc iṣ     indu sahasrabharṇas     uta u sahasrabharṇas     vāc soma makhasyu     pū indu ā bhṛ     pū indu idam     puru hvā jana     priya samudra ā viś     davidyut ruc     pariṣṭubh kṛp     soma śukra gavāśir     hi hetṛ yam     ā vāja vājin kram     sad vanus yathā     ṛdhak soma svasti     saṃgam div kavi     pū sūrya dṛś 
      hi sūra usri     svasṛ jāmi pati     mahat indu mahīyu     pū ruc ruc     deva deva pari     viśva vasu ā viś     ā pū suṣṭuti     vṛṣṭi deva duvas     iṣ pū saṃyat     vṛṣan hi as bhānu     dyumat tvad hvā     pū svādhī     ā pū su vīrya     mad su āyudha     iha u su indu ā gam     yat ap pariṣic     mṛj gabhasti     dru sadhastha aś     pra soma vyaśva vat     pū gā     mah sahasra cakṣas     yad varṇa madhuścut     hari hi adri     indu indra pā     tad tvad vājin mad     viśva dhana ji     sakhi tva ā vṛ     vṛṣan pū dhārā     marutvat ca matsara     viśva dhā ojas     tad tvad dhartṛ oṇi     pū svar dṛś     hi vāja vājin     idam cit vipānā     hari pū dhārā     yuj vāja coday     ā mad indu mah iṣ     pū viśva darśata     mad soma gātu vid     ā kalaśa nū     indu dhārā ojas     ā indra pā viś     yad tvad mad rasa     tīvra duh adri     tad pū abhimāti han     rājan medhā ī     pavamāna manu adhi     antarikṣa yā     ā mad indu śatagvin     go poṣa su aśvya     vah bhagatti ūti     ā mad soma sahas juvas     rūpa na varcas bhṛ     su deva vīti     ṛṣ soma dyumattama     abhi droṇa roro     sad śyena na yoni ā     ap sā indra vāyu     varuṇa marut     soma ṛṣ viṣṇu     iṣ toka mad dhā     mad soma viśvatas     ā pū sahasrin     yad soma parāvat     yad arvāvat su     yad vā adas śaryaṇāvant     yad ārjīka kṛtvan     yad madhya pastyā     yad vā jana pañcan     tad mad vṛṣṭi div pari     pū ā su vīrya     su deva indu     pū haryata hari     gṛ jamadagni     hi go adhi tvac     pra śukra vayoju     hi na sapti     śrī ap mṛj     tad tvad su ābhū     hi devatāti     tad pū idam ruc     ā tvad dakṣa mayobhu     vahni adya vṛ     pānta ā puruspṛh     ā mandra ā vareṇya     ā vipra ā manīṣin     pānta ā puruspṛh     ā rayi ā sucetuna     ā su kratu tanū ā     pānta ā puruspṛh 
      pū viśvacarṣaṇi     abhi viśva kāvya     sakhi sakhi īḍ     tad viśva rāj     yad pū dhāman     pratyañc soma sthā     pari dhāman yad tvad     tvad soma as viśvatas     pū ṛtu kavi     pū janay iṣ     abhi viśva vārya     sakhi sakhi ūti     tvad śukra arci     div pṛṣṭha vi tan     pavitra soma dhāman     tvad idam saptan sindhu     praśis soma sṛ     tvad dhāv dhenu     pra soma yā dhārā     su indra matsara     dhā akṣiti śravas     sam u tvad dhī svar     hi saptan jāmi     vipra āji vivasvant     mṛj tvad sam agrū     avya jīri adhi svan     rebha yat añj vana     pū tvad kavi     vājin sarga sṛj     arvant na śravasyu     acchā kośa madhuścut     sṛj vāra avyaya     vāś dhīti     acchā samudra indu     asta go na dhenu     gam ṛta yoni ā     pra mad indu mah ran     ap ṛṣ sindhu     yat go vāsay     idam tvad sakhya mad     iyakṣ tvoti     indu sakhi tva vaś     ā pū gaviṣṭi     mah soma nṛ cakṣas     ā indra jaṭhara viś     mahat as soma jyeṣṭha     ugra indu ojiṣṭha     yudhvan as śaśvat ji     yad ugra cit ojīyas     śūra cit śūratara     bhūri dā cit maṃhīyas     tvad soma svar ā iṣ     toka sāti tanu     vṛ sakhya     vṛ yujya     agni āyus pū     ā sū ūrj iṣ ca mad     āre bādh ducchunā     agni ṛṣi pū     pāñcajanya purohita     tad ī mahat gaya     agni pū su apas     mad varcas su vīrya     dhā rayi mad poṣa     pū ati sridh     abhi ṛṣ suṣṭuti     sūra na viśva darśata     tad marmṛj āyu     prayasvat prayas hi     indu atya vicakṣaṇa     pū ṛta bṛhat     śukra jyotis jan     kṛṣṇa tamas jaṅghan     pū jaṅghan     hari candra sṛj     jīra ajira śocis     pū rathītama     śubhra śubhraśastama     hari ścandra marut gaṇa     pū vi aś     raśmi vāja sātama     dhā stotṛ su vīrya     pra su indu kṣar     pavitra ati avyaya     pū indu indra ā     etad soma adhi tvac     go krīḍ adri     indra mada johav     yad tvad dyumnavat payas     pū ābhṛ div     tad mad mṛḍ jīv 
      tvad soma as dhārayu     mandra ojiṣṭha adhvara     pū maṃhay rayi     tvad su nṛ mādana     dhanv matsarintama     indra sūri andhas     tvad su adri     abhi ṛṣ kanikrad     dyumat śuṣma uttama     indu hi ṛṣ     tiras vāra avyaya     hari vāja krand     indu vi avya ṛṣ     vi śravas vi saubhaga     vi vāja soma gomat     ā mad indu śatagvin     rayi gomat aśvin     bhṛ soma sahasrin     pū indu     tiras pavitra āśu     indra yāma aś     kakuha somya rasa     indu indra pūrvya     āyu pū āyu     hi sūra usri     pū madhuścut     abhi gir sam svar     av mad aja aśva     pūṣan yāman yāman     ā bhaj kanyā mad     idam soma kapardin     ghṛta na pū madhu     ā bhaj kanyā mad     idam tvad āghṛṇi su     ghṛta na pū śuci     ā bhaj kanyā mad     vāc jantu kavi     pū soma dhārā     deva ratna dhā as     ā kalaśa dhāv     śyena varman vi gāh     abhi droṇa kanikrad     pari pra soma tvad rasa     sṛj kalaśa su     śyena na tak ṛṣ     pū soma manday     indra madhumattama     sṛj deva vīti     vājay ratha iva     tad su madintama     śukra vāyu sṛj     grāvan tud abhiṣṭu     pavitra soma gam     dhā stotṛ su vīrya     etad tud abhiṣṭu     pavitra ati gāh     rakṣas han vāra avyaya     yad anti yad ca dūraka     bhaya vid mad iha     pū vi tad han     pū tad adya mad     pavitra vicarṣaṇi     yad potṛ tad pū mad     yad tvad pavitra arcis     agni vitan antar ā     brahman tad pū mad     yad tvad pavitra arcivat     agni tad pū mad     brahman sava pū mad     ubh deva savitṛ     pavitra sava ca     mad pū viśvatas     tri tvad deva savitṛ     varṣiṣṭha soma dhāman     agni dakṣa pū mad     pū mad deva jana     pū vasu dhī     viśva deva pū mad     jātavedas pū mad     pra pyā pra syand     soma viśva aṃśu     deva uttama havis     upa priya panipn     yuvan āhuti vṛdh     gam bhṛ namas     alāyya paraśu naś     tad ā pū deva soma     ākhu cit eva deva soma     yad pāvamāna adhī     ṛṣi sambhṛ rasa     sarva tad pū aś     svaday mātariśvan     pāvamāna yad adhī     ṛṣi sambhṛ rasa     tad sarasvatī duh     kṣīra sarpis madhu udaka 
      pra deva acchā madhumat indu     syand go ā na dhenu     barhiṣad vacanāvat ūdhas     parisrut usriyā nirṇij dhā     tad roro abhi pūrva krand     upāruh śrathay svād hari     tiras pavitra parī uru jrayas     ni śarya dhā deva ā vara     vi yad mā yamya sami mada     sākaṃvṛdh payas pinv akṣita     mah apāra rajas vivevid     abhivraj akṣita pājas ā dā     tad mātṛ vicar vājay ap     pra medhira svadhā pinv pada     aṃśu yava piś yam nṛ     sam jāmi nas rakṣ śiras     sam dakṣa manas jan kavi     ṛta garbha nidhā yama paras     yuvan ha as prathamam vi jñā     guhā dhā janiman nema udyam     mandra rūpa vid manīṣin     śyena yat andhas bhṛ parāvat     tad marjay suvṛdh nadī     vaś aṃśu parī ṛgmiya     tvad mṛj daśan yoṣan su     soma ṛṣi mati dhīti hi     avya vāra uta deva hūti     nṛ yam vāja ā dṛ sāti     paripre vayya suṣaṃsad     soma manīṣā abhi nū stubh     yad dhārā madhumat ūrmi div     ṛch vāc rayiṣah amartya     idam div ṛch viśva ā rajas     soma pū kalaśa sad     ap go mṛj adri su     pū indu varivas vid priya     eva mad soma pariṣic     vayas dhā citratama pū     a dveṣa dyāvāpṛthivī hvā     deva dhā rayi mad su vīra 
      iṣu na dhanvan prati dhā mati     vatsa na mātṛ upa sṛj ūdhas     uru dhārā iva duh agra e     idam vrata api soma iṣ     upa u mati pṛc sic madhu     mandrājanī cud antar āsan     pū saṃtani prahan iva     madhumat drapsa pari vāra ṛṣ     avya vadhūyu pū pari tvac     śrath naptī aditi ṛta i     hari krand yajata saṃyam mada     nṛmṇa śā mahiṣa na śubh     ukṣan mā prati i dhenu     deva devī upa i niṣkṛta     ati kram arjuna vāra avyaya     atka na nij pari soma vye     amṛkta ruśat vāsas hari     amartya nirṇij pari vye     div pṛṣṭha barhaṇā nirṇij kṛ     upastaraṇa camū nabhasmaya     sūrya iva raśmi drāvayitnu     matsara prasup sākam īr     tantu tan pari sarga āśu     na indra ṛte pū dhāman kaścana     sindhu iva pravaṇa nimna āśu     vṛṣan cyu mada gātu aś     śam mad niveśa dvipad catuṣpada     mad vāja soma sthā kṛṣṭi     ā mad pū vasumat hiraṇyavat     aśvāvat gomat yavamat su vīrya     tvad hi soma pitṛ mad as     div mūrdhan prasthā vayaskṛt     etad soma pū indra     ratha iva pra yā sāti acchā     su pavitra ati i avya     hā vavri harit vṛṣṭi acchā     indu indra bṛhat pū     su mṛḍīka anavadya riśādas     candra gṛ vasu     deva dyāvāpṛthivī prāv mad 
      tris idam saptan dhenu duh     satya āśir pūrvya vyoman     catur anya bhuvana nirṇij     cāru kṛ yat ṛta vṛdh     tad bhikṣ amṛta cāru     ubh div kāvya vi śrath     tejiṣṭha ap maṃhanā pari vye     yadi deva śravas sadas vid     tad idam as ketu amṛtyu     adābhya janus ubh anu     yad nṛmṇa ca devya ca pū     āt id rājan manana grah     tad mṛj daśan su karman     pra madhyama mātṛ pramā sacā     vrata pā amṛta cāru     ubh nṛ cakṣas anu paś viś     tad marmṛj indriya dhāyas     ā ubh antar rodas hṛṣ hi     vṛṣan śuṣma bādh vi durmati     ādediś śaryahan iva śurudh     tad mātṛ na dṛś usriya     nānad i marut iva svana     jñā ṛta prathama yad svarṇṛ     praśasti kaṃ vṛ su kratu     ru bhīma vṛṣabha taviṣyā     śṛṅga śā harin vicakṣaṇa     ā yoni soma su kṛ ni sad     gavyaya tvac bhū nirṇij avyaya     śuci pū tanū arepas     avya hari ni dhāv sānu     juṣ mitra varuṇa vāyu     tri dhātu madhu kṛ sukarman     pū soma deva vīti vṛṣan     indra hārdi soma dhāna ā viś     purā mad bādha durita ati pāray     kṣetra vid hi diś ah vipracch     hi na sapti abhi vāja ṛṣ     indra indu jaṭhara ā pū     nau na sindhu ati pṛ vid     śūra na yudh ava mad nid spṛ 
      ā dakṣiṇā sṛj śuṣmin āsad     vī druh rakṣas pā jāgṛvi     hari opaśa kṛ nabhas payas     upastir camū brahman nirṇij     pra kṛṣṭi han iva śūṣa i roro     asurya varṇa ni ri idam tad     hā vavri pitu i niṣkṛta     upaprut kṛ nirṇij tan     adri su pū gabhasti     vṛṣāy nabhas vip mati     tad mud nas sādh gir     nenij ap yaj parīman     pari dyukṣa sahas parvatāvṛdh     madhu sic harmya sakṣaṇi     ā yad go su hutād ūdhas     mūrdhan śrī agriya varīman     sam ī ratha na bhurij hi     daśan svasṛ aditi upastha ā     gā upa jri go apīcya     pada yat idam matutha jan     śyena na yoni sadana dhī kṛ     hiraṇyaya āsad deva īṣ     ri barhis priya gir     aśva na deva api i yajñiya     parā vyañj aruṣa div kavi     vṛṣan tri pṛṣṭha nu go abhi     sahasraṇīti yati pare     rebha na pūrva uṣas vi rāj     tveṣa rūpa kṛ varṇa idam tad     yatra śī samṛti sidh sridh     ap sā yā svadhā daivya jana     sam suṣṭuti nas sam go agra     ukṣan iva yūtha parī ru     adhi tviṣi dhā sūrya     divya suparṇa ava cakṣ kṣā     soma pari kratu paś jā 
      hari mṛj aruṣa na yuj     sam dhenu kalaśa soma añj     ud vāc īray hi mati     puruṣṭuta kati cit pariprī     sākam vad bahu manīṣin     indra soma jaṭhara yat āduh     yadi mṛj su gabhasti nṛ     sanīḍa daśan kāmya madhu     a ram ati i go abhi     sūrya priya duhitṛ tiras rava     anu idam joṣa bhṛ vinaṅgṛsa     sam dvayī svasṛ kṣi jāmi     nṛ dhū adriṣuta barhis priya     pati go pradiv indu ṛtviya     puraṃdhivat manus yajña sādhana     śuci dhī pū soma indra tvad     nṛ bāhu coday dhārā su     anuṣvadham pū soma indra tvad     āprā kratu sam ji adhvara mati     vi na druṣad camū āsad hari     aṃśu duh stanay akṣit     kavi kavi apas manīṣin     sam ī go mati i saṃyat     ṛta yoni sadana punarbhū     nābhi pṛthivī dharuṇa mah div     ap ūrmi sindhu antar ukṣ     indra vajra vṛṣabha vibhūvasu     soma hṛd pū cāru matsara     tad tu pū pari pārthiva rajas     stotṛ śikṣ ādhū ca su kratu     mā mad niḥ bhaj vasu sādana spṛś     rayi piśaṅga bahula vas     ā tu mad indu śata dātu aśvya     sahasra dātu paśumat hiraṇyavat     upa mā bṛhat revat iṣ     adhi stotra pū mad gam 
      srakva drapsa dham sam svar     ṛta yoni sam ṛch nābhi     tri tad mūrdhan asura kṛ ārabh     satya nau sukṛt pṛ     samyak samyañc mahiṣa hi     sindhu ūrmi adhi vena vip     madhu dhārā janay arka id     priya indra tanū vṛdh     pavitravat pari vāc ās     pitṛ idam pratna abhi rakṣ vrata     maha samudra varuṇa tiras dhā     dhīra id śak dharuṇa ārabh     sahasra dhārā ava tad sam svar     div nāka madhu jihvā asaścat     idam spaś na ni miṣ bhūrṇi     pada pada pāśin as setu     pitṛ mātṛ adhi ā yad saṃsvar     ṛc śuc saṃdah avrata     indra dviṣ apa dham māyā     tvac asita bhūman div pari     pratna māna adhi ā yad saṃsvar     ślokayantra rabhasa mantu     apa anakṣa badhira hā     ṛta pathin na tṛ duṣkṛt     sahasra dhārā vitan pavitra ā     vāc pū kavi manīṣin     rudra idam iṣira adruh     spaś svañc sudṛś nṛ cakṣas     ṛta gopā na dabh sukratu     tri tad pavitra hṛd antar ā dhā     vid tad viśva bhuvana abhi paś     ava ajuṣṭa vyadh karta avrata     ṛta tantu vitan pavitra ā     jihvā agra varuṇa māyā     dhīra cit tad sam inakṣ aś     atra karta av pad aprabhu 
      śiśu na jan ava krand vana     svar yat vājin aruṣa siṣās     div retas sac payas vṛdh     tad ī sumati śarman saprathas     div yad skambha dharuṇa su ātan     āp￞ aṃśu parī viśvatas     tad idam mah rodas yaj āvṛt     samīcīna dhṛ sam iṣ kavi     mahi psaras su kṛ somya madhu     uru gavyūti aditi ṛta i     īś yad vṛṣṭi itas usriya vṛṣan     ap netṛ yad itaūti ṛgmiya     ātmanvat nabhas duh ghṛta payas     ṛta nābhi amṛta vi jan     samīcīna sudānu prī tad     nṛ hi ava mih peru     ru aṃśu sac ūrmi     devāvī manus pinv tvac     dhā garbha aditi upastha ā     yad toka ca tanaya ca dhā     sahasra dhārā ava tad asaścat     tṛtīya as rajas prajāvat     catur nābh nidhā avas div     havis bhṛ amṛta ghṛtaścut     śveta rūpa kṛ yat siṣās     soma mīḍhvas asura vid bhūman     dhī śamī sac tad īṃ abhi pravat     div kabandha ava dṛ udrin     adha śveta kalaśa go añj     kārṣman ā vājin kram san     ā hi manas devay     kakṣīvant śata hima go     ap soma pṛc tvad rasa     avya vāra vi pū dhāv     tad mṛj kavi madintama     svad indra pū pā 
      abhi priya pū canohita     nāman yahva adhi yad vṛdh     ā sūrya bṛhat bṛhat adhi     ratha viṣvañc ruh vicakṣaṇa     ṛta jihvā pū madhu priya     vaktṛ pati dhī idam adābhya     dhā putra pitṛ apīcya     nāman tṛtīya adhi rocana div     ava dyut kalaśa krand     nṛ yam kośa ā hiraṇyaya     abhi īṃ ṛta dohana nū     adhi tri pṛṣṭha uṣas vi rāj     adri su mati canohita     prarocay rodas mātṛ śuci     roman avya samayā vi dhāv     madhu dhārā pinv diva diva     pari soma pra dhanv svasti     nṛ pū abhi vāsay āśir     yad tvad mada āhanas vihāyas     tad indra coday dā magha 
      dhartṛ div pū kṛtvya rasa     dakṣa deva anumad nṛ     hari sṛj atya na satvan     vṛthā pājas kṛ nadī ā     śūra na dhā āyudha gabhasti     svar siṣās rathira gaviṣṭi     indra śuṣma īray apasyu     indu hi añj manīṣin     indra soma pū ūrmi     taviṣy jaṭhara ā viś     pra mad pinv vidyut abhra iva rodas     dhī na vāja upa mā śaśvat     viśva rājan pū svar dṛś     ṛta dhīti ṛṣiṣah vāś     yad sūrya asira mṛj     pitṛ mati a samaś kāvya     vṛṣan iva yūtha pari kośa ṛṣ     ap upastha vṛṣabha kanikrad     tad indra pū matsarintama     yathā ji samitha tvoti 
      etad pra kośa madhumat krand     indra vajra vapus vapuṣṭara     abhi īṃ ṛta su dugha ghṛtaścut     vāśrā ṛṣ payas iva dhenu     tad pūrvya pū yad div pari     śyena mathāy iṣ tiras rajas     sa madhu as yu vevij id     kṛśānu astṛ manas aha bhī     tad mad pūrva upara indu     mah vāja dhanv gomat     īkṣeṇya ahī na cāru     brahman brahman yad juṣ havis havis     idam mad vid van vanuṣy     indu satrāc manas puruṣṭuta     ina yad sadana garbha ādhā     go urubja abhi ṛṣ vraja     cakri div pū kṛtvya rasa     mahat adabdha varuṇa huruk i     su mitra vṛjana yajñiya     atya na yūtha vṛṣayu kanikrad 
      pra rājan vāc janay syand     ap vas abhi go iyakṣ     grah ripra avi idam tānva     śudh deva upa yā niṣkṛta     indra soma pari sic nṛ     nṛ cakṣas ūrmi kavi añj vana     puru hi tvad sruti as yā     sahasra aśva hari camūṣad     samudriya apsaras manīṣin     ās antar abhi soma kṣar     tad īṃ hi harmya sakṣaṇi     yāc sumna pū akṣita     go jit mad soma ratha jit hiraṇya jit     svar jit ap jit pū sahasra jit     yad deva kṛ pā mada     svādiṣṭha drapsa aruṇa mayobhu     etad soma pū asmayu     satya kṛ draviṇa ṛṣ     han śatru antika dūraka ca yad     uru gavyūti abhaya ca mad kṛ 
      acodas mad dhanv indu     pra su bṛhaddiva hari     vi ca naś mad iṣ arāti     ari naś san mad dhī     pra mad dhanv indu madacyut     dhana vā yad arvant jū     tiras marta kaścit parihvṛti     mad dhana viśvadhā bhṛ     uta sva arāti ari hi tad     uta anya arāti vṛka hi tad     dhanvan na tṛṣṇā sam ṛch tad abhi     soma han pū durādhī     div tvad nābhi parama yad ādā     pṛthivī tvad ruh sānu kṣip     adri tvad bhas go adhi tvac     ap tvad hasta duh manīṣin     eva tvad indu su bhū supeśas     rasa tuj prathama abhiśrī     nid nid pū ni tṛ     āvis tvad śuṣma bhū priya mada 
      soma dhārā pū nṛ cakṣas     ṛta deva hvā div pari     bṛhaspati ravatha vi dyut     samudra na savana vyac     yad tvad vājin aghnyā abhi nū     ayas han yoni ā ruh dyumat     maghavan āyus pratṛ mahi śravas     indra soma pū vṛṣan mada     ā indra kukṣi pū madintama     ūrj vas śravas su maṅgala     pratyañc tad viśva bhuvana abhi prath     krīḍ hari atya syand vṛṣan     tad tvad deva madhumattama nṛ     sahasra dhārā duh daśan kṣip     nṛ soma pracyu grāvan su     viśva deva ā pū sahasra jit     tad tvad hastin madhumat adri     duh ap vṛṣabha daśan kṣip     indra soma māday daivya jana     sindhu iva ūrmi pū ṛṣ 
      pra soma pū ūrmi     indra i jaṭhara supeśas     dadhi yat īṃ unnī yaśas go     dāna śūra unmad su     acchā hi soma kalaśa syand     atya na voḍhṛ raghu vartani vṛṣan     atha deva ubhaya janman     vid aś amutas itas ca yad     ā mad soma pū kṛ vasu     indu bhū maghavan rādhas mah     śikṣ vayodhas vasu su cetu     mā na u gaya āre mad parā sic     ā mad pūṣan pū su rāti     mitra gam varuṇa sajoṣas     bṛhaspati marut vāyu aśvin     tvaṣṭṛ savitṛ su yama sarasvatī     ubh dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminva     aryaman deva aditi vidhātṛ     bhaga nṛśaṃsa uru antarikṣa     viśva deva pū juṣ 
      su soma aruṣa vṛṣan hari     rājan iva dasma abhi go krand     pū vāra pari i avyaya     śyena na yoni ghṛtavat āsad     kavi vedhasyā pari i māhina     atya na mṛj abhi vāja ṛṣ     apasidh durita soma mṛḍay     ghṛta vas pari yā nirṇij     parjanya pitṛ mahiṣa parṇin     nābhi pṛthivī giri kṣaya dhā     svasṛ ap abhi go uta sṛ     sam grāvan nas vī adhvara     jāyā iva pati adhi śeva mah     pajra garbha śru brū tvad     antar vāṇī pra car su jīv     anindya vṛjana soma jāgṛ     yathā pūrva śata sā amṛdhra     sahasra sā pariyā vāja indu     eva pū suvita navyas     tvad vrata anu ap sac 
      pavitra tvad vitan brahmaṇaspati     prabhu gātra pari i viśvatas     a tap tanū na tad āma aś     śrī id vah tad sam aś     tapu pavitra vitan div pada     śuc idam tantu vi sthā     av idam pavītṛ āśu     div pṛṣṭha adhi sthā cetas     ruc uṣas pṛśni agriya     ukṣan bhṛ bhuvana vājayu     māyāvin mā idam māyā     nṛ cakṣas pitṛ garbha ā     gandharva itthā pada idam rakṣ     pā deva janiman adbhuta     grah ripu nidhā nidhā pati     su kṛttama madhu bhakṣa aś     havis haviṣmat mahi sadman daivya     nabhas vas pari yā adhvara     rājan pavitra ratha vāja āruh     sahasra bhṛṣṭi ji śravas bṛhat 
      pū deva mādana vicarṣaṇi     ap sā indra varuṇa vāyu     kṛ mad adya varivas svastimat     uru kṣiti gṛ daivya jana     ā yad sthā bhuvana amartya     viśva soma pari tad ṛṣ     kṛ saṃcṛt vicṛt abhiṣṭi     indu sac uṣas na sūrya     ā yad go sṛj oṣadhī ā     deva sumna iṣay upāvasu     ā vidyut pū dhārā su     indra soma māday daivya jana     etad tya soma pū sahasra jit     hi vāc iṣira uṣarbudh     indu samudra ud ṛch vāyu     ā indra hārdi kalaśa sad     abhi tya go payas payas vṛdh     soma śrī mati svar vid     dhanaṃjaya pū kṛtvya rasa     vipra kavi kāvya svar canas 
      indra soma suṣuta pari sru     apa amīvā bhū rakṣas saha     mā tvad rasa mad dvayāvin     draviṇasvat iha as indu     mad samarya pū coday     dakṣa deva as hi priya mada     han śatru abhi ā bhandanāy     pā indra soma ava mad mṛdh han     adabdha indu pū madintama     ātman indra bhū dhāsi uttama     abhi svar bahu manīṣin     rājan idam bhuvana niṃs     sahasraṇītha śata dhārā adbhuta     indra indu pū kāmya madhu     ji kṣetra abhi ṛṣ ji ap     uru mad gātu kṛ soma mīḍhvas     kanikrad kalaśa go añj     vi avyaya samayā vāra ṛṣ     marmṛj atya na sānasi     indra soma jaṭhara sam kṣar     svādu pū divya janman     svādu indra suhavītunāman     svādu mitra varuṇa vāyu     bṛhaspati madhumat adābhya     atya mṛj kalaśa daśan kṣip     pra vipra mati vāc īr     pū abhi ṛṣ suṣṭuti     ā indra viś madira indu     pū abhi ṛṣ su vīrya     uru gavyūti mahi śarman saprathas     mākir mad idam pariṣūti īś     indu ji tvad dhana dhana     adhi div sthā vṛṣabha vicakṣaṇa     ruc vi div rocana kavi     rājan pavitra ati i roro     div pīyūṣa duh nṛ cakṣas     div nāka madhu jihvā asaścat     vena duh ukṣan giriṣṭhā     ap drapsa vṛdh samudra ā     sindhu ūrmi madhumat pavitra ā     nāka suparṇa upapat     gir vena kṛp puru     śiśu rih mati panipn     hiraṇyaya śakuna kṣāman sthā     ūrdhva gandharva adhi nāka sthā     viśva rūpa praticakṣ idam     bhānu śukra śocis vi dyut     praruc rodasī mātṛ śuci 
      pra tvad āśu pū dhī jū     mada ṛṣ raghu jā iva tman     divya suparṇa madhumat indu     madintama pari kośa ās     pra tvad mada madira āśu     sṛj rathya yathā pṛthak     dhenu na vatsa payas abhi vajrin     indra indu madhumat ūrmi     atya na hi abhi vāja ṛṣ     svar vid kośa div adri mātṛ     vṛṣan pavitra adhi sānu avyaya     soma pū indriya dhāyas     pra tvad āśvina pū dhī jū     divya sṛj payas dharīman     pra antar ṛṣi sthāvira sṛj     yad tvad mṛj ṛṣiṣāṇa vedhas     viśva dhāman viśva cakṣas ṛbhvas     prabhu tvad as pari i ketu     vyānaśi pū soma dharman     pati viśva bhuvana rāj     ubhayatas pū raśmi     dhruva as pari i ketu     yadi pavitra adhi mṛj hari     sattṛ ni yoni kalaśa sad     yajña ketu pū su adhvara     soma deva upa yā niṣkṛta     sahasra dhārā pari kośa ṛṣ     vṛṣan pavitra ati i roro     rājan samudra nadī vi gāh     ap ūrmi sac sindhu śri     adhi sthā sānu pū avyaya     nābhi pṛthivī dharuṇa mah div     div na sānu stanay krand     div ca yad pṛthivī ca dharman     indra sakhya pū vivevid     soma pū kalaśa sad     jyotis yajña pū madhu priya     pitṛ deva janitṛ vibhūvasu     dhā ratna svadhā apīcya     madintama matsara indriya rasa     abhikrand kalaśa vājin ṛṣ     pati div śata dhārā vicakṣaṇa     hari mitra sadana sad     marmṛj avi sindhu vṛṣan     agra sindhu pū ṛṣ     agra vāc agriya go gam     agra vāja bhaj mahat dhana     su āyudha sotṛ pū vṛṣan     idam matavat śakuna yathā hi     avya sṛ pū ūrmi     tvad kratu rodasī antarā kavi     śuci dhī pū soma indra tvad     drāpi vas yajata divispṛś     antarikṣa prā bhuvana arpay     svar jan nabhas abhi kram     pratna idam pitṛ ā vivās     tad idam viś mahi śarman yam     yad idam dhāman prathama vyaś     pada yad idam parama vyoman     atas viśva abhi sam yā saṃyat     pra u yā indu indra niṣkṛta     sakhi sakhi na pra mī saṃgir     marya iva yuvati sam ṛṣ     soma kalaśa śata yāman pathin     pra tvad dhī mandrayu vipanyu     panasyu saṃvasana kram     soma manīṣā abhi nū stubh     abhi dhenu payas īṃ śri     ā mad soma saṃyat pyā iṣ     indu pū pū asridh     yad mad duh tris ahar a sac     kṣumat vājavat madhumat su vīrya     vṛṣan mati pū vicakṣaṇa     soma ahar pratarītṛ uṣas div     krāṇā sindhu kalaśa vāś     indra hārdi āviś manīṣin     manīṣin pū pūrvya kavi     nṛ yam pari kośa krand     trita nāman janay madhu kṣar     indra vāyu sakhya kṛ     idam pū uṣas vi rocay     idam sindhu bhū u loka kṛt     idam tris saptan duh āśir     soma hṛd pū cāru matsara     pū soma divya dhāman     sṛj indu kalaśa pavitra ā     sad indra jaṭhara kanikrad     nṛ yam sūrya ārohay div     adri su pū pavitra     indu indra jaṭhara āviś     tvad nṛ cakṣas bhū vicakṣaṇa     soma gotra aṅgiras vṛ apa     tvad soma pū svādhī     anu vipra mad avasyu     tvad suparṇa ābhṛ div pari     indu viśva mati pariṣkṛ     avya pū pari vāra ūrmi     hari nū abhi saptan dhenu     ap upastha adhi āyu kavi     ṛta yoni mahiṣa hi     indu pū ati gāh mṛdh     viśva kṛ su patha yajyu     go kṛ nirṇij haryata kavi     atya na krīḍ pari vāra ṛṣ     asaścat śata dhārā abhiśrī     hari nū ava tad udanyu     kṣip mṛj pari go āvṛ     tṛtīya pṛṣṭha adhi rocana div     tvad idam prajā divya retas     tvad viśva bhuvana rāj     atha idam viśva pū tvad vaśa     tvad indu prathama dhāman dhā as     tvad samudra as viśva vid kavi     tvad idam pañcan pradiś vidharman     tvad div ca pṛthivī ca ati bhṛ     tvad jyotis pū sūrya     tvad pavitra rajas vidharman     deva soma pū pū     tvad uśij prathama grah     tvad idam viśva bhuvana yam     pra rebha i ati vāra avyaya     vṛṣan vana ava krand hari     sam dhīti vāś nū     śiśu rih mati panipn     tad sūrya raśmi pari vye     tantu tan trivṛt yathā vid     nī ṛta praśis navīyas     pati jani upa yā niṣkṛta     rājan sindhu pū pati div     ṛta yā pathin kanikrad     sahasra dhārā pari sic hari     pū vāc janay upāvasu     pū mahi arṇas vi dhāv     sūra na citra avyaya pavyaya     gabhasti pū nṛ adri su     mah vāja dhanya dhanv     iṣ ūrj pū abhi ṛṣ     śyena na van kalaśa sad     indra madvan mad mada su     div viṣṭambha upama vicakṣaṇa     saptan svasṛ abhi mātṛ śiśu     nava jan jenya vipaścit     ap gandharva divya nṛ cakṣas     soma viśva bhuvana rāj     īśāna idam bhuvana vī     yuj indu harit suparṇī     tad tvad kṣar madhumat ghṛta payas     tvad vrata soma sthā kṛṣṭi     tvad nṛ cakṣas as soma viśvatas     pū vṛṣabha tad vi dhāv     tad mad pū vasumat hiraṇyavat     mad as bhuvana jīv     go vid pū vasu vid hiraṇya vid     retas dhā indu bhuvana arpay     tvad su vīra as soma viśva vid     tad tvad vipra upa gir idam ās     ud madhu ūrmi vanana sthāpay     ap vas mahiṣa vi gāh     rājan pavitra ratha vāja āruh     sahasra bhṛṣṭi ji śravas bṛhat     tad bhandanā ud ṛch prajāvat     viśvāyu viśva subhara ahardivi     brahman prajāvat rayi aśva pastya     pā indu indra mad yāc     tad agra ahar hari haryata mada     pra cetas cetay anu div     dvi jana yātay antar ī     nṛ ca śaṃsa daivya ca dhartṛ     añj vi añj sam añj     kratu rih madhu abhi añj     sindhu ucchvāsa patay ukṣan     hiraṇya pāva paśu idam grah     vipaścit pū gā     mah na dhārā ati andhas ṛṣ     ahi na jṛ ati sṛp tvac     atya na krīḍ sṛ vṛṣan hari     agrega rājan āpya taviṣy     vimā ahar bhuvana arpay     hari ghṛta snu su dṛśīka arṇava     jyotīratha pū rai okya     sṛj skambha div udyam mada     pari tri dhātu bhuvana ṛṣ     aṃśu rih mati panipn     gir yadi nirṇij ṛgmin yā     pra tvad dhārā ati aṇva meṣī     pū saṃyat i raṃhi     yat go indu camū samañj     ā su soma kalaśa sad     pū soma kratu vid na ukthya     avya vāra pari dhāv madhu priya     han viśva rakṣas indu atrin     bṛhat vad vidatha su vīra 
      pra tu dru pari kośa ni sad     nṛ pū abhi vāja ṛṣ     aśva na tvad vājin marjay     acchā barhis raśanā nī     su āyudha pū deva indu     aśasti han vṛjana rakṣ     pitṛ deva janitṛ su dakṣa     viṣṭambha div dharuṇa pṛthivī     ṛṣi vipra puraetṛ jana     ṛbhu dhīra uśanas kāvya     tad cit vid nidhā yad idam     apīcya guh nāman go     etad tya tvad madhumat indra soma     vṛṣan vṛṣan pari pavitra kṣar     sahasra sā śata sā bhūri dāvan     śaśvattama barhis ā vājin sthā     etad soma abhi gavya sahasra     mah vāja amṛta śravas     pavitra pū sṛj     śravasyu na pṛtanāj atya     pari hi sma puru hvā jana     viśva sṛ bhojana pū     atha bhṛ śyena bhṛ prayas     rayi tuj abhi vāja ṛṣ     etad su pari soma pavitra     sarga na sṛj dhāv arvan     tigma śā mahiṣa na śṛṅga     go gavyat abhi śūra na satvan     etad yā parama antar adri     kūcid as ūrva go vid     div na vidyut stanay abhra     soma tvad pū indra dhārā     uta sma rāśi pari yā go     indra soma sa ratha pū     puru iṣ bṛhat jīra dānu     śikṣ śacīvat tvad tad upaṣṭut 
      idam soma indra tvad su     tvad pū tvad idam pā     tvad ha yad kṛ tvad vṛ     indu mada yujya soma     tad īṃ ratha na bhūriṣāh yuj     maha puru sāti vasu     āt īṃ viśva nahuṣya jāta     svarṣāti vana ūrdhva nū     vāyu na yad niyutvat iṣ yāman     nāsatya iva hava ā śambhaviṣṭha     viśva vāra draviṇas dā iva tman     pūṣan iva dhī javana as soma     indra na yad maha karman cakri     hantṛ vṛtra as soma pur bhid     paidva na hi tvad ahi nāman     hantṛ viśva as soma dasyu     agni na yad vana ā sṛj     vṛthā pājas kṛ nadī     jana na yudhvan mahat upabdi     ṛch soma pū ūrmi     etad soma ati vāra avya     divya na kośa abhra varṣa     vṛthā samudra sindhu na nyāñc     su abhi kalaśa sṛj     śuṣmin śardhas na māruta pū     anabhiśasta divya yathā viś     ap na makṣū sumati bhū mad     sahasra apsas pṛtanāṣāh na yajña     rājan nu tvad varuṇa vrata     bṛhat gabhīra tvad soma dhāman     śuci tvad as priya na mitra     dakṣāyya aryaman iva as soma 
      pra u tya vahni pathyā syand     div na vṛṣṭi pū kṣar     sahasra dhārā sad ni mad     mātṛ upastha vana ā ca soma     rājan sindhu vas vāsas     ṛta nau āruh rajiṣṭha     ap drapsa vṛdh śyena jū     duh īṃ pitṛ duh īṃ pitṛ jā     siṃha nas madhu ayās     hari aruṣa div idam pati     śūra yudh prathama pracch go     idam cakṣas pari pā ukṣan     madhu pṛṣṭha ghora ayās aśva     ratha yuj uru cakra ṛṣva     svasṛ īṃ jāmi marjay     sanābhi vājin ūrjay     catur īṃ ghṛta duh sac     samāna antar dharuṇa niṣad     tad īṃ ṛṣ namas pū     tad īṃ viśvatas pari as puru     viṣṭambha div dharuṇa pṛthivī     viśva uta kṣiti hasta idam     as tvad utsa gṛ niyutvat     madhu aṃśu pū indriya     van avāta abhi deva vīti     indra soma vṛtra han pū     śak mah puru ścandra rai     su vīrya pati as 
      pra hi janitṛ rodasī     ratha na vāja san yā     indra gam āyudha saṃśā     viśva vasu hasta ādhā     abhi tri pṛṣṭha vṛṣan vayas dhā     āṅgūṣa vāś vāṇī     vana vas varuṇa na sindhu     vi ratna dhā day vārya     śūra grāma sarva vīra sahāvat     ji pū san dhana     tigma āyudha kṣipra dhanvan samad     a sah sah pṛtanā śatru     uru gavyūti abhaya kṛ     samīcīna ā pū puraṃdhi     ap siṣās uṣas svar go     sam krand mah mad vāja     mad soma varuṇa mad mitra     mad indra indu pū viṣṇu     mad śardhas māruta mad deva     mad mahat indra indu mada     eva rājan iva kratumat ama     viśva jaṅghan durita pū     indu sūkta vacas vayas dhā     tvad pā svasti sadā mad 
      sṛj vakvan rathya yathā āji     dhī manotṛ prathama manīṣin     daśan svasṛ adhi sānu avya     aj vahni sadana acchā     vīti jana divya kavya     adhi su nahuṣya indu     pra yad nṛ amṛta martya     marmṛj avi go ap     vṛṣan vṛṣan roro aṃśu idam     pū ruśat īr payas go     sahasra ṛkvan pathin vacas vid     adhvasman sūra aṇva vi yā     ruj dṛḍha cit rakṣas sadas     pū indu vṛ vi vāja     vraśc upariṣṭāt tuj vadha     yad anti dūrāt upanāya idam     tad pratna vat navyas viśva vāra     sūkta pathin kṛ prāñc     yad duḥṣaha vanus bṛhat     tad tvad aś puru kṛt purukṣu     eva pū ap svar go     mad toka tanaya bhūri     śam mad kṣetra uru jyotis soma     jyok mad sūrya dṛś rā 
      pari su hari aṃśu pavitra     ratha na sṛj sani hi     āp śloka indriya pū     prati deva juṣ prayas     acchā nṛ cakṣas sṛ pavitra     nāman dhā kavi idam yoni     sad hotṛ iva sadana camū     upa īṃ gam ṛṣi saptan vipra     pra sumedhas gātu vid viśva deva     soma pū sadas i nitya     bhū viśva kāvya rantṛ     anu jana yat pañcan dhīra     tvad tya soma pū niṇya     viśva deva tri ekādaśa     daśan svadhā adhi sānu avya     mṛj tvad nadī saptan yahva     tad nu satya pū as     yatra viśva kāru saṃnas     jyotis yat ahar kṛ u loka     prāv manu dasyu kṛ abhīka     pari sadman iva paśumat hotṛ     rājan na satya samiti ī     soma pū kalaśa yā     sad mṛga na mahiṣa vana 
      sākamukṣ marjay svasṛ     daśan dhīra dhīti dhanutṛ     hari pari dru jā sūrya     droṇa nakṣ atya na vājin     sam mātṛ na śiśu vāś     vṛṣan dhanv puru vāra ap     marya na yoṣā abhi niṣkṛta i     sam gam kalaśa usriyā     uta pra pyā ūdhas aghnyā     indu dhārā sac sumedhas     mūrdhan go payas camū     abhi śrī vasu na nij     tad mad deva pū rad     indu rayi aśvin vaś     rathirāy vaś puraṃdhi     asmadryañc ā dā vasu     nu mad rayi upa mā nṛvat     pū vātāpya viśva ścandra     pra vanditṛ indu tṛ āyus     prātar makṣū dhiyāvasu gam 
      adhi yat idam vājin iva śubh     spṛdh dhī sūrya na viś     ap vṛ pū kavīy     vraja na paśu vardhana manman     dvitā vivṛ amṛta dhāman     svarvid bhuvana prath     dhī pyā svasara na go     ṛtāy abhi vāś indu     pari yat kavi kāvya bhṛ     śūra na ratha bhuvana viśva     deva yaśas marta bhūṣ     dakṣa rai puru bhū navyas     śrī jan śrī ā niḥ i     śrī vayas jaritṛ dhā     śrī vas amṛta tva i     bhū satya samitha mitadru     iṣ ūrj abhi ṛṣ aśva go     uru jyotis kṛ mad deva     viśva hi suṣaha tad tvad     pū bādh soma śatru 
      kanikrad hari ā sṛj     sad vana jaṭhara pū     nṛ yam kṛ nirṇij go     atas mati janay svadhā     hari sṛj pathyā ṛta     ṛch vāc aritṛ iva nau     deva deva guhya nāman     āviṣkṛ barhis pravac     ap iva id ūrmi tartar     pra manīṣā īr soma acchā     namasy upa ca i sam ca     ā ca viś vaś vaś     tad marmṛj mahiṣa na sānu     aṃśu duh ukṣan giriṣṭhā     tad vaś mati sac     trita bhṛ varuṇa samudra     iṣ vāc upavaktṛ iva hotṛ     pū indu vi sā manīṣā     indra ca yat kṣi saubhaga     su vīrya pati as 
      pra senānī śūra agra ratha     gavyat i hṛṣ idam senā     bhadra kṛ indra hava sakhi     ā soma vastra rabhasa dā     sam idam hari hari mṛj     aśva haya aniśita namas     ā sthā ratha indra sakhi     vid idam sumati yā acchā     tad mad deva devatāt pū     mah soma psaras indra pāna     kṛ ap varṣay div uta idam     uru ā mad varivasyā pū     ajīti ahati pū     svasti sarvatāti bṛhat     tad vaś viśva idam sakhi     tad mad vaś pū soma     soma pū janitṛ mati     janitṛ div janitṛ pṛthivī     janitṛ agni janitṛ sūrya     janitṛ indra janitṛ uta viṣṇu     brahman deva padavī kavi     ṛṣi vipra mahiṣa mṛga     śyena gṛdhra svadhiti vana     soma pavitra ati i ribh     pravip vāc ūrmi na sindhu     gir soma pū manīṣā     antar paś vṛjana idam avara     ā sthā vṛṣabha go jñā     sa matsara pṛt van avāta     sahasra retas abhi vāja ṛṣ     indra indu pū manīṣin     aṃśu ūrmi īray go iṣaṇy     pari priya kalaśa deva van     indra soma ran mada     sahasra dhārā śata vāja indu     vājin na sapti samanā gā     tad pūrvya vasu vid jan     mṛj ap duh adri     abhiśasti pā bhuvana rājan     vid gā brahman pū     tvad hi mad pitṛ soma pūrva     karman kṛ pū dhīra     van avāta paridhi apavṛ     vīra aśva maghavan bhū mad     yathā pū manu vayas dhā     amitra han varivas vid haviṣmat     eva pū draviṇa dhā     indra sam sthā janay āyudha     pū soma madhumat ṛtāvan     ap vas adhi sānu avya     ava droṇa ghṛtavat sad     madintama matsara indra pāna     vṛṣṭi div śata dhārā pū     sahasra sā vājayu deva vīti     sam sindhu kalaśa vāś     sam usriyā pratṛ mad āyus     etad tya soma mati pū     atya na vājin tṛ id arāti     payas na duh aditi iṣira     uru iva gātu su yama na voḍhṛ     su āyudha sotṛ pū     abhi ṛṣ guhya cāru nāman     abhi vāja sapti iva śravasyā     abhi vāyu abhi go deva soma     śiśu jan haryata mṛj     śubh vahni marut gaṇa     kavi gir kāvya kavi as     soma pavitra ati i ribh     ṛṣi manas yad ṛṣi kṛt svarṣā     sahasraṇītha padavī kavi     tṛtīya dhāman mahiṣa siṣās     soma virāj anu rāj stubh     camūṣad śyena śakuna vibhṛtvan     go vindu drapsa āyudha bhṛ     ap ūrmi sac samudra     turīya dhāman mahiṣa vac     marya na śubhra tanū mṛj     atya na sṛ sani dhana     vṛṣan iva yūtha pari kośa ṛṣ     kanikrad camū ā viś     pū indu pū mahas     kanikrad pari vāra ṛṣ     krīḍ camū ā viś pū     indra tvad rasa madira mad     prās dhārā bṛhat sṛj     añj go kalaśa ā viś     sāman kṛ sāmanya vipaścit     krand i abhi sakhi na jāmi     apahan i pū śatru     priya na jāra abhigā indu     sad vana śakuna na patvan     soma pū kalaśa sad     ā tvad ruc pū soma     yoṣā iva i su dugha su dhārā     hari ānī puru vāra ap     krand kalaśa devayu 
      idam preṣ heman pū     deva deva sam pṛc rasa     su pavitra pari i ribh     mā iva sadman paśumat hotṛ     bhadra vastra samanya vas     mahat kavi nivacana śaṃs     ā vañc camū pū     vicakṣaṇa jāgṛvi deva vīti     sam u priya mṛj sānu avya     yaśastara yaśas kṣaita mad     abhi svar dhanv pū     tvad pā svasti sadā mad     pra gā abhi arc deva     soma hi mahat dhana     svādu pū ati vāra avya     ā sad kalaśa devayu mad     indu deva upa sakhya e     sahasra dhārā pū mada     nṛ stu anu dhāman pūrva     gam indra mahat saubhaga     stotṛ rai hari ṛṣ pū     indra mada gam tvad bhara     deva yā sa ratha rādhas acchā     tvad pā svasti sadā mad     pra kāvya uśanas iva brū     deva deva janiman vac     mahi vrata śuci bandhu pāvaka     pad varāha abhi i ribh     pra haṃsa tṛpala manyu acchā     amāt asta vṛṣagaṇa yā     āṅgūṣya pū sakhi     durmarṣa sākam pra vad vāṇa     tad raṃh urugāya jūti     vṛthā krīḍ mā na go     parīṇas kṛ tigma śṛṅga     divā hari dṛś nakta ṛjra     indu vājin pū gonyoghas     indra soma sahas inv mada     han rakṣas bādh pari arāti     varivas kṛ vṛjana rājan     adha dhārā madhu pṛc     tiras roman pū adri dugdha     indu indra sakhya juṣ     deva deva matsara mada     abhi priya pū pū     deva deva sva rasa pṛc     indu dharma ṛtuthā vas     daśan kṣip vye sānu avya     vṛṣan śoṇa abhikanikrad go     naday i pṛthivī uta div     indra iva vagnu ā śru āji     pracetay ṛṣ vāc ā idam     rasāyya payas pinv     īray i madhumat aṃśu     pū saṃtani i kṛ     indra soma pariṣic     eva pū madira mada     udagrābha namay vadhasna     pari varṇa bhṛ ruśat     gavyu mad ṛṣ pari soma sic     juṣ mad indu supatha suga     uru pū varivas kṛ     ghana iva viṣvañc durita vihan     adhi snu dhanv sānu avya     vṛṣṭi mad ṛṣ divya jigatnu     iḍāvat śaṃgaya jīra dānu     stukā iva vīta dhanv vici     bandhu idam avara indu vāyu     granthi na vi sā granth pū     ṛju ca gātu vṛjina ca soma     atya na krand hari ā sṛj     marya deva dhanv pastyāvat     juṣ mada devatāt indu     pari snu dhanv sānu avya     sahasra dhārā surabhi adabdha     pari sru vājasāti nṛṣahya     a raśman yad a ratha a yuj     atya na sṛj āji     etad śukra dhanv soma     deva tad upa yā pā     eva mad indu abhi deva vīti     pari sru nabhas arṇas camū     soma mad kāmya bṛhat     rayi dā vīravat ugra     takṣ yadi manas vena vāc     jyeṣṭha vā dharman kṣu anīka     āt īṃ i vara ā vaś     juṣ pati kalaśa go indu     pra dānuda divya dānu pinva     ṛta ṛta pū sumedhas     dharman bhū vṛjanya rājan     pra raśmi daśan bhṛ bhūman     pavitra pū nṛ cakṣas     rājan deva uta martya     dvitā bhū rayi pati rayi     ṛta bhṛ su bhṛ cāru indu     arvat iva śravas sāti acchā     indra vāyu abhi vīti ṛṣ     tad mad sahasra bṛhatī iṣ dā     bhū soma draviṇas vid pū     devāvī mad pariṣic     kṣaya su vīra dhanv soma     āyajyu sumati viśva vāra     hotṛ na diviyaj mandratama     eva deva devatāt pū     mah soma psaras deva pāna     mah cit hi as dhā samarya     kṛ suṣṭhāna rodas pū     aśva na u krand vṛṣan yuj     siṃha na bhīma manas javīyas     arvācīna pathin yad rajiṣṭha     ā pū saumanasa mad indu     śata dhārā deva jan sṛj     sahasra enad kavi mṛj     indu sanitra div ā pū     puraetṛ as mahat dhana     div na sarga sṛj ahar     rājan na mitra pra mī dhīra     pitṛ na putra kratu yat     ā pū viś idam ajīti     pra tvad dhārā madhumat sṛj     vāra yat pū atī avya     pū pū dhāman go     jan sūrya pinv arka     kanikrad anu pathin ṛta     śukra vi bhā amṛta dhāman     tad indra pū matsaravat     hi vāc mati kavi     divya suparṇa ava cakṣ soma     pinv dhārā karman deva vīti     ā indu viś kalaśa soma dhāna     krand i sūrya upa raśmi     tri vāc īray pra vahni     ṛta dhīti brahman manīṣā     go i gopati pracch     soma i mati vaś     soma go dhenu vaś     soma vipra mati pracch     soma su pū añj     soma arka triṣṭubh sam nū     eva mad soma pariṣic     ā pū pū svasti     indra ā viś bṛhat rava     vardhay vāc janay puraṃdhi     ā jāgṛvi vipra ṛta mati     soma pū sad camū     sap yad mithuna nikāma     adhvaryu rathira su hasta     tad pū upa sūra na dhātṛ     ubh prā rodas vi tad vṛ     priya cit yad priyasa ūti     sa tu dhana kārin na pra yam     tad vardhitṛ vardhana pū     soma mīḍhvas abhi mad jyotis av     yad mad pūrva pitṛ pada jña     svar vid abhi go adri uṣ     krand samudra prathama vidharman     janay prajā bhuvana rājan     vṛṣan pavitra adhi sānu avya     bṛhat soma vṛdh su indu     mahat tad soma mahiṣa kṛ     ap yat garbha vṛ deva     dhā indra pū ojas     janay sūrya jyotis indu     mad vāyu iṣṭi rādhas ca     mad mitrāvaruṇa pū     mad śardhas māruta mad deva     mad dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma     ṛju pū vṛjina hantṛ     apa amīvā bādh mṛdh ca     abhiśrī payas payas abhi go     indra tvad tvad mad sakhi     madhu sūda pū vasu utsa     vīra ca mad ā pū bhaga ca     svad indra pū indu     rayi ca mad ā pū samudra     soma su dhārā atya na hā     sindhu na nimna abhi vājin kṣar     ā yoni vanya sad pū     sam indu go sṛ sam ap     etad tya tvad pū indra soma     camū dhīra vaś tavasvat     svar cakṣas rathira satya śuṣma     kāma na yad devay sṛj     etad pratna vayas pū     tiras varpas duhitṛ dhā     vas śarman tri varūtha ap     hotṛ iva yā samana ribh     nu mad tvad rathira deva soma     pari sru camū pū     ap svādiṣṭha madhumat ṛtāvan     deva na yad savitṛ satya manman     abhi vāyu vīti ṛṣ gṛ     abhi mitrāvaruṇa pū     abhi nṛ dhī javana ratheṣṭhā     abhi indra vṛṣan vajra bāhu     abhi vastra su vasana ṛṣ     abhi dhenu su dugha pū     abhi candra bhṛ mad hiraṇya     abhi aśva rathin deva soma     abhi mad ṛṣ divya vasu     abhi viśva pārthiva pū     abhi yad draviṇa aś     abhi ārṣeya jamadagni vat mad     idam pavā pū enad vasu     māṃścatva indu saras pra dhanv     bradhna cit atra vāta na jū     puru medhā cit taku nṛ dā     uta mad enad pavā pū     adhi śru śravāyya tīrtha     ṣaṣṭi sahasra naiguta vasu     vṛkṣa na pakva dhū raṇa     mahi idam idam vṛṣa nāman śūṣa     māṃścatva vā pṛśana vā vadhatra     svāpay nigut snehay ca     apa amitra apa acit cit     sam tri pavitra vitan i     anu eka dhāv pū     as bhaga as dātra dātṛ     as maghavan maghavan indu     etad viśva vid pū manīṣin     soma viśva bhuvana rājan     drapsa īray vidatha indu     vi vāra avya samayā ati yā     indu rih mahiṣa adabdha     pada ribh kavi na gṛdhra     hi dhīra daśan kṣipā     sam añj rūpa ap rasa     tvad mad pū soma     bhara kṛta vi ci śaśvat     tad mad mitra varuṇa mah     aditi sindhu pṛthivī uta div 
      abhi mad vāja sātama     rayi ṛṣ puruspṛh     indu sahasrabharṇas     tuvi dyumna vibhvāsah     pari tya sū avyaya     ratha na varman vye     indu abhi dru dhā     hi dhārā kṣar     pari tya sū kṣar     indu avya mada cyu     dhārā yad ūrdhva adhvara     bhrāj na i gavyayu     tad hi tvad deva śaśvat     vasu marta dāś     indu sahasrin rayi     śata ātman vivās     mad tvad idam vṛtra han     vasu vasu puruspṛh     ni nediṣṭhatama iṣ     as sumna adhrigu     dvis yad pañcan sva yaśas     svasṛ adri saṃhan     priya indra kāmya     prasnāpay ūrmin     pari tya haryata hari     babhru pū vāra     yad deva viśva id pari     mada saha gam     idam tvad hi avas     pā dakṣa sādhana     yad sūri śravas bṛhat     dhā svar na haryata     tad tvad yajña mānavī     indu jan rodasī     deva devī giriṣṭhā     sridh tad tuviṣvaṇi     indra soma pā     vṛtra han pari sic     nṛ ca dakṣiṇāvat     deva sadanāsad     tad pratna vyuṣṭi     soma pavitra kṣar     apapruth sanutar huraścit     prātar tad apracetas     tad sakhi puroruc     tvad mad ca sūri     aś vājagandhya     san vāja pastyā 
      ā haryata dhṛṣṇu     dhanus tan pauṃsya     śukra ve asura nirṇij     vip agra mahīyu     adha kṣap pariṣkṛ     vāja abhi pra gāh     yadi vivasvant dhī     hari hi yā     tad idam marjay     mada yad indra pātama     yad go āsan     purā nūnam ca sūri     tad gāthā purāṇa     pū abhi nū     uta u kṛp dhīti     deva nāman bhṛ     tad ukṣ avyaya     vāra pū dharṇasi     dūta na pūrvacitti     ā śās manīṣin     tad pū madintama     soma camū sad     paśu na retas ādhā     pati vacasy dhī     tad mṛj su karman     deva deva su     vid yat idam saṃdadi     mahi ap vi gāh     su indu pavitra ā     nṛ yam vi nī     indra matsarintama     camū ā ni sad 
       abhi nū adruh      priya indra kāmya      vatsa na pūrva āyu      jan rih mātṛ      pū indu ā bhṛ      soma dvibarhas rayi      tvad vasu puṣ      viśva dāś gṛha      tvad dhī manas yuj      sṛj vṛṣṭi na tanyatu      tvad vasu pārthiva      divya ca soma puṣ      pari tvad ji yathā      dhārā su dhāv      raṃh vi avyaya      vāra vājin iva sānasi      kratu dakṣa mad kavi      pū soma dhārā      indra pā su      mitra varuṇa ca      pū vāja sātama      pavitra dhārā su      indra soma viṣṇu      deva madhumattama      tvad rih mātṛ      hari pavitra adruh      vatsa jan na dhenu      pū vidharman      pū mahi śravas      citra yā raśmi      śṛdh tamas han      viśva dāś gṛha      tvad div ca mahi vrata      pṛthivī ca ati bhṛ      prati drāpi muc      pū mahitvana 
       purojiti tvad andhas      su mādayitnu      apa śvan śnath      sakhi dīrghajihvya      yad dhārā pāvaka      pariprasyand su      indu aśva na kṛtvya      tad duroṣa abhi nṛ      soma viśvāñc dhī      yajña hi adri      su madhumattama      soma indra mandin      pavitravat kṣar      deva gam tvad mada      indu indra pū      iti deva brū      vācaspati makhasy      viśva īś ojas      sahasra dhārā pū      samudra vācamīṅkhaya      soma pati rayi      sakhi indra diva diva      idam pūṣan rayi bhaga      soma pū ṛṣ      pati viśva bhūman      vi khyā rodas ubh      sam u priya nū      go mada ghṛṣvi      soma kṛ pathin      pū indu      yad ojiṣṭha tad ā bhṛ      pū śravāyya      yad pañcan carṣaṇi abhi      rayi yad van      soma pū indu      mad gātu vittama      mitra su arepas      svādhī svar vid      su vi adri      cit go adhi tvac      iṣ mad abhitas      sam svar vasu vid      etad pū vipaścit      soma dadhi āśir      sūrya na darśata      jigatnu dhruva ghṛta      pra su andhas      marta na vṛ tad vacas      apa śvan arādhas      han makha na bhṛgu      ā jāmi atka vye      bhuj na putra oṇi      sṛ jāra na yoṣaṇā      vara na yoni āsad      tad vīra dakṣa sādhana      vi yad stambh rodas      hari pavitra vye      vedhas na yoni āsad      avya vāra pū      soma gavya adhi tvac      kanikrad vṛṣan hari      indra abhi i niṣkṛta 
       krāṇā śiśu mahi      hi ṛta dīdhiti      viśva pari priya bhū      adha dvitā      upa trita pāṣi      bhaj yad guhā pada      yajña saptan dhāman      adha priya      tri trita dhārā      pṛṣṭha eray rayi      mā idam yojana      vi su kratu      jan saptan mātṛ      vedhas śās śrī      idam dhruva rayi      cit yat      idam vrata sajoṣas      viśva deva adruh      spārha bhū ranti      juṣ yat      yad ī garbha ṛtāvṛdh      dṛś cāru jan      kavi maṃhiṣṭha adhvara      puruspṛh      samīcīna abhi tman      yahva ṛta mātṛ      tan yajña ānuṣak      yat añj      kratu śukra akṣa      ṛch apa vraja div      hi ṛta dīdhiti      pra adhvara 
       pra pū vedhas      soma vacas udyam      bhṛti na bhṛ mati juṣ      pari vāra avyaya      go añj ṛṣ      tri sadhastha pū kṛ hari      pari kośa madhuścut      avyaya vāra ṛṣ      abhi vāṇī ṛṣi saptan nū      pariṇī mati      viśva deva adābhya      soma pū camū viś hari      pari daiva anu svadhā      indra yā sa ratha      pū vāghant vāghant amartya      pari sapti na vājayu      deva deva su      vyānaśi pū vi dhāv 
       sakhi ā ni sad      pū pra gā      śiśu na yajña pari bhūṣ śrī      sam ī vatsa na mātṛ      sṛj gaya sādhana      devāvī mada abhi dvi śavas      pū dakṣa sādhana      yathā śardha vī      yathā mitra varuṇa śaṃtama      mad tvad vasu vid      abhi vāṇī nū      go tvad varṇa abhi vāsay      tad mad mada pati      indu deva psaras as      sakhi iva sakhi gātu vittama bhū      sanemi kṛ mad ā      rakṣas kaścit atrin      dvayu aṃhas yu mad 
       tad tvad sakhi mada      pū abhi gā      śiśu na yajña svaday gūrti      sam vatsa iva mātṛ      indu hi añj      devāvī mada mati pariṣkṛ      idam dakṣa sādhana      idam śardha vī      idam deva madhumattama su      gomat mad indu aśvavat      su su dakṣa dhanv      śuci tvad varṇa adhi go dhṛ      tad mad hari pati      indu deva psarastama      sakhi iva sakhi narya ruc bhū      sanemi tvad mad      adeva kaścit atrin      sah indu pari bādh apa dvayu 
       indra acchā su idam      vṛṣan i hari      śruṣṭi jan indu      svar vid      idam bhara sānasi      indra pū su      soma jaitra cit      yathā vid      idam id indra mada ā      grābha grah sānasi      vajra ca vṛṣan bhṛ      sam apsujit      pra dhanv soma jāgṛvi      indra indu pari sru      dyumat śuṣma ā bhṛ      svar vid      indra vṛṣan mada      pū viśva darśata      sahasra yāman pathikṛt      vicakṣaṇa      mad gātu vittama      deva madhumattama      sahasra yā pathin      kanikrad      pū deva vīti      indu dhārā ojas      ā kalaśa madhumat soma mad sad      tvad drapsa uda prut      indra mada vṛdh      tvad deva amṛta kaṃ pā      ā mad su indu      pū dhāv rayi      rīti ap svar vid      soma pū ūrmi      avya vāra vi dhāv      agra vāc pū kanikrad      dhī hi vājin      vana krīḍ atyavi      abhi tri pṛṣṭha mati sam svar      sṛj kalaśa abhi      mīḍha sapti na vājayu      pū vāc janay syand      pū haryata hari      ati hvaras raṃhi      abhyṛṣ stotṛ vīravat yaśas      idam pū devayu      madhu dhārā sṛj      ribh pavitra pari i viśvatas 
       pari itas sic su      soma yad uttama havis      dhanv yad narya ap antar ā      su soma adri      nūnam pū avi pari sru      adabdha surabhintara      su cit tvad ap mad andhas      śrī go uttara      pari su cakṣ deva mādana      kratu indu vicakṣaṇa      pū soma dhārā      ap vas ṛṣ      ā ratna dhā yoni ṛta sad      utsa deva hiraṇyaya      duh ūdhas divya madhu priya      pratna sadhastha āsad      āpṛcchya dharuṇa vājin ṛṣ      nṛ dhū vicakṣaṇa      pū soma jāgṛvi      avya vāra pari priya      tvad vipra bhū aṅgirastama      madhu yajña mikṣ mad      soma mīḍhvas pū gātu vittama      ṛṣi vipra vicakṣaṇa      tvad kavi bhū deva vītama      ā sūrya rohay div      soma u su sotṛ      adhi snu avi      aśvā iva harit yā dhārā      mandra yā dhārā      anūpa gomat go kṣar      soma duh kṣar      samudra na saṃvaraṇa gam      mandin mada tuś      ā soma su adri      tiras vāra avyaya      jana na pur camū viś hari      sadas vana dhā      tad mṛj tiras aṇva meṣī      mīḍha sapti na vājayu      anumad pū manīṣin      soma vipra ṛkvan      pra soma deva vīti      sindhu na pyā arṇas      aṃśu payas madira na jāgṛvi      acchā kośa madhuścut      ā haryata arjuna atka vye      priya sūnu na mṛj      tad īṃ hi apas yathā ratha      nadī ā gabhasti      abhi soma āyu      pū mad mada      samudra adhi viṣṭap manīṣin      matsara svar vid      tṛ samudra pū ūrmi      rājan deva ṛta bṛhat      ṛṣ mitra varuṇa dharman      pra hi ṛta bṛhat      nṛ yam haryata vicakṣaṇa      rājan deva samudriya      indra pū mada      soma marutvat su      sahasra dhārā ati avya ṛṣ      tad ī mṛj āyu      pū camū janay mati kavi      soma deva ran      ap vas pari go uttara      sad vana vye      tvad mad soma ran      sakhya indu diva diva      puru babhru ni car mad ava      paridhi ati tad i      uta mad nakta uta soma tvad divā      sakhya babhru ūdhas      ghṛṇā tap ati sūrya paras      śakuna iva pat      mṛj su hastya      samudra vāc inv      rayi piśaṅga bahula puruspṛh      pū abhi ṛṣ      mṛj vāra pū avyaya      vṛṣan ava krand vana      deva soma pū niṣkṛta      go añj ṛṣ      pū vāja sāti      abhi viśva kāvya      tvad samudra prathama vi dhāray      deva soma matsara      tad tu pū pari pārthiva rajas      divya ca soma dharma      tvad vipra mati vicakṣaṇa      śubhra hi dhīti      pū sṛj      pavitra ati dhārā      marutvat matsara indriya haya      medhā abhi prayas ca      ap vas pari kośa ṛṣ      indu hi sotṛ      janay jyotis mandana vāś      go kṛ na nirṇij 
       pū madhumattama      indra soma kratu vittama mada      mahi dyukṣatama mada      yad tvad pā vṛṣabha vṛṣāy      idam pīti svar vid      tad su praketa abhi kram iṣ      acchā vāja na etaśa      tvad hi aṅga daivya      pū janiman dyumattama      amṛta tva ghoṣay      yad navagva dadhyac apavṛ      yad vipra āp      deva sumna amṛta cāru      yad śravas aś      etad tya dhārā suta      avya vāra pū madintama      krīḍ ūrmi ap iva      yad usriyā apya antar aśman      niḥ go kṛt ojas      abhi vraja tan gavya aśvya      varmin iva dhṛṣṇu ā ruj      ā su pari sic      aśva na stoma aptur rajastur      vanakrakṣa uda prut      sahasra dhārā vṛṣabha payovṛdh      priya deva janman      ṛta yad ṛta jan vivṛdh      rājan deva ṛta bṛhat      abhi dyumna bṛhat yaśas      iṣ pati dīdī deva devayu      vi kośa madhyama yu      ā vañc su dakṣa camū su      viś vahni na viśpati      vṛṣṭi div pū rīti ap      jinv gaviṣṭi dhī      etad u tya mada cyut      sahasra dhārā vṛṣabha div duh      viśva vasu bhṛ      vṛṣan vi jan janay amartya      pratap jyotis tamas      tad suṣṭuta kavi nirṇij dhā      tri dhātu idam daṃsas      tad su yad vasu      yad rai ānetṛ yad iḍā      soma yad su kṣiti      yad mad indra pā yad marut      yad vā aryaman bhaga      ā yad mitrāvaruṇa kṛ      ā indra avas mah      indra soma pā      nṛ yam su āyudha madintama      pū madhumattama      indra hārdi soma dhāna ā viś      samudra iva sindhu      juṣ mitra varuṇa vāyu      div viṣṭambha uttama 
       pari pra dhanv indra soma      svādu mitra pūṣan bhaga      indra tvad soma su pā      kratu dakṣa viśva ca deva      eva amṛta mah kṣaya      tad śukra ṛṣ divya pīyūṣa      pū soma mahat samudra      pitṛ deva viśva abhi dhāman      śukra pū deva soma      div pṛthivī śam ca prajā      div dhartṛ as śukra pīyūṣa      satya vidharman vājin pū      pū soma dyumnin su dhārā      mah avi anu pūrvya      nṛ yam jan pū      kṣar viśva mandra svar vid      indu pū prajā vṛ      kṛ viśva draviṇa mad      pū soma kratu dakṣa      aśva na nij vājin dhana      tad tvad sotṛ rasa mada      pū soma mah dyumna      śiśu jan hari mṛj      pavitra soma deva indu      indu pū cāru mada      ap upastha kavi bhaga      bhṛ cāru indra nāman      yad viśva vṛtra han      pā idam viśva deva      go śrī nṛ su      pra su kṣar sahasra dhārā      tiras pavitra vi vāra avya      tad vājin kṣar sahasra retas      ap mṛj go śrī      pra soma yā indra kukṣi      nṛ yam adri su      sṛj vājin tiras pavitra      indra soma sahasra dhārā      añj enad madhu rasa      indra vṛṣan indu mada      deva tvad vṛthā pājas      ap vas hari mṛj      indu indra tuś      ni tuś      śrī ugra ri ap 
       pari u su pra dhanv vāja sāti      pari vṛtra sakṣaṇi      dviṣ tṛ ṛṇayā mad ī      anu hi tvad su soma mad      maha samarya rājya      vāja abhi pū pra gāh      jan hi pū sūrya      vidhāra śakman payas      go jīra raṃh puraṃdhi      jan amṛta martya      ṛta dharman amṛta cāru      sadā sara vāja acchā saniṣyad      abhi abhi hi śravas tṛd      utsa na kaścit jana pāna akṣita      śaryā na bhṛ gabhasti      āt īṃ kaścit paś āpya      vasu ruc divya abhi nū      vāra na deva savitṛ vi vṛ      tvad soma prathama vṛj barhis      mah vāja śravas dhī      tad tvad mad vīra vīrya coday      div pīyūṣa pūrvya yat ukthya      mah gāha div ā niḥ duh      indra abhi jan sam svar      adha yat idam pū rodasī      idam ca viśva bhuvana abhi majman      yūtha na niṣṭhā vṛṣabha vi sthā      soma pū avyaya vāra      śiśu na krīḍ pū kṣar      sahasra dhārā śata vāja indu      etad pū madhumat ṛtāvan      indra indu pū svādu ūrmi      vāja sani varivas vid vayas dhā      tad pū sah pṛtanyu      sidh rakṣas apa durgaha      su āyudha sah soma śatru 
       idam ruc harin pū      viśva dveṣas tṛ svayugvan      sūra na svayugvan      dhārā su ruc      pū aruṣa hari      viśva yat rūpa pariyā ṛkvan      saptan āsya ṛkvan      tvad tya paṇi vid vasu      sam mātṛ marjay sva ā dama      ṛta dhīti dama      parāvat na sāman tad      yatra ran dhīti      tri dhātu aruṣa vayas dhā      ruc vayas dhā      pūrva anu pradiś yā cekit      sam raśmi yat darśata ratha      daivya darśata ratha      gam uktha pauṃsya      indra jaitra harṣay      vajra ca yat bhū an apacyu      samad an apacyu 
       nānānam vai u na u dhī      vi vrata jana      takṣan riṣṭa ru bhiṣaj      brahman su iṣ      indra indu pari sru      jṛ oṣadhī      parṇa śakuna      kārmāra aśman div      hiraṇyavat iṣ      indra indu pari sru      kāru mad tata bhiṣaj      upala prakṣin nanā      nānā dhī vasūyu      anu go iva sthā      indra indu pari sru      aśva voḍhṛ sukha ratha      hasanā upamantrin      śepa romaṇvat bheda      vār id maṇḍūka iṣ      indra indu pari sru 
       śaryaṇāvant soma      indra pā vṛtra han      bala dhā ātman      kṛ vīrya mahat      indra indu pari sru      ā pū diś pati      ārjīka soma mīḍhvas      ṛta vāka satya      śraddhā tapas su      indra indu pari sru      parjanya vṛdh mahiṣa      tad sūrya duhitṛ bhṛ      tad gandharva prati grah      tad soma rasa ādhā      indra indu pari sru      ṛta vad ṛta dyumna      satya vad satya karman      śraddhā vad soma rājan      dhātṛ soma pariṣkṛ      indra indu pari sru      satya ugra bṛhat      sam sru saṃsrava      sam i rasin rasa      pū brahman hari      indra indu pari sru      yatra brahman pū      chandasya vāc vad      grāvan soma mahīy      soma ānanda janay      indra indu pari sru      yatra jyotis ajasra      yad loka svar dhā      tad mad dhā pū      amṛta loka akṣita      indra indu pari sru      yatra rājan vaivasvata      yatra avarodhana div      yatra adas yahvat ap      tatra mad amṛta kṛ      indra indu pari sru      yatra anukāma caraṇa      trināka tridiva div      loka yatra jyotiṣmat      tatra mad amṛta kṛ      indra indu pari sru      yatra kāma nikāma ca      yatra bradhna viṣṭapa      svadhā ca yatra tṛpti ca      tatra mad amṛta kṛ      indra indu pari sru      yatra ānanda ca moda ca      mud pramud ās      kāma yatra āp kāma      tatra mad amṛta kṛ      indra indu pari sru 
       yad indu pū      anu dhāman kram      tad ah suprajas iti      yad tvad soma vidh manas      indra indu pari sru      ṛṣi mantra kṛt stoma      kaśyapa udvardhay gir      soma namasy rājan      yad jan vīrudh pati      indra indu pari sru      saptan diś nānā sūrya      saptan hotṛ ṛtvij      deva āditya yad saptan      tad soma abhi rakṣ mad      indra indu pari sru      yad tvad rājan śrī havis      tad soma abhi rakṣ mad      arātīvan mā mad tṛ      mā u ca mad ka cana am      indra indu pari sru     agra bṛhat uṣas ūrdhva sthā     niḥ gam tamas jyotis gā     agni bhānu ruśat su aṅga     ā jan viśva sadman prā     tad jan garbha as rodasī     agni cāru vi bhṛ oṣadhī     citra śiśu pari tamas aktu     pra mātṛ adhi kanikrad gā     viṣṇu itthā parama idam vid     jan bṛhat abhi pā tṛtīya     ās yat idam payas kṛ sva     sacetas abhi arc atra     atas u tvad pitubhṛt janitrī     annāvṛdh prati car anna     tad īṃ prati i punar anya rūpa     as tvad viś mānuṣa hotṛ     hotṛ citra ratha adhvara     yajña yajña ketu ruśat     pratyardhi deva deva mahan     śrī tu agni atithi jana     tad tu vastra adha peśana     vas agni nābhi pṛthivī     aruṣa jan pada iḍā     purohita rājan yaj iha deva     ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agni ubh     sadā putra na mātṛ tan     pra yā acchā vaś yaviṣṭha     atha ā vah sahasya iha deva 
      prī deva vaś yaviṣṭha     vid ṛtu ṛtu pati yaj iha     yad daivya ṛtvij tad agni     tvad hotṛ as āyajiṣṭha     vī hotra uta potra jana     mandhātṛ as draviṇas dā ṛtāvan     svāhā mad kṛ havis     deva deva yaj agni arh     ā deva api pathin gam     yad śak tad anu pravah     agni vidvas tad yaj tad id u hotṛ     tad adhvara tad ṛtu kalpay     yat tvad mad pra mī vrata     vidvas deva aviduṣṭara     agni tad viśva ā pṛ vidvas     yad deva ṛtu kalpay     yad pākatrā manas dīna dakṣa     na yajña man martya     agni tad hotṛ kratu vid vijñā     yajiṣṭha deva ṛtuśas yaj     viśva hi adhvara anīka     citra ketu janitṛ tvad jan     tad ā yaj nṛvat anu kṣā     spārha iṣ kṣumat viśvajanya     yad tvad dyāvāpṛthivī yad tvad ap     tvaṣṭṛ yad tvad su janiman jan     pathin anu pravid pitṛyāṇa     dyumat agni samindh vi bhā 
      ina rājan arati samindh     raudra dakṣa suṣumat dṛś     cikit vi bhā bhās bṛhat     asiknī i ruśat apāj     kṛṣṇa yat abhi varpas bhū     janay yoṣā bṛhat pitṛ jā     ūrdhva bhānu sūrya stabhāy     div vasu arati vi bhā     bhadra bhadra sac āgā     svasṛ jāra abhi i paścāt     su praketa div agni viṣṭhā     ruśat varṇa abhi rāma sthā     idam yāma bṛhat na vagnu     indh agni sakhi śiva     īḍ vṛṣan bṛhat sva     bhāma yāman aktu cit     svana na yad bhāma pū     ruc bṛhat su div     jyeṣṭha yad tejiṣṭha krīḍumat     varṣiṣṭha bhānu nakṣ div     idam śuṣma dṛś pavi     jeh svanay niyut     pratna yad ruśat devatama     vi ribh arati bhā vibhvan     tad ā vah mahi mad ā ca sad     divaspṛthivī arati yuvati     agni sutuka sutuka aśva     rabhasvat rabhasvat ā iha gam 
      pra tvad yaj pra tvad ṛch manman     bhū yathā vand mad hava     dhanvan iva prapā as tvad agni     iyakṣu pūru pratna rājan     yad tvad jana abhi saṃcar     go uṣṇa iva vraja yaviṣṭha     dūta deva as martya     antar mahat car rocana     śiśu na tvad jenya vardhay     mātṛ bhṛ sacanasy     dhanu adhi pravat yā hary     jigīṣ paśu iva avasṛj     mūra a mūra na mad cikitu     mahi tva agni tvad aṅga vid     śī vavri car jihvā ad     rerih yuvati viśpati as     kūcid jan sanaya navya     vana sthā palita dhūma ketu     asnātṛ ap vṛṣabha na pra vī     sacetas yad praṇī marta     tanūtyaj iva taskara vanargu     raśanā daśan abhi dhā     idam tvad agni navīyas manīṣā     yuj ratha na śocay aṅga     brahman ca tvad jātavedas namas ca     idam ca gir sadam id vardhana bhū     rakṣ mad agni tanaya toka     rakṣ uta mad tanu aprayucchat 
      eka samudra dharuṇa rayi     mad hṛd bhūri janman vi cakṣ     sac ūdhas niṇya upastha     utsa madhya nidhā pada vi     samāna nīḍa vṛṣan vas     sam gam mahiṣa arvatī     ṛta pada kavi ni pā     guhā nāman dhā para     ṛtāyin māyin sam dhā     mā śiśu jan vardhay     viśva nābhi car dhruva     kavi cit tantu manas vī     ṛta hi vartani su jan     iṣ vāja pradiv sac     adhīvāsa rodas vas     ghṛta anna vṛdh madhu     saptan svasṛ aruṣa vaś     vid madhu ud bhṛ dṛś kaṃ     antar yam antarikṣa purājā     iṣ vavri vid pūṣaṇa     saptan maryādā kavi takṣ     tad eka id abhi aṃhura gā     āyu ha skambha upama nīḍa     pathin visarga dharuṇa sthā     asat ca as ca parama vyoman     dakṣa janman aditi upastha     agni ha mad prathama jā ṛta     pūrva āyu vṛṣabha ca dhenu 
      idam tad yad śarman avas     agni edh jaritṛ abhiṣṭi     jyeṣṭha yad bhānu ṛṣu     parī parivye vibhāvan     yad bhānu vibhāvan vibhā     agni deva ṛtāvan ajasra     ā yad vī sakhya sakhi     aparihvṛta atya na sapti     īś yad viśva deva vīti     īś viśvāyu uṣas vyuṣṭi     ā yad manā havis agni     ariṣṭa ratha skambh śūṣa     śūṣa vṛdha juṣ arka     deva acchā raghu patvan gā     mandra hotṛ tad juhū yajiṣṭha     sammiśla agni ā ghṛ deva     tad usrā indra na rej     agni gir namas ā kṛ     ā yad vipra mati gṛ     jātavedas juhū saha     sam yad viśva vasu gam     vāja na aśva saptīvat eva     mad ūti indra vātatama     arvācīna agni ā kṛ     adha hi agni mahan niṣad     sadyas jan hu bhū     tad tvad deva anu keta i     adha vṛdh prathama ūma 
      svasti mad div agni pṛthivī     viśvāyu dhā yajatha deva     sac tvad dasma praketa     uruṣy mad uru deva śaṃsa     idam agni mati tvad jan     go aśva abhi gṛ rādhas     yadā tvad marta anu bhoga naś     vasu dhā mati su jan     agni man pitṛ agni āpi     agni bhrātṛ sadam id sakhi     agni anīka bṛhat sapary     div śukra yajata sūrya     sidhra agni dhī mad sanutṛ     yad trā dama ā nitya hotṛ     ṛtāvan tad rohit aśva purukṣu     div idam aha vāma as     div dhā mitra iva prayoga     pratna ṛtvij adhvara jāra     bāhu agni āyu jan     viś hotṛ ni sāday     svayam yaj div deva deva     ka tvad pāka kṛ apracetas     yathā yaj ṛtu deva deva     eva yaj tanū su jan     bhū mad agni avitṛ uta gopā     bhū vayaskṛt uta mad vayodhas     rā ca mad su mahas havyadāti     trā uta mad tanū aprayucchat 
      pra ketu bṛhat yā agni     ā rodas vṛṣabha roro     div cit anta upama ud naś     ap upastha mahiṣa vṛdh     mud garbha vṛṣabha kakudmat     asreman vatsa śimīvat ru     tad devatāti udyam kṛ     sva kṣaya prathama gā     ā yad mūrdhan pitṛ rabh     ni adhvara dhā svar arṇa     idam patman aruṣī aśva budhna     ṛta yoni tanū juṣ     uṣas uṣas hi vasu agra i     tvad yama bhū vibhāvan     ṛta saptan dhā pada     janay mitra tanū sva     bhū cakṣus mah ṛta gopā     bhū varuṇa yat ṛta vī     bhū ap napāt jātavedas     bhū dūta yad havya juṣ     bhū yajña rajas ca netṛ     yatra niyut sac śiva     div mūrdhan dhā svarṣā     jihvā agni kṛ havyavāha     idam trita kratu vṛ antar     iṣ dhīti pitṛ eva para     sacasy pitṛ upastha     jāmi brū āyudha vī     tad pitrya āyudha vid     indra iṣ āptya abhi yudh     tri śīrṣan saptan raśmi han     tvāṣṭra cit niḥ sṛj trita go     bhūri id indra ud inakṣ ojas     avabhid satpati man     tvāṣṭra cit viśvarūpa go     ā kṛ tri śīrṣa parā vṛj 
      ap hi as mayas bhū     tad mad ūrj dhā     mah raṇa cakṣ     yad tvad śivatama rasa     tad bhājay iha mad     vaś iva mātṛ     tad aram gam tvad     yad kṣaya jinv     ap janay ca mad     śam mad devī abhiṣṭi     ap bhū pīti     śam yos abhi sru mad     īś vārya     kṣi carṣaṇi     ap yāc bheṣaja     ap mad soma brū     antar viśva bheṣaja     agni ca viśva śambhu     ap pṛ bheṣaja     varūtha tanū mad     jyok ca sūrya dṛś     idam ap pra vah     yad ka ca durita mad     yat vā mad abhidruh     yat vā śap uta anṛta     ā ap adya anu car     rasa sam gam     payasvat agni ā gam     tad mad sam sṛj varcas 
       ā u cit sakhi sakhya      vṛt tiras puru cit arṇava gam      pitṛ napāt ā dhā vedhas      adhi kṣam prataram dhī      na tvad sakhi sakhya vaś etad      salakṣman yat viṣurūpa bhū      mah putra asura vīra      div dhartṛ urviyā pari      vaś gha tad amṛta etad      eka cit tyajas martya      ni tvad manas manas dhā mad      jani pati tanū ā      na yad purā kṛ ka ha nūnam      ṛta vad anṛta      gandharva ap apya ca yoṣā      tad mad nābhi parama jāmi tad mad      garbha nu mad janitṛ dampati kṛ      deva tvaṣṭṛ savitṛ viśva rūpa      nakir idam pra mī vrata      vid mad idam pṛthivī uta div      ka idam vid prathama ahar      ka īṃ dṛś ka iha pra vac      bṛhat mitra varuṇa dhāman      ka u brū āhanas vīci nṛ      yama mad yamī kāma āgam      samāna yoni sahaśeyya      jāyā iva pati tanū ric      vi cit vṛh rathya iva cakra      na sthā na ni miṣ etad      deva spaś iha yad car      anya mad āhanas yā tūya      tad vi vṛh rathya iva cakra      rātri idam aha daśasy      sūrya cakṣus muhur ud mī      div pṛthivī mithuna sabandhu      yamī yama bhṛ ajāmi      ā gha tad gam uttara yuga      yatra jāmi kṛ ajāmi      upa barbṛh vṛṣabha bāhu      anya iṣ subhaga pati mad      ka bhrātṛ as yat anātha bhū      ka u svasṛ yat nirṛti nigam      kāma mūta bahu etad rap      tanu mad tanū sam pṛc      na vai u tvad tanu tanū sam pṛc      pāpa ah yad svasṛ nigam      anya mad pramud kalpay      na tvad bhrātṛ subhaga vaś etad      bata bata as yama      na eva tvad manas hṛdaya ca vid      anya kila tvad kakṣyā iva yuj      pari svaj libujā iva vṛkṣa      anya u su tvad yamī anya u tvad      pari svaj libujā iva vṛkṣa      tad vā tvad manas iṣ tad vā tvad      adha kṛ saṃvid su bhadra 
       vṛṣan vṛṣan duh dohas div      payas yahva aditi adābhya      viśva tad vid varuṇa yathā dhī      tad yajñiya yaj yajñiya ṛtu      rap gandharvī apya ca yoṣaṇā      nada nāda pari pā mad manas      iṣṭa madhya aditi ni dhā mad      bhrātṛ mad jyeṣṭha prathama vi vac      tad u cit nu bhadra kṣumat yaśasvat      uṣas vas manu svarvat      yat īṃ vaś vaś anu kratu      agni hotṛ vidatha jan      adha tya drapsa vibhu vicakṣaṇa      vi ābhṛ iṣay śyena adhvara      yadi viś vṛ dasma ārya      agni hotṛ adha dhī jan      sadā as raṇva yavasa iva puṣ      hotrā agni manus su adhvara      vipra vā yat śam ukthya      vāja san upayā bhūri      ud īray pitṛ jāra ā bhaga      iyakṣ haryata hṛttas iṣ      vac vahni svapasy makha      taviṣy asura vip mati      yad tvad agni sumati marta aś      sahas sūnu ati tad pra śru      iṣ dhā vah aśva      ā tad dyumat amavat bhūṣ div      yat agni etad samiti bhū      deva deva yajata yajatra      ratna ca yat vibhaj svadhāvat      bhāga mad atra vasumat vī      śru mad agni sadana sadhastha      yuj ratha amṛta dravitnu      ā mad vah rodas deva putra      mākir deva apa bhū iha as 
       div ha kṣam prathama ṛta      abhiśrāva bhū satya vāc      deva yat marta yajatha kṛ      sad hotṛ pratyañc sva asu i      deva deva paribhū ṛta      vah mad havya prathama cit      dhūma ketu samidh bhāṛjīka      mandra hotṛ nitya vāc yajīyas      svāvṛj deva amṛta yadi go      atas jan dhāray urvī      viśva deva anu tad tvad yajus gā      duh yat enī divya ghṛta vār      arc tvad vardha apas ghṛtasnu      dyāvābhūmī śru rodas mad      aha yat div asunīti i      madhu mad atra pitṛ śā      kim svid mad rājan grah ka idam      ati vrata kṛ ka vi vid      mitra cit hi sma hvṛ deva      śloka na yā api vāja as      durmantu atra amṛta nāman      salakṣman yat viṣurūpa bhū      yama yad man sumantu      agni tad ṛṣva pā aprayucchat      yad deva vidatha māday      vivasvant sadana dhāray      sūrya jyotis dhā mās aktu      pari dyotani car ajasra      yad deva manman saṃcar      apīcya na mad idam vid      mitra mad atra aditi anāga      savitṛ deva varuṇa vac      śru mad agni sadana sadhastha      yuj ratha amṛta dravitnu      ā mad vah rodas deva putra      mākir deva apa bhū iha as 
       yuj tvad brahman pūrvya namas      vi śloka i pathyā iva sūri      śru viśva amṛta putra      ā yad dhāman divya sthā      yama iva yat yat i      pra tvad bhṛ mānuṣa devay      ā sad sva u loka vid      svāsastha bhū indu mad      pañcan pada rup anu ruh      catuṣpada anu i vrata      akṣara prati mā etad      ṛta nābhi adhi sam pū      deva kaṃ vṛ mṛtyu      prajā kaṃ amṛta na vṛ      bṛhaspati yajña kṛ ṛṣi      priya yama tanū praric      saptan kṣar śiśu marutvat      pitṛ putra api vat ṛta      ubh id idam ubhaya rāj      ubh yat ubhaya puṣ
