       pare pravat mahi anu      bahu pathin anupaś      vaivasvata saṃgamana jana      yama rājan havis duvasy      yama mad gātu prathama vid      na etad gavyūti apabhṛ u      yatra mad pūrva pitṛ pare      enā jan pathyā anu sva      mātalī kavya yama aṅgiras      bṛhaspati ṛkvan vṛdh      yad ca deva vṛdh yad ca deva      svāhā anya svadhā anya mad      idam yama prastara ā hi sad      aṅgiras pitṛ saṃvid      ā tvad mantra kavi śaṃs vah      idam rājan havis māday      aṅgiras ā gam yajñiya      yama vairūpa iha māday      vivasvant hvā yad pitṛ tvad      idam yajña barhis ā niṣad      aṅgiras mad pitṛ navagva      atharvan bhṛgu somya      tad mad sumati yajñiya      api bhadra saumanasa as      pre pre pathin pūrvya      yatra mad pūrva pitṛ pare      ubh rājan svadhā mad      yama paś varuṇa ca deva      sam gam pitṛ sam yama      iṣṭāpūrta parama vyoman      hā avadya punar asta e      sam gam tanu suvarcas      ape vī vi ca sṛp atas      idam etad pitṛ loka kṛ      ahar ap aktu vyañj      yama dā avasāna idam      ati dru sārameya śvan      catur akṣa śabala sādhu pathin      atha pitṛ suvidatra upe      yama yad sadhamāda mad      yad tvad śvan yama rakṣitṛ      catur akṣa pathi rakṣi nṛ cakṣas      tad enad pari dā rājan      svasti ca idam anamīva ca dhā      urūṇasa asutṛp udumbala      yama dūta car jana anu      tad mad dṛś sūrya      punar dā asu adya iha bhadra      yama soma su      yama hu havis      yama ha yajña gam      agni dūta alaṃkṛ      yama ghṛtavat havis      hu pra ca sthā      tad mad deva ā yam      dīrgha āyus pra jīv      yama madhumattama      rājan havya hu      idam namas ṛṣi pūrvaja      pūrva pathikṛt      trikadruka pat      ṣaṣ urvī eka id bṛhat      triṣṭubh gāyatrī chandas      sarva tad yama ādhā 
       ud īr avara ud para      ud madhyama pitṛ somya      asu yad i avṛka ṛta jña      tad mad av pitṛ hava      idam pitṛ namas as adya      yad pūrva yad upara i      yad pārthiva rajas ā niṣad      yad vā nūnam su vṛjanā viś      ā mad pitṛ suvidatra vid      napāt ca vikramaṇa ca viṣṇu      barhiṣad yad svadhā su      bhaj pā tad iha āgamiṣṭha      barhiṣad pitṛ ūti arvāk      idam tvad havya kṛ juṣ      tad ā gam avas śaṃtama      atha mad śam yos arapas dhā      upahvā pitṛ somya      barhiṣya nidhi priya      tad ā gam tad iha śru      adhi brū tad av mad      āñc jānu dakṣiṇatas niṣad      idam yajña abhi gṛ viśva      mā hiṃs pitṛ ka cit mad      yad tvad āgas puruṣa tā kṛ      ās aruṇī upastha      rayi dhā dāś martya      putra pitṛ tad vasu      pra yam tad iha ūrj dhā      yad mad pūrva pitṛ somya      anuvah soma pītha vasiṣṭha      tad yama sam rā havis      vaś vaś pratikāma ad      yad tṛṣ devatrā jeh      hotrāvid stoma takṣ arka      ā agni yā suvidatra arvāñc      satya kavya pitṛ gharma sad      yad satya havirad haviṣpā      indra deva sa ratha dhā      ā agni yā sahasra deva vanda      para pūrva pitṛ gharma sad      agniṣvātta pitṛ ā iha gam      sadas sadas sad su praṇīti      ad havis prayam barhis      atha rayi sarva vīra dhā      tvad agni īḍ jātavedas      vah havya surabhi kṛ      pradā pitṛ svadhā tad ghas      ad tvad deva prayam havis      yad ca iha pitṛ yad ca na iha      yad ca vid yad u ca na pravid      tvad vid yati tad jātavedas      svadhā yajña su kṛ juṣ      yad agnidagdha yad anagnidagdha      madhya div svadhā māday      tad svarāj asunīti etad      yathāvaśam tanū kalpay 
       mā enad agni vi dah mā abhi śuc      mā idam tvac kṣip mā śarīra      yadā śrī kṛ jātavedas      atha īṃ enad pra hi pitṛ      śrī yadā kṛ jātavedas      atha īṃ enad pari dā pitṛ      yadā gam asunīti etad      atha deva vaśanī bhū      sūrya cakṣus gam vāta ātman      div ca gam pṛthivī ca dharman      ap vā gam yadi tatra tvad dhā      oṣadhī prati sthā śarīra      aja bhāga tapas tad tap      tad tvad śocis tap tad tvad arcis      yad tvad śiva tanu jātavedas      tad vah enad su kṛt u loka      ava sṛj punar agni pitṛ      yad tvad āhu car svadhā      āyus vas upa vī śeṣas      sam gam tanu jātavedas      yad tvad kṛṣṇa śakuna ātud      pipīla sarpa uta vā śvāpada      agni tad viśvād agada kṛ      soma ca yad brāhmaṇa āviś      agni varman pari go vye      sam pra vṛ pīvas medas ca      na id tvad dhṛṣṇu haras jarhṛṣ      dadhṛṣ vidah paryaṅkhay      idam agni camasa mā vi hvṛ      priya deva uta somya      etad yad camasa deva pāna      tad deva amṛta māday      kravyād agni pra hi dūram      yama rājan gam ripra vāha      iha eva idam itara jātavedas      deva havya vah prajñā      yad agni kravyād praviś tvad gṛha      idam paś itara jātavedas      tad hṛ pitṛ yajña deva      tad gharma inv parama sadhastha      yad agni kravya vāhana      pitṛ yaj ṛtāvṛdh      pra id u havya vac      deva ca pitṛ ā      vaś tvad ni dhā      vaś sam indh      vaś vaś ā vah      pitṛ havis ad      yad tvad agni saṃdah      tad u niḥ vāpay punar      kiyāmbu atra ruh      pākadūrvā vyalkaśā      śītaka śītikāvat      hlādaka hlādikāvat      maṇḍūkī su sam gam      idam su agni harṣay 
       tvaṣṭṛ duhitṛ vahatu kṛ      iti idam viśva bhuvana sam i      yama mātṛ parivah      mah jāyā vivasvant naś      apaguh amṛta martya      kṛ savarṇa dā vivasvant      uta aśvin bhṛ yat tad as      hā u dvi mithuna saraṇyū      pūṣan tvad itas cyāvay pra vid      a naś paśu bhuvana gopā      tad tvad etad pari dā pitṛ      agni deva suvidatriya      āyu viśvāyu pari pā tvad      pūṣan tvad pā prapatha purastāt      yatra ās su kṛt yatra tad yā      tatra tvad deva savitṛ dhā      pūṣan idam āśā anu vid sarva      tad mad abhayatama nī      svasti dā āghṛṇi sarva vīra      aprayucchat puras i prajñā      prapatha pathin jan pūṣan      prapatha div prapatha pṛthivī      ubh abhi priyatama sadhastha      ā ca parā ca car prajñā      sarasvatī devay hvā      sarasvatī adhvara tan      sarasvatī su kṛt hvā      sarasvatī dāś vārya dā      sarasvatī yad sa ratha yā      svadhā devī pitṛ mad      āsad idam barhis māday      anamīva iṣ ā dhā mad      sarasvatī yad pitṛ hvā      dakṣiṇā yajña abhinakṣ      sahasra argha iḍ atra bhāga      rai poṣa yajamāna dhā      ap mad mātṛ śundhay      ghṛta mad ghṛta pu pū      viśva hi ripra pravah devī      ud id idam śuci ā pū i      drapsa skand prathama anu div      idam ca yoni anu yad ca pūrva      samāna yoni anu saṃcar      drapsa hu anu saptan hotrā      yad tvad drapsa skand yad tvad aṃśu      bāhu cyu dhiṣaṇā upastha      adhvaryu vā pari vā yad pavitra      tad tvad hu manas vaṣaṭkṛ      yad tvad drapsa skand yad tvad aṃśu      avas ca yad paras sruc      idam deva bṛhaspati      sam tad sic rādhas      payasvat oṣadhi      payasvat māmaka vacas      ap payasvat id payas      tad mad saha śudh 
       para mṛtyu anu pare pathin      yad tvad sva itara deva yāna      cakṣuṣmat śru tvad brū      mā mad prajā riṣ mā uta vīra      mṛtyu pada yopay yat i      drāghīyas āyus prataram dhā      āpyā prajā dhana      śudh pū bhū yajñiya      idam jīva vi mṛ āvṛt      bhū bhadra deva hūti mad adya      prāñc gā nṛti hasa      drāghīyas āyus prataram dhā      idam jīva paridhi dhā      mā idam nu gā apara artha etad      śata jīv śarad purūcī      antar mṛtyu dhā parvata      yathā ahar anupūrva bhū      yathā ṛtu ṛtu i sādhu      yathā na pūrva apara hā      eva dhātṛ āyus kalpay idam      ā ruh āyus jaras vṛ      anupūrva yat yati as      iha tvaṣṭṛ su janiman sajoṣas      dīrgha āyus kṛ jīv tvad      idam nārī a vidhavā su patnī      āñjana sarpis sam viś      an aśru anamīva su ratna      ā ruh jani yoni agra      ud īr nārī abhi jīva loka      gatāsu etad upa śī e      hasta grābha didhiṣu tvad idam      pati jani tva abhi sam bhū      dhanus hasta ādā mṛ      mad kṣatra varcas bala      atra eva tvad iha mad su vīra      viśva spṛdh abhimāti ji      upa sṛp mātṛ bhūmi etad      uru vyacas pṛthivī su śeva      ūrṇamrada yuvati dakṣiṇāvat      etad tvad pā nirṛti upastha      ucchvañc pṛthivī mā ni bādh      su upāyana idam bhū su upavañcana      mātṛ putra yathā sic      abhi enad bhūmi vṛ      ucchvañc pṛthivī su sthā      sahasra mit upa hi śri      tad gṛha ghṛtaścut bhū      viśvāhā idam śaraṇa as atra      ud tvad stambh pṛthivī tvad pari      idam loga nidhā mā u mad riṣ      etad sthūṇā pitṛ dhāray tvad      atra yama sādana tvad mi      pratīcīna mad ahar      iṣu parṇa iva ā      pratyañc grah vāc      aśva raśanā yathā 
       ni vṛt mā anu gā      mad sac revat      agnīṣoma punarvasu      mad dhāray rayi      punar enad ni vartay      punar enad ni ā kṛ      indra enad ni yam      agni enad upāj      punar etad ni vṛt      idam puṣ gopati      iha eva agni ni dhāray      iha sthā yad rayi      yad niyāna nyayana      saṃjñāna yad parāyaṇa      āvartana nivartana      yad gopā api tad hvā      yad unnaś vyayana      yad unnaś parāyaṇa      āvartana nivartana      api gopā ni vṛt      ā nivarta ni vartay      punar mad indra go dā      jīva bhuj      pari tvad viśvatas dhā      ūrj ghṛta payas      yad deva ka ca yajñiya      tad rayi sam sṛj mad      ā nivartana vartay      ni nivartana vartay      bhūmi catur pradiś      tad enad ni vartay 
       bhadra mad api vātay manas      agni īḍ bhuj yaviṣṭha      śās mitra durdharītu      yad dharman svar enī      sapary mātṛ ūdhas      yad ās kṛpanīḍa      bhāsā ketu vardhay      bhrāj śreṇidat      ari viś gātu i      pra yat naś div anta      kavi abhra dīdī      juṣ havya mānuṣa      ūrdhva sthā ṛbhvas yajña      mi sadman puras i      tad hi kṣema havis yajña      śruṣṭi id a gātu i      agni deva vāśīmat      yajñāsāha duvas iṣ      agni pūrva śeva      adri sūnu āyu ah      nṛ yad ka ca mad ā      viśva id tad vāma ā as      agni havis vṛdh      kṛṣṇa śveta aruṣa yāma idam      bradhna ṛjra uta śoṇa yaśasvat      hiraṇya rūpa janitṛ jan      eva tvad agni vimada manīṣā      ūrj napāt amṛta sajoṣas      gir ā vah sumati i      iṣ ūrj su kṣiti viśva ābhṛ 
       ā agni na svavṛkti      hotṛ tvad vṛ      yajña stṛ barhis      vi tvad mada      śīra pāvaka śocis      vivakṣ      tvad u tad su ābhū      śubh aśva rādhas      vī tvad upasecanī      vi tvad mada      ṛjīti agni āhuti      vivakṣ      tvad dharman ās      juhū sic iva      kṛṣṇa rūpa arjuna      vi tvad mada      viśva adhi śrī dhā      vivakṣ      yad agni man rayi      sahasāvat amartya      tad ā mad vājasāti      vi tvad mada      yajña citra ā bhṛ      vivakṣ      agni jan atharvan      vid viśva kāvya      bhū dūta vivasvant      vi tvad mada      priya yama kāmya      vivakṣ      tvad yajña īḍ      agni pre adhvara      tvad vasu kāmya      vi tvad mada      viśva dhā dāś      vivakṣ      tvad yajña ṛtvij      cāru agni ni sad      ghṛta pratīka manus      vi tvad mada      śukra cetiṣṭha akṣa      vivakṣ      agni śukra śocis      uru prathay bṛhat      abhikrand vṛṣāy      vi tvad mada      garbha dhā jāmi      vivakṣ 
       kuha śru indra ka adya      jana mitra na śru      ṛṣi vā yad kṣaya      guhā vā carkar gir      iha śru indra mad adya      stu vajrin ṛcīṣama      mitra na yad jana ā      yaśas kṛ asāmi ā      mah yad pati śavas asāmi ā      mah nṛmṇa tūtuji      bhṛ vajra dhṛṣṇu      pitṛ putra iva priya      yuj aśva vāta dhuni      deva deva vajrivat      syand pathin virukmat      sṛj stu adhvan      tvad tya cit vāta aśva gā      ṛjra tman vah      yad deva na martya      yantṛ nakir vid      adha gam uśanā pracch tvad      kadartha mad ā gṛha      ā gam parāka      div ca gam ca martya      ā mad indra pṛkṣ      mad brahman udyam      tad tvad yāc avas      śuṣṇa yat han a mānuṣa      akarman dasyu abhi mad amantu      anya vrata a mānuṣa      tvad tad amitra han      vadhar dāsa dambhay      tvad mad indra śūra śūra      uta tvota barhaṇā      purutrā tvad vi pūrti      nū kṣoṇī yathā      tvad tad vṛtra hatya coday nṛ      kārpāṇa śūra vajrivat      guhā yadi kavi      viś na kṣatra śavas      makṣū tad tvad indra dānāpnas      akṣ śūra vajrivat      yat ha śuṣṇa dambhay      jāta viśva sa yāvan      mā akudhryañc indra śūra vasu      mad bhū abhiṣṭi      mad mad tvad idam      sumna as vajrivat      mad tad tvad indra as satya      a hiṃs upaspṛś      vid yad bhuj      dhenu na vajrivat      ahasta yat apada vṛdh kṣā      śacī vedyā      śuṣṇa pari pradakṣiṇit      viśva āyu ni śnath      pā pā id indra śūra soma      mā riṣaṇy vasavāna vasu as      uta trā gṛ maghavan      mah ca rai revat kṛ mad 
       yaj indra vajra dakṣiṇa      hari rathya vivrata      pra śmaśru dodhu ūrdhvathā bhū      vi senā day vi rādhas      hari nu idam yad vana vid vasu      indra magha maghavan vṛtra han bhū      ṛbhu vāja ṛbhukṣan paty śavas      ava kṣṇu dāsa nāman cit      yadā vajra hiraṇya id atha ratha      hari yad idam vah vi sūri      ā sthā maghavan sana śru      indra vāja dīrgha śravas pati      tad u cit nu vṛṣṭi yūthya sva      indra śmaśru harita abhi pruṣ      av vī su kṣaya suta madhu      ud id dhū vāta yathā vana      yad vāc vivāc mṛdhravāc      puru sahasra aśiva han      tad tad id idam pauṃsya gṛ      pitṛ iva yad taviṣī vṛdh śavas      stoma tvad indra vimada jan      apūrvya purutama su dānu      vid hi idam bhojana ina      yat ā paśu na gopā kṛ      mākir mad enad sakhya vi yu      tvad ca indra vimada ca ṛṣi      vid hi tvad pramati deva jāmi vat      mad tvad as sakhya śiva 
       indra soma idam pā      madhumat camū su      mad rayi ni dhāray      vi tvad mada      sahasrin purūvasu      vivakṣ      tvad yajña uktha      upa havya i      śacīpati śacī      vi tvad mada      śreṣṭha mad dhā vārya      vivakṣ      yad pati vārya      as radhra coditṛ      indra stotṛ avitṛ      vi tvad mada      dviṣ mad pā aṃhas      vivakṣ      tvad śakra māyāvin      samyañc niḥ math      vimada yat īḍ      nāsatya nirmath      viśva deva kṛp      samyañc niṣpat      nāsatya brū deva      punar ā vah iti      madhumat mad parāyaṇa      madhumat punar āyana      tad mad deva devatā      tvad madhumat kṛ 
       bhadra mad api vātay      manas dakṣa uta kratu      adha tvad sakhya andhas      vi tvad mada      ran go na yavasa      vivakṣ      hṛdispṛśa tvad ās      viśva soma dhāman      adha kāma idam mad      vi tvad mada      vi sthā vasūyu      vivakṣ      uta vrata soma tvad      pra mad mī pākyā      adha pitṛ iva sūnu      vi tvad mada      mṛḍ mad abhi cit vadha      vivakṣ      sam u pra i dhīti      sarga avata iva      kratu mad soma jīv      vi tvad mada      dhāray camasa iva      vivakṣ      tvad tya soma śakti      nikāma vi ṛch      gṛtsa dhīra tavas      vi tvad mada      vraja gomat aśvin      vivakṣ      paśu mad soma rakṣ      purutrā viṣṭhā jagant      samākṛ jīv      vi tvad mada      viśva saṃpaś bhuvana      vivakṣ      tvad mad soma viśvatas      gopā adābhya bhū      sidh rājan apa sridh      vi tvad mada      mā mad duḥśaṃsa īś      vivakṣ      tvad mad soma su kratu      vayas dheya jāgṛ      kṣetra vittara manus      vi tvad mada      druh mad pā aṃhas      vivakṣ      tvad mad vṛtra hantama      indra indu śiva sakhi      yat sīm hvā samitha      vi tvad mada      yudh toka sāti      vivakṣ      idam gha tad tura mada      indra vṛdh priya      idam kakṣīvant mah      vi tvad mada      mati vipra vardhay      vivakṣ      idam vipra dāś      vāja ṛch gomat      idam saptan ā vara      vi tvad mada      pra andha śroṇa ca tṛ      vivakṣ 
       pra hi acchā manīṣā      spārha i niyut      pra dasra niyudratha      pūṣan av māhina      yad tya mahi tva      vātāpya idam jana      vipra ā van dhīti      cit suṣṭuti      tad vid suṣṭuti      indu na pūṣan vṛṣan      abhi psuras pruṣāy      vraja mad ā pruṣāy      man tvad mad      mad deva pūṣan      mati ca sādhana      vipra ca ādhava      pratyardhi yajña      aśva haya ratha      ṛṣi tad yad manus hita      vipra yāvay sakha      adhīṣ pati      śuca ca śuca ca      vāsas vāya avi      ā vāsas marmṛj      ina vāja pati      ina puṣṭi sakhi      pra śmaśru haryata dhū      vi vṛthā yad adābhya      ā tvad ratha pūṣan      aja dhur vṛt      viśva arthin sakhi      sanojā an apacyu      mad ūrj ratha      pūṣan av māhina      bhū vāja vṛdha      idam mad śru hava 
       as su mad jaritṛ tad abhivega      yat su yajamāna śikṣ      an āśīrdā mad as prahan      satyadhvṛt vṛjināy ābhu      yadi id mad yudh saṃnī      a devayu tanu śuj      amā tvad tumra vṛṣabha pac      tīvra suta pañcadaśa ni sic      na mad tad vid yad iti brū      a devayu samaraṇa han      yadā avakhyā samaraṇa ṛghāvat      āt id ha mad vṛṣabha pra brū      yat ajñāta vṛjana as      viśva satas maghavan mad as      jyā vā id kṣema ā as ābhu      pra tad kṣi parvata pādagṛhya      na vai u mad vṛjana vāray      na parvata yat mad manasy      mad svana kṛdhukarṇa bhī      eva id anu div kiraṇa sam ej      dṛś nu atra śṛtapā an indra      bāhukṣad śaru pat      ghṛṣu vā yad nind sakhi      adhi ū nu idam pavi vṛt      bhū u vakṣ vi u āyus naś      dṛ nu pūrva apara nu dṛ      dvi pavasta pari tad na bhū      yad idam pāra rajas viṣ      go yava prayuta ari ghas      tad paś saha gopā car      hava id ari abhitas sam i      kiyat idam sva pati chanday      sam yat vī yavasād jana      mad yavād urvajra antar      atra yuj avasātṛ iṣ      atho ayukta yuj van      atra id u mad man satya vac      dvipād ca yat catuṣpād saṃsṛj      strī yad atra vṛṣaṇa pṛtany      a yudh idam vi bhaj vedas      yad anakṣa duhitṛ jātu as      ka tad vid abhi man andha      katara meni prati tad muc      yad īṃ vah yad īṃ vā varey      kiyat yoṣā marya vadhūyu      pariprī panyas vārya      bhadra vadhū bhū yat su peśas      svayam tad mitra van jana cit      pattas gṛ pratyañc ad      śīrṣan śiras prati varūtha      ās ūrdhva upas kṣi      nyāñc uttāna anu i bhūmi      bṛhat acchāya a palāśa arvan      sthā mātṛ viṣita ad garbha      anya vatsa rih mā      ka bhū ni dhā dhenu ūdhas      saptan vīra adharāt ud i      aṣṭan uttarāttāt sam gam tad      navan paścātāt sthivimat i      daśan prāk sānu vi tṛ aśan      daśan eka kapila samāna      tad hi kratu pārya      garbha mātṛ su dhita vakṣaṇā      a ven tuṣay bhṛ      pīvas meṣa pac vīra      nivap akṣa anu dīv as      dvi dhanū bṛhat ap antar      pavitravat car pū      vi krośana viṣvañc i      pac nema na hi pac ardha      idam mad deva savitṛ tad ah      dru anna id van sarpis anna      paś grāma vah ārāt      a cakra svadhā vṛt      sac ari pra yuga jana      sadyas śiśna pramī navīyas      etad mad go pramara yuj      mā u su pra sidh muhur id man      ap cit idam vi naś artha      svar ca marka upara bhū      idam yad vajra purudhā vivṛt      avas sūrya bṛhat purīṣa      śravas id enā paras anya as      tad avyathi jariman tṛ      vṛkṣa vṛkṣa niyam mā go      tatas vi pra pat pūruṣa ad      atha idam viśva bhuvana bhī      indra su ṛṣi ca śikṣ      deva māna prathama sthā      kṛntatra idam upara ud i      tri tap pṛthivī anūpa      dvi bṛbūka vah purīṣa      tad tvad jīvātu uta tad vid      mā sma etādṛś apa guh samarya      āvis svar kṛ guh busa      tad pādu idam nirṇij na muc 
       viśva hi anya ari āgam      mad id aha śvaśura na ā gam      ghas dhānā uta soma pā      su āśay punar asta gā      tad roro vṛṣabha tigma śṛṅga      varṣman sthā variman ā pṛthivī      viśva enad vṛjana pā      yad mad kukṣi su soma pṛ      adri tvad mandin indra tūya      su soma pā tvad idam      pac tvad vṛṣabha ad tad      pṛkṣa i maghavan hu      idam su mad jaritṛ ā cit      pratīpa śāpa nadī vah      lopāśa siṃha pratyañc tsar      kroṣṭṛ varāha niḥ tak kakṣa      kathā tvad etad mad ā cit      gṛtsa pāka tavas manīṣā      tvad mad vid ṛtuthā vi vac      yad ardha tvad maghavan kṣemya dhū      eva hi mad tavas vardhay      div cit mad bṛhat uttara dhū      puru sahasra ni śā sākam      aśatru hi mad janitṛ jan      eva hi mad tavas jñā ugra      karman karman vṛṣan indra deva      vadh vṛtra vajra mand      apa vraja mahi dāś vṛ      deva i paraśu bhṛ      vana vraśc abhi viś i      ni su dru dhā vakṣaṇā      yatra kṛpīṭa anu tad dah      śaśa kṣura pratyañc gṛ      adri loga vi bhid ārāt      bṛhat cit ṛhat randhay      vī vatsa vṛṣabha śvi      suparṇa itthā nakha ā sā      avarudh paripad na siṃha      nirudh cit mahiṣa tarṣyāvat      godhā tad ayatha kṛṣ etad      tad godhā ayatha kṛṣ etad      yad brahman pratipī anna      sima ukṣan avasṛj ad      svayam bala tanū śṛ      etad śamī suśamī bhū      yad hi tanū soma uktha      nṛ vat vad upa mad mā vāja      div śravas dhā nāman vīra 
       vana na vā yad ni dhā kan      śuci tvad stoma bhuraṇa jāgṛ      yad id indra puru dina hotṛ      nṛ narya nṛtama kṣapāvant      pra tvad idam uṣas pra apara      nṛti as nṛtama nṛ      anu triśoka śata āvah nṛ      kutsa ratha yad as san      ka tvad mada indra rantya bhū      dvār gir abhi ugra vi dhāv      ka vāhas arvāk upa mad manīṣā      ā tvad śak upama rādhas anna      ka u dyumna indra tvāvat nṛ      ka dhī kṛ kad mad āgam      mitra na satya urugāya bhṛti      anna sama yat as manīṣā      preray sūra artha na pāra      yad idam kāma janidhā iva gam      gir ca yad tvad tuvi jan puru      nṛ indra pratiśikṣ anna      mātrā nu tvad su mā indra puru      div majman pṛthivī kāvya      vara tvad ghṛtavat suta      svādman bhū pīti madhu      ā madhu idam sic amatra      indra pṛ tad hi satya rādhas      tad vṛdh variman ā pṛthivī      abhi kratu narya pauṃsya ca      vi naś indra pṛtanā su ojas      ā idam yat sakhya puru      ā sma ratha na pṛtanā sthā      yad bhadra sumati coday 
       pra devatrā brahman gātu i      ap acchā manas na prayukti      mah mitra varuṇa dhāsi      pṛthu jrayas radh suvṛkti      adhvaryu haviṣmat hi bhū      acchā ap i vaś vaś      ava yad cakṣ aruṇa suparṇa      tad ās ūrmi adya su hasta      adhvaryu apa i samudra      ap napāt havis yaj      tad tvad dā ūrmi adya su pū      tad soma madhumat su      yad anidhma dīdī ap antar      yad vipra īḍ adhvara      ap napāt madhumat ap dā      yad indra vṛdh vīrya      yad soma mud hṛṣ ca      kalyāṇa yuvati na marya      tad adhvaryu ap acchā pare      yat āsic oṣadhī pū      eva id yuvan yuvati nam      yat īṃ vaś vaś i acchā      sam jñā manas sam cit      adhvaryu dhiṣaṇā ap ca deva      yad tvad vṛ kṛ u loka      yad tvad mahi abhiśasti muc      tad indra madhumat ūrmi      deva mādana pra hi ap      pra idam hi madhumat ūrmi      garbha yad tvad sindhu madhu utsa      ghṛta pṛṣṭha īḍ adhvara      ap revat śru hava mad      tad sindhu matsara indra pāna      ūrmi pra hi yad ubh ṛch      mada cyut auśāna nabhas jā      pari tri tantu vicar utsa      āvarvṛt adha nu dvi dhārā      goṣuyudh na niyava car      ṛṣi janitrī bhuvana patnī      ap vand savṛdh sayoni      hi mad adhvara deva yajya      hi brahman sani dhana      ṛta yoga vi sā ūdhas      śruṣṭīvan bhū mad ap      ap revat kṣi hi vasu      kratu ca bhadra bhṛ amṛta ca      rai ca as su apatya patnī      sarasvatī tad gṛ vayas dhā      prati yat ap dṛś e      ghṛta payas bhṛ madhu      adhvaryu manas saṃvid      indra soma su su bhṛ      ā idam gam revat jīva dhanya      adhvaryu sāday sakhi      ni barhis dhā somya      ap naptṛ saṃvid enad      āgam ap vaś barhis ā idam      ni adhvara sad devay      adhvaryu su indra soma      bhū u tvad suśaka deva yajya 
       ā mad deva upa vī śaṃsa      viśva tura av yajatra      tad mad su sakhi bhū      tṛ viśva durita as      pari cit marta draviṇa man      ṛta pathin namas vivās      uta sva kratu sam vad      śreyas dakṣa manas grah      dhā dhīti sṛj aṃśa      tīrtha na dasma upa i ūma      abhi aś suvita śūṣa      navedas amṛta bhū      nitya kan sva pati damūnas      yad u deva savitṛ jan      bhaga vā go aryaman īṃ añj      tad idam cāru chaday uta as      idam tad bhū uṣas iva kṣā      yat ha kṣumat śavas sami      idam stuti jaritṛ bhikṣ      ā mad śagma upa i vāja      idam id etad sumati prath      bhū pūrvya bhūman go      idam sanīḍa asura yoni      samāna ā bharaṇa bhṛ      ka svid vana ka u tad vṛkṣa as      yatas dyāvāpṛthivī nistakṣ      saṃsthā ajara itaūti      ahar puru uṣas jṛ      na etāvat enā paras anya as      ukṣan tad dyāvāpṛthivī bhṛ      tvac pavitra kṛ svadhāvat      yat īṃ sūrya na harit vah      stega na kṣā ati i pṛthu      mih na vāta vi ha vā bhūman      mitra yatra varuṇa añj      agni vana na vi sṛj śoka      starī yat sū sadyas añj      vyathi a vyathi kṛ sva gopā      putra yat pūrva pitṛ jan      śamyā go gṛ yat ha pracch      uta kaṇva nṛṣad putra ah      uta śyāva dhana ādā vājin      pra kṛṣṇa ruśat pinv ūdhas      ṛta atra nakir idam pyā 
       pra su gam dhiyasāna sac      vara vara abhi su prasad      mad indra ubhaya juṣ      yat somya andhas budh      vi indra yā divya rocana      vi pārthiva rajas puruṣṭuta      yad tvad vah muhur adhvara upa      tad su van vagvana arādhas      tad id mad chand vapus vapuṣṭara      putra yat jāna pitṛ adhī      jāyā pati vah vagnu sumat      puṃs id bhadra vahatu pariṣkṛ      tad id sadhastha abhi cāru dhī      go yad śās vahatu na dhenu      mātṛ yad mantu yūtha pūrvya      abhi vāṇa saptan dhātu id jana      pra tvad acchā ric devayu pada      eka rudra yā turvaṇi      jarā vā yad amṛta dā      pari tvad ūma sic madhu      nidhā apaguh ap      pra mad deva vrata pā vac      indra vid anu hi tvad cakṣ      tad mad agni anuśās āgā      a kṣetra vid kṣetra vid hi pracch      tad pre kṣetra vid anuśās      etad vai bhadra anuśāsana      uta sruti vid añjasīna      adya id u prāṇ man idam aha      apivṛ dhā mātṛ ūdhas      ā īṃ enad āp jariman yuvan      a hīḍ vasu su manas bhū      etad bhadra kalaśa kṛ      kuruśravaṇa dā magha      dāna id tvad maghavan tad as      idam ca soma hṛd yad bhṛ 
       pra mad yuj prayuj jana      vah sma pūṣan antareṇa      viśva deva adha mad rakṣ      duḥśāsus āgā iti ghoṣa as      sam mad tap abhitas      sapatnī iva parśu      ni bādh amati nagnatā jasu      vi na vevīy mati      mūṣa na śiśna vi ad stotṛ      stotṛ tvad śatakratu      sakṛt su mad maghavan indra mṛḍay      adha pitṛ iva mad bhū      kuruśravaṇa āvṛ      rājan trāsadasyava      maṃhiṣṭha vāghant ṛṣi      yad mad harit ratha      tri vah sādhuyā      stu sahasradakṣin      yad prasvādas gir      upamaśravas pitṛ      kṣetra na raṇva vac      adhi putra upamaśravas      napāt mitrātithi i      pitṛ tvad as vanditṛ      yat īś amṛta      uta vā martya      jīv id maghavan mad      na deva ati vrata      śata ātman cana jīv      tathā yuj vi vṛt 
       prāvepa mad bṛhat māday      pravātejā iriṇa varvṛt      soma iva maujavata bhakṣa      vibhīdaka jāgṛvi mad chand      na mad mith na hīḍ etad      śiva sakhi uta mad as      akṣa mad eka para hetu      anuvrata apa jāyā rudh      dviṣ śvaśrū apa jāyā rudh      na nāth vid marḍitṛ      aśva iva jṛ vasnya      na mad vid kitava bhoga      anya jāyā pari mṛś idam      yad gṛdh vedana vājin akṣa      pitṛ mātṛ bhrātṛ enad ah      na jñā nī bandh etad      yat ā dhī na dīv idam      pare ava hā sakhi      nivap ca babhru vāc kṛ      i id idam niṣkṛta jāriṇī iva      sabhā i kitava pracch      ji iti tanū śuj      akṣa idam vi tṛ kāma      pratidīvan dhā ā kṛta      akṣa id aṅkuśin nitodin      nikṛtvan tapana tāpayiṣṇu      kumāra deṣṇa ji punarhan      madhu sampṛc kitava barhaṇā      tripañcāśa krīḍ vrāta idam      deva iva savitṛ satya dharman      ugra cit manyu na nam      rājan cit idam namas id kṛ      nīca vṛt upari sphur      ahasta hastavat sah      divya aṅgāra iriṇa nivap      śīta as hṛdaya niḥ dah      jāyā tap kitava hā      mātṛ putra car kva svid      ṛṇāvan bhī dhana iṣ      anya asta upa nakta i      strī dṛś kitava tap      anya jāyā su kṛ ca yoni      pūrvāhṇa aśva yuj hi babhru      tad agni anta vṛṣala pad      yad tvad senānī mahat gaṇa      rājan vrāta prathama bhū      tad kṛ na dhana rudh      daśan mad prāñc tad ṛta vad      akṣa mā dīv kṛṣi id kṛṣ      vitta ram bahu man      tatra go kitava tatra jāyā      tad mad vi cakṣ savitṛ idam ari      mitra kṛ khalu mṛḍ mad      mā mad ghora car abhi dhṛṣṇu      ni tvad nu manyu viś arāti      anya babhru prasiti nu as 
       budh u tya indravat agni      jyotis bhṛ uṣas vyuṣṭi      mahi dyāvāpṛthivī cit apas      adya deva avas ā vṛ      divaspṛthivī avas ā vṛ      mātṛ sindhu parvata śaryaṇāvant      anāgāstva sūrya uṣas ī      bhadra soma su adya kṛ mad      div mad adya pṛthivī anāgas      mahi trā suvita mātṛ      uṣas vas apa bādh agha      svasti agni sam indh ī      idam mad usrā prathama sudevya      revat sani revat vi vas      āre manyu durvidatra dhā      svasti agni sam indh ī      pra yad sṛ sūrya raśmi      jyotis bhṛ uṣas vyuṣṭi      bhadra mad adya śravas vi vas      svasti agni sam indh ī      anamīva uṣas ā car mad      ud agni hā jyotis bṛhat      ā yuj aśvin tūtuji ratha      svasti agni sam indh ī      śreṣṭha mad adya savitṛ vareṇya      bhāga ā sū tad hi ratna dhā as      rai janitrī dhiṣaṇā upa brū      svasti agni sam indh ī      pṛ mad tad ṛta pravācana      deva yad manuṣya man      viśva id usrā spaś ud i sūrya      svasti agni sam indh ī      a dveṣas adya barhis starīman      grāvan yoga manman sādha ī      āditya śarman sthā bhuraṇy      svasti agni sam indh ī      ā mad barhis sadhamāda bṛhat div      deva īḍ sāday saptan hotṛ      indra mitra varuṇa sāti bhaga      svasti agni sam indh ī      tad āditya ā gam sarvatāti      vṛdh mad yajña av sajoṣas      bṛhaspati pūṣan aśvin bhaga      svasti agni sam indh ī      tad mad deva yam su pravācana      chardis āditya subhara nṛpāyya      paśu toka tanaya jīv      svasti agni sam indh ī      viśva adya marut viśva ūti      viśva bhū agni sam indh      viśva mad deva avas gam      viśva as draviṇa vāja mad      yad deva av vājasāti      yad trā yad pṛ ati aṃhas      yad tvad gopītha na bhaya vid      tad as deva vīti tura 
       uṣāsānaktā bṛhat supeśas      dyāvākṣam varuṇa mitra aryaman      indra hvā marut parvata ap      āditya dyāvāpṛthivī ap svar      div ca mad pṛthivī ca pracetas      ṛtāvan rakṣ aṃhas riṣ      mā durvidatra nirṛti mad īś      tad deva avas adya vṛ      viśva mad aditi pā aṃhas      mātṛ mitra varuṇa revat      svarvat jyotis avṛka naś      tad deva avas adya vṛ      grāvan vad apa rakṣas sidh      duḥṣvapnya nirṛti viśva atrin      āditya śarman marut aś      tad deva avas adya vṛ      ā indra barhis sad pinv iḍā      bṛhaspati sāman ṛkva arc      su praketa jīv manman dhā      tad deva avas adya vṛ      divispṛś yajña mad aśvin      jīra adhvara kṛ sumna iṣṭi      prācīna raśmi āhu ghṛta      tad deva avas adya vṛ      upa hvā su hava māruta gaṇa      pāvaka ṛṣva sakhya śambhū      rai poṣa sauśravasa dhā      tad deva avas adya vṛ      ap peru jīva dhanya bhṛ      devāvī su hava adhvara śrī      su raśmi soma indriya yam      tad deva avas adya vṛ      san tad susanitā sanitvan      mad jīva jīva putra anāgas      brahman dviṣ viṣvañc enas bhṛ      tad deva avas adya vṛ      yad as manu yajñiya tad śru      yad tvad deva ī tad dā      jaitra kratu rayimat vīravat yaśas      tad deva avas adya vṛ      mahat adya mahat ā vṛ      avas deva bṛhat an arvan      yathā vasu vīra jan naś      tad deva avas adya vṛ      mah agni sam indh śarman      anāga mitra varuṇa svasti      śreṣṭha as savitṛ savīman      tad deva avas adya vṛ      yad savitṛ satya sava viśva      mitra vrata varuṇa deva      tad saubhaga vīravat gomat apnas      dhā draviṇa citra mad      savitṛ paścātāt savitṛ purastāt      savitṛ uttarāttāt savitṛ adharāttāt      savitṛ mad sū sarvatāti      savitṛ mad rā dīrgha āyus 
       namas mitra varuṇa cakṣas      mahas deva tad ṛta sapary      dūredṛś deva jan ketu      div putra sūrya śaṃs      tad mad satya ukti pari pā viśvatas      div ca yatra tan ahar ca      viśva anya ni viś yad ej      viśvāhā ap viśvāhā ud i sūrya      na tvad a deva pradiv ni vās      yat etaśa patara rathary      prācīna anya anu vṛt rajas      ud anya jyotis yā sūrya      yad sūrya jyotis bādh tamas      jagant ca viśva ud ṛch bhānu      tad mad viśva anirā anāhuti      apa amīvā apa duḥṣvapnya sū      viśva hi preṣ rakṣ vrata      a heḍay uccar svadhā anu      yat adya tvad sūrya upabrū      tad mad deva anu man kratu      tad mad dyāvāpṛthivī tad mad ap      indra śru marut hava vacas      mā śūna bhū sūrya saṃdṛś      bhadra jīv jaraṇā aś      viśvāhā tvad su manas su cakṣas      prajāvat anamīva anāgas      udi tvad mitra mahat diva diva      jyok jīva prati paś sūrya      mahi jyotis bhṛ tvad vicakṣaṇa      bhāsvat cakṣus cakṣus mayas      āruh bṛhat pājas pari      mad jīva prati paś sūrya      yad tvad viśva bhuvana ketu      pra ca īr ni ca viś aktu      anāgāstva hari keśa sūrya      ahar ahar mad vasyas vasyas ud i      śam mad bhū cakṣas śam mad ahar      śam bhānu śam hima śam ghṛṇa      yathā śam adhvan śam as duroṇa      tad sūrya draviṇa dhā citra      mad deva ubhaya janman      śarman yam dvipad catuṣpada      ad pā ūrjay āśay      tad mad śam yos arapas dhā      yad tvad deva kṛ jihvā guru      manas vā prayuti deva heḍana      arāvan yad mad abhi duchunāy      tad tad enas vasu ni dhā 
       idam mad indra pṛtsuti yaśasvat      śimīvat krandas pra av sāti      yatra goṣāti dhṛṣ khādin      viṣvañc pat didyu nṛṣāhya      tad mad kṣumat sadana vi vṛ      goarṇas rayi indra śravāyya      as tvad ji śakra medin      yathā mad vaś tad vasu kṛ      yad mad dāsa ārya vā puruṣṭuta      deva indra yudh cit      mad tvad suṣaha as śatru      tvad mad tad van saṃgama      yad dabhra hvā yad ca bhūri      yad abhīka varivas vid nṛṣāhya      tad vikhāda sasni adya śru nṛ      arvāñc indra av kṛ      svavṛj hi tvad mad indra śru      anānuda vṛṣabha radhra codana      pra muc pari kutsa iha ā gam      kim u tvāvat muṣka bandh ās 
       yad tvad parijman suvṛt aśvin ratha      doṣā uṣa hvā haviṣmat      śaśvattama tad u tvad idam mad      pitṛ na nāman su hava hvā      coday sūnṛtā pinv dhī      ud puraṃdhi īray tad vaś      yaśas bhāga kṛ mad aśvin      soma na cāru maghavan mad kṛ      amājur cit bhū tvad bhaga      anāśu cit avitṛ apama cit      andha cit nāsatya kṛśa cit      tvad id ah bhiṣaj ru cit      tvad cyavāna sanaya yathā ratha      punar yuvan caratha takṣ      niḥ taugrya vah ap pari      viśva id tad tvad savana pravac      purāṇa tvad vīrya pra brū jana      atha u ha as bhiṣaj mayobhu      tad tvad nu navya av kṛ      idam nāsatya śrath ari yathā dhā      idam tvad hvā śru mad aśvin      putra iva pitṛ mad śikṣ      an āpi a jñā asajātya amati      purā tad abhiśasti ava spṛ      tvad ratha vimada śundhyu      ni vah purumitra yoṣaṇā      tvad hava vadhrimatī gam      tvad suṣuti kṛ puraṃdhi      tvad vipra jaraṇā upe      punar kali kṛ yuvat vayas      tvad vandana ṛśyada ud vap      tvad sadyas viśpalā i kṛ      tvad ha rebha vṛṣan guhā dhā      ud īray mṛ aśvin      tvad ṛbīsa uta tap atri      omanvat kṛ saptavadhri      tvad śveta pedu aśvin aśva      navan vāja navati ca vājin      carkar dā drāvay sakha      bhaga na nṛ hvā mayobhu      na tad rājan aditi kutas cana      na aṃhas aś durita nakir bhaya      yad aśvin su hava rudravartani      puroratha kṛ patnī saha      ā tad yā manas javīyas      ratha yad tvad ṛbhu kṛ aśvin      yad yoga duhitṛ jan div      ubh ahar su dina vivasvant      tad vartis yā vi parvata      pinv śayu dhenu aśvin      vṛka cit vartikā antar āsya      tvad śacī gras muc      etad tvad stoma aśvin kṛ      takṣ bhṛgu na ratha      ni mṛj yoṣaṇā na marya      nitya na sūnu tanaya dhā 
       ratha yā kuha ka ha tvad nara      prati dyumat suvita bhūṣ      prātaryāvan vibhu viś viś      vastu vastu vah dhī śamī      kuha svid doṣā kuha vastu aśvin      kuha abhipitva kṛ kuha vas      ka tvad śayutrā vidhavā iva devara      marya na yoṣā kṛ sadhastha ā      prātar jṛ jaraṇa iva kāpā      vastu vastu yajata gam gṛha      ka dhvasra bhū ka vā nṛ      rājan putra iva savana ava gam      tvad mṛga iva vāraṇa mṛgaṇyu      doṣā vastu havis ni hvā      tvad hotrā ṛtuthā hu nṛ      iṣ jana vah śubh pati      tvad ha ghoṣā pari aśvin i      rājan vac duhitṛ pracch tvad nara      bhū mad ahar uta bhū aktu      aśvāvat rathin śak arvat      tvad kavi as pari aśvin ratha      viś na kutsa jaritṛ naśāy      tvad ha makṣā pari aśvin madhu      ās bhṛ niṣkṛta na yoṣaṇā      tvad ha bhujyu tvad aśvin vaśa      tvad śiñjāra uśanā uparch      tvad rarāvan pari sakhya ās      tvad mad avas sumna ā kan      tvad ha kṛśa tvad aśvin śayu      tvad vidh vidhavā uruṣy      tvad sani stanay aśvin      apa vraja vṛ saptan āsya      jan yoṣā patay kanīnaka      vi ca ruh vīrudh daṃsana anu      ā idam ri nivanā iva sindhu      idam ahar bhū tad patitvana      jīva rud vi may adhvara      dīrgha anu prasiti dhī nṛ      vāma pitṛ yad idam sam er      mayas pati jani pariṣvaj      na tad vid tad u su pra vac      yuvan ha yat yuvatī kṣi yoni      priya usriyā vṛṣabha retin      gṛha gam aśvin tad vaś      ā tvad gam sumati vājinīvasu      ni aśvin hṛd kāma yam      bhū gopa mithuna śubh pati      priya aryaman durya aś      tad mand manus duroṇa ā      dhā rayi saha vīra vacasyu      kṛ tīrtha su prapāṇa śubh pati      sthāṇu patheṣṭhā apa durmati han      kva svid adya katama aśvin      viś dasra māday śubh pati      ka īṃ ni yam katama gam      vipra vā yaj vā gṛha 
       samāna u tya puru hvā ukthya      ratha tri cakra savana ganīgam      parijman vidathya suvṛkti      mad vyuṣṭi uṣas hvā      prātar yuj nāsatya adhi sthā      prātar yāvan madhu vāhana ratha      viś yad gam yajvan nara      kīri cit yajña hotṛmat aśvin      adhvaryu vā madhu pāṇi suhastya      agnidh vā dhṛtadakṣa damūnas      vipra vā yat savana gam      atas ā yā madhupeya aśvin 
       astṛ iva su prataram lāya as      bhūṣ iva pra bhṛ stoma idam      vāc vipra tṛ vāc ari      ni rāmay jaritṛ soma indra      doha go upa śikṣ sakhi      pra bodhay jaritṛ jāra indra      kośa na pṛ vasu nyṛṣ      ā cyāvay magha deya śūra      kim aṅga tvad maghavan bhoja ah      śā mad śiśaya tvad śru      apnasvat mad dhī as śakra      vasu vid bhaga indra ā bhṛ mad      tvad jana mamasatya indra      saṃsthā vi hvā samīka      atra yuj kṛ yad haviṣmat      na a su sakhya vaś śūra      dhana na syandra bahula yad idam      tīvra soma ā su prayasvat      tad śatru sutuka prātar ahar      ni svaṣṭra yu han vṛtra      yad mad śaṃsa indra      yad śri maghavan kāma mad      ārāt cit as bhī idam śatru      ni idam dyumna janya nam      ārāt śatru apa bādh dūram      ugra yad śamba puruhūta tad      mad dhā yavamat gomat indra      kṛ dhī jaritṛ vāja ratna      pra yad antar vṛṣan sava gam      tīvra soma bahula anta indra      na aha dāman maghavan ni yam      ni su vah bhūri vāma      uta prahā ati dīv ji      kṛta yat śvaghnin vici kāla      yad deva kāma na dhana rudh      sam id tad rai sṛj svadhāvat      go tṛ amati dureva      yava kṣudh puruhūta viśva      mad rājan prathama dhana      asmāka vṛjana ji      bṛhaspati mad pari pā paścāt      uta uttara adharāt aghāyu      indra purastāt uta madhyatas mad      sakhi sakhi varivas kṛ 
       acchā mad indra mati svar vid      sadhryañc viśva vaś nū      pari svaj jani yathā pati      marya na śundhyu maghavan ūti      na gha tvadrik apa vī mad manas      tvad id kāma puruhūta śri      rājan iva dasma ni sad adhi barhis      idam su soma avapāna as tvad      viṣūvṛt indra amati uta kṣudh      tad id rai maghavan vasu īś      tad id idam pravaṇa saptan sindhu      vayas vṛdh vṛṣabha śuṣmin      vi na vṛkṣa su palāśa āsad      soma indra mandin camūṣad      pra idam anīka śavas davidyut      vid svar manu jyotis ārya      kṛta na śvaghnin vi ci devana      saṃvargam yat maghavan sūrya ji      na tad tvad anya anu vīrya śak      na purāṇa maghavan na uta nūtana      viś viś maghavan pari śī      jana dhenā av cākaś vṛṣan      yad aha śakra savana raṇ      tad tīvra soma sah pṛtany      ap na sindhu abhi yat sam kṣar      soma indra kulyā iva hrada      vṛdh vipra mahas idam sādana      yava na vṛṣṭi divya dānu      vṛṣan na krudh patay rajas ā      yad arya patnī kṛ idam ap      tad su maghavan jīra dānu      vid jyotis manu haviṣmat      ud jan paraśu jyotis saha      bhū ṛta sudughā purāṇa vat      vi ruc aruṣa bhānu śuci      svar na śukra śuc satpati      go tṛ amati dureva      yava kṣudh puruhūta viśva      mad rājan prathama dhana      asmāka vṛjana ji      bṛhaspati mad pari pā paścāt      uta uttara adharāt aghāyu      indra purastāt uta madhyatas mad      sakhi sakhi varivas kṛ 
       ā yā indra sva pati mada      yad dharman tuj tuviṣmat      pratvakṣ ati viśva sahas      apāra mahat vṛṣṇya      suṣṭhāman ratha su yama hari tvad      myakṣ vajra nṛpati gabhasti      śībham rājan su pathin yā arvāñc      vṛdh tvad pā vṛṣṇya      ā indra vāh nṛpati vajra bāhu      ugra ugra taviṣa enad      pratvakṣas vṛṣabha satya śuṣma      ā īṃ asmatrā sadhamād vah      eva pati droṇasāc sacetas      ūrj skambha dharuṇa ā vṛṣāy      ojas kṛ sam gṛbhāy tvad api      as yathā kenipa ina vṛdh      gam mad vasu ā hi śaṃs      su āśis bhara ā yā somin      tvad īś tad idam ā sad barhis      anādhṛṣya tvad pātra dharman      pṛthak pre prathama deva hūti      kṛ śravasya duṣṭara      na yad śak yajñiya nau āruh      īrma eva tad ni viś kepi      eva eva apāk apara as dūḍhī      aśva yad duryuj ā yuj      itthā yad prāk upara as dā      puru yatra vayuna bhojana      giri ajra rej dhāray      div krand antarikṣa kopay      samīcīna dhiṣaṇā vi skabhāy      vṛṣan pā mada uktha śaṃs      idam bhṛ su kṛ tvad aṅkuśa      yad āruj maghavan śaphāruj      idam su tvad savana as okya      su iṣṭi maghavan bhū ābhaga      go tṛ amati dureva      yava kṣudh puruhūta viśva      mad rājan prathama dhana      asmāka vṛjana ji      bṛhaspati mad pari pā paścāt      uta uttara adharāt aghāyu      indra purastāt uta madhyatas mad      sakhi sakhi varivas kṛ 
       div pari prathamam jan agni      mad dvitīyam pari jātavedas      tṛtīyam ap nṛmaṇas ajasram      indh enad jṛ svādhī      vid tvad agni tredhā traya      vid tvad dhāman vibhṛ purutrā      vid tvad nāman parama guhā yad      vid tad utsa yatas āgam      samudra tvad nṛmaṇas ap antar      nṛ cakṣas indh div agni ūdhas      tṛtīya tvad rajas sthā      ap upastha mahiṣa vṛdh      krand agni stanay iva div      kṣam rerih vīrudh samañj      sadyas jan vi hi iṃ indh khyā      ā rodas bhānu bhā antar      śrī udāra dharuṇa rayi      manīṣā prārpaṇa soma gopā      vasu sūnu sahas ap rājan      vi bhā agra uṣas indh      viśva ketu bhuvana garbha      ā rodasī pṛ jan      vīḍu cit adri bhid pare      jana yat agni yaj pañcan      uśij pāvaka arati sumedhas      marta agni amṛta ni dhā      ṛch dhūma aruṣa bharibhṛ      ud śukra śocis div inakṣ      dṛś rukma urviyā vi dyut      durmarṣa āyus śrī ruc      agni amṛta bhū vayas      yat enad div janay su retas      yad tvad adya kṛ bhadra śoci      apūpa deva ghṛtavat agni      pra tad nī prataram vasyas acchā      abhi sumna deva bhaj yaviṣṭha      ā tad bhaj sauśravasa agni      uktha uktha ā bhaj śaṃs      priya sūrya priya agni bhū      ud jan bhid ud jan      tvad agni yaj anu div      viśva vasu dhā vārya      tvad saha draviṇa iṣ      vraja gomat uśija vi vṛ      stu agni nṛ su śeva      vaiśvānara ṛṣi soma gopā      a dveṣa dyāvāpṛthivī hvā      deva dhā rayi mad su vīra 
       pra hotṛ jan mahat nabhas vid      nṛṣadvan sad ap upastha      dadhi yad dhā tad tvad vayas      yam vasu vidh tanū pā      idam vidh ap sadhastha      paśu na naś pada anu gam      guhā cat uśij namas      iṣ dhīra bhṛgu vid      idam trita bhūri vid iṣ      vaibhūvasa mūrdhan aghnyā      tad śevṛdha jan ā harmya      nābhi yuvan bhū rocana      mandra hotṛ uśij namas      prāñc yajña netṛ adhvara      viś kṛ arati pāvaka      havyavāha dhā mānuṣa      pra bhū ji mah vipodhā      mūra amūra pur darman      nī garbha van dhī dhā      hiriśmaśru na arvan dhana ṛc      ni pastyā trita stabhūy      parivye yoni sad antar      atas saṃgrah viś damūnas      vidharman ayantra ī nṛ      idam ajara dam aritra      arc dhūma agni pāvaka      śvitīci śvātra bhuraṇyu      vanarṣad vāyu na soma      pra jihvā bhṛ vepas agni      pra vayuna cetas pṛthivī      tad āyu śocay pāvaka      mandra hotṛ dhā yajiṣṭha      div yad agni pṛthivī jan āṃ      ap tvaṣṭṛ bhṛgu yad sahas      īḍ prathama mātariśvan      deva takṣ manu yajatra      yad tvad deva dhā havya vāha      puruspṛh mānuṣa yajatra      tad yāman agni stu vayas dhā      pra devay yaśas sam hi puru 
       grah tvad dakṣiṇa indra hasta      vasūyu vasu pati vasu      vid hi tvad gopati śūra go      mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā      su āyudha su avas su nīthā      catur samudra dharuṇa rayi      carkar śaṃs bhūri vāra      mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā      su brahman devavat bṛhat      uru gabhīra pṛthu budhna indra      śruta ṛṣi ugra abhimātiṣāh      mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā      san vāja vipra vīra tarutra      dhana spṛt śvi su dakṣa      dasyu han pūrbhid indra satya      mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā      aśvāvat rathin vīravat      sahasrin śatin vāja indra      bhadra vrāta vipra vīra svarṣā      mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā      pra saptagu ṛta dhīti su medhā      bṛhaspati mati acchā gā      yad āṅgirasa namas upasad      mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā      vanīvan mad dūta indra      stoma car sumati ī      hṛdispṛśa manas vañc      mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā      yad tvad yā dā tad mad indra      bṛhat kṣaya asama jana      abhi tad dyāvāpṛthivī gṛ      mad citra vṛṣan rayi dā 
       mad bhū vasu pūrvya pati      mad dhana sam ji śaśvat      mad hvā pitṛ na jantu      mad dāś vi bhaj bhojana      mad indra rodhas vakṣas atharvan      trita go janay ahi adhi      mad dasyu pari nṛmṇa ā dā      gotra śikṣ dadhyac mātariśvan      mad tvaṣṭṛ vajra takṣ āyasa      mad deva vṛj api kratu      mad anīka sūrya iva duṣṭara      mad ār kṛ kṛ ca      mad etad gavyaya aśvya paśu      purīṣin sāyaka hiraṇyaya      puru sahasra ni śā dāś      yat mad soma ukthin mad      mad indra na parā ji id dhana      na mṛtyu ava sthā kadā cana      soma id mad su yāc vasu      na mad pūru sakhya riṣ      mad etad śāśvas dvi dvi      indra yad vajra yudh kṛ      āhvā ava hanman han      dṛḍha vad a namasyu namasvin      abhi idam eka eka as niṣṣāh      abhi dvi ka u tri kṛ      khala na parṣa prati han bhūri      kim mad nind śatru an indra      mad guṅgu atithigva iṣkṛ      iṣ na vṛtra tura viś      yat parṇaya ghna uta vā karañja ha      pra mad maha vṛtra hatya śru      pra mad nami sāpya iṣ bhuj bhū      go eṣa sakhya kṛ dvitā      didyu yat idam samitha mahay      āt id enad śaṃs ukthya kṛ      pra nema dṛś soma antar      gopā nema āvis kṛ      tad tigma śṛṅga vṛṣabha yuyuts      druh sthā bahula bandh antar      āditya vasu rudriya      deva deva na mī dhāman      tad mad bhadra śavas takṣ      aparājita astṛta aṣāḍha 
       mad dā gṛ pūrvya vasu      mad brahman kṛ mad vardhana      mad bhū yaj coditṛ      ayajvan sah viśva bhara      mad dhā indra nāma devatā      div ca gam ca ap ca jantu      mad hari vṛṣaṇa vivrata raghu      mad vajra śavas dhṛṣṇu ā dā      mad atka kavi śnath hatha      mad kutsa av idam ūti      mad śuṣṇa śnathitṛ vadhar yam      na yad rā ārya nāman dasyu      mad pitṛ iva vetasu abhiṣṭi      tugra kutsa smadibha ca randhay      mad bhū yaj rājan      pra yat bhṛ tuji na priya ādhṛṣ      mad randhay mṛgaya śrutarvan      yat mad hā vayuna cana ānuṣak      mad veśa namra āyu kṛ      mad savya paḍgṛbhi randhay      mad tad yad navavāstva bṛhadratha      sam vṛtra iva dāsa vṛtrahan ruj      yat vardhay prathay ānuṣak      dūra pāra rajas rocana kṛ      mad sūrya pari yā āśu      pra etaśa vah ojas      yat mad sāva manus ah nirṇij      ṛdhak kṛṣ dāsa kṛtvya hatha      mad saptan han nahus nahuṣṭara      praśrāvay śavas turvaśa yadu      mad ni anya sahas sahas kṛ      navan vrādh navati ca vakṣay      mad saptan sravat dhāray vṛṣan      dravitnu pṛthivī sīrā adhi      mad arṇas vi tṛ su kratu      yudh vid manu gātu iṣṭi      mad tad idam dhāray yad idam na      deva cana tvaṣṭṛ dhāray ruśat      spārha go ūdhas vakṣaṇā ā      madhu madhu śvātrya soma āśir      eva deva indra vī nṛ      pra cyautna maghavan satya rādhas      viśva id tad tvad harivat śacīvat      abhi tura sva yaśas gṛ 
       pra tvad mah mad andhas      arc viśvānara viśvābhū      indra yad su makha sahas mahi      śravas nṛmṇa ca rodas sapary      tad cit nu sakhi narya ina stu      carkar indra māvat nṛ      viśva dhur vājakṛtya satpati      vṛtra vā ap abhi śūra mad      ka tad nṛ indra yad tvad iṣ      yad tvad sumna sa dhanya iyakṣ      ka tad vāja āsurya hi      ka ap sva urvarā pauṃsya      bhū tvad indra brahman mahat      bhū viśva savana yajñiya      bhū nṛ cyautna viśva bhara      jyeṣṭha ca mantra viśvacarṣaṇi      av nu kaṃ jyāyas yajñavanas      mah tvad omātrā kṛṣṭi vid      as nu kaṃ ajara vṛdh ca      viśva id etad savana tūtuma kṛ      etad viśva savana tūtuma kṛ      svayam sūnu sahas yad dhā      vara tvad pātra dharman tan      yajña mantra brahman udyam vacas      yad tvad vipra brahman kṛt suta sacā      vasu ca vasu ca dā      pra tvad sumna manas pathin bhū      mada su somya andhas 
       mahat tad ulba sthavira tad as      yad āviṣṭ praviś ap      viśva paś bahudhā tvad agni      jātavedas tanū deva eka      ka mad dṛś katama tad deva      yad mad tanū bahudhā paripaś      kva aha mitrāvaruṇa kṣi      agni viśva samidh deva yāna      iṣ tvad bahudhā jātavedas      praviś agni ap oṣadhī      tad tvad yama ci citrabhānu      daśan antaruṣya ati ruc      hotra mad varuṇa bhī i      na id eva mad yuj atra deva      tad mad tanu bahudhā niviś      etad artha na cit mad agni      e manu devayu yajña kāma      araṃkṛ tamas kṣi agni      su ga pathin kṛ deva yāna      vah havya sumanasyamāna      agni pūrva bhrātṛ artha etad      rathin iva adhvan anu āvarvṛt      tad bhī varuṇa dūram i      gaura na kṣepnu vij jyā      kṛ tvad āyus ajara yad agni      yathā yuj jātavedas na riṣ      atha ā vah sumanasyamāna      bhāga deva havis su jan      prayāja mad anuyāja ca kevala      ūrjasvat havis dā bhāga      ghṛta cāpa puruṣa ca oṣadhi      agni ca dīrgha āyus as deva      tvad prayāja anuyāja ca kevala      ūrjasvat havis as bhāga      tvad agni yajña idam as sarva      tvad nam pradiś catur 
       viśva deva śās mad yathā iha      hotṛ vṛ man yad niṣad      pra mad brū bhāgadheya yathā tvad      yad pathin havya ā tvad vah      mad hotṛ ni sad yajīyas      viśva deva marut mad jū      ahar ahar aśvin ādhvaryava tvad      brahman samidh bhū tad āhuti tvad      idam yad hotṛ kis u tad yama      ka api ūh yat samañj deva      ahar ahar jan mās mās      atha deva dhā havyavāha      mad deva dhā havya vāha      apamlukta bahu kṛcchra car      agni vid yajña mad kalpay      pañcan yāma trivṛt saptan tantu      ā tvad yaj amṛta tva su vīra      yathā tvad deva varivas kṛ      ā bāhu vajra indra dhā      atha idam viśva pṛtanā ji      tri śata tri sahasra agni      triṃśat ca deva navan ca sapary      ukṣ ghṛta stṛ barhis idam      āt id hotṛ ni sāday 
       yad iṣ manas tad idam āgā      yajña vid parus cit      tad mad yaj devatāti yajīyas      ni hi sad antara pūrva mad      rādh hotṛ niṣad yajīyas      abhi prayas sudhita hi khyā      yaj yajñiya hanta deva      īḍ īḍ ājya      sādhu kṛ deva vīti mad adya      yajña jihvā vid guhya      tad āyus āgā surabhi vas      bhadra kṛ deva hūti mad adya      tad adya vāc prathama man      yad asura abhi deva as      ūrjād uta yajñiya      pañcan jana mad hotra juṣ      pañcan jana mad hotra juṣ      go jan uta yad yajñiya      pṛthivī mad pārthiva pā aṃhas      antarikṣa divya pā mad      tantu tan rajas bhānu anu i      jyotiṣmat pathin rakṣ dhī kṛ      an ulbaṇa ve jogū apas      manu bhū janay daivya jana      akṣānah nah uta somya      iṣkṛ raśanā ā uta piś      aṣṭāvandhura vah abhitas ratha      yad deva nī abhi priya      aśmanvat ri sam rabh      ud sthā pra tṛ sakhi      atra hā yad as aśeva      śiva mad ud tṛ abhi vāja      tvaṣṭṛ māyā vid apas apastama      bhṛ pātra deva pāna śaṃtama      śā nūnam paraśu su āyasa      yad vraśc etaśa brahmaṇaspati      as nūnam kavi sam śā      vāśī yad amṛta takṣ      vid pada guhya kṛ      yena deva amṛta tva aś      garbha yoṣā dhā vatsa āsan      apīcya manas uta jihvā      tad viśvāhā sumanas yogya abhi      siṣāsani van kāra id jiti 
       tad su tvad kīrti maghavan mahitva      yat tvad bhī rodas hvā      pra av deva ā tṛ dāsa ojas      prajā tva yat śikṣ indra      yat car tanu vṛdh      bala indra prabrū jana      māyā id tad tvad yad yuddha ah      na adya śatru nanu purā vid      ka u nu tvad mahiman sama      mad pūrva ṛṣi anta āp      yat mātṛ ca pitṛ ca sākam      janay tanū sva      catur tvad asurya nāman      adābhya mahiṣa as      tvad aṅga tad viśva vid      yad karman maghavan kṛ      tvad viśva dhā kevala      yad āvis yad ca guhā vasu      kāma id mad maghavan mā vi tṛ      tvad ājñātṛ tvad indra as dātṛ      yad dhā jyotis jyotis antar      yad sṛj madhu sam madhu      adha priya śūṣa indra manman      brahman kṛt bṛhaduktha vac 
       dūra tad nāman guhya parācais      yad tvad bhī hvā      ud stambh pṛthivī div abhīka      bhrātṛ putra maghavan tviṣ      mahat tad nāman guhya puruspṛh      yad bhū janay yad bhū      pratna jan jyotis yad idam      priya priya sam viś pañcan      ā rodas pṛ ā uta madhya      pañcan deva ṛtuśas saptan saptan      catustriṃśat purudhā vi cakṣ      sa rūpa jyotis vivrata      yat uṣas vas prathama vibhā      janay yena puṣṭa puṣṭa      yad tvad jāmi tva avara para      mahat mahat asura tva eka      vidhu drā samana bahu      yuvan as palita gṛ      deva paś kāvya mahitva      adya mṛ tad hyas sam an      śākman śāka aruṇa suparṇa      ā yad mah śūra sanāt anīḍa      yad cit satya id tad na mogha      vasu spārha uta ji uta dā      ā idam dā vṛṣṇya pauṃsya      yad vakṣ vṛtra hatya vajrin      yad karman kṛ mahan      ṛtekarmam ud jan deva      yuj karman janay viśva ojas      aśasti han viśva manas turāṣāh      pā soma div ā vṛdh      śūra niḥ yudh dham dasyu 
       idam tvad eka paras u tvad eka      tṛtīya jyotis sam viś      saṃveśana tanū cāru as      priya deva parama janitra      tanū tvad vājin tanū nī      vāma mad dhā śarman tvad      a hvṛ mah dharuṇa deva      div iva jyotis sva ā mī      vājin as vājina suvena      suvita stoma suvita div gā      suvita dharman prathama anu satya      suvita deva suvita anu patman      mahiman idam pitṛ cana īś      deva deva dhā api kratu      sam vyac uta yad tviṣ      ā idam tanū ni viś punar      sahas viśva pari kram rajas      pūrva dhāman amita mā      tanū viśva bhuvana ni yam      prasāray purudhā prajā anu      dvidhā sūnu asura svar vid      āsthāpay tṛtīya karman      sva prajā pitṛ pitrya sahas      avara dhā tantu ātan      nau na kṣodas pradiś pṛthivī      svasti ati durga viśva      sva prajā bṛhaduktha mahitva      avara dhā ā para 
       mā pra gā pathin mad      mā yajña indra somin      mā antar sthā mad arāti      yad yajña prasādhana      tantu deva ātan      tad āhu naś      manas nu ā hvā      nārāśaṃsa soma      pitṛ ca manman      ā tvad i manas punar      kratu dakṣa jīv      jyok ca sūrya dṛś      punar mad pitṛ manas      dā daivya jana      jīva vrāta sac      mad soma vrata tvad      manas tanū bhṛ      prajāvat sac 
       yat tvad yama vaivasvata      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad div yat pṛthivī      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad bhūmi catur bhṛṣṭi      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad catur pradiś      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad samudra arṇava      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad marīci pravat      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad ap yat oṣadhi      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad sūrya yat uṣas      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad parvata bṛhat      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad viśva idam jagant      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad para parāvat      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv      yat tvad bhū ca bhū ca      manas gam dūrakam      tad tvad ā vartay      iha kṣaya jīv 
       pra tṛ āyus prataram navīyas      sthātṛ iva kratumat ratha      adha cyavāna ud tu artha      parātaram su nirṛti hā      sāman nu rai nidhimat nu anna      kṛ su purudhā śravas      tad mad viśva jaritṛ mad      parātaram su nirṛti hā      abhi su ari pauṃsya bhū      div na bhūmi giri na ajra      tad mad viśva jaritṛ cit      parātaram su nirṛti hā      mā u su mad soma mṛtyu parā dā      paś nu sūrya uccar      div dhā jariman su mad as      parātaram su nirṛti hā      asunīti manas mad dhāray      jīvātu su pra tṛ mad āyus      ran mad sūrya saṃdṛś      ghṛta tvad tanū vardhay      asunīti punar mad cakṣus      punar prāṇa iha mad dhā bhoga      jyok paś sūrya uccar      anumati mṛḍay mad svasti      punar mad asu pṛthivī dā      punar div devī punar antarikṣa      punar mad soma tanū dā      punar pūṣan pathyā yad svasti      śam rodasī subandhu      yahvī ṛta mātṛ      bhṛ apa yad rapas      div pṛthivī kṣam rapas      mā u su tvad ka cana am      ava dvaka ava trika      div car bheṣaja      kṣam cariṣṇu ekaka      bhṛ apa yad rapas      div pṛthivī kṣam rapas      mā u su tvad ka cana am      sam indra īray go      anaḍuh yad āvah      uśīnarāṇī anas      bhṛ apa yad rapas      div pṛthivī kṣam rapas      mā u su tvad ka cana am 
       ā jana tveṣa saṃdṛś      māhīna upastu      gam bhṛ namas      asamāti nitośana      tveṣa niyayin ratha      bhajeratha sat pati      yad jana mahiṣa iva      atiṣṭhā pavīravat      uta a pavīravat yudh      yad ikṣvāku upa vrata      revat marāyin edh      div iva pañcan kṛṣṭi      indra kṣatra asamāti      rathaproṣṭha dhāray      div iva sūrya dṛś      agastya nadh      sapti yuj rohita      paṇi ni kram abhi      viśva rājan arādhas      idam mātṛ idam pitṛ      idam jīvātu āgam      idam tvad prasarpaṇa      subandhu e niḥ i      yathā yuga varatrā      nah dharuṇa kaṃ      eva dhṛ tvad manas      jīvātu na mṛtyu      atho ariṣṭatāti      yathā idam pṛthivī mah      dhṛ idam vanaspati      eva dhṛ tvad manas      jīvātu na mṛtyu      atho ariṣṭatāti      yama mad vaivasvata      subandhu manas ābhṛ      jīvātu na mṛtyu      atho ariṣṭatāti      nyāñc vāta ava vā      nyāñc tap sūrya      nīcīna aghnyā duh      nyāñc bhū tvad rapas      idam mad hasta bhagavat      idam mad bhagavattara      idam mad viśva bheṣaja      idam śiva abhimarśana 
       idam itthā raudra gūrta vacas      brahman kratu śacī antar āji      kṛ yad idam pitṛ maṃhaneṣṭhā      pṛ paktha ahar ā saptan hotṛ      tad id dāna dabhya van      cyavāna sūda mā vedi      tūrvayāṇa gūrtavacastama      kṣodas na retas itaūti sic      manas na yad havana tigma      vip śacī van dru      ā yad śaryā tuvi nṛmṇa idam      āśrī ādiś gabhasti      kṛṣṇa yat go aruṇī sad      div napāt aśvin hvā tvad      vī mad yajña ā gam mad anna      van na iṣ asmṛtadhru      prath yad vīrakarma iṣ      anuṣṭhā nu narya apoh      punar tad ā vṛh yad kanā      duhitṛ ā anubhṛ anarvan      madhyā yad kṛ bhū abhīka      kāma kṛ pitṛ yuvati      manānaś retas hā vī      sānu niṣic su kṛ yoni      pitṛ yat sva duhitṛ adhi skand      kṣmā retas sam gam ni sic      su ādhī janay brahman deva      vāstoṣpati vrata pā niḥ takṣ      tad īṃ vṛṣan na phena as āji      smat ā pare apa dabhra cetas      sṛ pad na dakṣiṇā parāvṛj      na tad nu mad pṛśana grah      makṣū na vahni prajā upabdi      agni na nagna upa sad ūdhas      san idhma san uta vāja      tad dhartṛ jan sahas yavīyudh      makṣū kanā sakhya navagva      ṛta vad ṛta yukti gam      dvibarhas yad upa gopa āgā      a dakṣiṇā acyuta dudukṣ      makṣū kanā sakhya navīyas      rādhas na retas ṛta id turaṇy      śuci yad tvad rekṇas āyaj      sabardugha payas usriyā      paśu yat paścā viyuti budh      iti brū vaktṛ rā      vasu vasu tva kāru anehas      viśva viṣ draviṇa upa kṣu      tad id nu idam pariṣadvan gam      puru sad nārṣada bibhits      vi śuṣṇa saṃgranth anarvan      vid puru prajan guhā yad      bhargas ha nāman uta yad deva      svar na yad triṣadhastha niṣad      agni ha nāman uta jātavedas      śru mad hotṛ ṛta hotṛ adruh      uta tya mad raudra arcimat      nāsatya indra gūrti yaj      manuṣvat vṛktabarhis rā      mandu hitaprayas viś yajyu      idam stu rājan vand vedhas      ap ca vipra tṛ sva setu      tad kakṣīvant rejay tad agni      nemi na cakra arvant raghudru      tad dvi bandhu vaitaraṇa yaṣṭṛ      sabardhu dhenu duh      sam yat mitrāvaruṇa vṛj uktha      jyeṣṭha aryaman varūtha      tad bandhu sūri div tvad      nābhānediṣṭha rap pra ven      tad mad nābhi parama idam vā gha      mad tad paścā katitha cit as      idam mad nābhi iha mad sadhastha      idam mad deva idam as sarva      dvija aha prathama ja ṛta      idam dhenu duh jan      mandra arati vibhāvan      ava sā dvi vartani vaneṣah      ūrdhva yat śreṇi na śiśu      makṣū sthira śevṛdha sū mātṛ      adha go upamāti kanā      anu śvānta ka cit pare      śru tvad su draviṇas mad tvad yaj      āśvaghna vṛdh sūnṛtā      adha tvad indra vid mad      mah rai nṛpati vajra bāhu      rakṣ ca mad maghavan pā sūri      anehas tvad harivat abhiṣṭi      adha yat rājan gaviṣṭi      sṛ saraṇyu kāru jaraṇyu      vipra preṣṭha tad hi idam bhū      parā ca vah uta pṛ enad      adha nu idam jenya puṣṭi      vṛthā ribh i tad ū nu      saraṇyu idam sūnu aśva      vipra ca as śravas ca sāti      tvad yadi sakhya mad      śardha stoma juṣ namasvat      viśvatra yad ā gir gātu      ā gir gātu dāś sūnṛtā      tad gṛ ap devavat      iti su bandhu namas sūkta      vṛdh uktha vacas ā hi nūnam      vi adhvan i payas usriyā      tad ū su mad yajatra      bhū deva ūti sa joṣa      yad vāja nī vī      yad as nicetṛ amūra 
       yad yajña dakṣiṇā samañj      indra sakhya amṛta tva aś      tad bhadra aṅgiras tvad as      prati grah mānava sumedhas      yad udaj pitṛ go maya vasu      ṛta bhid parivatsara vala      dīrgha āyu tva aṅgiras tvad as      prati grah mānava sumedhas      yad ṛta sūrya ārohay div      prathay pṛthivī mātṛ vi      suprajāstva aṅgiras tvad as      prati grah mānava sumedhas      idam nābhi vad valgu tvad gṛha      deva putra ṛṣi tad śru      subrahmaṇya aṅgiras tvad as      prati grah mānava sumedhas      virūpa id ṛṣi      tad id gambhīra vepas      tad aṅgiras sūnu      tad agni pari jan      yad agni pari jan      virūpa div pari      navagva nu daśagva aṅgirastama      sacā deva mah      indra yuj niḥ sṛj vāghant      vraja gomat aśvin      sahasra mad dā aṣṭakarṇī      śravas deva kṛ      pra nūnam jan idam      manu tokman iva ruh      yad sahasra śata aśva      sadyas dāna mah      na tad aś kaścana      div iva sānu ārabh      sāvarṇya dakṣiṇā      vi sindhu iva prath      uta dāsa pariviṣ      smaddiṣṭi go parīṇas      yadu turva ca mah      sahasra dā grāmaṇī mā riṣ manu      sūrya idam yat i dakṣiṇā      sāvarṇi deva pra tṛ āyus      yad a śram san vāja 
       parāvat yad didhiṣ āpya      manu prī janiman vivasvant      yayāti yad nahuṣya barhis      deva ās tad adhi brū mad      viśva hi tvad namasya vand      nāman deva uta yajñiya tvad      yad as jan aditi ap pari      yad pṛthivī tad mad iha śru hava      yad mātṛ madhumat pinv payas      pīyūṣa div aditi adribarhas      uktha śuṣma vṛṣabhara svapnas      tad āditya anu mad svasti      nṛ cakṣas a nimiṣ arhaṇa      bṛhat deva amṛta tva aś      jyotīratha ahi māyā anāgas      div varṣman vas svasti      samrāj yad suvṛdh yajña āyā      aparihvṛta dhā div kṣaya      tad ā vivās namas suvṛkti      āditya aditi svasti      ka tvad stoma rādh yad juṣ      viśva deva manus yati as      ka tvad adhvara tu vijan aram kṛ      yad mad pṛ ati aṃhas svasti      yad hotrā prathama ā yaj manu      samindh agni manas saptan hotṛ      tad āditya abhaya śarman yam      su ga mad kṛ su patha svasti      yad īś bhuvana pracetas      viśva sthātṛ jagat ca mantu      tad mad kṛ akṛta enas pari      adya deva pṛ svasti      bhara indra su hava hvā      aṃhas muc su kṛt daivya jana      agni mitra varuṇa sāti bhaga      dyāvāpṛthivī marut svasti      su trāman pṛthivī div anehas      su śarman aditi su praṇīti      daiva nau su aritra anāgas      asravat ā ruh svasti      viśva yajatra adhi vac ūti      trā mad dureva abhihrut      satya tvad devahūti hvā      śru deva av svasti      apa amīvā apa viśva anāhuti      apa arāti durvidatra aghāy      āre deva dveṣas mad yu      uru mad śarman yam svasti      ariṣṭa tad marta viśva edh      pra prajā jan dharman pari      yad āditya nī sunīti      ati viśva durita svasti      yad deva av vājasāti      yad śūrasāti marut dhā dhana      prātaryāvan ratha indra sānasi      ariṣyat ā ruh svasti      svasti mad pathyā dhanvan      svasti ap vṛjana svarvat      svasti mad putrakṛtha yoni      svasti rai marut dhā      svasti id hi prapatha śreṣṭha      rekṇasvat abhi yad vāma i      tad mad amā tad u araṇa ni pā      su āveśa bhū deva gopa      eva plati sūnu vṛdh tvad      viśva āditya aditi manīṣin      īśāna nṛ amartya      stu jan divya gaya 
       kathā deva katama yāman      sumantu nāman śru man      ka mṛḍ katama mad mayas kṛ      katama ūti abhi ā vṛt      kratūy kratu hṛd dhīti      ven vena patay ā diś      na marḍitṛ vid anya idam      deva mad adhi kāma yam      nara vā śaṃsa pūṣan agohya      agni deva indh abhi arc gir      sūryāmāsa candramas yama div      trita vāta uṣas aktu aśvin      kathā kavi tuvīravat ka gir      bṛhaspati vṛdh suvṛkti      aja ekapād su hava ṛkvan      ahi śru budhnya havīman      dakṣa vā aditi janman vrata      rājan mitrāvaruṇa vivās      a tṛ pathin puru ratha aryaman      saptan hotṛ viṣurūpa janman      tad mad arvant havana śrut hava      viśva śru vājin mitadru      sahasra sā medha sāti iva tman      mahat yad dhana samitha bhṛ      pra tvad vāyu ratha yuj purandhi      stoma kṛ sakhya pūṣan      tad hi deva savitṛ savīman      kratu sac sacit sacetas      tris saptan sasra nadī mahi ap      vanaspati parvata agni ūti      kṛśānu astṛ tiṣya sadhastha ā      rudra rudra rudriya hvā      sarasvatī sarayu sindhu ūrmi      mahas mahi avas i vakṣaṇa      devī ap mātṛ sūdayitnu      ghṛtavat payas madhumat mad arc      uta mātṛ bṛhat diva śru mad      tvaṣṭṛ deva jani pitṛ vacas      ṛbhukṣan vāja rathaspati bhaga      raṇva śaṃsa śaśamāna pā mad      raṇva saṃdṛṣṭi pitumat iva kṣaya      bhadra rudra marut upastuti      go as yaśas jana ā      sadā deva iḍā sac      yad mad dhī marut indra deva      dā varuṇa mitra tvad      tad pyā payas iva dhenu      kuvid gir adhi ratha vah      kuvid aṅga prati yathā cit idam mad      sajātya marut budh      nābhi yatra prathamam sam nas      tatra jāmi tva aditi dhā mad      tad hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātṛ mahi      devī deva janman yajñiya i      ubh bhṛ ubhaya bharīman      puru retas pitṛ ca sic      vi tad hotrā viśva aś vārya      bṛhaspati aramati panīyas      grāvan yatra madhuṣut vac bṛhat      vāś mati manīṣin      eva kavi tuvīravat ṛta jñā      draviṇasyu draviṇas kan      uktha atra mati ca vipra      pyā gaya divya janman      eva plati sūnu vṛdh tvad      viśva āditya aditi manīṣin      īś nṛ amartya      stu jana divya gaya 
       agni indra varuṇa mitra aryaman      vāyu pūṣan sarasvatī sajoṣas      āditya viṣṇu marut svar bṛhat      soma rudra aditi brahmaṇaspati      indra agni vṛtra hatya sat pati      mithas hi tanū samokas      antarikṣa mahi ā prā ojas      soma ghṛtaśrī mahiman īray      tad hi mahan mahat anarvan      stoma ṛch ṛta jñā ṛtāvṛdh      yad apsava arṇava citra rādhas      tad mad rā mahay sumitrya      svarṇṛ antarikṣa rocana      dyāvābhūmī pṛthivī skambh ojas      pṛkṣa iva mahay su rāti      deva stu manuṣa sūri      mitra śikṣ varuṇa dāś      yad samrāj manas na pra yu      yad dhāman dharman ruc bṛhat      yad ubh rodasī nādhas vṛ      yad go vartani parī niṣkṛta      payas duh vratanī avāratas      tad prabrū varuṇa dāś      deva dāś havis vivasvant      divakṣas agni jihvā ṛtāvṛdh      ṛta yoni vimṛś ās      div skambh ap ā kṛ ojas      yajña jan tanū ni mṛj      pari kṣi pitṛ pūrvajāvan      ṛta yoni kṣi samokas      dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇa savrata      ghṛtavat payas mahiṣa pinv      parjanyāvāta vṛṣabha purīṣin      indra vāyu varuṇa mitra aryaman      deva āditya aditi hvā      yad pārthiva divya ap yad      tvaṣṭṛ vāyu ṛbhu yad ūh      daivya hotṛ uṣas svasti      bṛhaspati vṛtra khāda sumedhas      indriya soma dhana sā u ī      brahman go aśva janay oṣadhi      vanaspati pṛthivī parvata ap      sūrya div rohay sudānu      ārya vrata visṛj adhi kṣam      bhujyu aṃhas pṛ niḥ aśvin      śyāva putra vadhrimatī jinv      kamadyū vimada vah tvad      viṣṇāpū viśvaka ava sṛj      pāvīravī tanyatu ekapād aja      div dhartṛ sindhu ap samudriya      viśva deva śru vacas mad      sarasvatī saha dhī puraṃdhi      viśva deva saha dhī puraṃdhi      manu yajatra amṛta ṛta jñā      rātiṣāc abhiṣāc svar vid      svar gir brahman sūkta juṣ      deva vasiṣṭha amṛta vand      yad viśva bhuvana abhi prasthā      tad mad rā urugāya adya      tvad pā svasti sadā mad 
       deva hvā bṛhat śravas svasti      jyotiṣkṛt adhvara pracetas      yad vṛdh pratara viśva vedas      indra jyeṣṭha amṛta ṛtāvṛdh      indra prasū varuṇa praśās      yad sūrya jyotis bhāga aś      marut gaṇa vṛjana manman dhā      māghona yajña janay sūri      indra vasu pari pā mad gaya      āditya mad aditi śarman yam      rudra rudra deva mṛḍay mad      tvaṣṭṛ mad gnā suvita jinv      aditi dyāvāpṛthivī ṛta mahat      indra viṣṇu marut svar bṛhat      deva āditya av hvā      vasu rudra savitṛ su daṃsas      sarasvant dhī varuṇa dhṛ vrata      pūṣan viṣṇu mahiman vāyu aśvin      brahman kṛt amṛta viśva vedas      śarman mad yam tri varūtha aṃhas      vṛṣan yajña vṛṣan as yajñiya      vṛṣan deva vṛṣan haviṣkṛt      vṛṣan dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvan      vṛṣan parjanya vṛṣan vṛṣa stubh      agnīṣoma vṛṣan vājasāti      puru praśaṃs vṛṣan upa brū      yad yaj vṛṣan deva yajya      tad mad śarman tri varūtha vi yam      dhṛ vrata kṣatriya yajña niṣkṛt      bṛhat diva adhvara abhiśrī      agni hotṛ ṛtasāp adruh      ap sṛj anu vṛtratūrya      dyāvāpṛthivī janay abhi vrata      ap oṣadhi vanina yajñiya      antarikṣa svar ā prā ūti      vaśa deva tanū ni mṛj      dhartṛ div ṛbhu su hasta      vātāparjanya mahiṣa tanyatu      ap oṣadhī pra tṛ mad gir      bhaga rāti vājin i mad hava      samudra sindhu rajas antarikṣa      aja ekapād tanayitnu arṇava      ahi budhnya śru vacas mad      viśva deva uta sūri mad      as tvad manu deva vīti      prāñc mad yajña pra nī sādhuyā      āditya rudra vasu sudānu      idam brahman śaṃs jinv      daivya hotṛ prathama purohita      ṛta pathin anu i sādhuyā      kṣetra pati prativeśa i      viśva deva amṛta aprayucchat      vasiṣṭha pitṛ vat vāc kṛ      deva īḍ ṛṣi vat svasti      prī iva jñāti kāma e      mad deva ava dhū vasu      deva vasiṣṭha amṛta vand      yad viśva bhuvana abhi prasthā      tad mad rā urugāya adya      tvad pā svasti sadā mad 
       idam dhī saptan śīrṣan pitṛ mad      ṛta prajan bṛhat vid      turīya svid janay viśvajanya      ayāsya uktha indra śaṃs      ṛta śaṃs ṛju dhī      div putra asura vīra      vipra pada aṅgiras dhā      yajña dhāman prathama man      haṃsa iva sakhi vāvad      aśmanmaya nahana vyas      bṛhaspati abhi kanikrad go      uta prastu ud ca vid gā      avas dvi paras eka go      guhā sthā anṛta setu      bṛhaspati tamas jyotis iṣ      ud usrā ākṛ vi hi tri vṛ      vibhid pura śayatha īṃ apāñc      niḥ tri sākam udadhi kṛt      bṛhaspati uṣas sūrya go      arka vid stanay iva div      indra vala rakṣitṛ dughā      kara iva vi kṛt rava      sveda añji āśir iṣ      roday paṇi ā go muṣ      tad īṃ satya sakhi śuc      go dhāyas vi dhanasā dardar      brahmaṇaspati vṛṣan varāha      gharma sveda draviṇa vi naś      tad satya manas gopati go      ī iṣaṇay dhī      bṛhaspati mithoavadyapa      ud usriyā sṛj sva yuj      tad vardhay mati śiva      siṃha iva nānad sadhastha      bṛhaspati vṛṣan śūrasāti      bhara bhara anu mad jiṣṇu      yadā vāja san viśva rūpa      ā div ruh uttara sadman      bṛhaspati vṛṣan vardhay      nānā as bhṛ jyotis ās      satya āśis kṛ      kīri cit hi av sva eva      paścā mṛdh apa bhū viśva      tad rodasī śru viśvaminva      indra mahan mahat arṇava      vi mūrdhan bhid arbuda      han ahi ri saptan sindhu      deva dyāvāpṛthivī prāv mad 
       udan prut na vi rakṣ      vāvad abhriya iva ghoṣa      giri bhraj na ūrmi mad      bṛhaspati abhi arka nū      sam go āṅgirasa nakṣ      bhaga iva id aryaman nī      jana mitra na dampati añj      bṛhaspati vājay āśu iva āji      sādhvarya atithin iṣira      spārha su varṇa anavadya rūpa      bṛhaspati parvata vitṛ      niḥ go vap yava iva sthivi      āpruṣāy madhu ṛta yoni      avakṣip arka ulkā iva div      bṛhaspati uddhṛ aśman go      bhūmi udan iva vi tvac bhid      apa jyotis tamas antarikṣa      udan śīpāla iva vāta aj      bṛhaspati anumṛś vala      abhra iva vāta ā kṛ ā go      yadā vala pī jasu bhid      bṛhaspati agni tapas arka      dat na jihvā pariviṣ ad      āvis nidhi kṛ usriyā      bṛhaspati man hi tya idam      nāman svari sadana guhā yad      āṇḍa iva bhid śakuna garbha      ud usriyā parvata tman aj      aśan apinah madhu pari paś      matsya na dīna udan kṣi      niḥ tad bhṛ camasa na vṛkṣa      bṛhaspati virava vikṛ      tad uṣā vid tad svar tad agni      tad arka vi bādh tamas      bṛhaspati go vapus vala      niḥ majjan na parvan bhṛ      hima iva parṇa muṣ vana      bṛhaspati kṛpay vala go      anānukṛtya apunar kṛ      yāt sūryāmāsa mithas uccar      abhi śyāva na kṛśana aśva      nakṣatra pitṛ div piś      rātri tamas dhā jyotis ahar      bṛhaspati bhid adri vid go      idam kṛ namas abhriya      yad puru anu ā nonāv      bṛhaspati tad hi go tad aśva      tad vīra tad nṛ mad vayas dhā 
       bhadra agni vadhryaśva saṃdṛś      vāma praṇīti suraṇa upeti      yat īṃ sumitra viś agra indh      ghṛta āhu jṛ davidyut      ghṛta agni vadhryaśva vardhana      ghṛta anna ghṛta u idam medana      ghṛta āhu urviyā vi prath      sūrya iva ruc sarpis āsuti      yad tvad manu yad anīka sumitra      samindh agni tad idam navīyas      tad revat śuc tad gir juṣ      tad vāja dṛ tad iha śravas dhā      yad tvad pūrvam īḍ vadhryaśva      samindh agni tad idam juṣ      tad na stipā uta bhū tanū pā      dātra rakṣ yad idam tvad mad      bhū dyumnin vādhryaśva uta gopā      mā tvad tṛ abhimāti jana      śūra iva dhṛṣṇu cyavana sumitra      pra nu vac vādhryaśva nāman      sam ajrya parvatya vasu      dāsa vṛtra ārya ji      śūra iva dhṛṣṇu cyavana jana      tvad agni pṛtanāyu abhi as      dīrgha tantu bṛhat ukṣan idam agni      sahasra starī śata nīthā ṛbhvan      dyumat dyumat nṛ mṛj      sumitra dīdī devay      tvad dhenu su dugha jātavedas      asaścat iva samanā sabarduh      tvad nṛ dakṣiṇāvat agni      sumitra indh devay      deva cit tvad amṛta jātavedas      mahiman vādhryaśva pra vac      yat sampracch mānuṣa viś i      tvad nṛ ji tvāvṛdha      pitṛ iva putra bhṛ upastha      tvad agni vadhryaśva sapary      juṣ idam samidh yaviṣṭha      uta pūrva van vrādh cit      śaśvat agni vadhryaśva śatru      nṛ ji suta somavat      samana cit dah citrabhānu      ava vrādh bhid vṛdha cit      idam agni vadhryaśva vṛtra han      sanaka prendh namas upavac      tad mad ajāmi uta vā vijāmi      abhi sthā śṛdh vādhryaśva 
       idam mad agni samidh juṣ      iḍ pada prati hary ghṛtāñc      varṣman pṛthivī su dina tvad ahar      ūrdhva bhū su kratu deva yajya      ā deva agra yāvan iha yā      narāśaṃsa viśva rūpa aśva      ṛta pathin namas miyedhas      deva devatama sūd      śaśvattama īḍ dūtya      haviṣmat manuṣya agni      vahiṣṭha aśva suvṛt ratha      deva vah ni sad iha hotṛ      vi prath deva juṣ tiryañc      dīrgha drāghman surabhi bhū mad      a hīḍ manas deva barhis      indra jyeṣṭha vaś yaj deva      div vā sānu spṛś varīyas      pṛthivī vā mātrā vi śri      vaś dvār mahina mahat      deva ratha rathayu dhāray      devī div duhitṛ su śilpa      uṣāsānaktā sad ni yoni      ā tvad deva vaś vaś      uru sad subhaga upastha      ūrdhva grāvan bṛhat agni samindh      priya dhāman aditi upastha      purohita ṛtvij yajña idam      viduṣṭara draviṇa ā yaj      tri devī barhis idam varīyas      ā sad kṛ tvad syona      manuṣvat yajña sudhita havis      iḍā devī ghṛtapadī juṣ      deva tvaṣṭṛ yat ha cāru tva naś      yat aṅgiras bhū sacābhū      tad deva pāthas upa pra vid      vaś yaj draviṇas dā su ratna      vanaspati raśanā niyu      deva pāthas upa vah vid      svad deva kṛ havis      av dyāvāpṛthivī hava mad      ā agni vah varuṇa iṣṭi mad      indra div marut antarikṣa      sad barhis viśva ā yajatra      svāhā deva amṛta māday 
       bṛhaspati prathama vāc agra      yat prer nāmadheya dhā      yad idam śreṣṭha yad aripra as      as tad idam nidhā guhā āvis      saktu iva titau pū      yatra dhīra manas vāc kṛ      atra sakhi sakhya jñā      bhadra idam lakṣmī nidhā adhi vāc      yajña vāc padavīya i      tad anu vid ṛṣi praviś      tad ābhṛ vi dhā purutrā      tad saptan rebha abhi sam nū      uta tva paś na dṛś vāc      uta tva śru na śru enad      uta u tva tanū vi sṛ      jāyā iva pati vaś su vāsas      uta tva sakhya sthirapīta ah      na enad hi api vājina      a dhenu car māyā etad      vāc śru a phala a puṣpa      yad tyaj sacivid sakhi      na tad vāc api bhāga as      yat īṃ śru alakam śru      nahi pravid su kṛ pathin      akṣaṇvat karṇavat sakhi      manas java asama bhū      ādaghna upakakṣa u tva      hrada iva snā u tva dṛś      hṛd takṣ manas java      yat brāhmaṇa saṃyaj sakhi      atra aha tva vi hā vedyā      ohabrahman vi car u tva      idam yad na arvāk na paras car      na brāhmaṇa na sutekara      tad etad vāc abhipad pāpa      sirī tantra tan a prajajñi      sarva nand yaśas āgam      sabhāsāha sakhi sakhi      kilbiṣa spṛt pituṣaṇi hi idam      aram dhā bhū vājina      ṛc tva poṣam ās puṣ      gāyatra tva gā śakvarī      brahman tva vad jan vidyā      yajña mātrā vi mā u tva 
       deva nu mad jāna      pra vac vipanyayā      uktha śaṃs      yad paś uttara yuga      brahman pati etad      sam karmāra iva ādham      deva pūrvya yuga      asat sat jan      deva yuga prathama      asat as jan      tad āśā anu jan      tad uttānapad pari      bhū jan uttānapad      bhū āśā jan      aditi dakṣa jan      dakṣa u aditi pari      aditi hi jan      dakṣa yad duhitṛ tvad      tad deva anu jan      bhadra amṛta bandhu      yat deva adas salila      su saṃrabh sthā      atra tvad nṛt iva      tīvra reṇu apa i      yat deva yati yathā      bhuvana pinv      atra samudra ā guh      ā sūrya bhṛ      aṣṭan putra aditi      yad jan tanū pari      deva upa pre saptan      parā mārtāṇḍa as      saptan putra aditi      upa pre pūrvya yuga      prajā mṛtyu      punar mārtāṇḍa ābhṛ
