       jan ugra sahas tura      mandra ojiṣṭha bahula abhimāna      vṛdh indra marut cit atra      mātṛ yat vīra dhan dhaniṣṭha      druh u niṣad pṛśana cit eva      puru śaṃsa vṛdh tad indra      abhīvṛta iva tad mahat pada      dhvānta prapitva ud ṛch garbha      ṛṣva tvad pāda pra yat gā      vṛdh vāja uta yad cit atra      tvad indra śālāvṛka sahasra      āsan dhā aśvin vṛt      samanā tūrṇi upa yā yajña      ā nāsatya sakhya vah      vasāvī indra dhāray sahasra      aśvin śūra dā magha      mad ṛta adhi prajā      sakhī indra iṣira artha      idam hi māyā upa dasyu āgā      mih pra tamra vap tamas      sanāman cit dhvasay ni idam      avahan indra uṣas yathā anas      ṛṣva gam sakhī nikāma      sākam pratiṣṭhā hṛdya han      tvad han namuci makhasyu      dāsa kṛ ṛṣi vimāya      tvad kṛ manu syona      pathin devatrā añjasā iva yā      tvad etad prā vi nāman      īśāna indra dhā gabhasti      anu tvad deva śavas mad      uparibudhna vanin kṛ      cakra yat idam ap ā niṣad      uta u tad idam madhu id chand      pṛthivī atisā yat ūdhas      payas go dhā oṣadhī      aśva i iti yat vad      ojas jan uta man enad      manyu i harmya sthā      yatas prajan indra idam vid      vi su parṇa upa sad indra      priyamedha ṛṣi nādh      apa dhvānta vṛ pṛ cakṣus      muc mad nidhā iva bandh 
       vasu vā carkar iyakṣ      dhī vā yajña vā rodasī      arvant vā yad rayimat sāti      vanu vā yad suśruṇa su śrut dhā      hava idam asura nakṣ div      śravasy manas niṃs kṣā      cakṣ yatra suvita deva      div na vāra kṛ sva      idam idam amṛta gir      sarvatāti yad kṛpaṇ ratna      dhī ca yajña ca sādh      tad mad dhā vasavya asāmi      ā tad tvad indra āyu pan      abhi yad ūrva gomanta titṛd      sakṛtsū yad puru putra mah      sahasra dhārā bṛhat dudukṣ      śacīvat indra av kṛ      an ānam damay pṛtanyu      ṛbhukṣan maghavan suvṛkti      bhṛ yad vajra narya purukṣu      yat van purutama purāṣah      ā vṛtrahan indra nāman prā      cit prāsah pati tuviṣmat      yad īṃ vaś kṛ kṛ tad 
       pra su tvad ap mahiman uttama      kāru vac sadana vivasvant      pra saptan saptan tredhā hi kram      pra sṛtvara ati sindhu ojas      pra tvad rad varuṇa yā pathin      sindhu yat vāja abhi dru tvad      bhūmi adhi pravat yā sānu      yat idam agra jagant irajy      div svana yat bhūmi upari      ananta śuṣma ud ṛch bhānu      abhra iva pra stanay vṛṣṭi      sindhu yat i vṛṣabha na roro      abhi tvad sindhu śiśu id na mātṛ      vāśra ṛṣ payas iva dhenu      rājan iva yudhvan nī tvad id sic      yat idam agra pravat inakṣ      idam mad gaṅgā yamunā sarasvatī      śutudrī stoma sac paruṣṇī ā      asiknī marudvṛdhā vitastā      ārjīkīyā śru ā suṣomā      tṛṣṭāmā prathamam yā sajūs      susartu rasā śvetyā tya      tvad sindhu kubhā gomatī krumu      mehatnū sa ratha yad ī      ṛjīti eta ruśat mahitva      pari jrayas bhṛ rajas      adabdha sindhu apas apastama      aśvā na citra vapus iva darśata      su aśva sindhu su ratha su vāsas      hiraṇyaya su kṛ vājinīvat      ūrṇāvat yuvati sīlamāvatī      uta adhi vas subhaga madhuvṛdh      sukha ratha yuj sindhu aśvin      tad vāja san idam āji      mahat hi idam mahiman panasy      adabdha sva yaśas virapśin 
       ā tvad ṛj ūrjā vyuṣṭi      indra marut rodas añj      ubh yathā mad ahar sacābhū      sadas sadas varivasyā      tad u śreṣṭha savana su      atya na hasta yam adri sotṛ      vid hi ari abhibhūti pauṃsya      mah rai cit tṛ yat arvant      tad id hi idam savana apas      yathā purā manu gātu śri      goarṇas tvāṣṭra aśva nirṇij      adhvara adhvara śri      apa han rakṣas bhaṅgurāvat      skabhāy nirṛti sidh amati      ā mad rayi sarva vīra su      devāvī bhṛ śloka adri      div cit ā tvad amavattara      vibhvan cit āśvapastara      vāyu cit ā somarabhastara      agni cit arc pitukṛttara      bhur mad yaśas su andhas      grāvan vāc divit divitmat      nṛ yatra duh kāmya madhu      āghoṣay abhitas mithastur      su soma rathira adri      niḥ idam rasa gaviṣ duh tad      duh ūdhas upasecana kaṃ      nṛ hu na marjay āsan      etad nṛ su apas bhū      yad indra su soma adri      vāma vāma tvad divya dhāman      vasu vasu tvad pārthiva su 
       abhrapruṣ na vāc pruṣ vasu      haviṣmat na yajña vi jñā      su māruta na brahman arh      gaṇa stu idam na śubh      śrī marya añji kṛ      su māruta na pūrva ati kṣap      div putra eta na yat      āditya tad akra na vṛdh      pra yad div pṛthivī na barhaṇa      tman ric abhra na sūrya      pājasvat na vīra panasyu      riśādas na marya abhidyu      tvad budhna ap na yāman      vithury na mahī śrathary      viśvapsu yajña arvāk idam su tvad      prayasvat na satrāc ā gam      tvad dhur prayuj na raśmi      jyotiṣmat na bhās vyuṣṭi      śyena na sva yaśas riśādas      prava na prasita paripruṣ      pra yat vah marut parāka      tvad mah saṃvaraṇa vasu      vid vasu rādhya      ārāt cit dveṣas sanutar yu      yad udṛc yajña adhvareṣṭhā      marut na mānuṣa dāś      revat tad vayas dhā su vīra      tad deva api gopītha as      tad hi yajña yajñiya ūma      āditya nāman śambhaviṣṭha      tad mad av manīṣā      mahas ca yāman adhvara kan 
       vipra na manman su ādhī      su ādhī na yajña svapnas      rājan na citra su saṃdṛś      kṣiti na marya arepas      agni na yad bhrājas rukma vakṣas      vāta na sva yuj sadyaūti      prajñātṛ na jyeṣṭha su nīti      su śarman na soma ṛta i      vāta na yad dhuni jigatnu      agni na jihvā virokin      varmaṇvat na yodha śimīvat      pitṛ na śaṃsa su rāti      ratha na yad ara sanābhi      ji na śūra abhidyu      vareyu na marya ghṛtapruṣ      abhisvartṛ arka na suṣṭubh      aśva na yad jyeṣṭha āśu      didhiṣu na sudānu      ap na nimna udan jigatnu      viśva rūpa aṅgiras na sāman      grāvan na sūri sindhu mātṛ      ādardira adri na viśvahā      śiśūla na krīḍi su mātṛ      mahat grāma na yāman uta tviṣ      uṣas na ketu adhvara śrī      śubhaṃyu na añji vi śvit      sindhu na bhrāj ṛṣṭi      parāvat na yojana mā      subhāga mad deva kṛ su ratna      mad stotṛ marut vṛdh      adhi stotra sakhya gā      sanāt hi tvad ratna dheya as 
       paś idam mahat mahi tva      amartya martya viś      nānā hanu vibhṛ sam bhṛ      asinvat bhas bhūri ad      guhā śiras nidhā ṛdhak akṣi      asinvat ad jihvā vana      atra idam pad sam bhṛ      uttāna hasta namas adhi viś      pra mātṛ prataram guhya iṣ      kumāra na vīrudh sṛp uru      sasa na pakva vid śuc      rih rip upastha antar      tad tvad ṛta rodas pra brū      jan mātṛ garbha ad      na mad deva martya cit      agni aṅga vicetas tad pracetas      yad idam anna tṛṣu ādhā      ājya ghṛta hu puṣ      tad sahasra akṣa vi cakṣ      agni viśvatas pratyañc as tvad      ka deva tyajas enas kṛ      agni pracch nu tvad a vid      a krīḍ krīḍ hari ad a dat      vi parvaśas kṛt go iva asi      viṣvañc aśva yuj vanejā      ṛjīti raśanā grah      kṣad mitra vasu su jan      sam ṛdh parvan vṛdh 
       agni sapti vājambhara dā      agni vīra śrutya karman niṣṭhā      agni rodas vi car samañj      agni nārī vīra kukṣi puraṃdhi      agni apnas samidh as bhadra      agni mahi rodasī ā viś      agni eka coday samad      agni vṛtra day puru      agni ha tya jṛ karṇa av      agni ap niḥ dah jarūtha      agni atri gharma uruṣy antar      agni nṛmedha prajā sṛj sam      agni dā draviṇa vīra peśas      agni ṛṣi yad sahasra san      agni div havya ā tan      agni dhāman vibhṛ purutrā      agni uktha ṛṣi vi hvā      agni nṛ yāman bādh      agni vi antarikṣa pat      agni sahasra pari yā go      agni viś īḍ mānuṣa yad      agni manus nahus vi jan      agni gāndharva pathyā ṛta      agni gavyūti ghṛta ā niṣad      agni brahman ṛbhu takṣ      agni maha vac suvṛkti      agni pra av jaritṛ yaviṣṭha      agni mahi draviṇa ā yaj 
       yad idam viśva bhuvana hu      ṛṣi hotṛ ni sad pitṛ mad      tad āśis draviṇa iṣ      prathamacchad avara ā viś      ka svid as adhiṣṭhāna      ārambhaṇa katama svid kathā as      yatas bhūmi janay viśvakarman      vi div vṛ mahina viśva cakṣas      viśvatas cakṣus uta viśvatomukha      viśvatobāhu uta viśvataspād      sam bāhu dham sam patatra      dyāvābhūmī janay deva eka      ka svid vana ka u tad vṛkṣa as      yatas dyāvāpṛthivī nistakṣ      manīṣin manas pracch id u tad      yad adhiṣṭhā bhuvana dhāray      yad tvad dhāman parama yad avama      yad madhyama viśvakarman uta idam      śikṣ sakhi havis svadhāvat      svayam yaj tanū vṛdh      viśvakarman havis vṛdh      svayam yaj pṛthivī uta div      muh anya abhitas jana      iha mad maghavan sūri as      vāc pati viśvakarman ūti      ūti vāja adya hu      tad mad viśva havana juṣ      juṣ av sādhu karman 
       cakṣus pitṛ manas hi dhīra      ghṛta enad jan nannam      yadā id anta dṛh pūrva      āt id dyāvāpṛthivī prath      viśvakarman vimanas āt vihāyas      dhātṛ vidhātṛ parama uta saṃdṛś      tad iṣṭa sam iṣ mad      yatra saptan ṛṣi paras eka ah      yad mad pitṛ janitṛ yad vidhātṛ      dhāman vid bhuvana viśva      yad deva nāmadhā eka eva      tad sampraśna bhuvana i anya      tad āyaj draviṇa sam idam      ṛṣi pūrva jaritṛ na bhūnā      asūrta sūrta rajas niṣad      yad bhūta saṃkṛ idam      paras div paras idam pṛthivī      paras deva asura yad as      kaṃ svid garbha prathama dhā ap      yatra deva saṃpaś viśva      tad id garbha prathama dhā ap      yatra deva saṃgam viśva      aja nābhi adhi eka arpay      yad viśva bhuvana sthā      na tad vid yad idam jan      anya tvad antara bhū      nīhāra prāvṛ jalpi ca      asutṛp uktha śās car 
       yad tvad manyu vidh vajra sāyaka      sahas ojas puṣ viśva ānuṣak      sah dāsa ārya tvad yuj      sahaskṛta sahas sahasvat      manyu indra manyu eva as deva      manyu hotṛ varuṇa jātavedas      manyu viś īḍ mānuṣa yad      pā mad manyu tapas sajoṣas      abhī manyu tavas tavīyas      tapas yuj vi hā śatru      amitra han vṛtra han dasyu han ca      viśva vasu ā bhṛ tvad mad      tvad hi manyu abhibhūti ojas      svayaṃbhū bhāma abhimātiṣāha      viśvacarṣaṇi sahuri sahāva      mad ojas pṛtanā dhā      a bhāga as apa pare as      tvad kratu taviṣa pracetas      tad tvad manyu akratu hīḍ mad      sva tanū bala deya mad i      idam tvad as upa mad i arvāñc      pratīcīna sahuri viśva dhāyas      manyu vajrin abhi mad ā vṛt      han dasyu uta budh āpi      abhi pre dakṣiṇatas bhū mad      adha vṛtra jaṅghan bhūri      hu tvad dharuṇa madhu agra      ubh upāṃśu prathama pā 
       tvad manyu sa ratha āruj      hṛṣ dhṛṣ marutvat      tigmeṣu āyudha saṃśā      abhi pra i nṛ agni rūpa      agni iva manyu tviṣ sah      senānī mad sahuri hvā as      han śatru vi bhaj vedas      ojas mā vi mṛdh nud      sah manyu abhimāti mad      mad ruj pra i śatru      ugra tvad pājas nanu ā rudh      vaśin vaśa nī eka ja tvad      eka bahu as manyu īḍ      viś viś yudh sam śā      akṛtta ruc tvad yuj mad      dyumat ghoṣa vijaya kṛ      vijeṣa kṛt indra iva anavabrava      mad manyu adhipā bhū iha      priya tvad nāman sahuri gṛ      vid tad utsa yatas ābhū      ābhūti sahajā vajra sāyaka      sahas bhṛ abhibhū uttara      kratu mad manyu saha medin as      mahat dhana puru hvā saṃsṛj      saṃsṛj dhana ubhaya samākṛ      mad dā varuṇa ca manyu      bhī dhā hṛdaya śatru      parāji apa ni lī 
       satya uttambh bhūmi      sūrya uttambh div      ṛta āditya sthā      div soma adhi śri      soma āditya balin      soma pṛthivī mah      atho nakṣatra idam      upastha soma ādhā      soma man pā      yat sampiṣ oṣadhi      soma yad brahman vid      na tad aś kaścana      ācchad vidhāna gup      bārhata soma rakṣ      grāvan id śru sthā      na tvad aś pārthiva      yat tvad deva prapā      tatas ā pyā punar      vāyu soma rakṣitṛ      samā māsa ākṛti      raibhī as anudeyī      nārāśaṃsī nyocanī      sūryā bhadra id vāsas      gāthā i pariṣkṛ      citti as upabarhaṇa      cakṣus as abhyañjana      div bhūmi kośa as      yat yā sūryā pati      stoma as pratidhi      kurīra chandas opaśa      sūryā aśvin vara      agni as purogava      soma vadhūyu bhū      aśvin as ubh vara      sūryā yat pati śaṃs      manas savitṛ dā      manas idam anas as      div as uta chadis      śukra anaḍuh as      yat yā sūryā gṛha      ṛc sāman abhidhā      go tvad sāmana i      śrotra tvad cakra as      div pathin cara ācāra      śuci tvad cakra yā vyāna      yā vyāna akṣa āhan      anas manasmaya sūryā      āruh pre pati      sūryā vahatu pragā      savitṛ yad avasṛj      aghā han go      arjunī pari vah      yat aśvin pracch yā      tri cakra vahatu sūryā      viśva deva anu tad tvad jñā      putra pitṛ vṛ pūṣan      yat yā śubh pati      varey sūryā upa      kva eka cakra tvad as      kva deṣṭra sthā      dvi tvad cakra sūryā      brahman ṛtuthā vid      atha eka cakra yad guhā      tad addhāti id vid      sūryā deva      mitra varuṇa ca      yad bhū pracetas      idam tad kṛ namas      pūrva apara car māyā etad      śiśu krīḍ pari yā adhvara      viśva anya bhuvana abhicakṣ      ṛtu anya vidhā jan punar      nava nava bhū jan      ahar ketu uṣas i agra      bhāga deva vi dhā e      pra candramas tṛ dīrgha āyus      su kiṃśuka śalmali viśva rūpa      hiraṇya varṇa suvṛt su cakra      ā ruh sūryā amṛta loka      syona pati vahatu kṛ      ud īr atas pativat hi etad      viśvāvasu namas gir īḍ      anya iṣ pitṛṣad vyakta      tad tvad bhāga janus tad vid      ud īr atas viśvāvasu      namas iḍā mah tvad      anya iṣ prapharvī      sam jāyā pati sṛj      anṛkṣara ṛju as pathin      yad sakhi i mad varey      sam aryaman sam bhaga mad nī      sam jāspatya suyama as deva      pra tvad muc varuṇa pāśa      yad tvad bandh savitṛ su śeva      ṛta yoni sukṛta loka      ariṣṭa tvad saha pati dhā      pre muc na amutas      su bandh amutas kṛ      yathā idam indra mīḍhvas      su putra subhaga as      pūṣan tvad itas nī hasta grah      aśvin tvad pra vah ratha      gṛha gam gṛha patnī yathā as      vaśin tvad vidatha ā vad      iha priya prajā tvad sam ṛdh      idam gṛha gārhapatya jāgṛ      idam pati tanū sam sṛj      adha jivri vidatha ā vad      nīla lohita bhū      kṛtyā āsakti vi añj      edh idam jñāti      pati bandha bandh      parā dā śāmulya      brahman vi bhaj vasu      kṛtyā etad padvat bhū      ā jāyā viś pati      aśrīra tanū bhū      ruśat pāpā adas      pati yat vadhū vāsas      sva aṅga abhidhits      yad vadhū candra vahatu      yakṣma i jana anu      punar tad yajñiya deva      nī yatas āgam      mā vid paripanthin      yad āsad dampati      suga durga atī      apa drā arāti      su maṅgala idam vadhū      idam same paś      saubhāgya idam dā      atha asta vi parā i      tṛṣ etad kaṭuka etad      apāṣṭhavat viṣavat na etad ad      sūryā yad brahman vid      tad id vādhūya arh      āśasana viśasana      atho adhivikartana      sūryā paś rūpa      tad brahman tu śudh      grah tvad saubhaga tva hasta      mad pati jaradaṣṭi yathā as      bhaga aryaman savitṛ purandhi      mad tvad dā gārhapatya deva      tad pūṣan śivatama eray      yad bīja manuṣya vap      yad mad ūru vaś viśri      yad vaś prahṛ śepa      tvad agra pari vah      sūryā vahatu saha      punar pati jāyā      dā agni prajā saha      punar patnī agni dā      āyus saha varcas      dīrgha āyus idam yad pati      jīv śarad śata      soma prathama vid      gandharva vid uttara      tṛtīya agni tvad pati      turīya tvad manuṣya jā      soma dā gandharva      gandharva dā agni      rayi ca putra ca dā      agni mad atho idam      iha eva as mā vi viśva      viśva āyus vi aś      krīḍ putra naptṛ      mud sva gṛha      ā mad prajā janay prajāpati      ājarasāya sam añj aryaman      adurmaṅgala pati loka ā viś      śam mad bhū dvipad śam catuṣpada      aghora cakṣus a pati ghna as      śiva paśu su manas su varcas      vīrasū deva kāma syona      śam mad bhū dvipad śam catuṣpada      idam tvad indra      su putra subhaga kṛ      daśan idam putra ā dhā      pati ekādaśa kṛ      samrājñī śvaśura bhū      samrājñī śvaśrū bhū      nanāndṛ samrājñī bhū      samrājñī adhi devṛ      sam añj viśva deva      sam ap hṛdaya mad      sam mātariśvan sam dhātṛ      sam u deṣṭrī dhā mad 
       vi hi sotu sṛj      na indra deva man      yatra mad vṛṣākapi      ari puṣṭa mad sakhi      viśva indra uttara      parā hi indra dhāv      vṛṣākapi ati vyathis      no aha pra vid      anyatra soma pīti      viśva indra uttara      ka idam tvad vṛṣākapi      kṛ harita mṛga      yad irasy u nu      ari vā puṣṭimat vasu      viśva indra uttara      yad idam tvad vṛṣākapi      priya indra abhirakṣ      śvan nu idam jabh      api karṇa varāhayu      viśva indra uttara      priya takṣ mad kapi      vyakta vi duṣ      śiras nu idam ru      na suga duṣkṛt bhū      viśva indra uttara      na mad strī subhasattara      na suyāśutara bhū      na mad praticyavīyas      na sakthi udyamīyas      viśva indra uttara      uve ambā sulābhikā      yathā iva aṅga bhū      bhasad mad ambā sakthi mad      śiras mad vi iva hṛṣ      viśva indra uttara      kim su bāhu su aṅguri      pṛthuṣṭu      kim śūra patnī mad tvad      abhi am vṛṣākapi      viśva indra uttara      avīra iva mad idam      śarāru abhi man      uta mad as vīriṇī      indra patnī marut sakhi      viśva indra uttara      saṃhotra sma purā nārī      samana vāva gam      vedhas ṛta vīriṇī      indra patnī mahīy      viśva indra uttara      indrāṇī idam nārī      subhaga mad śru      nahi idam apara cana      jaras mṛ pati      viśva indra uttara      na mad indrāṇī ran      sakhi vṛṣākapi ṛte      yad idam apya havis      priya deva gam      viśva indra uttara      vṛṣākapāyī revatī      su putra āt u su snuṣā      ghas tvad indra ukṣan      priya kācitkara havis      viśva indra uttara      ukṣan hi mad pañcadaśan      sākam pac viṃśati      uta mad ad pīvas id      ubh kukṣi pṛ mad      viśva indra uttara      vṛṣabha na tigma śṛṅga      antar yūtha roro      mantha tvad indra śam hṛd      yad tvad su bhāvayu      viśva indra uttara      na tad īś yad lamb      antarā kapṛth      tad id īś yad romaśa      niṣad vijṛmbh      viśva indra uttara      na tad īś yad romaśa      niṣad vijṛmbh      tad id īś yad lamb      antarā kapṛth      viśva indra uttara      idam indra vṛṣākapi      parasvant han vid      asi sūnā nava caru      āt āci      viśva indra uttara      idam i vicākaśat      vici dāsa ārya      pā pākasutvan      abhi dhīra cākaś      viśva indra uttara      dhanvan ca yad kṛntatra ca      kati svid tad vi yojana      nedīyas vṛṣākapi      asta e gṛha upa      viśva indra uttara      punar e vṛṣākapi      suvita kalpay      yad etad svapnanaṃśana      asta i pathin punar      viśva indra uttara      yat udañc vṛṣākapi      gṛha indra gam      kva tya pulu agha mṛga      ka gam jana yopana      viśva indra uttara      parśu ha nāma mānavī      sākam su viṃśati      bhadra bhala tya bhū      yad udara      viśva indra uttara 
       rakṣas han vājin ā ghṛ      mitra prathiṣṭha upa yā śarman      śā agni kratu samindh      tad mad divā tad riṣ pā nakta      ayas daṃṣṭra arcis yātudhāna      upa spṛś jātavedas samindh      ā jihvā mūradeva rabh      kravyād vṛj api dhā āsan      ubh ubhayāvin upa dhā daṃṣṭra      hiṃsra śā avara para ca      uta antarikṣa pari yā rājan      jambha sam dhā abhi yātudhāna      yajña iṣu saṃnam agni      vāc śalya aśani dih      tad vyadh hṛdaya yātudhāna      pratyañc bāhu prati bhañj idam      agni tvac yātudhāna bhid      hiṃsra aśani haras han enad      pra parvan jātavedas śṛ      kravyād kraviṣṇu vi ci vraśc      yatra idānīm dṛś jātavedas      sthā agni uta vā car      yat vā antarikṣa pathin pat      tad astṛ vyadh śaru śā      uta ālabh spṛ jātavedas      ālabh ṛṣṭi yātudhāna      agni pūrva ni hā śośuc      āmād kṣviṅkā tad ad enī      iha pra brū yatama tad agni      yad yātudhāna yad idam kṛ      tad ā rabh samidh yaviṣṭha      nṛ cakṣas cakṣus randhay enad      tīkṣṇa agni cakṣus rakṣ yajña      prāñc vasu pra nī pracetas      hiṃsra rakṣas abhi śośuc      mā tvad dabh yātudhāna nṛ cakṣas      nṛ cakṣas rakṣas pari paś viś      tad tri prati śṛ agra      tad agni pṛṣṭi haras śṛ      tredhā mūla yātudhāna vraśc      tris yātudhāna prasiti tvad i      ṛta yad agni anṛta han      tad arcis sphūrjay jātavedas      samakṣa enad gṛ ni vṛj      tad agni cakṣus prati dhā rebha      śaphāruj yad paś yātudhāna      atharvan vat jyotis daivya      satya dhūrvat acit ni uṣ      yad agni adya mithuna śap      yad vāc tṛṣṭa janay rebha      manyu manas śaravyā jan yad      tad vyadh hṛdaya yātudhāna      parā śṛ tapas yātudhāna      parā agni rakṣas haras śṛ      parā arcis mūradeva śṛ      parā asutṛp abhi śośuc      parā adya deva vṛjina śṛ      pratyañc enad śapatha i tṛṣṭa      vācāstena śaru ṛch marman      viśva e prasiti yātudhāna      yad pauruṣeya kravis samañj      yad aśvya paśu yātudhāna      yad aghnyā bhṛ kṣīra agni      tad śīrṣa haras api vraśc      saṃvatsarīṇa payas usriyā      tad mā aś yātudhāna nṛ cakṣas      pīyūṣa agni yatama titṛps      tad pratyañc arcis vyadh marman      viṣa go yātudhāna pā      pā ā aditi dureva      parā enad deva savitṛ dā      parā bhāga oṣadhi ji      sanāt agni mṛ yātudhāna      na tvad rakṣas pṛtanā ji      anu dah sahamūra kravyād      mā tvad heti muc daivya      tvad mad agni adharāt udaktāt      tvad paścāt uta rakṣ purastāt      prati tvad tad ajara tapiṣṭha      agha śaṃsa śośuc dah      paścāt purastāt adharāt udaktāt      kavi kāvya pari pā rājan      sakhi sakhi ajara jariman      agni marta amartya tvad mad      pari tvad agni pur mad      vipra sahasya dhā      dhṛṣat varṇa diva diva      hantṛ bhaṅgurāvat      viṣa bhaṅgurāvat      prati sma rakṣas dah      agni tigma śocis      tapus agra ṛṣṭi      prati agni mithuna dah      yātudhāna kimīdin      sam tvad śā jāgṛ      adabdha vipra manman      prati agni haras haras      śṛ viśvatas prati      yātudhāna rakṣas      bala vi ruj vīrya 
       havis pānta ajara svar vid      divispṛś āhu juṣ agni      tad bharman bhuvana deva      dharman kaṃ svadhā prath      gṛ bhuvana tamas apaguh      āvis svar bhū jan agni      tad deva pṛthivī div uta ap      raṇay oṣadhī sakhya idam      deva nu iṣ yajñiya      agni stu ajara bṛhat      yad bhānu pṛthivī div uta idam      ātan rodas antarikṣa      yad hotṛ as prathama deva juṣ      yad samañj ājya ā vṛ      tad patatrin itvara sthā jagat yad      śvātra agni kṛ jātavedas      yat jātavedas bhuvana mūrdhan      sthā agni saha rocana      tad tvad hi mati gir uktha      tad yajñiya bhū rodasiprā      mūrdhan bhū bhū nakta agni      tatas sūrya jan prātar udi      māyā u tu yajñiya etad      apas yat tūrṇi car prajñā      dṛśenya yad mahina samindh      ruc diviyoni vibhāvan      tad agni su vac vāka deva      havis viśva āhu tanū pā      su vac vāka prathama āt id agni      āt id havis janay deva      tad idam yajña bhū tanū pā      tad div vid tad pṛthivī tad ap      yad deva janay agni      yad āhu bhuvana viśva      tad arcis pṛthivī div uta idam      ṛjūy tap mahi tva      stoma hi div deva agni      jan śakti rodasiprā      tad u kṛ tredhā bhū kaṃ      tad oṣadhi pac viśva rūpa      yadā id enad dhā yajñiya      div deva sūrya āditeya      yadā cariṣṇu mithuna bhū      āt id prapaś bhuvana viśva      viśva agni bhuvana deva      vaiśvānara ketu ahar kṛ      ā yad tan uṣas vibhā      apa u vṛ tamas arcis i      vaiśvānara kavi yajñiya      agni deva janay ajurya      nakṣatra pratna a mī cariṣṇu      yakṣa adhyakṣa taviṣa bṛhat      vaiśvānara viśvahā dīdī      mantra agni kavi acchā vad      yad mahiman paribhū urvī      uta avastāt uta deva parastāt      dvi sruti śru pitṛ      mad deva uta martya      tad idam viśva ej sam i      yad antarā pitṛ mātṛ ca      dvi samyañc bhṛ car      śīrṣa jan manas vimṛś      tad pratyañc viśva bhuvana sthā      aprayucchat taraṇi bhrāj      yatra vad avara para ca      yajñanī katara mad vi vid      ā śak id sadhamāda sakhi      nakṣ yajña ka idam vi vac      kati agni kati sūrya      kati uṣa kati u svid ap      na upaspij tvad pitṛ vad      pracch tvad kavi vid kaṃ      yāvanmātra uṣas na pratīka      suparṇī vas mātariśvan      tāvat dhā upa yajña e      brāhmaṇa hotṛ avara niṣad 
       indra stu nṛtama yad mahan      vibādh rocana vi jm anta      ā yad prā carṣaṇī dhṛt varas      pra sindhu ric mahitva      tad sūrya pari uru varas      ā indra vṛt rathya iva cakra      atiṣṭhat apasya na sarga      kṛṣṇa tamas tviṣi han      samāna idam anapāvṛt arc      kṣmā div asama brahman navya      vi yad pṛṣṭha iva janiman arya      indra ci na sakhi iṣ      indra gir aniśita sarga      sarga ap sagara budhna      yad akṣa iva cakriya śacī      viṣvañc stambh pṛthivī uta div      āpāntamanyu tṛpala prabharman      dhuni śimīvat śarumat ṛjīṣin      soma viśva atasa vana      na arvāk indra pratimāna dabh      na yad dyāvāpṛthivī na dhanvan      na antarikṣa na adri soma kṣar      yat idam manyu adhi nī      śṛ vīḍu ruj sthira      han vṛtra svadhiti vana iva      ruj puras rad na sindhu      bhid giri nava id na kumbha      ā go indra kṛ sva yuj      tvad ha tya ṛṇayā indra dhīra      asi na parvan vṛjina śṛ      pra yad mitra varuṇa dhāman      yuj na jana mī mitra      pra yad mitra pra aryaman dureva      pra saṃgir pra varuṇa mī      ni amitra vadha indra tumra      vṛṣan vṛṣan aruṣa śā      indra div indra īś pṛthivī      indra ap indra id parvata      indra vṛdh indra id medhira      indra kṣema yoga hu indra      pra aktu indra pra vṛdha pra      pra antarikṣa pra samudra dhāsi      pra vāta prathas pra jm anta      pra sindhu ric pra kṣiti      pra śośuc uṣas na ketu      na ketu tvad vṛt indra heti      aśman iva vyadh div ā sṛj      tapiṣṭha heṣas droghamitra      anu aha māsa anu id vana      anu oṣadhī anu parvata      anu indra rodas vaś      anu ap hā jan      karhi svid tad tvad indra cetyā as      agha yat bhid rakṣas      mitrakrū yat śasana na go      pṛthivī āpṛk adas śī      śatrūy abhi yad mad taṃs      mahi vrādh ogaṇa indra      andha amitra tamas sac      su jyotis aktu tad abhi as      puru hi tvad savana jana      brahman mad gṛ ṛṣi      idam āghuṣ avas sahūti      tiras viśva arc yā arvāñc      eva tvad mad indra bhuj      vid sumati nava      vid vastu avas gṛ      viśvāmitra uta tvad indra nūnam      śuna hu maghavan indra      idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti      śru ugra ūti samad      han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
       sahasra śīrṣan puruṣa      sahasra akṣa sahasra pād      tad bhūmi viśvatas vṛ      ati sthā daśan aṅgula      puruṣa eva idam sarva      yad bhū yad ca bhū      uta amṛta tva īś      yat anna atiruh      etāvat idam mahiman      atas jyāyas ca pūruṣa      pāda idam viśva bhūta      tri pād idam amṛta div      tri pād ūrdhva ud i puruṣa      pāda idam iha bhū punar      tatas viṣvañc vi kram      sa aśana anaśana abhi      tad virāj jan      virāj adhi pūruṣa      tad jan ati ric      paścāt bhūmi atha u puras      yat puruṣa havis      deva yajña tan      vasanta idam as ājya      grīṣma idhma śarad havis      tad yajña barhis prokṣ      puruṣa jan agratas      tad deva yaj      sādhya ṛṣi ca yad      tad yajña sarva hu      sambhṛ pṛṣadājya      paśu tad kṛ vāyavya      āraṇya grāmya ca yad      tad yajña sarva hu      ṛc sāman jan      chandas jan tad      yajus tad jan      tad aśva jan      yad ka ca ubhaya ad      go ha jan tad      tad jan aja avi      yat puruṣa vi dhā      katidhā vi kalpay      mukha ka idam ka bāhu      ka ūru pāda vac      brāhmaṇa idam mukha as      bāhu rājanya kṛ      ūru tad idam yad vaiśya      pad śūdra jan      candramas manas jan      cakṣu sūrya jan      mukha indra ca agni ca      prāṇa vāyu jan      nābhi as antarikṣa      śīrṣan div sam vṛt      pad bhūmi diś śrotra      tathā loka kalpay      saptan idam as paridhi      tris saptan samidh kṛ      deva yat yajña tan      bandh puruṣa paśu      yajña yajña yaj deva      tad dharma prathama as      tad ha nāka mahiman sac      yatra pūrva sādhya as deva 
       sam jāgṛ jṛ indh      dama damūnas iṣay iḍ pada      viśva hotṛ havis vareṇya      vibhu vibhāvan su sakhi sakhīy      tad darśata śrī atithi gṛha gṛha      vana vana śri iva      jana jana janya na ati man      viś ā kṣi viśya viś viś      su dakṣa dakṣa kratu as su kratu      agni kavi kāvya as viśva vid      vasu vasu kṣi tvad eka id      div ca yad pṛthivī ca puṣ      prajñā agni tvad yoni ṛtviya      iḍā pada ghṛtavat āsad      ā tvad cit uṣas iva īti      arepas sūrya iva raśmi      tvad śrī varṣya iva vidyut      citra cit uṣas na ketu      yat oṣadhi abhisṛj vana ca      pari svayam ci anna āsya      tad oṣadhi dhā garbha ṛtviya      tad ap agni janay mātṛ      tad id samāna vanin ca vīrudh      antarvat ca sū ca viśvahā      vāta upadhū iṣay vaś anu      tṛṣu yat anna veviṣ viṣṭhā      ā tvad yat rathī yathā pṛthak      śardhas agni ajara dah      medhā kāra vidatha prasādhana      agni hotṛ paribhūtama mati      tad id arbha havis ā samāna id      tad id maha vṛ na anya tvad      tvad id atra vṛ tvāyu      hotṛ agni vidatha vedhas      yat devay dhā prayas tad      haviṣmat manu vṛj barhis      tvad agni hotra tvad potra ṛtviya      tvad neṣṭra tvad agnidh ṛta āyam      tvad praśāstra tvad adhvarīy      brahman ca as gṛhapati ca mad dama      yad tvad agni amṛta martya      samidh dāś uta vā haviṣkṛt      tad hotṛ bhū yā dūtya      upa brū yaj adhvarīy      idam idam mati vāc mad      ṛc gir suṣṭuti sam gam      vasūyu vasu jātavedas      vṛdh cit vardhana yad kan      idam pratna suṣṭuti navīyas      vac idam vaś śru mad      bhū antarā hṛd idam nispṛś      jāyā iva pati vaś su vāsas      yad aśva ṛṣabha ukṣan      vaśā meṣa avasṛj āhu      kīlāla pā soma pṛṣṭha vedhas      hṛd mati janay cāru agni      hu agni havis āsya tvad      sruc iva ghṛta camū iva soma      vāja sani rayi mad su vīra      praśaṃs dhā yaśasa bṛhat 
       yajña tvad rathya viśpati viś      hotṛ aktu atithi vibhāvasu      śuc śuṣka hariṇī jarbhur      vṛṣan ketu yajata div śī      idam añjaspā ubhaya kṛ      dharman agni vidatha sādhana      aktu na yahva uṣas purohita      tanū napāt aruṣa niṃs      baṭ idam nīthā vi paṇi ca man      vayā idam prahu as ad      yadā ghora amṛta tva aś      āt id jana daivya carkar      ṛta hi prasiti div uru vyacas      namas mah aramati panīyas      indra mitra varuṇa sam cit      atho bhaga savitṛ pū dakṣas      pra rudra yayin i sindhu      tiras mah aramati dhanv      yad parijman parī uru jrayas      vi roro jaṭhara viśva ukṣ      kṛ rudra marut viśvakṛṣṭi      div śyena asura nīḍi      tad cakṣ varuṇa mitra aryaman      indra deva arvaśa arvaśa      indra bhuj śaśamāna aś      aś dṛśīka vṛṣan ca pauṃsya      pra yad nu idam arhaṇa takṣ      yuj vajra nṛṣadana kāru      sūra cit ā harit idam ram      indra ā kaścit bhī tavīyas      bhīma vṛṣan jaṭhara diva      diva diva sahuri stan a bādh      stoma tvad adya rudra śikvas      kṣayadvīra namas diś      yad śiva svavat eva yāvan      div sac sva yaśas nikāman      tad hi prajā bhṛ vi śravas      bṛhaspati vṛṣabha soma jāmi      yajña atharvan prathama vi dhāray      deva dakṣa bhṛgu sam cit      tad hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri retas      narāśaṃsa catur aṅga yama aditi      deva tvaṣṭṛ draviṇas dā ṛbhukṣan      pra rodas marut viṣṇu arh      uta tya mad uśij urviyā kavi      ahi śru budhnya havīman      sūrya māsa vicar divikṣit      dhī śamī nahus idam budh      pra mad pūṣan caratha viśvadevya      ap napāt av vāyu iṣṭi      ātman vasyas abhi vāta arc      tad aśvin su hava yāman śru      viś idam abhaya adhikṣit      gir u sva yaśas gṛ      gnā viśva aditi anarvaṇa      aktu yuvan nṛmaṇas adha pati      ribh atra janus pūrva aṅgiras      grāvan ūrdhva abhi cakṣ adhvara      yad vihāyas bhū vicakṣaṇa      pāthas sumeka svadhiti vananvat 
       mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhū uru      nārī yahu na rodas sadam mad      tad mad pā sahyas      idam mad pā śvi      yajña yajña tad martya      deva sapary      yad sumna dīrghaśruttama      ā vivās enad      viśva irajyu      deva vār maha      viśva hi viśva mahas      viśva yajña yajñiya      tad gha rājan amṛta mandra      aryaman mitra varuṇa parijman      kad rudra nṛ stu      marut pūṣaṇa bhaga      uta mad nakta ap vṛṣaṇvasu      sūryāmāsa sadana sa dhanya      sacā yat sad idam      ahi budhna budhnya      uta mad deva aśvin śubh pati      dhāman mitrāvaruṇa uruṣy      mah tad rai īṣ      ati dhanvan iva durita      uta mad rudra cit mṛḍ aśvin      viśva deva rathaspati bhaga      ṛbhu vāja ṛbhukṣan      parijman viśva vedas      ṛbhu ṛbhukṣan ṛbhu vidh mada      ā tvad hari jū vājin      duṣṭara yad sāman cit      ṛdhak yajña na mānuṣa      kṛ mad ahraya deva savitṛ      tad ca stu maghavan      saha u mad indra vahni ni idam      carṣaṇi cakra raśmi na yoyu      ā idam dyāvāpṛthivī dhā mahat      mad vīra viśvacarṣaṇi śravas      pṛkṣ vāja sāti      pṛkṣ rai uta tur      etad śaṃsa indra asmayu tvad      kūcid as sahasāvat abhiṣṭi      sadā pā abhiṣṭi      med vedatā vasu      etad mad stoma tan na sūrya      dyut yāman vṛdh nṛ      saṃvanana na aśvya      taṣṭṛ iva an apacyu      vṛt yad rai      yuj idam hiraṇyaya      nemadhiti na pauṃsya      vṛthā iva viś anta      pra tad duḥśīma pṛthavāna vena      pra rāma vac asura maghavan      yad yuj pañcan śata asmayu      pathin viśrāvin idam      adhi id nu atra saptati ca saptan ca      sadyas diś tānva      sadyas diś pārthya      sadyas diś māyava 
       pra etad vad pra mad vad      grāvan vāc vad vad      yat adri parvata sākam āśu      śloka ghoṣa bhṛ indra somin      etad vad śatavat sahasravat      abhi krand harita āsan      viṣ grāvan su kṛt su kṛtyā      hotṛ cit pūrva havis adya aś      etad vad vid anā madhu      ni ūṅkhay adhi pakva āmis      vṛkṣa śākhā aruṇa bhas      tad sūbharva vṛṣabha pra iṃ ru      bṛhat vad madira mandin      indra kruś vid anā madhu      saṃrabh dhīra svasṛ nṛt      āghoṣay pṛthivī upabdi      suparṇa vāc kṛ upa div      ākhara kṛṣṇa iṣira nṛt      ni i upara niṣkṛta      puru retas dhā sūryaśvit      ugra iva pravah samāyam      sākam yuj vṛṣan bhṛ dhur      yat śvas gras ru      śru idam prothatha arvant iva      daśan avani daśan kakṣyā      daśan yoktra daśan yojana      daśan abhīśu arc ajara      daśan dhur daśan yuj vah      tad adri daśan yantra āśu      tad ādhāna pari i haryata      tad u su somya andhas      aṃśu pīyūṣa prathama bhaj      tad somād hari indra niṃs      aṃśu duh adhi ās go      tad duh pā somya madhu      indra vṛdh prath vṛṣāy      vṛṣan tvad aṃśu na kila riṣ      iḍāvat sadam id as āśay      raivatī iva mahas cāru as      yad grāvan juṣ adhvara      tṛdila atṛdila adri      aśramaṇa aśṛthita amṛtyu      anātura ajara as amaviṣṇu      su pīvas atṛṣita atṛṣṇaj      dhruva eva tvad pitṛ yuga yuga      kṣema kāma sadas na yuj      ajurya haridru      ā div rava pṛthivī śru      tad id vad adri vimocana      yāman añjaspā iva gha id upabdi      vap bīja iva dhānyākṛt      pṛc soma na mī bhas      su adhvara adhi vāc kṛ      krīḍi na mātṛ tud      vi su muc su manīṣā      vi vṛt adri cāy 
       haye jāyā manas sthā ghora      vacas miśra kṛ nu      na mad mantra anudita etad      mayas kṛ paratara ca na ahar      ka etad vāc kṛ tvad mad      prakram uṣas agriya iva      purūravas punar asta pare      durāpana vāta iva mad as      iṣu na śrī iṣudhi      asanā na raṃhi      avīra kratu vi davidyut na      urā na māyu citay dhuni      tad vasu dhā śvaśura      vayas uṣa yadi vaś antigṛha      asta nakṣ yad kan      divā nakta śnath vaitasa      tris sma mad ahar śnathay vaitasa      uta sma mad a vī pṛ      purūravas anu tvad keta e      rājan mad vīra tanū tad as      yad sujūrṇi śreṇi sumnaāpi      hradecakṣus na granthin caraṇyu      tad añji aruṇa na sṛ      śrī go na dhenu nū      sam idam jan ās gnā      uta īṃ vṛdh nadī sva gūrta      mah yat tvad purūravas raṇa      vardhay dasyu hatya deva      sacā yat idam hā atka      amānuṣa mānuṣa niṣev      apa sma mad na bhujyu      tad tras ratha spṛś na aśva      yat idam marta amṛta nispṛh      sam kṣoṇī kratu na pṛc      tad āti na tanū śubh sva      aśva na krīḍi dandaś      vidyut na yad pat davidyut      bhṛ mad apya kāmay      jan u ap narya su jan      pra urvaśī tṛ dīrgha āyus      jan itthā gopīthya hi      hi tad purūravas mad ojas      śās tvad vid ahar      na mad āśru ka abhuj vad      kadā sūnu pitṛ jan iṣ      iṣ na aśru vartay vijñā      ka dampati samanas vi      adha yat agni śvaśura dīdī      prati brū vartay aśru      aśru na krand śiva      pra tad tvad hi yad tvad mad      pare asta nahi mūra mad āp      sudeva adya prapat anāvṛt      parāvat parama gam u      adha śī nirṛti upastha      adha enad vṛka rabhasa ad      purūravas mā mṛ mā pra pat      mā tvad vṛka aśiva u ghas      na vai straiṇa sakhya as      śālāvṛka hṛdaya etad      yat virūpa car martya      vas rātri śarad catur      ghṛta stoka sakṛt ahar aś      eva idam tṛp car      antarikṣa prā rajas vimāna      upa śikṣ urvaśī vasiṣṭha      upa tvad rāti sukṛta sthā      ni vṛt hṛdaya tap mad      iti tvad deva idam ah aiḍa      yathā īṃ etad bhū mṛtyu bandhu      prajā tvad deva havis yaj      svarga u tvad api māday 
       pra tvad maha vidatha śaṃs hari      pra tvad van vanus haryata mada      ghṛta na yad hari cāru sac      ā tvad viś hari varpas gir      hari hi yoni abhi yad saṃsvar      hi hari divya yathā sadas      ā yad pṛ hari na dhenu      indra śūṣa harivat arc      tad idam vajra harita yad āyasa      hari nikāma hari ā gabhasti      dyumnin su śiprā harimanyusāyaka      indra ni rūpa harita mikṣ      div na ketu adhi dhā haryata      vyac vajra harita na raṃhi      tud ahi hari śiprā yad āyasa      sahasraśokas bhū harimbhara      tvad tvad hary upastu      pūrva indra hari keśa yajvan      tvad hary tvad viśva ukthya      asāmi rādhas hari jan haryata      tad vajrin mandin stomya mada      indra ratha vah haryata hari      puru idam savana hary      indra soma hari dhanv      aram kāma hari dhanv      sthira hi hari hari tura      arvant yad hari joṣam i      tad idam kāma harivat aś      hari śmaśāru hari keśa āyasa      turaspeya yad hari pā vṛdh      arvant yad hari vājinīvasu      ati viśva durita pṛ hari      sruva iva yad hari vipat      śiprā vāja hari dodhu      pra yat kṛ camasa marmṛj hari      pā mada haryata andhas      uta sma sadman haryata pastya      atya na vāja harivat krand      mah cit hi dhiṣaṇā hary ojas      bṛhant vayas dhā haryata cit ā      ā rodas hary mahitva      navya navya hary manman nu priya      pra pastya asura haryata go      āvis kṛ hari sūrya      ā tvad hary prayuj jana      ratha vah hari śiprā indra      pā yathā pratibhṛ madhu      hary yajña sadhamāda daśan ūṇi      pā pūrva harivat suta      atho idam savana kevala tvad      mad soma madhumat indra      satrā vṛṣan jaṭhara ā vṛṣ 
       yad oṣadhī pūrva jan      deva tri yuga purā      nu babhru mad      śata dhāman saptan ca      śata tvad ambā dhāman      sahasra uta tvad ruh      adha śata kratu tvad      idam mad agada kṛ      oṣadhī prati mud      puṣpavat      aśva iva sa jitvan      vīrudh pārayiṣṇu      oṣadhī iti mātṛ      tad tvad devī upa brū      san aśva go vāsas      ātman tvad pūruṣa      aśvattha tvad niṣadana      parṇa tvad vasati kṛ      go bhāj id kila as      yat san pūruṣa      yatra oṣadhī sam gam      rājan samiti iva      vipra tad vac bhiṣaj      rakṣohan amīva cātana      aśvāvat somāvat      ūrjay udojas      vid sarva oṣadhi      idam ariṣṭatāti      ud śuṣma oṣadhī      go goṣṭha iva īr      dhana san      ātman tvad pūruṣa      iṣkṛti nāma tvad mātṛ      atho tvad as niṣkṛti      sīra patatrin as      yad āmay niḥ kṛ      ati viśva pariṣṭhā      stena iva vraja kram      oṣadhī pra cyu      yad ka ca tanu rapas      yat idam vājay mad      oṣadhī hasta ādhā      ātman yakṣma naś      purā jīvagṛbh yathā      yad oṣadhī prasṛp      aṅga aṅga parus parus      tatas yakṣma vi bādh      ugra madhyamaśī iva      sākam yakṣma pra pat      cāṣa kikidīvi      sākam vāta dhrāji      sākam naś nihākā      anya tvad anya av      anya anya upāv      tad sarva saṃvid      idam mad prāv vacas      yad phalin yad aphala      apuṣpa yad ca puṣpin      bṛhaspati prasū      tad mad muc aṃhas      muc mad śapathya      atho varuṇya uta      atho yama paḍvīśa      sarva deva kilbiṣa      avapat vad      div oṣadhi pari      yad jīva na tad      na tad riṣ pūruṣa      yad oṣadhī soma rājñī      bahu śata vicakṣaṇa      tad tvad as uttama      aram kāma śam hṛd      yad oṣadhī soma rājñī      viṣṭhā pṛthivī anu      bṛhaspati prasū      idam sam dā vīrya      mā tvad riṣ khanitṛ      yad ca mad khan tvad      dvipad catuṣpada mad      sarva as anātura      yad ca idam upaśru      yad ca dūram parāgam      sarva saṃgam vīrudh      idam sam dā vīrya      oṣadhi sam vad      soma saha rājan      yad kṛ brāhmaṇa      tad rājan pāray      tvad uttama as oṣadhi      tvad vṛkṣa upasti      upasti as tad mad      yad mad abhidās 
       bṛhaspati prati mad devatā i      mitra vā yat varuṇa vā as pūṣan      āditya vā yat vasu marutvat      tad parjanya śaṃtanu vṛṣāy      ā deva dūta ajira cit      tvad devāpi abhi mad gam      pratīcīna prati mad ā vṛt      dhā tvad dyumat vāc āsan      mad dhā dyumat vāc āsan      bṛhaspati anamīva iṣira      yad vṛṣṭi śaṃtanu van      div drapsa madhumat ā viś      ā mad drapsa madhumat viś      indra dā adhiratha sahasra      ni sad hotra ṛtuthā yaj      deva devāpi havis sapary      ārṣṭiṣeṇa hotra ṛṣi niṣad      devāpi deva sumati cit      tad uttara adhara samudra      ap divya sṛj varṣya abhi      idam samudra adhi uttara      ap deva nivṛ sthā      tad dru ārṣṭiṣeṇa sṛj      devāpi preṣay mṛkṣiṇī      yat devāpi śaṃtanu purohita      hotra vṛ kṛpay dhī      deva śrut vṛṣṭi vani rā      bṛhaspati vāc idam yam      yad tvad devāpi śuc agni      ārṣṭiṣeṇa manuṣya samindh      viśva deva anumad      pra parjanya īray vṛṣṭimat      tvad pūrva ṛṣi gir i      tvad adhvara puru hvā viśva      sahasra adhiratha mad      ā mad yajña rohit aśva upa yā      etad agni navati navan tvad      āhu adhiratha sahasra      tad vṛdh tanū śūra puru      div mad vṛṣṭi iṣay rā      etad agni navati sahasra      sam pra yam vṛṣan indra bhāga      vid pathin ṛtuśas deva yāna      api aulāna div deva dhā      agni bādh vi mṛdh vi durgaha      apa amīvā apa rakṣas sidh      idam samudra bṛhat div mad      ap bhūman upa mad sṛj iha 
       ka mad citra iṣaṇy cit      pṛthugman vāśra vṛdh      ka tad dātu śavas vyuṣṭi      takṣ vajra vṛtra tur pinv      tad hi dyut vidyut vī sāman      pṛthu yoni asura tva sad      tad sanīḍa prasah idam      bhrātṛ na ṛte saptatha māyā      tad vāja yā apaduṣpad i      svarṣāti pari sad san      anarvan yat śatadura vedas      han śiśna deva abhi varpas bhū      tad yahu avani go arvan      hu pradhanya sasri      a pād yatra yujya a ratha      droṇī aśva īr ghṛta vār      tad rudra a śaṃs vāra ṛbhvan      hā gaya āreavadya āgā      vamra man mithuna vivavri      anna abhī roday muṣāy      tad id dāsa tuvīrava pati dan      ṣaṣ akṣa tri śīrṣan damany      idam trita nu ojas vṛdh      vip varāha ayoagra han      tad druhvan manus ūrdhvasāna      ā sū arśasāna śaru      tad nṛtama nahus mad su jan      pur bhid arh dasyu hatya      tad abhriya na yavasa udany      kṣaya gā vid mad mad      upa yat sad indu śarīra      śyena ayopāṣṭi han dasyu      tad vrādh śavasāna idam      kutsa śuṣṇa kṛpaṇa parādā      idam kavi nī śaṃs      atka yad idam san uta nṛ      idam daśasy narya idam      dasma deva varuṇa na māyin      idam kanīna ṛtu pā vid      mā araru yad catuṣpād      idam stoma auśija ṛjiśvan      vraja daray vṛṣabha pipru      su yat yajata dīdī gir      pur ī abhi varpas bhū      eva mah asura vakṣatha      vamraka pad upa sṛp indra      tad ī kṛ svasti idam      iṣ ūrj su kṣiti viśva ābhṛ 
        indra dṛh maghavan tvāvat id bhuj       iha stu suta pā bhū mad vṛdh       deva mad savitṛ prāv śru       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       bhara su bhṛ bhāga ṛtviya       pra vāyu śuci pā krand iṣṭi       gaura yad payas pīti aś       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       ā mad deva savitṛ sū vayas       ṛjūy yaj su       yathā deva pratibhūṣ pākavat       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       indra mad sumanas as viśvahā       rājan soma suvita adhi i mad       yathā yathā mitradhita saṃdhā       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       indra uktha śavas parus dhā       bṛhaspati pratarītṛ as āyus       yajña manu pramati mad pitṛ hi kaṃ       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       indra nu su kṛ daivya sahas       agni gṛha jaritṛ medhira kavi       yajña ca bhū vidatha cāru antama       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       na tvad guhā kṛ bhūri duṣkṛta       na āviṣṭya vasu deva heḍana       mākir mad deva anṛta varpas       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       apa amīvā savitṛ sū       varīyas id apa sidh adri       grāvan yatra madhuṣut vac bṛhat       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       ūrdhva grāvan vasu as sotṛ       viśva dveṣas sanutar yu       tad mad deva savitṛ pāyu īḍ       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       ūrj go yavasa pīvas ad       ṛta yad sadana kośa añj       tanū eva tanū as bheṣaja       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       kratuprāvan jaritṛ śaśvat avas       indra id bhadra pramati sutāvat       pṛ ūdhas divya yad sikti       ā sarvatāti aditi vṛ       citra tvad bhānu kratu prā abhiṣṭi       as spṛdh jaraṇi prā adhṛṣṭa       rajiṣṭha raji paśu ā go       tūtūrṣ pari agra duvasyu 
        ud budh samanas sakhi       sam agni indh bahu sanīḍa       dadhikrā agni uṣas ca devī       indrāvat avas ni hvā tvad       mandra kṛ dhī ā tan       nau aritra paraṇa kṛ       iṣkṛ āyudha aram kṛ       prāñc yajña pra nī sakhi       yuj sīra vi yuga tan       kṛ yoni vap iha bīja       gir ca śruṣṭi sabharas as mad       nedīyas id sṛṇi pakva e       sīra yuj kavi       yuga vi tan pṛthak       dhīra deva sumnayā       niḥ āhāva kṛ       sam varatrā dhā       sic avata udrin mad       suṣeka an upakṣi       iṣkṛ āhāva avata       su varatrā suṣecana       udrin sic a kṣi       prī aśva dhā ji       svasti vāha ratha id kṛ       droṇa āhāva avata aśman cakra       aṃsatra kośa sic nṛpāṇa       vraja kṛ tad hi tvad nṛpāṇa       varman sīv bahula pṛthu       pur kṛ āyasa adhṛṣṭa       mā tvad sru camasa dṛh tad       ā tvad dhī yajñiya vṛt ūti       deva deva yajata yajñiya iha       tad mad duh yavasa iva gam       sahasra dhārā payas mah go       ā tu sic hari īṃ dru upastha       vāśī takṣ aśmanmaya       pari svaj daśan kakṣyā       ubh dhur prati vahni yuj       ubh dhur vahni āpibd       antar yoni iva car dvi jānī       vanaspati vana āsthāpay       ni su dhā a khan utsa       kapṛth nṛ kapṛth ud dhā       coday khud vājasāti       niṣṭigrī putra ā cyāvay ūti       indra sabādh iha soma pīti 
        pra tvad ratha mithūkṛt       indra av dhṛṣṇuyā       idam āji puruhūta śravāyya       dhana bhakṣa mad av       ud sma vāta vah vāsas idam       adhiratha yat ji sahasra       rathī bhū mudgalānī gaviṣṭi       bhara kṛta vi ci indrasenā       antar yam jighāṃs       vajra indra abhidās       dāsa vā maghavan ārya vā       sanutar yavay vadha       udan hrada pā jarhṛṣ       kūṭa sma tṛh abhimāti i       pra muṣka bhāra śravas iṣ       ajira bāhu bhṛ siṣās       ni kranday upe enad       mehay vṛṣabha madhya āji       tad sūbharva śatavat sahasra       go mudgala pradhana ji       kakardu vṛṣabha yuj as       vāvac sārathi idam keśin       dudhi yuj dru saha anas       ṛch sma niṣpad mudgalānī       uta pradhi ud han idam vid       upayuj vaṃsaga atra śikṣ       indra ud av pati aghnyā       raṃh padyā kakudmant       śuna aṣṭrāvin car kapardin       varatrā dāru ānah       nṛmṇa kṛ bahu jana       go paś taviṣī dhā       idam tad paś vṛṣabha       kāṣṭhā madhya drughaṇa śī       yad ji śatavat sahasra       go mudgala pṛtanājya       āre agha ka nu itthā dṛś       yad yuj tad u ā sthāpay       na idam tṛṇa na udaka ā bhṛ       uttara dhur vah pradediś       parivṛj iva pati vidyā naś       pyā kūcakra iva sic       eṣaiṣya cit rathī ji       su maṅgala sinavat as sāta       tvad viśva jagant       cakṣus indra as cakṣus       vṛṣan yat āji vṛṣaṇa siṣās       coday vadhri yuj 
        āśu śā vṛṣabha na bhīma       ghanāghana kṣobhaṇa carṣaṇi       saṃkrandana animiṣa eka vīra       śata senā ji sākam indra       saṃkrandana animiṣa jiṣṇu       yutkāra duścyavana dhṛṣṇu       tad indra ji tad sah       yudh nṛ iṣu hasta vṛṣan       sa iṣu hasta sa niṣaṅgin vaśin       saṃsraṣṭṛ tad yudh indra gaṇa       saṃsṛj jit soma pā bāhuśardhin       ugra dhanvan pratihitā as       bṛhaspati pari dī ratha       rakṣas han amitra apabādh       prabhañj senā pramṛṇa yudh ji       mad as av ratha       bala vijñā sthavira pravīra       sahasvat vājin sah ugra       abhivīra abhisatvan sahas jā       jaitra indra ratha ā sthā go vid       gotra bhid go vid vajra bāhu       ji ajman pramṛ ojas       idam sajāta anu vīray       indra sakhi anu sam rabh       abhi gotra sahas gāh       adaya vīra śatamanyu indra       duścyavana pṛtanāṣāh ayudhya       mad senā av pra yudh       indra idam netṛ bṛhaspati       dakṣiṇā yajña puras i soma       deva senā abhibhañj       ji marut i agra       indra vṛṣan varuṇa rājan       āditya marut śardhas ugra       mahāmanas bhuvanacyava       ghoṣa deva ji ud sthā       ud dharṣay maghavan āyudha       ud satvan māmaka manas       ud vṛtrahan vājin vājina       ud ratha ji i ghoṣa       mad indra samṛch dhvaja       mad yad iṣu tad ji       mad vīra uttara bhū       mad u deva av hava       adas citta pratilobhay       grah aṅga apvā pare       abhi pre niḥ dah hṛd śoka       andha amitra tamas sac       pre ji nṛ       indra tvad śarman yam       ugra tvad as bāhu       anādhṛṣya yathā as 
        su soma puruhūta tvad       hari yajña upa yā tūya       tvad gir vipra vīra i       dhanv indra pā suta       ap dhū harivat pā iha       nṛ suta jaṭhara pṛ       myakṣ yad adri indra tvad       tad vṛdh mada uktha vāhas       pra ugra pīti vṛṣan ṛch satya       prayā suta haryaśva tvad       indra dhenā iha māday       dhī viśva śacī gṛ       ūti śacīvat tvad vīrya       vayas dhā uśij ṛta jña       prajāvat indra manus duroṇa       sthā gṛ sadhamādya       praṇīti tvad haryaśva suṣṭu       suṣumna puru ruc jana       maṃhiṣṭha ūti dhā       stotṛ indra tvad sūnṛtā       upa brahman harivat hari       soma yā pā su       indra tvad yajña kṣam naś       dāś as adhvara praketa       sahasra vāja abhimātiṣāh       suteraṇa maghavan suvṛkti       upa bhūṣ gir apratīta       indra namasyā jaritṛ pan       saptan ap devī suraṇa amṛkta       yad sindhu tṛ indra pūrbhid       navati srotyā navan ca sru       deva gātu manus ca vid       ap mahi abhiśasti muc       jāgṛ idam adhi deva eka       indra yad tvad vṛtratūrya kṛ       tad viśvāyu tanū puṣ       vīreṇya kratu indra su śasti       uta api dhenā puruhūta īḍ       arday vṛtra kṛ u loka       sah śakra pṛtanā abhiṣṭi       śuna hu maghavan indra       idam bhara nṛtama vājasāti       śru ugra ūti samad       han vṛtra saṃjit dhana 
        kadā vasu stotra hary       ava śmaśā rudh vār       dīrgha su vātāpya       hari yad su yuj vivrata vi       arvat anu śepa       ubh raji na keśin pati       apa indra pāpaja ā marta na       śram bhī       śubha yat yuj taviṣīvat       sacā idam indra carkar       upānasa sapary       nada vivrata śūra indra       adhi yad sthā keśavat       vyacasvat na puṣṭi       van śiprā śipriṇīvat       prastu ṛṣva ojas ṛṣva       takṣ śūra śavas       ṛbhu na kratu mātariśvan       vajra yad kṛ su hana dasyu       hirīmaśa hirīmat       a ru hanu adbhuta na rajas       ava mad vṛjina śā       ṛc van anṛc       na abrahman yajña ṛdhak juṣ tvad       ūrdhva yat tvad tretinī bhū       yajña dhur sadman       sajūs nau sva yaśas sacā idam       śrī tvad pṛśni upasecanī bhū       śrī darvī arepas       yad sva pātra sic ud       śata vā yat asurya prati tvad       sumitra itthā stu       durmitra itthā stu       av yat dasyu hatya kutsa putra       pra av yat dasyu hatya kutsa vatsa 
        ubh u nūnam tad id arthay       vi tan dhī vastra apas iva       sadhrīcīna yā pra iṃ jāgṛ       su dina iva pṛkṣ ā taṃsay       uṣṭṛ iva pharvara śri       prāyoga iva śvātrya śāsus e       dūta iva hi as yaśas jana       mā apa sthā mahiṣa iva avapāna       sākaṃyuj śakuna iva pakṣa       paśu eva citra yajus ā gam       agni iva devayu dīdī       parijman iva yaj purutrā       āpi tvad mad pitṛ iva putra       ugra iva ruc nṛpati iva turī       irya iva puṣṭi kiraṇa iva bhuji       bhuji hava ā gam       vaṃsaga iva śimbāta       mitra iva ṛta śatarā       vāja iva ucca vayas gharmyeṣṭhā       meṣa iva īṣā saparyā purīṣa       sṛṇya iva jarbhari       naitośa iva turphari parpharīka       udanya ja iva jeman maderu       tad mad jarāyu ajara marāyu       carcara jāra marāyu       kṣadman iva artha tartar ugra       ṛbhu kharamajra kharajru       vāyu na kṣi rayi       gharma iva madhu jaṭhara saneru       saneru turphari       patara iva cacara candra nirṇij       manaṛṅga mananya na jagmi       bṛhat iva gambhara pratiṣṭhā       pāda iva gādha tṛ vid       karṇa iva śāsus anu hi smṛ       aṃśa iva mad bhaj citra apnas       āraṅgara iva madhu eray       sāragha iva go nīcīna bāra       kīnāra iva sveda āsvid       kṣāma iva ūrj su yavasa sac       ṛdh stoma san vāja       ā mad mantra sa ratha iha upa yā       yaśas na pakva madhu go antar       ā bhūtāṃśa aśvin kāma prā 
        āvis bhū mahi māghona idam       viśva jīva tamas niḥ muc       mahi jyotis pitṛ dā āgā       uru pathin dakṣiṇā dṛś       uccā div dakṣiṇāvat sthā       yad aśva da saha tad sūrya       hiraṇya da amṛta tva bhaj       vāsas da soma pra tṛ āyus       daiva pūrti dakṣiṇā deva yajya       na kavāri nahi tad pṛ       atha nṛ prayam dakṣiṇā       avadya bhī bahu pṛ       śata dhārā vāyu arka svarvid       nṛ cakṣas tad abhi cakṣ havis       yad pṛ pra ca yam saṃgama       tad dakṣiṇā duh saptan mātṛ       dakṣiṇāvat prathama hvā i       dakṣiṇāvat grāmaṇī agra i       tad eva man nṛpati jana       yad prathama dakṣiṇā āvī       tad eva ṛṣi tad u brahman ah       yajñanī sāman gā uktha śās       tad śukra tanū vid tri       yad prathama dakṣiṇā rādh       dakṣiṇā aśva dakṣiṇā go dā       dakṣiṇā candra uta yad hiraṇya       dakṣiṇā anna van yad mad ātman       dakṣiṇā varman kṛ vijñā       na bhoja mṛ na nyartha i       na riṣ na vyath ha bhoja       idam yad viśva bhuvana svar ca       etad sarva dakṣiṇā idam dā       bhoja ji surabhi yoni agra       bhoja ji vadhū yad su vāsas       bhoja ji antaḥpeya surā       bhoja ji yad a hvā pre       bhoja aśva sam mṛj āśu       bhoja ās kanyā śubh       bhoja idam puṣkariṇī iva veśman       pariṣkṛ deva māna iva citra       bhoja aśva suṣṭhuvāh vah       suvṛt ratha vṛt dakṣiṇā       bhoja deva av bhara       bhoja śatru samanīka ji 
        ka iṣ saramā pra idam naś       dūra hi adhvan jaguri parācais       ka asmehiti ka paritakmyā as       katham rasā tṛ payas       indra dūtī iṣay car       mah iṣ paṇi nidhi tvad       atiṣkad bhiyas tad mad av       tathā rasā tṛ payas       kīdṛś indra saramā ka dṛśīkā       yad idam dūtī sṛ parāka       ā ca gam mitra idam dhā       atha go gopati mad bhū       na mad tad vid dabhya dabh tad       yad idam dūtī sṛ parāka       na tad guh sru gabhīra       han indra paṇi śī       idam go saramā yad iṣ       pari div anta subhaga pat       ka tvad enad ava sṛj a yudh       uta mad āyudha as tigma       asenya tvad paṇi vacas       aniṣavya tanū as pāpa       adhṛṣṭa tvad i as pathin       bṛhaspati tvad ubhayā na mṛḍ       idam nidhi saramā adri budhna       go aśva vasu ni ṛṣ       rakṣ tad paṇi yad su gopa       reku pada alakam ā gam       ā iha gam ṛṣi soma śā       ayāsya aṅgiras navagva       tad etad ūrva vi bhaj go       atha etad vacas paṇi vam id       eva ca tvad saramā āgam       prabādh sahas daivya       svasṛ tvad kṛ mā punar gā       apa tvad go subhaga bhaj       na mad vid bhrātṛ tva no svasṛ tva       indra vid aṅgiras ca ghora       go kāma mad chaday yat i       apa atas i paṇi varīyas       dūra i paṇi varīyas       ud go i mī ṛta       bṛhaspati yad vid niguh       soma grāvan ṛṣi ca vipra 
        tad vad prathama brahman kilbiṣa       akūpāra salila mātariśvan       vīḍu hara tapas ugra mayas bhū       ap devī prathama ja ṛta       soma rājan prathama brahman jāyā       punar prayam a hṛṇīy       anvartitṛ varuṇa mitra as       agni hotṛ hasta grah nī       hasta eva grah ādhi idam       brahman jāyā idam iti ced vac       na dūta prahi sthā etad       tathā rāṣṭra gup kṣatriya       deva etad vad pūrva       saptan ṛṣi tapas yad niṣad       bhīma jāyā brāhmaṇa upanī       durdhā dhā parama vyoman       brahmacārin car veviṣ viṣ       tad deva bhū eka aṅga       tena jāyā anu vid bṛhaspati       soma nī juhū na deva       punar vai deva dā       punar manuṣya uta       rājan satya kṛ       brahman jāyā punar dā       punar dā brahman jāyā       kṛ deva nikilbiṣa       ūrj pṛthivī bhaj       urugāya upās 
        samindh adya manus duroṇa       deva deva yaj jātavedas       ā ca vah mitra mahat cit       tvad dūta kavi as pracetas       tanūnapāt pathin ṛta yāna       madhu samañj svaday sujihva       manman dhī uta yajña ṛdh       devatrā ca kṛ adhvara mad       āhu īḍ vand ca       ā yā agni vasu sajoṣas       tvad deva as yahva hotṛ       tad enad yaj iṣay yajīyas       prācīna barhis pradiś pṛthivī       vastu idam vṛj agra ahar       vi u prath vitaram varīyas       deva aditi syona       vyacasvat urviyā vi śri       pati na jani śubh       devī dvār bṛhat viśvaminva       deva bhū su prāyaṇa       ā yajata upāka       uṣāsānaktā sad ni yoni       divya yoṣaṇā bṛhat su rukma       adhi śrī śukrapiś dhā       daivya hotṛ prathama su vāc       mā yajña manus yaj       pracoday vidatha kāru       prācīna jyotis pradiś diś       ā mad yajña bhāratī tūya i       iḍā manuṣvat iha cetay       tri devī barhis ā idam syona       sarasvatī su apas sad       yad idam dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī       rūpa piś bhuvana viśva       tad adya hotṛ iṣay yajīyas       deva tvaṣṭṛ iha yaj vid       upa avasṛj samañj       deva pāthas ṛtuthā havis       vanaspati śamitṛ deva agni       svad havya madhu ghṛta       sadyas jan vi mā yajña       agni deva bhū purogā       idam hotṛ pradiś ṛta vāc       svāhākṛta havis ad deva 
        manīṣin pra bhṛ manīṣā       yathā yathā mati as nṛ       indra satya ā īray kṛ       tad hi vīra girvaṇasyu vid       ṛta hi sadas dhīti dyut       sam gārṣṭeya vṛṣabha go naś       ud sthā taviṣa rava       mahat cit sam vyac rajas       indra kila śruti idam vid       tad hi jiṣṇu pathikṛt sūrya       āt menā kṛ acyuta bhū go       pati div sanajā apratīta       indra mahan mahat arṇava       vrata mī aṅgiras gṛ       puru cit ni tan rajas       dhṛ yad dharuṇa satyatāti       indra div pratimāna pṛthivī       viśva vid savana han śuṣṇa       mah cit div ātan sūrya       skambh cit kambhana skabhīyas       vajra hi vṛtrahan vṛtra stṛ       adeva śvi māyā       vi dhṛṣṇa atra dhṛṣat han       atha bhū maghavan bāhu ojas       sac yat uṣas sūrya       citra idam ketu rai vid       ā yat nakṣatra dṛś div na       punar i nakir addhā nu vid       dūram kila prathama gam idam       indra yad prasava sṛ ap       kva svid agra kva budhna idam       ap madhya kva tvad nūnam anta       sṛj sindhu ahi gras       āt id etad pra vij java       mumukṣ uta yad muc       adha id etad na ram nitikta       sadhryañc sindhu vaś iva i       sanāt jāra ār pūrbhid idam       asta ā tvad pārthiva vasu       mad gam sūnṛtā indra puru 
        indra pā pratikāma suta       prātaḥsāva tvad hi pūrva pīti       hṛṣ han śūra śatru       uktha tvad vīrya pra brū       yad tvad ratha manas javīyas       ā indra tad soma peya yā       tūya ā tvad hari pra dru       yad yā vṛṣan mad       haritvat varcas sūrya       śreṣṭha rūpa tanū sparśay       mad indra sakhi hvā       sadhrīcīna māday niṣad       yad tya tvad mahiman mada       idam mah rodas na vyac       tad oka ā hari indra yuj       priya yā priya anna acchā       yad śaśvat pā indra śatru       anānukṛtya raṇya kṛ       tad tvad puraṃdhi taviṣī ṛch       tad tvad mada su indra soma       idam tvad pātra sanavitta indra       pā soma idam śatakratu       pṛ āhāva madira madhu       yad viśva id abhihary deva       vi hi tvad indra purudhā jana       dhā prayas vṛṣabha hvā       mad tvad madhumattama       idam bhū savana tad hary       pra tvad indra pūrvya pra nūnam       vīrya vac prathama kṛ       satīna manyu adri       su vedana kṛ brahman go       ni su sad gaṇapati gaṇa       tvad ah vipratama kavi       na ṛte tvad kṛ ka cana are       are arka maghavan citra arc       mad maghavan nādh       sakhi bhū vasupati sakhi       raṇa kṛ raṇa kṛt satya śuṣma       a bhaj cit ā bhaj rai mad 
        tad idam dyāvāpṛthivī sacetas       viśva deva anu śuṣma av       yat i kṛ mahiman indriya       pā soma kratumat vṛdh       tad idam viṣṇu mahiman ojas       aṃśu dhanv madhu vi rapś       deva indra maghavan sa yāvan       vṛtra han bhū vareṇya       vṛtra yat ahi bhṛ āyudha       saṃsthā yudh śaṃsa āvid       viśva tvad atra marut saha tman       vṛdh ugra mahiman indriya       jan eva vi bādh spṛdh       prapaś vīra abhi pauṃsya raṇa       vraśc adri ava sṛj       stambh nāka svapasyā pṛthu       āt indra satrā taviṣī paty       varīyas dyāvāpṛthivī bādh       avabhṛ dhṛṣ vajra āyasa       śeva mitra varuṇa dāś       indra atra taviṣī virapśin       ṛghāy raṃhay manyu       vṛtra yat ugra vi vraśc ojas       ap bhṛ tamas parīvṛ       yad vīrya prathama kṛ       mahi tva yat sami       dhvānta tamas ava dhvaṃs han       indra mahan pūrva hūti paty       viśva deva adha vṛṣṇya tvad       vardhay somavat vacasyā       radh vṛtra ahi indra hanman       agni na jambha tṛṣu anna āvay       bhūri dakṣa vacana ṛkvan       sakhya sakhya pra vac       indra dhuni ca cumuri ca dambhay       śraddhāmanasyā śru dabhīti       tvad puru ā bhṛ su aśvya       yad man nivacana śaṃs       suga viśva durita tṛ       vid su mad urviyā gādha adya 
        gharma samanta trivṛt vi āp       tad juṣṭi mātariśvan gam       div payas didhiṣ viṣ       vid deva sahasāman arka       tri deṣṭra nirṛti upās       dīrgha śrut vi hi jñā vahni       tad ni ci kavi nidāna       para yad guhya vrata       catur kaparda yuvati su peśas       ghṛta pratīka vayuna vas       tad suparṇa vṛṣan ni sad       yatra deva dhā bhāgadheya       eka suparṇa tad samudra ā viś       tad idam viśva bhuvana vi cakṣ       tad pāka manas paś antitas       tad mātṛ rih tad u rih mātṛ       suparṇa vipra kavi vacas       eka as bahudhā kalpay       chandas ca dhā adhvara       graha soma mā dvādaśan       ṣaṭtriṃśa ca catur kalpay       chandas ca dhā ādvādaśam       yajña vimā kavi manīṣā       ṛc sāman pra ratha vartay       caturdaśan anya mahiman idam       tad dhīra vāc pra nī saptan       āpnāna tīrtha ka iha pra vac       yad pathin prapā su       sahasradhā pañcadaśan uktha       yāvat dyāvāpṛthivī tāvat id tad       sahasradhā mahiman sahasra       yāvat brahman viṣṭhā tāvat vāc       ka chandas yoga ā vid dhīra       ka dhiṣṇya prati vāc pad       ka ṛtvij aṣṭama śūra ah       hari indra ni ci ka svid       bhūmi anta pari eka car       ratha dhur yuj sthā       śrama dāya vi bhaj idam       yadā yama bhū harmya dhā 
        citra id śiśu taruṇa vakṣatha       na yad mātṛ apī dhā       anūdhas yadi jan adha ca nu       vakṣ sadyas mahi dūtya car       agni ha nāma dhā apastama       sam yad vana yu bhasman dat       abhipramur juhū su adhvara       ina na pruth yavasa vṛṣan       tad tvad vi na druṣad deva andhas       indu pruth pravap arṇava       ās vahni na śocis virapśin       mahi vrata na sarajat adhvan       vi yad tad jrayasāna ajara       dhakṣu na vāta pari as acyuta       ā raṇva yuyudhi na satvana       trita naś pra śās iṣṭi       tad id agni kaṇvatama kaṇva sakhi       ārya para antara taruṣa       agni pā gṛ agni sūri       agni dā tad avas mad       vājintama sahyas su pitrya       tṛṣu cyavāna anu jātavedas       anudra cit yad dhṛṣat vara as       mahintama dhanvan id aviṣy       eva agni marta saha sūri       vasu sahas sūnara nṛ       mitra na yad sudhita ṛtāyu       div na dyumna abhi as mānuṣa       ūrj napāt sahasāvat iti tvad       upastuta vand vṛṣan vāc       tvad stu tvad su vīra       drāghīyas āyus pratara dhā       iti tvad agni vṛṣṭihavya putra       upastuta ṛṣi vac       tad ca pā gṛ ca sūri       vaṣaṭ vaṣaṭ iti ūrdhva nakṣ       namas namas iti ūrdhva nakṣ 
        pā soma mahat indriya       pā vṛtra han śaviṣṭha       pā rai śavas hvā       pā madhu tṛp indra vṛṣ       idam pā kṣumat prasthā       indra soma vara ā su       svasti dā manas māday       arvācīna revat saubhaga       mad tvad divya soma indra       mad yad su pārthiva       mad yad varivas kṛ       mad yad nirī śatru       ā dvibarhas amina yā indra       vṛṣan hari pariṣic andhas       go ā su prabhṛ madhu       satrā khedā aruśa han vṛṣ       ni tigma bhrāśay bhrāśya       ava sthira tan yātu jū       ugra tvad sahas bala dā       pratīti śatru vigada vraśc       vi ari indra tan śravas       ojas sthira iva dhanvan abhimāti       asmadryañc vṛdh sahas       a nibhraṃś tanū vṛdh       idam havis maghavan tvad rā       prati samrāj a hṛ gṛbhāy       tvad su maghavan tvad pakva       ad indra pā ca prasthā       ad id indra prasthā idam havis       canas dhā pacata uta soma       prayasvat prati hary tvad       satya as yaj kāma       pra indra agni su vacasyā ṛch       sindhu iva preray nau arka       idam iva pari car deva       yad mad dhana dā udbhid ca 
        na vai u deva kṣudh id vadha dā       uta āśay upa gam mṛtyu       uta u rayi pṛ na upa das       uta a pṛ marḍitṛ na vid       yad ādhra kam pā       annavat as raphita upagam       sthira manas kṛ sev purā       uta u cit tad marḍitṛ na vid       tad id bhoja yad gṛhu dā       anna kāma car kṛśa       aram idam bhū yāmahūti       yāmahūti kṛ sakhi       na tad sakhi yad na dā sakhi       sacābhū sac pā       apa idam pre na tad oka as       pṛ anya araṇa cit iṣ       pṛ id nādh tavyas       drāghīyas anu paś pathin       ā u hi vṛt rathya iva cakra       anya anya upa sthā rai       mogha anna vid apracetas       satya brū vadha id tad tad       na aryaman puṣ no sakhi       kevala agha bhū kevala ādin       kṛṣ id phāla āśay kṛ       i adhvan apa vṛj caritra       vad brahman a vad vanīyas       pṛ āpi a pṛ abhi as       ekapād bhūyas dvipad vi kram       dvipād tripād abhi i paścāt       catuṣpād i dvipad abhisvara       saṃdṛś paṅkti upasthā       sama cit hasta na sama viṣ       saṃmātarṛ cit na sama duh       yama cit na sama vīrya       jñāti cit as na sama pṛ 
        agni han ni atrin       dīdī martya ā       sva kṣaya śuci vrata       ud sthā su āhu       ghṛta prati mud       yat tvad sruc saṃsthā       tad āhu vi ruc       agni īḍ gir       sruc pratīka añj       ghṛta agni sam añj       madhu pratīka āhu       ruc vibhāvasu       jṛ sam indh       deva havya vāhana       tad tvad hvā martya       tad marta amartya       ghṛta agni sapary       adābhya gṛhapati       adābhya śocis       agni rakṣas tvad dah       gopā ṛta dīdī       tad tvad agni pratīka       prati uṣ yātudhānī       urukṣaya dīdī       tad tvad gir urukṣaya       havyavāha sam indh       yajiṣṭha mānuṣa jana 
        iti vai iti mad manas       go aśva san iti       kuvid soma pā iti       pra vāta iva ud mad pā       ud mad pā yam       kuvid soma pā iti       ud mad pā yam       ratha aśva iva āśu       kuvid soma pā iti       upa mad mati sthā       vāśrā putra iva priya       kuvid soma pā iti       mad taṣṭṛ iva vandhura       pari hṛd mati       kuvid soma pā iti       nahi mad akṣipat cana       chand pañcan kṛṣṭi       kuvid soma pā iti       nahi mad rodas ubh       anya pakṣa cana prati       kuvid soma pā iti       abhi div mahi bhū       abhi idam pṛthivī mahī       kuvid soma pā iti       hanta mad pṛthivī idam       ni dhā iha vā iha vā       kuvid soma pā iti       oṣam id pṛthivī mad       jaṅghan iha vā iha vā       kuvid soma pā iti       div mad anya pakṣa       adhas anya kṛṣ       kuvid soma pā iti       mad as mahat maha       abhinabhyam udīṣita       kuvid soma pā iti       gṛha yā alaṃkṛ       deva havya vāhana       kuvid soma pā iti 
        tad id as bhuvana jyeṣṭha       yatas jan ugra tveṣa nṛmṇa       sadyas jan ni ri śatru       anu yad viśva mad ūma       vṛdh śavas bhūri ojas       śatru dāsa bhiyas dhā       a vyan ca vyan ca sasni       sam tvad nū prabhṛ mada       tvad kratu api vṛj viśva       dvis yat etad tris bhū ūma       svādu svādīyas svādu sṛj sam       adas su madhu madhu abhi yudh       iti cit hi tvad dhana ji       mada mada anumad vipra       ojīyas dhṛṣṇu sthira ā tan       mā tvad dabh yātudhāna dureva       tvad mad śad raṇa       prapaś yudhenya bhūri       coday tvad āyudha vacas       sam tvad śā brahman vayas       stuṣeyya puru varpas ṛbhva       inatama āptya āptya       ā dṛ śavas saptan dānu       pra sah pratimāna bhūri       ni tad dhā avara para ca       yad av avas duroṇa       ā mātṛ sthāpay jigatnu       atas i karvara puru       idam brahman bṛhaddiva vac       indra śūṣa agriya svarṣā       mah gotra kṣi svarāj       dvār ca viśva vṛ apa sva       eva mahat bṛhaddiva atharvan       vac sva tanū indra eva       svasṛ mātaribhvarī aripra       hi ca śavas vardhay ca 
        hiraṇya garbha sam vṛt agra       bhūta jan pati eka as       tad dhṛ pṛthivī div uta idam       ka deva havis vidh       yad ātman dā bala dā yad viśva       upās praśis yad deva       yad chāyā amṛta yad mṛtyu       ka deva havis vidh       yad prāṇ nimiṣ mahitva       eka id rājan jagant bhū       yad īś idam dvipad catuṣpada       ka deva havis vidh       yad idam himavant mahitva       yad samudra rasā saha ah       yad idam pradiś yad bāhu       ka deva havis vidh       yad div ugra pṛthivī ca dṛh       yad sva stambh yad nāka       yad antarikṣa rajas vimāna       ka deva havis vidh       yad krandas avas stambh       abhi īkṣ manas rej       yatra adhi sūra udi vibhā       ka deva havis vidh       ap ha yat bṛhat viśva i       garbha dhā janay agni       tatas deva sam vṛt asu eka       ka deva havis vidh       yad cit ap mahi paripaś       dakṣa dhā janay yajña       yad deva adhi deva eka as       ka deva havis vidh       mā mad hiṃs janitṛ yad pṛthivī       yad vā div satya dharman jan       yad ca ap candra bṛhat jan       ka deva havis vidh       prajāpati na tvad etad anya       viśva jan pari tad bhū       yad kāma tvad hu tad mad as       mad as pati rayi 
        vasu na citra mahas gṛ       vāma śeva atithi adviṣeṇya       tad rā śurudh viśva dhāyas       agni hotṛ gṛhapati su vīrya       juṣ agni prati hary mad vacas       viśva vid vayuna su kratu       ghṛta nirṇij brahman gā eray       tvad deva janay anu vrata       saptan dhāman parī amartya       dāś dāś su kṛt mah       su vīra rayi agni       yad tvad naś samidh tad juṣ       yajña ketu prathama purohita       haviṣmant īḍ saptan vājin       śru agni ghṛta pṛṣṭha ukṣan       pṛ deva pṛ su vīrya       tvad dūta prathama vareṇya       tad hu amṛta mad       tvad marjay marut dāś gṛha       tvad stoma bhṛgu vi ruc       iṣ duh sudughā viśva dhāyas       yajña priya yajamāna su kratu       agni ghṛta snu tris ṛta dīdī       vartis yajña parī sukratūy       tvad id idam uṣas vyuṣṭi       dūta kṛ yaj mānuṣa       tvad deva mahayāyya vṛdh       ājya agni nimṛj adhvara       ni tvad vasiṣṭha hvā vājin       gṛ agni vidatha vedhas       rāyaspoṣa yajamāna dhāray       tvad pā svasti sadā mad 
        idam vena coday pṛśni garbha       jyotis jarāyu rajas vimāna       idam ap saṃgama sūrya       śiśu na vipra mati rih       samudra ūrmi ud ṛch vena       nabhas jā pṛṣṭha haryata dṛś       ṛta sānu adhi viṣṭap bhrāj       samāna yoni abhi nū vrā       samāna pūrva abhi vaś       sthā vatsa mātṛ sanīḍa       ṛta sānu adhi kram       rih madhu amṛta vāṇī       jñā rūpa kṛp vipra       mṛga ghoṣa mahiṣa hi gam       ṛta i adhi sindhu sthā       vid gandharva amṛta nāman       apsaras jāra upasmi       yoṣā bhṛ parama vyoman       car priya yoni priya as       sad pakṣa hiraṇyaya tad vena       nāka suparṇa upa yat pat       hṛd ven abhi cakṣ tvad       hiraṇya pakṣa varuṇa dūta       yama yoni śakuna bhuraṇyu       ūrdhva gandharva adhi nāka sthā       pratyañc citra bhṛ idam āyudha       vas atka surabhi dṛś kaṃ       svar na nāman jan priya       drapsa samudra abhi yat gā       paś gṛdhra cakṣas vidharman       bhānu śukra śocis kan       tṛtīya kṛ rajas priya 
        idam mad agni upa yajña e       pañcan yāma trivṛt saptan tantu       as havyavah uta mad purogā       jyok eva dīrgha tamas āśī       adeva deva pracatā guhā i       prapaś amṛta tva i       śiva yat as aśiva hā       sva sakhya araṇa nābhi i       paś anya atithi vayā       ṛta dhāman vi mā puru       śaṃs pitṛ asura śeva       ayajñiya yajñiya bhāga i       bahu samā kṛ antar idam       indra vṛ pitṛ hā       agni soma varuṇa tad cyu       tad cyu paryāvṛt rāṣṭra tad av e       nirmāya u tya asura bhū       tvad ca mad varuṇa kāmay       ṛta rājan anṛta vivic       mad rāṣṭra ādhipatya e       idam svar idam id as vāma       idam prakāśa uru antarikṣa       han vṛtra nire soma       havis tvad as havis yaj       kavi kavi tva div rūpa āsañj       a prabhūti varuṇa niḥ ap sṛj       kṣema kṛ jani na sindhu       tad idam varṇa śuci bharibhṛ       tad idam jyeṣṭha indriya sac       tad īṃ ā kṣi svadhā mad       tad īṃ viś na rājan vṛ       bībhatsu apa vṛtra sthā       bībhatsu sayuj haṃsa ah       ap divya sakhya car       anuṣṭubh anu carcar       indra ni ci kavi manīṣā 
        mad rudra vasu car       mad āditya uta viśvadeva       mad mitrāvaruṇa ubh bhṛ       mad indra agni mad aśvin ubh       mad soma āhanas bhṛ       mad tvaṣṭṛ uta pūṣan bhaga       mad dhā draviṇa haviṣmat       haviṣmat suprāvī yajamāna su       mad rāṣṭrī saṃgamana vasu       cit prathama yajñiya       tad mad deva vi dhā purutrā       bhūri sthātra bhūri āveśay       mad tad anna ad yad vipaś       yad prāṇ yad īṃ śru vac       amantu mad tad upa kṣi       śru śruta śraddhiva tvad vad       mad eva svayam idam vad       juṣ deva uta mānuṣa       yad kāmay tad tad ugra kṛ       tad brahman tad ṛṣi tad su medhā       mad rudra dhanus ā tan       brahman dviṣ śaru han u       mad jana samad kṛ       mad dyāvāpṛthivī ā viś       mad sū pitṛ idam mūrdhan       mad yoni ap antar samudra       tatas vi sthā bhuvana anu viśva       uta adas div varṣman upa spṛś       mad eva vāta iva pra vā       ārabh bhuvana viśva       paras div paras idam pṛthivī       etāvat mahi sam bhū 
        na tad aṃhas na durita       deva aś martya       sajoṣas yad aryaman       mitra nī varuṇa       ati dviṣ       tad hi mad vṛ       varuṇa mitra aryaman       yad niḥ aṃhas tvad       pā nī ca martya       ati dviṣ       tad nūnam mad idam ūti       varuṇa mitra aryaman       nayiṣṭha u mad nī       parṣiṣṭha u mad pṛ       ati dviṣ       tvad viśva pari pā       varuṇa mitra aryaman       tvad śarman priya       as su praṇīti       ati dviṣ       āditya ati sridh       varuṇa mitra aryaman       ugra marut rudra hu       indra agni svasti       ati dviṣ       nī u su mad tiras       varuṇa mitra aryaman       ati viśva durita       rājan carṣaṇi       ati dviṣ       śuna mad ūti       varuṇa mitra aryaman       śarman yam saprathas       āditya yad i       ati dviṣ       yathā ha tya vasu gaurī cit       pad sā muc yajatra       eva u su mad muc vi aṃhas       pra tṛ agni pratara mad āyus 
        rātri vi khyā e       purutrā devī akṣa       viśva adhi śrī dhā       ā uru prā amartya       nivat devī udvat       jyotis bādh tamas       niḥ u svasṛ kṛ       uṣas devī e       apa id u hā tamas       tad mad adya yad mad       ni tvad yāman viś       vṛkṣa na vasati vi       ni grāma viś       ni padvat ni pakṣin       ni śyena cit arthin       yāvay vṛkī vṛka       yavay stena ūrmyā       atha mad sutara bhū       upa mad pepiś tamas       kṛṣṇa vyañj sthā       uṣas ṛṇa iva yātay       upa tvad go iva kṛ       vṛ duhitṛ div       rātri stoma na ji 
        mad agni varcas vihava as       mad tvad indh tanū puṣ       mad nam pradiś catur       tvad adhyakṣa pṛtanā ji       mad deva vihava as sarva       indravat marut viṣṇu agni       mad antarikṣa uru loka as       mad vāta pū kāma idam       mad deva draviṇa ā yaj       mad āśī as mad deva hūti       daivya hotṛ pūrva       ariṣṭa as tanū su vīra       mad yaj mad yad havya       ākūti satya manas mad as       enas mā ni gā katama cana mad       viśva deva adhi vac mad       devī ṣaṣ uru uru mad kṛ       viśva deva iha vīray       mā hā prajā mā tanū       mā radh dviṣ soma rājan       agni manyu pratinud para       adabdha gopā pari pā mad tvad       pratyañc i nigut punar tad       amā idam citta prabudh vi naś       dhātṛ dhātṛ bhuvana yad pati       deva trātṛ abhimātiṣāh       idam yajña aśvin ubh bṛhaspati       deva pā yajamāna nyartha       uru vyacas mad mahiṣa śarman yam       idam hava puru hvā puru kṣu       tad mad prajā haryaśva mṛḍay       indra mā mad riṣ mā parā dā       yad mad sapatna apa tad bhū       indra agni ava bādh tad       vasu rudra āditya uparispṛś mad       ugra cettṛ adhirāj kṛ 
        na asat as na u as as tadānīm       na as rajas na u vyoman paras yad       ka āvarvṛt kuha ka śarman       ambhas ka as gahana gabhīra       na mṛtyu as amṛta na tarhi       na rātri ahar as praketa       an a vāta svadhā tad eka       tad ha anya na paras ka cana as       tamas as tamas guh agra       a praketa salila sarva as idam       tucchya ābhu apidhā yad as       tapas tad mahi jan eka       kāma tad agra sam vṛt adhi       manas retas prathama yad as       as bandhu asat niḥ vid       hṛd pratīṣ kavi manīṣā       tiraścīna vitan raśmi idam       adhas svid as upari svid as       retas dhā as mahiman as       svadhā avastāt prayati parastāt       ka addhā vid ka iha pra vac       kutas ājan kutas idam visṛṣṭi       arvāk deva idam visarjana       atha ka vid yatas ābhū       idam visṛṣṭi yatas ābhū       yadi vā dhā yadi vā na       yad idam adhyakṣa parama vyoman       tad aṅga vid yadi vā na vid 
        yad yajña viśvatas tantu tan       eka śata devakarma āyam       idam ve pitṛ yad āyā       pra ve apa ve iti ās tan       puṃs enad tan ud kṛt       puṃs vi tan adhi nāka idam       idam mayūkha upa sad u sadas       sāman kṛ tasara ve       ka as pramā pratimā ka nidāna       ājya ka as paridhi ka as       chandas ka as prauga ka uktha       yat deva deva yaj viśva       agni gāyatrī bhū sayugvan       uṣṇihā savitṛ sam bhū       anuṣṭubh soma uktha mahasvat       bṛhaspati bṛhatī vāc av       virāj mitrāvaruṇa abhiśrī       indra triṣṭubh iha bhāga ahar       viśva deva jagatī ā viś       tena kﾱp ṛṣi manuṣya       kﾱp tena ṛṣi manuṣya       yajña jan pitṛ mad purāṇa       paś man manas cakṣas tad       yad idam yajña yaj pūrva       saha stoma saha chandas āvṛt       saha pramā ṛṣi saptan daivya       pūrva pathin anudṛś dhīra       anvālabh rathī na raśmi 
        apa prāñc indra viśva amitra       apa apāñc abhibhūti nud       apa udañc apa śūra adharāñc       uru yathā tvad śarman mad       kuvid aṅga yavamat yava cit       yathā dā anupūrva viyu       iha iha idam kṛ bhojana       yad barhis namovṛkti na gam       nahi sthūri ṛtuthā yā as       na uta śravas vid saṃgama       gavyat indra sakhya vipra       aśvāyat vṛṣan vājay       tvad surāma aśvin       namuci āsura sacā       vipā śubh pati       indra karman av       putra iva pitṛ aśvin ubh       indra av kāvya daṃsanā       yat surāma vi pā śacī       sarasvatī tvad maghavan bhiṣaj       indra sutrāman svavat avas       su mṛḍīka bhū viśva vedas       bādh dveṣas abhaya kṛ       su vīrya pati as       tad mad sumati yajñiya       api bhadra saumanasa as       tad sutrāman svavat indra mad       ārāt cit dveṣas sanutar yu
