        yaj id div gūrtāvasu       yaj bhūmi abhi prabhū       yaj deva aśvin       abhi sumna vṛdh       tad tvad mitrāvaruṇa dhāray kṣiti       suṣumna iṣitatvatā yaj       tvad kṛ sakhya       abhi as rakṣas       adha cit nu yat didhiṣ tvad       abhi priya rekṇas pat       vā yat puṣ rekṇas       sam nakir idam magha       adas anya asura div       tvad viśva varuṇa as rājan       mūrdhan ratha kan       na etāvat enas antakadruh       idam su etad śakapūta enas       dhā mitra nigam han vīra       vā yat dhā tanū       avas priya yajñiya arvan       tvad hi mātṛ aditi vicetas       div na bhūmi payas pū       ava priya diś       sūra nij raśmi       tvad hi apnarāj sad       sthā ratha na dhūrṣad vanarṣad       tad mad kaṇūkay       nṛmedha tṛ aṃhas       sumedha tṛ aṃhas 
        pra u su idam puroratha       indra śūṣa arc       abhīka cit u loka kṛt       saṃga samad vṛtrahan       mad bhū coditṛ       nabh anyaka       jyākā adhi dhanvan       tvad sindhu avasṛj       adharāñc han ahi       aśatru indra jan       viśva puṣ vārya       tad tvad pari svaj       nabh anyaka       jyākā adhi dhanvan       vi su viśva arāti       ari naś mad dhī       as śatru vadha       yad mad indra jighāṃs       yad tvad rāti dadi vasu       nabh anyaka       jyākā adhi dhanvan       yad mad indra abhitas jana       vṛkāyu ādiś       adhaspada tad īṃ kṛ       vibādha as sāsahi       nabh anyaka       jyākā adhi dhanvan       yad mad indra abhidās       sanābhi yad ca niṣṭya       ava tad bala tṛ       mah iva div adha tman       nabh anyaka       jyākā adhi dhanvan       mad indra tvāyu       sakhitva ā rabh       ṛta mad pathin nī       ati viśva durita       nabh anyaka       jyākā adhi dhanvan       mad su tvad indra tad śikṣ       yad duh prati vara jaritṛ       acchidra udhan pyā yathā mad       sahasra dhārā payas mah go 
        ubh yat indra rodas       āprā uṣas iva       mahat tvad mahi       samrāj carṣaṇi       devī janitrī jan       bhadra janitrī jan       ava sma durhaṇāy       marta tan sthira       adhaspada tad īṃ kṛ       yad mad ādiś       devī janitrī jan       bhadra janitrī jan       ava tya bṛhat iṣ       viśvaścandra amitra han       śacī śakra dhū       indra viśva ūti       devī janitrī jan       bhadra janitrī jan       ava yat tvad śatakratu       indra viśva dhū       rayi na su sacā       sahasrin ūti       devī janitrī jan       bhadra janitrī jan       ava sveda iva abhitas       viṣvañc pat didyu       dūrvā iva tantu       vi mad i durmati       devī janitrī jan       bhadra janitrī jan       dīrgha hi aṅkuśa yathā       śakti bhṛ mantumat       pūrva maghavan pad       aja vayā yathā yam       devī janitrī jan       bhadra janitrī jan       nakir deva mī       nakir ā yopay       mantraśrutya car       pakṣa apikakṣa       atra abhi sam rabh 
        yad vṛkṣa su palāśa       deva sampā yama       atra mad viśpati pitṛ       purāṇa anu ven       purāṇa anuven       car pāpa adas       asūy abhi cākaś       tad spṛhay punar       yad kumāra nava ratha       acakra manas kṛ       ekeṣa viśvatas prāñc       apaśyat adhi sthā       yad kumāra pravartay       ratha vipra pari       tad sāman anu pravṛt       sam itas nau ādhā       ka kumāra janay       ratha ka niḥ vartay       ka svid tad adya mad brū       anudeyī yathā bhū       yathā bhū anudeyī       tatas agra jan       purastāt budhna ātan       paścāt nirayaṇa kṛ       idam yama sādana       deva māna yad vac       idam idam dham nāḍī       idam gir pariṣkṛ 
        keśin agni keśin viṣa       keśin bhṛ rodasī       keśin viśva svar dṛś       keśin idam jyotis vac       muni vāta raśanā       piśaṅga vas mala       vāta anu dhrāji i       yat deva viś       unmaday mauneya       vāta ā sthā mad       śarīra id mad tvad       marta abhi paś       antarikṣa pat       viśva rūpa avacākaś       muni deva deva       saukṛtya sakhi dhā       vāta aśva vāyu sakhi       atho deva iṣ muni       ubh samudra ā kṣi       yad ca pūrva uta apara       apsaras gandharva       mṛga caraṇa car       keśin keta vid       sakhi svādu madintama       vāyu idam upamath       piṣ sma kunannama       keśin viṣa pātra       yat rudra pā saha 
        uta deva avadhā       deva ud nī punar       uta āgas kṛ deva       deva jīvay punar       dvi idam vāta vā       ā sindhu ā parāvat       dakṣa tvad anya as vā       parā anya vā yad rapas       ā vāta vā bheṣaja       vi vāta vā yad rapas       tvad hi viśva bheṣaja       deva dūta i       ā tvad gam śaṃtāti       atho ariṣṭatāti       dakṣa tvad bhadra ābhṛ       parā yakṣma sū tvad       trā iha deva       trā marut gaṇa       trā viśva bhūta       yathā idam arapas as       ap id vai u bheṣaja       ap amīva cātana       ap sarva bheṣaja       tad tvad kṛ bheṣaja       hasta daśan śākhā       jihvā vāc purogavī       anāmayitnu tvad       tad tvad upa spṛś 
        tvad tya indra sakhya vahni       ṛta man vi dardar vala       yatra daśasy uṣas ri ap       kutsa manman hi ca daṃsay       avasṛj prasū śvañcay giri       ud aj usrā pā madhu priya       vardhay vanin idam daṃsas       śuc sūrya ṛta jan gir       vi sūrya madhya muc ratha div       vid dāsa pratimāna ārya       dṛḍha pipru asura māyin       indra vi as kṛ ṛjiśvan       anādhṛṣṭa dhṛṣ vi as       nidhi adeva mṛ ayāsya       mās iva sūrya vasu purya ā dā       gṛ śatru śṛ virukmant       a yudh senā vibhu vibhid       dāś vṛtrahan tujya tij       indra vajra bhī abhiśnath       prakram śundhyu hā uṣas anas       etad tya tvad śrutya kevala       yat eka eka kṛ a yajña       mās vidhāna dhā adhi div       tvad vibhid bhṛ pradhi pitṛ 
        sūrya raśmi hari keśa purastāt       savitṛ jyotis ud yam ajasra       tad pūṣan prasava yā vid       saṃpaś viśva bhuvana gopā       nṛ cakṣas etad div madhya ās       āprā rodas antarikṣa       tad viśvāñc abhi cakṣ ghṛtāñc       antarā pūrva apara ca ketu       rai budhna saṃgamana vasu       viśva rūpa abhi cakṣ śacī       deva iva savitṛ satya dharman       indra na sthā samara dhana       viśvāvasu soma gandharva ap       dṛś tad ṛta vi i       tad anvave indra raṃh idam       pari sūrya paridhi paś       viśvāvasu abhi tad mad gṛ       divya gandharva rajas vimāna       yat vā gha satya uta yat na vid       dhī hi dhī id mad av       sasni vid caraṇa nadī       apāvṛ dvār aśman vraja       pra idam gandharva amṛta vac       indra dakṣa pari jñā ahi 
        agni tvad śravas vayas       mahi bhrāj arci vibhāvasu       bṛhadbhānu śavas vāja ukthya       dhā dāś kavi       pāvaka varcas śukra varcas       anūna varcas ud ṛch bhānu       putra mātṛ vicar upa av       pṛc rodas ubh       ūrj napāt jātavedas su śasti       mand dhīti hi       tvad iṣ sam bhūri varpas       citra ūti vāma jan       irajy agni prathay jantu       mad rai amartya       tad darśata vapus vi rāj       pṛc sānasi kratu       iṣkartṛ adhvara pracetas       kṣi rādhas mah       rāti vāma subhaga mah iṣ       dhā sānasi rayi       ṛtāvan mahiṣa viśva darśata       agni sumna dhā puras jana       śrut karṇa saprathastama tvad giri       daivya mānuṣa yuga 
        agni acchā vad iha mad       pratyañc mad su manas bhū       pra mad yam viś pati       dhana dā as mad tvad       pra mad yam aryaman       pra bhaga pra bṛhaspati       pra deva pra uta sūnṛtā       rai devī dā mad       soma rājan av       agni gir hvā       āditya viṣṇu sūrya       brahman ca bṛhaspati       indra vāyu bṛhaspati       su hava iha hvā       yathā mad sarva id jana       saṃgati su manas as       aryaman bṛhaspati       indra dāna coday       vāta viṣṇu sarasvatī       savitṛ ca vājin       tvad mad agni agni       brahman yajña ca vardhay       tvad mad devatāti       rai dāna coday 
        idam agni jaritṛ tvad bhū api       sahas sūnu nahi anya as āpya       bhadra hi śarman tri varūtha as tvad       āre hiṃsa apa didyu ā kṛ       pravat tvad agni janiman pitūy       sāci iva viśva bhuvana ni ṛj       pra sapti pra san mad dhī       puras car paśupa iva tman       uta vā u pari vṛj bhas       bahu agni ulapa svadhāvat       uta khilya urvarā bhū       mā tvad heti taviṣī krudh       yat udvat nivat yā bhas       pṛthak i pragardhin iva senā       yadā tvad vāta anuvā śocis       vaptṛ iva śmaśru vap pra bhūman       prati idam śreṇi dṛś       eka niyāna bahu ratha       bāhu yat agni anumarmṛj       uttāna anvi bhūmi       ud tvad śuṣma hā ud tvad arcis       ud tvad agni śam vāja       ucchvañc ni nam vṛdh       ā tvad adya viśva vasu sad       ap idam nyayana       samudra niveśana       anya kṛ itas pathin       tad yā vaśa anu       āyana tvad parāyaṇa       dūrvā ruh puṣpin       hrada ca puṇḍarīka       samudra gṛha idam 
        tya cit atri ṛta jur       artha aśva na yā       kakṣīvant yadi punar       ratha na kṛ nava       tya cit aśva na vājin       areṇu yad tan       dṛḍha granthi na vi sā       atri yaviṣṭha ā rajas       nara daṃsiṣṭha atri       śubhra siṣās dhī       atha hi tvad div nara       punar stoma na       cit tad tvad su rādhas       rāti sumati aśvin       ā yat mad sadana pṛthu       samana pṛ nara       tvad bhujyu samudra ā       rajas pāra īṅkhay       yā acchā patatrin       nāsatya sāti kṛ       ā tvad sumna śaṃyu iva       maṃhiṣṭha viśva vedas       sam mad bhūṣ nara       utsa na pyā iṣ 
        idam hi tvad amartya       indu atya na paty       dakṣa viśva āyus vedhas       idam mad kāvya       ṛbhu vajra dāsvat       idam bhṛ ūrdhva kṛśana mada       ṛbhu na kṛtvya mada       ghṛṣu śyena kṛtvan       idam sva vaṃsaga       ava dhī ahīśuva       yad suparṇa parāvat       śyena putra ābhṛ       śata cakra yad vartani       yad tvad śyena cāru avṛka pad bhṛ       aruṇa māna andhas       idam vayas vi tṛ āyus jīv       idam jāgṛ bandhu tā       eva tad indra indu       deva cit dhāray mahi tyajas       kratu vayas vi tṛ āyus su kratu       kratu idam mad su 
        idam khan oṣadhi       vīrudh balavattama       yad sapatnī bādh       yad saṃvid pati       uttāna parṇa subhaga       deva jū sahasvat       sapatnī mad parā dham       pati mad kevala kṛ       uttara mad uttara       uttara id uttara       atha sapatnī yad mad       adhara tad adhara       nahi idam nāman grah       na u idam ram jana       para eva parāvat       sapatnī gamay       mad as sah       atha tvad as sāsahi       ubh sahasvat bhū       sapatnī mad sah       upa tvad dhā sahamānā       abhi tvad dhā sahīyas       mad anu pra tvad manas       vatsa go iva dhāv       pathin vār iva dhāv 
        araṇyānī araṇyānī       adas yad pra iva naś       kathā grāma na pracch       na tvad bhī iva vid       vṛṣārava vad       yat upa av ciccika       āghāṭi iva dhāvay       araṇyāni mahīy       uta go iva ad       uta veśman iva dṛś       uta u araṇyāni sāyam       śakaṭī iva sarj       go aṅga etad ā hvā       dāru aṅga etad apavadh       vas araṇyānī sāyam       kruś iti man       na vā araṇyāni han       anya ced na abhigam       svādu phala jakṣ       yathākāma ni pad       āñjana gandhi surabhi       bahu anna a kṛṣīvala       pra mad mṛga mātṛ       araṇyāni śaṃs 
        śrath tvad dhā prathama manyu       han yat vṛtra narya viṣ apas       ubh yat tvad bhū rodas anu       rej śuṣma pṛthivī cit adrivat       tvad māyā anavadya māyin       śravasy manas vṛtra arday       tvad id nṛ vṛ gaviṣṭi       tvad viśva hu iṣṭi       ā idam kan puruhūta sūri       vṛdha yad maghavan aś magha       arc toka tanaya pariṣṭi       medhasāti vājin ahraya dhana       tad id nu rai su bhṛ kan       mada yad idam raṃh cit       tvāvṛdha maghavan dāśu adhvara       makṣū tad vāja bhṛ dhana nṛ       tvad śardha mahina gṛ       uru kṛ maghavan śak rai       tvad mad mitra varuṇa na māyin       pitu na dasma day vibhaktṛ 
        su indra stu tvad       san ca tuvi nṛmṇa vāja       ā mad bhṛ suvita yad kan       tman tan san tvota       ṛṣva tvad indra śūra jan       dāsa viś sūrya sah       guhā dhā guh guh ap       bhṛ prasravaṇa na soma       ari vā gir abhi arc vid       ṛṣi vipra sumati kan       tad as yad raṇay soma       enā uta tvad ratha vah bhakṣa       idam brahman indra tvad śaṃs       dā nṛ nṛ śūra śavas       tad bhū sakratu yad kan       uta trā gṛ uta sti       śru hava indra śūra pṛthi       uta stu venya arka       ā yad tvad yoni ghṛtavat svar       ūrmi na nimna dravay vakva 
        savitṛ yantra pṛthivī ram       askambhana savitṛ div dṛh       aśva iva duh dhuni antarikṣa       atūrta bandh savitṛ samudra       yatra samudra skambh vi und       ap napāt savitṛ tad vid       atas bhū atas ā utthā rajas       atas dyāvāpṛthivī prath       paścā idam anya bhū yajatra       amartya bhuvana bhūman       suparṇa aṅga savitṛ garutmant       pūrva jan tad u idam anu dharman       go iva grāma yūyudhi iva aśva       vāśrā iva vatsa sumanas duh       pati iva jāyā abhi mad ni i       dhartṛ div savitṛ viśva vāra       hiraṇyastūpa savitṛ yathā tu       āṅgirasa hvā vāja idam       eva tvad arc av vand       soma iva aṃśu prati jāgṛ mad 
        samindh cit sam indh       deva havya vāhana       āditya rudra vasu mad ā gam       mṛḍīka mad ā gam       idam yajña idam vacas       juṣ upāgam       marta tvad samindh hvā       mṛḍīka hvā       tvad u jātavedas       viśva vāra gṛ dhī       agni deva ā vah mad priya vrata       mṛḍīka priya vrata       agni deva deva bhū purohita       agni manuṣya ṛṣi sam indh       agni mah dhana sāti mad hvā       mṛḍīka dhana sāti       agni atri bharadvāja gaviṣṭhira       prāv mad kaṇva trasadasyu āhava       agni vasiṣṭha hvā purohita       mṛḍīka purohita 
        śraddhā agni sam indh       śraddhā hu havis       śraddhā bhaga mūrdhan       vacas veday       priya śraddhā dā       priya śraddhā didās       priya bhoja yajvan       idam mad vad kṛ       yathā deva asura       śraddhā ugra kṛ       evam bhoja yajvan       mad vad kṛ       śraddhā deva yaj       vāyu gopā upās       śraddhā hṛdayya ākūti       śraddhā vid vasu       śraddhā prātar hvā       śraddhā madhyaṃdina pari       śraddhā sūrya nimruc       śraddhā śrath dhāpay iha mad 
        śāsa itthā mahat as       amitra khāda adbhuta       na yad han sakhi       na ji kadācana       svasti dā viś pati       vṛtra han vimṛdha vaśin       vṛṣan indra puras i mad       soma pā abhayaṃkara       vi rakṣas vi mṛdh han       vi vṛtra hanu ruj       vi manyu indra vṛtrahan       amitra abhidās       vi mad indra mṛdh han       nīcā yam pṛtany       yad mad abhidās       adhara gamay tamas       apa indra dviṣ manas       apa jijyās vadha       vi manyu śarman yam       varīyas yavay vadha 
        īṅkhay apasyu       indra jan upās       bhaj su vīrya       tvad indra bala adhi       sahas jan ojas       tvad vṛṣan vṛṣan id as       tvad indra as vṛtrahan       vi antarikṣa tṛ       ud div stambh ojas       tvad indra sajoṣas       arka bhṛ bāhu       vajra śā ojas       tvad as       viśva jāta ojas       tad viśva bhū ābhū 
        soma eka pū       ghṛta eka upās       yad madhu pradhāv       tad cit eva api gam       tapas yad anādhṛṣya       tapas yad svar yā       tapas yad kṛ mahas       tad cit eva api gam       yad yudh pradhana       śūra yad tanūtyaj       yad vā sahasra dakṣiṇā       tad cit eva api gam       yad cit pūrva ṛtasāp       ṛtāvan ṛtāvṛdh       pitṛ tapasvat yama       tad cit eva api gam       sahasraṇītha kavi       yad gopāy sūrya       ṛṣi tapasvat yama       tapas ja api gam 
        arāyī kāṇa vikaṭa       giri gam sadānvā       śirimbiṭha satvan       tad tvad cātay       cat u itas cat amutas       sarva bhrūṇa ṛch       arāyī brahman pati       tīkṣṇa śṛṅga udṛṣ i       adas yad dāru plu       sindhu pāra apūruṣa       tad ā rabh durhaṇu       tad gam parastara       yat ha prāñc gam       uras maṇḍūradhāṇikī       han indra śatru       sarva budbuda yāśu       pari idam go nī       pari agni hṛ       deva kṛ śravas       ka idam ā dhṛṣ 
        agni hi mad dhī       sapti āśu iva āji       tad ji dhana dhana       yad go ākṛ       senā agni tvad ūti       tad mad hi maghatti       ā agni sthūra rayi bhṛ       pṛthu gomat aśvin       añj kha vartay paṇi       agni nakṣatra ajara       ā sūrya rohay div       dhā jyotis jana       agni ketu viś as       preṣṭha śreṣṭha upastha sat       budh stotṛ vayas dhā 
        idam nu kaṃ bhuvana sādh       indra ca viśva ca deva       yajña ca mad tanū ca prajā ca       āditya indra saha kﾱp       āditya indra sa gaṇa marut       mad bhū avitṛ tanu       han deva asura yat i       deva deva tva abhirakṣ       pratyañc arka nī śacī       āt id svadhā iṣira pari paś 
        sūrya mad div pā       vāta antarikṣa       agni mad pārthiva       juṣ savitṛ yad tvad       haras śata sava arh       pā mad didyut pat       cakṣus mad deva savitṛ       cakṣus mad uta parvata       cakṣus dhātṛ dhā mad       cakṣus mad dhā cakṣus       cakṣus vikhyā tanū       sam ca idam vi ca paś       su saṃdṛś tvad mad       prati paś sūrya       vi paś nṛ cakṣas 
        ud adas sūrya gā       ud idam māmaka bhaga       mad tad vidvala pati       abhi sah viṣāsahi       mad ketu mad mūrdhan       mad ugra vivācana       mad id anu kratu pati       sah upācar       mad putra śatru han       atho mad duhitṛ virāj       uta mad as saṃjaya       pati mad śloka uttama       yad indra havis kṛ       bhū dyumnin uttama       idam tad kṛ deva       asapatna kila bhū       asapatna sapatna ghna       ji abhibhūvan       āvṛj anya varcas       rādhas astheyas iva       sam ji idam mad       sapatnī abhibhūvan       yathā mad idam vīra       virāj jana ca 
        tīvra abhivayas idam pā       sarva ratha vi hari iha muc       indra mā tvad yajamāna anya       ni ram tvad idam su       tvad su tvad u sotva       tvad gir śvātrya ā hvā       indra idam adya savana juṣ       viśva vid iha pā soma       yad vaś manas soma idam       sarva hṛd deva kāma su       na go indra tad parā dā       praśaṃs id cāru idam kṛ       anupaś bhū etad idam       yad idam revat na su soma       niḥ aratni maghavan tad dhā       brahman dviṣ han anānudiṣṭa       aśvāyat gavyat vājay       hvā tvad upagam u       ābhūṣ tvad sumati nava       mad indra tvad śuna hu 
        muc tvad havis jīvana kaṃ       ajñāta yakṣma uta rājayakṣman       grāhi grah yadi vā etad enad       tad indra agni pra muc enad       yadi kṣi āyus yadi vā pare       yadi mṛtyu antika nī eva       tad ā hṛ nirṛti upastha       spṛ enad śata śārada       sahasra akṣa śata śārada       śata āyus havis hṛ enad       śata yathā idam śarad nī ati       indra viśva durita pāra       śata jīv śarad vṛdh       śata hemanta śata u vasanta       śata indra agni savitṛ bṛhaspati       śata āyus havis idam punar dā       āhṛ tvad vid tvad       punar āgā punarnava       sarva aṅga sarva tvad cakṣus       sarva āyus ca tvad vid 
        brahman agni saṃvid       rakṣas han bādh itas       amīvā yad tvad garbha       durṇāman yoni āśī       yad tvad garbha amīvā       durṇāman yoni āśī       agni tad brahman saha       niḥ kravyād naś       yad tvad han patay       niṣatsnu yad sarīsṛpa       jan yad tvad jighāṃs       tad itas nāśay       yad tvad ūru vihṛ       antarā dampati śī       yoni yad antar ārih       tad itas nāśay       yad tvad bhrātṛ pati bhū       jāra bhū nipad       prajā yad tvad jighāṃs       tad itas nāśay       yad tvad svapna tamas       mohay nipad       prajā yad tvad jighāṃs       tad itas nāśay 
        akṣi tvad nāsikā       karṇa chubuka adhi       yakṣma śīrṣaṇya mastiṣka       jihvā vi vṛh tvad       grīvā tvad uṣṇihā       kīkasā anūkya       yakṣma doṣaṇya aṃsa       bāhu vi vṛh tvad       āntra tvad gudā       vaniṣṭhu hṛdaya adhi       yakṣma matasna yakṛt       plāśi vi vṛh tvad       ūru tvad aṣṭhīvant       pārṣṇi prapada       yakṣma śroṇi bhāsada       bhaṃsas vi vṛh tvad       mehana vanaṃkaraṇa       loman tvad nakha       yakṣma sarva ātman       tad idam vi vṛh tvad       aṅga aṅga loman loman       jan parvan parvan       yakṣma sarva ātman       tad idam vi vṛh tvad 
        ape manas pati       apa kram paras car       paras nirṛti ā cakṣ       bahudhā jīv manas       bhadra vai vara vṛ       bhadra yuj dakṣiṇa       bhadra vaivasvata cakṣus       bahutrā jīv manas       yad āśas niḥśas abhiśas       upa ṛch jāgṛ yad svap       agni viśva apa duṣkṛta       ajuṣṭa āre mad dhā       yat indra brahman pati       abhidroha car       pracetas mad āṅgirasa       dviṣ pā aṃhas       ji adya san ca       bhū anāgas mad       jāgrant svapna saṃkalpa pāpa       yad dviṣ tad tad ṛch       yad mad dviṣ tad ṛch 
        deva kapota iṣay yad iṣ       dūta nirṛti idam āgam       tad arc kṛ niṣkṛti       śam mad as dvipad śam catuṣpada       śiva kapota iṣay mad as       anāgas deva śakuna gṛha       agni hi vipra juṣ havis mad       pari heti pakṣin mad vṛj       heti pakṣin na dabh mad       āṣṭrī pada kṛ agnidhāna       śam mad go ca puruṣa ca as       mā mad hiṃs iha deva kapota       yad ulūka vad mogha etad       yat kapota pada agni kṛ       yad dūta prahi etad etad       tad yama namas as mṛtyu       ṛc kapota nud praṇoda       iṣ mad pari go nī       saṃyopay durita viśva       hā mad ūrj pra pat patiṣṭha 
        ṛṣabha mad samāna       sapatna viṣāsahi       hantṛ śatru kṛ       virāj go pati go       mad as sapatna han       indra iva ariṣṭa akṣata       adhas sapatna mad pad       idam sarva abhiṣṭhā       atra eva tvad api nah       ubh ārtnī iva jyā       vācaspati ni sidh idam       yathā mad adhara vad       abhibhū mad āgam       viśvakarma dhāman       ā tvad citta ā tvad vrata       ā tvad mad samiti dā       yogakṣema tvad ādā       mad bhū uttama       ā tvad mūrdhan kram       adhas pada mad ud vad       maṇḍūka iva udaka       maṇḍūka udaka iva 
        tvad idam indra pari sic madhu       tvad su kalaśa rāj       tvad rayi puru vīra u mad kṛ       tvad tapas paritap ji svar       svar jit mahi mad andhas       hvā pari śakra suta upa       idam mad yajña iha budh ā gam       spṛdh ji maghavan ī       soma rājan varuṇa dharman       bṛhaspati anumati u śarman       tvad mad adya maghavan upastuti       dhātṛ vidhātṛ kalaśa bhakṣay       prasū bhakṣa kṛ caru api       stoma ca idam prathama sūri ud mṛj       su sāta yadi āgam tvad       prati viśvāmitra jamadagni dama 
        vāta nu mahiman ratha       ruj i stanay idam ghoṣa       divispṛś yā aruṇa kṛ       uta u i pṛthivī reṇu as       sam prer anu vāta viṣṭhā       ā enad gam samana na yoṣā       tad sayuj sa ratha deva i       idam viśva bhuvana rājan       antarikṣa pathin i       na ni viś katama cana ahar       ap sakhi prathama jā ṛtāvan       kva svid jan kutas ā bhū       ātman deva bhuvana garbha       yathāvaśam car deva etad       ghoṣa id idam śru na rūpa       tad vāta havis vidh 
        mayas bhū vāta abhi vā usrā       ūrjasvat oṣadhi ā riś       pīvasvat jīva dhanya pā       avasa padvat rudra mṛḍ       yad sarūpa virūpa eka rūpa       yad agni iṣṭi nāman vid       yad aṅgiras tapas iha kṛ       tad parjanya mahi śarman yam       yad deva tanū īray       yad soma viśva rūpa vid       tad mad payas pinv       prajāvat indra goṣṭha rā       prajāpati mad etad rā       viśva deva pitṛ saṃvid       śiva sat upa mad goṣṭha ā kṛ       tad mad prajā sam sad 
        vibhrāj bṛhat pā somya madhu       āyus dhā yajñapati avihruta       vāta jū yad abhirakṣ tman       prajā puṣ purudhā vi rāj       vibhrāj bṛhat su bhṛ vāja sātama       dharman div dharuṇa satya arpay       amitra han vṛtra han dasyu hantama       jyotis jan asura han sapatna han       idam śreṣṭha jyotis jyotis uttama       viśva jit dhana jit vac bṛhat       viśva bhrāj bhrāja mahi sūrya dṛś       uru prath sahas ojas acyuta       vibhrāj jyotis svar       gam rocana div       yad idam viśva bhuvana ābhṛ       viśvakarman viśvadevyāvat 
        tvad tya iṭa ratha       indra prāv sutāvat       śru somin hava       tvad makha dudh       śiras ava tvac bhṛ       gam somin gṛha       tvad tya indra martya       āstrabudhna venya       muhur śrath manasyu       tvad tya indra sūrya       paścā as puras kṛ       deva cit tiras vaśa 
        ā yā vanas saha       go sac vartani       yat ūdhas       ā yā vasu dhī       maṃhiṣṭha jāray makha       sudānu       pitu bhṛt na tantu id       sudānu       prati dhā yaj       uṣas apa svasṛ tamas       sam vartay vartani       su jan tā 
        ā tvad hṛ antar as       dhruva sthā avicācali       viś tvad sarva vāñch       mā tvad rāṣṭra adhi bhraṃś       iha eva as mā apa cyu       parvata iva avicācali       indra iva iha dhruva sthā       iha rāṣṭra u dhāray       idam indra dhṛ       dhruva dhruva havis       tad soma adhi brū       tad u brahman pati       dhruva div dhruva pṛthivī       dhruva parvata idam       dhruva viśva idam jagant       dhruva rājan viś idam       dhruva tvad rājan varuṇa       dhruva deva bṛhaspati       dhruva tvad indra ca agni ca       rāṣṭra dhāray dhruva       dhruva dhruva havis       abhi soma mṛś       atho tvad indra kevala       viś bali hṛt kṛ 
        abhīvarta havis       yad indra abhivṛt       tad mad brahmaṇaspati       abhi rāṣṭra vartay       abhivṛt sapatna       abhi yad mad arāti       abhi pṛtany sthā       abhi yad mad irasy       abhi tvad deva savitṛ       abhi soma vṛt       abhi tvad viśva bhūta       abhīvarta yathā as       yad indra havis kṛ       bhū dyumnin uttama       idam tad kṛ deva       asapatna kila bhū       asapatna sapatna han       abhirāṣṭra viṣāsahi       yathā mad idam bhūta       virāj jana ca 
        pra tvad grāvan savitṛ       deva sū dharman       dhur yuj su       grāvan apa ducchunā       apa sidh durmati       usrā kṛ bheṣaja       grāvan upara ā       mahīy sajoṣas       vṛṣan dhā vṛṣṇya       grāvan savitṛ nu tvad       deva sū dharman       yajamāna su 
        pra sūnu ṛbhu       bṛhat nū vṛjana       kṣāman yad viśva dhāyas       aś dhenu na mātṛ       pra deva deva dhī       bhṛ jātavedas       havya mad vah ānuṣak       idam u tya pra devayu       hotṛ yajña nī       ratha na yos abhīvṛta       ghṛṇīvat cit tman       idam agni uruṣy       amṛta iva janman       sahas cit sahīyas       deva jīvātu kṛ 
        pataṃga añj asura māyā       hṛd paś manas vipaścit       samudra antar kavi vi cakṣ       marīci pada iṣ vedhas       pataṃga vāc manas bhṛ       tad gandharva vad garbha antar       tad dyut svarya manīṣā       ṛta pada kavi ni pā       paś gopā a nipad       ā ca parā ca pathin car       tad sadhryañc tad viṣvañc vas       ā varvṛt bhuvana antar 
        tya u su vājin deva jū       sahāvan tarutṛ ratha       ariṣṭa nemi pṛtanāj āśu       svasti tārkṣya iha hvā       indra iva rāti ājohav       svasti nau iva ruh       uru na pṛthu bahula gabhīra       mā tvad eti mā pareti riṣ       sadyas cit yad śavas pañcan kṛṣṭi       sūrya iva jyotis ap tan       sahasra sā śata sā idam raṃhi       na sma vṛ yuvati na śaryā 
        ud sthā ava paś       indra bhāga ṛtviya       yadi śrī hu       yadi a śrī mad       śrī havis ā u su indra pra yā       gam sūra adhvan vimadhya       pari tvad ās nidhi sakhi       kulapā na vrāja pati car       śrī man ūdhas śrī agni       su śrī man tad ṛta navīyas       mādhyaṃdina savana dadhi       pā indra vajrin puru kṛt juṣ 
        pra sah puruhūta śatru       jyeṣṭha tvad śuṣma iha rāti as       indra ā bhṛ dakṣiṇa vasu       pati sindhu as revat       mṛga na bhīma kucara giriṣṭhā       parāvat ā gam para       sṛka saṃśā pavi indra tigma       vi śatru takṣ vi mṛdh nud       indra kṣatra abhi vāma ojas       jan vṛṣabha carṣaṇi       apanud jana amitray       uru deva kṛ u loka 
        prathas ca yad sa prathas ca nāman       ānuṣṭubha havis havis yad       dhātṛ dyutāna savitṛ ca viṣṇu       rathaṃtara ā bhṛ vasiṣṭha       vid tad atidhā yad as       yajña dhāman parama guhā yad       dhātṛ dyutāna savitṛ ca viṣṇu       bharadvāja bṛhant ā kṛ agni       tad vid manas dhī       yajus skand prathama deva yāna       dhātṛ dyutāna savitṛ ca viṣṇu       ā sūrya bhṛ gharma etad 
        bṛhaspati nī durgaha tiras       punar nī agha śaṃsa manman       kṣip aśasti apa durmati han       atha kṛ yajamāna śam yos       narāśaṃsa mad av prayāja       śam mad as anuyāja hava       kṣip aśasti apa durmati han       atha kṛ yajamāna śam yos       tapurmūrdhan tap rakṣas yad       brahman dviṣ śaru han u       kṣip aśasti apa durmati han       atha kṛ yajamāna śam yos 
        paś tvad manas cekit       tapas jan tapas vibhū       iha prajā iha rayi rā       pra jan prajā putra kāma       paś tvad manas dhī       sva tanū ṛtvya nādh       upa mad uccā yuvati bhū       pra jan prajā putra kāma       mad garbha dhā oṣadhī       mad viśva bhuvana antar       mad prajā janay pṛthivī       mad jani aparī putra 
        viṣṇu yoni kalpay       tvaṣṭṛ rūpa piś       ā sic prajāpati       dhātṛ garbha dhā tvad       garbha dhā sinīvālī       garbha dhā sarasvatī       garbha tvad aśvin deva       ā dhā puṣkarasraj       hiraṇyaya araṇī       yad nirmath aśvin       tad tvad garbha hvā       daśama mās sū 
        mahi tri avas as       dyukṣa mitra aryaman       durādharṣa varuṇa       nahi tad amā cana       na adhvan vāraṇa       īś ripu agha śaṃsa       yad putra aditi       pra jīv martya       jyotis yam ajasra 
        vāta ā vā bheṣaja       śambhu mayobhu mad hṛd       pra mad āyus tṛ       uta vāta pitṛ as mad       uta bhrātṛ uta mad sakhi       tad mad jīvātu kṛ       yad adas vāta tvad gṛha       amṛta nidhi dhā       tatas mad dā jīv 
        pra agni vāc īray       vṛṣabha kṣiti       tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ       yad para parāvat       tiras dhanvan atiruc       tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ       yad rakṣas nijūrv       vṛṣa śukra śocis       tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ       yad viśva abhi vipaś       bhuvana sam ca paś       tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ       yad idam pāra rajas       śukra agni jan       tad mad pṛ ati dviṣ 
        pra nūnam jātavedas       aśva hi vājin       idam mad barhis āsad       idam pra jātavedas       vipra vīra mīḍhvas       mah ṛch suṣṭuti       yad ruc jātavedas       devatrā havya vāhana       tad mad yajña inv 
        ā idam go pṛśni kram       sad mātṛ puras       pitṛ ca pre svar       antar car rocana       idam prāṇa apān       vi khyā mahiṣa div       triṃśat dhāman vi rāj       vāc pataṃga dhā       prati vastu aha div 
        ṛta ca satya ca abhīndh       tapas adhi jan       tatas rātri jan       tatas samudra arṇava       samudra arṇava adhi       saṃvatsara jan       ahorātra vidhā       viśva miṣ vaśin       sūryācandramas dhātṛ       yathāpūrvam kalpay       div ca pṛthivī ca       antarikṣa atho svar 
        sam sam id yu vṛṣan       agni viśva ari ā       iḍ pada sam indh       tad mad vasu ā bhṛ       sam gam sam vad       sam tvad manas jñā       deva bhāga yathā pūrva       saṃjñā upās       samāna mantra samiti samāna       samāna manas saha citta idam       samāna mantra abhi mantray tvad       samāna tvad havis hu
